quote: Writing, when properly managed, (as you may be sure I think mine is) is but a different name for conversation.
author: Laurence Sterne

quote: I don’t teach. I just show them why to learn, what to learn, how to learn, and the ultimate purpose of learning.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There is much pleasure to be gained from useless knowledge.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Be strong. There is hope in any situation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Today I wonder why it is God refers to Himself as 'Father' at all. This, to me, in light of the earthly representation of the role, seems a marketing mistake.
author: Donald Miller, Blue Like Jazz: Nonreligious Thoughts on Christian Spirituality

quote: She hugged me and I could feel the heat rise in my face, either from shame or love, like there was a difference.
author: Christopher Moore, Lamb: The Gospel According to Biff, Christ's Childhood Pal

quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Joy comes, grief goes, we know not how.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: In times of your need, you will know your true friends.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Money, it turned out, was exactly like sex, you thought of nothing else if you didn't have it and thought of other things if you did.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: When you look for beauty, you usually end up finding it.From Central Park Song (A Screenplay)
author: Zack Love, Stories and Scripts: an Anthology

quote: Know what you want. Pursue what you need. Realize what you ought. Attain what you desire.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You can only write well ,what you have lived.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Outside, snow solidified itself into graceful forms. The peace of winter stars seemed permanent.
author: Toni Morrison, Beloved

quote: And yet,to say the truth, reason and love keep little company together nowadays.
author: William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream

quote: The horizons of man are incomparably narrower than that of the land on which he toils. Editor of the Nebraska journal
author: H.W. Brands, American Colossus: The Triumph of Capitalism, 1865-1900

quote: He was right that I was afraid. But I didn’t think I was afraid of the truth. I was afraid of believing something that would destroy me if it turned out to be a lie.
author: Amy Harmon, The Law of Moses

quote: May you find the grace of triumph in any situation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Take care. If you do not speak – I shall claim you as my own in some strange presumptuous way. Send me away at once, if I must go; – Margaret! –
author: Elizabeth Gaskell, North and South

quote: Don't talk for five minutes, there's a good chap! I've a strange feeling come over me--almost as if I were going to think!
author: Aleister Crowley, Moonchild

quote: Welcome to Hollywood. Here you can be whatever you want! That's the secret of American success! Fake it till you make it!
author: Lily Amis, America’s Royal Family

quote: What we call wisdom is the result of all the wisdom of past ages. Our best institutions are like young trees growing upon the roots of the old trunks that have crumbled away.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: There is very hard bonding between Tears and Rain, often both falls together in Happiness and in Pain'' -Samar Sudha
author: Samar Sudha

quote: We all have an inner intuition for authenticity, for matched up internal and external truth. When we detect this, we feel immediate comfort. We know truth when we hear it.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: Drink freely the wine life offers you and don't worry how much you spill.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: War had bled color from everything, leaving nothing but a storm of gray.
author: Ruta Sepetys, Salt to the Sea

quote: You can't get mad at a real ending. Some of them are ugly. It's the fake happily ever afters that should piss you off.
author: Colleen Hoover, Hopeless

quote: A new word. Bright with possibilities. A flawless pearl to turn over and over in my hand, then put away for safekeeping.
author: Jennifer Donnelly, A Northern Light

quote: If a pleasure lasts forever, it isn’t a pleasure anymore.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: They're a group called The Spirit-crushers and their leader is known as The Almighty Spirit-crusher.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Imagination

quote: Live with boldness! Get drunk with all of the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The cause of liberty becomes a mockery if the price to be paid is the wholesale destruction of those who are to enjoy liberty. Ghandi, quoted in Merton, p. 68
author: Thomas Merton, Gandhi On Non-Violence

quote: If your love for your wife can be measured, it is not big enough.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Life is a gift and every day is an opportunity to share your gift with others. Don’t be grateful, be fabulously grateful
author: Val Uchendu

quote: I discovered that seventeen-year-old girls have such huge verbal energy that their brain drives them to expend it every twenty seconds. On the third day I decided I had to find her a boyfriend -- if possible, a deaf one.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón, The Angel's Game

quote: As I get older I find it more and more easy to watch a pot until it boils.
author: Clifford Cohen

quote: If there is a war to be fought, we don’t consider cost one of the factors in deciding whether or not to fight.
author: Philip Pullman, The Golden Compass

quote: This was how girls left. They packed up their suitcases and walked away in high heels. They pretended they weren't crying, that it wasn't the worst day of their lives.
author: Janet Fitch, White Oleander

quote: Using someone else’s ruler to measure your self-worth will always leave you short.
author: Charles F. Glassman

quote: An intelligent person has knowledge, but a wise person has experience with humility.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: You'll never understand me as long as you're looking at me through society's lenses.
author: Robert Tew

quote: This was why Kiki had dreaded having girls: she knew she wouldn't be able to protect them from self-disgust.
author: Zadie Smith, On Beauty

quote: To four years until freedom," she said lifting her glass.He raised his in salute. "To you, Celaena." Their eyes met, and Chaol didn't hide his smile as she grinned at him. Perhaps four years with her might not be enough.
author: Sarah J. Maas, Throne of Glass

quote: No one knows you better than the one who created you.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Once the illusion (branti) goes away, one can see ‘as it is’, and that is why ignorance goes away. When ignorance goes, maya (deceit) goes. Once God’s maya is gone, the solution is found.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: It doesn’t matter your area of calling, you can invest quality time into it, you will definitely become the best and that will buy you greatness.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Veritable Source of Energy

quote: Success  which is something so simple in the end  is made up of thousands of things  we never fully know what.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: The next presumption is always valid: one's knowledge corresponds toone's intellectual capacity.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: It is a sign of creeping inner death when we can no longer praise the living.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: If you judge art be its cover, you efface the very essence of it
author: Evy Michaels

quote: And although I appreciated their kindness more than they would ever know, it's a fact that friends last longer the less you use them.
author: Lisa Kleypas, Sugar Daddy

quote: If safety is my goal, living life is not.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: The funny thing about facing imminent death is that it really snaps everything else into perspective.
author: James Patterson, The Angel Experiment

quote: Parents don't become inaccessible to your Children, when they don't get the right information from you, they may get the wrong one from an outsider; you are their Caretaker..be wise!
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Best Option

quote: Merely by doing darshan of just one kashay free person, one’s paap (sins; demerit karmas) get washed away! There can be no kashay-free person other than a Gnani.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: A true leader leads his people from the front and if he falls into a pit the people will surely not follow.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: In essence  the renaissance is simply the green end of one of civilization's hardest winters.
author: John Fowles

quote: If you just want to do something because it is a customary new year resolution, then soon enough the year will get a bit older, and the strength of your decision will also begin to wear off.
author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

quote: My wish is that you may be loved to the point of madness.
author: André Breton, What is Surrealism?: Selected Writings

quote: Life demands death. Life demands death to ego – A state when we only think and care about ourselves.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When your intentions are pure, so too will be your success.
author: Charles F. Glassman

quote: But nothing less than the most radical imagination will carry us beyond this place, beyond the mere struggle for survival, to that lucid recognition of our possibilities which will keep us impatient, and unresigned to mere survival.
author: Adrienne Rich, On Lies, Secrets, and Silence: Selected Prose, 1966-1978

quote: A millionaires' mindset focus moves from posessions to feelings, once they become conscious and awake.
author: Tony Dovale

quote: ...all she could think was 'This is how close a kiss is'. It felt every bit as dangerous as she'd imagined.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Raven Boys

quote: They were dealt with as in war, and they naturally employed the means that were used against them.
author: Leo Tolstoy, Resurrection

quote: Growing up is like that, I suppose. The strings fall away and you're left standing on your own.
author: Alan Bradley, Thrice the Brinded Cat Hath Mew'd

quote: I have no expectation that any man will read history aright who thinks that what was done in a remote age, by men whose names have resounded far, has any deeper sense than what he is doing today.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, The Essays of Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The only time I ever enjoyed ironing was the day I accidentally got gin in the steam iron.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Connie felt again the tightness, niggardliness of the men of her generation. They were so tight, so scared of life!
author: D.H. Lawrence

quote: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: The earth is crying for people who make sound judgement and informed decisions.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You think I'm gorgeous?”“When I look at you, all I can think about are the the different ways I'd like to fuck you.”“So that's a yes then?” she said shyly.“No, darlin. It's an I-hope-you-weren't-planning-on-sleeping-alone-tonight.
author: Nenia Campbell, Locked and Loaded

quote: What is suspicion? It is a tool to ruin one’s own Soul.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Play the game of life, without any fear.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: It was love, the real thing, nothing less or different.
author: Anuradha Bhattacharyya, The Road Taken

quote: When their minds mingle with His magnanimity, something of eternity rubs off on their imaginations.
author: Geoffrey Wood

quote: You're either reading a book or you're not.
author: Jonathan Franzen

quote: Always be a poet, even in prose.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Sometimes what may appear as unfair, may actually be a huge favor from the Universe, pushing you in the right direction to live your dreams.
author: Julieanne O'Connor, SPELLING IT OUT FOR YOUR CAREER

quote: Respect everyone who crosses your path, even if you feel they don't deserve it.
author: Alaric Hutchinson, Living Peace

quote: Sometimes, sleepers turn up as common people who do everyday things, and create a new destiny for themselves when nobody’s watching.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D., Sleepers: A Little Book on How to Find Hope, Meaning and the Courage to Fall in Love with Your Dreams

quote: I think it’s the books that you read when you’re young that live with you forever.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Reality can exceed even your wildest dreams.
author: Brownell Landrum, Repercussions: DUET stories Volume IV - Adult Version

quote: Business is not about negotations, its about mutually finding a point of balance where both parties find their objectives meeting.
author: Sukant Ratnakar, Open the Windows

quote: Remember, if you don’t do anything – if you don’t change the way your mind works and direct your subconscious mind to create the life you want – then everything stays the same, nothing changes.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: A writer is rarely so well inspired as when he talks about himself.
author: Anatole France

quote: In life; there are two things you should never believe: the tears of women and the hearts of men, and there are two things you should always believe in life; the hearts of women, and the tears of men.
author: Eyden I., Woman's Book: Only For Men

quote: Hearing nuns' confessions is like being stoned to death with popcorn.
author: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: Have the courage to be ignorant of a great number of things, in order to avoid the calamity of being ignorant of everything.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: Older women are best, because they always think they may be doing it for the last time.
author: Ian Fleming

quote: There is scarcely any passion without struggle.
author: Albert Camus, The Myth of Sisyphus and Other Essays

quote: Sometimes we are very convinced that what we went through needs to be re-lived so we end up going back and forth to the demons of the past and eventually we fail to get over them.
author: Stephen Richards, The Pain You Feel Today Is The Strength You Feel Tomorrow

quote: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
author: Brian Tracy, The Gift of Self-Confidence

quote: My greatest treasure is my thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Whilst you can be a stepping stone to help others succeed, you are not a dirty mat to be abused by others.
author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

quote: Those who have eyes…do not know their happiness.
author: André Gide, La symphonie pastorale

quote: He promised her that he would give her everything, everything she wanted, as men in love always do. And she trusted him despite herself, as women in love always do.
author: Philippa Gregory, The White Queen

quote: Do not lose hope — what you seek will be found. Trust ghosts. Trust those that you have helped to help you in their turn. Trust dreams. Trust your heart, and trust your story. (from 'Instructions')
author: Neil Gaiman, Fragile Things: Short Fictions and Wonders

quote: The greatest duty of life is to find the ultimate purpose of life. The second greatest duty is to put a laser focus on it and take action.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: No dream can be more beautiful than the reality itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: It's never too late to love and live again.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I don't want to tax my mind to find perfect Iron Man line.~ Aarush Kashyap
author: Kirtida Gautam, #iAm16iCan

quote: Sex should be about mutual enjoyment, connection, the borrowing from another’s fire at a moment when you want it most.
author: Alessandra Torre, Sex Love Repeat

quote: Is there not glory enough in living the days given to us? You should know there is adventure in simply being among those we love and the things we love, and beauty too.
author: Lloyd Alexander, The Black Cauldron

quote: I come here with no expectations, only to profess, now that I am at liberty to do so, that my heart is and always will be...yours.
author: Jane Austen, Sense and Sensibility

quote: A home filled with nothing but yourself. It's heavy, that lightness. It's crushing, that emptiness.
author: Margaret Atwood, The Tent

quote: Love thy soul, manifest thy light
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: There are women named Faith, Hope, Joy, and Prudence. Why not Despair, Guilt, Rage, and Grief? It seems only right. 'Tom, I'd like you to meet the girl of my dreams, Tragedy.' These days, Trajedi.
author: George Carlin, Brain Droppings

quote: Support those that have supported you.
author: Avina Celeste

quote: Our confident hope is our great trust in God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You can only make magic if you act at the right time when the right conditions are in place
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Book of Wisdom

quote: I make art, sometimes I make true art, and sometimes it fills the empty places in my life. Some of them. Not all.
author: Neil Gaiman, The Ocean at the End of the Lane

quote: A vision is something that holds you up when everyone pushes you down.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Don’t you think it’s better to continue reading than to just close the book?
author: Rebecca McNutt, Shadowed Skies: The Third Smog City Novel

quote: I wonder how one can hate to love and love to hate the same person over a period of time in a relationship
author: Amit Abraham

quote: By studying human history, we can realize how much of human stupidity has fallen on fertile ground. Is gravity guilty for such an occurrence too?
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: Do not spend all your strength to make money.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Art makes the spirit soar. And when the spirit is lifted, life follows.
author: Adriana Trigiani, Don't Sing at the Table: Life Lessons from My Grandmothers

quote: A stóirín, ya are a handful of trouble, but I kind of like it.
author: Michelle M. Pillow, Love Potions

quote: Oh sorry, I was taking life seriously.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: The greatest evil that can befall man is that he should come to think ill of himself.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: If you want to conquer fear  don't sit at home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Nice words and nice appearance doesn't conclude that someone is nice, i believe that the nicer you look, the more deceptive you appear.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Of my friends  I am the only one I have left.
author: Terence

quote: We only realize what happiness is about, after it has slammed the door to our inattention; and killing silence has deafened the tunefulness of our life. ("Happy days are back again")
author: Erik Pevernagie

quote: For me, the most interesting people seem to have the bumpiest pasts. I prefer to connect with someone who has experienced the struggles, battles, and casualties of life’s journey. There is beauty, wisdom, and truth to be found in the scars.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Literature is news that stays news.
author: Ezra Pound, ABC of Reading

quote: If some musicians put half as much effort in to the business side as they do their outer look and appearances, they could be twice as far.
author: Loren Weisman

quote: True love is when you relish the orange she eats.
author: Tapan Ghosh, Faceless The Only Way Out

quote: A book, too, can be a star 'explosive material, capable of stirring up fresh life endlessly.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The only difference between the saint and the sinner is that every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Fear is really quite tedious. She wanted to be rid of it as soon as possible.
author: Jim Butcher, The Aeronaut's Windlass

quote: You cannot catch a whale and a fish with the same bait.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Small truths have greater power than big lies.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: [I]f we revert to history, we shall find that the women who have distinguished themselves have neither been the most beautiful nor the most gentle of their sex.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft, A Vindication of the Rights of Woman

quote: Aren't 3,000 lives worth a miracle to a good and all-powerful god?
author: Zack Love, The Doorman

quote: To be ill adjusted to a deranged world is not a breakdown.
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: Why is it that when you awake to the world of realities you nearly always feel, sometimes very vividly, that the vanished dream has carried with it some enigma which you have failed to solve?
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, The Idiot

quote: The sound of a kiss is not as strong as that of a cannon, but its echo endures much longer.
author: Richard Paul Evans, The Last Promise

quote: The first rule about the low hanging fruit principle is to always watch out for low hanging branches, they’re the ones to take it away from you.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: By nature men are uncontrollable and wild, and it should be, but women have the key to control them, if they know how to use it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: as long as there arehuman beings aboutthere is never going to beany peacefor any individualupon this earth (oranywhere elsethey mightescape to).all you can dois maybe grabten lucky minuteshereor maybe an hourthere.somethingis working toward youright now, andI mean youand nobody butyou.
author: Charles Bukowski, You Get So Alone at Times That it Just Makes Sense

quote: As troubles bring money, money in turn can also bring troubles.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: The only chains you should wear in life are the chains of commitment.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Without the journey and crucial moment of understanding, I would still be questioning everything before me. I know now that I must trust what comes next, for there is a plan greater than the one I can see at work.
author: Brynn Myers, Falling Out of Focus

quote: When I see an arrogant man, I see one less competitor.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: And yet another moral occurs to me now: Make love when you can. It's good for you.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr., Mother Night

quote: But I know I will do neither; nothing. I have all the time in the world, and yet, I can't be bothered.
author: Sara Baume, A Line Made by Walking

quote: God will never leave nor forsake you even at the time of the most difficult trials
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I think children love reading, and they will make time for it if we put the right books into their hands. And I hope I get the chance to keep being one of the people that writes them.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Let strength & wisdom carry you forward beyond the limited horizons — you may have once envisioned.
author: Eleesha, The Soulful Pathway to Quotes: Soulfully Inspiring and Uplifting You Daily by Utilizing the Power of Positive Quotes

quote: We stand in the awe of God’s greatness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I am treating you as my friend  asking you to share my present minuses in the hope I can ask you to share my future pluses.
author: Katherine Mansfield

quote: Achieving your heart’s desire is the key to living a life of bliss, bring your heart alive with a passion for living.
author: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

quote: Like fragile ice anger passes away in time.
author: Ovid

quote: Hope doesn't require a massive chain where heavy links of logic hold it together. A thin wire will do...just strong enough to get us through the night until the winds die down.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: The joy of living is the gratitude of the moment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I scream out the ropes of words that bound my tongue, and the heavens echo back...'I love you'.
author: Alfa H

quote: No soul sin beyond recovery.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I really can't think about kissing when I've got a rebellion to incite.
author: Suzanne Collins, Catching Fire

quote: The man who can keep a secret may be wise, but he is not half as wise as the man with no secrets to keep
author: Edgar Watson Howe

quote: I searched for love, and only found God; I searched for God, and only found love.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Peace is an inner perception not an outer condition.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
author: Robert Frost

quote: A doctorate study is the passion for extensive research, reading, thinking and writing.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My mom fed us a lot of processed food when we were kids, like chicken fingers, grilled cheese sandwiches and quesadillas. I make those treats for my family, too, but I use organic cheeses and whole wheat bread and tortillas.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Every fragment of time that passes daily must be converted for it to be fully effective
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Don’t always deprive yourself trying to please others
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Definitions from Mulla Do-Piaza.Poverty: The result of marriage.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: Always ask yourself if you are really serving God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: History tells us that six million Jews disappeared during that war. If there was no Holocaust, where did they go?' She shakes her head. 'All of that, and the world didn't learn anything. Look around. There's still ethnic cleansing. There's discrimination.
author: Jodi Picoult, The Storyteller

quote: Can the Ethiopian change his skin  or the leopard his spots?
author: Bible

quote: Good health is a holy blessing.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Troubles teaches us what we must know.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It is deliberate policy to keep even the favoured groups somewhere near the brink of hardship, because a general state of scarcity increases the importance of small privileges and thus magnifies the distinction between one group and another.
author: George Orwell, 1984

quote: Let's us hold hands together in harmony for a peaceful co -existence for alll humankind in every nation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Reality is, you know, the tip of an iceberg of irrationality that we've managed to drag ourselves up onto for a few panting moments before we slip back into the sea of the unreal.
author: Terence McKenna

quote: Life is like playing a violin in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Discipline Your Mind to Think Positively: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: Don’t cover up your sore with your wealth. Your wealth has limitations. At the Limit the sore will embarrassing by surface
author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Repositioning Yourself for Greater Success

quote: Who cares about tomorrow?What more is tomorrow,than another day?(-The Avett Brothers, "Swept Away")
author: Colleen Hoover, Slammed

quote: I find love is more of a bacterium than a virus unless you are comparing it to herpes.
author: Amanda Mosher, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: On the Kite, the situation was being 'workshopped'. This is the means by which people who don't know anything get together to pool their ignorance.
author: Terry Pratchett, The Last Hero

quote: Sometimes I feel as if I'm racing with my own shadow
author: Haruki Murakami, After Dark

quote: The miracle centered gospel gives rise to a generation of people that believes that they don’t need to be good, better than anybody else but just want to pray and get favor.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: What is natural, needs to be looked upon, scrutinized and reshaped by each generation of the world, to make it compatible with the path of progress of a civilized society.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

quote: Abundance in life is achieved only when we tear down walls and fill our lives with light.
author: Seth Adam Smith, Your Life Isn't for You: A Selfish Person's Guide to Being Selfless

quote: Even the best Mindset will become contaminated and eventually blunted in a toxic organisational culture.
author: Tony Dovale

quote: Stress does not come from problems. It originates from fear which comes from the anticipation of problems.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To worry is to wear yourself out.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I eyed her like a thirsty traveler in the desert looks at a pail of water.
author: Faraaz Kazi, Truly, Madly, Deeply

quote: This is how many people become artists, musicians, writers, computer programmers, record-holding athletes, scientists... by spending time alone practicing what they love.
author: Meg Cabot

quote: I wither slowly in thine arms; here at the quiet limit of the world, a white hair'd shadow roaming like a dream.
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: All our good deeds cannot save us.We are saved by grace and faith in Jesus Christ.
author: Lailah GiftyAkita

quote: Maybe all that silence about my brother did something to me. I think it did. Not talking can make a guy pretty lonely
author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz, Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe

quote: Were it not for imagination  a man would be as happy in the arms of a chambermaid as of a duchess.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: To enlighten your life, see beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The human mind is the principal agent of creation. How we think is the prism for how we perceive reality.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: Anger and resentment are problems for our understanding and vision. They happen when we are away from our real purpose and mission.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The knife will only hurt for a moment. Then your choice will be made, and it will all be over.
author: Veronica Roth, Four: A Divergent Story Collection

quote: No one on earth is "functionless". The problem we usually have is that functions of people are being displayed in the wrong positions! Change position!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: I think one of the terrible things today is that people have this deathly fear of food: fear of eggs, say, or fear of butter. Most doctors feel that you can have a little bit of everything.
author: Julia Child

quote: Every morning the sun rises to wake you up with a beautiful message of peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There are no rules, because life is made up of too many rules as it is.
author: Jennifer Niven, All the Bright Places

quote: When you become the source of joy, when you become the source of peace, your world and world around you become joyful and peaceful. you become the symbol and messenger of joy and peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You can achieve anything, as long as you put your mind to it.
author: Ane Krstevska

quote: Men love pleasure, but women wish for purposeful promise.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: One of the expedients of party to acquire influence, within particular districts, is to misrepresent the opinions and aims of other districts.
author: George Washington, George Washington's Farewell Address

quote: I get it,' said the prisoner. 'Good Cop, Bad Cop, eh?'If you like.' said Vimes. 'But we're a bit short staffed here, so if I give you a cigarette would you mind kicking yourself in the teeth?
author: Terry Pratchett, Night Watch

quote: With God’s help in the grasp of addiction you’ll find the truth. When we understand this and its purity, then true healing can begin.
author: Ron Baratono

quote: There is a pleasure a bee takes in collecting nectar and piling it into a hive. It knows well that the chores involved in such a task will yield sweet results.
author: Gloria D. Gonsalves, The Wisdom Huntress: Anthology of Thoughts and Narrations

quote: Love words, agonize over sentences. And pay
author: Susan Sontag

quote: Some people are designed to be included in your story but not part of your destiny.
author: Ane Krstevska

quote: You're such a cynic," Molly said."I think cynics are playful and cute.
author: Jim Butcher, Changes

quote: Die Wahrheit hat keinen Erfolg.
author: Confucius, Gespräche

quote: Ursula craved solitude but she hated loneliness
author: Kate Atkinson, Life After Life

quote: So many bad things have happened to them that they can't trust the good things. They have to shove them away before someone can get it back.
author: Wally Lamb, The Hour I First Believed

quote: Some legends say that Hera's breast milk sprayed across the sky and created the Milky Way. I don't know. That seems like a whole lot of solar systems from just one squirt
author: Rick Riordan, Percy Jackson's Greek Heroes

quote: It is important to create a family and bring up a child: these things are good and even necessary
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: It is only upon life’s new journey & pathway that your greatest learning - will be experienced.
author: Eleesha, The Soulful Pathway To Empowerment:  Soulfully Empowering You to Overcome Life's Challenges & to Achieve Your Goals

quote: A man with a victim mentality feels like being a victim who is complaining and crying all the time
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We must begin to speak with each other in a gentle manner.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Communication is an art form that is crafted throughout our lives.
author: Asa Don Brown, Interpersonal Skills in the Workplace, Finding Solutions that Work

quote: All of the great leaders have had one characteristic in common: it was the willingness to confront unequivocally the major anxiety of their people in their time. This, and not much else, is the essence of leadership.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Oh, quit it! You're the possessor of a beautiful wife, a beautiful gas-stove, and you were going to forget all this race-hysteria.
author: Sinclair Lewis, Kingsblood Royal

quote: If you put a money sign in front of your eyes, how will you see the world?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The was something very satisfying about a smile that had to be earned.
author: Kasie West, By Your Side

quote: We should not only attend church but must have a ministry in the church as well
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The earth is man’s domain.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Love what you do and your heart will lead the rest of the way.
author: Jill Telford

quote: The place where "me & I" does not exist - Leadership
author: Alin Sav

quote: My destination is no longer a place, rather a new way of seeing.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Flowers for Algernon again? she asks. Doesn't that book always make you cry?One day it won't, I say. I want to be sure to be reading it on that day.
author: Nicola Yoon, Everything, Everything

quote: Even when you can't see, God is working it out. You should not be discouraged or give up hope. Keep the Faith! Your situation is not your destination. God will do what he promised, you just be ready
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Release The Ink

quote: All spheres of life in society are mission fields. They are the “Promised Land” where the Lordwill lead us to.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Baseball is 90 percent mental. The other half is physical.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: Courage comes from a heart that is CONVINCED it is loved.
author: Beth Moore

quote: Battles are lost in the same spirit in which they are won.
author: Walt Whitman, Leaves of Grass

quote: You need to be your own cheer squad not your own worst enemy.
author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

quote: Through Jiu Jitsu I have developed many of the most meaningful relationships in my life, and if that were the only benefit of my practice, Jiu Jitsu would still be the best endeavor I have ever undertaken.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Continued Education Through Jiu Jitsu

quote: We are born in the ocean of love and we love the ocean and her touch so much.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The Lord prefers common-looking people. That is why he made so many of them.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: He who hears the rippling of rivers in these degenerate days will not utterly despair.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Never live life without a hope.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When 'Midnight's Children' came out, people in the West tended to respond to the fantasy elements in the novel, to praise it in those terms. In India, people read it like a history book.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: And now we step to the rhythm of miracles.--from The Light, That Never Dies
author: Aberjhani, Elemental: The Power of Illuminated Love

quote: I am not trying to teach you anything but trying to ignite the fire of curiosity for knowledge and wisdom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There was a large sting near his upper lip. I touched it lightly. “Does it hurt?”My gaze moved from his lips up to his eyes. He was looking at me in a way that made me blush.“Yes,” he responded quietly.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: My whole theory of writing I can sum up in one sentence. An author ought to write for the youth of his own generation, the critics of the next, and the schoolmasters of ever afterward.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Even when poetry has a meaning, as it usually has, it may be inadvisable to draw it out. Perfect understanding will sometimes almost extinguish pleasure.
author: A.E. Housman

quote: Happiness, that grand mistress of the ceremonies in the dance of life, impels us through all its mazes and meanderings, but leads none of us by the same route.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: The test of glory and wealth is the hardest to pass
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: This advice, although good, was totally inapplicable to my case.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley, Frankenstein

quote: Don’t allow people to come in and out of your life when it only benefits them.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: The fault I find with our journalism is that it forces us to take an interest in some fresh triviality or other every day, whereas only three or four books in a lifetime give us anything that is of real importance.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Love her but leave her wild
author: Atticus Poetry, Love Her Wild: Poems

quote: Not only believe in yourself but trust in yourself. Confidence will bloom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I cry looking at our reality, through slave eyes. I bet they would say our generation has crossed the line.
author: Delano Johnson, My Lifes Lyrics Encrypted: Hate Me or Love Me (Life Series) [Kindle Edition]

quote: I bought you love poetry! 'I love you as certain dark things are loved, secretly, between the shadow and the soul.'" I blink at him. "Neruda. I starred the passage. God," he moans. "Why didn't you open it?
author: Stephanie Perkins, Anna and the French Kiss

quote: Rich or poor, money rules with an iron fist.
author: Gary   Hopkins

quote: My life has been full of terrible misfortunes most of which never happened.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Without ethics, man has no future. This is to say, mankind without them cannot be itself. Ethics determine choices and actions and suggest difficult priorities.
author: John Berger

quote: The present moment is the substance with which the future is made. Therefore, the best way to take care of the future is to take care of the present moment. What else can you do?
author: Thich Nhat Hanh, The Art of Mindful Living: How to Bring Love, Compassion, and Inner Peace Into Your Daily Life

quote: You, in bloom, heart, beloved,you are like the foliage of the sky over my eyesand I look at you lying on the earth
author: Pablo Neruda, 100 Love Sonnets

quote: Hope is the highest happiness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Ela acreditava em anjo e, porque acreditava, eles existiam" | "She believed in angels, and, because she believed, they existed
author: Clarice Lispector, The Hour of the Star

quote: To repent is depart from evil.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Will you marry me, my darling ?Do I have options, you bastard ?
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Keep your eyes on the prize and know that the trials are only for a while, so smile.
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: Before knowledge comes understanding, before understanding comes wisdom.
author: Steven Chopade

quote: True love for our nation will compel us to shout on the streets and get on our knees and ask people to repent
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Other people influence your life through their actions and thoughts.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: Can't you see? Every step I have taken, since I was that child on the bridge, has been to bring myself closer to you.
author: Arthur Golden, Memoirs of a Geisha

quote: One of the strongest conviction of delayed gratification is to convince people to have faith in the truth.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom
author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quote: It is not your mouth that sings. It is your mind and heart that sing.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Let your words merely reiterate what your actions have already stated.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Writers wake up the world.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: In reality there are no separate events. Life moves along like water, it's all connected to the source of the river is connected to the mouth and the ocean.
author: Alan W. Watts, The Essential Alan Watts

quote: Don't they get afraid, then?""They have a religion for that.
author: Ray Bradbury, The October Country

quote: Truth demands progress and change, and is always for the benefit of all souls—even if you must travel through a difficult learning process or make a shift as a result of facing the truth.
author: Molly Friedenfeld, The Book of Simple Human Truths

quote: Expectations make people miserable, so whatever yours are, lower them. You'll definitely be happier.
author: Simone Elkeles, How to Ruin Your Boyfriend's Reputation

quote: People are capable at anytime in their lives,of doing what they dream of
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: We measure everything by ourselves with almost a necessary conceit.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: The sad duty of politics is to establish justice in a sinful world.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: all theorieslike clichesshot to hell,all these small faceslooking upbeautiful and believing;I wish to weepbut sorrow isstupid.I wish to believe but believe is agraveyard. we have narrowed it down tothe butcherknife and themockingbird wish usluck.
author: Charles Bukowski, What Matters Most is How Well You Walk Through the Fire

quote: The traveler knows the grace of travel.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Humans have come into being for the sake of each other, so either teach them, or learn to bear them.
author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quote: When you turn your dreams on there is no off switch.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: See it, feel it, trust it!
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: The world is indeed a mixture of truth and make-believe. Discard the make-believe and take the truth.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: The greatest tragedy in mankind's entire history may be the hijacking of morality by religion.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Great victory requires great risk.-Hera
author: Rick Riordan, The Lost Hero

quote: Everybody is a book of blood; wherever we're opened, we're red.
author: Clive Barker, Books of Blood: Volumes One to Three

quote: Forever and always from me to you. My love is pure, my love is true. It is gifted to none other than you.
author: Truth Devour, Unrequited

quote: Surely no one would ever use such a weapon against a city.""There are no limits in war," Volger said, still staring out the window.
author: Scott Westerfeld, Goliath

quote: A writer must be willing to leave oneself behind in order to explore new territories of the mind and unearth primordial truths that startle and frighten us.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Art is a passion with great vision and cultural expression.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education is the fertilizer for the mind, the seeds for success, and the eye opener for life.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: When my brother called to inform me, on the morning of May 22, 2003, that our mother Caroline Oates had died suddenly of a stroke, it was a shock from which, in a way, I have yet to recover.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: Pearls' burst out the Snork Maiden excitedly. 'Could ankle rings be made out of pearls?''I should think they could,' said Moomintoll. 'Ankle-rings, and nose-rings and ear-rings and engagement rings...
author: Tove Jansson

quote: A woman, desires to hear nice words from a man who can praise her beauty.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: All of a sudden you see reading in bed and waffles on Sunday and laughing at nothing and his mouth on yours. And it's so far beyond fine that you know you can never go back to fine.
author: Gillian Flynn, Gone Girl

quote: Maturity dare to be the first to shine as a light in the dark.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: I don’t call it "Life Insurance," I call it "Love Insurance." We buy it because we want to leave a legacy for those we love.
author: Farshad Asl

quote: Vanity dies hard, in some obstinate cases it outlives the man.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson, Prince Otto

quote: When the power of LOVE is more important than the love of money, religion and power, and people realize that the most important things in this life are NOT things,the world will finally know peace.
author: Tanya Masse

quote: Like a word on a page that you’ve printed and read a million times, that suddenly looks strange or wrong, foreign. And you feel scared for a second, like you’ve lost something, even if you’re not sure what it is.
author: Sarah Dessen, Just Listen

quote: Today is the first day of the rest of your life. Begin with a new goal and with a new enthusiasm to create abundance in your life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Genius is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I discovered the miracle that all things that sound are music, including the dishes and silverware in the dishwasher, as long as they fulfill the illusion of showing us where life is heading.
author: Gabriel García Márquez, Living to Tell the Tale

quote: Sometimes your music sounds like there’s too much inside you. Maybe even you couldn’t get it all out. Maybe that’s why you died. Like you exploded from the inside.
author: Ava Dellaira, Love Letters to the Dead

quote: If words had weight, a single sentence from Death would have anchored a ship.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Truth is weirder than any fiction I've seen.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Love betrayed has an entirely different sound from hatred outright.
author: N.K. Jemisin, The Broken Kingdoms

quote: Greatness is the quality of time converted into production or value
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: She went to the window seat and sat there, sniffling, hating them all, and herself most of all. It was all her fault, everything bad that had happened.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Game of Thrones

quote: Gnani Purush’ [the enlightened one] has the [knowledge of the-Self] essence of all religions.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: It is the sign of a weak mind to be unable to bear wealth.
author: Seneca

quote: It is the ant, not the lion, which the elephant fears.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: When two or more hearts unite, anything is possible.
author: Molly Friedenfeld, The Book of Simple Human Truths

quote: Your faith may be just a little thread. It may be small and weak, but act on that faith. It does not matter how big your faith is, but rather, where your faith is.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: It’s fascinating. You know all these words, and they’re all English, but when you string them together into sentences, they just don’t make any sense.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Fallen Angels

quote: It was electric and we couldn't deny it anymore, even when our words spoke different the energy we drew from each-other spoke too loud, it was almost impossible to ignore.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: It is my strong conviction that a realist conception of human nature should be made a servant of an ethic of progressive justice and should not be made into a bastion of conservatism, particularly a conservatism which defends unjust privileges.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr, The Essential Reinhold Niebuhr: Selected Essays and Addresses

quote: Anyone can love a rose, but only a saint can love its thorns.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There is the past, and there is the future. The present is never more than the single second dividing one from the other. We live poised on that second as it's hurtling forward—toward what?
author: Laini Taylor, Dreams of Gods & Monsters

quote: The way children stretch time and the way adults forget that stretch could be one of the saddest differences in the world.
author: Catherine Lacey, The Answers

quote: May the way I look at you, the way I speak with you, and the way I treat you reflect the truth that... I have loved you since forever.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Those same fists had always defied everything expected of her.
author: Kiersten White, And I Darken

quote: Right. That's twenty-two fifty.""Twenty-two fifty?" We can't hide our exasperation."Well, yeah - this is a classy joint, you know.""That's obvious - the service is incredible.
author: Markus Zusak, I Am the Messenger

quote: Literature is news that stays news.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: No living being can ever “hitch” another living being. If one were able to “hitch” another, then we can say that the principle of this world is false! In this world, no one being is a superior over another.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Friendship is like a glass ornament, once it is broken it can rarely be put back together exactly the same way.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: Four things for success: work and pray, think and believe.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: This poetry. I never know what I'm going to say.
author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quote: Man starts over again everyday, in spite of all he knows, against all he knows.
author: Emil M. Cioran

quote: You put me through hell. On purpose. Made me suffer. And there’s no end in sight. I don’t know what the fuck you’re doing, ace, but this Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde shit ain’t cutting it with me.
author: Sylvia Day, Reflected in You

quote: You can only hurt a woman so many times before her fangs grow sharp, her claws scratch deep, and her eyes become blades.
author: Melody  Lee, Moon Gypsy

quote: Be tough minded but tenderhearted.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr., Life's Little Instruction Book: 511 Suggestions, Observations, and Reminders on How to Live a Happy and Rewarding Life

quote: Hand in hand with freedom of speech goes the power to be heard, to share in the decisions of government which shape men's lives.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: Innovation is about practical creativity - it's about making new ideas useful...
author: Max McKeown

quote: We only radiate the inner self.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Jesus Christ seeks to save lost souls.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There's looking and there's looking. When some men look at you it's a greasy thing. It makes you want to have a bath. With other men it's nice. It helps you know you're beautiful.
author: Patrick Rothfuss, The Wise Man's Fear

quote: The frontiers are not east or west  north or south  but wherever a man fronts a fact.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Time is the rider that breaks youth.
author: George Herbert

quote: When you have mountains in the distance or even hills, you have space.
author: Robert M. Pirsig, Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance: An Inquiry Into Values

quote: I know that men are so eager to be one among the stars.I feel that damaged earth will never let men go off hand.
author: Toba Beta

quote: To be happy, be yourself.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: In finding the courage and confidence to escape our cages and shine, we help others do the same.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: I hate books  they teach us only to talk about what we do not know.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Anyone who tries to put fear in a heart, has lost their heart to fear.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: Let's go invent tomorrow instead of worrying about what happened yesterday.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Life isn't about achieving successBut about creating joy and happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The little flowers grew everywhere around the rocks, and no one had asked them to grow, or me to grow.
author: Jack Kerouac, The Dharma Bums

quote: And the drawing near of Death, which alike levels all, alike impresses all with a last revelation, which only an author from the dead could adequately tell.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Happiness is an inner perception. It comes from simplicity, kindness, love, and compassion.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Change we must; if a river can, so can we.
author: Vinita Kinra

quote: Our love for our country is worth nothing if it deprives us of our sense of humanity, if it destroys positive consensus.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: Love is the cloud that keeps raining down.
author: Auliq Ice, World in Hands

quote: You cannot understand God without understanding people
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The man who thinks his wife  his baby  his house  his horse  his dog  and himself severely unequalled  is almost sure to be a good-humored person.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: We laugh, that we may not cry.
author: Roger Ebert

quote: I don’t want to take away anybody’s religion, but simply to make them see what religion really means.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Illusion of Religion: A Treatise on Religious Fundamentalism

quote: We are all a great deal luckier that we realize, we usually get what we want - or near enough.
author: Roald Dahl, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory

quote: There is no season and no reason for love. Love is not seasonal its perennial.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: I wish I had a horse; then I could run for miles in this splendid air, and not lose my breath." Jo
author: Louisa May Alcott, Little Women

quote: If God wanted the sky to be empty, He would not have given birds wings to fly.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Find the beauty in situations where it is not obvious, and you will create voluminous joy in your life.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: I can only be me not thee, as far as the eyes can see!
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quote: When a good man is hurt, all who would be called good must suffer with him.
author: Euripides

quote: She is tolerable, but not handsome enough to tempt me, and I am in no humor at present to give consequence to young ladies who are slighted by other men.
author: Jane Austen, Pride and Prejudice

quote: Self-confident people are mindful about spending their time, energy, and interests on things that truly matter.
author: Susan C. Young

quote: If your passion does not keep you sleepless, you can't be a good beginner. When passion itches, a great hand scratches... Wake up, it's your time to rise above idleness!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: Where there is love there is courage,where there is courage there is peace,where there is peace there is God.And when you have God, you have everything.
author: Louise Penny, The Brutal Telling

quote: Innovations succeed when failure is seen as a learning step to great success.
author: Pearl Zhu, 100 Creativity Ingredients: Everyone’s Playbook to Unlock Creativity

quote: Never under-estimate your effort, no matter how little. Every effort, little or great is a step closer towards the actualisation of your dreams.
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: We exist in the world of books.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: To drive free, to love free, to court destruction with taunts. One brief house of madness and joy!
author: Walt Whitman, Song of Myself

quote: True happiness... arises  in the first place  from the enjoyment of one's self  and in the next  from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: The wolf pounces on the sheep when the shepherd strays.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The nature of humanity, its essence, is to feel another's pain as one's own, and to act to take that pain away,. There is a nobility in compassion, a beauty in empathy, a grace in forgiveness.
author: John Connolly, The Killing Kind

quote: A man has only so much life, and must diversify his efforts according to his values.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Learning to Live through Jiu Jitsu

quote: Los Angeles gives one the feeling of the future more strongly than any city I know of. A bad future, too, like something out of Fritz Lang's feeble imagination.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Hope is the believe that the promised will be fulfilled.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: We all have faced fearful times. But it is better to live with faith than fear.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: To incessantly blame others for my shortcomings is cowardice borne of fear, fed by fear, and haunted by fear. To be steadfastly accountable for my shortcomings is bravery borne of God, fed by God, and blessed by God.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: The mind can never be satisfied.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: Every good citizen adds to the strength of a nation.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: A successful book cannot afford to be more than ten percent new.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: The past is our definition. We may strive with good reason to escape it or to escape what is bad in it but we will escape it only by adding something better to it.
author: Wendell Berry

quote: Life is a journey of a cell enjoying the beauty of this universe.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It's always your assumptions about you, about others, about future that make reality worse than it actually is.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D.

quote: When the first living thing existed, I was there waiting. When the last living thing dies, my job will be finished. I'll put the chairs on the tables, turn out the lights and lock the universe behind me when I leave.
author: Neil Gaiman, Dream Country

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Buddha

quote: Anarchism is not a romantic fable but the hardheaded realization, based on five thousand years of experience, that we cannot entrust the management of our lives to kings, priests, politicians, generals, and county commissioners.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: We donot qualify as humans going by our acts, but we surely prove through our vulnerability and sufferings!
author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quote: Never close your lips to those whom you have already opened your heart.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: We have to actually choose a name," Kane murmured above her head. "We can't keep calling him 'baby.' When he's fifteen he might resent it.
author: Christine Feehan, Ruthless Game

quote: He stared at her. “How is it that you’re cute, sexy as hell, and smarter than anyone I know?”She gave him a small smile. “It’s a gift.
author: Jill Shalvis

quote: I'll come back to you," I say. "I promise you, if it's the last thing I do, I'll come back to you."Her face is buried in my neck. She nods."I'll count the minutes until you do." she says.
author: Pittacus Lore, I Am Number Four

quote: Employment is the greatest dream killer
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: No country can police corruption in other countries when it itself is not free from corruption. You cannot clean a dirty wall with dirty hands.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: The best historical stories capture the modern imagination because they are, in many senses, still current - part of a continuum.
author: Sara Sheridan

quote: There are things in the world that cannot be brought about. There are mistakes that cannot be repaired. But there is one thing sure -- that loyalty and friendship are the most precious possessions a man can have.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: Become a positive person by seeing the bigger picture of whatever you dream of doing. Dream big and act big! It’s your time to have a bigger image of you!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Dream Big!: See Your Bigger Picture!

quote: Paper Towns for a Paper Girl, who wants to think and read clearly
author: John Green, Paper Towns

quote: if man's life value for women and if she need man,believe me she can not Broke his swear never in any situation,in any condition.
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, Zaki's Save Me

quote: Beauty is wishing for loneliness without any regret and complains.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: For a peaceful world, the golden rules to live by are mutual understanding, respect, tolerance, forgiveness, and love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The meeting began well, meaning it had the potential for being short.
author: Tucker Elliot, The Day Before 9/11

quote: What is the proper limit for wealth? It is  first  to have what is necessary  and  second  to have what is enough.
author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quote: Sacred dreams are dreamt day by day.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: He couldn't get into Harvard even if he had the dean's wife at gunpoint.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Don’t throw good ideas away until you’ve considered all of your options.
author: David Eddings, Crystal Gorge

quote: The Very first moment I beheld him, my heart was irrevocably gone.
author: Jane Austen, Love and Friendship

quote: Sow wisdom today, and you will reap success tomorrow.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Wonders and signs shall never cease.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: God will hear your cry even when your voice can't shout out loud unto him. He will see your tears even when can no longer shed any.
author: Gugu Mona

quote: The secret of education lies in respecting the pupil.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When things break, it's not the actual breaking that prevents them from getting back together again. It's because a little piece gets lost - the two remaining ends couldn't fit together even if they wanted to. The whole shape has changed.
author: John Green, Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: Oh," she said, in a very different way. "Well. Thanks for my part in the compliment. Naturally I'd love to be watched and controlled, but I think I may be washing my hair that day.
author: Sarah Rees Brennan, The Demon's Covenant

quote: But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie.
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: ...and Jo laid the rustling sheets together with a careful hand, as one might shut the covers of a lovely romance, which holds the reader fast till the end comes, and he finds himself alone in the work-a-day world again.
author: Louisa May Alcott, Little Women

quote: If there is no wind  row.
author: Latin proverb

quote: As the sun shines I will make hayTo keep failure at bayFor there remaineth a payFor my honest toil each day.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: You can win war without fighting and you must not fight a war in order to win. The battle is of the Lord.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: I shall seize fate by the throat.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Am I on your walk of shame? You did sleep with the right MacGregor, didn’t you?
author: Michelle M. Pillow, Love Potions

quote: I miss you something awful sometimes
author: Haruki Murakami, Norwegian Wood

quote: It is not incumbent on the world to conform to your vision of change. It is up to you to explain the future in terms that those living in the past and present can follow.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: You ought to pray for a strong heart and then you can endure all things.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: When free men stand, they will always carry on and lift Liberty yet unfree men shall always struggle to fight for freedom and liberty until they attain it.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: We will be judged by how well we love.
author: Toni Morrison, Desdemona

quote: Some men are born mediocre, some men achieve mediocrity, and some men have mediocrity thrust upon them.
author: Joseph Heller

quote: ... had to pee like a racehorse at an Iced Tea convention.
author: Stephen Colbert, I Am America

quote: The best works of art are never innocuous: they alter the viewer's perceptual predictions. It is only when the patterns of our vision are disrupted that we truly pay attention and must ask ourselves what we are looking at.
author: Siri Hustvedt, A Woman Looking at Men Looking at Women: Essays on Art, Sex, and the Mind

quote: Leaders who nurture followers to be leaders, keep leading even when they retire, and they keep winning the admiration of leading leaders
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: If you know the secret of life, you will never think negatively.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You will not find it in the words of poets or the longing eyes of sailors. If you want to know of love, look to a trouper's hands as he makes his music. A trouper knows.
author: Patrick Rothfuss, The Wise Man's Fear

quote: Reputation is what others perceive you as being, and their opinion may be right or wrong. Character, however, is what you really are, and nobody knows that but you.
author: John Wooden

quote: You are all the colours in one, at full brightness.
author: Jennifer Niven, All the Bright Places

quote: To see, feel, and understand the magic of life, always believe that life is beautiful and magical.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Yours in demigodishness, and all that. Peace out!
author: Rick Riordan, The Son of Neptune

quote: It is vain to ask of the gods what man is capable of supplying for himself.
author: Epicurus

quote: Never lose hope! You are capable of holding on to hope.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, The Wings of Hope: Survivor

quote: History suggests that capitalism is a necessary condition for political freedom. Clearly it is not a sufficient condition.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: Stimulated by the juice, I believe, men have even been known to ride alligators.
author: P.G. Wodehouse, Right Ho, Jeeves

quote: Joyful, joyful, joyful,as only dogs know how to be happywith only the autonomyof their shameless spirit.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: Shadows could be anywhere in blackness. (Eric)
author: Shannon A. Thompson, Minutes Before Sunset

quote: It doesn’t matter how hard the world tries to get the sons of God, everything is turned around for their good
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To creative people, the compendium of the white man's dialect are unfashionable, because their creations are more than what the tongue could say.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: There is no neutral position in the Lord. You are either becoming more like Christ every day or you’re becoming less like Him. That’s because whether you realize it or not, you’re never standing still.
author: Stormie Omartian, The Power of a Praying Woman

quote: When you have a strong company culture it will shine through your brand and you can authentically say, “This is what our brand is about.
author: Amber Hurdle, The Bombshell Business Woman: How to Become a Bold, Brave, and Successful Female Entrepreneur

quote: I turned to Dionysus. "You cured him?""Madness is my specialty. It was quite simple.""But...you did something nice. Why?"He raised and eyebrow. "I am nice! I simple ooze niceness, Perry Johansson. Haven't you noticed?
author: Rick Riordan, The Battle of the Labyrinth

quote: It takes your enemy and your friend, working together, to hurt you to the heart: the one to slander you and the other to get the news to you.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Enjoy this moment. The ultimate fulfilment of the dream will not come close to the dream. Enjoy it
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: If one understands (realizes) his own Self, then he himself is an Absolute Supreme Soul (Parmatma).
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Talk is cheap when your words are of no value
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: It is not your love that sustains the marriage,but from now on, the marriage that sustains your love.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer, Letters and Papers from Prison

quote: Leadership without servanthood is like an ocean without water.
author: Farshad Asl

quote: The Word frees us from smallness of mind (1 Kings 4:29) and from threatening confinements (Psalm 18:19).
author: John Piper, Desiring God: Meditations of a Christian Hedonist

quote: Accept what makes you happy and pay no attention to fearful beliefs no matter who they come from.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: Well I'd certainly hate to interrupt your pleasant night stroll with my sudden death.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Bones

quote: Anger is energising. The opposite of anger is depression, which is anger turned inward.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: But the people who mattered were the people you chose instead of the people who were yours by an accident of birth. Real family was heart as much as, if not more than, blood.
author: Martina Boone, Compulsion

quote: That competition and the struggle for existence is the mechanism behind this state of perpetual change.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, The Signature of All Things

quote: When the going gets tough, put one foot in front of the other and just keep going. Don’t give up.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: Though it doesn’t feel like it, crisis places us front and center of desire, which is the force of power.
author: S. Kelley Harrell, Gift of the Dreamtime - Reader's Companion

quote: The only sentence that begins with 'I' that's true of me is I'm full of shit.
author: John Green, An Abundance of Katherines

quote: The world needed a little Evil, so Good had something to compare itself to, but you couldn't let it think it had the right-of-way on the road and an invitation to dinner.
author: Dean Koontz, The Dead Town

quote: Don’t Freeze! Surrender to the Breeze like the Trees!
author: RVM

quote: If you get down and quarell everyday, you're saying prayers to the devil, I say.
author: Bob Marley

quote: I am hear to say I love you.I am hear to say I feel you.I am hear to say I care for you.I am hear to say, I really do.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The price of happiness is unconditional love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You must have a vivid imagination of what you seek.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You have a great potential.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The use of the atomic bomb, with its indiscriminate killing of women and children, revolts my soul.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: I am here, I will always be here. Watching you, loving you.
author: Jayson Engay

quote: Purity and simplicity are the two wings with which man soars above the earth and all temporary nature.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Life is the greatest sacred existence.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Could you please put this--could you all put these--could you get dressed, please?"The woman only bestowed a serene smile on me. "We are as the Goddess requires.""The Goddess requires you to be naked on my lawn?
author: Kelley Armstrong, Dime Store Magic

quote: I'm not letting go of you.
author: Jojo Moyes, After You

quote: It is not wealth one asks for, but just enough to preserve one's dignity, to work unhampered, to be generous, frank and independent.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: The man who has done his level best... is a success, even though the world may write him down a failure.
author: B. C. Forbes

quote: Harry, you wonderful boy, you brave, brave man.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: I am the master of my destiny.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Any man with a grain of sense knows that marriage is the only way, these days, to acquire a full-time maid who works twenty-five hours a day, with no time off and no pay except room and board. (p9)
author: Elizabeth Peters, Borrower of the Night

quote: I know of few families today that aren’t touched to some extent by the heartache of divorce, including our own.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: A reader knows the mind of sacred souls.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It is more from carelessness about truth than from intentionally lying that there is so much falsehood in the world.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: All the well-meaning advice in the world won't amount to a hill of beans if we're not even addressing the real problem.
author: Stephen R. Covey, The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People: Powerful Lessons in Personal Change

quote: I live locally, I eat regionally but I think internationally.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Booksellers are the most valuable destination for the lonely, given the numbers of books written because authors couldn't find anyone to talk to.
author: Alain de Botton, The Consolations of Philosophy

quote: Observe the eyes, for they are the windows to her soul.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: There is no feeling quite so lonely as failure.
author: Jeffrey Fry

quote: The main secret of his progress, the secret of all wisdom, was, that with him action was the beginning and end of thought.
author: George MacDonald, Mary Marston

quote: Assassination is an art, milord, and I am the city’s most accomplished artist - Durzo Blint
author: Brent Weeks

quote: You say you're 'depressed' - all i see is resilience. You are allowed to feel messed up and inside out. It doesn't mean you're defective - it just means you're human.
author: David Mitchell, Cloud Atlas

quote: When a worrier acts bravery and face death in a battle, rest assured that he/she is knows that the case fought for has its values.
author: Sameh Elsayed

quote: I’m proud to be a writer. I’m doing the job all my heroes did.
author: Carla H. Krueger

quote: Your calling should be combined with your passion
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Love has no distance or barrier, it's instantaneous.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Of this I am certain, that if we open a quarrel between the past and the present, we shall find that we have lost the future.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: To dream is to desire.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Choose Love, Love! Without the sweet life ofLove, living is a burden - as you have seen.
author: Elif Shafak, The Forty Rules of Love

quote: Three things will make you happy: always have happy thoughts, be honest to yourself, and express unconditional love for everything.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You can not live at all if you do not learn to adapt yourself to your life as it happens to be.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt, This I Remember

quote: I cannot love a man who cannot protect me.
author: Anne Brontë

quote: Patience is the food of understanding.
author: Idries Shah, A Perfumed Scorpion

quote: One does not have to be a philosopher to be a successful artist, but he does have to be an artist to be a successful philosopher. His nature is to view the world in an unpredictable albeit useful light.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: These days when Christians bicker they exaggerate passion into a legalistic belief and prosperity into a lukewarm belief.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: Last time I saw you, I said that it hurt too much to love you. But I was wrong about that. The truth is it hurts too much not to love you.
author: P.C. Cast

quote: The human heart is a healer, which heals both others and ourselves.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten, Presence - Working from Within. The Psychology of Being

quote: People with evil ideas will think and do as they have learned, but those people with good ideas have the responsibility to show them the way of love, way of truth, and the way of peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I just wanted to tell you that I understand if you go. It’s okay if you have to leave us. It’s okay if you want to stop fighting.
author: Gayle Forman, If I Stay

quote: That’s always seemed so ridiculous to me, that people would want to be around someone because they’re pretty. It’s like picking your breakfast cereals based on color instead of taste.
author: John Green, Paper Towns

quote: There is no such thing as a great talent without great will power.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: A colorful body with fabrics, tattoos and jewelry is attractive, but a colorful heart with love, truth and faith is beautiful.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Never mind of what your enemy thinks of you, relax and think a head of him.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: An inconsistent political philosophy is that which feeds our battle yet starves our victory.
author: Mike Klepper

quote: To the militant, identity is everything.
author: Susan Sontag, Regarding the Pain of Others

quote: Step forward out of your own lingering residual sense of smallness, take up every inch of life that is your blessed inheritance, and DO YOUR THING.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: When the leaves stop falling wasn't her time to die, it was your time to live.
author: Kelly Moran, When the Leaves Stop Falling

quote: Nobody can love you if you don't love yourself.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Always lust for the best, because life is too short to be an ordinary.
author: M.H. Rakib, The Cavalier

quote: Life is a purposeful action.
author: Asa Don Brown

quote: We will join our palms together, fingers intertwined in each other, and look at the stars in the night sky!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: An author who gives a manager or publisher any rights in his work except those immediately and specifically required for its publication or performance is for business purposes an imbecile.
author: George Bernard Shaw
