quote: In order to know the world from the outside, you must know yourself from the inside.
author: Steven Cuoco

quote: We had the experience but missed the meaning. And approach to the meaning restores the experience in a different form.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Farid asked, 'Do American teachers care about every student?'I thought about a humanities teacher I’d worked with in Korea and more recently a science teacher I’d worked with in Germany. I said, 'I think most schools have a resident idiot.
author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season

quote: Have you ever considered that you shouldn't pray for God to deliver you from your enemies, rather deliver you from yourself so you can not hate them?
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: To change your life, love yourself. To change your community, love others. To change the world, love everyone.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The 10 ever greatest misplacements in life:1. Leadership without character.2. Followership without servant-being.3. Brotherhood without integrity.4. Affluence without wisdom.5. Authority without conscience.6. Relationship without faithfullness.7. Festivals without peace.8. Repeated failure without change.9. Good wealth without good health.10. Love without a lover.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: What is done in God is done forever.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Ah, what happiness it is to be with people who are all happy, to press hands, press cheeks, smile into eyes.
author: Katherine Mansfield

quote: People in the West are always getting ready to live.
author: Chinese proverb

quote: Killing in the name of religion defines someone who is ignorant and actually void of religion. God does not condone terror. To kill innocent people to make a political statement is like shooting a dove to say hunting is wrong.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: The anointing you receive for any ministry is not to reduce but to increase you
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Don’t complain. Be a good person in this wrong world and transform it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Faith, the least exclusive club on Earth, has the craftiest doorman. Every time I've stepped through its wide-open doorway, I find myself stepping out on the street again.
author: David Mitchell, Cloud Atlas

quote: We wear on our faces the results of what we believe and how we behave, and such behavior is most evident in the eyes and on the faces of those who have lived many years.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley, Standing for Something: 10 Neglected Virtues That Will Heal Our Hearts and Homes

quote: Death is the veil which those who live call life; They sleep, and it is lifted.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Love is too precious to be ashamed of.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton, A Stroke of Midnight

quote: Life without Freedom can't go far…it's like a Brake that stops a car!
author: RVM

quote: And in those moments, Park thought about pulling back from her."Not breaking up with her. That phrase didn't even seem to apply here. Just . . . erasing away. Recovering the six inches between them
author: Rainbow Rowell, Eleanor & Park

quote: Celebrate God daily by celebrating His creation
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I can say.. that I never said that... we never met and this never happen... How?(Good question, the answer I will leave it for later)
author: Deyth Banger

quote: If you want to get rid of Rose then fine, I’ll take care of it. But I don’t think that is going to solve your problem. You’ll still be here. And you are your problem.
author: Holly Hood

quote: Where I am always thou art. Thy image lives within my heart
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon, Bad Moon Rising

quote: So many will try to destroy me. So many, over and over, coming in periods of greatness. But in this period, I cannot be broken: GAGAKLEIN.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Some people think that evolutionary psychology claims to have discovered that human nature is selfish and wicked. But they are flattering the researchers and anyone who would claim to have discovered the opposite.
author: Steven Pinker, How the Mind Works

quote: I think that when you invite people to your home, you invite them to yourself.
author: Oprah Winfrey, My Life

quote: Set goals that make your heart sing. Then achieving them is an experience of uplifting joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Leadership needs continuous learning from experience. Every time you learn something new, you re-wire your brain.
author: Amit Ray, Mindfulness Meditation for Corporate Leadership and Management

quote: If your desires be endless  your cares and fears will be so  too.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: The past does not define me, it ignites me. The past is not a piece of me, it has placed me.
author: Ricky Maye, Barefoot Christianity

quote: Take no heed of her.... She reads a lot of books.
author: Jasper Fforde, The Eyre Affair

quote: Your laughter : the drugThat cures my emotional infection
author: Richard L.  Ratliff

quote: Whole world is not looking for religion, it is looking for its own safe side.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: As I walk through the redwood trees, my sneakers sopping up days of rain, I wonder why bereaved people even bother with mourning clothes, when grief itself provides such an unmistakable wardrobe.
author: Jandy Nelson, The Sky Is Everywhere

quote: 1.	“Being able to depend on a person’s integrity lays a solid foundation for a relationship built on trust, both in business and in life.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact

quote: Nobody wants to be nothing. But that's the greatest thing in the world to be.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Let us express our gratitude to those people who make our journeys in life beautiful, easy, and interesting. They are the angels of Eden whom we often forget to appreciate.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Age does not protect you from love. But love, to some extent, protects you from age.
author: Anais Nin

quote: The window of opportunity is always open, just you have to find it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Courage isn't absenct of fear, it is the awareness that something else is important
author: Stephen R. Covey, The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People: Powerful Lessons in Personal Change

quote: He wasn't an alchemist, or a hero. He was a librarian, and a dreamer. He was a reader, and the unsung expert on a long-lost city no one cared a thing about.
author: Laini Taylor, Strange the Dreamer

quote: Pure happiness and peace are at their peak when your body is in harmony with itself.
author: Asa Don Brown, Waiting to Live

quote: Of so much moon were your hips to me,of all the sun your deep mouth and its delight,of so much burning light like honey in the shade
author: Pablo Neruda, 100 Love Sonnets

quote: Be a solution provider to challenges or issues; the more you proffer solution, the more your circle of influence grows and the more your circle of influence grows, the more wealth you will command.
author: ANIKOR Daniel

quote: Please all, and you will please none.
author: Aesop

quote: What thou art  that thou art.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: I waited for the seasons of love to pass from this cold winter to the summer heat I dreamed of.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: By forgiving we become free.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Practice trust in small matters for huge returns in the large ones.
author: Gina Greenlee, Postcards and Pearls:Life Lessons from Solo Moments in New York

quote: We have to be back in three hours," Ronan said. "I just fed Chainsaw but she'll need it again.""This," Gansey replied "is precisely why I didn't want to have a baby with you.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Raven Boys

quote: Then was ashamed of myself. I should be happy for what I'd been given. I hoped God hadn't noticed my lapse in appreciation.
author: Charlaine Harris, Dead and Gone

quote: Spy' is such a short ugly word. I prefer 'espionage.' Those extra three syllables really say something.
author: Howard Tayler, Emperor Pius Dei

quote: I have woken up…quite sloshedfrom night-mingled rainsa little drugged, by mountain fogsI have been kidnappedfor years....by a mere kiss.
author: Sanober  Khan, A Thousand Flamingos

quote: The soul's joy lies in doing.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: ...it's not the stories - it's the pain and the joy and the people who stay with you long after the stories are told ...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: God will judge us, Mr. Harris, by--by what we did to relieve the suffering of our fellow human beings. I don't think God cares what doctrine we embrace.
author: Abraham Verghese, Cutting for Stone

quote: Stars give so much to the world without demanding payment. Be likewise.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is an ironic habit of human beings to run faster when they have lost their way.
author: Rollo May

quote: A heart never breaks in the same pattern of pieces
author: John Geddes

quote: Yes, but does Maine have anything to SAY to Florida?
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Sexual thoughts float through a man’s brain many times a day, while on the contrary a woman has them only one to four times a day.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Neurosutra: The Abhijit Naskar Collection

quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Absence of conflict creating intents is itself Moksh (Ultimate Liberation).
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: You have become more and therefore expect more, but never become too purpose-driven to step back and realize just how far you have progressed.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Learning to Live through Jiu Jitsu

quote: Live fast. Die young. Be wild. Have fun.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: War was always here. Before man was, war waited for him. The ultimate trade awaiting its ultimate practitioner.
author: Cormac McCarthy, Blood Meridian, or the Evening Redness in the West

quote: It is always better to look at the bright side of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Scars are not injuries, Tanner Sack. A scar is a healing. After injury, a scar is what makes you whole.
author: China Miéville, The Scar

quote: The Holy Spirit is the most perfect gift of the Father to men, and yet He is the one gift which the Father gives most easily.
author: Thomas Merton, No Man Is an Island

quote: Parting with friends is a sadness. A place is only a place.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: Over done forgotten gone now my troubles will move on.
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: I think one of the problems in this country is that too many people are screwing things up, committing crimes and then getting on with their lives. What is really needed for public officials who shame themselves is ritual suicide.
author: George Carlin, When Will Jesus Bring the Pork Chops?

quote: Walking in shoes bigger than your feet, will inspire gravity to pull you down." Let's be grateful for what fits us...for what we have.
author: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana

quote: My Love wakes in a puddle of sunlight.Her hands asleep beside her.Her hair draped on the lawnlike a mantle of cloth.I give her my troth, for our love is wholeI sing her beauty in my soul
author: Roman Payne

quote: Champagne, if you are seeking the truth, is better than a lie detector. It encourages a man to be expansive, even reckless, while lie detectors are only a challenge to tell lies successfully.
author: Graham Greene

quote: Terrorism has nothing to do with religion, Islam or otherwise. Terrorism is born of fundamentalism not of religion.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Life is all about discovery
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you believe in the idea of true friends, then your heart is vulnerable to betrayal.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: I sometimes sit on my roof. Not to be closer to god. To be further from y'all.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: The person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest happiness in using it.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Read a good book every day. Books help to educate the soul. The mere joy of learning something new will instill the will to live in you.
author: Sanchita Pandey

quote: When you are young, do not get involved in steady dating. When you reach an age where you think of marriage, then is the time to become so involved.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: There is hope for every soul to know the spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When birds eat from your hand, they are letting the whole world know that they trust you.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Nobody wants to be a part of your story. Everybody wants you to elaborate on their fantasies.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson, Master of Maxims

quote: A person with money who chooses to spend it on you, takes little effort and is meaningless. However, a person with no time who manages to spend what little they have on you... this means everything and should appreciated.
author: Mark W. Boyer

quote: The central element in the economic problem of money is the objective exchange-value of money, popularly called its purchasing power.
author: Ludwig von Mises

quote: Worship the work not the God, because work is God.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: A man must be a Salomon before his magical ring will work
author: Idries Shah, The Way of the Sufi

quote: There is, you will concede, a limit to the niceties a man is obliged to fulfill when his wife is dead and not yet cold.
author: Allan Dare Pearce, Paris in April

quote: Belief is the driver that gives energy and power to achieve your potential.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: Experiment participants asked to pick which politician looked more confident in a photograph picked the winner of the race two thirds of the time. This phenomenon held up even when they only glimpsed the photographs for a 10th of a second.
author: Jonathan Haidt, The Righteous Mind: Why Good People are Divided by Politics and Religion

quote: Commonly men will only be brave as their fathers were brave, or timid.
author: Henry David Thoreau, Walden

quote: You're scared of what you can't control
author: Becca Fitzpatrick, Hush, Hush

quote: Too often the great decisions are originated and given form in bodies made up wholly of men, or so completely dominated by them that whatever of special value women have to offer is shunted aside without expression.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Too much consistency is as bad for the mind as for the body.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I am not made for politics because I am incapable of wanting or accepting the death of the adversary.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Not many abilities are inherent. Most are acquired through patient practice, and those that are inherent are enhanced and utilized through practice too.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

quote: Oh, let us love our occupations,Bless the squire and his relations,Live upon our daily rations,And always know our proper stations.
author: Charles Dickens, The Chimes

quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Enjoy every bit of your life to the fullest. Your compromises and sacrifices will be rewarded.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Suppose it’s your last day on earth. Have you done what all you wanted to do, you always dreamt of? If answer is NO, your time starts now.
author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Feeling good about government is like looking on the bright side of any catastrophe. When you quit looking on the bright side, the catastrophe is still there.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I stayed up all night playing poker with tarot cards. I got a full house and four people died.
author: Steven Wright

quote: It seems to me we can never give up longing and wishing while we are still alive. There are certain things we feel to be beautiful and good, and we must hunger for them.
author: George Eliot

quote: Religious bondage shackles and debilitates the mind, and unfits it for every noble enterprise, every expanded pro
author: James Madison, Letters and Other Writings of James Madison Volume 3

quote: I closed my eyes and tried to sleep. But it was not until much later that I was able to get any real sleep. In a place far away from anyone or anywhere, I drifted off for a moment.
author: Haruki Murakami, The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle

quote: What we dream repeatedly, we become.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched, they are felt with the heart.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, The Little Prince

quote: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
author: Voltaire

quote: I know of only one duty, and that is to love.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Only if we transvalue the plain-vanilla standards of our life, we may bring back things to light and sense the lies behind perceptions. ("Behind the frosted glass")
author: Erik Pevernagie

quote: The beauty of the universe consists not only of unity in variety, but also of variety in unity.
author: Umberto Eco, The Name of the Rose

quote: The most dangerous of all falsehoods is a slightly distorted truth.
author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg, The Waste Books

quote: Somebody's boring me  I think it's me.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: Calling it as you see it, should include yourself as well.
author: Tony Curl

quote: Do you think just having a baby automatically makes you love it?''I'm not sure... you might have to learn to love it, like any other person.
author: Judy Blume

quote: Devote yourself to reading, learning and writing.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you are not yourself people will look right through you and see the pale shadow of someone else
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: You've got to try and not let it keep you down. Sure, let it hurt but don't let it harm you.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Pessimism

quote: I have found no other cure for loneliness than to befriend it.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: Get a wealth of 'GOoD' vibes at goodreads.com
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: ... the reigns of the kings and queens who are portrayed as kneeling with clasped hands in the windows of churches, were stained by oppression and bloodshed.
author: Marcel Proust, Swann's Way

quote: Back then: to be regarded as well-known, one had to be great. Today: to be regarded as great, one has to be well-known.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: When you fill yourself with inner joy and inner peace, this world becomes peaceful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Worrying doesn’t change anything.Focus your energy on the outcomeyou do want and then do whatyou can to make it happen.
author: Domonique Bertolucci, The Happiness Code: Ten Keys to Being the Best You Can Be

quote: The author points out that, with life in provincial Washington difficult for those not of independent means, Adams and his wife undervalued the social connections that others found vital. They often made an impression as distant and prideful.
author: Paul C. Nagel, John Quincy Adams: A Public Life, a Private Life

quote: So this is it ⎯ what cost me all that time. A man who turned out to be old, a house that turned out to be empty.
author: Jennifer Egan, A Visit from the Goon Squad

quote: There are few things worse than mistaking an enemy for a friend.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quote: You looove me. (holds out arms) You love me this much.
author: James Patterson, Saving the World and Other Extreme Sports

quote: Grant me one hour on love’s most sacred shoresTo clasp the bosom that my soul adores,Lie heart to heart and merge my soul with yours.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Faust: First Part

quote: Growing age can kill the beauty, not the style.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: Sometimes, just be. Do not think or worry, do not get angry under stress. Just pray and keep your faith in the Lord. Keep patience and see how well things will work out for you!
author: Sanchita Pandey, Voyage to Happiness!

quote: You preach cleanliness,so I try to keep my room clean,but I feel no closer to God, and I guess that’s okaybecause he doesn’t knowwho he’s fucking with anyway.
author: Kris Kidd, Down for Whatever

quote: By disappearing in the Land of Nature, you appear in the Land of Wisdom!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Happy is the man who ventures boldly to defend what he holds dear.
author: Ovid

quote: Stop the tape, cut the paper! I will just write another poem and grab a microphone and push record again!
author: Delano Johnson, Rare Images of Love

quote: Meaning grows in the mind, but the shape and form of the act remains.
author: Ralph Ellison

quote: In the absence of faith, our dreams will move from feasible aspirations to implausible fantasy.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Without a word or hesitation, Pain took the mop from Nick. Suffering moved to pick up glass."Wow. Where have you two been all my life?"Pain quirked and eyebrow as he mopped the floor."Walking hand in hand with you. Haven't you noticed?
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon, Invincible

quote: Truly creative people care little about what they have done, and a lot about what they are doing.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: He who knows all the answers has not been asked all the questions.
author: Confucius

quote: He'd been an angel once. He hadn't meant to Fall. He'd just hung around with the wrong people.
author: Terry Pratchett, Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch

quote: Each night, when I go to sleep, I die. And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: We have to motivate people to be what they can be.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Time provides all of us with the opportunity to change, alter our belief system, and create new perspectives that challenge a person’s character and teach him or her how to become a happier and wiser person.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: Whether you like it or not, you're forced to come to the realisation that death is out there. But I don't fear death, I'm a fatalist. I believe when it's your time, that's it. It's the hand you're dealt.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: If the words you spoke appeared on your skin, would you still be beautiful?
author: Auliq Ice

quote: When you start living under the shadow of somebody, you lose your own personality and your own passions.
author: Balroop Singh

quote: A leader is firm enough to be responsive to changes.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: All men are created equal. It is what you do from there that makes the difference. We are all free agents in life. We make our own decisions. We control our own destiny.
author: Glenn Beck

quote: Men come and go. They lie, or die, or leave you.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: It is probable that Tom Towers considered himself the most powerful man in Europe; and so he walked on from day to day, studiously striving to look a man, but knowing within his breast that he was a god.
author: Anthony Trollope, The Warden

quote: ...is worship too strong a word? yes, I worship you - to worship is to give worth to something – isn’t that what love is all about?...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: Every risk that you take in order for you to come into significance is the greatest kind of risk to take.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: When your time is gone it is gone forever. Take action before your time is gone. Live now.
author: Avina Celeste

quote: What is holy is Honourable.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If I were a blind man and were told by you that you possess a faculty called sight, I should be unreasonable if I railed at you as a conceited enthusiast.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Lectures to My Students

quote: A danger foreseen is half avoided.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: I used to think that everything was just being funny but now I don't know. I mean, how can you tell?
author: Andy Warhol

quote: I'm extra-good at wanting things. I want things until I feel sort of sick about them. I want enough for two normal people, at least.
author: Rainbow Rowell, Landline

quote: Never be less interesting than your refrigerator magnets.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: How is it that food STILL contains calories that make you gain weight in the 21st CENTURY?! It’s like scientists aren’t even trying!
author: Tanya Masse

quote: Damien has died and gone straight to gay boy heaven,' Shaunee said...
author: P.C. Cast

quote: You will never truly realize the value of life until you take your very last breath.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You can learn a lot about a person through their dreams. It’s your subconscious, split open and bare for all to see.
author: Karina Halle, Veiled

quote: Who are you then?" "I am part of that power which eternally wills evil and eternally works good.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Faust: First Part

quote: My own mind is my own church.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: I'm a big believer in the power of visualizations. And so are neuroscientists. Numerous studies have proven how merely imagining positive circumstances sends blood flowing from negative brain regions to positive ones.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Everything what you do is Leadership, if you are OK being number 2 from time to time.
author: Alin Sav

quote: It was his home now. But it could not be his home till he had gone from it and returned to it. Now he was the Prodigal Son.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Man is a creature who lives not upon bread alone, but primarily by catchwords.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Our body is a machine for living. It is organized for that, it is its nature. Let life go on in it unhindered and let it defend itself.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: When you live for many hundreds of years, you know that every opportunity will come again.
author: Philip Pullman, The Golden Compass

quote: But still she stood, ready to get back at it. Badass and admirable.
author: Cristin Harber, Delta: Redemption

quote: He had always felt that he lived on the edges of life, Constantine realized, watching everyone else living, sometimes helping them do it.
author: Mary Balogh, A Secret Affair

quote: Religion without reason is merely an illusion of religion – it is a mockery of religion, like it has become today.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Illusion of Religion: A Treatise on Religious Fundamentalism

quote: I always was an early-morning or late-night writer. Early morning was my favorite; late night was because you had a deadline. And at four in the morning, you make up some of your most absurd jokes.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: Love is supposed to lift you up, not hold you down. It is supposed to push you forward, not hold you back.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Life is a rare fantasy that can be made a reality by being objective.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: Life is beautiful. Like a beautiful blue wave, it ebbs and flows, sometimes gushing forth and sometimes receding quietly.
author: Pooja Ruprell

quote: For one human being to love another human being: that is perhaps the most difficult task that has been given to us, the ultimate, the final problem and proof, the work for which all other work is merely preparation.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke, The Selected Poetry of Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: I'm turning into an old man. I own four pairs of oxfords, my stories get a little long winded, and my neighbors play their music too loud.
author: Christy  Hall, The Little Silkworm

quote: Although nature commences with reason and ends in experience it is necessary for us to do the opposite, that is to commence with experience and from this to proceed to investigate the reason.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: You must understand that love never keeps a man from pursuing his destiny. If he abandons that pursuit, it's because it wasn't true love… the love that speaks the Language of the World.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: It is the beauty of life that makes our lives worth living.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We've strayed into a zone with a high magical index,' he said. 'Don't ask me how. Once upon a time a really powerful magic field must have been generated here, and we're feeling the after-effects.'Precisely,' said a passing bush.
author: Terry Pratchett, The Color of Magic

quote: And all I did was read, and when I was too high to read I stared out the windows.
author: Junot Díaz, This Is How You Lose Her

quote: I understand a lot of stuff for a lot of people, how??You won't get the answer!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Folly and evil are twins;the devil is their father,and wisdom is their enemy.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There is a river whose streams make glad the city of Love. Along that river is the tree of heaven.
author: David Paul Kirkpatrick, The Address Of Happiness

quote: Everyone has a right to be a little happy, asshole.
author: John Irving, Last Night in Twisted River

quote: All this worldly wisdom was once the unamiable heresy of some wise man.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The greatest joys in life are found not only in what we do and feel, but also in our quiet hopes and labors for others.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: ...people demonize certain types of crime - it's a way of distancing ourselves from the monsters...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: We must have courage to bet on our ideas, to take the calculated risk, and to act. Everyday living requires courage if life is to be effective and bring happiness.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: We don't always get what we want but often something better happens and we become the person we always wanted to be.
author: Renae A. Sauter, An Empowered Life: Mind/Body/Spirit Empowerment

quote: You can lose a friend in springtime easier than any other season if you're too curious.
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett, The Secret Garden

quote: She's always looking for poetry and passion and sensitivity, the whole Romantic kitchen. I live on a rather simpler diet.' 'Prose and pudding?''I don't expect attractive men necessarily to have attractive souls.
author: John Fowles, The Magus

quote: Since life requires a specific course of action, any other course will destroy it. A being who does not hold his own life as the motive and goal of his actions, is acting on the motive and standard of death.
author: Ayn Rand, Atlas Shrugged

quote: I don't think a female running a house is a problem, a broken family. It's perceived as one because of the notion that a head is a man.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: A sail boat that sails backwards can never see the sun rise.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Not when truth is dirty, but when it is shallow, does the enlightened man dislike to wade into its waters.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: It was one thing to be fooled, and another thing to be taken for a fool all the time.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Triple Agent, Double Cross

quote: It may take us years and years to find our true calling in our life. But one fine day, we eventually do find it!Till then make merry, laugh, fight, dance and enjoy the craziness...
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Our feelings are our most genuine paths to knowledge.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: A rebirth out of spiritual adversity causes us to become new creatures.
author: James E. Faust

quote: I don't need the aid of a clever man to teach me how to live. I can find it out for myself.
author: Henry James, The Portrait of a Lady

quote: You cannot hate someone until you know what it might be like to love them.
author: Jodi Picoult, Vanishing Acts

quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who would want to live in an institution?
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: Search deep within your soul, you will find the light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: To be a success, dream with open eyes, have faith in your defined purpose, and act with deep love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: One of the things I've learned about vision is people will grab it mentally or, have a crab mentality.
author: Onyi Anyado

quote: Percy's thoughts: I don't recommend shadow travel if your scared of:A) The darkB) Cold shivers up your spineC) Strange noisesD) Going so fast you feel like your is peeling offIn other words I thought it was awesome
author: Rick Riordan, The Titan's Curse

quote: One may understand the cosmos  but never the ego  the self is more distant than any star.
author: G. K. Chesterton

quote: If you can fix yourself you can fix the problem===the cure u need is somewhere within you
author: Ikechukwu Joseph

quote: One should hold fast one's heart; for when one letteth it go, how quickly doth one's head run away!
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Thus Spoke Zarathustra

quote: You can develop a positive self image with positive thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Sense howEven the smooth stones acheWith stories of their ownIn the shuddering light of day.
author: Scott Hastie

quote: If we grow in faith, we shall never seize to bear fresh fruit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The double-crossed, might-have-been history of my country is not the study of what actually took place here: it's the study of historians' studies. . . .Memories are their own descendants masquerading as the ancestors of the present.
author: David Mitchell, Ghostwritten

quote: I've never begged. not for anything... except my mother's love.And that was a useless waste of time.
author: Kristin Hannah, Fly Away

quote: Leaders don't correct people to success as much as believe them to it.
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: We're supposed to take our problems to a family adviser. Personally  I've never met a family adviser. They're all off somewhere listening to dirty stories.
author: Robert Orben

quote: The reason you take antidepressants is to feel calm. And romantic love is not calm - it's elation, it's mood swings, and you're killing all that when you take the drug.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: Words are life. We are our words. Choose your words carefully.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The day you leave, this will be your only contentment: if you have made the existence a little more beautiful.
author: Osho, The Secret of Secrets

quote: I am with you always. You just have to find me by opening your inner eyes and closing your egocentric mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: An effective life is a life of purpose
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Be wild and boundless. Why are you crawling when you have wings of imagination?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The goals of true education are to teach acceptance, tolerance, and nonviolence.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Find your niche and occupy it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Waiting is not wasting. It is a strategy for champing for greater things.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: Treat each other like human beings? But the other great apes have no class hierarchy.
author: Bauvard, Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: Complex prevents a person from being a fully valued personality
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Loud critics are silenced by loud success.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Except, now that I don’t have a car, I can’t really make good on my birthday promise.” Sydney thought about it for several moments. “Well. I’ve got a car.”An hour later, I vowed I’d never make fun of that Mazda again.
author: Richelle Mead, The Fiery Heart

quote: You may not be punished for your procrastination, but for sure you will be punished by your procrastination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don't get too lost in consumerism or materialism. As for ownership, the ultimate test of it is were you born with it and can you take it with you when you leave?
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: There is little premium in poetry in a world that thinks of Pound and Whitman as a weight and a sampler, not an Ezra, a Walt, a thing of beauty, a joy forever.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: Being negative only makes a difficult journey more difficult. You may be given a cactus, but you don't have to sit on it.
author: Joyce Meyer, Approval Addiction: Overcoming Your Need to Please Everyone

quote: A real definition of life lies in our daily thoughts and the steps we take to or away from what is distinctive and noble.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: You have no minute to spare... All you have is to dare! It should be at the back of your mind to beware...
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: The conflicts we have with the outside world are often conflicts we have within ourselves.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: The More we value things, the less we value ourselves
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Learn to lose your destiny to find where it leads you
author: Munia Khan

quote: Can a dream be wrong? Aren't dreams God's way of telling you things?
author: Ellen Hopkins

quote: Many talk about flowing against the wind, but its only fools, who goes against the wind. The wise one’s, simply adjust themselves with the flow of the wind.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: A good place to meet a man is at the dry cleaner. These men usually have jobs and bathe.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Your book goes places you may never go and helps people you may never meet
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive, Why Every Entrepreneur Must Write a Book: The Ultimate Guide to Writing, Publishing & Marketing plus Quick & Easy Tips to Becoming a Bestseller

quote: When it comes to words, rather than using our own voice, authentic and unpracticed, we steal someone else's to shield our fear.
author: Terry Tempest Williams, When Women Were Birds: Fifty-four Variations on Voice

quote: Why sometimes we don't Trust people? It is either because we don't know them or know them.
author: Mohith Agadi

quote: If we followed our feelings all the time we´d be like cats chasin´ their tails.
author: Harper Lee

quote: Who I am is not the same minute to minute or day to day. There are far too many variables for that to ever be true, for me, or for anyone.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing

quote: And how can you say I love you to someone you love? I rolled onto my side and fell asleep next to her. Here is the point of everything I have been trying to tell you, Oskar. It's always necessary.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer, Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close

quote: Of all the places I have been, your mind is the most beautiful place I have ever seen.
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: Dear World,I exist.Deal with it.
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: Even fear afraid of faith.
author: Toba Beta, Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza

quote: No matter what you have, no matter your experience level, sometimes you just need a hand.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Except for the point, the still point, There would be no dance, and there is only the dance
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us, or we find it not.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, Emerson's Essays

quote: Accept life as the greatest gift.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The best plot twists are the ones you didn't expect.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: There is an equation that I like to use when looking at my life's progress:Current Worth - Past Worth = Progress or Regression
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Vision

quote: How can one fight for a love that acts as the enemy?
author: Katlyn Charlesworth, The Sun & Stars

quote: ... pain has been with him since birth - the universe's gift to a poet ...
author: Dan Simmons, The Fall of Hyperion

quote: I keep hearing about a spiritual awakening, but I feel what we need instead, is a human one. It would be wonderful and empowering to become free from the disillusionment and nonsense being sold to us from gurus for centuries.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Being a leader isn't a title, it's a lifestyle and there is no on and off switch.
author: Tyconis D. Allison Ty

quote: It is intolerable to have one's sufferings twinned with anybody else's.
author: Susan Sontag, Regarding the Pain of Others

quote: Nothing has done more damage to the Christian view of life than the hideous notion that those who are truly spiritual have lost all interest in the world and its beauties.
author: Elisabeth Elliot, Discipline: The Glad Surrender

quote: I've never heard of a man's cock being described as a fang before. - Rapahel
author: Nalini Singh, Angels' Blood

quote: Never accept the situation where you have the light but sufficient only for yourself! You must have an abundant light so that you may give to others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: I struggled in the beginning. I said I was going to write the truth  so help me God. And I thought I was. I found I couldn't. Nobody can write the absolute truth.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Never allow temporary defeat to keep you from lasting victory.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Philosophers console themselves with explanations.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: The Bible should be taught, but emphatically not as reality. It is fiction, myth, poetry, anything but reality. As such it needs to be taught because it underlies so much of our literature and our culture.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content
author: Helen Keller

quote: The hallmark of great dreams is not their possibility but their impossibility, and the fact that it is the very notion of the ‘impossible’ that inspires us to go and accomplish them anyway.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: If you're a true student of the truth, you may easily get frustrated when people try to make points based on mysticism and cultural beliefs.
author: Assegid Habtewold

quote: Ye have not  because ye ask not.
author: Bible

quote: Your suffering is here to help you unfold and to awaken into compassion, love and strength.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: You need to do research, to approach the study of the issue from all sides
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The simple truth is that every human being should be born with basic human rights without suffering from discrimination.
author: Leta B., Your Steady Soul: May you transform your pain, anger, and hurt into wisdom, kindness, and love.

quote: War was easy. The hard part was cleaning up afterward.
author: Evan Meekins, The Black Banner

quote: If everyone took his pen and wrote just anything that came on his mind, we would greatly help researchers to understand how our minds work
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: Educators not only teach, but they also inspire students to learn, ignite the light of imaginations, shine the sense of perception, and define the path of life for future generations.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be a leader, be an example that others may follow.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: [W]hat should I have done? Gather dirt in my purse?
author: Katie Crouch and Grady Hendrix, The White Glove War

quote: There is a special joy connected to your faith
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: He was a man  take him for all in all  I shall not look upon his like again.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: You can shoo people away in real life, but not when they force their way in through the dream door.
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: If you wish to achieve worthwhile things in your personal and career life, you must become a worthwhile person in your own self-development.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: We've had our ups and downs since then, but that's what families have, ups and downs.
author: Neil Gaiman, MirrorMask

quote: Karma is the balance sheet of life which debits and credit all your deeds.YourWhich is audited by our creator and actions are based on what we accumulated in it.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: The Holy Scripture is Spirit-taught words.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The joy is the journey of Life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: History, writing, infect after a time a man's sense of himself...
author: A.S. Byatt

quote: New technology is not good or evil in and of itself. It's all about how people choose to use it.
author: David Wong

quote: With you, it's different. I can see the rest of my life before my eyes and that scares me a little. Men don't tame my wild heart but somehow I crossed your path and have never been the same since.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Almost every successful person begins with two beliefs: the future can be better than the present, and I have the power to make it so.
author: David Brooks

quote: The worldly life (sansar) is the thing created through delusion [wrong belief]. Therefore when you come to know about this wrong belief, it will go away.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: A book with the genuine power to stir and comfort its readers.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: The belief that all genuine education comes about through experience does not mean that all experiences are genuinely or equally educative.
author: John Dewey

quote: We are each our own devil, and we make this world our hell.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Greatness is sifted through the grind, therefore don't despise the hard work now for surely it will be worth it in the end.
author: Sanjo Jendayi

quote: One day, he and William had been speeding toward each other; the next, careening away. But why?
author: Garth Risk Hallberg, City on Fire

quote: The moon will guide you through the night with her brightness, but she will always dwell in the darkness, in order to be seen.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: He believed a man should never be sober but never be drunk. And he believed in watching out for family, even if you had to stay sober for a few hours; it was that important.
author: Allan Dare Pearce, Paris in April

quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Leave the company of the people who are given you empty promises
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Your mind is a blue sky where without fear you can fly.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love with your heart not with your mind, mind is judgmental but heart is kind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Sylvia grabs my sleeve. “He’s a looker.”“I know. The problem is, he knows it, too.
author: Simone Elkeles, Rules of Attraction

quote: Truthfully she felt incredibly miserable, seeing university students and tourists bustling in and out of the place with their cell phones in hand, texting like there was no tomorrow. Living behind a screen, they’d likely text with their last breath.
author: Rebecca McNutt, Smog City

quote: Those who are men in God’s eyes would live and die for the promotion of equity, fairness and impartiality
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I carry out sun rituals on the slopes of high mountains. But I am also taboo for myself, untouchable because forbidden.
author: Clarice Lispector

quote: Ultimately, the number of books always exceeds the space they are granted.
author: Alberto Manguel, The Library at Night

quote: Education: the inculcation of the incomprehensible into the indifferent by the incompetent.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: Follow people who love people. Not necessarily those who teach people.
author: Alin Sav

quote: The scripture gives us timeless hope.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: ... Error, by force of contrast, enhances the triumph of Truth...
author: Marcel Proust, Swann's Way

quote: Do not forget to care for your body, soul and spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The human body is robust. It can gather strength when it's in mortal danger.
author: Toni Morrison, Song of Solomon

quote: I pray for all of us, oppressor and friend,that together we may succeed in building a better worldthrough human understanding and love,and that in doing so we may reducethe pain and suffering of all sentient beings.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: As thou know not what is the way of the spirit, nor how the bones do grow in the womb of her that is with child: even so thou know not the works of what makes all.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Often religious education teaches us to conform and creates a psychological prison which is difficult to escape.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: So that’s it? You’re just going to rescue me and go?
author: Pamela Clare, First Strike

quote: When you yield yourself in complete and wholehearted obedience to God, He can do great things through you.
author: Jim George, One-Minute Insights for Men

quote: When you are constantly waiting and wanting your declaration is that you are NOT.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: The loneliness you get by the sea is personal and alive. It doesn't subdue you and make you feel abject. It's stimulating loneliness.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Words were insufficient for the elevation of his [Mr Collins'] feelings; and he was obliged to walk about the room, while Elizabeth tried to unite civility and truth in a few short sentences.
author: Jane Austen, Pride and Prejudice

quote: Let us draw from the crib the joy and deep peace that Jesus comes to bring to the world.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Why be crying, fearful, lonely, when you have the whole universe? Be still, listen to your heart, breathe, and know you need nothing.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: Leadership is the art of giving people a platform for spreading ideas that work.
author: Seth Godin, Tribes: We Need You to Lead Us

quote: Teach the ignorant as much as you can. Society is to blame for not giving free education: it is responsible for the darkness it creates. the soul in darkness sins, but the real sinner is he who caused the darkness
author: Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

quote: The past is no further away than the last breath you took.
author: Robin Hobb, Fool's Errand

quote: I'm hopeful. I know there is a lot of ambition in Washington, obviously. But I hope the ambitious realize that they are more likely to succeed with success as opposed to failure.
author: George W. Bush

quote: She is forever beautiful just like the roses.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: All of the great empires of the future will be empires of the mind.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: I have spent years as a leadership coach to the very wealthy and have been able to get behind the eyes of some of the world's best, studying the minute details of what makes a person great.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: Why do I do anything?' she says. 'I'm educated enough to talk myself out of any plan. To deconstruct any fantasy. Explain away any goal. I'm so smart I can negate any dream.
author: Chuck Palahniuk, Choke

quote: Whatever problem you have can be solved through solitude.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: The good old days needed a lot of improvement. People aren't the only things that get better with age.
author: David Levithan, Wide Awake

quote: The Prince is the only option to a better living. His arm is reliable and dependable. Get to Him, stay glued and remain on Top!
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: The purpose of prayer is that we get ahold of God, not of the answer.
author: Oswald Chambers, My Utmost for His Highest

quote: The incapacity to name is a good symptom of disturbance.
author: Roland Barthes, Camera Lucida: Reflections on Photography

quote: Actors are one family over the entire world.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The framing of a problem is often far more essential than its solution
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
author: Jane Austen

quote: For the rational  psychologically healthy man  the desire for pleasure is the desire to celebrate his control over reality. For the neurotic  the desire for pleasure is the desire to escape from reality.
author: Nathaniel Branden

quote: She's cute, I thought, but you don't need to like a girl who treats you like you're ten: You've already got a mom.
author: John Green, Looking for Alaska

quote: Earth changes, but thy soul and God stand sure.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Man is the artificer of his own happiness.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: We don't realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Eat, Pray, Love

quote: ... and you might say “no, you will never do that, that’s not you, not who I know, not who I thought you were”and I will say“watch me”for I never did this to fit inor stand outbut to live.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: As I think of myself, so I shall be.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: If the grandfather of the grandfather of Jesus had known what was hidden within him, he would have stood humble and awe-struck before his soul.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Whether it's eight o'clock in the morning or eight o'clock at night, I always try to greet others before they have a chance to speak to me.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Our parents' generation carried the past memorialized in paint, porcelain, and wood; we cast it off. Even our national history is remembered in terms of the worst we did, not the best.

quote: But, in fact, depression is not a side effect of cancer. Depression is a side effect of dying. - Hazel Grace Lancaster
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Of all the thoughts that hover in your mind, the one you deliberately choose and act upon - changes your LIFE!
author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quote: The highest training trains oneness.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: The main thing is to writefor the joy of it. Cultivate a work-lustthat imagines its haven like your hands at nightdreaming the sun in the sunspot of a breast.You are fasted now, light-headed, dangerous.Take off from here.
author: Seamus Heaney, Station Island

quote: A poet's work . . . to name the unnamable, to point at frauds, to take sides, start arguments, shape the world and stop it from going to sleep.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: The Holy One is a flame.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You are the space in which these thoughts arise, but not the thoughts themselves.
author: Chris Matakas, #Human: Learning To Live In Modern Times

quote: the way to create art is to burn and destroyordinary concepts and to substitute themwith new truths that run down from the top of the headand out of the heart
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Whenever you see a successful business  someone once made a courageous decision.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: No effect occurs without cause, and no cause occurs without effect. No unjust action goes without penalty, and no action or thought flows unnoticed throughout the universe.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: My philosophy is that not only are you responsible for your life, but doing the best at this moment puts you I the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The very essence of I is being killed by You.
author: Santosh Kalwar, The Warrior

quote: Don't let lack of sexual communication get in the way of your pleasure any longer. Dare to ask the questions that will make sex so much more enjoyable, boost passion, and facilitate a deeper connection and intimacy in your relationship.
author: Miya Yamanouchi

quote: People just can’t cope with happiness.
author: Paulo Coelho, Veronika Decides to Die

quote: People from a planet without flowers would think we must be mad with joy the whole time to have such things about us.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: Your every ill-thought, secreted hate, cynical and vicious judgment you carry is meant only for you.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: That’s what happens when destiny unveils itself: you get a sense of knowing you’re exactly where you’re supposed to be, and with whom.
author: Brownell Landrum, A Chorus of Voices: DUET stories Volume III - Adult Version

quote: A positive mind reflects many of the Sun’s characteristics: brightness, nourishment, and vibrance.
author: Pearl Zhu, Thinkingaire: 100 Game Changing Digital Mindsets to Compete for the Future

quote: In an ideal world, the amount of money we spend on medical research to prevent or cure a disease would be proportional to its seriousness and the number of people who suffer from it.
author: Peter Singer

quote: And if you don't find what you're looking for?"At Roy's question Addie looked up."Then all I've lost is time.
author: Jodi Picoult, Salem Falls

quote: Flattery makes friends  truth enemies.
author: Spanish proverb

quote: The fragrance of the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The beauty of a bright new day!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Kindness gives birth to kindness.
author: Sophocles

quote: The essence if hope is accepting uncertainty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you would create something,you must be something.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: It was comparable to getting sick from bad ventilation
author: Alice Munro, Too Much Happiness

quote: Mother used to say that however miserable one is, there’s always something to be thankful for. And each morning, when the sky brightened and light began to flood my cell, I agreed with her.
author: Albert Camus, The Stranger

quote: In the glad old days, before the rise of modern morbidities...it used to be thought a disadvantage to be misunderstood.
author: G.K. Chesterton, Heretics

quote: A tongue is about the size of a bullet, but much more fierce and powerful.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Please Mia," he implores. "Don't make me write a song.
author: Gayle Forman, If I Stay

quote: If they want me to have mysticism, okay, I’ve got it.I’m a mystic, but only in my body,My soul is simple and doesn’t think.
author: Alberto Caeiro, The Keeper of Sheep

quote: Sleeping is the most common attempt to temporarily escape reality.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: The clearest explanation for the failure of any marriage is that two people are incompatible  that is  one is male and the other female.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: The beauty of a meek spirit is precious to God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: My heart made it's choice, and it chose you.
author: Colleen Hoover, Maybe Someday

quote: Torture?” she asked with a laugh. “My first piece of information I’ll divulge to you? I wouldn’t recommend trying to torture me. I dislike it and grow sulky under pincers.It’s a fault.
author: Kresley Cole, The Warlord Wants Forever

quote: God is my shield.God is my defender.God is my protector.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Two things define you in this life. Your attitude when you are at your highest and your attitude when you are at your lowest. Sometimes you have to hit rock bottom in order to recognize and define what truly matters.

quote: How is there freedom to choose if one does not learn how to choose?
author: David Foster Wallace, Infinite Jest

quote: I will never be a loser. Never. Because I will never stop trying to be better.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Every time we dedicate our time and other resources to others to the people around us, we serve God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Barrons: "He got upset it wouldn't shut up and tore its head off."Mac: "The child?" I gasped
author: Karen Marie Moning, Shadowfever

quote: Your Crystal Clear vision should provide you a glimpse of a new universe and turn your excuse for failure into purposes for progress. The shallowness of your previous failures has become a deep well of resources for success.

quote: The best way to earn paradise in the afterlife is to create it in your life and in the life of your neighbor
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: We are going to have peace even if we have to fight for it.

quote: To be successful, love yourself and be originally you. Discover what you were born to do and do it well.

quote: Happy people tend to be those who take pleasure in simple things.

quote: And in the stillness before dawn, on the brink of a war that could tear us apart, our auras danced and twined in the darkness, coiling around each other until they finally merged, becoming one.

quote: Understand that I am even ignored by the opposite sex on the internet.
author: Vann Chow, Shanghai Nobody

quote: We often know information but not the epistemology of that information.

quote: If you look in the mirror and don't like what you see, you can find out first hand what it's like to be me.

quote: You can always tell a real friend  when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: If you follow the herd, people may mistake you for a cow.

quote: Indeed, it's futile to try and use Holy Scripture to support any political position. I deeply distrust anyone who does. Just look at what an Islamic Republic is like.
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: When I was at home  I was in a better place  but travellers must be content.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Man is the only animal that laughs and weeps  for he is the only animal that is struck with the difference between what things are  and what they ought to be.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: You should never wear anything you can't afford to lose.
author: Sloane Crosley, How Did You Get This Number

quote: Do not focus on the problem. Pray for strength to persevere.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We are the dead . Our only true life is in the future. We shall take part in it as handfuls of dust and splinters of bone.
author: George Orwell, 1984

quote: You can say that Lebanese has hundreds of lexemes for family relations. Family to the Lebanese is as snow to the Inuit.
author: Rabih Alameddine, The Hakawati

quote: WOw, wow... so we are the same!?...Let's stop here as moment taken from your goldy life.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: I love the sacred moment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Life is a MISSIONFulfilled through our VISIONLive life well this SEASONYou were born for a REASON...
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: A sour corporate culture can actually make an entire society unhappy. This means that a strong corporate culture can have a positive impact on a society.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: I don't have to say so because people can see it from leagues away. I am ugly, shy and anachronistic, but by dint of not wanting to be those things I have pretended to be just the opposite.
author: Gabriel García Márquez, Memories of My Melancholy Whores

quote: Creativity is nature. Nature is creativity.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Love has value even though we can’t measure it. Silence has meaning even though we can’t understand it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Most people know the physical senses, but a lot of people don’t know the soul’s senses: empathy, trust, intuition, love and harmony
author: Steven Aitchison

quote: Nothing in life is worth,turning your back on,if you love it.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I won’t tolerate her hurting you, my son. I’ll kill the bitch first.”“Weren’t you the one who tried to cut father’s throat before he Claimed you?”"He deserved it,
author: G.A. Aiken, Dragon Actually

quote: Time is so important.'so spend time doing something that you love.' make the most of it and Let the good times roll in your existence!
author: Napz Cherub Pellazo

quote: My pride shut me up, my hurt shut me down, and together they ganged up on my hope and let her get away.
author: David Levithan, Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist

quote: The religious worry about life after death at the expense of life before death.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana, N for Nigger: Aphorisms for Grown Children and Childish Grown-ups

quote: I wonder sometimes if the motivation for writers ought to be contempt, not admiration.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: Go as far as you can see and you will see further.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The world of books, the greatest possessions.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: If books/stories and movies are going to be judge as for the personality of people so... Doctor Sleep and Nightmares and Dreamscapes... should make Stephen King the world top1 insane person, ever lived in the world.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: People don't trust private health insurance companies for all the right reasons.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: One must always be careful of books," said Tessa, "and what is inside them, for words have the power to change us.
author: Cassandra Clare, Clockwork Angel

quote: Anyone is to be pitied who has just sense enough to perceive his deficiencies.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Your life is lived in a day, so focus on living one good day by successfully designing, creating and living that good day and duplicating it.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: As a believer, you need to take responsibility of the Kingdom of God on earth
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Treasure your Ideas, for they are like seeds that germinate in your mind. They Root, Shoot, and Fruit into Concepts & Creativity that are beyond Imagination.
author: RVM

quote: You've never lived what you are thinking, and that isn't good. Only the ideas we actually live are of any value.
author: Hermann Hesse, Demian. Die Geschichte von Emil Sinclairs Jugend

quote: We can do whatever we wish to do provided our wish is strong enough. What do you want most to do? That's what I have to keep asking myself  in the face of difficulties.
author: Katherine Mansfield

quote: Every now and then one paints a picture that seems to have opened a door and serves as a stepping stone to other things.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: We younger Negro artists who create now intend to express our individual dark-skinned selves without fear or shame. If white people are pleased, we are glad. If they are not, it doesn't matter. We know we are beautiful. And ugly too.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: If you believe in God, believe in Death Row East.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Hard work without purpose seldom leads to success.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: We... have created a greater material wealth than any other society in the history of the human race. Yet we have managed to kill off millions of our population in an arrangement which we call "war.
author: Erich Fromm, The Sane Society

quote: Each spice has a special day to it. For turmeric it is Sunday, when light drips fat and butter-colored into the bins to be soaked up glowing, when you pray to the nine planets for love and luck.

quote: It isn't important how much you are giving but it is very important that you are giving.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Spending moments with another in earnest presence is one of the simple ways we can show unconditional love. It is the memories created from these impressions that survive after all else passes.
author: Molly Friedenfeld

quote: Best to introduce yourself to patience now, so that it might find you when you call upon it later.
author: Tahereh Mafi, Furthermore

quote: If you are unclear about what attitudes you adhere to, you will have a difficult time evaluation which ones are not serving your highest good.
author: Deborah Day

quote: Youthful life is a beautiful bliss.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: He thought each memory recalled must do some violence to its origins. As in a party game. Say the word and pass it on. So be sparing. What you alter in the remembering has yet a reality,known or not.
author: Cormac McCarthy, The Road

quote: Knowing the future is different from being told what I like.
author: Audrey Niffenegger, The Time Traveler's Wife

quote: It is good netiquette to use the internet for online education. Learn new things. NetworkEtiquette.net
author: David Chiles

quote: After the group vet appointment--during which Lyle scratched the vet, the vet tech, and some poor woman minding her own business in the waiting room--we went back to Sabrina's and re-released the cats to their natural habitat.
author: Sarah Dessen, Lock and Key

quote: Every new morning brings new sunshine, new joy and new hope.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Sometimes your kids will say the nastiest things, won't they, Rose? You want to ask,'Whose child is this?'"Rose chuckled."But usually, they're just in some kind of pain. They need to work it out.
author: Mitch Albom, For One More Day

quote: One who does not join in with the unfolding karmic effects (karma oodai) is a Gnani (Self-realized), and an agnani (non-Self-realized) cannot indeed refrain from joining in with the unfolding karmic effects.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The abundant life should include all that life has freely given you – love, good health, success, prosperity, happiness, joy, spirituality, fulfilment, wisdom, purpose, growth and excitement.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: All women may not be beautiful but every woman can look beautiful.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Our challenge is making a long-term investment in our children in an instant-gratification society.
author: Ted Agon, The Human Key Condensed

quote: They succeed not because they are perfect but because they do not let their imperfections stand in their way to success.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: Clarity leads to attention and attention leads to results.
author: Henry Cloud, Boundaries for Leaders: Results, Relationships, and Being Ridiculously in Charge

quote: What one has  one ought to use  and whatever he does  he should do with all his might.
author: Cicero

quote: The Scripture is never subjected to one's own interpretations.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Now it is time!" then louder, "Time!"; and then so loud it could have shaken the stars; "TIME." The door flew open.
author: C.S. Lewis, Narnia: The Last Battle

quote: When people come together and discuss their differences based on life issues that are shared, it brings about successful changes.
author: Ellen J. Barrier, The Price We Must Pay for Our Father's Sins

quote: Whatever lies in the soul, can never be stolen.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Love is a smoke rais'd with the fume of sighs; being purg'd, a fire sparkling in lovers' eyes; being vex'd, a sea nourish'd with lovers' tears; what is it else? A madness most discreet, a choking gall, and a preserving sweet.
author: William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

quote: The vertical manThough we value noneBut the horizontal one.
author: John le Carré

quote: This dwarf still observes the world from his own self-imposed height.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Learn to live in the heart’s conscious, not the mind’s.
author: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

quote: That pleasure which is at once the most pure, the most elevating and the most intense, is derived, I maintain, from the contemplation of the beautiful.
author: Edgar Allan Poe, Poems and Essays

quote: Truth is easier for a child to handle than evasiveness.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: If pain doesn't lead to humility, you have wasted your suffering.
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quote: People who don’t know how to use their minds can’t really know how to use their hearts either.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: The worship of power is an old religion.
author: George Santayana

quote: Now anybody can be "kind." And everybody's supposed to be. Except that long ago it was something you were born into and couldn't help. Now it's just a faked-up attitude half the time, like teachers the first day of class.
author: Robert M. Pirsig, Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance: An Inquiry Into Values

quote: That was the problem these days--everything was considered disposable--clothes, cell phones, relationships.
author: Melissa de la Cruz, Sun-Kissed

quote: Nick wanted to meet on campus at Love Library. (That was the actual name; thank you for your donation, Mayor Don Lathrop Love.)
author: Rainbow Rowell, Fangirl

quote: You did not come to this world for an experiment but for an assignment written on the palm of your hand. Discover yours !
author: Osunsakin Adewale

quote: We learn from failure, not from success!
author: Bram Stoker, Dracula

quote: Without the way, there is no going; without the truth, there is no knowing; without the life, there is no living.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Find someone who has a life that you want and figure out how they got it. Read books, pick your role models wisely. Find out what they did and do it.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: Violence was a disease Gansey didn't think he could catch. But all around him, his friends were slowly infected.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, Blue Lily, Lily Blue

quote: I just want to get away from me.
author: Kris Kidd

quote: You should keep calm and listen to voice inside you
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If I made a commitment, I stood by that commitment - and try to make it real. Because when you become leaders, the most important thing you have is your word, your trust. That's where respect comes from.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Genuine wisdom has two major conditions: you cannot teach it, and you cannot make someone learn it.
author: Raheel Farooq

quote: To make mistakes is to live, because no one is born knowing everything.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

quote: Flowers are prettiest where they are watered the most.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It’s not about the elimination of fear. Rather it’s about the elimination of the feeling that the elimination of fear is necessary before we take the next step.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: I'm not bothered by the idea of getting old, or I guess you could say by having arrived at old. I was 10 when my mom turned 55. For 1955, she was a very old mom.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: When they want to leave, they accuse you with endless flaws.
author: Eyden I., Woman's Book: Only For Men

quote: Dressing appropriately in one venue may be highly inappropriate in another. Yet every day we see a lack of modesty and taste, regardless of how uncomfortable it makes others feel.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Preparation: 8 Ways to Plan with Purpose & Intention for Positive Impact

quote: Without constructive skepticism, without human progress.
author: Pearl Zhu, 100 Creativity Ingredients: Everyone's Playbook to Unlock Creativity

quote: Wisdom reveals the beauty of the mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: This is how you explain how you feel: broken words and hard truths.
author: R. Y.S. Perez, I Hope You Fall in Love: Poetry Collection

quote: Memory is like fiction: or else it's fiction that's like memory.
author: Haruki Murakami, The Elephant Vanishes

quote: May our lives and gentle spirit be evident to all that we are members of God's family.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Age is only a number. Keep an active life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Each of us has our definition of adventure: ending an unsatisfyingrelationship, returning to school, parachute jumping or training for amarathon. Go ahead. Get your thrill on.
author: Gina Greenlee, Postcards and Pearls: Life Lessons from Solo Moments on the Road

quote: The desire to belong is in every mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I’m not sure. But – unless I’m struggling with the darkness within – I like to sustain the illusion that death is actually much further from me than it really is.
author: Zack Love, The Syrian Virgin

quote: Bodily exercise, when compulsory, does no harm to the body; but knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no hold on the mind.
author: Plato, The Republic

quote: Your art…” I gaped at the field of white. “There was a lovely portrait of me—right there.”I get offended whenever art is damaged, especially if that art features me.
author: Rick Riordan, The Hidden Oracle

quote: And this gray spirit yearning in desireTo follow knowledge like a sinking star,Beyond the utmost bound of human thought.
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: Some pieces will sing to your present, others may echo of your past, and the rest could whisper of your future.
author: Lang Leav, Lullabies

quote: Sex is the sweetest of all things.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: [Credit is a system whereby] a person who can't pay, gets another person who can't pay, to guarantee that he can pay.
author: Charles Dickens, Little Dorrit

quote: You only spoke a single line,yet it felt like a life sentence.
author: Timothy Joshua

quote: Ben was in his truck, window down, idling at the curb, dark lenses hiding his eyes from her, looking effortlessly big and badass.The way she wished she felt.
author: Jill Shalvis, Once in a Lifetime

quote: i wanted to destroy you.you are mine to ruin.something so beautifulshould only exist for me.
author: AVA., this is how you know i want you.

quote: Intuition is a sacred voice.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Nobody's going to win all the time. On the highway of life you can't always be in the fast lane.
author: Haruki Murakami, What I Talk About When I Talk About Running

quote: Does that mean that if we shave all the Ob'enn they'll be nice?
author: Howard Tayler, The Scrapyard of Insufferable Arrogance

quote: Nobody ever reaches to God, God comes to you when you are open and receptive, when you are ready.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Be the sun breaking through the clouds.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: There was a moment in my life when I really wanted to kill myself. And there was one other moment when I was close to that. . . . But even in my most jaded times, I had some hope.
author: Gerard Way

quote: The more God will reign in you the more you will reign over the earth to establish the kingdom of God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: How heron comesIt is a negligence of the mindnot to notice how at duskheron comes to the pond andstands there in his death robes, perfectservant of the system, hungry, his eyesfull of attention, his wingspure light
author: Mary Oliver, Swan: Poems and Prose Poems

quote: My heart is too thoroughly dried to be broken in a hurry, and I mean to live as long as I can.
author: Anne Brontë, The Tenant of Wildfell Hall
