quote: Nonetheless, I know where I'm coming from,I've got an idea on where I'm going,And with the way things are going,I'm just glad to be me.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, This Is My Life

quote: To keep your marriage brimming, with love in the wedding cup, whenever you're wrong, admit it; whenever you're right, shut up.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: When the Christian or the church becomes popular with the unbelieving world, something is seriously wrong. Because Christ runs counter to evil and because we are Christ-owned, we must also stand against evil.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: The sprint is like life ... blink and you miss it.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Neither have they hearts to stay  Nor wit enough to run away.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: We should fall in love. Love each other enough to shit at the same time on the same toilet.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker, Creep

quote: PROMISING, VOWING...cannot earn us trust. Trust can't be generated overnight. No SHORT CUT! It takes DOING over a very long period of time.
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: O Lord, help me to be pure, but not yet.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Anything built on doubt is rocky.Anything built on fear is shaky.Anything built on hate is unsteady.Anything built on wisdom is trustworthy.Anything built on faith is sturdy.Anything built on love is mighty.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Leaders don’t give excessive vocal orders. They humbly involve people and together cooperate with them to make a change happen.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

quote: Greatness always indicates simplicity. Wisdom always results from curiosity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If a thing loves, it is infinite.
author: William Blake

quote: It’s too risky,” said doubters.“It’s too difficult,” said scoffers.“It’s pointless,” said mockers.“It’s impossible,” said haters.“It’s already done,” said believers.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It’s not how you start that’s important, but how you finish!
author: Jim George

quote: a politician is an arse uponwhich everyone has sat except a man
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: Dreams grow if you grow.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: God softens harden heart into tender loving heart.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Man has a choice and it's a choice that makes him a man.
author: John Steinbeck, East of Eden

quote: ... reason andlove keep little company together now-a-days...
author: William Shakespeare

quote: You have to dig deep in yourself to dream. You have to close your eyes to see.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Jacinta never told Penelope that she loved her. The nurse knew that those who really love, love in silence, with deeds and not with words.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón, The Shadow of the Wind

quote: Life wants you to know that feelings are more important than facts, and you should never hurt someone just to be right.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: It was what you gave out that made a man, not what you got back.
author: Joe Abercrombie, Best Served Cold

quote: Happiness is very simple. To be happy, think happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Those who are called by God are predestined for victory
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Love powers my heart and color powers my soul.
author: Anthony T Hincks

quote: Sometimes you just gotta wear the tinfoil hat.
author: Gary   Hopkins

quote: It is your duty to do your best. It is not, however, your birth-right to prevail.
author: Idries Shah, Observations

quote: What seems to be a chaotic life is just a systematic, engineered Life driven for a purpose!!! The day you find peace in chaos, the game changes!
author: Harrish Sairaman

quote: Freedom from a tyrant is easy, but freedom from societal conformity is difficult.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Fight if you must, work hard, give your best but never quit in the face of difficulty.
author: Sanchita Pandey, Voyage to Happiness!

quote: An honest and wise man is always a very simple man.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Success doesn't teach as many lessons as failure
author: Jay Samit

quote: Sometimes when you are falling down, you grow wings to fly.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You have to control the circumstances and things in your life. They should not control you
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I can't go on Gawker. I actually think the writing is really funny, but there is a chance that somebody is undercutting me.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: Passion presented with a greater challenge achieves a greater goal.-- from The Sexual Side of Spirituality
author: Aberjhani, Journey through the Power of the Rainbow: Quotations from a Life Made Out of Poetry

quote: I want to give you back your first kiss, the one that jerk stole fromyou. And I want it to be something that even a coma can't make youforget.
author: Shelly Crane, Wide Awake

quote: Study the Bible, there God is the teacher.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: One of the fastest ways to move through your pain is to get a grip on reality.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: How silly then to imagine that the human mind, which is formed of the same elements as divine beings, objects to movement and change of abode, while the divine nature finds delight and even self-preservation in continual and very rapid change.
author: Seneca

quote: Over time, if you want rights, you have to also show that you can use them responsibly and that you can build a positive world in the online space, and that's also very important.
author: Rebecca MacKinnon

quote: You need to make time for your family no matter what happens in your life
author: Matthew Quick, The Silver Linings Playbook

quote: She was one of those happily created beings who please without effort  make friends everywhere  and take life so gracefully and easily that less fortunate souls are tempted to believe that such are born under a lucky star.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: We crave magic because we are magic. We crave power because we are pure power.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: You are either free or not free
author: Malcolm X, Malcolm X, Black Liberation, and the Road to Workers' Power

quote: I missed Eve so much I couldn't be a human anymore and feel the pain that humans feel. I had to be an animal again.
author: Garth Stein, The Art of Racing in the Rain

quote: The passion of hatred is so long lived and so obstinate a malady that the surest sign of death in a sick person is their desire for reconciliation.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Life is a voyage across troubled waters where our days are often spent clinging to the top of the highest mast, scouting for a comforting glimpse of shore.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: You have goodness in your heart, but your darkness overwhelms it all; your desire to hurt, destroy, and avenge is more powerful than your desire to love, help, and light the way.
author: Marie Lu, The Young Elites

quote: Words are clothes that thoughts wear
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Faith is the substance of things hoped for, evidence of things not seen.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Hard and dry, a chickpea is inedible.Hard and dry, a heart is unlovable.Presoak it in dance, music and art.
author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quote: You can’t lead without love, and more importantly, you can’t leave a legacy without love.
author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

quote: The objection to fairy stories is that they tell children there are dragons, but children have always known there are dragons. Fairy stories tell children that dragons can be killed.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Mardi Gras, baby. Mardi Gras. Time when all manner of weird shit cuts loose and parties down.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon, No Mercy

quote: Obedience to The Holy Spirit brings you heaven now.
author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quote: I'm a romantic and I kinda believed in this fairy tale. And in some ways I think that's always been to my advantage, because like if you can believe in something great, I feel like you can achieve something great.
author: Katy Perry

quote: Failing over and over again is how you learn to succeed over and over again.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: life will come to an end one moment in time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Teach a child to love his world deeply so that he may find the beauty and joy of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Then the hard, dry Spaniards came exploring through, greedy and realistic, and their greed was for gold or God. They collected souls as they collected jewels.
author: John Steinbeck, East of Eden

quote: Entrepreneur, don't just read history, write it so people can see the future in the present.
author: Onyi Anyado

quote: Never lose a chance of saying a kind word.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray, Vanity Fair

quote: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: To fully understand how utterly amazing we really are we must first understand all of the things about us that are not, and then we must make our habitation where they are not.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, An Intimate Collision: Encounters with Life and Jesus

quote: Bleesed is the person whose mind is ever at peace never diprssed never disappointed.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: What what," Trapis said as he hurried over to tend to her, his bare feet slapping on the floor. "What what. Hush hush.
author: Patrick Rothfuss, The Name of the Wind

quote: We must never forget that while striving to leave a better planet to our kids, it is just as important that we strive to leave better kids to our planet.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: No man can walk so long in the Shadow that he cannot come again to the Light.
author: Robert Jordan, The Great Hunt

quote: A bitter critic is the sweetest corrector.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson, Master of Maxims

quote: A work of art is never finished. It is merely abandoned.
author: E.M. Forster

quote: I cried until my eyes swelled shut, and then I slept, a black, dreamless sleep from which I awoke amazingly refreshed, at least until I remembered.
author: Elizabeth Berg, The Year of Pleasures

quote: If you live with the limited beliefs of your mind, you cannot see life, beyond the physical existence, while in reality, the life happens at a much deeper level.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: Happiness can only bloom in the garden of peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: THING TO TRY: If you are asked to describe a suspect to a police sketch artist, describe in precise detail, the features of the police sketch artist. This is one of the rare instances where two people can do one self-portrait.
author: Demetri Martin, This is a Book

quote: When I got [my] library card, that was when my life began.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Our time is the life we have at the moment
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: It's the craziest thing, but I can't stop thinking about you.
author: Anna Godbersen, The Luxe

quote: I am not grown up, because I grow everyday.
author: Alin Sav

quote: My life, as it passes thus, was indeed hateful to me, and it was during sleep alone that I could taste joy. O blessed sleep!
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley, Frankenstein

quote: Cooking is great, but the meal that has been prepared for you with love is the best.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: People are pretty forgiving when it comes to other people's families. The only family that ever horrifies you is your own.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: The Soul selects her own Society.
author: Emily Dickinson, The Complete Poems of Emily Dickinson

quote: It is a great thing to be able to make God your source and the time of solitude presents you with that opportunity.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: i am constantly torn between killing myself and killing everyone around me. those seem to be the two choices. everything else is just killing time.
author: John Green, Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: Business should never be merely transactional -it should be transformational
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru, Soul Trader: Putting the Heart Back into Your Business

quote: It takes a great man to be a good listener.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: True love is when all differences vanish with mere eye contact.
author: Tapan Ghosh, Faceless The Only Way Out

quote: The Ultimate Answer to Life, The Universe and Everything is...42!
author: Douglas Adams, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quote: Let kindness be the flower of your heart and fragrance of your mind. Let it fill the world with peace, joy and the fragrance of kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A soft moan escapes me, making him smile even more. He's too good at this.
author: Collette West, Night Games

quote: Still, perhaps that's all lives are, all the world is, a collision of vast conflagrations, each sparked from nothing.
author: Mark  Lawrence, Prince of Fools

quote: Through out your life people will project many things onto you. The projections are not about you, they are about them. Most will actually have very little to do with who you actually are. Remember this instead of reacting.
author: Renae A. Sauter, An Empowered Life: Mind/Body/Spirit Empowerment

quote: Sometimes I think heaven must be one continuous unexhausted reading.
author: Virginia Woolf, Selected Letters

quote: Mother earth cried so much that she has pool of tears more than the land of happiness.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Joy is found in simple things.
author: Todd Stocker, Dancing with God: First Year Thoughts on the Loss of My Daughter

quote: Conscience, the divine nature within us, sees everything as connected, what’s good for all is always its priority.
author: Ilchi Lee, Change: Realizing Your Greatest Potential

quote: Christianity would have lacked a great essence without the Bible. A Christian who seldom devotes a little time to read the Bible is with a great question mark.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: A broken friendship that is mended through forgiveness can be even stronger than it once was.
author: Stephen Richards, Forgiveness and Love Conquers All: Healing the Emotional Self

quote: Accept love with love, but never forget to forgive hate with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I suppose I'm saying that defiance is actually part of the lyric job
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Set goals,pursue them,achieve them,and then surpass them.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It will not be easy for him to see her dead, should they become close. But she has so few friends. She cannot turn one away.
author: Kendare Blake, Three Dark Crowns

quote: Never feel sorry for me, just teach me and watch me grow.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quote: [Jesus] prayed briefly when He was in a crowd; He prayed a little longer when He was with His disciples; and He prayed all night when He was alone. Today, many in the ministry tend to reverse that process.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: If typos are God's way of keeping a writer humble, plot holes certainly keeps one on their knees.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quote: Valid questions are better than invalid assumptions.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Beauty is one of the rare things which does not lead to doubt of God.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: The world is too quiet without you nearby.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: We wonder with our thoughts to the heavens.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We're standing here, beat to shit, walking away from a crime scene where either or both of us could have bought it, and you're asking me to marry you?""Perfect timing.
author: J.D. Robb, Glory in Death

quote: And because Eddie knew that was only the truth, he said nothing.
author: Stephen King, The Waste Lands

quote: When I look at your smile, I can see your heart. When I look at your heart, it makes me smile back.
author: Ron Baratono, The Writings of Ron Baratono

quote: A good garden may have some weeds.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Man is not merely born to make money. But to fulfill his mission.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Once we were a stranger... just passing by.......in school... we never know each other... but one day came and we became friends.
author: Deyth Banger, Afraid - Part 2

quote: I have never bought into the idea that blood is thicker than water. Love and respect are meant to be earned from our children, our spouses, our families, and our friends.
author: Raquel Cepeda, Bird of Paradise: How I Became Latina

quote: Every day of our life has risk. So never fear to take one.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: It is when we finally realize the futility of violence and the invalidity of war will we, the people of this world finally wake up!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Madness exist in the mind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Your smile carries my heart away every time that I see you.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: A leader is a lamp not just a sign board.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There is no point in using the word 'impossible' to describe something that has clearly happened.
author: Douglas Adams, Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency

quote: The thing I hate about religion is, they ban what they have done and force us to do what they haven’t done.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: I know that I have lived because I have felt, and, feeling giving me the knowledge of my existence, I know likewise that I shall exist no more when I shall have ceased to feel.
author: Giacomo Casanova

quote: A Genius always admires the choices of the most Confident Fool!
author: Vishwanath S J

quote: Living a lifetime is experiment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Full fathom five thy father lies;Of his bones are coral made;Those are pearls that were his eyes:Nothing of him that doth fade,But doth suffer a sea-changeInto something rich and strange.Sea-nymphs hourly ring his knell: Ding-dong Hark! now I hear them,—Ding-dong, bell.
author: William Shakespeare, The Tempest

quote: If there is another world  he lives in bliss If there is none  he made the best of this.
author: Robert Burns

quote: There are so many futures still to dawn!
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Daybreak: Thoughts on the Prejudices of Morality

quote: Devices which in some curious new way imitate nature are attractive to simple minds.
author: Vladimir Nabokov, Bend Sinister

quote: Historically, I come from Jewish history. I had the classic upbringing in the Yeshiva, learning, learning, and more learning.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Focus your mind on love, peace and harmony.It will vanish fear, doubt and disharmony.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everybody deserves love, but nobody is entitled to it.
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quote: Have you noticed that whatever sport you're trying to learn, some earnest person is always telling you to keep your knees bent?
author: Dave Barry

quote: By studying yesterday, you will understand today.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Author points out in Woodrow Wilson the flipside of the positive we might call big picture vision. He observes that as college president Wilson resorted to the language of a national crusade when he met resistance in a local, academic issue.
author: David Pietrusza, 1920: The Year of the Six Presidents

quote: The entire world is surviving only due to ‘beliefs’, not because of ‘Knowledge’ (Gnan). Every human being is (living) only because of beliefs.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: It is raining in my heart.Humanity is shedding a tear.I asked, “Who is suffering?”Is it my mother?Silence.No answer.Everyone has a mother,And she always suffers.Why as a child do we let our mothers suffer?I could not get an answer.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: Because when I kiss you, I want yours to be the first... and last lips I ever kiss.
author: Renee Ahdieh, The Rose & the Dagger

quote: If you can convince people that freedom is injustice, they will then believe that slavery is freedom.
author: Stefan Molyneux

quote: Idolatrous beliefs have eroded the foundations of truth. Whether ancient or modern, all have posed alternatives to the biblical way of approaching God.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: God is the greatest Teacher.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Let the tent be struck.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: True happiness is of a retired nature and an enemy to pomp and noise  it arises  in the first place  from the enjoyment of one's self  and  in the next  from the friendship and conversations of a few select companions.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Music is breath of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Faust: First Part

quote: Fear attracts the darkness. When you have no fear, the darkness fears you.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: If women are given the same honor and dignity in society as the men, they will run the society way better than men.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Much that may seem evil can be good.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Dance with Dragons

quote: Don't deny your parents a chance at happiness and also an opportunity to see you achieve greatness.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: Sometimes words I think are small come out big.
author: Corey Ann Haydu, The Careful Undressing of Love

quote: Miss Abbott, don't worry over me. Some people are born not to do things. I'm one of them.
author: E.M. Forster, Where Angels Fear to Tread

quote: The soul knows its sorrow.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I have forgotten my umbrella.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The basic structure of the universe is balanced on a razor’s edge for life to exist
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Nobody can always have devout feelings: and even if we could, feelings are not what God principally cares about.
author: C.S. Lewis, Mere Christianity

quote: People get stupid when they're in love; people want what they can't have; and the years between ages twelve and eighteen always, always suck.
author: Claudia Gray, Evernight

quote: The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear.
author: H.P. Lovecraft

quote: Like it takes so little not only to change something, but to make you forget the way it once was, as well.
author: Sarah Dessen, Lock and Key

quote: If you can begin with enthusiasm and confidence, you are half way to success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Cosmetic surgery processes the bodies of woman-made women, who make up the vast majority of its patient pool, into man-made women.
author: Naomi Wolf, The Beauty Myth

quote: One man scorned and covered with scars still strove with his last ounce of courage to reach the unreachable stars and the world will be better for this.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: The expressions of those moving about a picture gallery show ill-concealed disappointment that they only find pictures there.
author: Walter Benjamin, One Way Street And Other Writings

quote: What a blessing to love someone so much that you long for them at the core of your being. At the same time, when you are separated from that person, that longing is a torture I would not wish on anyone.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Ever since I discovered that my god given male member was going to give me no peace, I decided to give it no rest in return.
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: He who says either that the time for philosophy has not yet come or that it has passed is like someone who says that the time for happiness has not yet come or that it has passed.
author: Epicurus

quote: All are born with halters round their necks; but it is only when caught in the swift, sudden turn of death, that mortals realize the silent, subtle, ever-present perils of life.
author: Herman Melville, Moby-Dick or, The Whale

quote: To read is to translate, for no two persons' experiences are the same. A bad reader is like a bad translator: he interprets literally when he ought to paraphrase and paraphrases when he ought to interpret literally.
author: W.H. Auden

quote: We often feel proud of our knowledge even when it is filled with emptiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Even the tallest trees always begin as a seed.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar

quote: Why is everything always my decision?" I asked.Because you will not tolerate anything else."Oh, I remembered now. "Great", I whispered.- Anita to Jean-Claude
author: Laurell K. Hamilton, Cerulean Sins

quote: The secret of all greatness is in knowing what to do with time. The secret of all the great men and women in history is that they converted their time into tangible products.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: What I believe is that when it comes to big things in life, there are no accidents. Everything happens for a reason. You are here for a reason -- and it's not to fail and die.
author: Ransom Riggs, Hollow City

quote: Women need a reason to have sex, while men just need an angle
author: Josh Stern, And That’s Why I’m Single

quote: My heart feels strong for you, my desire isn’t just to marry you and let this be our moment, Kiersten. I want to marry you and create a million moments every single day.
author: Rachel Van Dyken, Fearless

quote: Growing nails breaks all conducts (aachar). When one conduct breaks, it breaks all other conducts.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Monsters don’t get happy endings.
author: Paula Stokes, Ferocious

quote: May you live to be as old as 120 years old.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: After years in utter darkness, I force my eyes into the light. For I must retain my sight, that I might view the wholeness of the void, objectively.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: Every victory and success that God will give you will make others jealous it will cause hatred and opposition as well
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Acceptance” is the most beautiful word in the English language.
author: David W. Earle

quote: Intelligence is a way of thinking, not a choice of words.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana, N for Nigger: Aphorisms for Grown Children and Childish Grown-ups

quote: only someone who is ready for everything, who doesn't exclude any experience, even the most incomprehensible, will live the relationship with another person as something alive and will himself sound the depths of his own being.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke, Letters to a Young Poet

quote: There is a sense that things, if you keep positive and optimistic about what can be done, do work out.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: People should just buy a CD and rip it. You are legal then.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Satan impregnated my mother one lovely spring morning. We didn’t have the heart to tell my father.
author: Holly Hood

quote: Life is going on even if you are not on the train.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There is only one passion, the passion for happiness.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: If you want peace, prepare for ideological war with those who want others to prepare for physical war.
author: Jakub Bożydar Wiśniewski

quote: A library is chamber of treasures.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Nature finds its peace in silence, forgiveness, and universal love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When everybody is planting apples a visionary plants oranges.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Like soil, the quality of your mind decides the quality and quantity of ideas your mind can produce.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Everything known and referred to as “impossible” is often what has not been attempted before. It will always have a change of name once it’s attempted!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: Let go of what was and embrace what to be.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Your Mind is an asset that is a foundation upon which resources are built. Resources will come and go but a Mindset built on success will always attract the needed resources.
author: Oscar Bimpong

quote: It is not objective proof of God's existence that we want but, whether we use religious language for it or not, the experience of God's presence.
author: Frederick Buechner, The Magnificent Defeat

quote: I understand now that nobody could have saved Ty but Ty. There’s no one else to blame. Not you. Not me. Ty was holding all the cards.
author: Cynthia Hand, The Last Time We Say Goodbye

quote: He is as full of valor as of kindness. Princely in both.
author: William Shakespeare, Henry V

quote: No government ought to be without censors; and where the press is free, no one ever will. Chance is the pseudonym of God when he did not want to sign.
author: Anatole France

quote: Fear? What has a man to do with fear? Chance rules our lives, and the future is all unknown. Best live as we may, from day to day.
author: Sophocles, Oedipus Rex

quote: There should be no tenacity of insistence or obstinate insistence of any kind. If there is any tenacity, it should be the kind that will go away if you tell it to!
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Even if you don't have all the things you want, be grateful for the things you don't have that you don't want (Bob Dylan's dad)
author: Bob Dylan, Chronicles, Vol. 1

quote: Apparently the complete works of Shakespeare packed quite a wallop. To think, my mother said I'd never find use for an English degree. Ha! I'd like to see her knock someone silly with an apron and a cookie press.
author: Rachel Vincent, Stray

quote: I celebrate my spirit with joy and playful abandon.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Appreciate who accompany, let go who leave. People who surround are ultimate wealth.
author: Mahrukh

quote: In Kenya, I met wonderful girls; girls who wanted to help their communities. I was with them in their school, listening to their dreams. They still have hope. They want to be doctor and teachers and engineers.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Who you allow into the circle of your life will make the difference in the quality of your life.
author: Chris Prentiss, Zen and the Art of Happiness

quote: Hate in your heart will consume you.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Creators aren't gods. They make places, which is quite hard. It's men that make gods. This explains a lot.
author: Terry Pratchett, The Last Continent

quote: It may be inevitable that mankind has to suffer so that it may gain experience to transcend and transform her collective consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We ought to walk with God and not for God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The times, they are a-changing! What was once defined by tradition, respect, and custom has evolved into a relaxed and casual society. What is acceptable and normal today would never have been permitted in the past.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Preparation: 8 Ways to Plan with Purpose & Intention for Positive Impact

quote: Respect yourself is you would have others respect you.
author: Baltasar Gracián

quote: Your time is your time. Be awake to it. It's hard work to be wisely alive.
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift

quote: The only history is a mere question of one's struggle inside oneself. But that is the joy of it. One need neither discover Americas nor conquer nations, and yet one has as great a work as Columbus or Alexander, to do.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: The only cost to happiness is, choice. Remember, happiness is exclusive of materialism and/or the external worldly influences
author: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, Ph.D, MBA

quote: Relax. Refresh. Renew. Play. Sing. Laugh. Enjoy. Forgive. Dance. Love. Hug. Share. Kiss. Create. Explore. Hope. Listen. Dare. Trust. Dream. Learn. TODAY!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Generosity is an act of love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I think my life is of great importance, but I also think it is meaningless.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Before he could say anything, "I told him; I have had my share of boys".He drew me closer and said "let me your man then".
author: Pushpa Rana, Just the Way I Feel

quote: Every time God gives you prosperity and favor to attain His goals and you do not use it, the devil will lead you in another way
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You have to choose your own destiny.You have to choose your own path in life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Wherever you go, go with love, but never leave hope behind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: …I am left with lessthan one drop of my blood that does not tremble.I recognize the the signs of the old flame.
author: Dante Alighieri, Purgatorio

quote: One would go mad if one took the Bible seriously but to take it seriously one must be already mad.
author: Aleister Crowley, Magick: Liber ABA: Book 4

quote: They are a couple in love, and anyone but a fool would see it is simply that, nothing more- and certainly nothing less.
author: Philippa Gregory, The Red Queen

quote: Though there are no stars, no light but the souls in love will always shine so bright even in darkness.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Do not curse the well that quenches your thirst.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: What is hardest to accept about the passage of time is that the people who once mattered the most to us wind up in parentheses.
author: John Irving, The Cider House Rules

quote: If some people came into contact with anything real they would be shocked out of their minds.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Ignorance is your opponent, fear is your enemy, vice is your adversary, virtue is your friend, and wisdom is your helper.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Being proactive and intentional will enable you to create a positive experience for yourself and others.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Action: 8 Ways to Initiate & Activate Forward Momentum for Positive Impact

quote: Wisdom is the pillar of success.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Keep moving forward! You don't need permission from anyone in order to move on your own father's land! Go ahead and take the lead!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Great tranquility of heart is his who cares for neither praise nor blame.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: If ever a generation was bequeathed the knowledge of God, we were. Yet we are throwing away this glorious heritage on our lust and passions.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Don't build a team that will fuel your 'ego'. Build a team that has the skills, desire & passion for fueling the 'vision'.
author: Yvonne Pierre, The Day My Soul Cried:  A Memoir

quote: The books - the generous friends who met me without suspicion - the merciful masters who never used me ill!
author: Wilkie Collins, Armadale

quote: Prayer without gratitude is more like complaining.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Today's tears sweep the road to tomorrow's blessings.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is the strongest, not the prettiest birds that conquer the sky.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: I'm very type-A, and many things in my life are about control and domination, but eating should be a submissive experience, where you let down your guard and enjoy the ride.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: Most problems can be effectively dealt with before they are in full swing.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

quote: Nothing ever really ends. That’s the horrible part of being in the short-story business—you have to be a real expert on ends. Nothing in real life ends. ‘Millicent at last understands.’ Nobody ever understands.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

quote: The profoundest thing writing teaches us is how much we contradict ourselves.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: depth and substance.the two most exquisite qualities. be it in a poemor a person.
author: Sanober  Khan

quote: He did not waste time in a vain search for a place in history.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: ..he had trampled her poor, pining heart, and the wound was still raw, even these many years later.
author: Ransom Riggs, Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children

quote: All who call on God in true faith  earnestly from the heart  will certainly be heard  and will receive what they have asked and desired.
author: Martin Luther

quote: There is no royal road to science, and only those who do not dread the fatiguing climb of its steep paths have a chance of gaining its luminous summits.
author: Karl Marx, Capital, Vol 1: A Critical Analysis of Capitalist Production

quote: The worst cynicism: a belief in luck.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: The secret is writing down one simple line after another.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: i never met myself before i die once in lifetime coming again as best alive
author: litymunshi

quote: For time and the world do not stand still. Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or the present are certain to miss the future.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Like" and "like" and "like"--but what is the thing that lies beneath the semblance of the thing?
author: Virginia Woolf, The Waves

quote: If its danger you seek, come on over. I covet tranquility but beget the tempest storm.
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: Breath is the bridge that connects us with the mysteries of the universe and universal consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you don't love me, it does not matter, anyway I can love for both of us.
author: Stendhal

quote: It is necessary to the happiness of man that he be mentally faithful to himself. Infidelity does not consist in believing, or in disbelieving, it consists in professing to believe what he does not believe.
author: Thomas Paine, The Age of Reason

quote: Your level of consciousness defines the beauty of your life and destiny.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your love opened up a whole world that no amount of books or wisdom could ever do.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: It was considered at the time a striking proof of virtue in the young king that he was sorry for his father's death;but, as common subjects have that virtue too, sometimes, we will say no more about it.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: A weird time in which we are alive. We can travel anywhere we want, even to other planets. And for what? To sit day after day, declining in morale and hope.
author: Philip K. Dick, The Man in the High Castle

quote: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself and you are the easiest person to fool.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: How can you find answers, if you do not ask questions?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Most people trusted in the future, assuming that their preferred version of it would unfold.
author: Jhumpa Lahiri, The Lowland

quote: We never know how high we are till we are called to rise. Then if we are true to form our statures touch the skies.
author: Emily Dickinson, Collected Poems of Emily Dickinson

quote: Writing means not just staring ugliness in the face, but finding a way to embrace  it.
author: Veronica Roth

quote: Align your activity with your vision. Being consistent and intentional with your daily activities will result in sustainable success.
author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

quote: Parents teach children discipline for two different, indeed diametrically opposed, reasons: to render the child submissive to them and to make him independent of them. Only a self-disciplined person can be obedient; and only such a person can be autonomous.
author: Thomas Szasz

quote: A marriage filled with unconditional love experiences the depth of grace and mercy.
author: Elizabeth George, Moments of Grace for a Woman's Heart

quote: Whatever we may say about the soul going to the sky... we know there is no sky but only an atmosphere.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: I had aimed at Mars and was about to hit Venus unquestionably the all-time cosmic record for poor shots.
author: Edgar Rice Burroughs, Pirates of Venus

quote: For a couple of days he was nice and I was on cloud number 9,damn they don’t teach how to come down from there instead leave us to gravity.
author: Pushpa Rana, Just the Way I Feel

quote: The world was full of monsters, and they were all allowed to bite the innocent and the unwary
author: Stephen King, Cujo

quote: Most people do not really want others to have freedom of speech, they just want others to be given the freedom to say want they want to hear.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: It strikes me that perhaps this is part of what we are fighting to choose. Which pain to feel.
author: Ally Condie, Matched

quote: Friendship is one of our most treasured relationships, but it isn't codified and celebrated; it's never going to give you a party.
author: Hanya Yanagihara

quote: I wonder how it is possible to believe in religion and also believe nothing is wrong with you.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: There comes a stage at which a man would rather die cleanly by a bullet than by the unknown terror of the phantom in the forest.
author: Tahir Shah, House of the Tiger King: The Quest for a Lost City

quote: Christ is not valued at all, unless he is valued above all.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: I recalled my father-in-law's aphorism "To fool a judge, feign fascination, but to bamboozle the whole court, feign boredom..." & I pretended to extract a speck from my eye.
author: David Mitchell, Cloud Atlas

quote: Don't run I never liked fast food
author: Rachel Caine

quote: You can only diffuse light in dark places.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Don't let your tragedies fool you, they were never meant to alter your path; just re-pave your direction. Spend time nurturing the things that once tore you apart and you will find within you, your most empowering strength.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Even of his sins the Enemy does not want him to think too much: once they are repented, the sooner the man turns his attention outward, the better the Enemy is pleased.
author: C.S. Lewis, The Screwtape Letters

quote: ... why I like timetables, because they make sure I don't get lost in time.
author: Mark Haddon, The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time

quote: I feel like if you're a really good human being, you can try to find something beautiful in every single person, no matter what.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: What right does my present have to speak of my past? Has my present some advantage over my past? What "grace" might have enlightened me? except that of passing time, or of a good cause, encountered on my way?
author: Roland Barthes, Roland Barthes

quote: She may be an old flame, but she still smokin'.
author: Lois Greiman, Unscrewed

quote: A great number isn’t bad though, but doesn’t take numbers to change the world.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

quote: i am awake and aliveand swollen and heavywith love.
author: AVA., you are safe here.

quote: There is more than one road to spiritual salvation. We discover a philosophical way of living by encountering the world, culling knowledge from all available resources, and thinking reverently about life.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: Your consciousness creates pure potentiality where nothing is impossible.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Ripples of karmic events are best humbly done in an artistic, significant, unique karmic harvests without any forms of retaliation.
author: Angelica Hopes

quote: Never be afraid to love. Just be careful who you love.
author: Carlos Wallace, The Other 99 T.Y.M.E.S: Train Your Mind to Enjoy Serenity

quote: No poet or novelist wishes he was the only one who ever lived, but most of them wish they were the only one alive, and quite a number believe their wish has been granted.
author: W.H. Auden

quote: Once you are at the point where you can call yourself a writer, there’s no turning back.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: To find joy in work is to discover the fountain of youth.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: There are many different forms of family and there is in fact NO 'the' family.The basic building block of any close relationship - and thus any family - is LOVE.
author: Christina Engela, All That Remains

quote: We can only continue to promote invention, creativity and success by asking of ourselves, our situations and problems some key questions. What questions are you asking today?
author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

quote: A society becomes a breeding ground of violence and terrorism when it closes its door to new ideas and forces the citizens to live in the prison of conforming thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: This bullet can go straight through the couch."He was right. Fuck Ikea for making such flimsy furniture.
author: Karina Halle, Shooting Scars

quote: Our bird of hope was being denied the altitude it sought, just free enough to fly dangerously close to the reality of the treetops.
author: Dan Groat, An Enigmatic Escape: A Trilogy

quote: The beach is a natural park, without the greenery but the sand is a natural toy.
author: Anuradha Bhattacharyya

quote: The worst thing you can do is make money at the expense of losing your time.
author: J.R. Rim

quote: We are long before we are convinced that happiness is never to be found, and each believes it possessed by others, to keep alive the hope of obtaining it for himself.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: until we courageously find a cheaper antidote to our ignorance, we shall always pay a higher price for our ignorance courageously.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: You have to be excited about your life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Sum of life; Birth, childhood, youth, adulthood, parenthood, old age and death.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: God is our Holy Father.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: And I thought Ereaders could not become any more dreadful.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Pessimism

quote: The fossil record implies trial and error, the inability to anticipate the future, features inconsistent with a Great Designer (though not a Designer of a more remote and indirect temperament.)
author: Carl Sagan, Cosmos

quote: Love shouldn’t require Windex to be clear. It either is or it isn’t.
author: Mandy Hale, The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: Do all the work you can, there is enough rest in the grave.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I've learned one thing: you can only really get to know a person after a row. Only then can you judge their true character!
author: Anne Frank, The Diary of a Young Girl

quote: Read as you taste fruit or savor wine, or enjoy friendship, love or life.
author: George Herbert

quote: If you stretch your soul, you will find your sacred spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When you decide to be the bestyou can be, don’t be surprisedif the circle of people youwant to spend your time withbecomes smaller.
author: Domonique Bertolucci, The Happiness Code: Ten Keys to Being the Best You Can Be

quote: Truth made you a traitor as it often does in a time of scoundrels.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: I imagined I was God for a millisecond And became speechless for a long time.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: A great source of calamity lies in regret and anticipation; therefore a person is wise who thinks of the present alone, regardless of the past or future.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: The highest creed is Universal Acceptance.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Follow Your Heart & The world Shall Follow YOU!Reject it and It stops beating!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: Earth is the source of light.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sign and Its Children

quote: The spiritual soul is sacred.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: All outdoors may be bedlam, provided there is no disturbance within.
author: Seneca

quote: That which is not good for the bee-hive cannot be good for the bees.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Do you really believe that the moon isn’t there when nobody looks?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: And he grew and grew strong as a boy must grow who does not know that he is learning any lessons, and who has nothing in the world to think of except things to eat" (23).
author: Rudyard Kipling, The Jungle Book

quote: As an adult, be child-like as you learn but not child-ish as you live.
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift

quote: To dream doesn't cost you much, so dream.To hope doesn't cost you much, so hope.To yearn doesn't cost you much, so yearn;but to succeed costs you everything, so persevere.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so, you apologize for the truth.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Life becomes a blessing when you discover your calling
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There is no use indicting words, they are no shoddier than what they peddle.
author: Samuel Beckett, Malone Dies

quote: There is more than enough for everyone. Any idea of lack and so its experience comes from fear. Fear powers greed, which encourages people to save for later just for themselves.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: We now have the advantage of a few years more of life, but death is still standing at the end of the road.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Powerful people have no regrets.
author: Gregory David Roberts, Shantaram

quote: Life is to be entered upon with courage.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: Confidence is the greatest success.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: To be a success, find what you love and do it with all your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is on every side, and no one's side. Don't ask what Love can do for you.
author: Rick Riordan, The House of Hades

quote: The bonds of family bind us up, support us, help us. And they are also a bond from which it is difficult, perhaps impossible to extricate oneself.
author: Neil Gaiman, The Wake

quote: Overcoming poverty is not a gesture of charity. It is an act of justice. It is the protection of a fundamental human right, the right to dignity and a decent
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws.
author: Plato

quote: I think that's just a story.""But, Jace," she said. "All stories are true.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Congratulations, he said. "That was the stupidest thing I've ever seen." His expression was a mix of awe and disbelief. "Ever.
author: Patrick Rothfuss, The Name of the Wind

quote: I see, eye see, what my heart feels, soul knows. In flowing sound and glowing scenes, I touch the living dream.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: But Hyacinth Bridgerton, who at ten should have known the least about kisses of anyone, just blinked thoughtfully, and said, " I think it's nice. If they're laughing now, they'll probably be laughing forever.
author: Julia Quinn, The Duke and I

quote: And I'd pray for them. And I'd imagine peace they couldn't expect and couldn't account for descending on their illness or their quarreling or their dreams.
author: Marilynne Robinson

quote: The happiness of the superficial: when a man who has lost his donkey finds it again.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: Every change comes in a challenge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Girls are pearls, ladies are rubies, mothers are moulders, and women are wonderful.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: Izzy. Sweet, beautiful, but eternally strange Izzy.
author: G.A. Aiken, What a Dragon Should Know

quote: Peace is the only destination worth beginning a journey for.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I discovered that night (in his college's student politics) that an audience has a feel to it, and, in the parlance of the theater, that audience and I were together.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Friends are like books, you learn from every one of them.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Excuses will not take you far, they will take you out. The success of your many excuses doesn’t mean you will run away from the work. It means the work will run away from you!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: God is love, I said, but art's the possibility of forms, and shadows are the source of identity.
author: Ralph Ellison, Juneteenth

quote: If love and kindness is life's investment, then joy and happiness will be life's profit and dividend.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The Celestial (Heavenly Gods) become pleased with the one who isn’t hungry for fame and recognition. The whole world can be pleased with us, but because of our hunger they are not pleased with us.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Life Consists Of Many Things But You Have To Do One Thing... And That Thing Is Living For God.Remember You Cant Do Many Things At Once.
author: Cyc Jouzy

quote: Even evolutionary explanations of the traditional division of labor by sex do not imply that it is unchangeable, “natural” in the sense of good, or something that should be forced on individual women or men who don’t want it.
author: Steven Pinker, How the Mind Works

quote: A dog Is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Tally smiled. At least she was causing trouble to the end. "I'm Tally Youngblood," she said. "make me pretty.
author: Scott Westerfeld, Uglies

quote: My father told me once that the most important thing every man should know is what he would die for.
author: Tana French, Faithful Place

quote: Where they burn books, at the end they also burn people
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: It is true that words have power, and one of the things they are able to do is get out of someone's mouth before the speaker has the chance to stop them.
author: Terry Pratchett, Wyrd Sisters

quote: I can amass countless fortunes and yet stand with empty hands. I can seek God and have fortunes that fill countless hands.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, Flecks of Gold on a Path of Stone: Simple Truths for Profound Living

quote: Jiu Jitsu can be a source of total transparency such as a mirror, but it takes a conscious choice to see what it has to say.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Continued Education Through Jiu Jitsu

quote: Sometimes good-bye is a second chance. Clears your head. Anyway... missing someone makes you remember why you loved that person in the first place.
author: Jamie McGuire, Something Beautiful

quote: When two partners always agree, one of them is not necessary." If there is some point you haven't thought about, be thankful if it is brought to your attention.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: ... only darkened trails of rain could paint your face upon a pane...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: An unexciting truth may be eclipsed by a thrilling falsehood.
author: Aldous Huxley, Brave New World Revisited

quote: No man is more cheated than the selfish man.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: God gave you a special purpose, do not see yourself as insignificant
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you say that you never lie in life,you honestly insult my intelligence.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Love is your only wealth. Everything else is just a mirage.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Belief in a cruel God makes a cruel man.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: And it's always better, isn't it, when you discover answers on your own?
author: Veronica Rossi, Under the Never Sky

quote: The strongest trees are rooted in the dark places of the earth. Darkness will be your cloak, your shield, your mother's milk. Darkness will make you strong.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Dance with Dragons

quote: Sometimes you have to go on when you don't feel like it, and sometimes you're doing good work when if feels like all you're managing is to shovel shit from a sitting position.
author: Stephen King

quote: If you think you need to forgive anyone....you got it all wrong.
author: Vivian Amis

quote: Some increase happens within us and are not seen by the outside world
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God is great.God is amazing.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Where were the scientific pamphlets that taught a woman how to listen to herself die?
author: Gail Carriger, Heartless

quote: It's strange because sometimes, I read a book, and I think I am the people in the book. Also, when I write letters, I spend the next two days thinking about what I figured out in my letters.
author: Stephen Chbosky

quote: I think God eventually changed my heart simply because I clung to my desire for Him, even though I wasn't sure how to follow through on that desire.
author: Craig Groeschel, Dare to Drop the Pose: Ten Things Christians Think but Are Afraid to Say

quote: HopeSmiles from the threshold of the year to come, Whispering 'it will be happier'...
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: what such people miscall their religion, is a vent for their bad humours and arrogance.
author: Charles Dickens, David Copperfield

quote: A man of character can have what a man of intellect can imagine.
author: Raheel Farooq

quote: ...at dawn, the grains of sleep turn to floating black spots, then out of focus the world tilts, and the cat scratches at the door...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: I’ve gotta get out of the basement. I’ve gotta see the world. I’ve gotta make a difference
author: Gerard Way

quote: Choices! Choices!! Choices!!! I have chosen love over hate.I have chosen faith over fears.I have chosen courage over cowardice.I have chosen strength over weakness.I have chosen positive thinking over negative thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: YOU are your own guru. YOU are your own soul mate. YOU are powerful. Take the reigns and drive your carriage home to love.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Is it true; is it kind, or is it necessary?
author: Socrates, Essential Thinkers - Socrates

quote: The only way we can divorce fears in our lives is by marrying our desires.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: It’s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
author: Lewis Carroll, Alice in Wonderland

quote: Trees're always a relief, after people.
author: David Mitchell, Black Swan Green

quote: History and beauty lie in the baroque wrinkles of old cathedrals. mosques, synagogues, temples and faces whose stories are told without a single word.
author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quote: For an optimist life is beautiful, for a pessimist life is beautiful for the fool.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everyone you meet is a part of your journey, but not all of them are meant to stay in your life. Some people are just passing through to bring you gifts; either they're blessings or lessons.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: There should be no boundaries to human endeavor. (...) However bad life may seem (...) While there’s life, there is hope.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: You deserve to be unleashed. Bliss is your birthright.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Never let what you don't know stop you from doing what you do know.
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: Nothing is more futile than looking for meaning in things that have none.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Life is beautiful, so celebrate it like the gift that it is.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: I know you exist not just because your eyes flyand give light to things like an open window
author: Pablo Neruda, 100 Love Sonnets

quote: Whoever is first in the field and awaits the coming of the enemy, will be fresh for the fight; whoever is second in the field and has to hasten to battle will arrive exhausted.
author: Sun Tzu, The Art of War

quote: Five syllables," Apollo said, counting them on his fingers. "That would be real bad.
author: Rick Riordan, The Last Olympian

quote: In order to grow, I promise you'll have to let go of some habits. 10 times out of 10, they'll be the habits you're most in love with.
author: Brandi L. Bates, Remains To Be Seen

quote: Success in creating AI would be the biggest event in human history. Unfortunately, it might also be the last, unless we learn how to avoid the risks.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Renunciation is dropping the fear, anger, respect, and disrespect but continuously radiating unconditional love for everyone.
author: Amit Ray, Peace Bliss Beauty and Truth: Living with Positivity

quote: The world is made up of words.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I do not need any friends. I prefer enemies. They are better company and their feelings towards you are always genuine.
author: Dylan Thomas, The Doctor and the Devils

quote: Centre yourself. Fear will get you killed as easily as a weapon.
author: Sarah J. Maas, Tower of Dawn

quote: To be at peace with others you must be at peace with yourself.
author: E'yen A. Gardner

quote: When you yield yourself in complete and whole-hearted obedience to God, He can do great things through you.
author: Jim George, One-Minute Insights for Men

quote: Fundamentalism of any kind, be it religious, atheistic, political or educational, is the greatest threat to human excellence – it is a threat to progress – it is a threat to greatness.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Principia Humanitas

quote: It is the toughest time but the best.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party.
author: Nick Hornby

quote: The grace,faith,love and power of God will uplift you to greater heights.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: P40- this violence, as a process, is perpetuated from generation to generation of oppressors, who become its heirs and are shaped by it.
author: Paulo Freire

quote: Discipline is needed in our family lives.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: As I speak to you today, government censors somewhere are working furiously to erase my words from the records of history. But history itself has already condemned these tactics.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: When my information changes, I alter my conclusions. What do you do, sir?
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: It does not take God one second to re-write your ugly past .
author: Osunsakin Adewale

quote: Speak gently to young women as you would to your sisters
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: P33- Oppression is domesticating. Gravest obstacle to the achievement of liberation is that oppressive reality absorbs those within it and thereby acts to submerge human beings consciousness.
author: Paulo Freire, Pedagogy of the Oppressed

quote: There are nine and sixty ways of constructing tribal lays  and every single one of them is right.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: A society that puts equality before freedom will get neither. A society that puts freedom before equality will get a high degree of both.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: For a game, you don’t need a teacher.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: I think the attempt to defend belief can unsettle it, in fact, because there is always an inadequacy in argument about ultimate things.
author: Marilynne Robinson, Gilead

quote: No person has the right to rain on your dreams.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: We cannot lose the battle, if we release our faith knowing that God can do a miracle
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: In our lives we know joy, anger, sorrow, and a hundred other emotions, but these emotions altogether occupy a bare one per cent of our time. The remaining ninety-nine per cent is just living in waiting.
author: Osamu Dazai, The Setting Sun

quote: On famous relatives - First I was my mother's daughter..and now..I am my daughter's mother !
author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

quote: We travel to see beauty of souls in new landscapes.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Are we not acceptable, moon? Are we not lovely sitting together here, I in my satin; he in black and white?
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Your mind gives birth to an action and, whether you like it or not, it will never let it become orphaned
author: Dean Cavanagh

quote: Always continue the climb. It is possible for you to do whatever you choose, if you first get to know who you are and are willing to work with a power that is greater than ourselves to do it.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: When our internal reference point is the ego or self-image, we feel cut off from our source, and the uncertainty of events creates fear and doubt.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The uncertainty of the future is a great blessing for us humans! Let the road ahead of us be completely unknown for us so that we can have the marvellous joy of discovering it!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The life of people who do not know their destiny becomes an infinite chain of activities that in fact do not actually mean anything for their success
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished??
author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quote: But let there be spaces in your togetherness and let the winds of the heavens dance between you. Love one another but make not a bond of love: let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Free will...it's all the rage these days
author: Lauren Kate, Passion

quote: Be wise enough to learn from the past, shrewd enough to capitalize on the present, and clever enough to prepare for the future.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: If you struggle making people knowing Jesus, then you better revise your actions.
author: Alin Sav

quote: I think one of the keys to leadership is recognizing that everybody has gifts and talents. A good leader will learn how to harness those gifts toward the same goal.
author: Ben Carson

quote: WHAT PRODUCTIVE AND POSITIVE YOU DO TODAY WITH YOUR TIME CAN MAKE REST OF YOUR LIFE WORTHY AND FRUITFUL.
author: Seema Brain Openers

quote: To make them forget how bad human beings are, they were taught too insistently that bears are good. Instead of being told honestly what humans are and what bears are.
author: Umberto Eco, How to Travel with a Salmon and Other Essays

quote: The personal eloquence of other people expressing aspects of nature and human condition inspire us, as do persons whom exhibit courage to gain strength when dealing with the hardships and struggles of a mortal life.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: When a president's popularity grows, the he is doing wrong things.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I’m fulfilling my calling when I raise my voice high
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The only real limitation on your abilities is the level of your desires. If you want it badly enough, there are no limits on what you can achieve.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Even if you walk through a beautiful garden, you will not be able to find the beauty if your heart is not ready to bloom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The mind, the body and the soul enfolds in divinity of spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You know, my friends, with what a brave carouse I made a Second Marriage in my house; favored old barren reason from my bed, and took the daughter of the vine to spouse.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: The only impeccable writers are those who never wrote.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: This is the us you wanted us to be, Gwen.
author: Kristen Ashley, Mystery Man

quote: Most people have this tendency to make judgments on others based on preconceptions, especially when they are dealing with them for the first time.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: There is no evidence of the soul except in tis sudden absence. A nothingness enters, taking the place where something was before. A night without stars falls and for a moment covers everything in the room.
author: Bruce Springsteen, Born to Run

quote: Power...Born out of nature, Coveted by men; Wars rage on, And victors are crowned. But true power can never be lost or won. True power comes from within.
author: Emily Thorne

quote: Truth is a fundamental principle that is needed for any form of building or construction. So also is honesty.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Life would be unbearably dull if we had answers to all our questions.
author: Jim Butcher, Death Masks

quote: You (Millennials) are the generation most afraid of real community because it inevitably limits freedom and choice. Get over your fear.
author: Timothy J. Keller

quote: Faith is a certitude without proofs ... a sentiment  for it is a hope  it is an instinct  for it precedes all outward instruction.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Every rose has poetry in her heart and is eager to tell you when you are in love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A bad peace is even worse than war.
author: Tacitus

quote: God's grace is sufficient for us to overcome any situation,
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The process of fostering the growth of another living being—either plant or human—is a delight for the soul.
author: Catherine Carrigan, What Is Healing? Awaken Your Intuitive Power for Health and Happiness

quote: A scholar knows not to waste time rediscovering information already known.
author: Brandon Sanderson, The Way of Kings

quote: this life has been a landscape of painand still,flowersbloom in it.
author: Sanober  Khan, A Thousand Flamingos

quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
author: Julia Child

quote: I suppose the test of one's decency is how much of a fight one can put up after one has stopped caring, and after one has found that one can never please the people they wanted to please.
author: Willa Cather, The Selected Letters

quote: Speed to fail should be every entrepreneur's motto. When you finally find the one idea that can't be killed, go with it.
author: Jay Samit

quote: I will not allow my mistakes of the past compromise my hope for the future.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Who can claim to know you more than you know yourself? You have been with yourself all your life, after all.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Mirror

quote: In the ill-judged execution of the well-judged plan of things the call seldom produces the comer, the man to love rarely coincides with the hour for loving
author: Thomas Hardy, Tess of the D'Urbervilles

quote: A happy life is one which is in accordance with its own nature.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: An encounter with God demands a response. An encounter with Satan demands your God's response.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Success comes from patience and passion.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Listen, said Beverly. Let me tell you something. There is no Very Friendly Animal Center. That cat is long gone.
author: Kate DiCamillo, Raymie Nightingale

quote: A drop in the bucket, a tear in the ocean, you’ve been treading cold water, memorizing the motion just to stay afloat.
author: Kris Kidd, Down for Whatever

quote: You are a winner when you have the courage to face the adversity and endure the difficulties.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What comes into our minds when we think about God is the most important thing about us.
author: A.W. Tozer

quote: I am not the Messiah. I am a simple human being with the unlimited power of love and kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Luck always favors those who are bold.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: North and South has both met and made kind o' friends in this big smoky place.
author: Elizabeth Gaskell, North and South

quote: One should measure their life by the faith they embrace and the relationships they cherish
author: John Paul Warren

quote: A popular author is one who writes what the people think. Genius invites them to think something else.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: When someone else's truth is the same as your truth, and he seems to be saying it just for you, that's great.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: You are like fire; you will burn wherever you go. If contained, channeled, you can bring light, but you will also always cast a shadow.
author: Michelle Hodkin, The Retribution of Mara Dyer

quote: I cannot live without books.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: You've lived through a lot of wars, I said. "Yes."Do they ever make more sense?"No.
author: Mitch Albom, Have a Little Faith: a True Story

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: TO the States or any one of them, or any city of the States, Resist much, obey little, Once unquestioning obedience, once fully enslaved,Once fully enslaved, no nation, state, city of this earth, ever after-ward resumes its liberty.
author: Walt Whitman, Leaves of Grass

quote: Things which are accidentally the causes either of hope or fear are called good or evil omens.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: The habit of expression leads to the search for something to express. Something remains as a residuum of the commonplace itself, if one strikes out every commonplace in the expression.
author: Henry Adams, The Education of Henry Adams

quote: Wherever you are, for sure, you are everywhere.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Every life is a possession of faith  and exercises an inevitable and silent propaganda.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Never forget why you should win or achieve your goals and dreams. Once you feel you are losing purpose in the process, remind yourself why you saw the need to begin in the first place, let that drive you.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: Pray and mediate on the Scriptures.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Life without a defined purpose is similar to a boat without a crew in the middle of the ocean.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: She's burning and out of control and everything I love about fire.
author: Melody  Lee, Moon Gypsy

quote: It doesn't matter what you did, all what matters is what you want to do, when, where and how you are going to do it.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Ours is a world where people don't know what they want and are willing to go through hell to get it.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Liking colors doesn't make you shallow.It gives you depth!
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Interviewer: 'So Frank, you have long hair. Does that make you a woman?'Frank Zappa: 'You have a wooden leg. Does that make you a table?
author: Frank Zappa

quote: The scariest thing in the world is thinking someone you love is going to die.
author: Jodi Picoult, Lone Wolf

quote: Blaming other people inevitably makes us blame ourselves because if we are pointing the finger at someone, practically, we are pointing it at ourselves as well.
author: Stephen Richards, The Pain You Feel Today Is The Strength You Feel Tomorrow

quote: Determining to read through your Bible is a decision only you can make.
author: Jim George, A Man After God's Own Heart

quote: The pain I feel now is the happiness I had before. That's the deal.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The adult within me would be much wiser to learn from the child within me rather than focus on the demand that the child within me grow up.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: God has put enough into the world to make faith in Him a most reasonable thing. But He has left enough out to make it impossible to live by sheer reason or observation alone.
author: Ravi Zacharias

quote: The purpose of life is life.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: I want to kiss you so thoroughly that you lose your ability to stand.
author: John Mark Green

quote: Every child should be taught how to read, write and think.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: every time God forgives us, God is saying that God's own rules do not matter as much as the relationship that God wants to create with us.
author: Richard Rohr, Falling Upward: A Spirituality for the Two Halves of Life

quote: The teacher works in accordance with the prospects of his students and the possibility of maintaining the community of Sufis.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: A biomass will live with a self-preservation instinct
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: No art is harder to master than believing in yourself.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Desires kept within the mind are simply unrealised dreams.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: I have so much health problems, but I believe I could still make it through.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quote: In the last analysis, most of our difficulties come from losing contact with our instincts, with the age-old forgotten wisdom stored up in us.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: The effectiveness of your life is determined by your ability to convert your time into values
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: A sunshine can bring opportunities for a person's life and you should never be disappointed if it shines on you because if you disregard it, you will miss the moment of great luck.
author: Saaif Alam

quote: Sometimes, you don't get what you want the most... At other times, you're just lucky.
author: Sanhita Baruah

quote: I am part of what she thinks is her illness, a symptom of which she thinks she has been cured. She, on the other hand, is what I was looking for.
author: Louise Erdrich, The Plague of Doves

quote: When we're healthy we respond to the presence of the hateful with fear and nausea.
author: Anthony Burgess, A Clockwork Orange

quote: What is Fulfillment? Fulfillment is being Blissfully Content...with Pleasure and Peace...with Calmness and Courage...with Joy and Love.
author: RVM

quote: Sometimes its not the strength but gentleness that cracks the hardest shells.
author: Richard Paul Evans, Lost December

quote: Ram wanted to marry a woman in front of whom he would be compelled to bow his head in admiration. P.210
