author: Amish Tripathi, Sita: Warrior of Mithila

quote: you came in slowly like the fog and consumed me.
author: Ava, This Is How You Know I Want You.

quote: There's nothing more aggravating in the world than the midnight sniffling of the person you've decided to hate.
author: Shannon Hale, Book of a Thousand Days

quote: She complains that I'm lazy, but I just like to save my energy for dinner.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is painful for the plant which is myself to live in the atmosphere and light of this world. Somewhere an element is lacking which would permit me to continue.
author: Osamu Dazai, The Setting Sun

quote: Millions of men, renouncing their human feelings and reason, had to go from west to east to slay their fellows, just as some centuries previously hordes of men had come from the east to the west slaying their fellows.
author: Leo Tolstoy, War and Peace

quote: Life is not like water. Things in life don't necessarily flow over the shortest possible route.
author: Haruki Murakami, 1Q84

quote: The wise know much, but pretend to know little; the ignorant know little, but pretend to know much; and the foolish know nothing, but pretend to know all.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: I believe Jesus Christ is the Son of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: God requires two things: ‘pure love’ and ‘true justice’. Everywhere else there is relative justice. Where ‘pure love’ and ‘true justice’ exist, there comes the grace of God!
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Education is a never ending light that enlightens our path of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Nature  like a kind and smiling mother  lends herself to our dreams and cherishes our fancies.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Love is the light of lamp of the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: In order that people may be happy in their work, these three things are needed: They must be fit for it. They must not do too much of it. And they must have a sense of success in it.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Another relative?" Valek asked.A broad smile stretched Moon Man's lips. "Yes. I am her mother's uncle's wife'sthird cousin."--Valek and Moon Man
author: Maria V. Snyder, Magic Study

quote: I am thankful to my teachers who taught me how to read.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If only I had wings, I would not hesitate to fly away from my mistakes.
author: Delano Johnson, Rare Images of Love

quote: Patriotism is when love of your own people comes first; nationalism, when hate for people other than your own comes first.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Is there anything refreshing like renewed words of God?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When you choose your friends, don't be short-changed by choosing personality over character.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Reading is thinking with someone else's head instead of ones own.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer, The Art of Literature

quote: Reading haiku is as much an art as writing it. The reader needs to pause and listen to the silences, to feel the spaces between the words, and to journey into the depths of many multi-colored worlds.
author: Harley King, Mother, Don't Lock Me In That Closet!

quote: How could we be sorrow, if there is a song?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Fear is inevitable, I have to accept that, but I cannot allow it to paralyze me.
author: Isabel Allende, The Sum of Our Days: A Memoir

quote: There are as many kinds of anger as there are of the sunsets with which they ought to end.
author: George MacDonald

quote: Guilt: the gift that keeps on giving.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: I feel the terror of idleness,like a red thirst.Death isn't just an idea.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: Even as a solid rock is unshaken by the wind, so are the wise unshaken by praise or blame.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: The secret of the answered prayer is not in its artistry, nor shouts either…
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Aim and hit the target of excellence, with constant practice. Make success happen, by working to be the best at what you do.
author: Mark F. LaMoure

quote: Alltami (n.)The ancient art of being able to balance the hot and cold shower taps.
author: Douglas Adams, The Deeper Meaning of Liff

quote: In a rich moonlit garden, flowers open beneath the eyes of entire nations terrified to acknowledge the simplicity of the beauty of peace.
author: Aberjhani, Elemental: The Power of Illuminated Love

quote: We expect miracles from love but love has only itself to give.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Love is ignites the light in the spirit
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Asking big “WHY” question is to dig through the root cause of changes, how to manage it and achieve a more tangible result.
author: Pearl Zhu, Change Insight: Change as an Ongoing Capability to Fuel Digital Transformation

quote: You cannot carry your past without dropping your future.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It's pretty hard to be efficient without being obnoxious.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Large bodies of goal achievement research encourage written goals for good reason. When we write down our goals, we transform what we imagine into reality.
author: Gina Greenlee, The Whole Person Guide to Your First Marathon: A Mind Body Spirit Companion

quote: Among the American contemporaries I read with most enjoyment are several North Carolinians. I think the best poetry being written these days is being written by Southerners.
author: Robert Morgan

quote: Even the enemy needs permission from God to do what he wants with you.
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: They will cry, he will shout but you must sweat.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Much can be accomplished if you seek a heart of wisdom and walk diligently with God each and every day.
author: Elizabeth George, A Woman's Daily Walk with God

quote: The view of Jerusalem is the history of the world; it is more, it is the history of earth and of heaven.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: We need to pay as much attention to the MEANS, as to the END! This is the biggest principle of SUCCESS..The END is so enticing, that we lose sight of the details altogether..Success lies in the DETAILS!
author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

quote: You are way awesome than you think you are. Don't forget about your awesomeness today
author: Janna Cachola

quote: Without leaps of the imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Bringing a great attitude with positive energy is one of the best strategies you can have for your personal and professional success. Matching our energy with another person’s will help us build rapport and relationships more easily.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Body Language: 8 Ways to Optimize Non-Verbal Communication for Positive Impact

quote: I don't want to be the one who says life is beautiful. I want to be the one who feels it.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: LIFE’S SOFT EDGES‘Tis a truth I will confess that we ofttimes find soft edges –to such a degree, our livesare well manifestof people’s kindliness.
author: Tara Estacaan

quote: Respect is the lifeblood of progress, and the safe harbour of humanity's great aspirations
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: I don't want you to leave. I want you to stay.
author: Olga Goa, Fateful Italian Passion

quote: It was the love which the hunter has for living things, and which he can only express by aiming his gun at them ...
author: Italo Calvino

quote: Your life will be simplified when you choose inaction when no action is required and choose action when action is required!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Life begins when you learn that life is an opportunity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A leader must stand up for his team even when he has to stand alone.
author: Farshad Asl

quote: You lost your innocence when you grew up, all right, everyone knew that, but did you have to lose your hope, as well?
author: Stephen King

quote: The best way to guide children without coercion is to be ourselves.
author: Madeleine L'Engle, A Circle of Quiet

quote: Sex outside of marriage is an abuse.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: THE PRESOCRATIC PROBLEM[all snap flags]Parmenides named his gun The Hot Power of the Stars. His gun was one, uncreated, imperishable, timeless, changeless, perfect, spherical. Spherical was the problem.
author: Anne Carson, Decreation

quote: You know your husband truly loves you when he calls you, "Money, I'm home!
author: Natalya Vorobyova, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: You have to embrace the idea of imperfection, even in the thing that is most perfect for you.
author: Kiera Cass, The Crown

quote: So close to the powers of evil she must have lived that she still breathed more freely in their air.
author: Edith Wharton, The Age of Innocence

quote: The funny thing is people won't let me pay for things. I'll be in a restaurant and the manager will say, 'Oh no, it's on the house.'
author: Richard Branson

quote: God does not require from you empty words or idle conversations
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When you look more generally at life on Earth, you find that it is all the same kind of life. There are not many different kinds; there's only one kind. It uses about fifty fundamental biological building blocks, organic molecules.
author: Carl Sagan, The Varieties of Scientific Experience: A Personal View of the Search for God

quote: In temples you find religion, but in hearts you find God.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Life is so short, no time to spare, so choose carefully, love intensely and live blissfully.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: No man can be merry unless he is serious.
author: G. K. Chesterton

quote: If we are to judge of love by its consequences  it more nearly resembles hatred than friendship.
author: La Rochefoucauld

quote: O Lord  help me not to despise or oppose what I do not understand.
author: William Penn

quote: The best music is essentially there to provide you something to face the world with.
author: Bruce Springsteen

quote: There is nothing which can better deserve our patronage than the promotion of science and literature. Knowledge is in every country the surest basis of public happiness.
author: George Washington

quote: The heavens declare the glory of God.The heavens declare the majesty King.The heavens declare the marvellous Lord.The heavens declare the mighty Saviour.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I do not think there is a woman in whom the roots of passion shoot deeper than in me.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: I never write anything without humor, just because I like humor, but at the same time, it is a way for anything fantastical to become relatable.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: It is no coincidence that, on all four sides, in all four corners, the borders of the Roman Empire stopped where wine could no longer be made.
author: Neel Burton

quote: The egocentric is always frustrated, simply because the condition of self-perfection is self-surrender. There must be a willingness to die to the lower part of self, before there can be a birth to the nobler.
author: Fulton J. Sheen, Seven Words of Jesus and Mary: Lessons from Cana and Calvary

quote: People have often told me that one of their strongest childhood memories is the scent of their grandmother's house. I never knew my grandmothers, but I could always count of the Bookmobile.
author: Adriana Trigiani, Big Stone Gap

quote: He was jealous of her future, and she of his past.
author: Anaïs Nin, Delta of Venus

quote: Don't search Dreams in the sky, they need strong footage on earth.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: You find peace by becoming a source of peace for others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: But part of him wanted to say: Forget the world. He didn't want to be without her.
author: Rick Riordan, The Mark of Athena

quote: You must understand that all great things come through time conversion.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: May you find the might, the power within you, to eagerly reach out to your dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Believe you can achieve your dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We need to place God at the center of our family . . . As a family, we need to walk with God daily.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: To be a successful doer, be a dreamer.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Renewal of mind, revival of spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I once went on the most grueling radio tour. Living in hotel rooms, sleeping in the backs of rental cars as my mom drove to three different cities in one day.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: If you're optimistic, think of it as bronze.
author: Markus Zusak

quote: So you love war. I used to think you were a decent man. But I see now I was mistaken. You're a hero.
author: Joe Abercrombie, The Heroes

quote: When does one qualify (for moksha)? It is when he never has any conflict in the worldly life.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Live for today with love and kindness. Live profoundly for tomorrow is promised to no one.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Every day you and I walk through God's shop. Every day we brush up against objects of incalculable worth to Him. People. Every one of them carries a price tag, if only we could see it.
author: John Ortberg, Love Beyond Reason: Moving God's Love from Your Head to Your Heart

quote: If you wrote something for which someone sent you a check, if you cashed the check and it didn't bounce, and if you then paid the light bill with the money, I consider you talented.
author: Stephen King

quote: I am doomed to an eternity of compulsive work. No set goal achieved satisfies. Success only breeds a new goal. The golden apple devoured has seeds. It is endless.
author: Bette Davis

quote: Be kind to all the people you meet on your journey.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: A bull that allows a he goat to deter it from moving forward is nothing but a mere he goat
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Sometimes I think it would be easier to avoid old age, to die young, but then you'd never complete your life, would you? You'd never wholly know you.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Without even knowing, humanity actually worships not an Entity, rather a mental state.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Errors do not cease to be errors simply because they’re ratified into law.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri, Brushstrokes of a Gadfly

quote: Outer beauty is transient, but the beauty of the soul is everlasting.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is such a deep gratitude. When you are truly in love with life, every breath you take is gratitude.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: There are natural phases to all life and wherever you are in life, you are perfectly becoming.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Most success springs from an obstacle or failure. I became a cartoonist largely because I failed in my goal of becoming a successful executive.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Every path that my foot has treaded was divinely ordered.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Your passion sustains you. Your purpose is why you were created. Follow your passion but ensure you fulfill your purpose.
author: Kemi Sogunle

quote: Africans require, want, the franchise on the basis of one man one vote. They want political independence.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You have freedom when you're easy in your harness.
author: Robert Frost

quote: One heroic act doesn’t make a man trustworthy. What if he decides to turn his blade on you?
author: Marie Lu, The Midnight Star

quote: I want America to be more like America, if you will. I want the songs, that patriotism we have.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: What’s the point of something virtual if it doesn’t end up being real?
author: David Levithan, Every Day

quote: Freemasonry is a spiritual practice that good men of every spiritual practice can agree upon.
author: J.Adam Snyder

quote: Dour music has its own beauty, for the song of ruin is most fertile.
author: Steven Erikson

quote: Every one that asketh receiveth  and he that seeketh findeth.
author: Matthew

quote: Emotion is the poetry of life.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Men will never be free until the last king is strangled with the entrails of the last priest.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: Finishing a good book is like leaving a good friend
author: William Feather

quote: Strive to be more than number one—strive to be the greatest number one.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Life truly is what you make it. The purpose and meaning of life is the purpose and meaning that you give it.
author: Steven Redhead, Keys to Creating Your Reality

quote: She had tried to be loved by him; more important, she had tried to keep loving him, but in the end, one was impossible as the other.
author: Kristin Hannah, The Nightingale

quote: When people do not respect us we are sharply offended yet in his private heart no man much respects himself.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Trying to impose our personal agenda on someone else’s experience is the shadow side of love, while real love recognizes that life unfolds at its own pace.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: Any man's death diminishes me, because I am involved in mankind, and therefore never send to know for whom the bells tolls; it tolls for thee.
author: John Donne, Meditation XVII - Meditation 17

quote: A new baby! Why, Scarlett, this is a surprise!” he laughed, leaning down to push the blanket away from Ella Lorena's small ugly face." - Rhett Butler
author: Margaret Mitchell, Gone With the Wind

quote: Eliminate the overwhelming cost of phantom wars and fools' errands, and humankind might begin to balance its books. After all, its only debts are to itself.
author: Marilynne Robinson, When I Was a Child I Read Books

quote: Stand firm in the Lord. Stand firm and let Him fight your battle. Do not try to fight alone.
author: Francine Rivers, A Voice in the Wind

quote: Saying just the right thing after a considerable, awkward pause is far less effective than saying the wrong thing with perfect timing. I'm telling you.
author: Augusten Burroughs, This Is How: Proven Aid in Overcoming Shyness, Molestation, Fatness, Spinsterhood, Grief, Disease, Lushery, Decrepitude & More. For Young and Old Alike.

quote: A house is never small or empty, when filled with love.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: All those men who end up disappointing you. After a while, you don't even want to have feelings anymore. You just want to get on with your life.
author: Candace Bushnell, Sex and the City

quote: It is Vitaraag vignan [the Spiritual Science of the Enlightened Ones] to look at gain, and to see losses is the knowledge of worldly wanderings.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: ... you "met" this Moneta ... or whatever her real name is ... in her past but your future ... in a meeting that's still to come
author: Dan Simmons, Hyperion

quote: Ако съдбата не те разсмива, ти просто не схващаш шегата.
author: Gregory David Roberts, Shantaram

quote: People think that fun in Christ is non-existent, but there is fun wherever your heart lives.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: Looking back together, telling our stories to one another, we learn how to be on our own.
author: Lois Lowry, Looking Back: A Book of Memories

quote: Reality is a projection of your thoughts or the things you habitually think about.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: The best of my essence is shown to those who value my energy and appreciate my love, some would call it selfish, I call it selective.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: I assess the power of a will by how much resistance, pain, torture it endures and knows how to turn to its advantage
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Nervous means you want to play. Scared means you don't want to play.
author: Sherman Alexie, The Absolutely True Diary of a Part-Time Indian

quote: The essence of life change when we admire our teachers kindneess.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: Southern gentleman,” he said aside to him in Arabic. “Do you wish for me to continue this for you?”Caine’s temper shifted to a low simmer in his chest. “Your way takes too long.”“Ma’aleyk, and your way hurts my ears,” he argued.
author: V.S. Carnes

quote: Leadership. No rules, no laws, no books, no titles, just influence.
author: Alin Sav

quote: The books that everybody admires are those that nobody reads.
author: Anatole France

quote: The fair request ought to be followed by the deed  in silence.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: We cannot ignore our gift of the future.
author: Jimmy Carter, Just Peace: A Message of Hope

quote: The proper function of man is to live, not to exist. I shall not waste my days in trying to prolong them. I shall use my time.
author: Jack London

quote: Without travels, our existence, our memories, our literature, our dreams, our everything would be very poor, very boring, very limited!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Faith in God is a full force of grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The primary focus of homeschooling should be on cultivating hearts for the Lord.
author: Tamara L. Chilver

quote: Conquer all your fears with faith.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When you start dreaming- what’s there to boast?Life may treat you like a living ghostBrokenness haunts you until you perishDeath will bring you nothing to cherish
author: Munia Khan

quote: One shot is all anyone needs if they back themselves and do it right.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Pessimism

quote: The premise of this book is that it is easier to recognize other people's mistakes than our own.
author: Daniel Kahneman, Thinking, Fast and Slow

quote: Hades was the personification of dark and dangerous--a living, breathing Batman.
author: P.C. Cast, Goddess of Spring

quote: The world needs more love and Twitter just figured out a way to send 'hearts all over the world'.
author: Germany Kent

quote: I don't stand for the black man's side, I don' t stand for the white man's side. I stand for God's side.
author: Bob Marley

quote: If you don’t know where you are going, ask those who have been there.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The best Gift a man can get from God is a noble wife, trust me, everything is possible!
author: Samuel Asumadu-Sarkodie

quote: If you believe that you are NOT omnipresent, omniscient and ultimately omnipotent – you are delusional. If you believe that you are separate from that which you call God, then you are living a lie.
author: Kevin Michel, Moving Through Parallel Worlds To Achieve Your Dreams

quote: A mistake is a stepping stone to success
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: War  he sung  is toil and trouble  Honour but an empty bubble.
author: John Dryden

quote: Everything becomes yours when you touch it with your love. You are connected to everything with your feelings.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don't panic. Are you sitting? You probably don't need to sit. Well, possibly. At least lean on something.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Raven Boys

quote: Time is time. You cannot replay time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Every heart is a universe within its own galaxy that is ready to accommodate many others in her immeasurable depth.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A benevolent universe of spirit helpers sits at the ready to support your unfolding joy. All you have to do is ask.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Happiness lies for those who cry, those who hurt, those who have searched, and those who have tried for only they can appreciate the importance of people who have touched their lives.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The madness in the heart is the state of mind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Life has simply decided to open the floodgates, trying to drown me in a whirlwind of twists and turns.
author: Victoria Aveyard, Red Queen

quote: Even if most days can’t be half as good as today, it’s days like this that make it all worth it.
author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading 2

quote: Every decent con man knows that the simplest truth is more powerful than even the most elaborate lie.
author: Ally Carter, Uncommon Criminals

quote: There isn't any formula or method. You learn to love by loving - by paying attention and doing what one thereby discovers has to be done.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I think that the greatest gift God ever gave man is not the gift of sight but the gift of vision. Sight is a function of the eyes, but vision is a function of the heart.
author: Myles Munroe

quote: Show me what you've written," I said, although I wanted desperately to avoid looking at it.
author: Osamu Dazai, No Longer Human

quote: To dream of success is to set a goal of where you want to be; to wake up, take action, and achieve it is what true success is all about.
author: Idowu Koyenikan, Wealth for All Africans: How Every African Can Live the Life of Their Dreams

quote: One should never trust a woman who tells one her real age. A woman who would tell one that would tell one anything.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I am reading six books at once, the only way of reading; since, as you will agree, one book is only a single unaccompanied note, and to get the full sound, one needs ten others at the same time.
author: Virginia Woolf, The Letters of Virginia Woolf: Volume Three, 1923-1928

quote: There's a hunger for stories in all of us, adults too. We need stories so much that we're even willing to read bad books to get them, if the good books won't supply them.
author: Philip Pullman

quote: I reach up and pat them both on the head. "Poor things. If you had a boy that looked like Logan, you'd be kissing him every chance you had, too.
author: C.J. Redwine, Deception

quote: Lately...the Peter Principle has given way to the "Dilbert Principle." The basic concept of the Dilbert Principle is that the most ineffective workers are systematically moved to the place where they can do the least damage: management.
author: Scott Adams, The Dilbert Principle: A Cubicle's-Eye View of Bosses, Meetings, Management Fads & Other Workplace Afflictions

quote: Conscience: That which makes a boy tell his mother before his sister does.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: It is highly significant and indeed almost a rule, that moral courage has its source in such identification through one's own sensitivity with suffering of one's fellow human beings." (p. 16-17)
author: Rollo May, The Courage to Create

quote: When we are writing or painting or composing, we are, during the time of creativity, freed from normal restrictions and opened to a wider world, where colours are brighter, sounds clearer, and people more wondrously complex than we normally realize.
author: Madeleine L'Engle, Walking on Water: Reflections on Faith and Art

quote: Society is indeed a contract ... it becomes a participant not only between those who are living, those who are dead, and those who are to be born.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: I love the tranquility, serenity, generosity, and the beauty of the ocean.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: All men are by nature free; you have therefore an undoubted liberty to depart whenever you please, but will have many and great difficulties to encounter in passing the frontiers.
author: Voltaire, Candide

quote: The more natural or eco-based products you can introduce into your beauty regimen, the more beneficial it is for your skin. It's similar to introducing organic food into your daily diet.
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: Who would ever know the greater graces of comfort and perserverance, mercy and forgiveness, patience and courage, if no shadows fell over a life?
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: When we are sad...it can be comforting to cling to familiar objects, to things that don't change.
author: Donna Tartt, The Goldfinch

quote: To find your self, get lost is the search of knowledge and wisdom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Self-esteem comes from not letting unrelated external occurrences be tied to your own self-worth.
author: Sam Owen, 500 Relationships And Life Quotes: Bite-Sized Advice For Busy People

quote: Don't learn to do, but learn in doing.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: The God I believe in isn't short on cash, mister.
author: Bono

quote: The Gospel is the throne of much more grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The buddhi [intellect] is today’s gain, it is today’s experience! Whereas, akkal [insight, wisdom] is a nature’s gift!
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: An ugly jar full of water is worth more than an empty beautiful one in the desert.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: She lives the poetry she cannot write.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can bel How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is I
author: Anne Frank

quote: Everything has to be taken on trust  truth is only that which is taken to be true. It's the currency of living. There may be nothing behind it  but it doesn't make any difference so long as it is honoured.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: The stroke of death is as a lover's pinch  Which hurts and is desired.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: No country can act wisely simultaneously in every part of the globe at every moment of time.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: Hope keeps us alive. Life is interesting because of egocentric hope and love full sprit.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You cannot become something new without putting in the appropriate effort, can you? Just as a seed cannot grow into an ear of corn without the appropriate time, sunlight, water, and care.
author: Chris     Murray, The Extremely Successful Salesman's Club

quote: There is no bitterness like that of man who finds out he has been believing in a ghost.
author: Salman Rushdie, The Satanic Verses

quote: To surrender to ignorance and call it God has always been premature, and it remains premature today.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: To be a princess is to play at life. To be a queen is to be a serious player...The purpose of life as a woman is to ascend to the throne and rule with heart.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: I think it is all a matter of love: the more you love a memory, the stronger and stranger it is.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: When it comes to texting the power of you thumbs compel you
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: Some books mirror reality while others are entirely fantasy. My favorite are those that manage to weave both into a world.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: Love makes reality invisible and no one around you can understand why you do the things you do, for something that can cause you so much pain. Because you know after all the fighting, tears, and uncertainty, it's all worth it.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: All answers to life’s key questions are found within.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: We navigate many paths each day, but how many sooth our souls and nourish our senses? Be aware of where you walk because the path you take can change your very essence.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: We try to find something to fill our void. But it is only God who can fill the void.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If you fall for someone, make sure they’re there to catch you.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The future was one thing that could never be broken, because it had not yet had the chance to be anything.
author: Sarah Dessen, Saint Anything

quote: Let your requests be made known unto God.
author: Bible

quote: I will be so glad for you to hear not the sounds of gunfire but the sounds of church bells, and of people working in peace.
author: Elizabeth Berg, Dream When You're Feeling Blue

quote: Faith is the knowledge of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A story has to break your heart or it's not worth telling.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Lift up your eyes from your books, from your past, from your hurts and look upon all people with love, because when you look into another’s eyes and see innocence, you find it in yourself.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D.

quote: Many preach that do this way, do that way, have faith, speak the truth, have patience. These are all results (effects). How can results be changed?
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
author: William Shakespeare, As You Like It

quote: A poet is an artist that paints pictures by mixing thought, imagination, and emotion with words.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Why did people assume that the beautiful among them needed nothing but their beauty to bring them happiness? That behind the beauty there was nothing but an empty shell, insensitive shell?
author: Mary Balogh, A Secret Affair

quote: Home is supposed to be a place of security, the last resort of refuge.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, Disciples of Fortune

quote: Almost as a rule, political dissidents were writers.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, Serbian Satire and Aphorisms

quote: When a great many people are unable to find work, unemployment results.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: To educate a man in mind and not in morals is to educate a menace to society.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Love yourself as much you can before loving others. If you don't have something, you can't give it to anyone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Nothing gets transformed in your life until your mind is transformed.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: A shadow is hard to seize by the throat and dash to the ground.
author: Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

quote: You chose love and you lost.
author: Timothy Joshua

quote: Meditate upon yourself and you'll find bliss.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Brilliance is the masterpiece of your mind. Excellence is the masterpiece of your heart. Genius is the masterpiece of your soul.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It was as if when I looked into his eyes I was standing alone on the edge of the world...on a windswept ocean beach. There was nothing but the soft roar of the waves.
author: Anne Rice, Interview with the Vampire

quote: One way to disperse fear and create decision was to consider the worst possible outcome of one's actions.
author: Robin Hobb, The Mad Ship

quote: The amount of abhorrence that departs, that much of ‘Pure Love’ arises. When abhorrence goes away completely, then Pure Love arises in totality. This is the only way.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Hard work is what you do to make ends meet, easy work is getting others to do the hard work for you.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: I'm alone, inside the world of the story. My favorite feeling in the world.
author: Haruki Murakami, Kafka on the Shore

quote: Falling in love maybe destiny but be in love its depend on your Honesty
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: If not for me being stoned and clinging to a taco, it would have been terribly romantic.
author: Richelle Mead, Succubus on Top

quote: Contrary to the ecologists, nature does not stand still and does not maintain the kind of equilibrium that guarantees the survival of any particular species - least of all the survival of her greatest and most fragile product: man.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: All definitions are the interpretations of contrasts. What is, helps define what it is not!
author: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, Ph.D, MBA

quote: In marriage do thou be wise: prefer the person before money, virtue before beauty, the mind before the body; then thou hast a wife, a friend, a companion, a second self.
author: William Penn

quote: I don't believe in atheists. I have never seen a real one.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Yes, you're right. It's part of growing up, I suppose. You always have to leave something behind you.ü
author: Neil Gaiman, Season of Mists

quote: God‘s love for mankind; wide, long, high and deep.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Don't forget, a person's greatest emotional need is to feel appreciated.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr., Life's Little Instruction Book: 511 Suggestions, Observations, and Reminders on How to Live a Happy and Rewarding Life

quote: Excuse me, Tex," the nurse said, hands on hips. 'Would you mind reining in the voice. There are babies being born in this hospital. We wouldn't want the first sound they hear to be your painful howling. There could be lawsuits.
author: Eoin Colfer, Half-Moon Investigations

quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: In politics, what begins in fear usually ends in failure.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Set the standard! Stop expecting others to show you love, acceptance, commitment, & respect when you don't even show that to yourself.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: It is not difficult to learn a new idea, but it is almost impossible to unlearn an old one.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In many ways, it was much, much harder to get the first book contract. The hardest thing probably overall has been learning not to trust people, publicists and so forth, implicitly.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Learning how to transcend consciousness to a higher consciousness is a blissful journey and the ultimate essence of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Hard work precedes great success.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Without space, there is no time.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: The whole of what we know is a system of compensations. Each suffering is rewarded  each sacrifice is made up  every debt is paid.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Without memory, they were lost. And nobody wanted someone they loved to be lost.
author: Cassandra Clare, Welcome to Shadowhunter Academy

quote: You know what the best thing is about the end of the day? Tomorrow, it starts all over again.
author: Douglas Coupland, JPod

quote: The mosh pit will reveal all the answers. The mosh pit never lies.-Norah, Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
author: Rachel Cohn

quote: Explanation is where the mind rests.
author: David Hume

quote: Love is as abundant and powerful as sunlight. It can enlighten the whole world. Clouds of doubt can hide it temporarily, but it is always there. It can heal you as sunlight, but it can also burn you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don’t be with him, don’t want him, don’t go with him. Be with me. Want me. Stay with me.I don’t know how to be without you.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Ashes

quote: Life is better when happiness is your only purpose.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: Whether the glass is half empty or half full, you have the power to fill it up.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Making others better is a core value of a great life.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: Don't. Don't let's pretend when there's no one around.
author: Suzanne Collins, The Hunger Games

quote: Reimbursement is a major determinant of how medicine is practiced. When reimbursement changes, so do medical practice and medical education.
author: Dean Ornish

quote: Success in this world depends on knowing exactly how little effort each job is worth...distribution of energy...
author: Evelyn Waugh, Vile Bodies

quote: Political judgment is the ability to hear the distant hoofbeats of the horse of history.
author: Otto von Bismarck

quote: I remember when I was a kid, I could never find anything positive about chubby girls. If a girl was pudgy in books, she wasn't okay. She couldn't be happy or make friends unless she lost weight.
author: Ann Aguirre

quote: ...in the business of writing what one accumulates is not expertise but uncertainties. Which is but another name for craft.
author: Joseph Brodsky, Less Than One: Selected Essays

quote: No press, no television. If my mom calls and says, 'Did you hear about?' I don't want to know nothing about anything that is going on in relation to music. I shut it all off.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Invariably, we all are 'MIND LORDS'.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: The first snow is like the first love. Do you remember your first snow?
author: Lara Biyuts

quote: The goal of Dr. Martin Luther King is to give Negroes a chance to sit in a segregated restaurant beside the same white man who had brutalized them for 400 years.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Always have a willing hand to help someone, you might be the only one that does.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: Night is when the whispers of the past become the echoes of the present.
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: Dear 2016,If I has any defeats in your term, I am glad they were on my terms!Best,The Defeated Winner
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: Someone who lives meaningfully for 30 years has lived a much longer Life than one who drifted through Life for 60 years.
author: RVM

quote: A heart? Peppone knows where one is to be met with. There is always someone in the black market in need of dying early.
author: Michelle Franklin

quote: It was gratitude; gratitude, not merely for having once loved her, but for loving her still well enough to forgive all the petulance and acrimony of her manner in rejecting him, and all the unjust accusations accompanying her rejection.
author: Jane Austen

quote: I now understand that writing fiction was a seed planted in my soul, though I would not be ready to grow that seed for a long time.
author: Sue Monk Kidd, Traveling With Pomegranates: A Mother-Daughter Story

quote: Pity may represent little more than the impersonal concern which prompts the mailing of a check, but true sympathy is the personal concern which demands the giving of one's soul.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: An obedient child learns from the example of an obedient parent.
author: Jim George

quote: The ultimate purpose of education is to learn how to reveal your own unique beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Um...Mercer? Haven't seen you in nearly a month. I was expecting something like, 'Oh Cross, love of my heart, fire of my loins, how I've longed--
author: Rachel Hawkins, Spell Bound

quote: The land of wonder is full of lights.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I travel because it makes me realize how much I haven't seen, how much I'm not going to see, and how much I still need to see."- The Legacy Letters, by Carew Papritz
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift

quote: Success can be defined as how hard you continue to fight when they tell you that the battle is over.
author: Mark W. Boyer

quote: You may exist inthis world--but I exist tooand I will not yield
author: Matthew Quick, Sorta Like a Rock Star

quote: I didn't see her love,but I felt itthrough the sun,the wind,and the raindrops.
author: Timothy Joshua

quote: May you find the joy, hope and love of existence.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The exceeding brightness of this early sunMakes me conceive how dark I have become.
author: Wallace Stevens, The Palm at the End of the Mind: Selected Poems and a Play

quote: It is in the balancing of your spirituality with your humanity that you will find immeasurable happiness, success, good health, and love.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: A consciously exaggerated compliment is an offense.
author: Mark Twain, Who Is Mark Twain?

quote: When people don't understand the meaning of freedom in their lives, they will continue to live as if they're still oppressed.
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: Business is win-win, everything else shades into crime.
author: Stefan Emunds

quote: Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of very part of your life.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Destiny is manifested only through action.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: In the early morning on the lake sitting in the stern of the boat with his father rowing, he felt quite sure that he would never die.
author: Ernest Hemingway, In Our Time

quote: If you love someone, unknowingly, you become beloved.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Take too much time, and time will take you.
author: Lisa Kleypas, Love in the Afternoon

quote: Your knowledge can stir the world, your intellect can move it, your wisdom can shake it, but only your love can truly change it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Three carefully stringed words are worth more than a book of gibberish. It's not the word count but the impact of those words that counts.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: To be whole simply requires paying attention to oneself
author: Gary   Hopkins

quote: Can a woman not walk with her possessions down the street of a city?
author: Brandon Sanderson, The Way of Kings

quote: God puzzled her and she was too ashamed of Him to say so.
author: Toni Morrison, Beloved

quote: Peace is always pleasant, always kind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life is simply beautiful and too short to shed tears for something which was never yours. It was time to move on.
author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

quote: All gardening is landscape painting.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: There was no trust anywhere in the world, O my brothers, the way I could see it.
author: Anthony Burgess, A Clockwork Orange

quote: The fruit of timidity is neither gain nor loss.
author: Idries Shah, The Dermis Probe

quote: I’d heard you were dead.”"I heard you wear a red lace corset,” I said matter-of-factly. “But I don’t believe every bit of nonsense that gets rumored about.
author: Patrick Rothfuss, The Wise Man's Fear

quote: Every single time you crossed over for me and met me on my side. I realize now, I don't think I ever met you in the middle. And I don't think I ever once said that you for that.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: The law or any practice that is not for the good of the people must be changed.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: ​As the neurobiology of our species gets more and more complicated, its functional expression, which we call the mind, shall get more vivid and productive.
author: Abhijit Naskar, What is Mind?

quote: Sex is only a tool in love, not love itself.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

quote: We can't win the world with weapons or violence.We can win the world with love and practice of nonviolence.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The more energy taken, the less energy that is left for us to implement our goals and the smaller the probability of realization of our innate potential
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The music world is where child prodigies go to die.
author: Haruki Murakami, Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman

quote: All men who have turned out worth anything have had the chief hand in their own education.
author: Walter Scott

quote: The leaders have the responsibility to protect and hold in high esteem the law and virtues of the land.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: The beauty of a thought is true science fiction.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: It's your heart. No one else gets a say in that.
author: Jay Asher, What Light

quote: If everyone wants to be somebody, I want to be somebody else
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: There was no mistaking what the feeling of fullness in his heart meant. They were mates and were bound together. Forever. Wharick's green eyes closed for a moment as he absorbed the feeling of completeness their bond provided his spirit.
author: Madison Thorne Grey, Magnificence

quote: You are lovelier than all the roses in the world.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: There is power in a King's blood.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Dance with Dragons

quote: Real beauty knocks you a little bit off kilter.
author: David Byrne

quote: Maybe you're holding on too tight, and the magic comes in letting go.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: When God chooses you to deliver a message, to have a purpose, no one and nothing can reverse the course of His plan.
author: Carlos Wallace, The Other 99 T.Y.M.E.S: Train Your Mind to Enjoy Serenity

quote: The true magic of novels dwells within us individually. Each reader will interpret every single character, scene, and metaphor in a slightly different way
author: Carl Henegan, Darkness Left Undone

quote: Truth is always exciting. Speak it  then  life is dull without it.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: You have to open up to the world and learn optimism...Contentment with the past, happiness with the present, and hope for the future. Learned optimisim.
author: Jennifer Crusie, Agnes and the Hitman

quote: there is a difference betweenloneliness and solitude,one will empty you andone will fill you.you have the power to choose.
author: AVA., you are safe here.

quote: The more excited I get, the more I vibrate.""Now there's a thought," Lor says."If you mean what I think you mean, you want to shut the fuck up and never think it again," Ryodan says.
author: Karen Marie Moning, Iced

quote: Every single person is sacred. Sacred means special, precious, a treasure of true beauty. That means you.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: We need to apply the rules of 10,000 hours in order to achieve the level of a skill commensurate with the status of a world-class expert
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If we do not love one another  we certainly shall not have much power with God in prayer.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: If you assume that it is there, you will generally not be far off the truth.
author: Idries Shah, The Commanding Self

quote: It's lonely to say goodbye. Very lonely. Partings are the beginnings of new meetings. Beginnings happen because there are endings…Meetings. Beginnings. It's not too late…to believe in them after the fact.
author: Natsuki Takaya, Fruits Basket, Vol. 22

quote: For things to be right on the outside, they first have to be right on the inside.
author: Bohdi Sanders, Modern Bushido: Living a Life of Excellence

quote: Lord, thank you for the courage to live life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Join my dreams, I will bring you a trip to paradise.
author: Tanmaya Guru

quote: Just know that if you move forward with honesty, faith and love, everything will be alright.
author: Brownell Landrum, A Chorus of Voices: DUET stories Volume III - Adult Version

quote: To fill the hour  and leave no crevice ... that is happiness.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If i start hate her, just because of this that she betrayed me ,Then i will betray to my Love.
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: The first place where self-esteem begins its journey is within us.
author: Stephen Richards, Boost Your Self Esteem

quote: If you say you are truly in love with me, you must see the light in my darkness, embrace my iniquity, and follow me to hell.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson, Classic Quotations From The Otherworlds

quote: The biggest problem of the world is not lack of education but brainwashing of innocent children by the religion institutes in the name of education. Brainwashing of innocent children no less a violence.
author: Amit Ray, Nonviolence: The Transforming Power

quote: The path leading to stability is always opened to the sons of God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: It doesn’t matter how bitter or better the past has been, what we can do with the bitter or better past today is what matters.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Religion, Philosophy and life

quote: Some experiences are universal. A girl is a girl whether she lives in West Omaha or Sweet Valley. Books are often far more than books.
author: Roxane Gay, Bad Feminist

quote: The knowledge of God is a sacred pursuit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A conscientious man would be cautious how he dealt in blood.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: I didn't know that there was a thin line between ignorance and arrogance.
author: Faraaz Kazi, Truly, Madly, Deeply

quote: We are blessed with a finite life, but our imaginations are infinite.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I don’t believe in prayer, but I do believe in magic, and I want to believe in miracles.
author: Laini Taylor, Night of Cake & Puppets

quote: An attractive woman becomes beautiful when she's happy and in love.
author: Chloe Thurlow, Katie in Love

quote: I'm just another stupid human.
author: Markus Zusak, I Am the Messenger

quote: The most difficult experience one might ever have, is to grieve the loss of a Loved-one who is still alive.
author: Raymond D. Longoria Jr.

quote: Enthusiasm is the energy and force that builds literal momentum of the human soul and mind.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Modern society, the political body, the legal and judiciary system, the state of governance, capitalism and the very fabric of the society itself, including our religions and so-called morals and values, are institutions steeped in traditions of absolute and total violence.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: There is nothing betterthan us,making memories of us.
author: Timothy Joshua

quote: Explore the endless possibilities in life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The art of living is to rise above lesser things so that we can truly enjoy great things. And the message of Christmas is the greatest of all things.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, An Intimate Collision: Encounters with Life and Jesus

quote: A wife's loyalty is tested when her husband has nothing. A husband's loyalty is tested when he has everything.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: There is no greater intelligence than kindness and empathy.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: Live and let live is not enough  live and help live is not too much.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Ah, Harry, how often this happens, even between the best of friends! Each of us believes that what he has to say is much more important than anything the other might have to contribute!
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: If we elect the same corrupt politicians every time, that's a very clear message that we don't want a change.
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: If your political theory requires humanity to "evolve", then you do not have a theory.
author: A.E. Samaan

quote: Old soul. Poet's heart. Warriors mind.
author: Melody  Lee

quote: As always we could talk... over and over... here I am locked in time, so far I have plenty of it.
author: Deyth Banger, The Life Of One Kid

quote: feeling shy is simply replacing courage with the feeling and fear of how others will perceive or what they will say about us after and act. Courage dares regardless
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Distinctive Footprints of Life: Where Are You Heading Towards?

quote: We are sustained by spiritual fire.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Firmness of purpose is one of the most necessary sinews of character and one of the best instruments of success. Without it  genius wastes its efforts in a maze of inconsistencies.
author: Lord Chesterfield

quote: Sons branch out  but one woman leads to another.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: Time owed an alliance to the undying.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, We Shadows

quote: Find as much information about your subject as you can
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Sitting in the brightly lit library, surrounded by books, in total silence, that was ma personal zenith.
author: Irvine Welsh, Skagboys

quote: I missed the crowds in those big stadiums, the flashbulbs, the roaring cheers - the majesty of the whole thing. I missed it bitterly. So did my father. We shared a thirst to return; unspoken, undeniable.
author: Mitch Albom, For One More Day

quote: Love people who hate you. Pray for people who have wronged you. It won’t just change their life…it’ll change yours.
author: Mandy Hale, The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: If you think about it, an unfair society that makes it possible for you to exploit your abilities to the limit.
author: Haruki Murakami, Norwegian Wood

quote: Love seems the swiftest, but it is the slowest of all growths. No man or woman really knows what perfect love is until they have been married a quarter of a century.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Simple misunderstanding… and couple forget the lovely moments they spent before marriage and during honeymoon.
author: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

quote: I have a very strong sense that we only know where we are by looking clearly at where we've come from.
author: Sara Sheridan

quote: To be evenminded is the greatest virtue.Wisdom is to speakthe truth and actin keeping with its nature.
author: Heraclitus, Fragments

quote: World & people only seem unlovable due to toxins & lies they've been fed. Release distortions of mind. Return all to innocence & freedom
author: Jay Woodman

quote: I'm aware of the mystery around us, so I write about coincidences, premonitions, emotions, dreams, the power of nature, magic.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: You are not in the kingdom by accident
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: A woman is a blissful mother, a wonderful sister, a gorgeous daughter, and a friend with a kind heart who really cares. Wishing you a wonderful International Women’s Day
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: She breathed in the crisp autumn air, hoping the loveliness of nature would somehow cleanse her soul and overshadow her sorrow.
author: J.E.B. Spredemann, Amish by Accident

quote: Pretend to be mad and talk a lot. Then — and this is the important bit — do nothing at all until you absolutely have to and then make sure everyone dies.
author: Jasper Fforde, Something Rotten

quote: My life is black and white and mixed. My mother's a Rastafarian, my dad was a short white guy - it's not an affectation. It's also the lives of millions of people throughout the world.
author: Zadie Smith

quote: Earth changes  but thy soul and God stand sure.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Remember that things are not always as they appear to be… Curiosity creates possibilities and opportunities.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The current relationship between companies and the workforce is like marrying into a dysfunctional family. Only you don't get to escape when the holiday meal is over.
author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

quote: Unconditionally love people for what they are not what they should be.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When I look back, I realize I was praying for something God had already given me.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Commitment is the foundation of focus.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: We are just two people. Not that much separates us. Not nearly as much as I'd thought.
author: Kathryn Stockett, The Help

quote: A man who do not understand the reality of divine love is he that don’t know God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I always looked for someone who can appreciate my feelings, to understand me and above all feel very happy to have my love, it took me years to find you but today I feel happier than ever.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: I often wonder if I am entitled to be as happy as I am, given the amount of suffering in the world.
author: Dennis Prager, Happiness Is a Serious Problem: A Human Nature Repair Manual

quote: There lies before us, if we choose, continual progress in happiness, knowledge and wisdom. Shall we instead choose death, because we cannot forget our quarrels? I appeal as a human being to human beings; remember your humanity, and forget the rest.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: There are no perfect human beings and even those who we pray such as Allah, Buddha, Jesus, Krishna among others, were not perfect.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.
author: James Allen

quote: Patience is a garment which has never worn out.
author: Idries Shah, The Dermis Probe

quote: To end the greatest work designed,A thousand hands need but one mind.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Faust, Part Two

quote: Pray for the peace of the world.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you seek success, serve others. If you seek immortality give. Serve or give your time, skills, talent or gift. In the end, what you leave behind are trails of the lives you changed and the hearts you touched.
author: Val Uchendu

quote: The act of acting morally is behaving as if everything we do matters.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: May you find a sacred strength to fulfill our dreams in the coming year.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You overcome a problem, not by solving it, but by becoming bigger than the problem.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When a poet digs himself into a hole, he doesn't climb out. He digs deeper, enjoys the scenery, and comes out the other side enlightened.
author: Criss Jami, Venus in Arms

quote: Time Can Not Cure Heart's Wounds Never,But Wounds Spoil and Kill Heart On The Time
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: That’s what happens to friends, eventually. They leave you. It’s practically what they’re for.
author: Catherynne M. Valente, The Girl Who Circumnavigated Fairyland in a Ship of Her Own Making

quote: Every atom of your flesh is as dear to me as my own: in pain and sickness it would still be dear.
author: Charlotte Brontë, Jane Eyre

quote: Life is uncertain.Lord grant us gracious courage to face the uncertainty of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Where love is the light, love is the way. Happiness is there; sadness flies away.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I don’t wish for more time. I wish for more courage to live freely right now.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: ...freshly cut Christmas trees smelling of stars and snow and pine resin - inhale deeply and fill your soul with wintry night...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: Don’t trivialize the fact that your life is diminishing.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: To be spiritual is not to be spiritual.August 11, 2016Petra Cecilia Maria HermansReligious Leader
author: Petra Hermans, Voor een betere wereld

quote: Love can be such a mysterious muse and seductress... spinning her magical web of stardust and emotional euphoria. True love sang her siren song and we wrapped that song around us like the sweetest melody.
author: Jaeda DeWalt

quote: Whenever you hurt someone, you bring torment into your own life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everyone gets broken. Everyone. Some grow stronger in those breaks. Others never recover.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: Do you know, sire, I think that if we live to tell our grandchildren about this war, they will accuse us of making it up.' -Marielle
author: Tamora Pierce, The Realms of the Gods

quote: how anxiously I yearned for those I had forsaken.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, The Dream of a Ridiculous Man

quote: I have seen the light and it is green
author: Steven Magee

quote: A student will find that he is more affected by one book which he has truly mastered than by 20 books which he has merely skimmed.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Lectures to My Students

quote: ...,dying seems like the greatest weakness, and in a world where people say you're lazy for not shaving your legs, then being dead seems like the ultimate character flaw. Chapter I.
author: Chuck Palahniuk, Damned

quote: The more you enhance your ability to meditate, the better you will be able to make better decisions and create better harmony either within yourself, at home or at work.
author: Vishwas Chavan

quote: There is nothing more secure in a relationship than a sense of insecurity.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: Every good marriage must be a friendship between two people who are willing to sacrifice for the other person.
author: Jim George, A Husband After God's Own Heart

quote: There is a lot to do in life than to get bored with.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: If it rains during sunshine, don't worry; you'll see your rainbow.
author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

quote: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
author: May Sarton

quote: The universe was playing with loaded dice, which insured an excess of cowards in our ranks.
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates, Between the World and Me

quote: Better hazard once than always be in fear.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: The shadowy edge between normal and paranormal is more than ILLUSORY...
author: Sahara Sanders, A Dream of Two Moons  Novel

quote: Whatever beliefs and definitions you hold will seem to be true.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer, Essence of Reality: A Clear Awareness of How Life Works

quote: Molly was arrested. Possession.” I blinked at him. “She was possessed?
author: Jim Butcher, Proven Guilty

quote: When we apply the lessons we've struggled for our whole lives to learn to the lives of people we love, our love becomes judgment—which is toxic. Our fear our daughters will fail leads us to fail them.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir

quote: If you see success as a race, then you will start eagerly with enthusiasm and passion with the hope of finishing quickly but there is much more to your success journey than your duration and speed.
author: Mensah Oteh, Unlocking Life's Treasure Chest: Wisdom keys to keep you inspired, encouraged, motivated and focused

quote: The world loves to be amused by hollow professions, to be deceived by flattering appearances, to live in a state of hallucination; and can forgive everything but the plain, downright, simple, honest truth.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Everything is for the best in this best of all possible worlds.
author: Voltaire

quote: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks, And all the sweet serenity of books.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Sometimes, it seemed, the business of a Witch or a Godmother was not so much using magic as knowing when not to use it.
author: Mercedes Lackey, The Fairy Godmother

quote: People will ask you the question 'how is life treating you?' But my question is 'how are you treating life?' On that your happiness rests
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: He was rebuilt, reconstituted by vengeance dressed up as high purpose.
author: Ron Suskind, The Way of the World: A Story of Truth and Hope in an Age of Extremism

quote: In order to have success it is necessary to know certain principles and rules
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Learn to Open Your Heart and mind to the infinite wonder that exists for you in life
author: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

quote: The truth is cruel  but it can be loved and it makes free those who have loved it.
author: George Santayana

quote: Actually oddly enough, I think my work, the activism, will be forgotten. And I hope it will. Because I hope those problems will have gone away.
author: Bono

quote: Be knowledgeable but humble. Be wise and simple.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You will never be a leader in any area of your life if you are not a reader in those areas of life.
author: Jim George, A Husband After God's Own Heart

quote: Smile at strangers and you just might change a life.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: I don’t know how – it is a question of process
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Life is a game. Either you win or lose. Never allow the fear of losing prevent you from entering the game.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Faith is only a word if there is no love at its center, so flaccid and lifeless, vague and hollow - not anything you could truly feel.
author: Elif Shafak, The Forty Rules of Love

quote: The stupidest man I ever met had a favourite saying. It was: 'What do you think I am, stupid, or something?
author: Idries Shah, Reflections

quote: Father always said that money doesn’t grow on trees. Well, time doesn’t grow on trees either.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: A dream is sacred essence of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The welfare of the people in particular has always been the alibi of tyrants, and it provides the further advantage of giving the servants of tyranny a good conscience.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The courage of the poet is to keep ajar the door that leads into madness.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: There is a scientific explanation behind everything. Finding it depends on whether you give in to the much simpler supernatural explanation.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: There must be something in books, things we can't imagine.
author: Ray Bradbury, Fahrenheit 451

quote: My life has far exceeded my expectations not because of my own personal efforts or mindset but because of my friends who have enriched my existence
author: John Paul Warren

quote: Do you know why we’re all happy here, monsieur? Because it’s the last house on the road.
author: Louise Penny, A Rule Against Murder

quote: In music the passions enjoy themselves.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Beyond Good and Evil

quote: LifeParticles are the particles of Nothingness that have attributes of being and nonbeing, and the particles of energy and consciousness, which are the essence of Life.
author: Ilchi Lee, Change: Realizing Your Greatest Potential

quote: Essentially prayer and meditation are one and the same thing.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Love, God & Neurons: Memoir of a Scientist Who Found Himself by Getting Lost

quote: The only way to behave to a woman is to make love to her if she is pretty, and to someone else if she is plain.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Importance of Being Earnest

quote: Fear kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Faith is one of the forces by which men live  the total absence of it means collapse.
author: William James

quote: An eagle can catch a fish in the ocean of impossibility because he pursues and focuses on only one fish.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The smooth folds of her dress concealed a tumultuous heart, and her modest lips told nothing of her torment. She was in love.
author: Gustave Flaubert, Madame Bovary

quote: I am sorry to say that there is too much point to the wisecrack that life is extinct on other planets because their scientists were more advanced than ours.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Those moral laws on which all human excellence is founded—a love of truth in ourselves, and a sincere sympathy with our fellow-creatures.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley, Lodore

quote: It wasn’t worth it, but at the time it was. And that’s all that mattered.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: Lust of power is the most flagrant of all the passions.
author: Tacitus

quote: If you go to war with your mind, you will always be at war.
author: T. Scott McLeod, All That Is Unspoken

quote: People are never going to act exactly like we want them to. So if we stop expecting things from others, we’ll find peace in our hearts that will last a lifetime.
author: Ron Baratono, The Writings of Ron Baratono

quote: ..my father was the best man in the world and probably worth a hundred of me, but he didn't understand me. The town he lived in and the town I lived in were not the same.
author: Bob Dylan, Chronicles, Vol. 1

quote: If you can't feel anything, it doesn't mean it's not hurting.
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: A string of excited, fugitive, miscellaneous pleasures is not happiness; happiness resides in imaginative reflection and judgment, when the picture of one’s life, or of human life, as it truly has been or is, satisfies the will, and is gladly accepted.
author: George Santayana

quote: Lord keep us from all evil so that our lives will be free of pain.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The reflection of chaos is creativity.
author: Lionel Suggs

quote: Perhaps the mission of an artist is to interpret beauty to people - the beauty within themselves.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Life has sadness, joy, beauty, like poetry.So be passionate and write a great story.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Trust is the foundation of any society
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Did you ever see that painting the Mona Lisa. It always reminds me of a reporter listening to a politician.
author: Robert Orben

quote: i sometimes think i'm too in love with alone. who could i love more than this peace?
author: Ava, You Are Safe Here.

quote: Dying is an art.Like everything else,I do it exceptionally well.I do it so it feels like hell.I do it so it feels real.I guess you could say I have a call.
author: Sylvia Plath, Ariel

quote: Brave is the thief who carries a lamp in his hand.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: Money cannot buy you "HEALTH.
author: Henry Johnson Jr

quote: Creativity is a gift. It doesn't come through if the air is cluttered.
author: John Lennon

quote: Everything you love also loves you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Her eyes were clear; she hadn't been crying. She was a cop's wife first, a woman second; she wouldn't give in to tears as long as Wyatt was fighting for his life because she was fighting with him in spirit.
author: Dean Koontz, Odd Thomas

quote: You were at the age where you could fall in love with a girl over an expression, over a gesture. That's what happened with your girlfriend, Paloma- she stooped to pick up her purse and your heart flew out of you.
author: Junot Díaz

quote: The greatest force is the divine power within you.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: But have a care! It is a bitter blade, and steel serves only those that can wield it. It will cut your hand as willingly as aught else.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Your ability to learn from the experiences of other successful people is one of your most important habits that will give you the best chance of success.
author: Mensah Oteh, Unlocking Life's Treasure Chest: Wisdom keys to keep you inspired, encouraged, motivated and focused

quote: Every great architect is - necessarily - a great poet. He must be a great original interpreter of his time, his day, his age.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Chance is your godThough you're falling free you will land hard
author: Criss Jami, Salomé: In Every Inch In Every Mile

quote: By the creative act, however, we are able to reach beyond our own death. This is why creativity is so important and why we need to confront the problem of the relationship between creativity and death.
author: Rollo May, The Courage to Create

quote: I want it said of me by those who knew me best, that I always plucked a thistle and planted a flower where I thought a flower would grow.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I heard a definition once: Happiness is health and a short memory! I wish I'd invented it, because it is very true.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: But there are times," said Charlotte, "when it is necessary and an act of friendship to write nothing rather than not to write.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Elective Affinities

quote: The most brutal avenger on earth is a reality you ignored, however minor.
author: Raheel Farooq

quote: You get all these friends when just when you don't need friends anymore.
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: I fall in love with any girl who smells of library paste.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: If you say ‘we’re in this together,’ I’m going to hurl.
author: Kelley Armstrong

quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour, Economic Warfare: Secrets of Wealth Creation in the Age of Welfare Politics

quote: Life sucks, and then you die.Yeah, I should be so lucky.
author: Stephenie Meyer, Breaking Dawn

quote: Honest is how I want to look. The truth doesn't glitter and shine.
author: Chuck Palahniuk, Survivor

quote: Thus, an inhibition center developed below what in humans is the temporal lobe, to turn off much of the functioning of the reptilian brain; and an activation center evolved in the pons to turn on the R-complex, but harmlessly, during sleep.
author: Carl Sagan, Dragons of Eden: Speculations on the Evolution of Human Intelligence

quote: Gold conjures up a mist about a man, more destructive of all his old senses and lulling to his feelings than the fumes of charcoal.
author: Charles Dickens, Nicholas Nickleby

quote: People that don't know what they are worth will always see their capture's wings, but never their tail.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Fiction is an urgent business. It is the Dying Us telling stories to the Dying Us, trying to crack the nonsense in our heads open with a big hammer pronto, before Death arrives.
author: George Saunders

quote: I like the sound of words, but I don't ever really expect my slow, slanted impression of the world to change by what I read.
author: Gregory Maguire, Wicked: The Life and Times of the Wicked Witch of the West

quote: I want you to crave the crisp ocean breezeas much as I do.I want your soul to beas rain-swept as mine.
author: Sanober  Khan

quote: Isn't it ironic that a nightmare can masquerade as a dream?
author: Ken Poirot

quote: Whatever you do, stay in love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It is a long road from conception to completion.
author: Moliere

quote: The opinions of souls are their state of being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Women rescue men just as much as, if not more than, men rescue women.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: The laws of physics say if there’s a party, Isla will eventually end up dancing on a table.
author: Corey Ann Haydu, The Careful Undressing of Love

quote: The true champion of justice, if he intends to survive even for a short time, must necessarily confine himself to private life and leave politics alone.
author: Socrates, Apology

quote: Failure is nature's plan to prepare you for great responsibilities.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: In relationships, when there is suffering there cannot be true love: true Love is Unconditional. Either Love is joy and happiness, or it is not Unconditional Love.
author: Human Angels, We are human angels

quote: The love of God is the nature of the kingdom
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I wonder if you know thy soul?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita
