quote: If you wrote something for which someone sent you a cheque, if you cashed the cheque and it didn't bounce, and if you then paid the light bill with the money, I consider you talented.
author: Stephen King

quote: Between giant spiders and meeting Edmund Ellis did I have a chance, Ms Rainn?
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Imagination

quote: My tendency to make up stories and lie compulsively for the sake of my own amusement takes up a good portion of my day and provides me with a peace of mind not easily attainable in this economic climate.
author: Chelsea Handler, Chelsea Chelsea Bang Bang

quote: Evil does not exist; once you have crossed the threshold, all is good. Once in another world, you must hold your tongue.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: He that will not apply new remedies must expect new evils for time is the greatest innovator.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Think of your day as a blank canvas, and everything you say, your art upon it. Then join your loved ones and friends, and create lasting beauty together, worthy of your inner Rembrandt.
author: Tom Althouse

quote: Every day and every night, I dance with Jesus Christ, Prophet Mohammad & all personal Gods: Krishna, Shiva & Buddha. You are welcome too !
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Few men realize that their life, the very essence of their character, their capabilities and their audacities, are only the expression of their belief in the safety of their surroundings.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: When we stop judging others and ourselves, our heart begins to open.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten, The Silent Whisperings of the Heart - An Introduction to Giten's Approach to Life

quote: A lot of guys have muscles. A lot of strong men in this world. I think it's important to show that even under all this strength there's a fragile side, a side that can be affected.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: ....And above all, it is your civilization, it is you. However much you hate it or laugh at it, you will never be happy away from it for any length of time
author: George Orwell

quote: Like life, love is a constant adventure and a constant process. It is not a possession.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The art of peaceful living comes down to living compassionately & wisely.
author: Allan Lokos, Patience: The Art of Peaceful Living

quote: We were enjoying one of those rare summers of utter freedom – no financial responsibility, no debts, no time owing to anybody.
author: Jojo Moyes, Me Before You

quote: It has always been my private conviction that any man who puts his intelligence up against a fish and loses had it coming.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Every creation comes from the Creator.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Education  n: that which discloses to the wise and disguises from the foolish their lack of understanding.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: In your hands winteris a book with cloud pagesthat snow pearls of love.
author: Aberjhani, Journey through the Power of the Rainbow: Quotations from a Life Made Out of Poetry

quote: No woman marries for money; they are all clever enough, before marrying a millionaire, to fall in love with him first.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
author: George Santayana

quote: Looking through the ruby glass one cannot see the true colour of the sky.
author: Lara Biyuts, La Arme Blanche

quote: I have found that reading is much better than a good sleep.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I am on the side of the unregenerate who affirm the worth of life as an end in itself  as against the saints who deny it.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: Spiritual Laws ensures that every entity will be at the exact place where it has earned the right to be, by all its previous thoughts, words and actions, including those of the previous lives.
author: Thomas Vazhakunnathu, God Does Not Play Dice

quote: Peace of mind arrives the moment you come to peace with the contents of your mind.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: This’ is not called a religion, ‘This’ is called a science (vignan). Religion keeps changing, science does not change.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Don't be afraid to show your soul, we need plenty of soul to show in this world.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: I wish I could line up naked the men I've slept with and just gloat for a hot minute. Beautiful creatures.
author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading 2

quote: If you keep an active life, you stay young.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Do not wait until the near end of your life to realize that you have not fully lived to love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: We don’t forget, but something vacant settles in us.
author: Roland Barthes, Mourning Diary

quote: Because it's so difficult to fight what you cannot control and right now I can't even control my own imagination as it grips my hair and drags me into the dark.
author: Tahereh Mafi, Unravel Me

quote: Does trust have to be earned. Or is it simply a matter of faith?
author: Nicholas Sparks, At First Sight

quote: I travel to be replenished with beauty, for travel makes the beauty of this world seem like a Christmas that never ends.
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift

quote: Beware of advice about successful people and their methods. For starters, no two situations are alike. Your dreams of creating a dry-cleaning empire won't be helped by knowing that Thomas Edison liked to take naps.
author: Scott Adams

quote: It was a strange feeling, like touching a void.
author: Haruki Murakami, Kafka on the Shore

quote: Death and life were just adjacent verandas.
author: Salman Rushdie, In the South

quote: Donata Santori looked down at the dead body lying at her feet and thought, ‘Damn, that can’t be a good sign.
author: Deborah Blake, Veiled Menace

quote: Even in war there should be lines you didn't cross.
author: Suzanne Collins, Gregor and the Code of Claw

quote: Priesthood lessons are regularly devoted to topics of family leadership, and quorum leaders everywhere are feeling more and more their responsibility to teach and train their quorum members to be better husbands and fathers.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: words...To lure the tribal shoals to epigram / And order.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Write the story. Don't write sentences.
author: James Patterson

quote: One of life’s mysteries is why two children growing up in the same home sometimes take radically different paths—one following Christ, the other rebellious and scornful. Yet it happens.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Progress is impossible without change  and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: While pensive poets painful vigils keep,Sleepless themselves, to give their readers sleep.
author: Alexander Pope, The Dunciad

quote: When mother-cow is chewing grass its young ones watch its mouth
author: Chinua Achebe, Things Fall Apart

quote: whoever approaches his goal dances
author: Cormac McCarthy, Blood Meridian, or the Evening Redness in the West

quote: A breach in trust brings mistrust, followed by a multitude of troubles.
author: Pawan Mishra, Coinman: An Untold Conspiracy

quote: How incessant and great are the ills with which a prolonged old age is replete.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Thank God she doesn't have to be confirmed by the Senate.(on the birth of his granddaughter)
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: And now about the cauldron singLike elves and fairies in a ring,Enchanting all that you put in.
author: William Shakespeare, Macbeth

quote: In any sane society, a farmer is a billion times more important than an economist.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Well-intentioned but ill-informed actions usually compromise quality.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: Love bravely, live bravely, be courageous, there's really nothing to lose. There's no wrong you can't make right again, so be kinder to yourself, you know, have fun, take chances. There's no bounds.
author: Jewel

quote: The moment to make your dreams come true is day before tomorrow, same time, called NOW.
author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

quote: Creativity flourishes where there is freedom.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Not a clue – and, no, I don’t touch drugs. The world’s unstable enough without scrambling your brain for kicks.
author: David Mitchell, The Bone Clocks

quote: Every house is built by a man. But Maker is the Builder of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: fire is beautifuland we know that if we gettoo close it will kill usbut what does that matterit is better to be happy for a momentand be burned up with beautythan to live a long timeand be bored all the while
author: Don Marquis

quote: To be wealthy and honored in an unjust society is a disgrace.
author: Confucius, The Analects

quote: Never trust the captain who has never taken any education from the School of Storms!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Lust is the source of all our actions, and humanity.
author: Blaise Pascal, Pensées

quote: One dead and one alone. That's how the story ends.
author: Karen Quan, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: There is nothing wrong with dreaming, but there is everything wrong with dreaming without any intention to make the dream a reality.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: He'd seen when she began to panic, but he hadn't offered comfort like other Doms or changed his plans. He'd just waited her out. She could hate him a little for that.
author: Cherise Sinclair, Breaking Free

quote: It is the character of the road you travel gives you wisdom not the length of the road!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Convictions in our ideas is dangerous not only because it leaves us vulnerable to false positives, but also because it stops us from generating the requisite variety to reach our creative potential.
author: Adam Grant, Originals

quote: With strength you can move rocks.With faith you can move mountains.With love you can move the world.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: We were all forged in the crucible.
author: Gayle Forman, Where She Went

quote: I will make thee think thy swan a crow.
author: William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

quote: Give yourself something to work toward -- constantly.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: For all the way he loved her. Every song had her memory, every rain had her smell, and every girl had her face.
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: The goal was never dependent on the route that took me there. It was always dependent on the heart that got me through whatever route opened itself up to my efforts.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing

quote: This tottered ensign of my ancestorsWhich swept the desert shore of that dead seaWhereof we got the name of Mortimer,Will I advance upon these castle-walls.Drums, strike alarum, raise them from their sport,And sing aloud the knell of Gaveston!
author: Christopher Marlowe, Edward II

quote: With a book he was regardless of time.
author: Jane Austen

quote: I'm fat because I'm greedy, and if my mind is fat it's because I'm curious.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: Those who are preparing for the coming of Christ should be sober, and watch unto prayer, for our adversary, the Devil, goeth about like a roaring lion, seeking whom he may devour; whom we are to resist steadfast in the faith.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: Live a life never having any regrets.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: God does not ask your ability  or your inability. He asks only your availability.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: I learned not to fear infinity,The far field, the windy cliffs of forever,The dying of time in the white light of tomorrow,The wheel turning away from itself,The sprawl of the wave,The on-coming water.
author: Theodore Roethke

quote: When you surround yourself with dramatic people, your life will be driven by drama instead of destiny.
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: You don’t achieve success, you attract success.
author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

quote: In every situation, there is a sacred answer.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: When there is silence, Give your voice. When there is darkness, Shine your light. When there is desperation, Offer hope.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: The word 'Islam' means 'peace.' The word 'Muslim' means 'one who surrenders to God.' But the press makes us seem like haters.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: To enjoy a beautiful life, always believe in your heart that life is wonderful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: One thing I am sure of is that when a long-standing desire gets fulfilled, it is certainly a moment of happiness but it may not lead us to eternal happiness, which lies in our heart, mind and thoughts.
author: Balroop Singh

quote: No. I cannot let him control me.You are mine, Adelina, Enzo growls. Turn your powers against your own fleet.
author: Marie Lu, The Midnight Star

quote: Hold on to thy sacred dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Relationships with your enemies; you need to cultivate those, because: "Only true enemies stab you in the front.
author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quote: Winning and losing was suddenly elevated to be about things that had no score and no teams and no uniforms; just one player at a time dealing with his life, his own struggle, his own triumph and torment.
author: Dan Groat, A Punctual Paymaster

quote: After all the world is indeed beautiful and if we were any other creature than man we might be continuously happy in it.
author: Sebastian Barry, The Secret Scripture

quote: The mastery of nature is vainly believed to be an adequate substitute for self mastery.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Exercising the Body is great, But exercising the Mind is the GREATEST.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: To live out God’s plan for your life calls for you to discipline yourself…and your body. To push yourself. To deny yourself.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: The more stupid one is, the closer one is to reality. The more stupid one is, the clearer one is. Stupidity is brief and artless, while intelligence squirms and hides itself. Intelligence is unprincipled, but stupidity is honest and straightforward.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, The Brothers Karamazov

quote: I didn't have to say a word. My love for him appeared upon my flesh like virgin tattooed skin.
author: Alfa H, Abandoned Breaths

quote: Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Real friends, are really hard to come by.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Don't follow a defeated foe. Follow Christ. It is costly. You will be an exile in this age. But you will be free.
author: John Piper, The Passion of Jesus Christ

quote: A man should never miss an opportunity to keep his mouth shut.
author: David Eddings, The Treasured One

quote: As photographs give people an imaginary possession of a past that is unreal, they also help people to take possession of space in which they are insecure.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: Now he was nothing to her, just a lesson in time, a wicked boy-man, incapable of wealth or prestige.
author: Coco J. Ginger

quote: (...) and spend my days surrounded by wise books, - bright windows in this life of ours, lit by the shining souls of men.
author: H.G. Wells

quote: Fame you'll be famous, as famous as can be, with everyone watching you win on TV, Except when they don't because sometimes they won't..
author: Dr. Seuss, Oh, The Places You'll Go!

quote: Those who write the editorials and those who write the columns, they simply are unaccountable. They're free to impose their cultural politics in the name of freedom of the press.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: In Republics, the great danger is, that the majority may not sufficiently respect the rights of the minority.
author: James Madison

quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life … all areas of life.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The sacredness of solitude is spiritualty
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Own your happiness and let people understand that they have to own theirs. If you make it your job to make people happy, you have made it your job to keep people happy.
author: Saji Ijiyemi

quote: Grace is the gateway to heaven.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It's shocking the things we call love.
author: Deb Caletti, The Secret Life of Prince Charming

quote: Phaedra looked across the water and her eyes met Lucian’s. Their needs came second. It came from the privilege of being tr
author: Melina Marchetta, Quintana of Charyn

quote: It's like people care more about their pride than about what's correct, about the truth.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: The power of classical music turns my words into fire.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: We go to the past to lay the blame - since the past can't argue. We go to our past selves to account for our present miseries.
author: Glen Duncan, Love Remains

quote: Vision unknown is self-abuse. Vision known is self-abuse discovery. But vision applied is self-liberation. Application is the key
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

quote: History is written by the winners.
author: Napoléon Bonaparte

quote: Just enjoy the music of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Daily communication with God must be desired and pursued above all other things.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You do not need any more strength. You only need to realize how strong you already are.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: Who you allow into your life, mind and heart are among the most important decisions you will ever make.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Honesty is the key to Happiness. Be always truthful to yourself, to your feelings, emotions, needs and desires & to others, no matter what!
author: Lily Amis

quote: It may help to understand human affairs to be clear that most of the great triumphs and tragedies of history are caused, not by people being fundamentally good or fundamentally bad, but by people being fundamentally people.
author: Neil Gaiman, Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch

quote: An economic system which can only expand or expire must be false to all that is human.
author: Edward Abbey, Desert Solitaire

quote: You know that saying about how you don’t know what you have until it’s gone? I already did know what I had, and now that she’s gone, I know even more.
author: A.S. King, Ask the Passengers

quote: You'll always get out of life what you put in-and you control what youput in.
author: Brian Tracy, Maximum Achievement: Strategies and Skills that Will Unlock Your Hidden Powers to Succeed

quote: The pleasures arising from thinking and learning will make us think and learn all the more. 1153a 23
author: Aristotle, The Nicomachean Ethics

quote: Sometime I wish if I were from Mars, because no one loves me here.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: You know the look: genius gone to pot, and ready to join the Communist Party
author: William Saroyan

quote: I feared my own kind more than anything the natural world could ever threaten me with.
author: Robin Hobb, Assassin's Quest

quote: Time makes friendship stronger, but love weaker.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Truth does not need publicity, lies do.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

quote: Love is the miracle of life.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Whoever you are, or whatever it is that you do, when you really want something, it's because that desire originated in the soul of the universe. It's your mission on earth.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: Throughout history, story telling was at the very beginning of life.
author: Anthony Horowitz

quote: We tell the dead to rest in peace, when we should worry about the living to live in peace.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: The point is, it didn’t really matter what the book was about. It was what it meant that was important.
author: Markus Zusak, The Book Thief

quote: I understand the sacred words of the sacred souls.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: For all its accolades and celebrated recognition as sound guidance, I have personally noticed that sometimes, 'follow your heart,' is really bad advice.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Inherent within your soul is a greater light, recognize and radiate it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Only cowards cave. The brave get assassinated.
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: The fear of God is a fierce faith.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Write and your experiences with others. Never underestimate your writings. It can bring hope and inspiration to many people.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: That's science fiction shit," "It's only fiction until science catches up.
author: J.D. Robb

quote: And at the end of your days, you can thank creativity for having blessed you with a charmed, interesting, passionate existence.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Big Magic: Creative Living Beyond Fear

quote: Always be kind. Every one needs it. Practice forgiveness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: At the end, someone or something always gives up. It is either you give up and quit or the obstacle or failure gives up and makes way for your success to come through.
author: Idowu Koyenikan, Wealth for All Africans: How Every African Can Live the Life of Their Dreams

quote: Theology sits rouged at the window and courts philosophy's favor, offering to sell her charms to it.
author: Søren Kierkegaard, Fear and Trembling

quote: All progress is based upon a universal  innate desire on the part of every living organism to live beyond its income.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: See and live life for the wonderful gift that it is ...acknowledging everyone's beauty, flaws, frailty, strength, gifts and possibilities. Honour and cherish it and above be loving and compassionate. Here is the birthplace of inner and worldly peace.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Thank goodness, we can choose our friends. We have to take our relatives as they are, and be thankful…
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne's House of Dreams

quote: Where there is love, there is no war.
author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann, Love Poems: Love Conquers All

quote: The strength of spirit is measured by sufferings.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: It is a good thing to live long but it is much more important to make a difference in life by living a life of significance.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: Ye mustn't be afraid to ask for help. Pride is a good thing, my girl, but it will kill you in time.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Learning to let go should be learned before learning to get. Life should be touched, not strangled. You’ve got to relax, let it happen at times, and at others move forward with it.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: A Master Jedi feels emotions, but they do not allow them to influence their reasoning. Yoda told Luke that he would know the good from the bad when he was 'calm, at peace.
author: Stephen Richards, Develop Jedi Self-Confidence: Unleash the Force within You

quote: Pent up anger brews into hate, which subsequently becomes a juicy revenge.
author: Natalya Vorobyova

quote: Maybe it was me," Grandma said."Sometimes they sneak out.Did I fart?
author: Janet Evanovich, To the Nines

quote: It's not objective. It's subjective.” Katya hooks her bra behind her back. “It's just what you think, not the truth.
author: E. Lockhart, Fly on the Wall: How One Girl Saw Everything

quote: Labour is blossoming or dancing whereThe body is not bruised to pleasure soul.
author: W.B. Yeats, The Tower

quote: To hell with you. To hell with you and to hell with the Internet.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Every authentic leader needs to mind certain gaps and bridge the cognitive difference.
author: Pearl Zhu, Digital Boardroom: 100 Q&as

quote: The individual cannot bargain with the State. The State recognizes no coinage but power: and it issues the coins itself.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Dispossessed

quote: But it is not always the people who say most who do most.
author: Agatha Christie, Death Comes as the End

quote: Q: I want to be an author when I grow up. Am I insane?"Neil Gaiman: "Yes. Growing up is highly overrated. Just be an au
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Some people get lifetimes, some get moments. I’ve got to tell myself it’s what you do with what you get that counts.
author: Nora Roberts, Bay of Sighs

quote: Love yourself first to love others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I left smiles on your wordless lipsThe night roads- dismal and narrow,dream’s path remains shadowy wideas our lone hearts felt that arrowFrom the Poem 'My Tomorrow
author: Munia Khan, To Evince the Blue

quote: Happiness is what matters, feeling alive-not art or knowledge or money.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Fall in lovewith the energyof the morningstrace your fingers along the lullof the afternoonstake the spirit of the eveningsin your armskiss it deeply and thenmake loveto the tranquilityof the nights.
author: Sanober  Khan

quote: If you build a wall they won't come.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Think about the eternal consequence of your actions
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The life of every individual, viewed as a whole and in general, and when only its most significant features are emphasized, is really a tragedy; but gone through in detail it has the character of a comedy.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer, The World as Will and Representation, Vol 1

quote: What is nobler," she mused, turning over the photographs, "than to be a woman to whom every one turns, in sorrow or difficulty?
author: Virginia Woolf, Night and Day

quote: What are you doing to me?” he asked the crow, tearful. Teaching you how to fly. “I can’t fly!” You’re flying right now. “I’m falling!” Every flight begins with a fall, the crow said.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: —I don't want to lose you—Then why are you the one that keeps letting go?
author: Alexandra Bracken, The Darkest Minds

quote: We cannot solve life's problems except by solving them.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: My relationship to power and authority is that I'm all for it. People need somebody to watch over them. Ninety-five percent of the people in the world need to be told what to do and how to behave.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: We work in the dark - we do what we can - we give what we have. Our doubt is our passion, and our passion is our task. The rest is the madness of art.
author: Henry James, The Middle Years

quote: Life' wrote a friend of mine, 'is a public performance on the violin, in which you must learn the instrument as you go along.
author: E.M. Forster, A Room with a View

quote: By having good memories on every place you just visit, you are building paradise in your own heart and your life.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Insecurity kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: This life is our shared dream.We all may meet again in reality.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: My life should be unique; it should be an alms, a battle, a conquest, a medicine.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Isn't that thing a little unsanitary for the workplace?" I pointed to his lip ring."I assure you that my lip ring is the last thing you should be worried about." He smiled as he leaned on the counter.
author: Magan Vernon, Life, Love, & Lemons

quote: Beauty is seen in repetition; keep repeating your beauty even if your beauty is not all that beautiful, you shall still leave a mark and there shall come a moment when the beauty will be seen
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The main reason of fear of failure lies in people’s being unaware of the impact of misfortune on achieving success
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: A writer, I think, is someone who pays attention to the world.", Frankfurt Book Fair, October 12, 2003]
author: Susan Sontag

quote: Those who expect to reap the blessings of freedom must, like men, undergo the fatigue of supporting it.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Satan can’t prevail against you when you know God’s Word and stand on it. So have your ‘It is written’ armour ready. Build yourself up on the Word of God before the attack comes.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: I always secretly looked forward to nothing going as planned. That way, I wasn't limited by my imagination. That way, anything can, and always did, happen.
author: CrimethInc.

quote: Even when I press against him his presence is too far away.
author: Johnny Rich, The Human Script

quote: Oh, my love,' she said. 'What do the only children do?''We'll never have to know.
author: Ann Patchett, Commonwealth

quote: Whenever I have doubt, I often use epistemological methods or dialectic methods to come to a rational conclusion.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Act with though awareness and love in the present moment then you will never need to worry about the thought of regret.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: God can answer every need.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: To be diligent means to be serious and devoted to the work of God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you are only ‘moral’ or only ‘sincere’, even then you will go to moksha!
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Children, who play life, discern its true law and relations more clearly than men, who fail to live it worthily, but who think that they are wiser by experience, that is, by failure.
author: Henry David Thoreau, Walden

quote: An ass may bray a good while before he shakes the stars down.
author: George Eliot

quote: Where are you?" I wheeze into the floor. "Where did you go?
author: Cynthia Hand, The Last Time We Say Goodbye

quote: Give yourself the love and attention you desire, it's the starting point of contentment.
author: Rob Liano

quote: Someone's therapist knows all about you.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: If thou really believe in one God,irrationality is subset of thou logic.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Rachmaninoff. The 18th Variation of a Rhapsody on a Theme of Paganini.
author: Claudia Gray, A Thousand Pieces of You

quote: The feeling of freedom and scent of sea air are intoxicating. As the wind picks up, I gain speed, holding on to life with a capital L
author: Laurie Nadel

quote: And every book, you find, has its own social group--friends of its own it wants to introduce you to, like a party in the library that need never, ever end.
author: Caitlin Moran, How to Be a Woman

quote: You’re supposed to pinch yourself – not the one you’re dreaming about.
author: Nicki Elson, Three Daves

quote: Human nature is all alike.
author: Mark Twain, Autobiography of Mark Twain, Vol. 1

quote: The Lord is calling us to turn from evil. And return to Him in repentance.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The oppressed are allowed once every few years to decide which particular representatives of the oppressing class are to represent and repress them.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Inside your dream is a nation. To the rest of the world it is invisible, yet it is the only thing you see. It is your imagination.
author: J.R. Rim, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: Don't confuse one leader's bluster for muster or another leader's meekness for weakness.
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: You know there's no such thing as a complete lie. There's always some truth in there.
author: David Levithan, Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: I believe a marriage is between a man and a woman.
author: George W. Bush

quote: We see eternity through a microscopic window of time.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Finding beauty in the common is the sign of a gifted mind.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: If you pray, you can endure any pain.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: God’s greatest investment in our lives is our calling
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you can sit with your pain, listen to your pain and respect your pain — in time you will move through your pain.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: When nothing is possible, then do the impossible.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The task of the leader is to get his people from where they are to where they have not been.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: I know grammar by ear only, not by note, not by the rules.
author: Mark Twain

quote: My dad was fiscally conservative, and I was influenced by that. He didn't believe in spending more than you had because it gets you into trouble.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: I decided to give up meaningless sex, but then I remembered that everything is meaningless.
author: Oli Anderson

quote: you're going to love your way out of this.out of the hurt.out of the pain.you're going to love your way out of it and be free.
author: Ava, You Are Safe Here.

quote: Anytime that cannot be accounted for is a wasted time.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: The true measure of a person is not in what he knows, but what he does with what he knows.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: Boys keep working over your goals these girls ain't going anywhere.
author: Moosa Rahat

quote: She didn’t want to die. She couldn’t imagine wanting to die…Death was for—for other people.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: I’m not trying to—What do teenagers say nowadays?” he asked my grandmother.“Get all up in her biznez,” Nana said.Without cracking a smile.“That’s right,” he replied. “We’re not trying to get all up in your biznez, Ali.
author: Gena Showalter, Alice in Zombieland

quote: It was almost like a reverse nightmare, like when you wake up from a nightmare, you're so relieved. I woke up into a nightmare.""And what is that nightmare, Craig?""Life.
author: Ned Vizzini, It's Kind of a Funny Story

quote: Belief in immortality is harmful because it is not in our power to conceive of the soul as really incorporeal. So this belief is in fact a belief in the prolongation of life, and it robs death of its purpose.
author: Simone Weil, Gravity and Grace

quote: Great God, Great faith.Great faith, Great spirit.Great spirit, Great soul.Great soul, great life.Great life, great deeds.Great deeds, great blessings.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Love survives in us precisely because it isn't wise.
author: Gregory David Roberts, Shantaram

quote: The key to a wonderful life is to never stop wandering into wonder.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Like most hearts, it was complicated, shaded with dark and dappled with light.
author: Kate DiCamillo

quote: The ambition of men compels them to break even the most heartfelt vows.
author: A.H. Septimius

quote: Reading well is one of the great pleasures that solitude can afford you.
author: Harold Bloom

quote: Don't let yourself die without knowing the wonder of fucking with love.
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: Pain is a pleasure in disguise.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I wonder how much the general population of this country know that the legal system has far more to do with playing a good hand of poker than it does with justice.
author: Jodi Picoult, My Sister's Keeper

quote: Difficult times often bring out the best in people.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: I want to see life through a spiritual perspective, so I can make choices that influence eternity.
author: Alisa Hope Wagner

quote: We are the most informed people in the history of civilization—and yet the most confused. Though our heads are crammed with knowledge, our hearts are empty.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: The view is endlessly fulfilling. It is like the answer to a lifetime of questions and vague cravings.
author: Don DeLillo

quote: I still don't have all the answers, but I'm no longer afraid to confront the questions.
author: Pittacus Lore, The Fate of Ten

quote: Not the comfort, but the confrontation and hardship, is the teacher of a great life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Music empowers the soul with great strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Living life is sacred education.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Chief among the forces affecting political folly is lust for power, named by Tacitus as "the most flagrant of all passions.
author: Barbara W. Tuchman, The March of Folly: From Troy to Vietnam

quote: If you can concentrate always on the present, you'll be a happy man.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: When God sprinkled stars in the heavens, he opened our eyes to the wonders of the universe.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: The gracious moment a given time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I could feel my moral compass as a soldier, in danger of - I could feel the squeeze, the pressure of frustration and anger and fear combining on me... I felt the danger; I felt the squeeze of it.
author: Tim O'Brien

quote: You can’t be a successful leader or mentor until you have served. You can’t serve until you have stepped out of your comfort zone. And you can’t step out of your comfort zone unless you have character and keep your word.
author: Bill Courtney, Against the Grain: A Coach's Wisdom on Character, Faith, Family, and Love

quote: Smart people that like good health spend several hours outdoors daily in the shade of trees.
author: Steven Magee

quote: Two persons cannot long be friends if they cannot forgive each other's little failings.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: She rested her head on his shoulder. "You're better than waffles, Matthias Helvar." A small smile curled the Fjerdan's lips. "Let's not say things we don't mean, my love.
author: Leigh Bardugo, Crooked Kingdom

quote: God allows us to face the tension whether we like it or not.
author: Donald Miller, A Million Miles in a Thousand Years: What I Learned While Editing My Life

quote: So if animals aren't our friends, then what are they? The answer can be summed up between two buns.
author: Stephen Colbert, I Am America

quote: Self-knowledge is better than self-control any day," Raquel said firmly. "And I know myself well enough to know how I act around cookies.
author: Claudia Gray, Evernight

quote: The Only God left standing 'There' is Oneness and Unity of Everything. And not a fancied man-like god - yours or mine. Get 'IT'?
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: I'm wishing he could see that music lives. Forever. That it's stronger than death. Stronger than time. And that its strength holds you together when nothing else can.
author: Jennifer Donnelly, Revolution

quote: LINK OUT OF SYNCWhen the mind fails to keep pace with the body's maturityKamil Ali
author: Kamil Ali, Profound Vers-A-Tales

quote: Who am I, for God's sake, that I should be kind!
author: Charles Dickens, Great Expectations

quote: If we feel good, we can keep going in the direction of the reality we’re creating. If we don’t feel good, we may reflect upon our beliefs and change them according to the reality we do wish to create.
author: Alaric Hutchinson, Living Peace

quote: The less I have, the less I can lose.
author: Dean Koontz, Odd Thomas

quote: I’m telling you that responsibly applying time strategy and proactively leveraging your calendar is the dumb ol’ secret to seeing your dreams come true.
author: Amber Hurdle, The Bombshell Business Woman: How to Become a Bold, Brave, and Successful Female Entrepreneur

quote: It is the rule in war, if our forces are ten to the enemy's one, to surround him; if five to one, to attack him; if twice as numerous, to divide our army into two.
author: Sun Tzu, The Art of War

quote: Write about the thing that scares you most or your most private confession and you'll never have a problem coming up with decent fiction.
author: Don Roff

quote: I had a polynomial once. My doctor removed it.
author: Michael  Grant, Gone

quote: Think of the ills from which you are exempt.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: If a train is two minutes late in leaving, one will become impatient, ‘when will the train leave, when will it leave?’ This world is not worth getting impatient restless about.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The abundant life doesn’t happen by accident. It is the result of doing specific things purposefully every day and it requires an investment of time, energy and effort.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Let us think, let us loveJust for a day, just for a nightLet us find peace and happinessDeep in our heart with spiritual light.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The first stair to failure is ignorance. Keep learning by leaning on the lap of information and you'll take the lead!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: We are surrounded by adversity but we shall triumph because we have a greater spirit
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: If you walk in joy, happiness is close behind.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: To laugh continually is to never laugh at all. For it takes the periodic sound of sorrow from which to distinguish the sound of joy.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: Success rarely occurs until a desire is turned into a passion and all focus and energy is channelled in its path.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: God is a great God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Nothing is as real as a dream. The world can change around you, but your dream will not. Your life may change, but your dream doesn't have to. Responsibilities need not erase it. Duties need not obscure it.
author: Tom Clancy

quote: You see, nothing matters except pleasure - which is the opposite of happiness, its tragic part, I expect.
author: Lawrence Durrell, The Alexandria Quartet

quote: What starts in the heart doesn't stay in the heart, it either turn into action or words.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: The greatest legacy one can pass on to one's children and grandchildren is not money or other material things accumulated in one's life, but rather a legacy of character and faith.
author: Billy Graham

quote: No matter where you are spread the fragrance of peace like a flower.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I believe in giving kindness, regardless of how unreasonable and self-centered a person is. Kindness is a gift of sanctity for a person. It has the goal of making the soul smile.
author: Lionel Suggs

quote: Mockery is childish. It does not become you.
author: Veronica Roth, Insurgent

quote: When you forgive, it does not mean that you have submitted, it simply means that you have made a choice to stop bearing any grudge.
author: Stephen Richards, The Pain You Feel Today Is The Strength You Feel Tomorrow

quote: There is no love that is not self-love
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: I still believe that peace and plenty and happiness can be worked out some way. I am a fool.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

quote: I don't use big words to show off because it's ostentatious.
author: Don Roff

quote: For those who sit on the stairs, a good quote is a strong invitation to stand up and to go up the stairs!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: [Who are the artists you admire, Surrealist or otherwise?]Remedios Varo, Max Ernst, Charlotte Salomon, Goya, Aubrey Beardsley. Beardsley is not so much about the impossible as he is about freaks and deformities, but those are interesting to me too.
author: Audrey Niffenegger

quote: Freedom is being whole on my own and not needing somebody else to complete me.
author: Christina Engela, Demonspawn

quote: One by one she slew her fears, and then planted a flower garden over their graves.
author: John Mark Green

quote: I have a different vision of leadership. A leadership is someone who brings people together.
author: George W. Bush

quote: If you cannot inspire a woman with love of you, fill her above the brim with love of herself; all that runs over will be yours.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: The time has come to harness the blessed power within us and to use it to transcend from our current existence into a more empowered reality.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Footnotes  the little dogs yapping at the heels of the text.
author: William James

quote: To learn something new, take the path that you took yesterday.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Angels are showing up in our lives as friends. We just have to recognize them.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It was that impossible thing: happiness that does not wilt to reveal the thin shoots of some new desire rising from within it.
author: George Saunders, Tenth of December

quote: Always surround yourself with people who lift you up, rather than hold you down.
author: Donald L. Hicks, Look into the stillness

quote: Everyone, either from modesty or egotism, hides away the best and most delicate of his soul’s possessions; to gain the esteem of others, we must only ever show our ugliest sides; this is how we keep ourselves on the common level
author: Gustave Flaubert, November

quote: Men will not accept truth at the hands of their enemies, and truth is seldom offered to them by their friends
author: Alexis de Tocqueville, Democracy in America

quote: True beauty is not related to what color your hair is or what color your eyes are. True beauty is about who you are as a human being, your principles, your moral compass.
author: Ellen DeGeneres, Seriously... I'm Kidding

quote: There comes a time when the world gets quiet and the only thing left is your own heart. So you'd better learn the sound of it. Otherwise you'll never understand what it's saying.
author: Sarah Dessen, Just Listen

quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
author: Plutarch

quote: your brain is wider than the sky
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Be skeptic, be doubtful, be rebellious towards every single dogma of the society. Only then there will be hope of progress for humanity.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Illusion of Religion: A Treatise on Religious Fundamentalism

quote: …in the library…surrounded by things far more dangerous than what roamed the school corridors. For here thoughts were housed.
author: Louise Penny, Bury Your Dead

quote: The evenings are meant for deep reflection.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: A lot of mothers incorrectly see the meaning of their lives as being the designer or creator of their child’s life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: How long will it be necessary to pay City men so entirely out of proportion to what other servants of society commonly receive for performing social services not less useful or difficult?
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: One of the fundamental causes of the disintegration of society is copying, which is the worship of authority.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti, The First and Last Freedom

quote: You have to chase your dreams with all your heart.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, The Alphabets of  Success: Passion Driven Life

quote: The jar shall never ceased to be filled with oil.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: They’re scared of death, but that’s like being afraid of life.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: Many great ideas, great love stories, and great achievements are born from a healthy irrationality.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: What is the nature of egoism? It spends away everything in its power!
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: It is hard work and great art to make life not so serious.
author: John Irving, The Hotel New Hampshire

quote: Nothing makes you think you might need years of therapy like saying the word breasts in front of your mother.
author: Katie McGarry, Dare You To

quote: Desire to dwell in clean environment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I’ve heard it said that a thousand mile journey to success begins with the first step. Anyone feel like taking a walk with me today?
author: DeWayne Owens

quote: There have been occasions in my later life (I suppose in most lives) when I have felt for a time as if a thick curtain had fallen on all interest in romance, to shut me out from anything save dull endurance.
author: Charles Dickens, Great Expectations

quote: If you ever looked at me once with what I know is in you, I would be your slave.
author: Emily Brontë, Wuthering Heights

quote: Graduate study is an intensive education. You have to be diligent and determined from the beginning to the very end.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Choosing to unconditionally love others is a path to deep joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Compassion Revolution: 30 Days of Living from the Heart

quote: God is a comedian playing to an audience that is too afraid to laugh.
author: Voltaire

quote: Philosophy starts when we question ourselves and search for meaning in our lives.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Leave the door open for the unknown, the door into the dark. That’s where the most important things come from, where you yourself came from, and where you will go.
author: Rebecca Solnit, A Field Guide to Getting Lost

quote: Men inflict injuries from hatred, jealousy or contempt, but the wise man masters all these passions by means of reason.
author: Epicurus, The Art of Happiness

quote: I owe my solitude to other people.
author: Alan W. Watts

quote: Smile and Slay.You have to slay it in life or life will slay you.
author: Janna Cachola

quote: Death comes in endless forms. Of the body. Of the soul. Of the heart. - Catriona Mercant, philosopher and warrior. (circa 1419)
author: Nalini Singh, Silver Silence

quote: It nods and curtseys and recoversWhen the wind blows above,The nettle on the graves of loversThat hanged themselves for love.The nettle nods, the wind blows over,The man, he does not move,The lover of the grave, the loverThat hanged himself for love.
author: A.E. Housman, A Shropshire Lad

quote: All I have seen teaches me to trust the Creator for all I have not seen.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I like shape very much. A novel has to have shape, and life doesn't have any.
author: Jean Rhys, Smile Please: An Unfinished Autobiography

quote: When you change your level of consciousness and awareness, the situation around you will change with joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Like a missing tooth, sometimes an absence is more noticeable than a presence.
author: Jodi Picoult, Lone Wolf

quote: And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
author: Sylvia Plath, The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: A tree sings to us with her beauty and her love. It is our responsibility to listen to her music.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Without love, life will be a great mistake.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I think comedy as an art involves the audience as a participant as much as is involves the artist.
author: Craig Ferguson

quote: How do YOU know what God meant? Did he whisper into your ear? Did he put the knife in your heart? Did he put a gun in your hand?
author: Christina Engela, Black Sunrise

quote: It often seems to me that art conceals the artist far more completely than it ever reveals him.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Stop comparing yourself to others. Always strive to improve yourself to become better today than you were yesterday to serve those around you and the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: When a man has lost all happiness  he's not alive. Call him a breathing corpse.
author: Sophocles

quote: Eragon looked back at him, confused. "I don't understand.""Of course you don't," said Brom impatiently. "That's why I'm teaching you and not the other way around.
author: Christopher Paolini, Eragon

quote: Pieces of your heart broke every day when you were a mother.
author: Dianna Hardy, Summer's End

quote: Things conceived by minds and made by hands can never be quite the same, even if they try their best to be identical, because they're never the same from day to day or even moment to moment.
author: Stephen King, Bag of Bones

quote: Stay in your bed as long as you want. Your money just left for work.
author: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

quote: Today I have nothing to do except sing the songs of peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Frequent risk-takers have had their fair shares of failures and successes, hence, being confident in reaching their goals, they will usually seem insensitive to whether or not they look foolish or cool to other people.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: If you have strength, why won’t you work?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Women understand the workings of nature than men. They trust in their instincts while men consider this behavior weakness.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Where no hope is left  is left no fear.
author: John Milton

quote: Human making is our mission.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Human Making is Our Mission: A Treatise on Parenting

quote: All who joy would win must share it. Happiness was born a Twin.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Oh", she thought, "how horrible it is that people have to grow up-and marry-and change!
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of the Island

quote: The fuse is lit. You can run all you want to but you leave a trail of gunpowder in your wake. There’s going to be a reckoning eventually.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: How many kids are in the Graveyard?""A bunch.""Who sends your supplies?""George Washington. Or is it Abraham Lincoln? I forget.""How often do you receive new arrivals?""About as often as you beat your wife.
author: Neal Shusterman, UnWholly

quote: Love is the source of great power and great strength.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: How to make God laugh. Tell him your future plans.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Life can be seen through several spectrums of light, but it’s the person who is doing the soul searching that defines what they may see.
author: Nadège Richards

quote: I see great things in baseball. It's our game - the American game.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Every person you meet in your life is your destiny. We alter the course of every life we touch, whether we realize it or not.
author: Dannika Dark, Two Minutes

quote: You say  "But He has not answered." He has  He is so near to you that His silence is the answer. His silence is big with terrific meaning that you cannot understand yet  but presently you will.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote: There are souls, he thought, whose umbilicus has never been cut. They never got weaned from the universe. They do not understand death as an enemy; they look forward to rotting and turning into humus.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Dispossessed

quote: Work therefore is the paramount key to discovering yourself.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Your life was meant for more than being a life-long doormat for deadbeats, losers, gossipers, nay-sayers, dream-crushers, energy vampires, users, abusers, ragers and passive-aggressive backstabbers.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: The truth, he thought, has never been of any real value to any human being - it is a symbol for mathematicians and philosophers to pursue. In human relations kindness and lies are worth a thousand truths.
author: Graham Greene

quote: Worrying paralyzes progress; prayer, preparation and persistence ensures it.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: We scarified a mosquito. I bet that's what did it. It was probably a virgin too.
author: Kelley Armstrong, Broken

quote: People shouldn't just talk about you, they should tell your tales.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: The sorrow we feel when we lose a loved one is the price we pay to have had them in our lives.
author: Rob Liano

quote: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: In that moment I’m able to accept the inevitability of how I feel, though not with joy. I need to talk to someone. I need to trust someone. And for whatever reason, I know, I know it’s her.
author: Veronica Roth, Four: A Divergent Story Collection

quote: The sinner is saved to be a saint by the Saviour.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Often a healthy obsession is an essential component of great success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Some people are so afraid to die that they never begin to live.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: ...Ah, but the Moon my Love is jealous, and can you blame him? You outshine him with your virtues...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Great leaders die empty. They live to offload everything they put in them! Don’t die with your books in your mind unpublished!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Watchwords

quote: Let's life bring a joy, and let's realise that this now is a lie and to make a truth. To make a real life!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: The infinitude of Jiu Jitsu allows for the infinitude of the types of practitioners. There exists a game for each and every one of us which is specifically possible within the confines of our particular skill set.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Continued Education Through Jiu Jitsu

quote: I’m just a soul whose intentions are good,’“ he sang to the crabs and the spiders and the palmetto beetles and the lizards and the night. ‘“Oh lord, please don’t let me be misunderstood.
author: Neil Gaiman, American Gods

quote: Learn to recognize omens, and follow them
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: You only live when you truly get lost in love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In most job interviews, people say they are looking for people skills and emotional intelligence. That's reasonable, but the question is, how do you define what that looks like?
author: Susan Cain

quote: Holy cow, she'd just slept with the hottest guy in the universe. She, the super science geek. The you-go-girl side of her brain wahooed. The rational side of her brain spat out a resounding, Oh shit.
author: Zoe Forward, Protecting His Witch

quote: The dead person once had a life! This is a misery?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Sometimes at night I would sleep open-eyed underneath a sky dripping with stars. I was alive then.
author: Albert Camus

quote: If you are not living in active consciousness, you will always be lost
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: [Myrnin to Claire about their costumes of Pierrot and Harlequin, respectively]"Don't they teach you anything in your schools?".""Pity. I suppose that's what comes of your main education flowing from Google.
author: Rachel Caine, Feast of Fools

quote: God is a consuming fire.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Bad habits were all a matter of perspective, and as long as the present was viewed through the lens of the past, anyone would say he was doing a spectacular job.
author: Ann Patchett, Commonwealth

quote: There is no sweeter pleasure than wandering aimlessly about.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Fully inhale your dream and completely exhale manifestation of it.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: If you wish gain understanding, turn away from evil.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I don’t like psychiatrists,” Alecto told her. “Not because they don’t think I’m real, but because they have no idea what they’re doing.
author: Rebecca McNutt, Mandy and Alecto: The Collected Smog City Book Series

quote: If wisdom is a place, you should be the wisest one to live there..
author: Munia Khan

quote: They thrived on the rapid turnover of acquaintances, the lack of involvement with others, and the total self-sufficiency of lives which, needing nothing, were never dissapointed.
author: J.G. Ballard, High-Rise

quote: I rode an elevator with a guy who was whistling the tune of 'this is the song that never ends'. Putting that on me? Come on dude..
author: Taylor Swift, Taylor Swift

quote: Clearly God was in some kind of mood on my birthday.
author: Jodi Picoult, My Sister's Keeper

quote: You are backed by great power. Press onwards, you will succeed.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: want a war ? please fall in love with your awaken soul
author: litymunshi

quote: Why are you choosing to be unhappy, when you're created for happiness?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Words do less than 10 things, but actions do more than 10 thousand things. Leaders don’t talk in vain; they follow with actions.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

quote: The world of knowledge takes a crazy turn when teachers themselves are taught to learn.
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: …the truest feeling of happiness is the security that comes with being loved.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: If we truly loved ourselves, we’d never harm another. That is a truly revolutionary, celebratory mode of self-care.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: Laughter Is Created As An Expression Of Happiness And Joy Which Results In Health
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Poetry is an echo asking a shadow to dance.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: nothing contributes so much to tranquilize the mind as a steady purpose
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quote: Writers are like tricksters. Their words lure us to embark on journeys and unlock our emotions.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: Religion comes not where reign fundamentalism and authoritarianism.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Look back, and smile on perils past!
author: Walter Scott, The Complete Poetical Works of Sir Walter Scott

quote: If warm air rises, Heaven could be hotter than Hell.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Forgive yourself and you will be happy. Forgive everything and you will be happiest.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In a world of increasing fakery, genuine people are the sexiest.
author: Sam Owen

quote: Work done by you with unconditional love and pure devotion goes straight in the category of divine and immortal craft.
author: Seema Brain Openers

quote: There comes a time in a man's life when he hears the call of the sea. If the man has a brain in his head, he will hang up the phone immediately.
author: Dave Barry

quote: If you're making a conscious effort…someone should be meeting you on the same page. Don't be silly be smart.
author: Turcois Ominek

quote: Positive thoughts give positive energy.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: #Twitter: proudly promoting ghastly grammar and silly misspelling since 2006.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quote: Hurry up! Do it – get it done. You got work to do. Don’t put this off and don’t take the long view. Life is today and tomorrow, and if you are lucky, may be next week.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: we always knewthat good times camewith termination contractseven if we weren't quite readyto sign it.
author: Sanober  Khan, Turquoise Silence

quote: The primary purpose of a liberal education is to make one's mind a pleasant place in which to spend one's leisure.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder, not the mirror.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Change does not surface when you are not ready to be the catalyst. Your reaction matters, not your inaction.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: A good picture is equivalent to a good deed.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Love is not about finding the right person, but about being the right person.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: The higher the vibration, the more positive the events or people you attract and likewise.
author: Stephen Richards, Ask and the Universe Will Provide: A Straightforward Guide to Manifesting Your Dreams

quote: Evolutionarily speaking, there is seldom any mystery in why we seek the goals we seek — why, for example, people would rather make love with an attractive partner than get a slap on the belly with a wet fish.
author: Steven Pinker, How the Mind Works

quote: My mission is to make the external God of human society obsolete in front of humanity’s internal Godliness.
author: Abhijit Naskar, 7 Billion Gods: Humans Above All

quote: Be the God or goddess of love and love everyone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Like a caterpillar, when you feel that your time is over, you may reach infinite light with infinite joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A flower blossoms for its own joy.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Only the light from your heart can see the beauty of magnificent morn.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: aren't you, uh... reproducing?"sure, we love reproducing it's one of our favorite things.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Bones

quote: Inside her it was as if death didn’t exist, as if love could weld her, as if eternity were renewal.
author: Clarice Lispector, Near to the Wild Heart

quote: My mind is the only sanctuary that has not been stolen from me.
author: Christopher Paolini

quote: Can't be on the front lines fighting a war with the weapons given to you by the enemy.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: You can only find strength, if you dare conquer the situation
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love ...
author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quote: Souls soar high above reach,Hands extend but never touch,Words exchanged in dulcet tones,Tis a fated moment to understand one's truth,Time to let go.
author: Truth Devour, Wantin

quote: Beautify your breath – beautify your life.
author: Amit Ray, Mindfulness Living in the Moment - Living in the Breath

quote: Someday, I'm going to have to break some of your rules, Mom.""I know," she said. "Try to do it behind my back, will you?¨You can bet on that, Mom.¨We both sat there and laughed.
author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz

quote: When I listen and enjoy the deepest silence I hear the sound of universal love and lose myself completely.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you take it step by step, you shall least miss a step!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Love in a night shall live and die,Love in a day shall wing and fly;Love in the Spring shall last an hour,Easily fade a spring-tide flower.
author: Aleister Crowley, White Stains & the Nameless Novel: Flowers of Eros and Evil

quote: What is history? An echo of the past in the future a reflex from the future on the past.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: It's funny how things work out.Trouble is, I'm still not laughing.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: It has taken me a lot of years, but I find silence is sometimes the best answer.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Pride and ego makes a mockery of an apology. Humility wins forgiveness without question...so break 'yo'self'!
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Nothing against the music, it's awesome... but going deeper and deeper in Super Genes... it's kind of dry... isn't it???So I need something bloody!- Crime is a great choice!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: The grace of prayer is an act of seeking to communicate with divine power.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I do not choose the roads to travel;my destination does, apparently it is always the one less traveled.
author: Pushpa Rana, Just the Way I Feel

quote: You will see that the things you desire most are the very things that bring you the greatest sorrow.
author: Christopher Pike, Phantom

quote: If you can dream it up. You can team it up.
author: Richie Norton

quote: Discover your deep inner-self and from that place spread love in every direction.
author: Amit Ray, Meditation: Insights and Inspirations

quote: I am not pretty. I am not beautiful. I am as radiant as the sun.
author: Suzanne Collins, The Hunger Games

quote: When man manages his intellect and steadies his mind, He discovers the all-pervading Self.
author: Gian Kumar

quote: Silence is not a fucking virtue. It’s a disease—­a cancer that eats away at you and fucks with your head.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout, Be with Me

quote: You are more than capable of taking decisions about your own life.
author: Raphael Zernoff, Being Yourself, Riding the Wave of Change

quote: People are secretive when they have secrets.
author: Deb Caletti, The Secret Life of Prince Charming

quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I am certain no one sets out to be cruel, but our treatment of the elderly ill seems to have no philosophy to it. As a society, we should establish whether we have a policy of life at any cost.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: The wicked ones make us better persons for those that deserve our attention. Nothing is really lost and wasted in this alchemical dance of life.
author: Robin Sacredfire

quote: If there were a nation of Gods, it would govern itself democratically. A government so perfect is not suited to men.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau, The Social Contract

quote: The fault  dear Brutus  is not in our stars  But in ourselves  that we are underlings.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Reality is crushing. The world is a wrong-sized shoe. How can anyone stand it?
author: Jandy Nelson, I'll Give You the Sun

quote: I have always been a firm believer in God and the power of prayer, though to be honest, my faith has made for alist of questions I definitely want answered after I'm gone.
author: Nicholas Sparks, The Notebook

quote: It is a fool's prerogative to utter truths that no one else will speak.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: There can't be a quarrel without two parties, and I won't be one. I will be a friend to you in spite of you. So now you know what you've got to expect
author: Charles Dickens, David Copperfield

quote: Stop groveling, stop whining and start working!
author: Abhijit Naskar, Principia Humanitas

quote: Her screams are heard across generations who dared not scream and died without joy,in silence and isolation.
author: David W. Earle

quote: You're great. You don't need to be sorry for being who you're. You're a miracle. You're a wonder in this generation. Unchain your true self!
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: Let us say that you might have become a telepathic cancer, a malignant mentality which in its inevitable dissolution would have poisoned other and greater minds.
author: Arthur C. Clarke, Childhood's End

quote: How much time? Not as much as I had yesterday.
author: Orson Scott Card, Shadow of the Giant

quote: Forgiveness is not an event. It is a series of decisions made over and over again.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: What happened to the good old days when rich white men just bought their way into office?
author: Jennifer Crusie, Strange Bedpersons

quote: We must let our every act be out of love, and for the greater good of all.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: I see them and they see me but the lovers — we recognise one another: there is light in our eyes.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: When you love your neighbor, you won’t have problems with embracing them
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: A healthy amount of fear and respect might be a good idea
author: Haruki Murakami, Kafka on the Shore

quote: Be a poet in action as well as in words.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Comedians are people who embarrass themselves in style.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Don't always use prudence for precaution, sometimes use it for progress.
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

quote: True love is eternal  infinite  and always like itself. It is equal and pure  without violent demonstrations: it is seen with white hairs and is always young in the heart.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The worst thing that could possibly happen to anybody would be to not be used for anything by anybody. Thank you for using me, even though I didn't want to be used by anybody.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr., The Sirens of Titan

quote: What you think of is what you will attract to your life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: She had yet to actually call him by his real name. The psychologist in him had all kinds of theories as to why. The man in him wanted to hear her say it. Just once.
author: Kelly Moran, Ghost of You

quote: You were built for this moment.
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: Being the first born gives you great patience.
author: Abraham Verghese, Cutting for Stone

quote: All children are morbid: it's their one saving grace.
author: Truman Capote, Other Voices, Other Rooms

quote: It could have been so beautiful.The way I learned and got free and swore to never love another person ever againand it could have been so beautiful,the way I actually did.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: A book is a mirror: if an ape looks into it an apostle is hardly likely to look out.
author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg, Sudelbücher.

quote: Isn't it splendid to think of all the things there are to find out about? It just makes me feel glad to be alive--it's such an interesting world
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of Green Gables

quote: People should never sit alone for too long when they're crying.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Once you face the truth, the knowledge both empowers you and sets you free.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: I don’t know what you dream, when you are everyone’s dream.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: But you will trust me again, Annabelle. You will want me again, and we will be together. I will behave. You'll see. - Zacharel
author: Gena Showalter, Wicked Nights

quote: I should fancy, however, that murder is always a mistake. One should never do anything that one cannot talk about after dinner.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Maybe eventually winter will finish our job for us and end the world in ice instead of blood.
author: Isaac Marion, Boarded Window

quote: Why do we complicate life, when it was meant to be very simple?
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: Who cares what colour your hair or what shape your shape is? Who cares what religion your religion or what language your language is? What is the colour of your heart? That is all that matters!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: A bridge of silver wings stretches from the dead ashes of an unforgiving nightmareto the jeweled vision of a life started anew.
author: Aberjhani, Journey through the Power of the Rainbow: Quotations from a Life Made Out of Poetry

quote: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don’t look at your circumstance. Be courageous!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The unlike is joined together, and from differences results the most beautiful harmony.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Poetry  therefore  we will call Musical Thought.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: When at last we have to die it will be time enough to get cold.While we are on fire let us seethe and boil.
author: Rabindranath Tagore, The Home and the World

quote: There are gods and there are true knights too. All the stories can't be lies.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Clash of Kings

quote: Many times what we perceive as an error or failure is actually a gift. And eventually we find that lessons learned from that discouraging experience prove to be of great worth.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: With faith, I love without any fear.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: What’s a TH?”“A Traffic Hazard,” Heeb clarified.“Oh you mean because the woman is so hot she’ll take your eyes off the road?” Narc confirmed.“Exactly.
author: Zack Love, Sex in the Title: A Comedy about Dating, Sex, and Romance in NYC

quote: Don't forget to give Neville our love!' Ginny told James as she hugged him.!' Neville-'James rolled his eyes.....
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Morality is the clipping of a bird's wings.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: In this worldly life, one is possessed by the three ghosts of the mind, speech and the body.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: So, your god is the only god? Okay, but then, so is my dog.
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: Show me a person who really knows what 'good' is, and I will show you that he almost never uses the word.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: She blushed and so did he. She greeted him in a faltering voice, and he spoke to her without knowing what he was saying.
author: Voltaire, Candide

quote: Understand your power. Live dangerously. Live fearlessly. Cower before no earthly master. Know yourself. Live truthfully. Live freely. Be yourself. Love yourself.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: How foolish to believe we are more powerful than the sea or the sky.
author: Ruta Sepetys, Salt to the Sea

quote: Your gracefulness and feminine charms always so tender, you make my heart smile and wonder!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: A friend is he who can feel you, adore you, understand you, and never leave you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Throughout the history of mankind, the virtues embraced by humanity have remained true, unwavering, and consistent.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact

quote: Many quote scripture, less study it, and even fewer live it. ~T.F. Hodge
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: The word of God gives hope.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The greatest law is: love yourself first
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Some men are warriors and some men are weenies. The trick is figuring out which is which.
author: Lois Greiman, Unzipped

quote: Express gratitude for every little thing.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There is no such uncertainty as a sure thing.
author: Robert Burns, Collected Poems of Robert Burns

quote: They will notdisappoint you, and you will look upon them morecharitably. Men seek but one thing in life—their pleasure
