author: W. Somerset Maugham, Of Human Bondage

quote: The Spirit, and your soul are not the same things. The Spirit is God - the source. Your soul is God's imagination.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Who are we? We find that we live on an insignificant planet of a humdrum star lost in a galaxy tucked away in some forgotten corner of a universe in which there are far more galaxies than people.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: When we are out of sympathy with the young, then I think our work in this world is over.
author: George MacDonald

quote: Writers of novels live in a strange world where what's made up is as important as what's real.
author: Sara Sheridan

quote: The sound of the king's music made Despereaux's soul grow large and light inside of him.
author: Kate DiCamillo, The Tale of Despereaux

quote: An ugly sight, a man who is afraid.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Have an appreciating eye to enjoy the beauty of sky.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: God created you for His higher purpose and for your better good
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: She enjoyed the sights and sounds of the dockside – ports were places of freedom.
author: Sara Sheridan, On Starlit Seas

quote: Use what you have got to create your world.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: It often takes more courage to change one's opinion than to stick to it.
author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quote: If you lose something, do not worry.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When eagles are silent, parrots begin to chatter.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: Divine self is holy being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: the man who is pure, and who dares, does all things.
author: Swami Vivekananda, Complete Works of Swami Vivekananda 8 Vol. set

quote: Everyone who has ever built anywhere a "new heaven" first found the power thereto in his own hell.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I accept chaos, I'm not sure whether it accepts me.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: He may be my half brother, but we're not related. A chasm of incommunicable worlds lies between us.
author: Rabih Alameddine, An Unnecessary Woman

quote: Keep striving, for God gives His hardest battles to His strongest soldiers.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: We create in people through our actions and example. In this way people around us become reflections of our own behavioral patterns and internal energies
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Keep your dreams, you will never know when you need them
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón, The Shadow of the Wind

quote: Money will buy a pretty good dog but it won't buy the wag of his tail.
author: Josh Billings

quote: The Chinese use two brush strokes to write the word 'crisis.' One brush stroke stands for danger; the other for opportunity. In a crisis, be aware of the danger--but recognize the opportunity.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Wherever one has to ‘do’ anything, there is worldly life (sansaar) there.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Working on yourself will reveal a new image of yourself
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The mortal mind alone cannot devise an answer to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, because the true answer lies on a level of consciousness that's beyond our mortal thinking. Quite simply, when it comes to Israel and the Palestinians, we need a miracle.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Human: That's stupid. Isn't there grass on both sides?
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: The burning lamp is found in reading books.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If your treated like a puppet find a new ball of string
author: Benny Bellamacina, Piddly Poems for Children

quote: Enjoy the ride of life. It is irreplaceable.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The dawn of light is the liberation of souls.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Minds are like flowers, they only open when the time is right.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: I hate facts. I always say the chief end of man is to form general propositions - adding that no general proposition is worth a damn.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: I care not so much what I am to others as what I am to myself. I will be rich by myself  and not by borrowing.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Your eyes hold all the answers to my life's problems.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: It’s difficult to accept full responsibility and apportion blame at the same time – you have to choose one.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Thoughtful minds grow, in the sharpened awareness of those who have lived life; through love, curiosity and tragedy.
author: Aisha Mirza

quote: The first thing to do after you get fired is to discover God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Don't be shy, dear. I'm too old for you to be embarrassed by me.” #RicardoAlonso , #FatefulItalianPassion.
author: Olga Goa

quote: The man with toothache thinks everyone happy whose teeth are sound.The poverty stricken man makes the same mistake about the rich man.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The rain that falls wherever it pleases. I want to be that rain.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: For an instant Harry imagined... Just for an instant, before his imagination blew a fuse and called an emergency shut down and told him never to imagine that again.
author: Eliezer Yudkowsky, Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality

quote: Speak clearly, if you speak at all; carve every word before you let it fall.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: I cannot concentrate all my friendship on any single one of my friends because no one is complete enough in himself.
author: Anais Nin

quote: I'm great at lying to myself.
author: Karina Halle, Where Sea Meets Sky

quote: I must say a word about fear. It is life's only true opponent. Only fear can defeat life.
author: Yann Martel, Life of Pi

quote: I’ve had a tense couple of days. And I’ve got to tell you, burning someone’s face off sounds like a great way to relax.
author: Jim Butcher, Small Favor

quote: I laugh, because he knew what I was thinking, and very few people ever know what I'm thinking.
author: Lois Lowry, A Summer to Die

quote: When someone else doesn’t believein you or your dreams, rememberit’s about them, not you.
author: Domonique Bertolucci

quote: If winter comes, can spring be far behind?
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley, Ode to the West Wind

quote: God is Change.Earthseed: The Books of the LivingLauren Oya Olamina
author: Octavia E. Butler, Parable of the Sower

quote: Is there any smooth path to success? No. You must learn to travel on many rugged roads to find the straight path.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Life is too precious to worry about what could or will happen. Life is..what you make it
author: E'yen A. Gardner

quote: Past love is as good as a past dream, intangible, impossible to share.
author: Catherine Lacey, The Answers

quote: When I write, I see the character inside out, not outside in.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your mind fuels the state of your soul, spirit and body.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If evil exists its to be found in our fears.
author: Paulo Coelho, Adultery

quote: It was a Guild of Assassins, after all. Black was what you wore. The night was black and so were you. And black had such style, and an Assassin without style, everyone agreed, was just a highly paid arrogant thug.
author: Terry Pratchett, Night Watch

quote: Luck is a woman. She's drawn to those that least deserve her.
author: Joe Abercrombie, Last Argument of Kings

quote: Science gave us forensics. Law gave us crime.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana, N for Nigger: Aphorisms for Grown Children and Childish Grown-ups

quote: You have to be quite heavily invested in someone to do them the honour of telling them you're annoyed with them.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Love yourself so much that you can never harm yourself. Remember, you can never harm others without harming yourself.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Decide to be HAPPY when you start your day. Commit to put JOY in whatever comes your way. You may be hurt by what people say, but don’t let anyone spoil your Day.
author: RVM

quote: I am in love with the serendipitous poetry with which this universe expresses itself.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The “result” of micromanagement is perhaps tangible in the short run, but more often causes damage for the long term.
author: Pearl Zhu, Change Insight: Change as an Ongoing Capability to Fuel Digital Transformation

quote: Either do not attempt at all  or go through with it.
author: Ovid

quote: The evolution of man is slow. The injustice of men is great.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Soul of Man Under Socialism

quote: Bias has to be taught. If you hear your parents downgrading women or people of different backgrounds, why, you are going to do that.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Time takes it all, whether you want it or not. Time takes it all, time bears it away, and in the end there is only darkness. Sometimes we find others in that darkness, and sometimes we lose them there again.
author: Stephen King, The Green Mile

quote: It’s important to have a husband that lives and believes the same way you do. Otherwise, you’re asking for problems.
author: J.E.B. Spredemann, An Unforgivable Secret

quote: There's something about kindred spirits, you meet them and for a moment this world no matter ugly, makes sense. They bring a sense of freedom and clarity to one conversation; just enough to remind you of who you are.
author: Nikki Rowe, Once a Girl, Now a Woman

quote: Be good to everyone you meet.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: They have been having sex for eighteen months now (he realizes he has to make himself stop counting, as if his sexual life is a prison term, and he is working toward its completion).
author: Hanya Yanagihara, A Little Life

quote: When we illuminate the road back to our ancestors, they have a way of reaching out, of manifesting themselves...sometimes even physically.
author: Raquel Cepeda, Bird of Paradise: How I Became Latina

quote: My team and I have reunited two elements that coexist with difficulty: respect and affection, because when they love you they don't respect you and when they respect you they don't love you.
author: Shakira

quote: You cut yourself off from all sorts of experience because you tell yourself you re not 'that sort of person
author: Jojo Moyes, Me Before You

quote: Never question yourself to satisfy the comfort of those living blindly by the false masks of life.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: When your words enter the material world in the form of ink or on screen, you are immediately afforded the opportunity to judge their worth.
author: Chris Matakas, #Human: Learning To Live In Modern Times

quote: To realize your imagination, go with trust in the direction of your destination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If I were omnipotent and omnibenevolent I wouldn't be so damn ineffable.
author: Jo Walton, Among Others

quote: Thought is the greatest of pleasures —pleasure itself is only imagination—have you ever enjoyed anything more than your dreams?
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: I tell you the truth, so many people failed to do what they could have done because of the bitter things that happened in the past.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Religion, Philosophy and life

quote: The new day is almost here, but the old one is still dragging its heavy skirts. Just as ocean water and river water struggle against each other at a river mouth, the old time and the new time clash and blend.
author: Haruki Murakami, After Dark

quote: Be yourself. Love yourself. This is your sacred self.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Those who have FAITH believe that the Sun will Rise. They don’t wake up in the morning and look out to see if the sun has failed them.
author: RVM

quote: Doesn’t it feel great when someone does something nice for you? Especially when you’re not expecting it? The irony is that they are getting as much joy by giving as you are by receiving.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact

quote: Fights were recounted, battles won amid wars sure to be lost; hope was clung to; families were both celebrated and denounced; it was agreed that friends just didn't get it; tears were shed; comfort proffered.
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Anyone who knows me, should learn to know me again;For I am like the Moon,you will see me with new face everyday.
author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quote: I didn't read so much Japanese literature. Because my father was a teacher of Japanese literature, I just wanted to do something else.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: If intelligence is the triumph of life, the spoken word is the marvellous means by which this intelligence is manifested.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The Simple PathSilence is PrayerPrayer is FaithFaith is LoveLove is ServiceThe Fruit of Service is Peace
author: Mother Teresa

quote: For the first time she had dimly realized that only the hopeless are starkly sincere and that only the unhappy can either give or take sympathy--even some of the bitter and dangerous voluptuousness of misery.
author: Jean Rhys

quote: Don’t worry. Cast your anxieties upon the Lord!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Cunning grows in deceit at seeing itself discovered, and tries to deceive with truth itself.
author: Baltasar Gracián, The Art of Worldly Wisdom

quote: They say money talks, but all mine ever says is 'good-bye sucker.
author: Jill Shalvis, Head Over Heels

quote: We don't know what's happened out there since they put us in here, or how many generations have lived and died since they did.We could be the last people left.
author: Veronica Roth, Allegiant

quote: If you are not creative enough to create change change will be creative to create you.
author: ANIKOR Daniel

quote: If we have no heretics we must invent them, for heresy is essential to health and growth.
author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quote: TRUTHWhenever you stand up For your conscience, Be prepared to be hated By the wicked. But never, ever,Let that scare you;For whenever you Stand up for God, By him, You are loved.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: We loved each other with a premature love, marked by a fierceness that so often destroys adult lives.I was a strong lad and survived; but the poison was in the wound, and the wound remained ever open
author: Vladimir Nabokov, Lolita

quote: In desperate love, we always invent the characters of our partners, demanding they be what we need of them, and then feeling devastated when they refuse to perform the role we created in the first place.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Eat, Pray, Love

quote: He specialized in the murder of dreams, Hazel Grace...
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Anything you do, do with love and enthusiasm.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It is not important who the leader is. It's important what and where he/she leads one to.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: He who despises his own life is soon master of another's.
author: English proverb

quote: If, however, I am allowed to think that you and yours feel an interest in my fate and actions, it may be the means—it may put me on my guard—at least, it may be something to live for.
author: Jane Austen, Sense and Sensibility

quote: It is through solitude that you can convert your time into something of value.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: Never look back. The past is done. The future is a blank canvas. Work on creating a masterpiece. Only you have the power to make your painting beautiful.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: With the same habit of mind, even if you live thousands of lives, all will be the same! Get a different habit of mind to get a different life!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Love is perhaps the only emotions that is boundless
author: Santosh Avvannavar, Umbilical Cord

quote: If I am indeed my own god, I’d better start praying to myself to get myself out of myself.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Men of God are not just born, they are formed
author: John Paul Warren

quote: Pegging your contentment to the overall state of the world rather than of your own life: the basis of morality, or a sort of madness?
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Every day I’m convinced that I can’t possibly love you more… and every day I’m proven wrong.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Neither were you [born yesterday], unless of course I am wrong, in which case welcome to the world, little baby, and congratulations on learning to read so early in life.
author: Lemony Snicket, The Penultimate Peril

quote: We are like water, aren’t we? We can be fluid, flexible when we have to be. But strong and destructive, too.” And something else, I think to myself. Like water, we mostly follow the path of least resistance.
author: Wally Lamb, We Are Water

quote: Appreciate her beauty, love her uniqueness and respect her reality.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: You ask me to write you a poem,I pen you an empty ocean,You run away.You ask me who I am,I paint you a breaking sky,You weep in the rain.
author: Jenim Dibie, The Calligraphy of God

quote: Think about the things in life that elicit passion in you and make you happy.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact

quote: We were sent here just to be kind to each other.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Hunters will tell you that a moose is a wily and ferocious forest creature. Nonsense. A moose is a cow drawn by a three-year-old.
author: Bill Bryson, A Walk in the Woods

quote: We must cultivate our heads. But nurture our hearts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Abundance of life does not come from having a great job. Abundance comes from generosity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Nothing stings quite like an unanswered text message.
author: Paula Stokes, The Art of Lainey

quote: Give mea moon-blanket nightto keep me warma long-gone smileto comfort mea pair of rain-blue eyesto haunt mea simple soul...to love me.
author: Sanober  Khan, Turquoise Silence

quote: You are all kinds of beautiful and I love you like crazy.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: And besides, we lovers fear everything
author: Ovid, Metamorphoses

quote: They want the federal government controlling Social Security like it's some kind of federal program.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Those who have little in the way of character do all they can to blend into crowds, as those with Integrity stand alone in Success
author: Bluenscottish

quote: No man is born into the world whose work Is not born with him  there is always work  And tools to work withal  for those who will  And blessed are the horny hands of toil!
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: Innovative leaders today are digital conductors, problem-solvers, and culture influencers.
author: Pearl  Zhu, Unpuzzling Innovation: Mastering Innovation Management in a Structural Way

quote: If you know the why, you can live any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Do not stand at a distance and wave hands. Get closer and hug.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Whenever I feel sad, I just take out my phone and listen to her laughter recorded in my online messenger.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Every worker should know that by working, he is releasing the nature of God in him. He is becoming creative just like God is creative.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Ignore failure. Try anew until you succeed.
author: Tim Fargo, Alphabet Success - Keeping it Simple

quote: Confidence believes you are able. Competence knows you are able.
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: You don't have to close your eyes or even look up to find an answer you just have to want an answer to come, and then ask.
author: Brent M. Jones

quote: Right Now Is the Time to Be Kind You cannot do a kindness too soon  for you never know how soon it will be too late.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Enjolras caught glimpses of a luminous uprising under the dark skirts of the future.
author: Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

quote: I didn't want any degrees if all the ill-read literates and radio announcers and pedagogical dummies I knew had them by the peck.
author: J.D. Salinger, Franny and Zooey

quote: There is not point keeping up with the Joneses if they’re going someplace you don’t want to go.
author: Michael Hyatt, Living Forward: A Proven Plan to Stop Drifting and Get the Life You Want

quote: By nature, we get more pleasure from God's gifts then from Himself.
author: John Piper, When I Don't Desire God: How to Fight for Joy

quote: Writing is supposed to be difficult, agonizing, a dreadful exercise, a terrible occupation.
author: Ray Bradbury, Zen in the Art of Writing

quote: Every pearl of your necklace touches my heart like a fresh flower of joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: An abundance of thinking leads to me, me, me.An abundance of Thanking leads to YOU, YOU, YOU!
author: Raymond D. Longoria Jr.

quote: Manners and politeness will never become old-fashioned.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: A little deed done very well is better than a mighty plan kept on paper, undone. Wishes don't change the world; it's actions that do this business!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: We humans are the gods of this planet. And we also have created Superior Gods than us, to have a sense of security.
author: Abhijit Naskar, What is Mind?

quote: There are things you can't walk away from. Not if you want to live with yourself afterward.
author: Jim Butcher, Death Masks

quote: Patience is the glue that binds hard work and faith.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: If you get so unequal that people believe they don't have a chance, that the field isn't level for them and their children, that puts democracy at risk.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: All of our relationships and our interactions, the life affirming ones and the challenging ones, show us how far we have come and where we still need to go.
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: You really shouldn’t trust a soul in this game. Not when everyone has something to gain or lose.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout, Opal

quote: The only substance that goes in and never leaves, are words
author: Natasha Tsakos

quote: The more I learn about the universe, the less convinced I am that there's any sort of benevolent force that has anything to do with it, at all.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: All precious things discovered lateTo those that seek them issue forth,For Love in sequel works with Fate,And draws the veil from hidden worth
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: I kindly ask you to place your name in 1 Corinthians 13:4-6. And read it out loud. This verse will help you reflect on your own behavior, to become the right type of person for yourself and others.
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quote: Confidence is always the best accessory. Own the moment. Own your space.
author: Andrena Sawyer

quote: An attitude of gratitude fills a heart with happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Make life as a lifelong love affair with yourself.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Being simple is the most complicated thing nowadays!
author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quote: The game itself is bigger than the winning.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Nothing flatters a man as much as the happiness of his wife  he is always proud of himself as the source of it.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: love canembellish its beginningsing its blossomingand engrave its eternitiesbut can never explain its loss.
author: Sanober  Khan

quote: Ah college years, those were the days. Pure freedom ... leaving home for the first time…the parties…”"What about the tutorials, the lectures, the large building with all the books called the ‘library’?”“Is that what those were?” Gerry blithely replied.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri, Brushstrokes of a Gadfly

quote: If your headlight is broken, stop travelling in the darkness! Either you travel with the light or sit tight wherever you are!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: It's not a big thing, but I guess it's true- big things are often just small things that are noticed.
author: Ned Vizzini, It's Kind of a Funny Story

quote: Think independently and critically, but never forget to think with understanding and love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I don't like romance, I don't like sadness. The sadness motion is negative one... as much you are sad as more deeper you go and you want to return the thing which you can't.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: The greatest energy must be use for work.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I write because I want express
author: Anamika Mishra

quote: May the Lord grant you great grace, great strength and great wisdom.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Generally music feedeth that disposition of the spirits which it findeth.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: I refuse to answer that question on the grounds that I don't know the answer
author: Douglas Adams

quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying. There is no defeat except from within, no really insurmountable barrier save our own inherent weakness of purpose.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Don't let the lies that darken our world keep you from living within your truth.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: Those who grant sympathy to guilt, grant none to innocence.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Night-time is being brushed aside like so much cobweb. The day is wound up and begins even before the last haunted dreams, the last of the fog, those spectral and evanescent residues, have faded away.
author: Gregory Maguire

quote: Goals are important but what you become to achieve goals is much more important.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: True contemplation is not a psychological trick but a theological grace. It can come to us ONLY as a gift, and not as a result of our own clever use of spiritual techniques.
author: Thomas Merton, Contemplative Prayer

quote: The secret to unseating great power, is not to move the other direction, but to compete directly against their goals.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Stand firm. Stand tall.You are a tower of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: We are force-fed beliefs through incessant advertisements by a culture that ceaselessly fosters our conformity to values which are of no service to the individual.
author: Chris Matakas, The Tao of Jiu Jitsu

quote: I think of my pile of old paperbacks, their pages gone wobbly, like they'd once belonged to the sea.
author: Kazuo Ishiguro, Never Let Me Go

quote: No one wants to get hurt but without pain how can we win?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: God is the creator of all good plot twists!
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Read to refresh your mind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The relationship between parents and children, but especially between mothers and daughters, is tremendously powerful, scarcely to be comprehended in any rational way.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: You’re a mess, I confess, I despise you in the best kind of way.
author: Coco J. Ginger

quote: Freedom is not reserved for those unwilling to fight for it.
author: Ben Carson

quote: Success is the greatest teacher for future success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You need to see a future with such clarity and desirability that you will go through all the uncomfortable things like throws at you to attain it.
author: Michael Hyatt, Living Forward: A Proven Plan to Stop Drifting and Get the Life You Want

quote: Go thy way, and tell my people, the people of thy Lord God what manner of things, and how great wonders of the Lord thy God, thou hast seen.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Wisdom.... comes not from age, but from education and learning.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: May you let the authentic colors of your heart illuminate and may you feel the light within others.
author: Leta B., Your Steady Soul: May you transform your pain, anger, and hurt into wisdom, kindness, and love.

quote: I believe that which you study is only matched in importance by the sincerity with which you approach it.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Continued Education Through Jiu Jitsu

quote: Beauty is in the reflection of your love that is always present in your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Allow your pain to cleanse you and burn away what needs to die.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: She wished she liked him more.She wished she loved him less.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: Extrapolating from the statistical growth of the legal profession, by the year 2035 every single person in the United States will be a lawyer, including newborn infants.
author: Michael Crichton, State of Fear

quote: If God knows the number of hairs on your head he already knew where you will go after you're dead
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: All the elements of greater emotional awareness can weave together to ensure you make a more positive impact.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Preparation: 8 Ways to Plan with Purpose & Intention for Positive Impact

quote: Once she had loved Prince Joffrey with all her heart, and admired and trusted her his mother, the queen. They had repaid that love and trust with her father's head. Sansa would never make that mistake again.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Clash of Kings

quote: We can assist other souls’ hearts and make their world brighter when they are traveling through a difficult experience not by lowering ourselves to their level of sadness but by lifting them up with the light of our joy.
author: Molly Friedenfeld

quote: Take action! An inch of movement will bring you closer to your goals than a mile of intention.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: If I had time, I would become timeless.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova, The New Land

quote: Your medicine is in you, and you do not observe it. Your ailment is from yourself, and you do not register it.
author: Idries Shah, The Way of the Sufi

quote: [I]t is that we are too apt to despise what appears to be neither good nor beautiful, and thus we lose what is helpful and salutary.
author: George Sand, La Petite Fadette

quote: Some old and unrealized ideas will undoubtedly be actualized when their time comes.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: There's something about death that is comforting. The thought that you could die tomorrow frees you to appreciate your life now.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: The unity of Nigeria will only come if we overcome and overgrow tribe, materialism and selfish human nature.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: I allow my inner joy wellspring to be unbounded and free, to power me up, and to keep me radiantly healthy!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Like most people on the planet I have experienced moments when a friend’s, or just a stranger’s, warm cheering up was like a gulp of oxygen essential for survival.
author: Sahara Sanders

quote: Impulsive passion please set me free.
author: Delano Johnson, Love Quotes

quote: Part of my driving desire as a pastor is to remove every obstacle except the cross that would keep people from coming to faith in Christ.
author: Mark Batterson

quote: Believing you're something that you're not excites the mind and the imagination. And it's hopeful.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: You’re going to make something wonderful of yourself. I promise.You’re doing just fine.
author: Charlotte Eriksson, You're Doing Just Fine

quote: The travel impulse is mental and physical curiosity. It's a passion. And I can't understand people who don't want to travel.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Mma Ramotswe tucked the cheque safely away in her bodice. Modern business methods were all very well, she thought, but when it came to the safeguarding of money there were some places which had yet to be bettered.
author: Alexander McCall Smith, Morality for Beautiful Girls

quote: At the time, my life just seemed too complete, and maybe we have to break everything to make something better out of ourselves.
author: Chuck Palahniuk, Fight Club

quote: She was weak and helpless, shaken in mind and nerve. It was to take her at a disadvantage to obtrude love upon her at such a time.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle, The Sign of Four

quote: Library science was the foundation of all sciences.
author: Robert A. Heinlein, Have Space Suit—Will Travel

quote: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
author: William Penn

quote: I never stopped loving you, Ronnie. And I never stopped thinking about you. Even if summers do come to an end.
author: Nicholas Sparks, The Last Song

quote: Let us grow together, not to become older, to love each other better.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: He was one of the numerous and varied legion of dullards, of half-animated abortions, conceited, half-educated coxcombs, who attach themselves to the idea most in fashion only to vulgarize it and who caricature every cause they serve, however sincerely.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Crime and Punishment

quote: Moral action – humble and honest – is the tribute that power must at some point pay to reason.
author: Ron Suskind, The Way of the World: A Story of Truth and Hope in an Age of Extremism

quote: I was a normal person, living in a rough area with a foreign mother, I endured it and came out of the other side to help hundreds of thousands of people worldwide to change their lives just like I had mine.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Liberty is rendered even more precious by the recollection of servitude.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: All tyranny needs to gain a foothold is for people of good conscience to remain silent.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Once you say you're going to settle for second  that's what happens to you.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Let us live  while we are alive!
author: Johann von Goethe

quote: They made for his noise far quicker than he had expected. They were frightfully angry. Quite apart from the stones no spider has ever like being called Attercop, and Tomnoddy of course, is insulting to anybody.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Hobbit

quote: There is nothing that can defeat you if it does not first capture your mind.
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: A person is an entity of a sort to which the only proper and adequate way to relate is love.
author: John Paul II, Love and Responsibility

quote: Piglet noticed that even though he had a Very Small Heart, it could hold a rather large amount of Gratitude.
author: A.A. Milne, Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: But death is stronger than that and when you cover your eyes you are the one who can't see the dark. The dark still sees you.
author: Francesca Lia Block, The Elementals

quote: Every relationship is governed by motive, capability and reliability and these three factors become the core components of the trust equation
author: David Amerland, The Tribe That Discovered Trust: How Trust Is Created Lost and Regained in Commercial Interactions

quote: When starting out, don’t worry about not having enough money. Limited funds are a blessing, not a curse. Nothing encourages creative thinking in quite the same way.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Man can have faith without religion, but religion cannot have faith without man.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: You never know, until it happens, what you will owe the dead.
author: Zadie Smith, The Autograph Man

quote: when man determined to destroy himself he picked the was of shall and finding only why smashed it into because
author: E.E. Cummings, 100 Selected Poems

quote: Life is ever changing.We are ever transforming.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Outer beauty is transient, but the inner beauty of a kind heart gets brighter with time. Be kind and get prettier forever.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Happiness is not being pained in body  or troubled in mind.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: A castle of defense, a bastion of mightA fort where the wise teach the young to fightAn armory of weapons, sharp as hooksAre wrapped in leather and shelved as books
author: Shannon Hale, The Forgotten Sisters

quote: Nature is my manifestation of God. I go to nature every day for inspiration in the day's work.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Role models are only of limited use. For no-one is as important, potentially powerful and as key in your life and world as you.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: I cannot remember you when the rain flows down -I cannot remember youandmy heart begins to drown ...
author: Muse

quote: And somewhereout there,in the river ofaddicts, alcoholics,wife beaters,doormats,overeducated legalized thieves,fascist police,and bitter rivalries—someone told meit’s a good city,and I don’t knowwhat’s more frightening
author: Phil Volatile, White Wedding Lies, and Discontent: An American Love Story

quote: The way of a superior man is threefold: Virtuous  he is free from anxieties  wise  he is free from perplexities  bold  he is free from fear.
author: Confucius

quote: If you see oppression, violence, injustice and evil deeds, unzip your silence and uncaring indifference, do something and act against all these unethical instances." ~ Angelica Hopes, an excerpt from my novel, If I Could Tell You
author: Angelica Hopes

quote: And so you prefer her faults to other people’s perfections?
author: Anne Brontë, The Tenant of Wildfell Hall

quote: God plans every sacred purpose for a sacred time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Anyone who says he knows God's intention is showing a lot of very human ego.
author: Michael Crichton, Next

quote: The seed of the gift may come, but a seedling that isn't nourished dies quickly.
author: Mary E. Pearson, The Kiss of Deception

quote: Great faith surfaces in great problems - have faith
author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Through Faith: Living an Overcoming Life

quote: Nowadays, using a computer has become a way of life.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: Love is still alive in my heart. Dreams are still alive at the dead of night. Hopes are still dancing in my mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Building a family is an entrepreneurial experience. No doubt about it. The family is the greatest and most important enterprise on earth. Lead yours with passion and joy!
author: Richie Norton

quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappoint you.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Knowledge will reveal its value only when we use it to gain wisdom through experience.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Happiness is the goal of all goals and ultimate purpose of our life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Complaining is a complete waste of one's energy. Those who complain the most accomplish the least.
author: Robert Tew

quote: Marriage, n.: The state or condition of a community consisting of a master, a mistress and two slaves, making in all, two.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Imagination, persistence, perseverance, and trust transform dreams into reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I wish you great fun with your sacred adventure.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: right in this moment, I can´t even remember what unhappy feels like.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, Shiver

quote: In deep silence, close your eyes and let your heart fly by spreading those wings of love in an unknown sky.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When this world is full of fashion, be unique by reflecting your own style.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To live in peace and righteousness is to be restored to God’s dominion
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I wonder that religion can live or die on the strength of a faint, stirring breeze. The scent trail shifts, causing the predator to miss the pounce. One god draws in the breath of life and rises; another god expires.
author: Barbara Kingsolver, The Poisonwood Bible

quote: We have largely lost sight of the holiness and purity of God today. This is one reason why we tolerate sin so easily.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: I'd prefer to be alone by myself,than alone in a room full of people.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Love and self are one and the discovery of either is the realization of both
author: Leo Buscaglia, Love

quote: Wherever we look, the work of the chemist has raised the level of our civilization and has increased the productive capacity of our nation.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: You gotta be careful: don't say a word to nobody about nothing anytime ever.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: Loving someone can be hard at times. You risk a lot when you love - your heart and soul, at the least. Love is the most important and most rewarding investment you can make in another person.
author: J.E.B. Spredemann, A Secret of the Heart

quote: He who fears a positive purposeful change fears growth.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, The Untapped Wonderer in You: Dare to Do the Undone

quote: Intelligence entails a strong mind, but genius entails a heart of a lion in tune with a strong mind.
author: Criss Jami, Diotima, Battery, Electric Personality

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: He who reigns within himself and rules his passions  desires  and fears is more than a king.
author: John Milton

quote: You disregard God when you disregard His people
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Wealth ... is a relative thing since he that has little and wants less is richer than he that has much but wants more.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: The Gospel of God is the Good News.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A man never knows how to say goodbye a woman never knows when to say it.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: I think there are some who live on a knife-edge in the soul, and at times are driven to hurl themselves into the air, at the mercy of heaven or he'll which way to fall.
author: Ellis Peters, A Morbid Taste for Bones

quote: You might sooner get lightning out of incense smoke than true action or passion out of your modern English religion.
author: John Ruskin

quote: For masterpieces are not single and solitary births; they are the outcome of many years of thinking in common, of thinking by the body of the people, so that the experience of the mass is behind the single voice.
author: Virginia Woolf, A Room of One's Own

quote: A broken vessel cannot hold anything within itself, therefore only something supernatural can hold itself within a broken vessel.
author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quote: Don't wait until it's too late to tell someone how much you love, how much you care.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: There are certain kinds of silence that make you walk on air.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: Goals should be broken down into parts, and then think over the plan of their implementation
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Reach for the stars, not your fears.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Jealousy is that pain which a man feels from the apprehension that he is not equally beloved by the person whom he entirely loves.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: There is something about the state putting the power to bully into the hands of subnormal, sadistic apes that makes my blood boil.
author: Gore Vidal, Death in the Fifth Position

quote: If I had permitted my failures, or what seemed to me at the time a lack of success, to discourage me I cannot see any way in which I would ever have made progress.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: It is painfully easy to define human beings. They are beings who, for no good reason at all, create their own unnecessary suffering.
author: Sōseki Natsume, I am a Cat III

quote: Rank and status do not represent power when surrounded by negativity.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Chemistry is great, but eventually your relationship moves out of the laboratory.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: As a Christian, my highest calling is not motherhood; my highest calling is to follow Christ.
author: Rachel Held Evans, A Year of Biblical Womanhood

quote: Nothing thicker than a knife's blade separates happiness from melancholy.
author: Virginia Woolf, Orlando

quote: ... where there's one there's ten.'That's crazy math.
author: Emma Donoghue, Room

quote: Any constituency that needs amending, is a prototype in error.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: When you come back you will not be you. And I may not be I.
author: E.M. Forster, The Life to Come and Other Stories

quote: By one fact, the Self [Soul] is the creator [of new karma]. From another fact, the Self [Soul] is not the creator.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: You were made by God and for God and until you understand that, life will never make sense.
author: Rick Warren

quote: Marriage is about compromise; it's about doing something for the other person, even when you don't want to.
author: Nicholas Sparks, The Wedding

quote: It took a moment to right himself, and he pulled his shoulders back as he regained his equilibrium. He didn't want to be half asleep the first time he kissed Ellie. For that, he wanted to be wide awake.
author: Jennifer E. Smith, This Is What Happy Looks Like

quote: You've got no sense of humor.""I'm going to laugh really hard after I kick your ass.
author: J.D. Robb, Imitation in Death

quote: When you are motivated by the kindness and wellbeing of humanity, then nothing can scare or derail you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Man alone is born crying, lives complaining, and dies disappointed.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: If you truly love who you are other's opinions won’t even matter.
author: Carlos Wallace, Life Is Not Complicated-You Are: Turning Your Biggest Disappointments Into Your Greatest Blessings

quote: Until you actually possess true peace with God, no one can describe its wonders to you.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: My name is David Charleston.I kill people with super powers.
author: Brandon Sanderson, Firefight

quote: Some people are so positive, that when they slip in dog poop, they pirouette
author: Josh Stern, And That's Why I'm Single: What Good Is Having A Lucky Horseshoe Up Your Butt When The Horse Is Still Attached?

quote: People shouldn’t be ashamed of what they are. And it will help them, to gain self esteem and confidence.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: Knowing the path through the forest doesn't make the trip any less daunting. Knowing the steps to your dreams doesn't make the climb any less of a challenge.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: The law of love could be best understood and learned through little children.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The family exists for many reasons, but its most basic function may be to draw together after a member dies.
author: Stephen King

quote: Listen, I would say, this is not how I thought our lives would go; and maybe we cannot find our way out of this alley. But there is no one I'd rather be lost with.
author: Jodi Picoult, My Sister's Keeper

quote: Some parts of life are lived in the shadows where the only sunlight you feel is the light you pray for.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: Like Jesus, forgive those who are hurting you because they don't know what they are doing.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A child is not to blame for being immersed in a certain environment and handed down complexes
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: True enough. I say this all the time.Trez looked at his hands. “I didn’t ask for this.”“No one asks for life.” The executioner hiked iAm’s body up higher. “And sometimes they do not ask for death...
author: J.R. Ward, The Shadows

quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgment that something is more important than fear.
author: Meg Cabot, The Princess Diaries

quote: An empowered organisation is one in which individuals have the knowledge, skill, desire, and opportunity to personally succeed in a way that leads to collective organisational success.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Step out of the crowd of average people. Enter that game and change the values on the scoreboard.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Dream Big!: See Your Bigger Picture!

quote: The difference between impossible and possible is a willing heart.
author: Lolly Daskal, Thoughts Spoken From The Heart

quote: A lot of people pray for power, house, financial breakthrough, wealth etc. But only few ask God for wisdom. There are so many great power pack man and women of God who lack wisdom.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: Once you have seen his face you will forever long to see it again.
author: Max Lucado, God Came Near

quote: Morality cannot replace goodness.Knowledge cannot replace wisdom.Fame cannot replace honor.Pleasure cannot replace contentment.Passion cannot replace love.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: May you find love, joy and hope at Christmas and every day of your life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Set yourself earnestly to see what you are made to do, and then set yourself earnestly to do it.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: Realize that your life situation will never line up perfectly for you to start a business.
author: Ehab Atalla, The Secrets of Business

quote: Enemies,' the wizard said, 'are the price of honour.
author: Terry Goodkind, Debt of Bones

quote: Marriage is the only adventure open to the cowardly.
author: Voltaire

quote: I must be dreaming. Bring that sweet ass over here and I'll show you what God made women and well-hung Scotsmen for.
author: Karen Marie Moning, Shadowfever

quote: A bird is safe in its nest - but that is not what its wings are made for.
author: Amit Ray, World Peace: The Voice of a Mountain Bird

quote: Time is a structured perception towards observable changes.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: We live in such a special time when literally anything we can think of is possible.
author: Daniel Willey

quote: The opportunity to do what is right is available at all times.
author: Jim George

quote: You are a beautiful, timeless, strong, eternal, blessed soul.
author: Catherine Carrigan, Unlimited Intuition NOW

quote: The ego romanticizes the past to avoid the true romance of the present.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: I need drama in my life to keep making music.
author: Eminem

quote: Every day we have a choice - either to spread love and peace or to spread hate and war! And each one of us must choose love and peace each time and every time!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: There is nothing like young love. It comes at a time before the heart knows to protect itself, when everything important is raw and exposed—the perfect environment for a soul-sucking, heart-crushing burst.
author: Alessandra Torre, The Ghostwriter

quote: The great writings interact with one another. They cannot be read in isolation..
author: Richard J. Foster, Celebration of Discipline: The Path to Spiritual Growth

quote: Like “love,” “hope” is one of those ridiculously disproportional words that by all rights should be a lot longer.
author: Jim Butcher, Turn Coat

quote: Rejoice and be glad, you have life, the greatest gift.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I believe that one key to success is to accept truth, no matter how it's spoken.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Only my heart can see your love and only my soul can feel your touch.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you look into the mirror, you can’t even see your heart; but when God looks at your shadow, He sees your soul.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Believe in the power of dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Fear of failure prevents you from realising your dreams of success.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: God is everything I ever needed.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The truth is that the world doesn't have much use or respect for "do nothing" people. Can you really blame them?
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: If one departs from the bliss of the Eternal, he will come across the happiness that is obtained from the temporary.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Definitions are the guardians of rationality, the first line of defense against the chaos of mental disintegration.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The intention to be absolutely truthful and the willingness to put the benefit of all before personal benefit hold the power to change the world.
author: Ilchi Lee, Change: Realizing Your Greatest Potential

quote: I wanted to cry so bad, but my tears are inside. A blindfold keeps them there. I can’t see today. Patti, I don’t know anything.
author: Patti Smith, Just Kids

quote: Cutting out drama... Healthy mind and body choices... Intent followed by action... Keeping real friends and letting go of the pretends... Livin' clean for Twenty Seventeen!
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The basic stimulus to the intelligence is doubt, a feeling that the meaning of an experience is not self-evident.
author: W.H. Auden, Selected Essays

quote: One does not inhabit a country; one inhabits a language. That is our country, our fatherland - and no other.
author: Emil M. Cioran

quote: To forgive, we may need to open our minds to a fuller exploration of the context in which the events occurred, and feel compassion for the circumstances and everyone involved, starting with ourselves.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: There are many ways to manifest, but the most effective and joyous creators all create in the space of love.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: You can, and you will. If you’re going to carry any belief, carry one that empowers you. Believe in your unlimited potential.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: Why can we throw a question further than we can pull in an answer?
author: Yann Martel

quote: Really, I protest--what is left for the satirical mind to invent when reality so surpasses it?
author: Jude Morgan, An Accomplished Woman

quote: Intelligence, integrity and courage are the great pillars that support the State. Above all, the citizens of a free nation should honor the brave and independent man - the man of stainless integrity, of will and intellectual force.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: When you choose being a loving soul, and give proper attention to your dreams without using your own will power, then you are in a process of creating a range of experiences which flow into your life harmoniously.
author: Hina Hashmi, Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: It's all about sex and territory,which are what will finish us offin the long run.
author: Margaret Atwood, Morning in the Burned House

quote: This is why they started us here so young: to give ourselves away before the age when the questions 'why' and 'to what' grow real beaks and claws.
author: David Foster Wallace, Infinite Jest

quote: No man and woman know what will be born in the darkness of their intermingling; so much besides children, so many invisible births, exchanges of soul and character, blossoming of unknown selves, liberation of hidden treasures, buried fantasies...
author: Anaïs Nin, The Four-Chambered Heart: V3 in Nin's Continuous Novel

quote: Humility puts others first because "first" takes on new meaning through the practice of humility.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: If a rare golden heart is sacrificed in the process of trying to research or help many, then the world loses.
author: Leta B., Your Steady Soul: May you transform your pain, anger, and hurt into wisdom, kindness, and love.

quote: Even the weakest disputant is made so conceited by what he calls religion, as to think himself wiser than the wisest who think differently from him.
author: Walter Savage Landor

quote: Whoever risks, shall know how far they can reach.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Imagination is the connecting of disparate things in novel ways.
author: R.A.Delmonico

quote: A person with a large tuber of self-pride remains engrossed in the fear of, ‘Someone is going to insult me…someone is going to insult me’ or ‘From where can I get respect? From where can I get the respect?
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Belief driven by determination is one key factor governing whether what you pursue becomes real or not.
author: Steven Redhead, The Solution

quote: But, said Alice, if the world has absolutely no sense, who's stopping us from inventing one?
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: The wretch, concentred all in self,Living, shall forfeit fair renown,And, doubly dying, shall go downTo the vile dust, from whence he sprung,Unwept, unhonored, and unsung.
author: Walter Scott, The Lay of the Last Minstrel 1805

quote: Almost everything comes from almost nothing.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: He had threatened my parents. I had to remember that. Still, it was really hard to stay mad at a wounded naked man.
author: Darynda Jones, Third Grave Dead Ahead

quote: Our men think earning money and ordering around others is where power lies. They don't think power is in the hands of the woman who takes care of everyone all day long, and gives birth to their children.
author: Malala Yousafzai, I Am Malala: The Story of the Girl Who Stood Up for Education and Was Shot by the Taliban

quote: Foresight of phenomenon and power over them depend on knowledge of their sequences, and not upon any notion we may have formed respecting their origin or inmost nature.
author: John Stuart Mill, Auguste Comte And Positivism

quote: Just think how many thousands of years nature has spent sculpting rocks for us! I can tell you, I have learned that just because it was that way yesterday, it does not mean that it should be that way tomorrow.
author: Stephen Richards, Ask and the Universe Will Provide: A Straightforward Guide to Manifesting Your Dreams

quote: Sarah, honey, I hardly think kidnappers are going to take the time to buy a memento of their stay. I could be wrong, but it seems rather unlikely.
author: Christine Feehan, Magic in the Wind

quote: Safety is not a destination that we reach for, rather it is a retreat that we escape to. And if our lives are marked by the incessant search for safety, we will live the whole of it going in reverse.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Truth... has no obligation to console you.
author: Osho

quote: Sometimes hope is like wearing someone else’s coat. You know it can shield and protect you, just as it did them, but it still doesn’t feel right. You’re just not used to it.
author: Karina Halle, Before I Ever Met You

quote: Our brains want God even as our minds debunk the divine.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Pagan Standard Times: Essays on the Craft

quote: May you find new strength to accomplish your daily work.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Because if you take a risk, you just might find what you're looking for.
author: Susane Colasanti, Take Me There

quote: A man's world is different from a woman's world and a man's emotions are different from a woman's emotions and only marriage can bring the two different sets of emotions together properly.
author: Sylvia Plath, The Bell Jar

quote: A powerful church is capable of transforming our world to God’s kingdom standard
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To submit to a dominion is to pursue relationship with the King of that domain
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Becoming a man means doing the right thing even though it may be hard or difficult. Boys do what is easiest. A man does what is right, whether easy or not.
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift

quote: Age shouldn't affect you. It's just like the size of your shoes - they don't determine how you live your life! You're either marvellous or you're boring, regardless of your age.
author: Morrissey

quote: Don’t be lazy. Hard work brings happiness. There is no other time to avoid being a lazy. Take that decision now. Kick laziness out.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Shaping the dream

quote: Proverbs and truisms are for this reason dangerous, because they produce blindness or non-thought.
author: Idries Shah

quote: When you discover your own self, you will see that same infinite potential in your lover’s eyes.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: Draw: For the most part, a draw occurs when it appears that neither side will win.
author: Kenya Wright, Bad for You 2

quote: Do not be deceived that you are weak because you have forgiven; instead be rest assured that you are now showing great strength - after all, forgiving is one of the most difficult things to do.
author: Stephen Richards, The Pain You Feel Today Is The Strength You Feel Tomorrow

quote: The first duty of any Christian is to know God and the wisdom of His Word to the utmost
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Often we can help each other most by leaving each other alone  at other times we need the hand-grasp and the word of cheer.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Fear was stronger than the calculation of probabilities.
author: George Eliot, Middlemarch

quote: Men work together,' I told him from the heart,'Whether they work together or apart.
author: Robert Frost, The Tuft of Flowers

quote: Pride and power fall when the person falls, but discoveries of truth form legacies that can be built upon for generations.
author: Criss Jami, Venus in Arms

quote: Knowingly or unknowingly, our past disappointments guide us positively and or negatively in our present day journey of life, based on how we see and use the lessons from our past!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Religion, Philosophy and life

quote: There is no replay of yesterday.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I lost my balance when the train pulled away, but a human crumple zone buffered my fall. We stayed like that, half fallen. Diagonal People.
author: David Mitchell, Cloud Atlas

quote: To attract pure love, love yourself passionately.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Happiness doesn't have to be chased...it merely has to be chosen.
author: Mandy Hale, The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: The dead know everything but they don't give a damn.
author: Joanne Harris, Runemarks

quote: You may follow the footstepsThe whole day will passWith you going around in circlesYet not reaching anywhere at last!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: I'm such a good lover because I practice a lot on my own.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Wisdom holds a candle to experience, but you've got to take the candle and walk alone.
author: Lauren Kate, Teardrop

quote: TimeYou were the oneI wanted mostto stay.But time could notbe kept at bay.The more it goes,the more it's gone—the more it takes away.
author: Lang Leav, Lullabies

quote: With every sunrise, I wake up with a deep driving desire to enhance the beauty of my life by becoming happy and joyful. I have found that when I am happy, everything around me dances with joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your instinct is your divine being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I once sent a dozen of my friends a telegram saying 'flee at once - all is discovered.' They all left town immediately.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I don't want to lose you because of the f**ked-up way I found you.
author: Gayle Forman, I Was Here

quote: Hope dreams into being what is possible but not yet formed.
author: Sharon Weil, ChangeAbility: How Artists, Activists, and Awakeners Navigate Change

quote: Wisdom begins in knowing the self.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Patience pays off, success and miracle, often in a very big way.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.
author: Michelangelo

quote: When I was 16... I worked in a pet store. And they fired me because... they had three snakes in there, and one day I braided them.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Searching outside of you is Samsara (the world). Searching within you leads to Nirvana.
author: Amit Ray, Yoga and Vipassana: An Integrated Life Style

quote: In my mind I lead a phantom's life. My neighbor makes me real.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Loyalty to petrified opinion never yet broke a chain or freed a human soul.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Win over the fear and adversity and prove yourself wrong.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I'll quote the truth wherever I find it, thank you.
author: Richard Bach, Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah

quote: Rachel: You're a half-blood, too?Annabeth: Shhh! Just announce it to the world, how about?Rachel: Okay. Hey, everybody! These two aren't human! They're half Greek god!...They don't seem to care.
author: Rick Riordan, The Battle of the Labyrinth

quote: These days we have Smartphones, Smartcars, Smartboards, Smarteverything, but consider this: if technology is getting smarter, does that mean humans are getting dumber?
author: Rebecca McNutt

quote: The encapsulated bird your conspirators sent you to fetch. The sterilized male chicken with the Creator DNA sequences. The plot capon. Where is it?
author: Charles Stross, Saturn's Children

quote: If your best friends do not read books, they read you.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: How could he mean so much to me in such a short time?
author: E.L. James, Fifty Shades of Grey

quote: We simply can’t feel fulfilled by love we pay for.
author: Delano Johnson, Love Quotes

quote: If we understand each other, we can live together in harmony.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Excellence is a way of life.
author: Bohdi Sanders, Modern Bushido: Living a Life of Excellence

quote: Failure is only a step towards success.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Disturbing anything [situation] results in damage. To improve, you do not need to disturb anything that is natural and has turned bad. You need to make way out; you need to find a solution.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: It's not the best life in the world, but it's all I know.
author: Shannon A. Thompson, November Snow

quote: The trouble with lying and deceiving is that their efficiency depends entirely upon a clear notion of the truth that the liar and deceiver wishes to hide.
author: Hannah Arendt

quote: You know you’re successful when your wants and needs are in harmony with your current situation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don't worry, I plan on living a long time.""Why are you making a bucket list, then?""Because if you wait until you're really dying, it's too late.
author: Gayle Forman, Just One Day

quote: Oh, my goodness,” said Louisiana. “I’m just all filled up with feathers and regrets. And fears. I have a lot of fears.
author: Kate DiCamillo, Raymie Nightingale

quote: Like a feather in the air, like a leaf in the sea, I surrender to Thee, I surrender to Thee.
author: RVM

quote: At present nothing is possible except to extend the area of sanity little by little. We cannot act collectively. We can only spread our knowledge outwards from individual to individual, generation after generation.
author: George Orwell, 1984

quote: Proclaim human equality as loudly as you like, Witless will serve his brother.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: You be the sun, I'll be the moon, let's share the stars and dance in the sky.
author: Karen Quan, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: Inspiration shouldn't respond to time, rather the other way around. Time must be altered to inspiration, "Timing is wrong" NO! Timing is never wrong. Sacrifice and the likes gets thrown in at this point.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: Setting sail using different moral compasses causes a relationship to go in circles.
author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quote: No wires tender even as nervescan transmit the impact ofour seasons, our catastropheswhile we are closed inside them
author: Margaret Atwood, The Animals in That Country

quote: You cannot grant amnesty. If the American people see us granting amnesty they will never again believe in legal immigration. They will never again support it, and that's wrong for our country, bad for our future.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: More than at any other time, when I hold a beloved book in my hand my limitations fall from me, my spirit is free.
author: Helen Keller, Midstream: My Later Life

quote: A pearl never loses its value, not even when covered with dirt.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Always start your day with positive thoughts and attitude of gratitude.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If it weren't for music, I would think that love is mortal.
author: Mark Helprin, A Soldier of the Great War

quote: If you study of scriptures, you find sacredness of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Inside the museums, | Infinity goes up on trial | Voices echo this is what salvation must be like after a while
author: Bob Dylan

quote: I shall look at you out of the corner of my eye, and you will say nothing. Words are the source of misunderstandings.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Life is school.Be a student for life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Always look ahead with great hope and believe in timeless possibilities.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The worst of all fears is the fear of living.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The fly that doesn't want to be swatted is most secure when it lights on the fly-swatter.
author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quote: Simplify your life. You don't grow spiritual, you shrink spiritual.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Never give up but never forget to grow up.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you want to get anywhere in religion, you got to keep it sweet.
author: Flannery O'Connor, Wise Blood

quote: Though fervent was our vow,Though ruddily ran our pleasure,Bliss has fulfilled its measure,And sees its sentence now.Ache deep; but make no moans:Smile out; but stilly suffer:The paths of love are rougherThan thoroughfares of stones.
author: Thomas Hardy, The Complete Poems

quote: I always wondered why God was supposed to be a father," she whispers. Fathers always want you to measure up to something. Mothers are the ones who love you unconditionally, don't you think?
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: The winner's edge is not in a gifted birth, a high IQ, or in talent. The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude. Attitude is the criterion for success.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: It is necessary to understand who you are
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We talk a lot here about grit and self-control. The kids know what those words mean
author: Malcolm Gladwell, Outliers: The Story of Success

quote: Excellence encourages one about life generally it shows the spiritual wealth of the world.
author: George Eliot

quote: I wonder if you can refuse to inherit the world.
author: Bill Watterson, The Essential Calvin and Hobbes: A Calvin and Hobbes Treasury

quote: He had become, after all, her home.
author: Lauren Groff, Fates and Furies

quote: Set a goal to achieve something that's so big so exhilarating that excites you & scares you at the same time.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: Dare to think the unimaginable, imagine the unthinkable, dream of that which will never happen, yet continue to aspire and to test the limits of your very being and those around you.
author: Mark W. Boyer

quote: If many good things have not happened in your life, God is not to be blamed
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: the girl with a moustache" they called me every now and then"It's about time you wax your arms" those who "cared" saidI faced the fears of the dreaded thread on my faceTo succumb every other week to the world's ways
author: Sanhita Baruah

quote: I have never thought, for my part, that man's freedom consists in his being able to do whatever he wills, but that he should not, by any human power, be forced to do what is against his will.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau, Reveries of the Solitary Walker

quote: My proceeds from the PayPal acquisition were $180 million. I put $100 million in SpaceX, $70m in Tesla, and $10m in Solar City. I had to borrow money for rent.
author: Elon Musk

quote: If I'm walking on thin ice, I might as well dance my way across.
author: Mercedes Lackey

quote: Gavin's Law: Live to start. Start to live.
author: Richie Norton, The Power of Starting Something Stupid: How to Crush Fear, Make Dreams Happen, and Live without Regret

quote: The days we shared I alone would remember now.I suddenly felt less real.
author: Robin Hobb, Royal Assassin

quote: Can you do it? When the time comes? When the time comes there will be no time. Now is the time. Curse God and die.
author: Cormac McCarthy, The Road

quote: She loves me like the star loves the sky.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: I am never long  even in the society of her I love  without yearning for the company of my lamp and my library.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Sadness is not out there. It's inside you. Sadness is often a misperception and false interpretation of a situation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I don't pray because it doesn't work. Prayer doesn't fix anything. Bad things happen anyway.
author: Nicholas Sparks, Three Weeks With My Brother

quote: May find the right road to travel on.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I love you with so much of my heart that none is left to protest.
author: William Shakespeare, Much Ado About Nothing

quote: There’s no stronger bulwark of sound conservatism than the evangelical church, and no better place to make friends who’ll help you to gain your rightful place in the community than in your own church-home!
author: Sinclair Lewis, Babbitt

quote: Joy is the holy fire that keeps our purpose warm and our intelligence aglow.
author: Helen Keller

quote: See mirror, every time you will miss me and look deeper into your eyes till you will find me.
author: Santosh Kalwar, Quote Me Everyday

quote: I never speak in silence.
author: Anthony T Hincks

quote: Be kind! Go and burn the world with the fire of your love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Do not cry over the past mistakes. Laugh over the events in time. Make things right now.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Can the sarcasm,' he said. 'Please, I always use fresh sarcasm, never canned.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton, Circus of the Damned

quote: Those who have made it to the top have only done so through hard work and time conversion.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: Get scared later, and if you're scared now remember what Kit always said. If you're not scared, she told me, it's not bravery. And you want to be brave, don't you, Snicket?
author: Lemony Snicket, Shouldn't You Be in School?

quote: Love is not necessary for sex.
author: Patricia Briggs, Dragon Blood

quote: Unhappiness comes when we feel helpless. Hope comes the minute we decide we are not.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: Love is a spark of light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I never exactly made a book. It's rather like taking dictation. I was given things to say.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: ...don’t judge your future based on others’ mistakes.
author: Rachel Vincent, My Soul to Take

quote: Diazapam (that's valium), temazepam, lithium, ECT, HRT - how long must I stay on this stuff? Don't give me anymore!
author: Morrissey

quote: Leaders don't pray to God to fill their potholes. They ask God for shovels so they can do it by His grace. Pray practically.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

quote: May the Lord give you your heart desires.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: God cannot be realized through the intellect. Intellect can lead one to a certain extent and no further. It is a matter of faith and experience derived from that faith.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Jesus demonstrated the importance of prayer by His own example. His whole ministry was saturated with prayer.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: When you live life connected to purpose, you don't have to chase opportunities, they come to you.
author: Sue Fitzmaurice

quote: The past is called the past for a reason. If you are constantly looking behind you, your eyes aren't on the road ahead. You don't drive the car that way, so why should you live your life that way?
author: Rachel Van Dyken, The Bet

quote: We are never so happy nor so unhappy as we imagine.
author: La Rochefoucauld

quote: Love! Love until the night collapses!
author: Pablo Neruda, Machu Picchu

quote: Pessimism becomes a self-fulfilling prophecy it reproduces itself by crippling our willingness to act.
author: Howard Zinn, You Can't Be Neutral on a Moving Train: A Personal History of Our Times

quote: The circulation of money is like the sharing of cake. The one that holds the knife controls the portion you get.
author: Oscar Bimpong

quote: Poetry might be defined as the clear expression of mixed feelings.
author: W.H. Auden, New Year Letter

quote: Greatness is an attainment that is bought with the currency of time.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: I never approve, or disapprove, of anything now. It is an absurd attitude to take towards life.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Guard well your thoughts when alone and your words when accompanied.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Every Child Deserves A Chance To Live Their Own Dream
author: Phil Mitchell, A Bright New Morning: An American Story

quote: But you said so yourself,the poor lass will die of it...Do you really want her to die?'Yes, I'd rather she died than have a bad life.
author: Émile Zola, The Dream

quote: Do not be hot tempered.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: And it came to me as I stood on the desert sand, looking at the Great Pyramid, that what any civilization says about God tells us more about that civilization than it does about God.
author: Madeleine L'Engle, Glimpses of Grace: Daily Thoughts and Reflections

quote: To live in a spiritual dimension is to be connected to one’s eternal destiny
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There is a place called ‘heaven’ where the good here unfinished is completed; and where the stories unwritten, and the hopes unfulfilled, are continued. We may laugh together yet.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
