quote: A time when sky blue love bids farewell to the day and before dusk falls, the sunset ignites the smouldering embers of the moonlit soul...
author: Virginia Alison

quote: The beauty of life is in our dream . When our actions transform our dream to a reality we become a success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The discipline of delaying gratification is a factor for predicting success.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Best Chance: A Guide to Discovering Your Purpose, Reaching Your Potential, Experiencing Fulfilment and Achieving Success in Any Area of Life

quote: Even the juncture in history and the zeitgeist we live in is something we choose, setting the scene for the spiritual fodder we need to grow and achieve deeper elevation of our souls.
author: Raquel Cepeda, Bird of Paradise: How I Became Latina

quote: Naked truths aren't always pretty.
author: Colleen Hoover, It Ends with Us

quote: Any writer worth his salt writes to please himself...It's a self-exploratory operation that is endless. An exorcism of not necessarily his demon, but of his divine discontent.
author: Harper Lee

quote: Wherever you are, whoever you are, I am touching you and feeling you, not with my hand, but with my feelings and love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Legislating morality grows big government immensely, and helps fashion the noose the government will use to ultimately hang you by.
author: A.E. Samaan

quote: Great leaders inspire greatness in others.
author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

quote: The HurricaneThe tree lay downon the garage roof and stretched, You have your heaven, it said, go to it.
author: William Carlos Williams, The Collected Poems, Vol. 2: 1939-1962

quote: Never subject to the rules, believing that the correct judgement and healthy nature keep her in the honesty she lived in.
author: Émile Zola, The Ladies' Paradise

quote: Begin to write, your heart will flow with sacred words.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Intelligence is not all that important in the exercise of power and is often  in point of fact  useless. Just as a leader doesn't need intelligence  a man in my job doesn't need too much of it either.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: You don’t learn about yourself by being alone, you learn about yourself from other people.
author: Lev Grossman

quote: I had thought that successful people, wealthy people, prosperous people, don’t stretch themselves and they don’t live a life of pressure. Well I was wrong.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The life you wish you had will come by working like you never have.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The more you love, the more you give, the more you get.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Daring greater life is a divine act.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Technology gives us power, but it does not and cannot tell us how to use that power. Thanks to technology, we can instantly communicate across the world, but it still doesn't help us know what to say.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: Romeo: Courage, man; the hurt cannot be much.Mercutio: No, 'tis not so deep as a well, nor so wide as a church-door; but 'tis enough, 'twill serve. Ask for me tomorrow, and you shall find me a grave man.
author: William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

quote: Reason is intelligence taking exercise. Imagination is intelligence with an erection.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: It is better to be unhappy with rejection of love than never love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Beware of the man who works hard to learn something, learns it, and finds himself no wiser than before. He is full of murderous resentment of people who are ignorant without having come by their ignorance the hard way.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr., Cat's Cradle

quote: Those that dare not to dream big are cowards, for they fear to expose the already great potentials embedded inside of them.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: Oh beloved, I want to live in your love,to feel the joy of life, to see the beauty of desires,to enjoy the song of heart,to dance with you, my love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be patient in painful times.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: He stood up straight and looked the world squarely in the fields and hills. To add weight to his words he stuck the rabbit bone in his hair. He spread his arm out wide. "I will go mad!" he annouced.
author: Douglas Adams, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy Omnibus

quote: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
author: Jane Austen, Pride and Prejudice

quote: Wonder is a beautiful bliss.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The world breaks every one and afterward many are strong at the broken places.
author: Ernest Hemingway, A Farewell to Arms

quote: Truth is stranger than fiction, but it is because Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities; Truth isn't.
author: Mark Twain, Following the Equator: A Journey Around the World

quote: What begins will eventually end. The gap between is life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We belong to the 'Stardust Family'. Thanks to those initial stars who sacrificed their precious lives for us! We're STARDUST! ~ UNIVERSE LOVES YOU & SO DO I ‪#‎StardustAK‬
author: Abhishek Kumar

quote: Reasons are the fuel for goal achievement. Without a strong enough reason, it’s impossible to persevere.
author: Mensah Oteh, Unlocking Life's Treasure Chest: Wisdom keys to keep you inspired, encouraged, motivated and focused

quote: Great leaders can see the greatness in others when they can’t see it themselves and lead them to their highest potential they don’t even know.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: No one can take the power within you.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It is easier to start a war than to end it.
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: Every man is an author - an author of his state.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: Beyond speech and mind,Into the river of ever-effulgent LightMy heart dives.Today thousands of doors, closed for millennia,Are opened wide.
author: Sri Chinmoy, The Wings of Joy: Finding Your Path to Inner Peace

quote: Are you in love? What makes your heart beat faster? What do you want people to think about when they hear your name.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: Somewhere, someone is search for the pieces of you that mold well with theirs.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: What, anyway, was he to say? That intelligence could surpass and excel the blind force of evolution, with its emphasis on mutation, struggle and death? That conscious cooperation was more efficient than feral competition?
author: Iain M. Banks, The Player of Games

quote: There is something about me, doll face. It’s between my legs, and I do believe a few minutes ago you were praying to it.
author: Debra Anastasia, Crushed Seraphim

quote: I have a beautiful collection of knifes but not mine.these are deposit belongs to those who forgot in my back
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: There should ne’er be a timeWhen a duty or dimeDoth outshineThe importance of family.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: Some people have difficulty releasing control. It comes down to trust. When they trust themselves, as well as their partner, enough to relinquish their will, it can be emancipating.
author: Brownell Landrum, A Chorus of Voices: DUET stories Volume III - Adult Version

quote: A good book will surely become an event in your life.
author: Aman Jassal, Rainbow - the shades of love

quote: Let me get lost in your heart so that I may find myself in the mirror of your mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life is like photography. You need the negatives to develop.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: Explaining a joke is like dissecting a frog. You understand it better but the frog dies in the process.
author: E.B. White

quote: The price of greatness is responsibility.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: You're here to love and appreciate.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We learn much of parenting from our own parents. My love for my father deepened profoundly when he was kind, patient, and understanding.
author: James E. Faust

quote: In a war of truth and lie, lie retreats always with shame and pity.
author: Ehsan Sehgal

quote: And there you have it...if I knew that I could only have a few nights in that man's arms or nothing, I would take those magic nights and use them to keep me warm for the rest of my life.
author: Karen Marie Moning, To Tame a Highland Warrior

quote: Mindfulness and compassion can give you the power, illumination, love, and wisdom to draw higher forms, thoughts, feelings, and situations into your life.
author: Amit Ray, Walking the Path of Compassion

quote: Those things that take my breath away become the ocean-complex and deep-and I'm prone to drowning in beautiful things. Like you.
author: Melody  Lee

quote: If you know the power of your thoughts, you would never fear failure.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A peaceful mind is the source of all joy and all happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Oops Typo!" - When God created humans.
author: Saleem Sharma

quote: There is another alphabet, whispering from every leaf, singing from every river, shimmering from every sky.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: The ego of the mind can entrap you in a web of dilution.
author: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

quote: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love the animals: God has given them the rudiments of thought and joy untroubled.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quote: Why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time. My greatest regret was how much I believed in the future.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer, Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close

quote: The mystery of God’s love would not be a mystery if we knew all the answers.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
author: Plato

quote: It takes a little slip to slip. Inappropriate words are inappropriate!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The most called-upon prerequisite of a friend is an accessible ear.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Never you fight a man that knows and understand the mysteries about God.
author: Ikechukwu Izuakor, Great Reflections on Success

quote: How well you express it! That is exactly the curse of a politician's life. He has to bow to the country's feeling, however dangerous and foolhardy he knows it to be.
author: Agatha Christie, Murder in the Mews

quote: You ask me why I’m nice to you,” he said. “Why, why, why. But you don’t ask me stuff that matters. Who I am or where I been. What I see when I look at you. What I want.
author: Sarah Ockler, The Book of Broken Hearts

quote: Forget being turned on. This man, this kiss, encompassed everything she ever wanted.
author: Robin Bielman, Worth the Risk

quote: Your inner light is your inner power.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There was a great deal of progress being made, right under their noses, particularly in Africa, and this progress was good. Life was much harder for tyrants than it had been before.
author: Alexander McCall Smith, The Woman Who Walked in Sunshine

quote: One should forgive one's enemies, but not before they are hanged.
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: All I'm trying to do is survive and make good out of the dirty, nasty, unbelievable lifestyle that they gave me.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: You cannot judge a man by his smile, but you can judge a man by his heart. The smallest actions reveal the most about a heart's true color, so pay attention to them. Actions are the true words of the heart.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Faithful are the wounds of a friend  but the kisses of an enemy are deceitful.
author: Bible

quote: I vibrate with cheer and delight in my cells. I let beauty heal me!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: To be really great in little things, to be truly noble and heroic in the insipid details of everyday life, is a virtue so rare as to be worthy of canonization.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Sometimes being a friend is enough in its own right to inspire someone on to victory.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: I'll never fall in love again," he once confessed to José Palacios, the only human being with whom he ever permitted himself that sort of confidence. "It's like having two souls at the same time.
author: Gabriel García Márquez, The General in His Labyrinth

quote: Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby- awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess.
author: Lemony Snicket, Horseradish

quote: What was it about that short creature with her wild hair and spurious air of purity and why would anyone much less two men love her and to such disastrous ends.
author: Anna Godbersen, Envy

quote: God’s grace is the strength for every good deed.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Only one feat is possible: not to have run away.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Our world ends and some people never understand how much we really loved them.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: Unable to penetrate to the secret place of his soul where his motives lay hidden, he believed that a supernatural voice had called him onward, and that a supernatural power had obstructed his retreat.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne, Mosses from an Old Manse

quote: Somebody who is focused on money, doesn´t care about man. Somebody who cares about man, isn´t focused on money.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Time is standing still. We are measuring ourselves by how far we are going.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Take a tram ride today.Recognise a dear friend in everyone around. Speak kindly to yourself.It is only your thoughts that bring you fear.You've been through a lot. There is perfect peace in this moment.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D., Sleepers: A Little Book on How to Find Hope, Meaning and the Courage to Fall in Love with Your Dreams

quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Failure comes from fear. Success comes from boldness and persistence.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: Regardless of the trends we see in the deterioration of morality, respect, and values, wise people will still strive to take the high road to rise above the ever-increasing rudeness and stand apart from the crowd.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Action: 8 Ways to Initiate & Activate Forward Momentum for Positive Impact

quote: The voice had an extraordinary sadness. Pure from all body, pure from all passion, going out into the world, solitary, unanswered, breaking against rocks—so it sounded.
author: Virginia Woolf, Jacob's Room

quote: He felt now that he was not simply close to her, but that he did not know where he ended and she began.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: What we need is more people who specialize in the impossible.
author: Theodore Roethke

quote: I have my own matches and sulphur, and I'll make my own hell.
author: Rudyard Kipling, The Light That Failed

quote: We are what we are. Nothing more, nothing less. There is good and evil among every kind of people. It's the evil among us who rule now.
author: Anne Bishop, Daughter of the Blood

quote: What was more, they had taken the first step toward genuine friendship. They had exchanged vulnerabilities.
author: Arthur C. Clarke, 2010: Odyssey Two

quote: The person who offends, and the person who has been offended and awaiting for a revenge have one thing in common: the real uncertainties of tomorrow is truly uncertain to both of them.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: We learn that all life is scarce yet abundant. Profane yet sacred. Loving yet hateful. Enlightened yet obscured. Isolated yet collective. That life is somehow derived from love.
author: A.P. Sweet, dead, but dreaming

quote: Faith is a sounder guide than reason. Reason can go only so far  but faith has no limits.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Love yourself first in order to endlessly love others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There is a scarcity of friendship, but not of friends.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Managers maintain an efficient status quo while leaders attack the status quo to create something new.
author: Orrin Woodward, LIFE

quote: For once,engulf,not air,but hope.For once,breathe on,a firm belief!
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Medical Science Has Determined Envy, Anger Are Responsible For Plethora Of Medical Conditions
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: It's not what you pay a man, but what he costs you that counts.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Having a spine is overrated. If everybody squealed and ran away, there'd be no more wars.
author: Robert Anton Wilson

quote: We are not often against the evils, only because our enemies are against them.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, The Journalist: Attack on the Central Intelligence Agency

quote: When love becomes a play of squirming mindgames or a tinderbox of mental conflicts, emotional benchmarks need an unremitting reset. ("Another empty room")
author: Erik Pevernagie

quote: If I talk about her like she’s a beingIt’s because talking about her I need to use the language of menWhich gives personality to things,And imposes a name on things.
author: Alberto Caeiro, The Keeper of Sheep

quote: WAKE UP NOW...You will become a history one day...Even if you are most important, most powerful, most wanted or most influential individual on the planet. THAT’S IT!
author: Aditya Ajmera

quote: She had blue skin. And so did he. He kept it hid, And so did she. They searched for blue Their whole life through, Then passed right by - And never knew.
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: I am fulfilling my destiny.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Odd how the creative power at once brings the whole universe to order
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Self love is the elixir of an immortal heart.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Some girls are bigger than others.
author: Morrissey

quote: There are always exquisite things and times to remind us of the original source of all beauty and love.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: Innovation is the heart of humanity. We need new ideas and new creativities to help address contemporary issues.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Investigation in our own life is far more rewarding than investigating life of other's.
author: Aditya Ajmera

quote: I've been living for too long abroad and aboard, Methinking the concept of being grounded or floored.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, The Tao of Physical and Spiritual

quote: She was lucky to be wanted not desired though, worse pain is the feeling of being unwanted in love.
author: Pushpa Rana, Just the Way I Feel

quote: Leaders who listen to their team ,encourage dreams, they inspire success by example andl ignite the passion needed to achieve ~Bluenscottish
author: Bluenscottish

quote: There is strife (trouble) the moment one enters the worldly life and bliss the moment one enters the Self [the Soul].
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference… You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your concern, your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: I stood like Adam in his lonely gardenOn that first morning, shaken out of sleep,Rubbing his eyes, listening, parting the leaves,Like tissue on some vast, incredible gift.
author: Mary Oliver, New and Selected Poems, Vol. 1

quote: There is a single light of science, and to brighten it anywhere is to brighten it everywhere.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Obedience to God will bring blessings to you and others.
author: Jim George

quote: There should be no restlessness within, no matter what the circumstances. If there is restlessness within, know that the kashays have not left yet.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: It was Tigerstar's ambition that destroyed him. If he had been willing to wait for power to come to him, he would've been the greatest leader in the forest.
author: Erin Hunter, Outcast

quote: Wealth is violent and uneasy to acquire, don't blow yourself by rushing. You won't find, you will only get lost on your way to find and you won't find it, Reserve yourself and wealth will find you.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Violence is spiritual junk food, and boredom is spiritual anorexia.
author: Peter Kreeft, Jesus-Shock

quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and to have her nonsense respected.
author: Charles Lamb, The Life, Letters and Writings of Charles Lamb

quote: Whoever works knows the grace of labour of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you are really humble you will put yourself first when you need to take care of you.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Each of us has his own rhythm of suffering.
author: Roland Barthes

quote: For you, I wish for second chances
author: Sarah Dessen, Once and for All

quote: After your visits, I twisted my blinds shut every night. I locked out the stars and I never saw lightning again. Each night, I simply turned out the lights and went to bed.
author: Jay Asher, Thirteen Reasons Why

quote: A travel book is about someone who goes somewhere, travels on the ground, sees something and spends quite a lot of time doing it, and has a hard time, and then comes back and writes about it. It's not about inventing.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Whether you need to make a call or answer one,don’t put your passions on hold.
author: Gina Greenlee, Postcards and Pearls: Life Lessons From Solo Moments in New York

quote: I am not meant to be a biomass, I am a human being and I am born with a mission
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Because people have no thoughts to deal in, they deal cards, and try and win one another's money. Idiots!
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: The stars in the sky are immeasurable.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A good-enough novel violently written now is better than a perfect novel meticulously written never.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Big Magic: Creative Living Beyond Fear

quote: The best incentive for an artist are the harshest criticism
author: Válgame, Zori 2ª Parte

quote: I strive never to forget the real world consequences of my decisions on individuals, businesses and government.
author: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: Today is a day to be thankful.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Awake to the spiritual realities of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You hurt. It's okay. I hurt too. Hold my hand.
author: Neil Gaiman, The Sandman: Endless Nights

quote: Improve your relationship with you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I'm wondering what to read next." Matilda said. "I've finished all the children's books.
author: Roald Dahl, Matilda

quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If you love yourself the most at your happiest moments, there is no reason not to be fond of who you are in the dark.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: If beauty is relative, then any and everything when compared to the beauty of God is absolutely hideous.
author: Criss Jami

quote: I said you were beautiful. I slept in your bed!
author: Stephanie Perkins, Anna and the French Kiss

quote: If you believe in the Lord Jesus Christ, you will be saved.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You think when you wake up in the mornin yesterday don't count. But yesterday is all that does count. What else is there? Your life is made out of the days it’s made out of. Nothin else.
author: Cormac McCarthy, No Country for Old Men

quote: Where are they, the American fiction writers whose works are interested in the question “What do these people have to do with us?” and “What are we doing out there in the world?
author: Kamila Shamsie

quote: God's love is too great to be confined to any one side of a conflict or to any one religion.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: I'm sorry. I just meant that all this is new to me. I get lost sometimes." I give her my most honest expression.
author: Katie Crouch and Grady Hendrix, The White Glove War

quote: In life, we are constantly growing.There are no true adults because our life experiences and sometimes unfortunate conditions show us that constant growth is part of the human story.
author: Henry Johnson Jr, Liberian Son

quote: When 'happiness' eludes us - as, eventually, it always will - we have the invitation to examine our programmed responses and to exercise our power to choose again.
author: Richard Rohr

quote: Deeply respecting yourself is the first step toward having a deep respect for others.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: my beauty, flower by flower, star by star,wave by wave, love, I have counted your body.
author: Pablo Neruda, 100 Love Sonnets

quote: There is a certain right by which we many deprive a man of life, but none by which we may deprive him of death; this is mere cruelty.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Human, All Too Human

quote: We cannot command Nature except by obeying her.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Love is that which gives of itself.
author: Vivian Amis, The Essentials of Life

quote: The only certainty life contains is death.
author: Patricia Briggs, When Demons Walk

quote: The abdomen is the reason why man does not easily take himself for a god.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: To write simply is as difficult as to be good.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: There's nothing so heavy as books, sir--unless it's bricks.
author: Graham Greene, The Ministry of Fear

quote: The Self-confidence of the ignorant is one of the biggest disasters of the humanity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: I sit in the sky like a sphinx misunderstood; My heart of snow is wed to the whiteness of swans; I hate the movement that displaces the rigid lines, With lips untaught neither tears nor laughter do I know.
author: Charles Baudelaire, Selected Poems from Les Fleurs du mal: A Bilingual Edition

quote: People relates the process of evolution, as growth and success in the material world, rather in reality, the process of evolution, is all about, how you perceive life, with your understanding, in the present moment.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: We bereaved are not alone. We belong to the largest company in all the world--the company of those who have known suffering.
author: Helen Keller, We Bereaved

quote: Lack of wisdom does not make a fool. A fool, in the truest sense, is the man who regards his own misfortunes or those of others as a source of doubt or criticism of the infinite mercy of the Gohonzon.-Josei Toda
author: Daisaku Ikeda, Human Revolution- Volume 2

quote: Joy keeps the soul alive.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: It gave an appalling idea of the value of an hour, and I thought I could never waste one again without remorse and terror.
author: Mark Twain, The Mysterious Stranger

quote: Our dreams wrapped in desire let us fly high enough to get the reward.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: Nothing is as important as your calling and purpose in life.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We often try to understand the world without understanding ourselves.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Joy is God’s presence in our lives.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: They heard a lullaby every time a part of her died in Silence.
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: When you make music or write or create, it's really your job to have mind-blowing, irresponsible, condomless sex with whatever idea it is you're writing about at the time.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: The four L's: Love Light Life Liberty!!
author: Lailah GiftyAkita

quote: Search for the stranger inside you, forgotten even by your death.
author: Sorin Cerin, Wisdom Collection: The Book of Wisdom

quote: Buy a pup and your money will buyLove unflinching that cannot lie.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Imagination, like reality, has its limits.
author: Tim O'Brien, Going After Cacciato

quote: To every man his little cross. Till he dies. And is forgotten.
author: Samuel Beckett, Waiting for Godot

quote: Is there any success without an effort?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There's a huge swath of humanity that has developed verbal abilities to extract resources from guilt-ridden people.They used to be priests, and now they're leftists.
author: Stefan Molyneux

quote: Dreams are things from the past. They aren't from the future. That wasn't you imprisoned there. You imprison your dreams. You understand?Yeah, I'd say. But I wasn't convinced.
author: Haruki Murakami, The Ice Man

quote: He is free to evade reality, he is free to unfocus his mind and stumble blindly down any road he pleases, but not free to avoid the abyss he refuses to see.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: They placed their bets with such self righteous bravado, but I’m the one who lost.
author: Chuck Palahniuk, Damned

quote: To his way of thinking, the only thing more natural than death was sex.
author: Stephen King, 'Salem's Lot

quote: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.
author: Henry Ford

quote: We are the cats inside. We are the cats who cannot walk alone, and for us there is only one place.
author: William S. Burroughs, The Cat Inside

quote: If you 're serious about getting it on again, be sure to give me some advance notice, so I can grab my appointment calendar and block out three minutes.
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips, Natural Born Charmer

quote: Isn’t it time that, loving, we freed ourselves from the beloved, and, trembling, endured:as the arrow endures the bow, so as to be, in its flight, something more than itself?
author: Rainer Maria Rilke, Duino Elegies

quote: Poems are like dreams: in them you put what you don't know you know.
author: Adrienne Rich, Arts of the Possible: Essays and Conversations

quote: Wisdom comes from the internalization and reflection of experience.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We shall never arrive at true meekness by any other way than by humiliating ourselves and by honoring others from the depth of our hearts.
author: John Calvin

quote: I think the greatest of people that have ever been in society, they were never versions of someone else. They were themselves.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: There's a part of me that thinks perhaps we go on existing in a place even after we've left it.
author: Colum McCann, Let the Great World Spin

quote: Whoever shall call on God, shall be saved.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: What you do without expectations defines your success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The Lord himself lead the way to the holy heavens.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Hope is the grace of a happy heart.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Reach out for the heavenly blessings!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Most of my writing life consist of nothing more than unglamorous, disciplined labor. I sit at my desk and I work like a farmer, and that's how it gets done.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Big Magic: Creative Living Beyond Fear

quote: You can either worry or wonder. The best choice is to wonder.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: If you are 100% sure that you live, why don´t you live 100%?
author: Alin Sav

quote: I am writing in the garden. To write as one should of a garden one must write not outside it or merely somewhere near it, but in the garden.
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quote: Making name for yourself requires you not to stop and consider you have done enough but rather continue to move forward
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Sometimes we need to just brush away our pride, break down the walls around our hearts, and open up to those we truly care for.
author: Imania Margria

quote: May my soul radiate light and love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: A man is what he thinks about all day long.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I learned early and at that kitchen table that there are ways of avoiding, without guilt, the commitments of love.
author: P.D. James, The Children of Men

quote: Sometimes words are just a crude translation of love.
author: Saleem Sharma

quote: Hold the flame of faith, it quench all doubt of darkness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Alas, my lord, your wisdom is consumed in confidence.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I want to write about people who dream and wait for the night to end, who long for the light so they can hold the ones they love.
author: Haruki Murakami, After the Quake

quote: When exercising gifted will-power, move boldly without hesitation. The reward for such decisiveness is increased confidence in what the heart knows, which the mind does not feel
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: I have sometimes sacrificed freedom in order to belong, but more often I have given up all hope of belonging.
author: Jeanette Winterson, The World and Other Places: Stories

quote: Being a wizard gives you more power than most, but it doesn't change your heart. We're all human. We're all of us equally naked before the jaws of pain.
author: Jim Butcher, White Night

quote: We are the change we have been waiting for.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Sometimes what we want isn't what we need.
author: Gena Showalter, The Darkest Night

quote: Confidence and hope builds up in you when you have a glimpse of what your future is like
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Even though human life may be the most precious thing on earth, we always behave as if there were something of higher value than human life.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, Night Flight

quote: The more I want to get something done the less I call it work.
author: Richard Bach

quote: None should say : 'I can trust,' or 'I cannot trust' until he is a master of the option, of trusting or not trusting.
author: Idries Shah, Reflections

quote: Let every hindrance to joy become the soil out of which joy blossoms.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: An act of goodness is of itself an act of happiness.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: Colourful lips are pretty, child but they also speak colourful lies.
author: J. Limbu

quote: nothing in this world was more difficult than love.
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: Adversity is a spiritual awaken in every soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Those who walk the talk get the work.
author: Gina Greenlee, Postcards and Pearls:Life Lessons from Solo Moments in New York

quote: Sometimes one doesn't have to be part of the experience to realize and learn from the experience.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they're not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: It should be made clear that religious freedom DOES NOT include the right to persecute others, nor the right to take away their humanity and equal treatment before the law.
author: Christina Engela, Autumn Burning: Dreadtime Stories for the Wicked Soul

quote: To the question: Wilderness, who needs it? Doc would say: Because we like the taste of freedom, comrades. Because we like the smell of danger. But, thought Hayduke, what about the smell of fear, Dad?
author: Edward Abbey, The Monkey Wrench Gang

quote: Any fool can start a religion. And many do.
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: Faith in God gives faith in self.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Narcissism makes people incapable of looking beyond themselves, beyond their own desires and needs.
author: Pope Francis, Amoris Laetitia: Apostolic Exhortation on the Family

quote: In any society, fanatics who hate don't hate only me - they hate you, too. They hate everybody.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Embrace your responsibility to dream big.
author: Kevin Michel, Moving Through Parallel Worlds To Achieve Your Dreams

quote: Three things to help keep your brain cells awake and alert ... drink plenty of clean water, get plenty of deep sleep, and let your imagination soar to places it's never dared venture.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Talking to Rhett was comparable only to one thing, the feeling of ease and comfort afforded by a pair of old slippers after dancing in a pair too tight.
author: Margaret Mitchell, Gone with the Wind

quote: Never fear what people will say... Never think you can't do it because it was never done before! You can be the source of change that is suspending for quite a long period now! You too can fly!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: A bird that fears falling off of a tree branch is ignorant of its gifts.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It is impossible for an uneducated man to rebel.
author: Paul Bamikole

quote: I find my greatest pleasure, and so my reward, in the work that precedes what the world calls success.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Mirror, mirror on the wall, who's the hottest bitch of all?
author: Sara  Humphreys, Luck of the Irish

quote: But love, I’ve come to understand, is more than three words mumbled before bedtime. Love is sustained by action, a pattern of devotion in the things we do for each other every day.
author: Nicholas Sparks, The Wedding

quote: listen to me,you’ve got this.seriously, you’ve got this.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: These are all novels, all about people that never existed, the people that read them it makes them unhappy with their own lives. Makes them want to live in other ways they can never really be.
author: Ray Bradbury, Fahrenheit 451

quote: What these men represented was not 'The West' but what was for this century a relatively new kind of monied class in America, a group devoid of social responsibilities because their ties to any one place had been so attenuated.
author: Joan Didion, Vintage Didion

quote: Every child gets a good mother, but not every mother gets a good child.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Age does not make us childish, as some say; it finds us true children.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Let us not look back in anger  nor forward in fear  but around us in awareness.
author: James Thurber

quote: Any prophet who does not refer you to christ is not a true prophet.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: Keep your heart always warm.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I don't understand your book. Isn't every book a book of words?
author: Kristin Cashore, Bitterblue

quote: Every child should be taught how to think, read and write.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Don't ignore the love you DO have in your life by focusing on the love you DON'T.
author: Mandy Hale, The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: Read no history: nothing but biography, for that is life without theory.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The mind is an instrument made up of universal consciousness, egocentric consciousness, societal consciousness, along with education, values, virtues, judgment and wisdom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I prefer peace. But if trouble must come, let it come in my time, so that my children can live in peace.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Failure is a fundamental piece of success.
author: Ben Tolosa, Masterplan Your Success

quote: To find beauty, look above the boundaries of conformity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Travel is fatal to prejudice  bigotry and narrow-mindedness.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life is share, sacrifice and service.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Motivating others leads to success whereas inspiring others leads to greatness.
author: Ken Poirot

quote: You Keep Looking at what you want but you can’t have it , and once you have it it will never be the same.
author: Sami Abouzid

quote: Ordinary courage is about putting our vulnerability on the line. In today’s world, that’s pretty extraordinary.
author: Brené Brown, The Gifts of Imperfection: Let Go of Who You Think You're Supposed to Be and Embrace Who You Are

quote: It is an acknowledged fact that we perceive errors in the work of others more readily than in our own.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I thought I had everything until I found you.
author: Turcois Ominek

quote: We failed, but in the good providence of God apparent failure often proves a blessing.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: No true...father would be unconcerned about discord in his family that may cause it to disintegrate in his absence...
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: He was, after all, just a man. And not merely a narrative.
author: Hanif Kureishi, The Last Word

quote: Lovers, forget your love,And list the love of these,She a window flower,And he a winter breeze.
author: Robert Frost, A Boy's Will

quote: There is no feeling, except the extremes of fear and grief, that does not find relief in music.
author: George Eliot

quote: Undecided thoughts’ is called the mind. ‘Decided thoughts’ is called the intellect.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The worst crime is faking it
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: Without darkness, how could we have appreciated the light?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Before I fellin love with words,with setting skies and singing birds—it was you I fellin love with first.
author: Lang Leav, Love & Misadventure

quote: What is the difference between disrespect (avinay) and despise (viradhana)? Disrespect (avinay) means one shows lack of respect and to despise (viradhana) means one becomes an adversary (opponent).
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Wherever you go, whenever you meet someone, enlighten every mind, brighten their life with love and kindness, it will make your world so delightful and so beautiful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A woman brings so much more to the world than birth, for she can birth discovery, intelligence, invention, art, just as well as any man.
author: Shannon Celebi, Small Town Demons

quote: Get over it, Roo. If you have friends who actually like you, you’re popular enough.
author: E. Lockhart, Real Live Boyfriends: Yes. Boyfriends, Plural. If My Life Weren't Complicated, I Wouldn't Be Ruby Oliver

quote: It's not how long you see something. It's how you intensely you feel it"From Central Park Song: a Screenplay
author: Zack Love, Stories and Scripts: an Anthology

quote: We are the same people as we were at three  six  ten or twenty years old. More noticeably so  perhaps  at six or seven  because we were not pretending so much then.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: I don't argue things being spiritual vs scientific, because I've never met anyone who knows enough about either to be convincing--including myself.
author: S. Kelley Harrell

quote: Let them howl. Let the wolves pant. You have evolved. You were not fashioned to run in a pack, or to be defined by the opinions of those who wish to limit your creativity. Let them howl. Let the wolves pant.
author: Alfa H, Abandoned Breaths

quote: Do you ever wonder about the fairy tales of life?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Religion is just mind control.
author: George Carlin

quote: Let your judgements have their own quiet, undisturbed development, which must, like all progress, come from deep within, and cannot in any way be pressed or hurried.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke, Letters to a Young Poet

quote: To bind one free man with love is better than to release a thousand slaves.
author: Idries Shah, The Dermis Probe

quote: Many of us saw religion as harmless nonsense. Beliefs might lack all supporting evidence but, we thought, if people needed a crutch for consolation, where's the harm? September 11th changed all that.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Fear is static that prevents me from hearing myself.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Whatever you don't completely reject outright is taken as acceptance by reality.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: If what he said was the truth, it broke her heart. If what he said was a lie, it was broken anyway.
author: Christine Feehan, Oceans of Fire

quote: A woman must prefer her liberty over a man. To be happy, she must. A man to be happy, however, must yearn for his woman more than his liberty. This is the rightful order.
author: Roman Payne, Hope and Despair

quote: I generally avoid temptation  unless I can't resist it.
author: Mae West

quote: I have no culture, no humane harmony in my brains. I can't live without a culture anymore.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr., Breakfast of Champions

quote: Don't believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that - thoughts.
author: Allan Lokos, Pocket Peace: Effective Practices for Enlightened Living

quote: No one makes history, no one sees it happen, no one sees the grass grow.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: I love new clothes. If everyone could just wear new clothes everyday, I reckon depression wouldn’t exist anymore.
author: Sophie Kinsella, Confessions of a Shopaholic

quote: Impossibility only lasts until you find new unbelievable hard evidences.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Stop worrying about what tomorrow may bring. Focus on what you can control. Stay positive. Enjoy today. Expect good things to come.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: God himself made government and gave it an environment of the kingdom
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To enjoy the beauty of the world, don’t try to fit in. Try to fly out of your perceived boundaries.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Our eyes met and our souls caught on fire.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Rain. Tumble, bumble and, fall on me. Any old day, any old way. Come for a visit, or come for a stay. Rain, rain, don't go away.
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift

quote: Austerity, if I were to define, I'll say, It's YOU.
author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

quote: But then I realize that even if I did have a soul, it’s not as though someone else would be there. It would only be more of me.
author: Ally Condie, Atlantia

quote: Today’s events are reminiscent of the Old Testament story of how the Israelites demanded a king over God’s objection. They believed that a king would give them peace and security. The results proved otherwise.
author: Ron Paul, Liberty Defined: 50 Essential Issues That Affect Our Freedom

quote: I was surprised. I'd always associated belief in heaven with, frankly, a kind of intellectual disengagement. But Gus wasn't dumb.
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: I am determined to be a lifelong learner.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If egoism is there, the benefit of the Self cannot be obtained and if the Self is there, the benefit of egoism cannot be obtained.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Heralds don't sing about men who lived in orthodoxy or played it safe, they sing about men who lived an uncertain future and took enough risks to make your head spin.
author: Evan Meekins, The Black Banner

quote: She had seen this relationship dying before it ever lived, but allowed optimism and lust to blind her.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Danse Macabre (Night's Dream, #2)

quote: To be a rainbow in someone’s cloud is commendable, but I prefer to be the rain because it dampens cheeks and washes away tears.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: Despite all our gains in technology, product innovation and world markets, most people are not thriving in the organizations they work for.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Not only our future economic soundness but the very soundness of our democratic institutions depends on the determination of our government to give employment to idle men.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Unless philosophy can make a Juliet,Displant a town, reverse a prince’s doom,It helps not, it prevails not.
author: William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

quote: If he believed in souls he would have said she had a good one.
author: Salman Rushdie, Two Years Eight Months and Twenty-Eight Nights

quote: Man needs, for his happiness, not only the enjoyment of this or that, but hope and enterprise and change.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: He who possesses forgiveness is able to enjoy true happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Do not compete with anyone. Seek to exceed your own expectations.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I'm fine. Well, I'm not fine - I'm here.""Is there something wrong with that?""Absolutely.
author: Ned Vizzini, It's Kind of a Funny Story

quote: If your content is good, your career just started.
author: Alin Sav

quote: I am incapable of conceiving infinity, and yet I do not accept finity. I want this adventure that is the context of my life to go on without end.
author: Simone de Beauvoir, La Vieillesse

quote: A lie is my attempt to tamper with the truth so that I need not face the truth. Yet as shrewd as I think myself to be, I would be wise to understand that God designed truth as ultimately tamper-proof.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, An Intimate Collision: Encounters with Life and Jesus

quote: Women have routinely been punished and intimidated for attempting that most simple of freedoms, taking a walk, because their walking and indeed their very beings have been construed as inevitably, continually sexual in those societies concerned with controlling women's sexuality.
author: Rebecca Solnit, Wanderlust: A History of Walking

quote: Stop praying to God to change your marriage or your finances because you might end up seeing that you are the one that need the change not your marriage or finances.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: A journey begins with a single step
author: Ricky Maye, Barefoot Christianity

quote: Life is an offensive  directed against the repetitious mechanism of the universe.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: When teaching someone a boundary, they learn less from the enforcement of the boundary, and more from the way the boundary is established.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Change is automatic, but Growth is intentional.
author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quote: Just preaching "you are blessed" to a congregation is like giving them a big fertile land. They need the seeds to plant on it; they need business ideas, a little of which is enough!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: Good  to forgive  Best  to forget.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: May the hopes of your heart and dreams of your eyes keep turning into realities. To all women out there: The more you progress, the more humanity progresses.
author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

quote: Inner voice is the divine voice.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Lincoln learned to summon the passions, but he never addressed his audience as sweethearts.
author: Richard Brookhiser, Founders' Son: A Life of Abraham Lincoln

quote: If you would hit the mark  you must aim a little above it: Every arrow that flies feels the attraction of earth.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Moving forward implies MOTION when in all actuality it may be simply standing STILL and seeing the salvation of the Lord.
author: John Paul Warren

quote: We are stardust brought to life, then empowered by the universe to figure itself out—and we have only just begun.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson, Astrophysics for People in a Hurry

quote: Some people start to live when they die
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Authors, he thought. Even the sane ones are nuts.
author: Dan Brown, The Da Vinci Code

quote: I must not imagine what is ‘not’ as a means of escaping what ‘is’. Rather, I must understand what ‘is’ and imagine how I can make it what it is ‘not’.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: The surface of learning is hearing what your ears aren't prepared to hear, and the core of learning is hearing what your ears don't want to hear.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: God wants to raise rich and successful Christians up whose prosperity will never end
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When the expected occurred, never panic, by keep calming, you gain control over the situation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I experience the grace of greater power.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You have some queer friends, Dorothy,' she said.The queerness doesn't matter, so long as they're friends,' was the answer
author: L. Frank Baum, The Road to Oz

quote: We never want to be taken for granted, but our partners should be able to expect our honest loyalty. That is a powerfully strong foundation block for a relationship. I want to meet the greatest expectations, without being the greatest fraud.
author: Cathy Burnham Martin, The Bimbo Has Brains: And Other Freaky Facts

quote: Don't try to worry about the things that could've happen. Just wonder about the things that can still happen and fight for them. Because anything worth fighting for will happen in time.
author: Imania Margria

quote: Mirroring provides social cues through body language and behavior which enable us to develop more empathy and understanding for others.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Body Language: 8 Ways to Optimize Non-Verbal Communication for Positive Impact

quote: Comedy strikes here... just to reduce pressure and depression.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: When a dream of dying actually becomes a chance to live. All you have to do is fall.
author: Brynn Myers, Falling Out of Focus

quote: It is unjust, but only Christlike, to suffer persecution for doing what is right.
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: You took life by the horns and tried to hold on tight, for fear of being ripped to shreds, left bloodied and battered.
author: Holly Hood, Polar

quote: As soon as you start fulfilling your purpose your adversaries will appear
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: War never takes a wicked man by chance, the good man always.
author: Sophocles

quote: How can we prepare for the future if we won’t acknowledge the past?
author: N.K. Jemisin, The Stone Sky

quote: Negative desires can cause no evil if you do not allow yourself to be seduced by them.
author: Paulo Coelho, Maktub

quote: It is left only to God and to the angels to be lookers on.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Each city receives its form from the desert it opposes.
author: Italo Calvino

quote: Richard Nixon coveted, to the point of obsession, a controversy-free, stage-managed coronation.
author: David Pietrusza, 1960--LBJ vs. JFK vs. Nixon: The Epic Campaign That Forged Three Presidencies

quote: In what concerns you much, do not think that you have companions: know that you are alone in the world.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Ah coffee. The sweet balm by which we shall accomplish today's tasks.
author: Holly Black, Ironside

quote: Change is uncomfortable, but it’s helpful!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Six Words Inspiration

quote: Keep the personal, personal and do not be guilty of spreading bad feelings.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That

quote: One thing God has been showing me is that I'm not called to save the world, just to point those He places in my life towards the right way.
author: J.R. Rim

quote: Sometimes she thought the Creator had only made men to cause trouble for women.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: Some say that the age of chivalry is past, that the spirit of romance is dead. The age of chivalry is never past, so long as there is a wrong left unredressed on earth.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: One of the hardest expressions of self-assertiveness is challenging your limiting beliefs.
author: Nathaniel Branden

quote: Gentleness doesn't get work done unless you happen to be a hen laying eggs.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: The men who are dropped in a jungle or a desert and expected video games and got mundanity and depravity and friends dying like animals.
author: Dave Eggers, Your Fathers, Where Are They? And the Prophets, Do They Live Forever?

quote: I had fallen too far. I was in love with Rush Finlay.
author: Abbi Glines, Fallen Too Far

quote: Be careful of what you allow your mind to dwell on. And the words that come out of your mouth.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I will find comfort in the rhythm of the sea.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: Things had improved after he was born. We both loved him with such fervor that it was impossible that some wouldn’t splash back on us.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Of Christmas Present

quote: Someone needs to put a muzzle on President Trump sooner rather than later.
author: Steven Magee

quote: It is completely raw, the sort of thing I feel free to do with the door shut—it’s the story undressed, standing up in nothing but its socks and undershorts.
author: Stephen King, On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and loose ourselves at the same time.
author: Thomas Merton, No Man Is an Island

quote: Truth doesn’t need to be defended. Truth just is.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Sleepers: A Little Book on How to Find Hope, Meaning and the Courage to Fall in Love with Your Dreams

quote: The big thinking gives us vision, power and direction, but it is the small steps that are the action of the process.
author: John Patrick Hickey, All You Have Is Now: How Your Approach to the World Determines Your Destiny

quote: Lila!" he said cheerfully. "So you aren't a figment of my brothers imagination after all.
author: V.E. Schwab, A Gathering of Shadows

quote: I went to him in the doorway and embraced him tightly. "Thank you," I whispered. "You've done so much for us, and we've done nothing for you.""Don't say that." Vic's hands patted my back. "You're my friends. Nothing else to it.
author: Claudia Gray, Afterlife

quote: Life is Won when you learn to run in the Sun and have Fun before Life is done.
author: RVM

quote: I want to speak to the dream in your heart. That dream that has taken a backseat as you have strived to live up to something different.
author: Suzette R. Hinton

quote: We stumble on, thinks Jaslyn, bring a little noise into the silence, find in others the ongoing of ourselves. It is almost enough.
author: Colum McCann, Let the Great World Spin

quote: When we are loving, we openly and honestly express care, affection, responsibility, respect, commitment, and trust.
author: bell hooks, All About Love: New Visions

quote: They told us love was a disease. They told us it would kill us in the end.For the very first time I realize, that this, too, might also be a lie.
author: Lauren Oliver, Delirium

quote: Hundreds of thousands of American servicemen and women are deployed across the world in the war on terror. By bringing hope to the oppressed, and delivering justice to the violent, they are making America more secure.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Life is worth living but not worth thinking about.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: My greatest concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are concerned with your failure.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: We can do nothing without prayer. All things can be done by importunate prayer. It surmounts or removes all obstacles  overcomes every resisting force and gains its ends in the face of invincible hindrances.
author: E. M. Bounds

quote: Many people in this world want you to follow them blindly, no questions asked , they wanna control your fate, your heart, soul & thoughts, I tell you...Follow your heart , listen to what it has to say .
author: Sami Abouzid

quote: If the willingness is there, you can graciously fulfill your dream.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Oh, he did his best to make their short lives miserable, because that was his job, but nothing he could think up was half as bad as the stuff they thought up themselves.
author: Terry Pratchett, Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch

quote: When you tend to another's dying embers, you find both warmth and an increase in the glow of your own fire.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: All you need is a vision and everything else will fall in place. Trust me
author: Charmaine J. Forde

quote: Keep moving. Don't get bogged down. Don't think about the bad stuff. Smile and joke even when you don't feel like it.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Destiny brought two souls, Jeremiah and Lailah Akita, to light the world with love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It's not easy to get close to anyone.... Everyone's afraid of everybody else.... maybe because we're all afraid of ourselves.
author: Ellen Hopkins

quote: Just fancy! One can hear and see the grass growing,' thought Levin, as he noticed wet slate-coloured aspen leaf move close to the point of a blade of grass.
author: Leo Tolstoy, Anna Karenina

quote: Kindness is the best style that you can wear anytime and anywhere.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: For spiritual vision of our soul, we need to balance between quantitative illusions & qualitative reality of our life.
author: Aditya Ajmera

quote: A sens of humor can avoid many misunderstandings.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Once you eliminate the impossible, whatever remains, no matter how improbable, must be the truth.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: If the storm underestimates your power, nothing happens to him; but if you underestimate the power of the storm, you sink!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Others may write from the head, but he writes from the heart, and the heart will always understand him.
author: Washington Irving, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow and Other Stories

quote: To create extraordinary results, you must first have or ReThink an extraordinary Mindset to start.
author: Tony Dovale

quote: I believe that all government is evil, and that trying to improve it is largely a waste of time.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: In times of adversity, you will realize who is there for you. The struggle is real and those who walk with you with love, are honorable true friends. Be thankful for the friends and loved ones you’ve got.
author: Angie karan

quote: Few people know so clearly what they want. Most people can't even think what to hope for when they throw a penny in a fountain.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: It’s you and me that matters to me and you.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: Love is the best school, but the tuition is high and the homework can be painful.
author: Diane Ackerman

quote: Be careful how you treat those who you perceive to be below you. The universe has a way of favoring the underdog.
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones, Giants At Play: Finding Wisdom, Courage, And Acceptance To Encounter Your Destiny

quote: Such a small, pure object a poem could be, made of nothing but air a tiny string of letters, maybe small enough to fit in the palm of your hand. But it could blow everybody's head off.
author: Mary Karr, Lit

quote: Book sense makes sense because someone has gone through it before and able to share it with you. Your job is to listen and discern.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Solitude, the joy of being alone, stems from, as well as promotes, a state of maturity and inner richness.
author: Neel Burton, Heaven and Hell: The Psychology of the Emotions

quote: Surround yourself with people who believe in your dreams, encourage your ideas, support your ambitions, and bring out the best in you.
author: Roy  Bennett

quote: If a person do not seek God’s face, all of his merits will be working for evil
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I can't change you and you can't change me, but together we can work to change the world.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Those who lived by the sword were forced to die by it.
author: T.H. White, The Once and Future King

quote: Our identity rests in God's relentless tenderness for us revealed in Jesus Christ.
author: Brennan Manning, Abba's Child: The Cry of the Heart for Intimate Belonging

quote: Words are very powerful," Miss Possibelf said, stepping lightly between the rows of desk. "And they take on more power the more they're spok
author: Rainbow Rowell, Fangirl

quote: Meditation is to dive all the way within, beyond thought, to the source of thought and pure consciousness. It enlarges the container, every time you transcend. When you come out, you come out refreshed, filled with energy and enthusiasm for life.
author: David Lynch

quote: Older people shouldn't eat health food, they need all the preservatives they can get.
author: Robert Orben

quote: Sympathy constitutes friendship  but in love there is a sort of antipathy  or opposing passion. Each strives to be the other  and both together make up one whole.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: The public history of modern art is the story of conventional people not knowing what they are dealing with.
author: Golda Meir

quote: They were lucky. They'd been given history.
author: Kate Atkinson, A God in Ruins

quote: A diminished self-image will cause you to slouch, to avoid meeting others, to avoid looking others in the eye, to be unassertive, and to be indecisive.
author: Chris Prentiss, The Laws of Love: Creating the Relationship of Your Dreams

quote: Everyone helping out was supposed to make me feel better, but it actually made me feel more like a screw up.
author: Kathy Bryson, Fighting Mad

quote: Beliefs are not related to religion but they are basically about who you are.
author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: Children of God, Children of the light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Skeptics would rather, even at their own expense, appear to be right than take the risk of trusting.
author: John Ortberg, Faith and Doubt

quote: You will surely be rewarded for every seed of good deed and godliness.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: I will speak of love until you go mad and join me in my mad worship of love.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Your past history is NOT an excuse.
author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

quote: Old age is just a record of one's whole life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Education is a chemical reaction between knowledge and the mind; the byproducts are new thoughts, new ideas, new perceptions, and new feelings.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We must turn from worthless things towards faith in God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It is difficult to cultivate a healthy relationship in a landscape overgrown with blame, lack of trust, and betrayal
author: Saji Ijiyemi

quote: If life is a song, and God is the divine conductor, I must consider these trials and troubles as the harmony of my song, for every song needs more than a melody!
author: Evinda Lepins

quote: Your strength is greater than your struggles.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: To find it, give the love that you seek.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: How much I missed, simply because I was afraid of missing it.
author: Paulo Coelho, Brida

quote: If she opened the closet with her skeletons, they might drag her in with them.
author: Kayla Krantz, Alive at Sunset

quote: I hate being placed on committees. They are always having meetings at which half are absent and the rest late.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: In every endeavour, we need God’s grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: We are such stuff as dreams are made on and our little life is rounded with a sleep.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Smiles are the dance of our soul,with the music of love, to express the beauty of mind,for the happiness of spirit,and for the joy of the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You can't edit a blank page
author: Nora Roberts

quote: Peace in my mind,Peace in my heart,Peace in my dreams And peace in my thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you conform, you can never reform.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In my youth, the question chiefly important to me was—What sort of man shall I decide to be? At nineteen one asks oneself this question; at thirty-nine we say, “I wish Fate hadn’t made me this sort of man.
author: Jerome K. Jerome, Second Thoughts Of An Idle Fellow

quote: Your life is about you and your God alone.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: Never settle up for something that is lesser than what you expected.
author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

quote: Be courageous. I have seen many depressions in business. Always America has emerged from these stronger and more prosperous. Be brave as your fathers before you. Have faith! Go forward!
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Living honestly is a prerequisite for a clear conscience.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: It is so fatally easy to make young children believe that they are horrible.
author: T.H. White, The Once and Future King

quote: A painting is a universal language which everyone can read, understand, and interpret in his own way through the power of imagination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The true man wants two things: danger and play. For that reason he wants woman, as the most dangerous plaything.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Only redeemed children of God can become redeemers for their people
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: That is a dream also; only he has remained asleep, while you have awakened; and who knows which of you is the most fortunate?
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Mistletoe," said Luna dreamily, pointing at a large clump of white berries placed almost over Harry's head. He jumped out from under it. "Good thinking," said Luna seriously. "It's often infested with nargles.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Tis best to weigh the enemy more mighty than he seems.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Every life is different because you passed this way and touched history.
author: Barbara Kingsolver, The Poisonwood Bible

quote: Stolen oranges also have Vitamin C. Likewise, a stolen salmon, too, has omega-3 fatty acids.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Declare it. Just the same way we declare war. That is how we will have peace... we just need to declare it.
author: John Lennon

quote: In the flailing light they all looked sharp-edged and ethereal and divided by great distances
author: Virginia Woolf, To the Lighthouse

quote: The more I know about God, I am convinced He likes to read books and authors are His librarians. Every soul is a story waiting to be read.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: When you star arises, your cloud of opposition awakens
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: You either LIVE or you THINK!
author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quote: History will have to record that the greatest tragedy of this period of social transition was not the strident clamor of the bad people, but the appalling silence of the good people.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: In order to compete with God for the dominion of the world, Satan, whom Christ called “the prince of this world,” was forced to go into the “religion” business.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Stop identification of your thoughts nd celebrate Now. Bcz life is made up of time that is NOW . . . . .!!!
author: Sushil Singh

quote: A liberated woman is one who has sex before marriage and a job after.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: In every person, there is a doer and a devil. With every passing days, the doer dies and a devil has to rise.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Success is relative. We shouldn't compare the financial success between a person born into riches and the one born into abject poverty.
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: ¿Preguntas cúal es el fundamento de la sabiduría? No gozarte en cosas vanas.
author: Seneca, Moral letters to Lucilius Volume 1

quote: The securest place is a prison cell, but there is no liberty
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: While scholarly research provides extensive information, the real Jesus, the man who voiced various timeless insights on life, can only be revealed when life is understood better than the common mindset of our time allows.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer, The Illusion of "Truth": The Real Jesus Behind the Grand Myth

quote: I have great respect for you - once you are dead, and gone
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: If we cannot now end our differences, at least we can help make the world safe for diversity.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Stagnancy will suffocate a business… Leadership must be dynamic and evolving to ensure successful growth, enhancement, and longevity.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Minds have their own weather systems. You are in a hurricane. Hurricanes run out of energy eventually. Hold on.
author: Matt Haig, Reasons to Stay Alive

quote: No one here likes a wet dog.
author: Billy Collins

quote: Love is the divinity of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: True courage is knowing not when to take a life, but to save one.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: In the long history of the world, only a few generations have been granted the role of defending freedom in its hour of maximum danger. I do not shrink from this responsibility - I welcome it.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Eternity is in love with the productions of time.
author: William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

quote: What counts is not necessarily the size of the dog in the fight - it's the size of the fight in the dog.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: As many political writers have pointed out, commitment to political equality is not an empirical claim that people are clones.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: A specialist’s mind is a slave to his specialization.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: No cause is left but the most ancient of all, the one, in fact, that from the beginning of our history has determined the very existence of politics, the cause of freedom versus tyranny.
author: Hannah Arendt

quote: I respect myself and receive joy form all directions.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: When you love someone, you don’t care that she ate your sandwich. You only hope she found it delicious.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: If we’ve somehow become convinced that the script we followed ‘yesterday’ can’t be edited, it will be incredibly difficult to tell the difference between ‘yesterday’ and ‘tomorrow’.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Be a learning machine. What made you money last year, won't necessarily make you money this and next year.
author: Richie Norton

quote: To Fulfill Destiny Is To Walk In The Ordained
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: History does not remember the forgettable. It honors the unique minority the majority cannot forget.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Criticism of one’s appearance hurts, no matter what.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: You are going to end up as one of those sad old men who poke around in rubbish bins.”“I’m going to end up in a hole in the ground... And so are you. So are we all.
author: J.M. Coetzee, Disgrace

quote: The most effective form of creation is an act of cooperation, not force.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: If you open the flood gates of thought you do not know what may come. You may discover that you are better than you thought or worse than the devil himself
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: ...art had no moral responsibility. Art, he argued, should strive only to be a beautiful object entirely separate from its creator.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: As a success-minded person, you should always be looking to not only do your job but do it with excellence and go the extra mile.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That

quote: Even so, I’m somebody.I’m the Discoverer of Nature.I’m the Argonaut of true sensations.I bring a new Universe to the UniverseBecause I bring the Universe to itself.
author: Alberto Caeiro, The Keeper of Sheep

quote: If you hit bottom, there's a whole lot of people here to help you up
author: Suzanne Collins, Gregor and the Code of Claw

quote: The soul is beautiful and blissful.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It costs a man just as much or even more to go to hell than to come to heaven. Narrow, exceedingly narrow is the way to perdition!
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: Most people, whatever their opinions and protestations, do not want to learn.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: Civilization will not attain to its perfection until the last stone from the last church falls on the last priest.
author: Émile Zola

quote: Some stories end in despair, some begin there
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Some people will only love you as much as they can use you, their loyalty ends where the benefits cease.
author: honeya

quote: The cake had a trick candle that wouldn't go out, so I didn't get my wish. Which was just that it would always be like this, that my life could be a party just for me.
author: Janet Fitch, White Oleander

quote: We joyfully pray with grateful heart to welcome blessings in New Year.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Expect success, abundance, and happiness. You will attract only that which you expect.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We rely on faith only in the context of claims for which there is no sufficient sensory or logical evidence.
author: Sam Harris

quote: Politics is pointless if it does nothing to enhance the beauty of our lives.
author: Howard Zinn, You Can't Be Neutral on a Moving Train: A Personal History of Our Times

quote: The treasures of life are hidden in a book.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: We will never outrun the nagging of original divinely inspired purpose.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Mental fight means thinking against the current, not with it. It is our business to puncture gas bags and discover the seeds of truth.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: The disciples of Jesus Christ, believes in God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Sooner or later, I hate to break it to you, you're gonna die, so how do you fill in the space between here and there? It's yours. Seize your space.
author: Margaret Atwood
