quote: Tonight I can write the saddest lines.To think that I do not have her. To feel that I have lost her.To hear the immense night, still more immense without her,And the verse falls to the snow like dew to the pasture.
author: Pablo Neruda, Twenty Love Poems and a Song of Despair

quote: A single word spoken at an appropriate time can make someone feel loved, comforted or happier.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: You don’t need to provide answers to question like “why were you born?”. Be committed to what excites you and what excites you will provide the answers!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: Explore the depth of the sacred world.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Don't be too timid and squeamish about your actions. All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, Journals of Ralph Waldo Emerson, with Annotations - 1841-1844

quote: Generosity gives assistance  rather than advice.
author: Vauvenargues

quote: You struggle alone. But rejoice in success with many.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: How do you feel right now?" "I hurt like hell.""You'll feel worse tomorrow.""So?""So, better get a jump on this while you still feel...not as bad.""What kind of logic is that?" I retorted.
author: Richelle Mead, Vampire Academy

quote: What this world needs now… more balloons and clowns
author: David W. Earle

quote: You can only give yourself a chance to find right things when you stop chasing wrong things.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: All human wisdom is contained in these two words: 'wait' and 'hope'".
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: But at night, when the library lamps are lit, the outside world disappears and nothing but the space of books remains in existence.
author: Alberto Manguel, The Library at Night

quote: If your students aren't learning, then maybe you're not teaching.
author: Ace Antonio Hall

quote: Whether you are aged or weak, you can still serve the Lord
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Trust is tough. Once trust has been broken by multiple people on multiple occasions, believing in anyone or anything becomes increasingly difficult. Much of the skepticism of our world can be traced back to broken trust.
author: Dillon Burroughs, Hunger No More: A 1-Year Devotional Journey Through the Psalms

quote: Do what you were called to do and guard your calling
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Improving your life doesn’t have to be about changing everything – it’s about making changes that count.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Trying to be offensive for the sole purpose of being offensive should always deem one the least offensive of offenders.
author: Criss Jami, Healology

quote: The objection to conforming to usages that have become dead to you is that it scatters your force. It loses your time and blurs the impression of your character.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You can't prepare for the things that change your life. They come suddenly and unannounced.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Peace comes at a price, often only at the end of a hard-fought battle.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: No, my young apprentice. You said the exact right thing. Again. I'm just laughing at life.""Why?" he asked, opening both his eyes."Because sometimes it's either laugh or cry. I prefer laugh. How about you?
author: P.C. Cast, Brighid's Quest

quote: You cannot create experience. You must undergo it.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Life has a meaning but do not set out to find out. Just live it out.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: To live and love is a great fulfillment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Be passionate about creating a life that is exciting and fun, one that will help you reach your ultimate potential.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Judge little but love much.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We can forgive a man for making a useful thing as long as he does not admire it. The only excuse for making a useless thing is that one admires it intensely.All art is quite useless.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Sometimes I fear that even as a People when we take one step forward, we reel backwards ten times fold. I don't even think on the Precipice of Change will we truly move forward... It will most definitely take a Miracle.
author: Solange nicole

quote: Thus like a Captive in an Isle confin'd,Man walks at large, a Pris'ner of the Mind
author: John Dryden, Four Plays by Dryden: The Conquest of Granada parts 1 and 2, Marriage-a-la-Mode, and The Assignation

quote: There is absolutely everything in great fiction but a clear answer.
author: Eudora Welty

quote: The first requisite for the happiness of the people is the abolition of religion.
author: Karl Marx

quote: It may be a man's world, but men are easily controlled by women.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: We find ourselves in the pursuit of our dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: (I) only write it now because I have grown to believe that there is no dangerous idea, which does not become less dangerous when written out in sincere and careful English. ("The Adoration of The Magi")
author: W.B. Yeats

quote: Life demands discomfort and pain.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Grief, my friend, forces us to search our souls and find answers to issues that constrain us from becoming better human beings.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Union Moujik

quote: wherever you find the greatest good, you will find the greatest evil, because evil loves paradise as much as good.
author: Wallace Stegner, All the Little Live Things

quote: Shane kissed her one more time, lightly and softly, and fluffed her hair back from her face. “To be continued,” he said. “I hate cliff-hangers.” “Blame Eve.
author: Rachel Caine, Fade Out

quote: Spiritual is criterion, where free will exists in plenty.
author: Gian Kumar

quote: I can elect something I love and absorb myself in it.
author: Anaïs Nin, The Diary of Anaïs Nin, Vol. 1: 1931-1934

quote: You will get your father's wealth one day but not his legacy.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Days become weeks. Weeks become months. Month become years. And years become silence.
author: Christy  Hall, The Little Silkworm

quote: If you would not be forgotten, as soon as you are dead and rotten, either write things worth reading, or do things worth writing.
author: Benjamin Franklin, Poor Richard's Almanack

quote: Never trust books on the question of whether or not to trust your rational thinking. Trust your rational thinking on the question of whether or not to trust the books.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: It is not enough just to believe in Christ. We have to believe that He believes in us so we can believe in ourselves. That’s a sentence that deserves a re-read.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Both men and women remain in dysfunctional, loveless relationships when it is materially opportune.
author: bell hooks, All About Love: New Visions

quote: She had the bizarre feeling of time bending all around her, as though she was from the past reading about the future, or from the future reading about the past.
author: Mohsin Hamid, Exit West

quote: I had rather hear my dog bark at a crow, than a man swear he loves me.
author: William Shakespeare, Much Ado About Nothing

quote: God works through angels, people, nature and animals.
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: God’s perfect plan and purpose shall be fulfilled in my life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Grief does not change you, Hazel. It reveals you.
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Go for what you want.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: She'd known me my whole life. It's hard to throw away history. It was like you were throwing a part of yourself.
author: Jenny Han, The Summer I Turned Pretty

quote: Wisdom is the most important part of happiness.
author: Sophocles

quote: Maya wrapped one leg around him, writhing against him as she threaded her fingers through his hair and held him to her, urging him on."Never stop touching me that way," Maya rasped.
author: Sara  Humphreys, Vampire Trouble

quote: God is like a mirror, consistent, stable, unchanging; reflecting His image of us, that is always changing.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Make the world a better place by resolving to do something good for someone different every day.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: A taste for ostentation is rarely associated in the same souls with a taste for honesty
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: People wonder who is who,Everyone is different - even you!
author: Christina Engela, Other Kids Are Kids Almost Just Like You

quote: People remain what they are  even when their faces fall to pieces.
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: Intuition is using the inner body energy and heart to pave the way for your life.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: Smartass Disciple: Master, what is the secret recipe of your happiness?Master of Stupidity: If I tell you, there is nobody left to be made fun of.
author: Toba Beta

quote: your trouble is you. you came and get to know the facts ,which were not for you .now till end you will claim your share in to the story ,will remain as outsider
author: litymunshi

quote: Love is spelt C-O-L-O-R.AndColor is spelt L-O-V-E.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Believe, believe and it shall be!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Premeditated anger is a bitch. Instead of saying, "Next time he does this, I will ... ", say, "Next time he does that, I will show him more patience and more love. That's premeditative love. She's much sexier!
author: Ace Antonio Hall

quote: Was that all it took to be brave? Knowing that someone believed in you?
author: Jodi Picoult, Between the Lines

quote: It's time for both of us to be free.
author: Jessica Khoury, Origin

quote: Afflictions are but the shadow of His wings.
author: George MacDonald, The Curate of Glaston

quote: Fear and doubt are major stampeders.
author: Karen Marie Moning, Iced

quote: Some of the most miserable people I have ever met have been people who are very popular with the public, but down inside are empty and miserable.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: But you're like me,” he says. “An outsider. Different. A freak. We're both weird, which is why we get along.
author: Darren Shan, Lord Loss

quote: That surge of power and delight, of confidence, of control. That sudden sense of the richness of the world. Its infinite possibility.
author: Donna Tartt, The Secret History

quote: But between now and then, there was Life; and Bod walked into it with his eyes and his heart wide open.
author: Neil Gaiman, The Graveyard Book

quote: Would you rather work forty hours a week at a job you hate or eighty hours a week doing work you love?
author: Jay Samit, Disrupt You!: Master Personal Transformation, Seize Opportunity, and Thrive in the Era of Endless Innovation

quote: Do not too late to tell me, I love you.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We cannot keep on blaming the past leaders about the present circumstances. We need to be mindful that if we do nothing to improve the present circumstances, our children will also blame us in the future.
author: Gugu Mona

quote: I will ask questions that are so wide and open they will feel the need to speak for a week. Then from the information that they give to me, I will mould solutions designed specifically for them.
author: Chris     Murray, The Extremely Successful Salesman's Club

quote: Love the person, not his position.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You say that this society will come to an end, because societies always have done so. I wonder whether they have ended because they were not really societies at all.
author: Idries Shah, Reflections

quote: I pity you all... Most of you will die---scratch that---ALL of you.
author: Gerard Way, The Umbrella Academy, Vol. 2: Dallas

quote: The purpose of the Kingdom is the essence of life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Men didn't respect beauty...they used it.
author: Nora Roberts, Montana Sky

quote: Without sense of purpose and clear direction of your life, you will only be building a fake brand of you
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive, The No Nonsense Guide to Personal Branding for Career Success

quote: If you want to get educated, fall in love with learning.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is the energy of a sacred-soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You are my favourite part of me.
author: Jenim Dibie

quote: You love Roth," he continued for me."You're in love with him." My eyes met his bright blue ones."Yes," I whispered, my lower lip trembling."It's him. It's always been him.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout, Every Last Breath

quote: [The decay of Logic results from an] untroubled assumption that the particular is real and the universal is not.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Do the thing you fear the most and the death of fear is certain.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Give me ten thousand Filipino soldiers and I will conquer the world.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Just above our terror, the stars painted this storyin perfect silver calligraphy. And our souls, too oftenabused by ignorance, covered our eyes with mercy.
author: Aberjhani, I Made My Boy Out of Poetry

quote: ABILITY TO TURN FAILURES INTO MEANINGFUL LIFE LESSONS IS WHAT MAKES A PERSON A TRUE ACHIEVER.
author: Seema Brain Openers

quote: Yesterday I was sad, today I am happy! Yesterday I had a problem, today I still have the same problem! But today I changed the way I look at it!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: You're the one who has to live with your choice," she says. "Everyone else will get over it, move on, no matter what you decide. But you never will.
author: Veronica Roth, The Transfer

quote: It is very humbling to see my own character defects in someone who annoys me. At the end of the day, I realize they have actually prompted positive change in me.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Walking out with the people, I didn't know which was more exciting, the air race, the parachute jump that failed, or the cunt.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: You are moving on the chariot of your desire whatever you are thinking is always right.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Even the strongest of opponents always has a weakness.-Itachi Uchiha
author: Masashi Kishimoto

quote: The origin of the word fail means to stop functioning. So as long as you haven't stopped, you haven't failed.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: There were differences between memories and dreams. He had only dreams of things he had wanted to do, while Lespere had memories of things done and accomplished. And this knowledge began to pull Hollis apart, with a slow, quivering precision.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Writing is not just my Hobby . Pen is mouthpiece of my feelings,I have no another one But paper is my best friend. and My Best Friend always Listen so patiently whatever,whenever i speak
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: There are things known and there are things unknownand in between are the doors.
author: Jim Morrison, Letters from Joe

quote: I felt my lungs inflate with the onrush of scenery—air, mountains, trees, people. I thought, "This is what it is to be happy.
author: Sylvia Plath, The Bell Jar

quote: Let us all practice the power of love to win the peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Sometimes you just need to distance yourself from people. If they care, they'll notice. If they don't, you know where you stand.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: We are always the same age inside.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: Strength of character isn't always about how much you can handle before you break, it's also about how much you can handle after you've broken.
author: Robert Tew

quote: What are these pines & these birds about? What is this pond a-doing? I must know a little more.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The jar of oil is sacred anointing
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: He tasted of whisky and his skin was rough where he hadn’t shaved, but Mirabelle kissed him back.
author: Sara Sheridan, British Bulldog

quote: The potential of your life experience shrinks or expands according to your ability to love.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: In the realm of faith, there is no fear.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: All real works of art look as though they were done in joy.
author: Robert Henri

quote: Fear triggers need, need powers sincerity. Sincerity is the required element.
author: Terry Goodkind, The First Confessor

quote: Maybe there is no such thing as success—a final destination where you arrive once and for all. Maybe existence is a never-ending journey of peaks and valleys and forever chasing dreams.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: To achieve peace,we needed to have a war to start with.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Never underestimate the potential of your dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The strength and power of despotism consists wholly in the fear of resistance.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: It was never about the world being too big, it was more like she was too much for the world to handle.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: Music is like a dream. One that I cannot hear.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Once you let the truth loose it is like setting a fire that you can't stop.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: My father wrote: "Always question where your loyalties lie. The people you trust will expect it, your greatest enemies will desire it, and those you treasure the most, will, without fail, abuse it.
author: Emily Thorne

quote: Imagination belongs to hope. It’s the creative dance of possibility.
author: Sharon Weil, ChangeAbility: How Artists, Activists, and Awakeners Navigate Change

quote: Doubt, fear, and hesitation are enemies of the mind, for a weak will severs our inborn connection with the universe, dampens the faith with which we are able to join our will to it.
author: Stephen Richards, How to Get Everything You Can Imagine: Volume 1: How Mind Power Works

quote: The books are to remind us what asses and fools we are.
author: Ray Bradbury, Fahrenheit 451

quote: Introspection does not need to be a still life. It can be an active alchemy.
author: Anaïs Nin, The Diary of Anaïs Nin, Vol. 1: 1931-1934

quote: People would say - to break free, to soar, and sadly, to chop your wings too. The moment you listen to them, you voluntarily put yourself in a cage. Be a free soul - fly or fall on your own terms.
author: Saru Singhal

quote: Developing a true and solid character and finding unique traits that belong to only you is a foundational thing
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Carpe Diem - Seize the Moment. Every moment must be seized. Every little moment sets you up for the big moments. If you don't seize the small ones you won't be ready for the big ones.
author: Bobby F. Kimbrough Jr.

quote: A baby is the source of pure joy, a bundle of a warm smile, and a heart of dancing love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Had the love been perennial, there won’t have been murders of wives by husbands and murders of husbands by wives, who were lovers at a point of time.
author: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

quote: Against eternal injustice, man must assert justice, and to protest against the universe of grief, he must create happiness.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Confess your faults one to another  and pray one for another  that ye may be healed. The effectual  fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
author: Bible

quote: Thinking is mind over matter.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Fear causes the dog to bite and Roze was one bitch.
author: Maria V. Snyder, Magic Study

quote: The mother who lay in the grave, was the mother of my infancy; the little creature in her arms, was myself, as I had once been, hushed for ever on her bosom.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Losing something is difficult while gaining something is easier. So try to gain beauty and make your life prettier.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: True love is very silent, very personal, very non-demanding, and nonjudgmental.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you go to the workplace thinking that you are a mere employee, you can only be an employee. If you go with an Entrepreneur consciousness, you can definitely become an Entrepreneur
author: Rajasaraswathii, Success-Talks : For Evolution of Your Success

quote: Courage leads you to win battles everyone may lose.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

quote: To be happy: the simple pursue pleasure, the common pursue riches, the uncommon pursue knowledge, and the exceptional pursue wisdom.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You can drive in your imaginations to make a tour to your future, visit it and see all kinds of good things hiding in there. But you have to take bold actions before you can truly relocate into what you see!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: You are capable of loving. Love deeply.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Rather than words comes the thought of high windows:The sun-comprehending glass,And beyond it, the deep blue air, that showsNothing, and is nowhere, and is endless.
author: Philip Larkin, High Windows

quote: Great issues develop from small beginnings.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: The gates of hell are open night and day;Smooth the descent, and easy is the way:But to return, and view the cheerful skies,In this the task and mighty labor lies.
author: Virgil, The Aeneid

quote: Most books on witchcraft will tell you that witches work naked. This is because most books on witchcraft are written by men.
author: Terry Pratchett, Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch

quote: The mind is a magnetic field. When it a attract good thoughts, it will produce good deeds.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: For me, the most magical truth of this universe is that no magic is required.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Renewed mind, revived spirit and restored strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If Makar Denisych was just a clerk or a junior manager, then no one would have dared talk to him in such a condescending, casual tone, but he is a 'writer', and a talentless medio
author: Anton Chekhov, The Exclamation Mark

quote: Cause me to hear thy loving kindness in the morning.
author: Bible

quote: Practice positive and affirming self-talk.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact

quote: Tranquil breeze Glittering beach Dancing water Bluest skyMy mind flies high with joyful laughter.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I'm a salami writer. I try to write good salami  but salami is salami.
author: Stephen King

quote: Just pick a goal and stick to it―no big complicated secret.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: There is no doubt fiction makes a better job of the truth.
author: Doris Lessing, Under My Skin: Volume One of My Autobiography, to 1949

quote: There is no bigger gratification than the realization of the things you believe in after overcoming all the odds.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: A lot of people are alive because I shed too much hair to get away with murder.
author: Darynda Jones, The Dirt on Ninth Grave

quote: How is it possible to write one's autobiography in a world so fast-changing as this?
author: Malcolm X, The Autobiography of Malcolm X

quote: Extending gratitude to another says, “I see what you’ve done and I thank you for the energy you put forth.
author: Molly Friedenfeld, The Book of Simple Human Truths

quote: You have purged your way. You are ready to lead sons of men.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
author: Kahlil Gibran, The Collected Works

quote: Losing excess fats through exercise is important, but losing useless friends is urgent. Treat urgent things first!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Let's Go to the Next Level

quote: The treacherous are ever distrustful.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Two Towers

quote: I am the bridge that connects these two ever- separated banks of human understanding.
author: Abhijit Naskar, In Search of Divinity: Journey to The Kingdom of Conscience

quote: Inspiration is the result of moments of insight and a key component of internal “drive.
author: Pearl Zhu, Thinkingaire: 100 Game Changing Digital Mindsets to Compete for the Future

quote: What if you spent some alone time every morning? Call it prayer. Call it planning. Call it centering. I call it a powerful way to begin the day.
author: Steve Goodier

quote: The future is the lie with which we justify the brutality of the present.
author: Anthony Marra, The Tsar of Love and Techno

quote: The Queen is coming to reclaim her girls.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: She says screens are the cigarettes of our age. They're toxic, and we're only going to realize the damage they're doing when it's too late.
author: Sophie Kinsella, Finding Audrey

quote: May all men find grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Thank God forgiven me of my many sins.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: In the plains the grass grows tall, since there is no one to cut it. There is no one to water it either.
author: Vera Nazarian, The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration

quote: The words you speak reveal the heart you have.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: Men. Do they all evade as first line of defense?
author: Karen Marie Moning, Bloodfever

quote: People don't realize that the future is just now, but later.
author: Russell Brand

quote: Nobody holds a good opinion of a man who has a low opinion of himself.
author: Anthony Trollope

quote: She was drawn to the wild warriors, they had to have a little gypsy in their veins.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: How casually and unobservedly we make all our most valued acquaintances.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life is like playing musical chairs –– you never know when the music will stop.” ~
author: Frank Sonnenberg, BookSmart: Hundreds of real-world lessons for success and happiness

quote: Alice! You know I love you like a sister!""Words." she growled.
author: Stephenie Meyer

quote: It's alright to love someone who doesn't love you back, as long as they're worth you loving them. As long as they deserve it.
author: Cassandra Clare, Clockwork Angel

quote: If you learn from defeat, you haven't really lost.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: He didn't know the right people. That's all a police record means in this rotten crime-ridden country.
author: Raymond Chandler, The Big Sleep

quote: Every theoretical explanation is a reduction of intuition.
author: Peter Høeg, Smilla's Sense of Snow

quote: Never focus on achieving your goals, focus on achieving the behaviors and beliefs that will help you achieve your goals
author: Harrish Sairaman

quote: Its the fate of all creators: They fall in love with their creations.
author: Michael  Grant, Eve & Adam

quote: You are one of the most beautiful and unique flowers in the garden of humanity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Cheerfulness and contentment are great beautifiers.
author: Jennifer E. Smith, The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight

quote: If you shake a tree, fruit must fall, no matter how reluctant it is.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: When you put your passion into your desire, when it becomes a fire that threatens to consume you unless you have it, then your will is in the right place.
author: Stephen Richards, Cosmic Ordering Guide

quote: What really holds their marriage together are mutual respect of an awesome depth, a shared sense of humor, faith that they were brought together by a force greater than themselves, and a love so unwavering and pure that it is sacred.
author: Dean Koontz, Forever Odd

quote: I looked up at the wall. My bachelor's degree had been in History. Films like Back to the Future and Quantum Leap had been some of my favorite programs. Could time travel really be possible? This seemed too unreal.

quote: Pain los[es] its power when other things bec[o]me more important.

quote: We are kept keen on the grindstone of pain and necessity.

quote: We can discover the capacity of the mind to be aware, to love, to begin again
author: Sharon Salzberg, A Heart as Wide as the World: Stories on the Path of Lovingkindness

quote: Why does anybody do anything?" Mimi asked impatiently. "Most of the time we don't know--any of us.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: now it’s computers and more computersand soon everybody will have one,3-year-olds will have computersand everybody will know everythingabout everybody elselong before they meet them.nobody will want to meet anybodyelse ever againand everybody will bea recluselike I am now.
author: Charles Bukowski, The Continual Condition: Poems

quote: It makes a soul lonely when even your tongue has no home.
author: Kiersten White, Illusions of Fate

quote: Vous travaillez pour l'armee, madame?' (You are working for the army?), a Frenchwoman said to me early in the Vietnam war, on hearing I had three sons.
author: Adrienne Rich, Of Woman Born: Motherhood as Experience and Institution

quote: Walk with me now into this very bright night, and revere with me in silence what must be God-given and what is surely God-taken.
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift

quote: To find the inner peace be utmost honest to yourself.

quote: Don’t let your mood or happiness be dictated by the judgement of others but stay true to that you believe in because you’re the architect of your own happiness.

quote: We never really had any kind of a Christmas. This is one part where my memory fails me completely.

quote: Time’s a goon, right? You gonna let that goon push you around?” Scotty shook his head. “The goon won.
author: Jennifer Egan, A Visit from the Goon Squad

quote: The true parents of creativity are curiosity and necessity.
author: Max McKeown, The Innovation Book: How to Manage Ideas and Execution for Outstanding Results

quote: We lead our lives like water flowing down a hill, going more or less in one direction until we splash into something that forces us to find a new course.
author: Arthur Golden, Memoirs of a Geisha

quote: Smile out loud! Make them wonder.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova, The New Land

quote: For someone like myself in whom the ability to trust others is so cracked and broken that I am wretchedly timid and am forever trying to read the expression on people's faces.
author: Osamu Dazai, No Longer Human

quote: Give yourself permission to enjoy this present moment. Resist the urge to fill it with I need to's, I shoulds, I coulds. Trying to fill all your present moments is impeding the natural flow of life.

quote: I could take back those moments that snatched you away from me or maybe just wipe away those ten minutes when you came to me for the first time and I looked into your eyes to realise what love is.

quote: Well, that cinched it. He was an asshole. I was definitely going to end up sleeping with him.
author: Molly Harper, How to Flirt with a Naked Werewolf

quote: Every day is a journey.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: After you die, a rare friend or family member may carry your memory throughout life. Most will forget you. As if you were never here.

quote: Think of only three things: your God  your family and the Green Bay Packers-in that order.

quote: I want to drink from you're life force.

quote: Stress can also lead to poor posture because it causes you to breathe more shallowly, which leads to slumping.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: Deep scientific psychoanalysis reveals that excessive beliefs and dependence on religion is a superstition and fear induced psychiatric disease.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Neal huffed. Frustrated. "I hate that you thought I wouldn't call--I hate that everything is so tentative between us right now. When did everything get so tentative?
author: Rainbow Rowell, Landline

quote: If you can’t handle others’ disapproval, then leadership isn’t for you.
author: Miles Anthony Smith, Why Leadership Sucks™ Fundamentals of Level 5 Leadership and Servant Leadership

quote: Cherish every person and all opportunities. Have no fears, no doubts and no regrets. Focus on what you can give, not on what you can get.

quote: In the end you should always do the right thing even if it's hard.

quote: No days, perhaps, of all our childhood are ever so fully lived are those that we had regarded as not being lived at all: days spent wholly with a favourite book.
author: Marcel Proust, Days of Reading

quote: When a person is devastated, it coneys that the individual is regretting for his or her mistakes.

quote: There are things that life demands of every person living on the surface of the earth.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Having confidence in your obedience, offers yourself confidence and love.

quote: The secret to success is constancy of purpose.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.

quote: All lovers meet and love by chance.

quote: America has a unique type of poverty that looks like wealth.

quote: As more women lean in to their careers, more men need to lean in to their families. We need to encourage men to be more ambitious in their homes.

quote: He shrugs. "Doesn't help to waste my time thinking about would've-beens."Laila whispers, "He says to the girl with a mind full of them.

quote: The fiction writer has to engage in a continual examination of conscience. He has to be aware of the freak in himself.

quote: Too many people in this world think small is the best they can do. Not you, Libby Strout. You weren't born for small! You don't know how to do small! Small is not in you!

quote: For every laugh, there should be a tear.
author: Walt Disney Company

quote: All success comes down to this . . . action
author: Rob Liano

quote: May God give you inner peace, joy and happiness.

quote: The vision teller tells the vision to unguarded minds' of prey. The programmed.

quote: All churches are an echo of this—the Cathedral of Nature.

quote: Would you rather live one perfect day over and over or live your life with no perfect days but just decent ones?

quote: Finding your purpose is a lifelong adventure. Enjoy the journey.

quote: Forgiveness is the joy of friendship.

quote: The vast distances that separate the stars are providential. Beings and worlds are quarantined from one another. The quarantine is lifted only for those with sufficient self-knowledge and judgment to have safely traveled from star to star.

quote: Me and my dad are the biggest promoters of an estate tax in the US. It's not a popular position.
author: Bill Gates

quote: If you could arrange to avoid that routine job-world, you were an intellectual or an artist. Too restless, tremorous, agitated, too mad to sit at a desk eight hours a day, you needed an institution - a higher institution.
author: Saul Bellow, Humboldt's Gift

quote: how can i everbreathe normally againafter having been cradledby the kind of sorrowso silent, that it nourishesafter having been sweptby the kind of joyso absolute, that it wounds.
author: Sanober  Khan, Turquoise Silence

quote: The walls around the hood keep the people on the inside from the changes on the outside.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: Words could be quite enough for magic to occur, when the night was warm enough and the moon waxing.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Flies to Wanton Boys

quote: Every voyage is a new glorious experience.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I will do anything. Anything, Blaire, just to be near you. I can’t think about anything else. I can’t focus on anything. So never think you’re inconveniencing me. You need me, I’m there.

quote: I think it [religion] is an art, the greatest one; an extension of the communion all the other arts attempt.
author: Dodie Smith, I Capture the Castle

quote: It's not enough merely to exist. Every man has to seek in his own way to make his own self more noble and to relize his own true worth.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: I just want to live my own life instead of everyone else’s version of it.
author: Sol Luckman, Beginner's Luke

quote: In my opinion, being a Christian is a noticeable behavior. If you have to tell somebody you’re a Christian, then you’re probably not doing it right.

quote: To all young people out there: This is the time you should be fearless but not jobless. Identify the right job, find what excited you the most, find what you are the most passionate about.

quote: Why must ignorance be destroyed? Because it is the number one destroyer of the people of God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The beauty of souls is like the beauty of colours.

quote: What is false about hope?
author: Mitch Albom, The First Phone Call from Heaven

quote: The grace of God transforms the sinner into saint.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The words of men cannot be trusted, especially men like you!
author: Olga Goa, Fateful Italian Passion

quote: The most important part of life is in fact, the journey, and it's happening right now.
author: Julieanne O'Connor, SPELLING IT OUT FOR YOUR CAREER

quote: You dance inside my chest,where no one sees you,but sometimes I do, and thatsight becomes this art.

quote: Whenever I'm around him, all I can think about is how much more I want to be around him.

quote: I can trust my friends These people force me to examine myself, encourage me to grow.

quote: There was no necessity for either to have the last word. For the first word became the only word of their romantic conversation.
author: David Paul Kirkpatrick, The Address Of Happiness

quote: Nately had a bad start. He came from a good family.
author: Joseph Heller, Catch-22

quote: Drink nothing without seeing it  sign nothing without reading it.
author: Spanish proverb

quote: Listening over and over to the voices through a family of instruments allowed us to recognize and appreciate the dignity and uniqueness of each living thing in the meadow and forest.
author: Terry Tempest Williams, When Women Were Birds: Fifty-four Variations on Voice

quote: His supporters will push him to disaster unless his opponents show where the dangers are.
author: Walter Lippmann

quote: When sorrow's cup is filled up to the brim,the slightest touch of memory can cause tears to spill again.

quote: Many men but one Master.

quote: Pain & suffering requires time, awareness, and an intentional practice of self-love to disentangle.

quote: I am a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: If his forces are united, separate them.
author: Sun Tzu, The Art of War

quote: Look yourself... staring into the monitor... and your time is going to be lost like that...First secondsSecond minutesThird hours
author: Deyth Banger

quote: The best way to effectively use time is to schedule it.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: She found herself longing for home-not just for the hotel but for New York and all the real novels that she could lose herself in there.
author: Anna Godbersen, Envy

quote: To reprove a harm-doer, put him to shame by doing a good deed in return.

quote: Success is a path of setbacks, passion, purpose and inner strength

quote: So that others can live in peace, talk about love and peace wherever you go.

quote: The warmth and the passion in my veins are more than enough for a hundred thirsty girls.

quote: Friendship isn't a science mudboy. Just do what you think is right.
author: Eoin Colfer, The Opal Deception

quote: The soul needs meaning as much as the body needs food.
author: Richard Rohr, Adam's Return: The Five Promises of Male Initiation

quote: If you don’t practice presence, you never learn how to have busyness facilitate accomplishment.

quote: Passion is the 'not-so-secret' ingredient to success. Passion drives hard work, persistence and creativity.

quote: With craziness of mind, I have courage to live as I wish.

quote: Good memories are like charms...Each is special. You collect them, one by one, until one day you look back and discover they make a long, colorful bracelet.

quote: I try to avoid stories that end with...and he was never seen again.
author: Ken Poirot

quote: Who you are in Christ is far more important and meaningful than what has taken place in your past.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: If you want to be drunk, become drunk with an idea.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

quote: I hug him tightly. “I can’t imagine my life without you, Christian. I love you so much it frightens me.” “Me, too,” he breathes. “My life would be empty without you. I love you so much.
author: E.L. James, Fifty Shades Darker

quote: I can think of no more worthwhile aim than pursuing mastery in this craft while transcending one’s own limitations.
author: Chris Matakas

quote: I love mankind it's people I can't stand.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: A mature heart for Christ would much rather spend its time praising him than condemning his fanatics.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: I can't prove it scientifically, that there's a God, but I believe.
author: Billy Graham

quote: I'm convinced that everything I do will have a better outcome than the person who failed at it before me, because it’s the only reality I choose to accept.
author: Crystal Woods, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: ...What I depend on is a vigorous audience that can discover sweetness and light, beauty and truth, beyond the ability of the artist, on his own, to create them.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The recession and regression of any society are always an indication of how poorly the citizens of that country understand the value of time.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: The more we give, the more we are blessed to keep giving.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Rethink Success: Most people will never achieve past their existing levels, because they don't understand the importance of changing their Mindset
author: Tony Dovale

quote: The flame that burns Twice as bright burns half as long.
author: Lao Tzu, Te Tao Ching

quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: It is always worth itemising happiness, there is so much of the other thing in a life, you had better put down the markers for happiness while you can.
author: Sebastian Barry, The Secret Scripture

quote: I am so tired of talented lazy people.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Don't let reality, get in way of your dreams.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: What we call happiness is what we do not know.
author: Anatole France

quote: (I think Rowdy might be the most important person in my life. maybe more important than my family.) Can your best friend be more importamt than your family?
author: Sherman Alexie, The Absolutely True Diary of a Part-Time Indian

quote: The path of prayer is forever bright.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Reality is a construct of the neurons.
author: Abhijit Naskar, What is Mind?

quote: Resolve to be thyself ... he who finds himself loses his misery!
author: Matthew Arnold

quote: Know what you want to do, hold the thought firmly, and do every day what should be done, and every sunset will see you that much nearer the goal.

quote: Circumstances, events or situations do not have inherent meanings except what you give them.

quote: Soft hearts make the universe worth living in.

quote: We should have stories in common, I found myself thinking. We should have stories, and jokes no one understands, and memories that we know will stay alive because neither of us will let the other forget.

quote: Life is short, the art long.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Today’s amateurs are tomorrow’s champions.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Maybe you’re not breaking down.Maybe you’re breaking through.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: Progress is impossible without change  and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: It's harder to pick and choose when you're dead. It's like a photograph, you know. It doesn't matter as much.
author: Neil Gaiman, American Gods

quote: I haven't always been thrilled with my work. But the fear of not proving the people wrong who think you can't emerge from a franchise and do well, that's a very strong driving force.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: I'm not denyin' the women are foolish. God Almighty made 'em to match the men.
author: George Eliot

quote: Ohne Gedankenfreiheit gibt es keine Weisheit. Und ohne Redefreiheit keine öffentliche Freiheit.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: When your world gets stripped down to nothing you may feel empty and naked—but this is when your space can be filled with what is new, and maybe even upgraded. Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana
author: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, Ph.D, MBA

quote: A society living by the laws of the world is moving towards a global crisis in all its spheres of life.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Okra is the closest thing to nylon I've ever eaten. It's like they bred cotton with a green bean. Okra, tastes like snot. The more you cook it, the more it turns into string.

quote: One of the most radical and revolutionary things you can do is grow your own food and eat from the land.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: It's been so long, I don't remember what okay feels like.
author: Kayla Krantz, Survive at Midnight

quote: Not like a heart, which let people in without permission, held them in a special place she never had any say in and then yearned for them to remain there longer than they planned.
author: Cecelia Ahern, If You Could See Me Now

quote: I am he As you are me And we are all together.
author: John Lennon

quote: To teach how to live with uncertainty  and yet without being paralyzed by hesitation  is perhaps the chief thing that philosophy in our age can still do for those who study it.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: I have hope, therefore, I am happy

quote: For every setback, do not get discouraged. Rejoice because you learned more than you expected.

quote: Every one was born with a guardian angel.Guardian angels brightens our journey of life with divine love,protection,peace, healing,grace,strength and miracles.
author: Lailah GiftyAkita

quote: Keep your heads up! We are sinking!
author: Ljupka Cvetanova, The New Land

quote: The are two kinds of people in this modern society. First and the majority are those fools who think they are wise, and second are the few wise individuals who know that they are fools.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: I think the scariest person in the world is the person with no sense of humor.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: Love without hope will not survive.Love without faith changes nothing.Love gives power to hope and faith.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: And the people of Ankh-Morpork are so thirsty for novelty that the whole city is, you might say, hurrying the future along for the sheer joy of watching its progress.
author: Terry Pratchett, Raising Steam

quote: Surround yourself with those who won’t compete but will revel in you your success and see your ascent as a reflection of their own possibilities.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: Mr. Right is coming, but he's in Africa and he's walking.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Only a fool lights a fire and tries to hide at the same time.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: No matter how fleeting Your smile is,Your smile is the very beginningOf your wisdom-light.
author: Sri Chinmoy, The Jewels of Happiness: Inspiration and Wisdom to Guide Your Life-Journey

quote: In spite of everything, I still believe that people are really good at heart.
author: Anne Frank

quote: A person’s destiny is something you look back at afterwards, not something to be known in advance.
author: Haruki Murakami, The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle

quote: I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: There is no vicious inhumanity than keeping children hungry.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: A book is a collaboration between the one who reads and what is read and, at its best, that coming together is a love story like any other.
author: Siri Hustvedt, The Summer Without Men

quote: No matter how many good deeds we preform, they aren’t the ticket to earning God’s favor. God graces us in spite of what we do in this life, not because of.

quote: When someone loves you, you are living in the most beautiful place in the earth, in the beauty of his or her mind. So enjoy it, even if it lasts for a moment.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Beauty is seeing,the world through colored glass,of seeing everything in its glory,it's all it ever asks.
author: Anthony T Hincks

quote: Don't dare try to be heroes.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Pessimism

quote: To welcome the present with an open hand and heart, let your past go with appreciation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your life is happening in the NOW, yet the present moment is often squandered by your thinking about what has happened in the past or may happen in the future.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Action: 8 Ways to Initiate & Activate Forward Momentum for Positive Impact

quote: To find true peace, forgive those who fill your mind with hatred and instead show them the path of love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Exponential Results Requires Exponential Thinking and High Performance Teamworking with Growth Oriented Mindsets.
author: Tony Dovale

quote: Dare to believe in your sacred dreams
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If someone is destined to be with you, nothing can keep her away; if she is not, nothing can make her stay.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The brain becomes illogical, in the throes of new romance.
author: Abhijit Naskar, What is Mind?

quote: It’s not about optimism, pessimism or realism. It’s not about thinking nothing bad will ever happen to you. It’s about having the faith and courage that no matter what happens, you’ll be okay.
author: Brownell Landrum, Repercussions: DUET stories Volume IV - Adult Version

quote: when distress comes your way, pause and ponder
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Distinctive Footprints of Life: Where Are You Heading Towards?

quote: This is the day the Lord had made. We will rejoice and be glad in it.
author: Bible

quote: The grace of service is heart of belonging.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Leadership. A gun to protect or a gun to kill. Your choice.
author: Alin Sav

quote: I've always wanted to be somebody  but I see now I should have been more specific.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Writing is not a matter of time, but a matter or of space. If you don't keep space in your head for writing, you won't write even if you have the time.
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quote: For being different, it’s easy. But to be unique, it’s a complicated thing.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Apple's goal isn't to make money. Our goal is to design and develop and bring to market good products.
author: Jonathan Ive

quote: Music is the emotional life of most people.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: Quand celui à qui l'on parle ne comprend pas et celui qui parle ne se comprend pas, c'est de la métaphysiqueWhen he to whom a person speaks does not understand, and he who speaks does not understand himself, that is metaphysics.
author: Voltaire

quote: No art is silent! Because art is an original idea and every original idea speaks, every interesting thought screams, every art talks, every art screams! No art is silent! If it is silent, then it is not an art!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Part of what I love about novels and dogs is that they are so beautifully oblivious to economic concerns. We serve them, and in return they thrive. It's not their responsibility to figure out where the rent is coming from.
author: Ann Patchett, This is the Story of a Happy Marriage

quote: Working hard is not a waste of time, but a state of mind. Keep pushing your limits until you reach the edge. Then be kind and rewind.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, A-Z of Happiness: Tips for Living and Breaking Through the Chain that Separates You from Getting That Dream Job

quote: Mystics reign where lacks true education.
author: Abhijit Naskar, I Am The Thread: My Mission

quote: Everybody was sorta going to sleep twards the end of 1983, and I felt that they had to be woken up!
author: Morrissey

quote: Forgiveness is not simply a single act, it is a full process.
author: Stephen Richards, The Pain You Feel Today Is The Strength You Feel Tomorrow

quote: The truth is hidden in books.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Two-thirds of all preachers, doctors and lawyers are hanging on to the coat tails of progress, shouting, whoa! while a good many of the rest are busy strewing banana peels along the line of march.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The person who feels secure, loved, safe and happy inside will have a secure, safe and happy life. Your inner integrity will be matched by those around you
author: Hina Hashmi, Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: If I could but know his heart, everything would become easy.
author: Jane Austen, Sense and Sensibility

quote: I was stirred only like a leaf in the wind, that is all. . .
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: We die a day at a time
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Love truth, but pardon error.
author: Voltaire

quote: Be aware of the power of self awareness.
author: Alin Sav

quote: I'm not one of those who wants to purge our society of our Christian history.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Money is necessary in everyone's life. Why? Only because people have decided that it should be. It didn't have to be the way that it has become. If nothing came at the price of money, it wouldn't need to exist.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: But her grandmother had never suggested she could think the same of Scarlet. You'll be fine, she always said, after a skinned knee, after a broken arm, after her first youthfull heartbreak. You'll be fine, because you're strong, like me.
author: Marissa Meyer, Scarlet

quote: Man needs only a small patch of earth for his pleasures, and a smaller one still to rest beneath.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, The Sorrows of Young Werther

quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr., Life's Little Instruction Book: 511 Suggestions, Observations, and Reminders on How to Live a Happy and Rewarding Life

quote: We have never heard the devil's side of the story, God wrote all the book.
author: Anatole France

quote: No matter how much struggle you face in your journey towards success, someday you will look back and realize your struggles changed your life for the better.

quote: Anecdotes don't make good stories. Dig down so far that what finally comes out is not even what you thought it was about.

quote: The more belief and confidence we feel toward achieving our goal, the higher the probability of our making the changes required to hit our targets.

quote: Words cannot express love. Only thoughts of love born in silence can do that.

quote: If at 1st you don't succeed, stretch out on your La-Z-Boy with a six-pack and a porn flick. Y' still won't succeed, but you sure as hell won't give a shift.

quote: He was good and then really good and then bad and then really bad, but since he was good I got lost in the thought that I could fix it.

quote: Eyes which feast on the beauty of the world will always look beautiful to others. That which receives beauty exudes it as well.

quote: Meditation is the simplest process through which you can create harmony between the body, mind, spirit, and nature.

quote: I would not come in.I meant not even if asked,And I hadn't been.

quote: I'm afraid that in nine cases out of ten Nature pulls one way and human nature another.

quote: To listen to what I'd heard - as if I'd already learned everything I needed.

quote: Life’s best lessons are learned during the most painful experiences.

quote: I hate you' she said to me one afternoon. 'I really, really hate you.' Call me sensitive, but I couldn't help but take it personally.

quote: Be thankful for all you gain. Be thankful for what you lose, too. Find a reason each day to celebrate your life.

quote: Grudges are for those who insist that they are owed something; forgiveness, however, is for those who are substantial enough to move on.

quote: Don't wound someone's eye trying to remove the twig from it.

quote: Those who loves you they do not die with you but they do all that you die to live.And Those who do not love you do not kill you physically but they do all that you wait to die

quote: The rabbit of Easter. He bring of the chocolate.

quote: Now that she had nothing to lose, she was free.

quote: Maybe its because i rejoice over what i have and don't grieve over what i don't have".
author: Leo Tolstoy, Anna Karenina

author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: That's God's will - Lunatic
author: Deyth Banger

author: Janet Evanovich, Hot Six

quote: The future is certain. It is just not known.

quote: I can’t help but to dance!

quote: No need for miracles to do the impossible if we have beliefs,will and insistence

quote: Religion's just a well-oiled profit-driven denial of the randomness of it all.

quote: When you develop yourself, you grow humanity.

author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: Ladies and gentlemen, let us hear the demand of life and adhere to it. It would do us good

quote: Godliness is a devotion to God.

quote: There's a difference between really loving someone and loving the idea of her.

quote: Poetry isn't like any writing I've ever heard before. I don't understand all of it, just bits of images, sentences that appear half-finished, all fluttering together like brightly colored ribbons in the wind.

quote: A book is a garden, only its flowers are ideas.

quote: God accepts us into His atmosphere when we accept people into our lives

quote: Do all the work you can while you still have strength.

quote: No one can be an atheist who does not know all things. Only God is an atheist.

quote: The voice of the archangel is the trumpet call of God.

quote: Sharing the same passionate love with another person, gives a feeling of being alive! The experience of something real, is unforgettable.

quote: I don't hate you. I don't think I ever really did. It was just anger. And once I faced it head-on, once understood it, it dissipated. -Mia

quote: I jealously guard my research time and I love fully immersing myself in those dusty old books and papers. It's one of the most enjoyable parts of my job.

quote: A sheep in wolves clothing!

quote: I wasn’t reading poetry because my aim was to work my way through English Literature in Prose A–Z.But this was diff

quote: The more you recover your authentic self, the more your destiny will unfold before your eyes. Just keep doing your inner work - that's the most essential thing.

quote: The problem was to sustain at any cost the feeling you had in the theater that you were watching a real person, yes, but an intense condensation of his experience, not simply a realistic series of episodes.

quote: Measure your day by the love you are giving away.

quote: Lawyers spend a great deal of their time shoveling smoke.

quote: Be the ocean of love so that everyone can come to you to enjoy the beauty of the beach.

quote: Just as courage imperils life  fear protects it.

quote: World is getting stranger and stranger... I think there is interesting perspective in the series "Falling Water".

quote: You have to fight great battles to guard your mind, extraordinary battles to protect your heart, and remarkable battles to defend your soul.
