quote: Things always happen as they should and when they should. Our intuition provides us with guidance on our true purpose. These messages come from the heart. We can only hear them when we're silent not through a cluttered mind.
author: Nanette Mathews

quote: The silences here are retreats of sound, like the retreat of the surf before a tidal wave: sound draining away, down slopes of acoustic passage, to gather, someplace else, to a great surge of noise.
author: Thomas Pynchon, Gravity's Rainbow

quote: Instead of being presented with stereotypes by age, sex, color, class, or religion, children must have the opportunity to learn that within each range, some people are loathsome and some are delightful.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: If every one of us spreads the message of love, compassion, kindness and forgiveness, peace will be there.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You are as happy as you chose to be. So chose to be happy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: That’s all kids want to know—that you love them.
author: Kim Harrison, Into the Woods: Tales from the Hollows and Beyond

quote: I imagine, therefore I am.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You may have bought my body, you may even have the papers to prove it, but don't fool yourself into thinking for a moment that my heart and mind were included in the purchase.
author: Nenia Campbell, Bleeds My Desire

quote: Perhaps priest and magician were once one, but the priest, learning humility in the face of God, discarded the spell for prayer.
author: Patti Smith, Just Kids

quote: We huddle tightly together as cowards, protecting the ranks of our false collective identity from "less-human" intruders, when the only obvious and sane truth is that we are all the same human beings.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: My mama always used to tell me: 'If you can't find somethin' to live for, you best find somethin' to die for.'
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Gratitude is the seed of gladness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: May God give comfort to the suffering souls.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I can always pray to God with confidence because my righteous state is a gift given through grace in faith on the cross by Jesus!
author: Alisa Hope Wagner, Eve of Awakening

quote: Love is divinity within us.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: We hope that we will live only because we must be with God, as alive as He is.
author: Sorin Cerin, Wisdom Collection: The Book of Wisdom

quote: To be a great success detect the problem, find the solutions, never complain, but never forget to compliment someone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I know I wrote letters to people with no address on this earth, I know that you are dead. But I hear you. I hear all of you. We were here. Our lives matter.
author: Ava Dellaira, Love Letters to the Dead

quote: Women may be the one group that grows more radical with age.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Melody.” His voice was a tormented whisper on his lips.“Yes,” I said.“If you ever need to escape, come to me.”“What?” I asked.“Just come. I won’t. . .I would never hurt you.”“But—”“You’re all that matters to me.
author: Kenya Wright, Bad for You 2

quote: With patient, you shall possess your soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A woman who focuses on worshiping God will consider carefully how she is dressed, because her heart will dictate her wardrobe and appearance.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: Action may not always bring happiness but there is no happiness without action.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I once thought it would take a miracle to improve my circumstances. Now, I believe it will take something far more powerful, if such a thing exists.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: Writing in a journal reminds you of your goals and of your learning in life. It offers a place where you can hold a deliberate, thoughtful conversation with yourself.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: He takes my hand and says, 'Let's make a world.
author: Claudia Gray, A Million Worlds with You

quote: Turn the mess of your life to a message of triumph for the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Truth is immortal  error is mortal.
author: Mary Baker Eddy

quote: Ingratitude makes man an animal, even worse, for some animals do have a way of saying thank you when you do them a favor; take a dog for instance.
author: Paul Bamikole

quote: We are all actors in life. Some act like they won’t amount to much while others do the opposite. You have a choice
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: ...the depth or humaneness of our love depends on the wideness of our souls.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Fire and Ice Legend

quote: My soul struggles; I stay all night, and sleep day time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Victory at all costs, victory in spite of all terror, victory however long and hard the road may be; for without vicory there is no survival.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: I am chic, sleek, and so unique.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: The trouble with him was that he was without imagination.
author: Jack London, To Build a Fire

quote: Words are life. Positive words create positive life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: ...methinks the older that one grows, Inclines us more to laugh the scold, though laughterLeaves us so doubly serious shortly after.
author: George Gordon Byron

quote: Many people get visited by the Lord in a given time but lack the wisdom to navigate in it.
author: Paul Gitwaza

quote: Remember, you are as dispensable as the most indispensable king of kings, the mighty lord of silly worldly men.
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: RULES OF FAIRYLAND-BELOWBEWARE OF DOGANYTHING IMPORTANT COMES IN THREES AND SIXESDO NOT STEAL QUEENSA GIRL IN THE WILD IS WORTH TWO IN CHAINSNECESSITY IS THE MOTHER OF TEMPTATIONEVERYTHING MUST BE PAID FOR SOONER OR LATERWHAT GOES DOWN MUST COME UP
author: Catherynne M. Valente, The Girl Who Fell Beneath Fairyland and Led the Revels There

quote: I’d heard street food was a big thing here in Mexico but I didn’t think it meant the creatures that lived on the street.
author: Karl Pilkington

quote: Even a feeble-minded man wants to be like other men.A child may not know how to feed itself, or what to eat, yet it knows hunger.
author: Daniel Keyes, Flowers for Algernon

quote: While humans play God, dogs learn from their masters.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Science, my lad, is made up of mistakes, but they are mistakes which it is useful to make, because they lead little by little to the truth.
author: Jules Verne, A Journey to the Center of the Earth

quote: I have an unfounded belief that there is a conspiracy out there creating unsupportable theories.
author: Ted Agon, The Human Key Condensed

quote: I can't worry about everything at once, Elend thought with determination. I just have to trust. Trust in myself and keep going.
author: Brandon Sanderson, The Hero of Ages

quote: Prayer should not be a structured and complicated conversation. It should be a simply and spontaneous conversation between heavenly Father and His sons and daughters.
author: Euginia Herlihy

quote: The more you seek security, the less of it you have. But the more you seek opportunity, the more likely it is that you will achieve the security that you desire.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Take care of your life force and always keep it streaming. Always be active and creative, and never ever stop dreaming.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Christ did not die by accident. He died voluntarily in our place.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: It's a very strange thing for a designer to say, but one of the things that really irritates me in products is when I'm aware of designers wagging their tails in my face.
author: Jonathan Ive

quote: Ten years of shadows, but no longer. Light up the darkness, Magesty.
author: Sarah J. Maas, Queen of Shadows

quote: Keep expecting and believing that your due season is coming. Declare that the good you have harvested in your life will manifest.
author: Germany Kent

quote: He’d pushed it back, where he’d kept the thought for weeks, but it wouldn’t stay. Wouldn’t stop. Wouldn’t let him go.
author: Veronica Rossi, Through the Ever Night

quote: To become an able and successful man in any profession, three things are necessary, nature, study and practice.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: God does not care where you pray. He only cares what is in your heart.
author: Tucker Elliot, The Rainy Season

quote: If you don't have the time to read, you don't have the time or the tools to write.
author: Stephen King

quote: Give people time and space. Dont beg for anyone to stay. Dont beg anyone for Love. Whats meant for you will always be yours. If you are meant to be together you will be despite everything! Trust in Gods plans.
author: Lily Amis, Angel of Love  Lily: Zak, My Sweet Inspiration

quote: I think I'd rather be liked than loved. It just seems as if more criticism and chastening is shown to those we love, while kind manners and compassion are reserved for those we simply like. So, I hope you like me.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: Everything he was, he gave to her.
author: L.J. Smith

quote: What is the size of this universe? The size of this universe is whatever the size of your dreams!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The goal of libertarianism is not to permit people to be free, but to make them realize that they don't need anyone's permission to be free.
author: Jakub Bożydar Wiśniewski

quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Our environment, including the physical body, reflect our inner state - what we are inwardly, our eternal nature. When we renew our mind and transform ourselves, our environment responds to this change automatically.
author: Thomas Vazhakunnathu, God Does Not Play Dice

quote: Love is the dance of the spirit on a stage called heart with the songs of mind to satisfy our eternal desires to belong.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I blame God for all the good things that happened in my life to spite him I will be good to others
author: rassool jibraeel snyman

quote: People wouldn't know this about me, but I adore ball gowns. I love their cut, their architecture and the thought of the hands of so many seamstresses working on them.
author: Patti Smith

quote: I have always had more dread of a pen, a bottle of ink, and a sheet of paper than of a sword or pistol.
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: Last night I lost the world, and gained the universe.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Buddha had said:"Each of us is a God. Each of us knows all. We need only open our minds to hear our own wisdom.
author: Dan Brown, Angels & Demons

quote: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Death reminds us that life is a temporary privilege, not an endless right.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: People get absorbed in chitchats with whomever they meet. They simply have to meet someone. Infinite energies are wasted in such chitchatting.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: I would entertain the apparently fading idea that patriotism that serves the self is greed dressed in the garments of liberty and adorned with the fashion accessories of other associated patriotic notions.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, A View from the Front Porch: Encounters with Life and Jesus

quote: With conscious effort, you can be a reader.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The vanities of life:pleasure, possession, position and power.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: A wise woman invests her time and doesn’t squander it in gossip, judgment or idleness. She knows every moment gone is one that she will not get back.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: The truth is that all men having power ought to be mistrusted.
author: James Madison

quote: Love is the soul's symphony.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Science fiction was rocket-mad for about 40 years until aerospace hit a brick wall about 1970. I would not write off space colonisation or exploration completely, but we are profoundly ill adapted for going boldly into outer space.
author: Charles Stross

quote: Just being out of the house with Daddy like this at Fisher's lights me up enough for somebody to read by me.
author: Mary Karr, The Liars' Club

quote: Life is so sweet even though it is full of lies and half truths...
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Usurper: And Other Stories

quote: I think the rules where different there. It was all about science, but the science was magical. It didn't care about whether something could be done. It was about whether it should be done, and the answer was always, always yes.
author: Seanan McGuire, Every Heart a Doorway

quote: We’ve all got weaknesses. Me, for instance. I’m tragically funny and good-looking.
author: Rick Riordan, The Mark of Athena

quote: It is a masterpiece of the devil to make us believe that children cannot understand religion. Would Christ have made a child the standard of faith if He had known that it was not capable of understanding His words?
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Save your mind from a premature death by always learning something new no matter your age! Think every day, but make sure it's not within the perimeter of the box! Think outside the box!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: Anytime, someone gives you advice, rethink if it will lead to personal progress.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If you want a new life, first give praise for having the old one!
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Friendship, like love, is destroyed by long absence, though it may be increased by short intermissions.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: It matters not which partner is bringing negativity into conversations and exchanges. Toxicity has no place at all between people who have promised to love each other.
author: Cathy Burnham Martin, The Bimbo Has Brains: And Other Freaky Facts

quote: Of all noises, I think music is the least disagreeable.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: ...only the philosophical question is perennial, not the answers.
author: Paul Tillich, Dynamics of Faith

quote: This, she realizes, is the basis of all fear. That a light you are powerless to stop will turn on you and usher a bullet to its mark.
author: Anthony Doerr, All the Light We Cannot See

quote: Hope is a form of conscious dream making
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: There is no hope unmingled with fear, and no fear unmingled with hope.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: And he will never know what it is to look up at the night sky and wish.
author: Sarah J. Maas, A Court of Mist and Fury

quote: Employers have decided that having the breadth of knowledge that's associated with a four-year degree is often something they want to see in the people they give that job to.
author: Bill Gates

quote: If you don't know what to do next take the oath that will enhance your soul and erase your ego, & from the quiet space inside yourself, you will know what to do.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Trust is a collective mind - the corporate culture. You can’t build and nourish trust without creating a conducive environment of trust.
author: Pearl Zhu, Digital Gaps: Bridging Multiple Gaps to Run Cohesive Digital Business

quote: Is it the raindrops pervading my being?or is it your lips touching my skin?
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Solving crimes is like following a spider web. Everything is connected in some way. It's just figuring out where things intersect so I can find the spider in the middle.
author: Lisa Kessler, Lure of Obsession

quote: But forgiveness is the act of not putting anyone out of your heart, even those who are acting out of deep ignorance or out of confusion and pain.
author: Jack Kornfield, Meditation for Beginners

quote: History, Stephen said, is a nightmare from which I am trying to awake.
author: James Joyce, Ulysses

quote: I felt sure that [Oyarsa] was what we call "good," but I wasn't sure whether I liked "goodness" so much as I had supposed.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Dreams sometimes are a lot of real!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Thirteen virtues necessary for true success: temperance  silence  order  resolution  frugality  industry  sincerity  justice  moderation  cleanliness  tranquility  chastity  and humility.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: There are many people who feel that it is useless and futile to continue talking about peace and non-violence against a government whose only reply is savage attacks on an unarmed and defenseless people.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The true love is unconditional.Marriage is a conditional bond.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: I do not wish women to have power over men  but over themselves.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quote: If you cannot build from nothing, then you'll have to destroy in order to create.
author: Lionel Suggs

quote: I wouldn’t be who I am today if it wasn’t for the people I had met and the people I had lost.
author: Shannon A. Thompson, November Snow

quote: It was as though God's hand was reaching down to Anna, and she was reaching her hands to Harvey and Joe, creating a circle of love.
author: J.E.B. Spredemann, A Secret Encounter

quote: Gimme an S! A T! An O! A C! Followed by a K-H-O-L-M! What's it spell? HEAD FUCK.- Jane
author: J.R. Ward, Lover Unbound

quote: All the world's a stage  And all the men and women merely players.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: With determination, the dream will be fulfilled.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: A circumstance is not easy to come by and when it does, there are causes behind it. Therefore I do those things which bring an end to all the causes.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: [I]t is the wine that leads me on,the wild winethat sets the wisest man to singat the top of his lungs,laugh like a fool – it drives theman to dancing... it eventempts him to blurt out storiesbetter never told.
author: Homer, The Odyssey

quote: The death of a beautiful woman is, unquestionably, the most poetical topic in the world.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Coming down life's highwayAt ninety mile an hour I want to slideWith bad brakes and bald tiresInto my final parking space
author: Richard L.  Ratliff

quote: Perseverance is everything. We all stumbled when we took our first steps yet we were running sooner than we realized, and then we couldn’t stay still. Why stay still now?
author: Rob Liano

quote: The old gal was only another lonely creature in a world that didn’t care
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: The characters in my novels are my own unrealised possibilities. That is why I am equally fond of them all and equally horrified by them. Each one has crossed a border that I myself have circumvented.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: Without music to decorate it, time is just a bunch of boring production deadlines or dates by which bills must be paid.
author: Frank Zappa, Real Frank Zappa Book

quote: There are three stages in scientific discovery. First, people deny that it is true, then they deny that it is important; finally they credit the wrong person.
author: Bill Bryson, A Short History of Nearly Everything

quote: The closer he was the less confident I was.
author: Shannon A. Thompson, Take Me Tomorrow

quote: Saying of the ProphetTHE PEOPLEIt is the people who are God's family.(Muhammad the Prophet)
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: Make no mistake: peaceful madmen are ahead of the future.
author: Gabriel García Márquez, Memories of My Melancholy Whores

quote: Pay great attention to those who love you, and love those who hate you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: God can't clean the house of you when you're still in it.
author: Anne Lamott, Grace (Eventually): Thoughts on Faith

quote: To dispense knowledge without moral guidance would be grossly irresponsible.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman, Kaya Abaniah and the Father of the Forest

quote: I am very close to HIM, sometimes I think I am HIM, with my mood is the weather,bright and sunny forever.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: The key point about life is that in the end nothing really matters.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: If you are not afraid of the voices inside you, you will not fear the critics outside you.
author: Natalie Goldberg, Writing Down the Bones: Freeing the Writer Within

quote: The sacred-time determines the due events.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: If your believed in book-told god is a silly sod, you too are.
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: Better to live with peace and not stress over the things which we can’t handle .
author: Latika Teotia

quote: Stop focusing on how miserable you are and focus on how many opportunities you have to get better.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The man who says that all events are necessitated has no ground for critizing the man who says that not all events are necessitated. For according to him this is itself a necessitated event.
author: Epicurus, Epicurus: Letters, Principal Doctrines, and Vatican Sayings

quote: People who own the world outright for profit will have to be stopped by influence, by power, by us.
author: Wendell Berry

quote: If you hire people just because they can do a job, they’ll work for your money. But if you hire people who believe what you believe, they’ll work for you with blood and sweat and tears.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: On armageddon day,' Sandy said, 'both armies will think they fight for good. And both of them will be wrong.
author: George R.R. Martin, The Armageddon Rag

quote: If you don't change your beliefs, your life will be like this forever. Is that good news?
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: You must remember, the so-called Jihadis who are in reality, mentally unstable individuals run by Quranic fundamentalists, do not represent the whole Muslim population of the world.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Does life has any value without love?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I love you now... I love you immortally, even if I die and there is nothing left of me.
author: Gail Carson Levine, Ever

quote: The burning flame is a spirit of light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Where were we? I've forgotten. He was deciding whether to cut her throat or love her forever.Right. Yes. The usual choices.
author: Margaret Atwood, The Blind Assassin

quote: Now he must put into practice all his fine poetic thoughts about romantic love.
author: Philip Zaleski, The Fellowship: The Literary Lives of the Inklings: J.R.R. Tolkien, C.S. Lewis, Owen Barfield, Charles Williams

quote: Friendship is not an obligation or duty. It is a sweet responsibility.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Successful people don't have a limit whereas unsuccessful people often draw a line of limit
author: Santosh Avvannavar, Black, Grey and White

quote: What's up?" I asked.You tell me," he said. "You were the one about ready to start making out with Adrian."It was an experiment," I said. "It was part of my therapy."What the hell kind of therapy are you in?
author: Richelle Mead, Shadow Kiss

quote: History can be rewritten, but at what cost?
author: Lauren Kate, Rapture

quote: To achieve patent commercialization success, every inventor must think like a business man
author: Kalyan C. Kankanala, Fun IP, Fundamentals of Intellectual Property

quote: I am the Lilum. Time. Truth. Destiny. The Endless River. The Wheel of Fate. You do not command me.
author: Kami Garcia

quote: Ignore negative criticisms, focus on positive thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The idea of one's normality is delusional fact of the reality.
author: J. Limbu

quote: Music gives strength to the spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Isn’t it better just to make your own money, and then spend it how and when you want, and with dignity?
author: Zack Love, The Syrian Virgin

quote: Keep dreaming big. You have a great glorious future.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Be fearless to live life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: . . . for not an orphan in the wide world can be so deserted as the child who is an outcast from a living parent's love.
author: Charles Dickens, Dombey and Son

quote: Goldfish get big enough only for the bowl you put them in. Bonsai trees twist in miniature. I would have given anything to keep her little. They outgrow us so much faster than we outgrow them.
author: Jodi Picoult, My Sister's Keeper

quote: Sometimes things happen in our lives that wake us up to the truth, about how short life is. It’s then we wonder why we spent so much wasted time looking too far into the future.
author: Ron Baratono

quote: The real tragedy of life is not being limited to one talent  but in failing to use that one talent.
author: Edgar Watson Howe

quote: He was a product of a culture where it was generally counterproductive to hold grudges.
author: H.W. Brands

quote: Suppose you were an idiot, and suppose you were a member of Congress; but I repeat myself.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I'm selfish, impatient, and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I'm out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Hello winter! My heart is warm and ready to enjoy your cool loving touch of beauty and splendor.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Care more for a grain of faith than a ton of excitement.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: In the past, human society provided encouragement and opportunity for people to extend support to each other, especially in highly stressful situations.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Herr Kafka, essen Sie keine Eier." (As one and only piece of dialog K recalls from his meeting with Rudolf Steiner - "Mr. Kafka don't eat eggs.
author: Franz Kafka, Diaries, 1910 1923

quote: All Superheroes are differently abled.All differently abled are Superheroes.
author: Mohith Agadi

quote: The number of ways to live in one lifetime is limitless. So why limit yourself?
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: I am scared of the day, when they turn atheism into another religion for controlling masses.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: Change occurs on a continuum and does not move in a straight line.
author: Sharon Weil, ChangeAbility: How Artists, Activists, and Awakeners Navigate Change

quote: Proper words in proper places  make the true definition of a style.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Life summed up with a marketing slogan: Limited Edition!
author: Kevin Focke

quote: Nowists get off on getting on, so they run when they could walk, jump when they could sit and dance when they could sit at the edge. They regret inaction, so simply act.
author: Max McKeown, #NOW: The Surprising Truth About the Power of Now

quote: I cannot forgive my friends for dying: I do not find these vanishing acts of theirs at all amusing.
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: When an Angel whispers in your ear, it is your heart that hears thy message.
author: Molly Friedenfeld, The Book of Simple Human Truths

quote: Bravery is the knowledge of the cowardice in the enemy.
author: Edgar Watson Howe

quote: Is life a fantasy or fairy tales?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Love is expressed more by deeds than words.
author: Tapan Ghosh, Faceless The Only Way Out

quote: I always pick a gorgeous time to fall over a suitcase or something.
author: J.D. Salinger, The Catcher in the Rye

quote: Designing is my hobby. If I didn't do what I do for a living - at some point when I don't do this for a living - I'll probably just do design work. I love finding really special pieces of furniture.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: People fear death even more than pain. It's strange that they fear death. Life hurts a lot more than death. At the point of death, the pain is over. Yeah, I guess it is a friend.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: All men are children, and of one family. The same tale sends them all to bed, and wakes them in the morning.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I have come here not to find answers, but to find a way to live in a world without any.
author: Sue Monk Kidd, The Mermaid Chair

quote: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people together to collect wood and don't assign them tasks and work, but rather teach them to long for the endless immensity of the sea.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Each way of being is more valued in the presence of the other. This balance between making camp and following the seasons is both very ancient and very new. We all need both.
author: Gloria Steinem, My Life on the Road

quote: More it hurt more better it is. Can't nothing heal without pain, you know.
author: Toni Morrison, Beloved

quote: Let us not demand love; it will fly away. Just feel and give love, and it will be yours.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: During the gold rush its a good time to be in the pick and shovel business
author: Mark Twain

quote: If you are landing it doesn't really matter who is sitting beside you but while you are taking off, it is very important you know who is around you. Eagles don't flock with pigeons.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: If you can trust God and yourself, anything is possible.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I knew from the age of 16 that I wanted to be a writer because I just didn't think I could do anything else. So I read and read and wrote short stories and dreamed of escape.
author: Paul Auster

quote: An intelligent, informed mind is more powerful than a loaded gun.
author: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, Ph.D, MBA

quote: Truth is what you think, not what you find.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything in life had a purpose, and unless it achieved that purpose, it was just taking up space on the planet and wasting everybody's time.
author: Jeannette Walls, Half Broke Horses

quote: If, living in the world, you refuse to be a part of it, you will help other out of this chaos - not in the future, not tomorrow, but now.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti, The First and Last Freedom

quote: Ýou can do the work by God’s grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The best kind of humans are the ones who stay.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: The idea that creative endeavor and mind-altering substances are entwined is one of the great pop-intellectual myths of our time.
author: Stephen King, On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quote: To wear your heart on your sleeve isn't a very good plan; you should wear it inside, where it functions best.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: God loves us, but the devil takes an interest.
author: Jennifer Donnelly, Revolution

quote: Being in love with yourself will teach how to love others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We do not preach against people, we preach against sin.
author: Alin Sav

quote: No passion so effectually robs the mind of all its powers of acting and reasoning as fear.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: I'm losing weight, you notice, Pop?
author: Arthur Miller, Death of a Salesman

quote: Sometimes we don’t have a choice in where we come from, but we can definitely choose where we go from there.
author: Faraaz Kazi, More Than Just Friends

quote: As it stands right now, I lead Richard Pryor in heart attacks, two to one. However, Richard still leads me, one to nothing, in burning yourself up.
author: George Carlin

quote: When Buzz gets in, he won't be having any parade of wounded soldiers. That'll be bad Fascist psychology. All those poor devils he'll hide away in institutions, and just bring out the lively young human slaughter cattle in uniforms.
author: Sinclair Lewis, It Can't Happen Here

quote: If you expect love, don't forget to love someone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Better to be a successful failure, than to fail at success.
author: Benny Bellamacina, Little Luigi: A Musical Adventure

quote: ...Not I......Not I...You lose.... not I!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Whoever is willing to sacrifice his life for God will always be under God’s protection
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: It is when things are at worst you will get the best.
author: Santosh Kalwar, You Can

quote: I never saw a discontented tree. They grip the ground as though they liked it, and though fast rooted they travel about as far as we do.
author: John Muir

quote: I dwell on positive and beauty of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Life is but a dream for the dead.
author: Gerard Way

quote: you'd take one look at me and whole pieces of the earth would break off and fall away finally leaving me alone with you.
author: Ava

quote: It will be of little avail to the people that the laws are made by men of their own choice if the laws be so voluminous that they cannot be read, or so incoherent that they cannot be understood.
author: James Madison

quote: Don't be afraid! Hold my hand and let's jump off that cliff together.
author: Ahmed Mostafa

quote: The Good News of love must be a lifestyle, not a program for Christian
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Focus on what you can do right now, not what you can't do right now
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: Deliberation is the work of many men. Action  of one alone.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: You could start a fire with the heat between you two.""You're mistaking bitter animosity for heartfelt affection.
author: Michelle Hodkin, The Unbecoming of Mara Dyer

quote: I'd like to have a good long talk with you once you've calmed down. Please call me soon. Happy Birthday.
author: Haruki Murakami, Norwegian Wood

quote: Only those things are beautiful which are inspired by madness and written by reason.
author: André Gide

quote: To save a man and thereby to spare a father's agony and a mother's feelings is not to do a noble deed, it is but an act of humanity.
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: My beloved jay, give me a name now. call out the name you give me, looking into the deepest place in your heart. Everytime you call my name, I'll fly to you and be your wings.
author: Ilchi Lee, Bird of the Soul

quote: Even as I think them, the words lose their context, dissolve into grains of absurdity in the vast ocean of day-to-day hunger.
author: Isaac Marion, Boarded Window

quote: All you ever need is God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: It is hard to stop a hopeful soul from the pursuit of passion.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Why should we build our happiness on the opinons of others, when we can find it in our own hearts?
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau, The Social Contract and Discourses

quote: Sometimes, we can’t help but to shed tears!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I dream like a dew drop in the nightThen glitter in the morning sunlightThen it evaporates to embrace the sky
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Wanting to win is what keeps the trade on, If you win, you lose the trade.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Courage is not a virtue or value among other personal values like love or fidelity. It is the foundations that underlies and gives reality to all other virtue and personal values. (p. 13)
author: Rollo May, The Courage to Create

quote: Let me ask you a question Alex. What do you think is the greatest evil on this plant today?""Is that including, or not including you?
author: Anthony Horowitz, Eagle Strike

quote: A flower takes a while to grow, but can die in an instant; this is how it is with trust.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Live or die, but don't poison everything.
author: Anne Sexton

quote: God is a necessary evil.
author: Manoj Vaz

quote: Love is a magnetic force, you can't see it, but it can pull you toward the beloved.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There are so many things we do not appreciate in our life until we recognize God's love for us in them.
author: Stormie Omartian, Choose Love: The Three Simple Choices That Will Alter the Course of Your Life

quote: Surplus meant unnecessary. Not required.You couldn’t be a Surplus if you were needed by someone else. You couldn’t be a Surplus if you were loved.
author: Gemma Malley, The Declaration

quote: If you have no job, help is needed.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Kindness is not a business. True kindness expects nothing in return and should never act with conditions.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: In my country of South Africa, we struggled for years against the evil system of apartheid that divided human beings, children of the same God, by racial classification and then denied many of them fundamental human rights.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Our need for instant gratification is the reason we’re drawn to liars and hot air blowers.
author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quote: It is Homer who has chiefly taught other poets the art of telling lies skilfully.
author: Aristotle

quote: That something so small could be so beautiful. Worth so much. Only the strongest people can turn away from feelings like that.
author: Anthony Doerr, All the Light We Cannot See

quote: Any healthy man can go without food for two days--but not without poetry.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: I repeat... that all power is a trust; that we are accountable for its exercise; that from the people and for the people all springs, and all must exist.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: You take the words in the sense which is most damaging to the argument.
author: Plato, The Republic

quote: You have to create the life you want.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Success is too often measured by the size of one’s bank account or the degree of their celebrity. Yet, neither can truly represent the size of one’s character or the depth of their soul.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: If lightning is the anger of the gods, then the gods are concerned mostly about trees.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: God is available in your thinking, impulses, and impressions on your mind, so login
author: Ikechukwu Joseph, Unlocking Closed Doors

quote: But facts, remembered or not, are all, alas, still facts
author: Sōseki Natsume, I Am a Cat

quote: There was a skyness to the sky and a nowness to the world that he had never seen or felt or realized before.
author: Neil Gaiman, Stardust

quote: 'Tis man's to fight  but Heaven's to give success.
author: Homer

quote: There's no secret about success. Did you ever know a successful man who didn't tell you about it?
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: As soon as I say the words, I know they were the right ones. My eyes dip down to Dad’s memorial plaque. Truth doesn’t lie in the heart of fortune… it’s under Triumph Towers, where the labs are.
author: Beth Revis, The Body Electric

quote: In her view, there were threeoptions for a woman. If you were beautiful, you got married. If youwere ugly, you became a nun. If you were beautiful and stupid, orugly and dishonorable, you became a whore.
author: Nenia Campbell, Cloak and Dagger

quote: I spent my whole life playing sports and training and pushing myself to the limits.
author: Venus Williams

quote: Some people will tell you there is a great deal of poetry and fine sentiment in a chest of tea.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, Letters and Social Aims

quote: I have just returned from Boston  it is the only sane thing to do if you find yourself up there.
author: Fred Allen

quote: To know your future, turn to the Lord in prayer
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Some part of me knew from the first that what I wanted was not reality but myth.
author: Stephen King

quote: We are not poor because we do not have money, we are poor because we do not know how to make money.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: Everything is within the limit of possibility.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: How can we live our lives without God?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Basically, Sherri's idea had to do with bringing Fat's mind down from the cosmic and the abstract to the particular. She had hatched out the practical notion that nothing is more real than a large World War Two Soviet tank.
author: Philip K. Dick, VALIS

quote: I’d rather love you at the bottom than despise you at the top.
author: Colleen Hoover, Never Never: Part Two

quote: We think in generalities  but we live in detail.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: The economics of industrialized countries would collapse if women didn't do the work they do for free: According to economist Marilyn Waring, throughout the West it generates between 25 and 40 percent of the gross national product.
author: Naomi Wolf, The Beauty Myth

quote: A person must make peace with oneself before they will find peace with the world.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: I live each day with joyful hopes.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: When you recognize and reflect on even one good thing about yourself, you are building a bridge to a place of kindness and caring.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: When people get into their 30s plus "boyfriend" sounds weird...if you really think about it. Instead, I think we should universally start using the term "manfriend" or "snookie bookie cuddles pie".

quote: There is nothing more uncommon than common sense.

quote: The poetry you read has been written for you, each of you - black, white, Hispanic, man, woman, gay, straight.

quote: Happiness, as is evident, depends partly upon external circumstances and partly upon oneself.

quote: May our lives be transformed by the power of the Holy Scriptures.

quote: Every new situation requires new strategy.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Elena gasped back, "I can touch the ground!""I can see you touching it!", Bonnie exclaimed with tears of joy.
author: L.J. Smith, Dark Reunion

quote: Sometimes Silence Is Better In Explaining Something Than Words....
author: Muhammad Imran Hasan

quote: Even coal shimmers in the light
author: Jocelyn  Murray

quote: A true friend is a person that will shout at you when you’re wrong, hold your hand when you fall down, dance with you during the good times, and stay with you during your ups and downs.

quote: Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age.

quote: Life is a sacred journey.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: As soon as Mr. Prosser realized that he was substantially the loser after all, it was as if a weight lifted itself off his shoulders: this was more like the world as he knew it.
author: Douglas Adams, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quote: I am the universe and the universe is inside of me.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I believe that, for those who love to write, time spent writing is never wasted. And then isn't it from book to book that we approach the book that we really want to write?
author: Elena Ferrante, La frantumaglia

quote: Oh, my beauty!Oh, my reflection of life!Oh, my unmet desires!I am longing for youtor now and forever!
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your goal must be divided into smallest measurable and visible period of time- a day, so you know exactly what to do everyday
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Who can understand the profound mystery of God?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: There can never be suffering in the home of a person who is working for world's salvation.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: ...so i will greet youin a wayall loved thingsare meant to be greetedwith a tear in my heartand a poem in my eye.
author: Sanober  Khan, Turquoise Silence

quote: To love is to destroy, and to be the one loved is to be destroyed.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Bones

quote: Chip, I know you don't understand this, but I'd take it as a personal favor if you'd stop trying to marry your mother off to my brothers.

quote: The human voice is still the most paramount vessel or weapon to use, to uphold justice and to protest against injustice.

quote: The level of our responsibility in things of God determines our level of prosperity

quote: Holiness, not happiness, is the chief end of man.

quote: Gods are great," said Atsula, slowly, as if she were imparting a great secret. "But the heart is greater. For it is from our hearts they come, and to our hearts they shall return...

quote: The imagination is truly the enemy of bigotry and dogma.

quote: The quality of your ideas 'your actual thoughts' determines your success more than you think.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Our exterior world affects our internal landscape, our inner world affects our interpretation of physical sense impressions, and the combination of emotions, thoughts, and physical sensations influences how we address reality.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: God's in His heaven, alls right with the world', whispered Anne softly.
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of Green Gables

quote: It is vanity to chase the whirlwind.

quote: As a society, let's all strive to make "old fashioned" the "new fashion". Husbands make it clear to your wives that you are on a mission to become her knight in shining armor.
author: Lindsey Rietzsch, Successful Failures: Recognizing the Divine Role That Opposition Plays in Life's Quest for Success

quote: he was one of those diplomats who like and know how to work, and, despite his laziness, he occasionally spent nights at his desk.
author: Leo Tolstoy, War and Peace

quote: What difference does it make if you live in a picturesque little outhouse surrounded by 300 feeble minded goats and your faithful dog? The question is: Can you write?
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: More children suffer from interference than from noninterference.
author: Agatha Christie, Crooked House

quote: I've had so much of you in such little time that I shouldn't be suffering from withdrawal!
author: Ahmed Mostafa

quote: The finer natures were those that shone at the larger times.
author: Henry James, The Portrait of a Lady

quote: And then he's somewhere inside of me, each thrust rattling my ribcage like a bottle of pills. I'm somewhere outside of myself, thinking about lust— about my slutty white sheets and all the men who like to hide in them.

quote: The blinking of eyes is an involuntary reflex action, provided they eyes are not watching your beauty.
author: Amit Kalantri, I Love You Too

quote: Nature, to be commanded, must be obeyed. The imagination must be given not wings but weights.
author: Henry Adams, The Education of Henry Adams

quote: Always cherish your true friends who were there when no one else was.

quote: I like nothing better in this world than a good clean book, brother.
author: Anthony Burgess, A Clockwork Orange

quote: Don't think that this people are stupid, probably you have caught one, but you didn't finish your work and what now???You were in their trap...
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Money is made only from time well converted.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: Remember me, even if it's only in a corner and secretly. Don't let me go.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón, The Shadow of the Wind

quote: Learning and knowing something is cool, but superb knowledge comes when you leave your books and become the inner world's friend.

quote: Nothing in the world is so strong as a kind heart
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quote: I am yours but you are free of mine.My love is yours but I don't want any return
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Poor people! They build tunnels to reach the light.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova, The New Land

quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.

quote: What you say about the world reflects more about you and your perception of the world than the world itself.

quote: If you manage to live long enough, most of your greatest fears become fond memories to look back on.

quote: The sand in the hour glass isn't meant to stick together. It will flow exactly same today, how it did ten years back. That's how much reliable that stuff is. The stuff that can be consistent.

quote: Our entire neurobiology acts as a giant input-output system, that receives information from the outside world, processes that information and makes a person react accordingly.
author: Abhijit Naskar, What is Mind?

quote: Change your perception about things and the things you perceive changes.
author: Ane Krstevska

quote: The bond of love will unite the world.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Her ways are ways of pleasantness  and all her paths are peace.
author: Bible

quote: Men seldom make passes at girls who wear glasses.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: It is most unlikely. But--here comes the big "but"--not impossible.
author: Roald Dahl, The Witches

quote: A few dud universes can really clutter up your basement.
author: Neal Stephenson, In the Beginning...Was the Command Line

quote: A life filled with excuses is defeated, unproductive, and miserable.

quote: And, even yet, I dare not let it languish,Dare not indulge in memory’s rapturous pain;Once drinking deep of that divinest anguish,How could I seek the empty world again?
author: Emily Brontë, Poems by Currer, Ellis, and Acton Bell

quote: I'll get there, if I leave everything but my bones behind," said Sam. "And I'll carry Mr. Frodo up myself, if it breaks my back and heart.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Return of the King

quote: The colour of the water seems to be the colour of the glass into which it has been poured'.
author: Idries Shah

quote: When the pain of being the same becomes greater than the pain of being different, you change.
author: Deepak Chopra, Why Is God Laughing?: The Path to Joy and Spiritual Optimism

quote: A pen, a piece of white paper, and an idea can create a new you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life of any real value or substance is not formed during good times merely enjoyed.
author: John Paul Warren

quote: Inaction is the worst action of human beings!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Armageddon was yesterday, today we have a serious problem.
author: Stieg Larsson, The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

quote: Life is a mansion of opportunity: love is the key.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I prioritize my creative pleasure. I enjoy expressing my artistic side and receive the gifts of doing so.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Love is the way. Love is the destination.Love is the happiness. Love is the source of all creation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I think we deserve a happily-ever-after.""If anyone ever did, it's us.
author: Jodi Picoult, Salem Falls

quote: As a business leader you have to ask yourself, “Am I creating a consumer environment that is conducive to loyalty?” If the answer is no, FIX IT!
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: TO LIVE A LIFE VOID OF NEED ISA LIFE FILLED WITH DEPRIVATION
author: Qwana Reynolds-Frasier, Friend In Your Pocket Conversations Session One

quote: Words have magic. Spells and curses. Some of them, the best of them, once said change everything.
author: Nora Roberts, Jewels of the Sun

quote: If you can't share your story, you can't sell your product.
author: Alin Sav

quote: You don’t have to be happy to smile.
author: Daniel Willey

quote: I have great respect for the Syrian people, as I do for the rest of the Middle East.
author: Steven Magee

quote: Well, the future for me is already a thing of the past.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: My purely practical advice: Don't get excited. Don't raise your voice. Bite back. Bite back hard, but never cry.
author: Siri Hustvedt, A Woman Looking at Men Looking at Women: Essays on Art, Sex, and the Mind

quote: But it's important to acknowledge that while we may make mistakes, in the long run, we may also learn from them.
author: Sarah Dessen, Lock and Key

quote: Success and perseverance are Siamese twins: where one goes the other follows.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Without doubt, it is a delightful harmony when doing and saying go together.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Leadership is a longterm game.
author: Alin Sav

quote: The rearing of children is considered too important to be left to the individual and should be the responsibility of the state.
author: Jostein Gaarder, Sophie's World

quote: The great words never die... and so does the soul of its author.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: It takes something more than intelligence to act intelligently.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Crime and Punishment

quote: Here is a man whose life and actions the world has already condemned - yet whose enormous fortune...has already brought him acquittal!
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero, Selected Works

quote: He is very careful and loving, and hardly lets me stir without special direction.I have a schedule prescription for each hour in the day; he takes all care from me, and so I feel basely ungrateful not to value it more.
author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman, The Yellow Wall-Paper

quote: We are products of the lack of understanding of the people who raised us up.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: Some things are private. I mean, we're grown-ups now. You don't share everything.
author: Sophie Kinsella, Shopaholic to the Rescue

quote: But love...it's only an illusion. A story one makes up in one's mind about another person. And one knows all the time it isn't true. Of course one knows why one's always taking care not to destroy the illusion.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: He keeps getting older while I'm not paying attention.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Scorpio Races

quote: People tend to complicate their own lives, as if living isn't complicated enough
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quote: Let the night take you. Let the stars evaporate into your dreams. Let sleep be the only comfort for you to believe.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: We are all endowed with wealth of time equally
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There is a great deal of difference between an eager man who wants to read a book and a tired man who wants a book to read.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: As we get better at knowing God’s love, we grow into better things that surround our lives.
author: Ron Baratono, The Writings of Ron Baratono

quote: Love awakens the spirit and the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: When I look back to where I come from, I realize it's for a good reason that God changed my life.
author: Gugu Mona

quote: A flower is a gift of love from the universe given to you. So cherish it, enjoy it with a full blissful heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Let people be the pursuits of happiness, you be the pursuit of perfection.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: The greatest wisdom is to be happy
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: He who would learn to fly one day must first learn to stand and walk and run and climb and dance  one cannot fly into flying.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Talk is free but the wise man chooses when to spend his words.
author: Neil Gaiman, Odd and the Frost Giants

quote: In anything you set out to do, don't try your best. Do your best.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: Like a floating feather in the air, take life very lightly and joyfully adjust to the flow of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Endurance is more important than truth because without endurance there can't be any truth. And truth means going to the end like you mean it. That way, death itself comes up short when it grabs
author: Charles Bukowski, On Writing

quote: Prayer is heart to heart talk with the Creator.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Give people the chance to change.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If money could buy happiness, the rich would not drown their sorrows in expensive wine.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: A couple of them were school beauty-queen pretty while a few were that more real-looking type. A realer kind of pretty.
author: Markus Zusak, Underdog

quote: When we think of love,we always think of red,but when I think of love,I think of you instead.
author: Anthony T Hincks

quote: In my mind, I saw a string stretching from Henry’s heart at Quiet Waters to my heart. It was taut and it vibrated with Henry’s worries and fears and I felt them all.Deeply. I felt them all.
author: Laura Anderson Kurk, Perfect Glass

quote: Some men are like swords, made for fighting. Hang them and they go to rust.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Clash of Kings

quote: Wear your heart on your sleeve. Write about what you think and feel. And share it with your friends.
author: Fennel Hudson, A Writer's Year - Fennel's Journal - No. 3

quote: The old continued to have one resurgence of foolishness after another, until the organism gave out altogether.
author: Saul Bellow

quote: Just like waves in the ocean come and go, no challenge is permanent. Problems will come and go too. We must enjoy the Challenges just like we enjoy the Waves.
author: RVM

quote: MARCUS ANDRONICUS: Now is a time to storm; why art thou still?TITUS ANDRONICUS: Ha, ha, ha!MARCUS ANDRONICUS: Why dost thou laugh? it fits not with this hour.TITUS ANDRONICUS: Why, I have not another tear to shed:
author: William Shakespeare, Titus Andronicus

quote: Your courage to take a risk and your ability to accept responsibility will define you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When your leadership and legacy are built on love, obstacles are overcome through love’s fruit of optimism, foundations are built solid and secure in love’s values, and success is achieved through the strength found in love’s endurance.
author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

quote: I am so, so alive.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Scorpio Races

quote: When we are happy, we forget to eat. Then happiness is a primary need, even more important for life than nourishing the body.
author: Rossana Condoleo

quote: Your heart can break at any age.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: Appreciation is a better motivator than pain.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love, it never dies. It never goes away, it never fades, so long as you hang on to it. Love can make you immortal
author: Gayle Forman, If I Stay

quote: Every moment, every second, every hour and every day, be in love by becoming love. There is nothing else.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Most of the poems I write take 5 minutes, but the words can give a lifetime of relief. Many people that have read my book say it helped them with their grief.
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich, Stantasyland: Quips Quotes and Quandaries

quote: It is much harder to lie to someone's face.But.It is also much harder to tell the truth to someone's face.
author: David Levithan, Dash & Lily's Book of Dares

quote: Utilising the Power of Your Heart is the most significant choice you will make in life.
author: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

quote: Even in democratic society, we don't have good answers how to balance the need for security on one hand and the protection of free speech on the other in our digital networks.
author: Rebecca MacKinnon

quote: Hope is affirmation of positive thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, The Wings of Hope: Survivor

quote: A dynamic person can easily grow and become a civil human when they start to live independently.
author: Saaif Alam

quote: I have a dark soul, that doesn't mean I don't love the sun, rainbows and things that emphasize the light.
author: Melody  Lee, Moon Gypsy

quote: The success of a man should be measured not by his income but by his tax returns.
author: Haresh Sippy

quote: Change is not something you do. Change is something you allow.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: I have no such powers. If I did I would be more merciful than God, believe me.
author: Mario Puzo, The Godfather

quote: Letting go doesn't have to mean walking away. It means the things that hurt you don't hurt you anymore.
author: Sue Fitzmaurice

quote: To better understand our love, I revisited chemical kinetics.
author: Amanda Mosher, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: Let us walk in the path of light
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times -- always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: If we will imagine the thing we want and do our part to “be in the right place at the right time,” there isn’t anything we can’t do, be, or attain.
author: Daniel Willey

quote: The ability to rejoice in any situation is a sign of spiritual maturity.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Disappointment has quite a penchant for taking one by a surprise.
author: Pawan Mishra, Coinman: An Untold Conspiracy

quote: Let life happen to you. Believe me: life is in the right, always.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: You will not be the same after the storms of life; you will be stronger, wiser and more alive than ever before!
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: God is the fountain of all living waters.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Stop worrying about approval and appreciation. Enjoy the beauty and effect of contributing to the universe.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Carrying confidence isn't being the person everyone likes, it's being yourself, regardless of who likes you.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Increasing public awareness of risks of nuclear conflict is the core element of any successful nuclear-weapons-free world strategy.
author: Amit Ray, Peace on the Earth  A Nuclear Weapons Free World

quote: This place looks like the last scene in Hamlet.
author: Patricia Briggs, On the Prowl

quote: Style used to be an interaction between the human soul and tools that were limiting. In the digital era, it will have to come from the soul alone.
author: Jaron Lanier

quote: All goes onward and outward, nothing collapses, And to die is different from what any one supposed, and luckier.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Unprecedented technological capabilities combined with unlimited human creativity have given us tremendous power to take on intractable problems like poverty, unemployment, disease, and environmental degradation. Our challenge is to translate this extraordinary potential into meaningful change.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: The present is precious gift.The past cannot be replayed.The future is no guarantee.Live in the present.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Major breakthroughs often come after major breakdowns.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: No one can grasp the love of the God of the universe without knowing His Son.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: On the Day of Judgment , life and death are not determined by the world but by God's wisdom and law
author: John Bunyan, The Pilgrim's Progress

quote: No friendship is an accident.
author: O. Henry, Heart of the West

quote: If loneliness was a choice, what was the other option? To settle for second-best and try to be happy with that? And was that fair to the person you settled for?
author: Lisa Kleypas, Sugar Daddy

quote: The wise man knows that it is better to sit on the banks of a remote mountain stream than to be emperor of the whole world.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: A lie has more dynamic than truth but truth has more potential.
author: R.A.Delmonico

quote: Knowledge is just a foundation. The whole point of a foundation is to build on it.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: As far as my experience of matrimony goes -- I think it tends to draw you out of, and away from yourself.
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: Nothing is perpetual in this world. Not even your everlasting soul!
author: Munia Khan

quote: Seek to know thy soul; strength of love, light and life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: If you understood him, it would not be God.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: Fear is the strong passion; it is with fear that you must trifle, if you wish to taste the intensest joys of living.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Do I look stupid?" snarled Uncle Vernon, a bit of fried egg dangling from his bushy mustache.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Little girls get hurt when they play grown-up games.
author: V.C. Andrews, Petals on the Wind

quote: Plagiarism is the fear of a blank page.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: I need my eulogy to look better than my resume. I'm living for that.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: The fact that you don’t realize how wonderful you are only makes you more wonderful.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: No civilization can thrive or survive if it refuses to adapt or change.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Light in Greek is the same thing as knowledge which is the opposite of ignorance.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: It's a funny old world.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: We often focus on what is wrong and complain that nothing is beautiful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Letti wasn’t born to pass through the world. She had been born to sit atop of it.
author: S.R. Crawford, Bloodstained Betrayal

quote: Those who put you in difficult times are enemies.Those who forsook you in difficult times are acquaintances.Those who stood by you in difficult times are friends.Those who fought for you in difficult times are family.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There are no moral obligations in the game of empire.
author: A.H. Septimius

quote: Hypocrites get offended by the truth.
author: Jess C. Scott, Bad Romance: Seven Deadly Sins Anthology

quote: There is a sad disconnectedness that overcomes a library when its owner is gone.
author: Lois McMaster Bujold, Komarr

quote: The power of belief is that is should change lives not create chains.
author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quote: Only that 'holy' book which teaches you to love all beings - animals or human things - read. Another one, idiots do, You let go, God speed.
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: Being strong is not just about your physical strength, no, it is about your capacity to handle difficult problem with ease.
author: Nurudeen Ushawu

quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Families help us learn what unconditional love is
author: Brent M. Jones

quote: Eagerly examine the Scriptures daily for spiritual growth.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The failure mode of clever is “asshole.
author: John Scalzi

quote: True love knows no boundaries.
author: Heather Wolf, The Long Spring

quote: It's such a huge arrogance to love someone, and there's too much of it around. There's too much love in this world. Sometimes I think that's what heavens is-- a place where everybody's happy because nobody loves anybody else, ever.
author: Gregory David Roberts, Shantaram

quote: You battled monsters. You sweat and cried your way to this one prolific moment where you finally realize that those dark days and sleepless nights were pre-requisites to your becoming.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth, Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl

quote: Reading leads to good character development.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We all need salespeople who understand the problem and can deliver a solution that works brilliantly for both sides.
author: Chris     Murray, Selling with EASE: The Four Step Sales Cycle Found in Every Successful Business Transaction

quote: George Banks and all he stands for will be saved. Maybe not in life, but in imagination. Because that's what we storytellers do. We restore order with imagination. We instill hope again and again and again.
author: Walt Disney Company, Saving Mr Banks the Official Multi Touch Book

quote: Silence is the music of the heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: My parents grew up during the space race, and I think they imagined the future would be us living on moon bases and everyone has rocket shoes.
author: Brian K. Vaughan

quote: What can a man do with music who is not benevolent?
author: Confucius, The Analects

quote: I’ is in the form of the eternal element (vastu swaroop) and ‘my’ is in the form of circumstances (saiyog swaroop). Circumstance form and eternal element form are two different things.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Most creatures run when they sense danger. People grab a six-pack and a folding chair.
author: Nenia Campbell, Black Beast

quote: The Master, by residing in the Tao,sets an example for all beings.Because he doesn't display himself,people can see his light.Because he has nothing to prove,people can trust his
author: Lao Tzu

quote: For how long will insult hurt a person? For as long as he covets self-importance. For as long as one covets temporary [non eternal] things
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: If you leave this world without solving the problems for which you were born, then you are a failure.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: Mindfulness, also called wise attention, helps us see what we’re adding to our experiences, not only during meditation sessions but also elsewhere.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Happiness: The Power of Meditation

quote: Error is human,perfection is divine!You are not God! Your mistake is normal.So forgive yourself.
author: Paul Gitwaza

quote: The more you let yourself go  the less others let you go.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: It seems to me that trying to live without friends is like milking a bear to get cream for your morning coffee. It is a whole lot of trouble, and then not worth much after you get it.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: When somebody you love dies, a phase of life’s innocence dies with that person, and a part of you dies as well.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: Your success is directly proportional to the number of lives you have touched for the better.
author: Vishwas Chavan, Vishwasutras: Universal Principles for Living: Inspired by Real-Life Experiences

quote: Life is an opportunity to love and serve.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Anyone can lecture from the butt, only very few can act.
author: Pawan Mishra, Coinman: An Untold Conspiracy

quote: There is nothing more beautiful than a vulnerable heart in open hands.
author: Amanda Mosher, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: Works of art imitate and provoke other works of art, the process is the source of art itself.
author: Edward Hirsch

quote: It does not take the striking pose of a high-fashion model or the strict stance of someone in uniform to earn respect and admiration.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today

quote: If you are bored it is only because you are a boring person.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: I'm starting to learn that if things are messy, or pieces don't get put back right, they are going to hurt, either way.
author: R. Y.S. Perez, I Hope You Fall in Love: Poetry Collection

quote: True generosity is an offering given freely and out of pure love. No strings attached. No expectations. Time and love are the most valuable possession you can share.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Never go into battle for your ego, Learn to battle for something much greater.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: I spend a lot of time balancing between faith and disbelief.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: In the strangely simple economy of the world people only get what they give, and to those who have not enough imagination to penetrate the mere outward of things and feel pity, what pity can be given save that of scorn?
author: Oscar Wilde, De Profundis

quote: On the way, see the beauty, find the love, and express the kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To live a great life, focus and do what makes you happy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life is less about finding and more about seeking.
author: Seth Adam Smith, Rip Van Winkle and the Pumpkin Lantern

quote: All those who try to unveil the mysteries always have tragic lives. At the end they are always punished.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: With self-courage, self-confidence and self-will, you will master the act.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Any man who has had the job I've had and didn't have a sense of humor wouldn't still be here.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: It is not the truth which has to be sought, it is you who have to be brought home.
author: Osho, Hsin Hsin Ming, the Book of Nothing: Discourses on the Faith Mind of Sosan

quote: Nothing in my life has ever felt so good yet it hurt so achingly bad.
author: Colleen Hoover, Maybe Someday

quote: The world will go on with or without humanity.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Fear  desire  hope still push us on toward the future.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever  Its loveliness increases  it will never Pass into nothingness.
author: John Keats

quote: We all have an old knot in the heart we wish to untie.
author: Michael Ondaatje, The Cat's Table

quote: Whatever feelings you think you would have if your financial goals were met, feel them now!
author: Stephen Richards, Six Figure Success: Time To Think Big - You Can Do It

quote: Love for you dances within & around my core of being as regular as the beat of my heart. As certain as the draw and release of each breath.
author: Truth Devour, Wantin

quote: Yes it is, because you can only be brave if you're scared.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson, The Impossible Knife of Memory

quote: One of the best ways to support the development of patience is to cultivate happiness with yourself.
author: Allan Lokos, Patience: The Art of Peaceful Living

quote: I watched the Indy 500, and I was thinking that if they left earlier theywouldn't have to go so fast.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Does it help if we're so strong-willed, stubborn, ambitious, and selfish that we always overcome everything in our way no matter what?" asked Wang-mu."I think those are the pertinent virtues, yes," said Peter."Then let's do it. That's us in spades.
author: Orson Scott Card, Children of the Mind

quote: That's what trust is. It's about giving someone else power over you. Power to hurt you.
author: Brandon Sanderson, The Hero of Ages

quote: Round these men stories tended to group themselves, sometimes deserting more ancient heroes for the purpose. Round poets have they gathered especially, for poetry in Ireland has always been mysteriously connected with magic.
author: W.B. Yeats, Irish Fairy and Folk Tales

quote: The funniest thing people say to me: "I wish I had your life". Hello! I make a living writing about it.
author: Daniel Marques

quote: The first rule in life is 'everybody lies.' Remember that and you'll get a lot further.
author: Jennifer Crusie, What the Lady Wants

quote: Money brings courage with it but lock contentment behind.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: Gratitude is one of the greatest attitudes of the human heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Prayers bring comfort, not change. Change requires tangible human efforts.
author: Abhijit Naskar, 7 Billion Gods: Humans Above All

quote: We co-create when we reach out and touch souls. Like rays of light—where they converge—twice as bright.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: If thou dost seek to have what thou dost hide,By self-example mayst thou be denied.
author: William Shakespeare, Shakespeare's Sonnets

quote: Scientists have an expression for hypotheses that are utterly useless even for learning from mistakes. They refer to them as being "not even wrong." Most so-called spiritual discourse is of this type.
author: Christopher Hitchens, god is Not Great: How Religion Poisons Everything

quote: The secret of a good sermon is to have a good beginning and a good ending and to have the two as close together as possible.
author: George Burns

quote: My life has a mysterious purpose that I don't understand, and day by day, conflict by conflict, I learn by going where I have to go.
author: Dean Koontz, Odd Interlude: A Special Odd Thomas Adventure

quote: In order to answer the question “Where am I going?” you need to not understand your mission, but also work at self-improvement
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Political action means taking on responsibility. This cannot happen without power. Power is to serve responsibility.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer, Ethics

quote: When you fill your heart with love, life becomes abundant.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The men who act stand nearer to the mass of man than the men who write  and it is in their hands that new thought gets its translation into the crude language of deeds.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Love is the most potent drug used to seduce anyone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you love something let it go.. if it comes back its yours
author: James Patterson, Max

quote: I'm fine," [her dad] said gently. "Back on the horse, Cath.''What's the horse?' she sighed, watching him pull on a South High hoodie. 'Jogging? Working too much?''Living,' he said, a little too loud. 'Life's the horse.
author: Rainbow Rowell, Fangirl

quote: I don't want revenge on the Taliban, I want education for sons and daughters of the Taliban.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: I say good-bye to hope, but I also say goodbye to hope's disappointment.
author: David Levithan, How They Met, and Other Stories

quote: Hardships make or break people.
author: Margaret Mitchell, Gone with the Wind

quote: The funny thingaboutadvice is,we always tellothersthe thingswecannotreally doourselves.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: The loss of a child exploits the emotions of each individual it encounters.
author: Asa Don Brown

quote: A philosophy a system of principles that will guide your thoughts and actions.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: People enter different paths seeking for happiness and fulfillment. We must respect other people's individuality. Just because they're not on your path doesn't mean they are on the wrong track.
author: Ogwo David Emenike, Happiness Recipe: Eat and Stay Happy

quote: So I put up with bad behavior in the name of loving the way I thought you were supposed to love.
author: Deb Caletti, The Secret Life of Prince Charming

quote: ...and I laugh and I spin and dance and frolic in ecstasy and I... I hurt no more, while you...you petrified little man, are left to wonder if it's you I speak of.
