author: Kellie Elmore, Jagged Little Pieces

quote: One never reaches home, but wherever friendly paths intersect the whole world looks like home for a time.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: A moment or an eternity—did it matter? Life, undefeated, existed and could exist.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Only knowledge and truth may result in freedom of mind.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: I wish we could make out in your bed."Noah sighed. "As do I, but I'm afraid we have ritual burning to conduct.""It's always something.""Isn't it though?
author: Michelle Hodkin, The Evolution of Mara Dyer

quote: ...summer was the swiftness with which Dill would reach up and kiss me when Jem was not looking, the longing we sometimes felt each other feel. With him life was routine; without him life was unbearable.
author: Harper Lee, "To Kill A Mockingbird" A4 Gcse

quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
author: Confucius

quote: A man who is afraid will do anything.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Give your best today you will create a better tomorrow.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: hough we travel the whole over to find the perfect match,we must carry it with us a light or it's playing hard to catch.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, ACross Tic

quote: Patience, that blending of moral courage with physical timidity.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: Time should always by used well to maximise personal desires.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: It is much easier to be brave if you do not know everything.
author: Lois Lowry

quote: Pursue your dreams. You will be amazed about what you can achieve it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: She cured me of my sadness.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Average leaders take you to the mountain.Superior leaders take you up the mountain.Excellent leaders take you to mountaintop.Transcendent leaders take you to the stars.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There is no difference between the person living in ignorance and the person living in darkness.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: We came to this world with two wealths, love and hope, but, in the end, love is our only wealth.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I assess the power of a will by how much resistance, pain, torture it endures and knows how to turn to its advantage.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: We ought to walk in the bright light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Is there any adventure like living life?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Since the beginningnot one unusual thinghas ever happened.
author: Eliezer Yudkowsky, Rationality: From AI to Zombies

quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Truth shrilled in prison or cemetary.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Unless a person understands God’s laws, he will not have long-lasting success
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: May the grace of God keep you strong through every difficulty.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Everyone can choose to live with a golden heart, it is a privilege of loving truly.
author: Angelica Hopes

quote: Live thy creed in the love of Christ.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: People in their handlings of affairs often fail when they are about to succeed. If one remains as careful at the end as he was at the beginning, there will be no failure.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Creativity begins with a walk with nature.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: God’s discipline has nothing to do with rejection but more to do with refinement.
author: Gary Rohrmayer

quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Its easy to fall for someone that will find humor in every situation.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: The eternal sea of politics is best left to politicians.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman, Veterans of the Psychic Wars

quote: Nothing should become a stumbling block in your relationship with the people who surround you
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Writing is like making love. Don't worry about the orgasm, just concentrate on the process.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: I don't want someone to believe my lies, I need someone to accept my truths.
author: Kellie Elmore

quote: Usually, there is nothing more pleasing that returning to a place where you have endured hardship.
author: Tahir Shah, In Search of King Solomon's Mines

quote: How did you-"Fool your guards? They're not very good, the forgot to check the ceiling for spiders."Valek grinned. His angular face softened.
author: Maria V. Snyder

quote: I was thinking about how people seem to read the bible a lot more as they get older, and then it dawned on me—they’re cramming for their final exam.
author: George Carlin

quote: When all you have to face life situations with the attitude forced on to you by society traditions, you will then regret not being the mad you used to be but will never be again.
author: Sameh Elsayed

quote: Fear sits and smiles and is predatory, immobile and silent and serene; an observer who conserves his energy and is content to wait.
author: John Scalzi, The Sagan Diary

quote: Do I perform sometimes in a manic style? Yes. Am I manic all the time? No. Do I get sad? Oh yeah. Does it hit me hard? Oh yeah.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Courage is the complement of fear. A man who is fearless cannot be courageous. [He is also a fool.]
author: Robert A. Heinlein, Time Enough for Love

quote: His mind was a tapestry constantly weaving and unweaving with the dedication of Penelope for her Odysseus.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Flies to Wanton Boys

quote: The value of things is not the time they last, but the intensity with which they occur. That is why there are unforgettable moments and unique people!
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: Man's love is of man's life a thing apart  'Tis woman's whole existence.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Spirituality is not adopting more beliefs and assumptions but uncovering the best in you.
author: Amit Ray, Beautify your Breath - Beautify your Life

quote: We, all who live, haveA life that is livedAnd another life that is thought,And the only life we haveIt's the one that is dividedIn right or wrong.
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: What people say behind your back is your standing in the community in which you live.
author: Edgar Watson Howe

quote: Every island to a child is a treasure island.
author: P.D. James, The Lighthouse

quote: Those footprints in the snow led me to this wildfire.
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: When men age they're called sophisticated. When women age they ain't called at all.
author: Lois Greiman, Unmanned

quote: Life is all we have, the grace of service to mankind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My passionate adventure is to fulfill my calling; revered, preacher woman.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I love theologians, they know god cannot speak so they spend their energy trying to explain to us what his silence means
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Words,words filled the night like the fragrance of invisible flowers.
author: Cornelia Funke

quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Love yourself, even a little bit each day, and your life will bloom into infinite joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: My life is a perfect graveyard of buried hopes.
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of Green Gables

quote: Fearlessness is not only possible, it is the ultimate joy. When you touch nonfear, you are free.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: We have all sorts of words that could describe us. But we get to choose which ones are most important.
author: Jennifer E. Smith, Windfall

quote: You can reach the greatest height in the service of the Lord
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Given a choice between life and death, choose life. Given a choice between right and wrong, choose what's right. And given a choice between a terrible truth and a beautiful lie, choose the truth every time.
author: Mira Grant, Blackout

quote: Our trials are our greatest teachers, mentors and benefactors.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: When you are madly in love with someone, even when sanity tries to rescue you, you wrestle it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: All religions are based on obsolete terminology.
author: Vladimir Nabokov, Pale Fire

quote: People meet in the course of life, they talk together, they discuss, they quarrel, without realizing that they're talking to one another across a distance, each from an observation post standing in a different place in time.
author: Milan Kundera, The Festival of Insignificance

quote: Biti dobro upućen u stvari znači lišiti druge mogućnosti da udovolje svojoj taštini, što će pametan čovek uvek nastojati da izbegne.
author: Jane Austen, Northanger Abbey

quote: Plenty of foods inside my stomach.Soul is empty.
author: Munia Khan

quote: It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is.
author: Erasmus

quote: I believe that anyone can conquer fear by doing the things he fears to do, provided he keeps doing them until he gets a record of successful experience behind him.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Whilst people wholeheartedly talk wrongly about you openly, wholeheartedly talk rightly to God in silence and in faith! He knows everything! He sees everything! He hears everything! And He has the very right answer to everything!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Love is burning in my heart, oh love is shining from the start, don’t let it die tonight
author: Sami Abouzid

quote: I've never looked forward before. I've always looked back. I think about the past way too much and I think about what I should have done and everything I did wrong and I've never once looked forward in my life.
author: Colleen Hoover, Losing Hope

quote: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: When you explore your fears then you set yourself free.
author: Stephen Richards, Releasing You from Fear

quote: Insomnia is his mind's revenge for all the tricky thoughts he has carefully avoided during the daylight hours.
author: Alain de Botton, The Course of Love

quote: Loving kindness is the practice of offering to oneself and others wishes to be happy, peaceful, healthy, strong
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: Both positive and negative thinking can be formed in a child
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There’s no arguing with a song that writes itself.
author: Clifford Cohen

quote: We work to become  not to acquire.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Love is a spell created by mortals
author: Kami Garcia

quote: A mirror reflects appearance but only actions reflect beauty
author: Janna Cachola

quote: I don’t read biographies for moral instruction, or for a history lesson. I want to know what people are saying about me.
author: Bauvard, Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: Motivation is not just part of business—it’s everything in business.
author: Ehab Atalla, The Secrets of Business

quote: When someone says you can't do something because of XYZ, is that true? Or are they playing with your life with their good intentions to keep you safe?
author: Richie Norton

quote: Better is a dinner of herbs where love is  than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.
author: Proverbs

quote: I don't know what can be so dangerous about giving people hope.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: But, you must remember, whatever you eat, make sure you have at least one bowl of salad with it.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Imagination

quote: Flowers, after love, must have been the best advert planet Earth had going for it.
author: Matt Haig, The Humans

quote: You will either have value, or be grist for the mill — nothing more.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: It's a date.""It's a cookie.""It's a cookie date.
author: Shaun David Hutchinson, We Are the Ants

quote: It was just over a year ago. Twelve months, nine days and six hours ago, actually. But thirteen months ago everything was...perfect.
author: Sarah Ockler, Twenty Boy Summer

quote: Nothing of real worth can ever be bought. Love, friendship, honour, valour, respect. All these things have to be earned.
author: David Gemmell, Shield of Thunder

quote: I was tired of being a haunted house' he said. 'Thank you for coming home.
author: Mira Grant, Blackout

quote: God will restore all that you have lost in your life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The Sun, the Moon, the Stars, the Birds, the Animals, the Flowers, are all proof that a Universal Power exists.
author: RVM

quote: Healing is about making the choice to focus your thoughts on what feels energetically better at the level of your heart.
author: Susan Barbara Apollon, Affirmations for Healing Mind, Body & Spirit

quote: If God can help us locate demands, He can also help us locate the leaks.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: I am certain of nothing but the holiness of the Heart's affections and the truth of the Imagination.
author: John Keats

quote: The most important relationship you have in life is the one you have with yourself. And then after that, I'd say once you have that, it may be hard work, but you can actually design your life.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Love your children, for they are the seeds that will make this city bloom.
author: Jessie Burton, The Miniaturist

quote: What other people think and say about you is none of your business. The most destructive thing you would ever do is to believe someone else's opinion of you. You have to stop letting other people's opinions control you.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: Being number one doesn't mean you are the best.
author: Cyc Jouzy

quote: I would give Alex back control so she could protect herself instead of making the decision for her.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout, Elixir

quote: He was not interested in what they were doing, not any of it— it was both ugly and abstract, a continuous manipulation of people devoid of any of the tangible rewards that so much work had. That’s politics....
author: Kim Stanley Robinson, Blue Mars

quote: Andrea raised her hand. “This is the hand that slapped Aunt B.”“Maybe you should have it gold-plated.”“Here, you can touch it, since you’re my best friend.
author: Ilona Andrews, Magic Slays

quote: What about a compromise? I’ll kill them first, and if it turns out they were friendly, I’ll apologize.
author: Rick Riordan, The Lost Hero

quote: When next the devil attack you apply your break resist the devil and he will flew from you. The bible didn't say you should run from the devil but resist him.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: I planted a kamikaze kiss on Jamie’s cheek.“FUCK,” he shouted, wiping it off. “What if you killed me!” He threw a Skittle at my face. It hit my forehead.“Ow!”“Taste the rainbow bitch.
author: Michelle Hodkin, The Retribution of Mara Dyer

quote: Life is pain and the enjoyment of love is an anesthetic.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: Upgrading one's imagination about what is possible is always a leap of faith.
author: Clay Shirky, Cognitive Surplus: Creativity and Generosity in a Connected Age

quote: I mentally bless and exonerate anyone who has kicked a chair out from beneath her or swallowed opium in large chunks. My mind has met their environment, here in the void. I understand perfectly.
author: Suzanne Finnamore, Split: A Memoir of Divorce

quote: The eternal struggle between failure and fortune is a fight not between mortal enemies but sparring partners. So fortune is improved by failure, and the reverse is also true.
author: Agona Apell, The Success Genome Unravelled: Turning Men from Rot to Rock

quote: Avoid working in windowless environments for good health.
author: Steven Magee

quote: We ran as if to meet the moon.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Stop waiting for someone else to run your life. Get into the driver's seat and choose your destination.
author: Karon Waddell

quote: Just because it is night now it doesn't mean that there is no morning. Just hope for the best and be patient.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You're like, both like, Alexander the Great.'We can't both be Alexander.'Well sometimes I think you're two side of the same coin, and I'm the metal in between.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: If you know what the treasure of time is worth, if you know that time is a resource, then you will actually be able to convert your time into any product you want.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: A judgement results from some kind of consideration of the evidences available and is always better than an assumption!
author: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

quote: If you desire many things  many things will seem but a few.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: A very great deal more truth can become known than can be proven.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: What would be the significance of the candlelight, if there were no darkness? What would be the power of the stars over our minds, if there were no night?
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Do all the work you can in your youthful days while you have the greatest strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: If you think the world is a tough place, it time to change your lens!!!!
author: Harrish Sairaman

quote: Every answer I seek lies within me. Any outward seeking for my answers can only take me as far as my inner self permits.
author: Pooja Ruprell, Passion, Perseverance and Prayer

quote: Jesus said, 'Enter into My rest' and let God do what He does best
author: R. Alan Woods, The Journey Is The Destination: A Photo Journal

quote: What good is faith if it causes pain for another? What good is religion if it does no good? What good is any belief that leads to hate?
author: Jared Brock, A Year of Living Prayerfully: How a Curious Traveler Met the Pope, Walked on Coals, Danced with Rabbis, and Revived His Prayer Life

quote: The more you concentration on God, the longer your conversation with him lasts and the holier his consacration will be on you. Let your communication with him be controlled by your committment.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: I close my eyes. I don't expect Four to reassure me, and he makes no effort to, but I feel better standing here than I did out there among the people who are my friends, my faction.
author: Veronica Roth, Divergent

quote: Never having been able to succeed in the world, he took his revenge by speaking ill of it.
author: Voltaire

quote: The thing that binds us together is that we have both lowered our expectations of life
author: Orhan Pamuk, Snow

quote: As a sculptor sculpts a statue, an educator educates our future generation. Beauty depends on the creator.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You know, I'm just a very boring, not very funny person in person. I don't feel pressured to be otherwise.
author: Lorrie Moore

quote: Previous generations understood about death, and undoubtedly would have seen a reasonable amount of death. Once you get into the Victorian era, you might well have seen the funerals of many of your siblings before you were very old.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: What matters is at the end of life, when you're about to pass into oblivion, that you've at least scratched 'Kilroy was here,' on the last wall of the universe.
author: William Faulkner, Lion in the Garden: Interviews with William Faulkner, 1926-1962

quote: Necessity is the constant scourge of the lower classes  ennui of the higher ones.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I thought with melancholy how an author spends months writing a book, and maybe puts his heart’s blood into it, and then it lies about unread till the reader has nothing else in the world to do.
author: W. Somerset Maugham, The Razor's Edge

quote: Some children were lucky enough to have their Potter novels banned by witch-hunting school boards and micromanaging ministers. Is there any greater job than a book you're not allowed to read, a book you could go to hell for reading?
author: Ann Patchett

quote: I wanted the monster back and that was plainly wrong.
author: Stephenie Meyer, The Host

quote: In my fool hardy youth, when my friends were dreaming of heroic deeds in the realms of engineering and law, finance and national politics, I dreamt of becoming a librarian.
author: Alberto Manguel, The Library at Night

quote: It has never been my goal to impress anyone but myself. That has proven challenging enough.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: I'm very down to Earth, I'm just not from this Earth.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you.
author: Jane Austen, Pride And Prejudice

quote: The first ten million years were the worst," said Marvin, "and the second ten million years, they were the worst too. The third ten million years I didn't enjoy at all. After that I went into a bit of a decline.
author: Douglas Adams, The Restaurant at the End of the Universe

quote: When our thoughts, our words, and our deeds are for happiness then we are happy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If tragedy never entered our lives, we wouldn't appreciate the magic.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: You cannot pour more water into a full cup without causing a spillage.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: It was as if-this is something I thought of only later, of course-she was gently peeling bcd one layer after another hat covered a person's heart, a very sensual feeling.
author: Haruki Murakami, South of the Border, West of the Sun

quote: The tragedy of life is what dies inside a man while he lives.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Don’t worry if you don’t accomplish everything in this life. Fortunately, death overcomes every thing—even the very thing that tried to kill us.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: I'm saying that I'm a moody, insecure, narrow-minded, jealous, borderline homicidal bitch, and I want you to promise me that you're okay with that, because it's who I am, and you're what I need.
author: Jeaniene Frost, Halfway to the Grave

quote: Wherever there is somebody else, a war is not far away.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: How nice-to feel nothing, and still get full credit for being alive.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr., Slaughterhouse-Five

quote: Learning is the source of growth and we become stagnant without it.
author: Euginia Herlihy

quote: If somebody asks me what enlightenment is, I say that it is simply recovering conscience.
author: Ilchi Lee, Change: Realizing Your Greatest Potential

quote: Socrates  indeed  when he was asked of what country he called himself  said  "Of the world"  for he considered himself an inhabitant and a citizen of the whole world.
author: Cicero

quote: If you can imagine a thing,then it has already existed,somewhere, somewhen, somehow.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: The wind is made of haunting souls that moan and groan in whistles and whispers. This ghostly choir chills the breeze and orchestrates a rise of goose bumps on my skin.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: Be one of the crowd? It went against everything a wizard stood for, and a wizard would not stand for anything if he could sit down for it, but even sitting down, you had to stand out.
author: Terry Pratchett, Unseen Academicals

quote: Fundamentally, leadership is more about the future, but starts at today.
author: Pearl Zhu, Leadership Master: Five Digital Trends to Leap Leadership Maturity

quote: A bride never forgets her wedding ornaments!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I was raised in a large family. The first reason for my travel was to get away from my family. I knew that I wanted to be a writer, but I didn't want people to ask me questions about it.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Believing is a fine thing, but putting those beliefs into execution is a test of strength.
author: Kahlil Gibran, The Treasured Writings of Kahlil Gibran

quote: The irritating question they ask us -- us being writers -- is: "Where do you get your ideas?"
author: Neil Gaiman, Smoke and Mirrors: Short Fiction and Illusions

quote: No matter where you are--no matter what happens to you--always be kind and always be loving.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: As sure as time, history is repeating itself, and as sure as man is man, history is the last place he'll look for his lessons.
author: Harper Lee

quote: If you learn to use the power of love then you're the most powerful person.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education, whatever else it should or should not be, must be an inoculation against the poisons of life and an adequate equipment in knowledge and skill for meeting the chances of life.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: With a strong spirit, you will survive any situation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: To automatically be promoted from one class to another without any serious self- discipline, and self- improvement is a cheap life.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: It's like you have a plan and someone comes along and makes you want to change it all, but you still like your first plan, no matter how fantastic the second one makes you feel.
author: Melina Marchetta, Saving Francesca

quote: Even when the lightening flashes inside them we say they are only clouds and turn our attention to the next meal, the next pain, the next breath, the next page. This is how we go on.
author: Stephen King, Bag of Bones

quote: Music fills the infinite to give us infinite joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: She was carmine shadows reflecting from my crimson words. Every pulse sent a velvet ripple through the shade. Every breath, a scarlet pause.
author: Hubert Martin

quote: The cause of most of man's unhappiness is sacrificing what he wants most for what he wants now.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: The virtues of character, behavioural patterns determine how great a nation and people are.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: a major reason why we wake up each day is to know the real reasons why we wake up each day
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: This is the funniest book I’ve ever held in my hands. --Dave Barry, Pulitzer Prize winning humorist and author says about Radical Sabbatical
author: Dave Barry

quote: Praying is a persuasive act.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: They plot, they plot, sleeping or afoot they never let up.
author: Thomas Pynchon, Gravity's Rainbow

quote: The products your life must have could be in the form of an improved character and virtue.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: If we take care the Nature it will be our careful Mother.
author: Jan Jansen

quote: The downtrodden  who are the great creators of slang  hurl pithiness and colour at poverty and oppression.
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: That men would die was a matter of necessity; which men would die, though, was a matter of circumstance, and Yossarian was willing to be the victim of anything but circumstance.
author: Joseph Heller

quote: art is never finished, only abandoned
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Love is the only language that everyone understands without any word or interpretation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You have my advice. Carry it with you. It won't slow you down.
author: Mark  Lawrence, Emperor of Thorns

quote: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Adding to my emotional dizziness on Sunday, I spoke with my sister, who kept noting how amazing Michael is, and what a brave and selfless man he is for having helped as he did.
author: Zack Love, Anissa's Redemption

quote: Do good, live in the most positive and joyful way possible every day.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: Learn from the past, but don’t live in the past.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Do I need to wriggle my breasts at you again?""No, please. I don't know if I'd be able to stand the theological debate that would follow.
author: Brandon Sanderson, Warbreaker

quote: If he was planning to attack and ravish, he gave no indication of being in a hurry to do so.
author: Julia Quinn, Ten Things I Love About You

quote: It has seemed to be more necessary to have regard to the weight of words rather than to their number.
author: Cicero

quote: You were born for more than just living in mediocrity and dying after your time here evaporates.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: To understand the language of love and peace, listen to the silence.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be strategic and purposeful in whatever you do
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The primary cause of disorder in ourselves is the seeking of reality promised by another.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: We are a society of notoriously unhappy people: lonely, anxious, depressed, destructive, dependent — people who are glad when we have killed the time we are trying so hard to save.
author: Erich Fromm, To Have or to Be? The Nature of the Psyche

quote: We can bring heaven on the earth when we have compassion for all living beings.
author: Amit Ray, Walking the Path of Compassion

quote: People make the rules of society, not God.
author: V.C. Andrews, Flowers in the Attic

quote: You know,' he said, the condition of sourness--or monstrousness, as you might call it--doesn't have to be permanent.'P189
author: Veronica Roth, Carve the Mark

quote: So what? All writers are lunatics!
author: Cornelia Funke, Inkspell

quote: Man is no star, but a quick coalOf mortal fire:Who blows it not, nor doth controlA faint desire,
author: George Herbert, The Temple: The Poetry of George Herbert

quote: No one is a doer in this world. To claim, ‘I am doing’ is egoism. Illusion continues to prevail under the umbrella of egoism.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Life wasn't meant to be a trial, it was intended to be a wondrous joy.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: Nature has always had more force than education.
author: Voltaire

quote: The most fatal thing a man can do is try to stand alone.
author: Carson McCullers, The Heart is a Lonely Hunter

quote: The habit of reading is the only enjoyment in which there is no alloy  it lasts when all other pleasures fade.
author: Anthony Trollope

quote: If a man brags about his sex life he's a stud, but if a woman brags about her sex life she's a slut.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: If you want to know whether or not you have had a successful life, think about what people would say about you at your own funeral.
author: Lindsey Rietzsch, Successful Failures: Recognizing the Divine Role That Opposition Plays in Life's Quest for Success

quote: Art is a positive "FORCE" that bring beings together for the common good. Only the people who had lost a piece of themselves can create the unimaginary.
author: Henry Johnson Jr

quote: In our dreams we find the dreams of others and in other’s dreams we find ourselves. No will is separated from others and no dream is in itself isolated from the will of God.
author: Robin Sacredfire

quote: Surprises are all part of life's journey.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: I lost a horse today.''That sounds careless. What happened?''She jumped off a cliff.''A cliff! Is that normal?
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Scorpio Races

quote: God abandons only those who abandon themselves, and whoever has the courage to shut up his sorrow within his own heart is stronger to fight against it than he who complains.
author: George Sand, La Petite Fadette

quote: Here your dreams are sweet and tomorrow brings them true...
author: Suzanne Collins, The Hunger Games

quote: Forget everything that surrounds you. Think that there’s just you and me in this wide world.
author: Olga Goa, Fateful Italian Passion

quote: Writing a book of poetry is like dropping a rose petal down the Grand Canyon and waiting for the echo.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Life is not a puzzle to solve. Stop, Enjoy the Journey!-RVM
author: RVM

quote: I have trust issues.”“I know. I’m on a mission to cure you of that.
author: Simone Elkeles, Rules of Attraction

quote: A wise warrior learns from her mistakes.
author: Leigh Bardugo, Wonder Woman: Warbringer

quote: It is often very useful for others to think you less intelligent than you are," Benedict said, his tone amused. "It works particularly well against those who aren't as intelligent as you in the first place.
author: Jim Butcher, The Aeronaut's Windlass

quote: The writing of novels is one of the few ways I have found to approach the altar of God and Creation itself. You try to worship God by performing the singularly courageous and impossible favor of knowing yourself.
author: Pat Conroy, My Reading Life

quote: Offence is an event, offended is a decision. Offence and offended we have to live through it but to stay offended? To live in that place denies the very nature of the salvation that you claimed to have received.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: Stand strong in your value. That starts by knowing your value.
author: Julieanne O'Connor, SPELLING IT OUT FOR YOUR CAREER

quote: I do think that art that doesn't communicate is useless.
author: William Golding

quote: On rare occasion we are granted the gift of seeing how far we have come just how much we have healed and how really free we are. This changes us. Never again will we underestimate our ability to rise.
author: Renae A. Sauter

quote: To be, is to be in love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Take time for all things: great haste makes great waste.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: A woman does not marry with a man for his wealth, unless he is too rich and a man does not marry with a girl for her beauty, unless she is too beautiful.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: Be a person that radiates happiness with her every movement and enlightens every place she goes with her smile.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A thought is a Cosmic Order waiting to happen.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Though you can live for as much as you like, but your longevity is stupidity if you were leading a worthless life.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: You are my heart. Even if you are a broken heart
author: Philippa Gregory, The Kingmaker's Daughter

quote: Who said you to give up on your bold dreams? Don't you know that the universe is with you to help you achieve all your bolder visions?
author: Seema Brain Openers

quote: Water is life, and clean water means health.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: My life didn't please me, so I created my life.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: I stand secured in the Lord.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Each of us has our destination and target, but when we ignore it, we are used for purposes other than for what we were actually intended
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I'd never be where I am if more successful writers hadn't taken an interest in me and done me a good turn.
author: Sara Sheridan

quote: When fears are screaming in your ears, try to hear the whispers of your faith and run into that dark path. That is how you reach the paradise.
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: Wake up,dance with the light of the morning sun.Enjoy the warmth of her love,fell the joy of life,feel the joy of deepest gratitude.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: All wisdom contracts then expands, contracts then expands. That is how consciousness evolves.
author: S. Kelley Harrell, Gift of the Dreamtime - Reader's Companion

quote: When you allow your mind to ONLY have positive thoughts towards your desired outcome you are saying to the Universe that you are devoted to manifesting your dream.
author: Stephen Richards, Ask and the Universe Will Provide: A Straightforward Guide to Manifesting Your Dreams

quote: Even one voice in a wilderness of ignorance is a voice that is heard by someone.
author: Kristen Ashley, Golden Trail

quote: You have to be near Him to hear Him.
author: Jared Brock, A Year of Living Prayerfully: How a Curious Traveler Met the Pope, Walked on Coals, Danced with Rabbis, and Revived His Prayer Life

quote: If everything is possible, then it is also possible that something is impossible.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Our difficulties in understanding or effectuatingcommunication with other animals may arise from our reluctance to grasp unfamiliar ways of dealing with the world.
author: Carl Sagan, Dragons of Eden: Speculations on the Evolution of Human Intelligence

quote: We will find our sacred-path.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Faith  as an intellectual state  is self-reliance.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: It is possible to rise above any adversity.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The purpose of religion is tocontrol yourself, not to criticiseothers.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Suffering is nothing by itself. But suffering shared with the passion of Christ is a wonderful gift, the most beautiful gift, a token of love.
author: Mother Teresa, In the Heart of the World: Thoughts, Stories and Prayers

quote: Every difficult problem is easy if you know how to.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In this complex modern world, it is impossible to be simple.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What you must understand about me is that I’m a deeply unhappy person.
author: John Green, Looking for Alaska

quote: This time is very important in your life because God wants to lift this generation from failures, poverty, and unbelief
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I do not want to eat or drink, or i will lose the taste of you in my mouth
author: Jandy Nelson

quote: Truth is, moments come to an end. That's how memories are created.
author: Tyconis D. Allison Ty

quote: To see a man’s true colours, tell him that you don’t plan on having sex with him. To see a woman’s true colours, tell her that you don’t plan on marrying her.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: He is a man of sense who does not grieve for what he has not  but rejoices in what he has.
author: Epictetus

quote: Perfect courage means doing unwitnessed what we would be capable of with the world looking on.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Hayden?""Yes,Gia?""Nothing I just wanted to say your name
author: Kasie West, The Fill-In Boyfriend

quote: Women priests. Great, great. Now there's priests of both sexes I don't listen to.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: Every eye makes its own perception.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: In bourgeois society capital is independent and has individuality, while the living person is dependent and has no individuality.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Youth is like a fickle girlfriend. We can't understand or value her until she goes off with someone else, never to return.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón, Marina

quote: When a man plans, a woman laughs.
author: David Wong, John Dies at the End

quote: Writing a novel is a terrible experience, during which the hair often falls out and the teeth decay.
author: Flannery O'Connor

quote: Better a witty fool, than a foolish wit.
author: William Shakespeare, Twelfth Night

quote: Wisdom defines your value—not your wealth.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Adding your own piece of knowledge to the vast knowledge of the humanrace could be a sufficient reason for having existed.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: Being here with him is safety; it's a cave, where we huddle together while the storm goes on outside. This is a delusion, of course. This room is one of the most dangerous places I could be.
author: Margaret Atwood, The Handmaid's Tale

quote: It was one thing to snuggle a little when the world seemed about to end, and quite another to explain to her parents that she wanted to date an ancient magical horse.
author: Brandon Mull, Keys to the Demon Prison

quote: Some of us have deeper feelings for one over another. It can’t be helped. It’s chemistry. It’s inherent. You can’t make yourself love someone you don’t and you can’t make yourself stop loving someone you do.
author: Kate McGahan, Jack McAfghan: Return from Rainbow Bridge

quote: Our spirit knows our purpose, let these en-grained impressions shape our perceptions of who we think we are today.
author: Napz Cherub Pellazo

quote: Passion is the fuel for excellence. Rest, vacation or a payrise can't make you create excellence in your work. Findbwhat makes you passionate about what you do
author: Janna Cachola

quote: Show me your friends and I'll show you your future.
author: Moosa Rahat

quote: There is nothing to fear in this world. Whatever happens, it happens to the body-complex [relative-self], right?
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Life is a happy journey.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: People fall in love without reason, without even wanting to. You can't predict it. That's love.
author: Haruki Murakami, Dance Dance Dance

quote: The greatest literature is the Biblical stories.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I have fallen for someone who's so emotionally shut down, I will only get hurt.
author: E.L. James, Fifty Shades of Grey

quote: The best lies were always mixed with truth.
author: Sarah J. Maas, Crown of Midnight

quote: If the tree doesn't hug you back, it's not a problem with the tree, it's a problem with your heart.
author: Donald L. Hicks, Look into the stillness

quote: No one knows anything, really. It's all rented, or borrowed.
author: Ian McEwan

quote: I can’t express the truth about reality. I can only express my feelings.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don't love just for beauty, love to make her beautiful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Storytellers are a threat. They threaten all champions of control, they frighten usurpers of the right-to-freedom of the human spirit -- in state, in church or mosque, in party congress, in the university or wherever.
author: Chinua Achebe, Anthills of the Savannah

quote: Witnessing honesty frightens some people because they haven't known authenticity in their own life.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: I live nearby a graveyard, that's where I get all my inspiration for wisdom and life
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, Pearls Of Eternity

quote: Let the world know your dreams, my friend; realise them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The right music and lyrics can infiltrate your soul.
author: Brownell Landrum, Repercussions: DUET stories Volume IV - Adult Version

quote: REAL success, satisfaction and joy has nothing to do with owning STUFF!
author: Tony Dovale

quote: To the sick  while there is life there is hope.
author: Cicero

quote: All truthful music is familiar to the ear, for its notes were written into our souls long ago.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Take my advice: live your life to the fullest. Breathe the air, taste the wine, kiss the girls, and always remember that the tales of another are never as wondrous as your own.
author: Michael J. Sullivan, Rise of Empire

quote: Apprehension of a painful or disagreeable recognition made me tremble. I am confident that it took no distinctness of shape, and that it was the revival for a few minutes of the terror of childhood.
author: Charles Dickens, Great Expectations

quote: ...If I don't have twenty or thirty books right here, waiting to be read, I start jonesing. That's my compulsion.
author: Nora Roberts, Key of Knowledge

quote: Creative is my god. Technology my cherished lover.
author: Nora Roberts, The Collector

quote: Dividing the goal into pieces must be brought down to the smallest measurable element, a day, to know exactly what to do every day
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There is no mystery-- that's the beauty of it. We are entirely explicable to each other, and yet we stay. What a miracle that is.
author: Kamila Shamsie, Broken Verses

quote: Who do you love more, your thoughts or God?
author: Bert McCoy

quote: Women withhold sex, then men make it boring and soon their marriage is over.
author: Linda Alfiori, The Art of Loving Again: How to More Intelligently Start Again After a Breakup, Divorce and The Death of a Loved One

quote: There is no truth," Stephanie said mysterously. "Only perspectives.
author: Michelle Hodkin, The Evolution of Mara Dyer

quote: The struggle is never easy to finding what is lost and to gain the best of what is to come without sweat.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: A chap’s impending death has a way of focusing the mind.
author: Sara Sheridan, British Bulldog

quote: But this room looked like it had been decorated by the unholy lovechild of Barbie and Strawberry Shortcake.
author: Rachel Hawkins, Hex Hall

quote: Love is the light that brightens every heart's darkness.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: It's not oil that runs the world, it's shame.
author: Sherman Alexie, War Dances

quote: Suffering is only suffering if it's done in silence, in solitude. Pain experienced in public, in view of loving millions, was no longer pain. It was communion.
author: Dave Eggers, The Circle

quote: And perhaps it is the greater grief, after all, to be left on earth when another is gone.
author: Madeline Miller, The Song of Achilles

quote: There are two ways to reach me: by way of kisses or by way of the imagination. But there is a hierarchy: the kisses alone don't work.
author: Anaïs Nin, Henry And June

quote: The grace by which our world relies, Is man’s ability to do good. But judgment seeks to condemn in our eyes, the times in which we could
author: Robert Vanleeuwen

quote: Words can't be wood enough for a lot of things. But you know, I guess we have to try.
author: Ava Dellaira, Love Letters to the Dead

quote: I wanted to live in your heart and in your dreams.I wanted to enjoy your love, laughter and screams.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In order for a person to be able to “turn our lives and our wills” over requires something very difficult for a spiritually wounded person to accomplish - Trust. Yet, to accomplish this step, trust of the spirit must be present.
author: David W. Earle

quote: The chemist who can extract from his heart's elements compassion  respect  longing  patience  regret  surprise  and forgiveness and compound them into one can create that atom which is called love.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Everyone knows that God protects drunkards and lovers.
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Three Musketeers

quote: I did not find my way out of the darkness until I admitted I was lost.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Never been more truthful then right now, looking at you fixes everything.
author: Holly Hood

quote: Even when we earn a lot of money, how we earn it should be a pleasant experience.
author: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, Ph.D, MBA

quote: Let go of yesterday. Let today be a new beginning and be the best that you can, and you'll get to where God wants you to be.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: It was me who had to carry myself over the finish line, and all I needed to remember when I felt like not trying was that that feeling wouldn't last forever.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout, The Problem with Forever

quote: Your soul is always trying to guide you in your true life direction towards your highest good and greatest happiness.
author: Catherine Carrigan, Unlimited Intuition NOW

quote: I have noticed... that men usually leave married women alone and are inclined to treat all wives with respect. This is no great credit to married women.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: In my view, the novelist has no right to express his opinions on the things of this world. In creating, he must imitate God: do his job and then shut up.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: …it’s not just learning that’s important. It’s learning what to do with what you learn and learning why you learn things that matters.
author: Norton Juster

quote: I have a different GOD. I see it in the smile of others. My worship to make people happy. Love is my Religion.
author: Vikrmn, Guru with Guitar

quote: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
author: Bob Proctor, You Were Born Rich

quote: Artists, especially writers, great writers, are the most honest people I know. There are deep confessions in their words. And if we're strong enough to expose the spaces between them, we find truths there also.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: we have to live today by what truth we can get today and be ready tomorrow to call it falsehood
author: William James

quote: How vain it is to sit down to write when you have not stood up to live.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Live is not about constantly fighting to keep someone in your life. It is about constantly fighting for a better life together.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: It is my mood which decides the weather, it is my mood which brings the tiny changes to humankind.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: We must plant trees, grow gardens instead of lawns, ride bicycles when we can and support responsible local businesses over big brands.

quote: Nature does not ask your permission, she has nothing to do with your wishes, and whether you like her laws or dislike them, you are bound to accept her as she is, and consequently all her conclusions.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Notes from Underground, White Nights, The Dream of a Ridiculous Man, and Selections from The House of the Dead

quote: Ammu's tears made everything that had so far seemed unreal, real.
author: Arundhati Roy, The God of Small Things

quote: Do not, for one more minute, spend your precious time and energy on or surround yourself with people who are less than you deserve.
author: Tanya Masse

quote: Live for possibilities. Live with passion and purpose.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: For each one of us, there is only one thing necessary: to fulfill our own destiny, according to God's will, to be what God wants us to be.
author: Thomas Merton, No Man Is an Island

quote: An honorable man has a heart for the poor and vulnerable in our society.
author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quote: This I know for a fact: the reason African women have children is so that there's someone else to do the housework.
author: Ben Aaronovitch, Midnight Riot

quote: Live a life in the light of love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: It was absolutely necessary to interrupt him now.
author: Jane Austen, Pride and Prejudice

quote: Your mornings are very powerful. Be careful with them.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: I follow three rules: find the opportunity to love and love endlessly, be kind to all and rude to none, and serve others with care and know that service is joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I'm restless. Things are calling me away. My hair is being pulled by the stars again.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge.
author: Bible

quote: When bad strikes, most likely you will not get an answer when you ask, “Why?” Your strength must come from having faith that someday the answer will come and then it will all make sense.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: I hold steadfast to hope.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Film is the ultimate canvas, the elixir of art, and the magic of life.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: We have too many cellphones. We've got too many internets. We have got to get rid of those machines. We have too many machines now.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: When others sit, a #StaticJedi is found standing—even standing along, with a message not in hand but secure in heart!
author: Eric Samuel Timm, Static Jedi: The Art of Hearing God Through the Noise

quote: Sharks to not eat Chinese people because they get hungry thirty minutes later".
author: R. Alan Woods

quote: I think that people's sexual preferences are a legitimate subject for humour, dirty humour if at all possible.
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: I have decided to understand and spread love for peace rather than fight for peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: No one has the right to do wrong, even if wrong has been done to them.
author: Viktor E. Frankl, Man's Search for Meaning

quote: A small idea with wings will take you higher than a big one with legs.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: I belong to love the world and its endless beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: She wondered that hope was so much harder then despair.
author: Patricia Briggs, Cry Wolf

quote: To every difficulty, God’s grace abounds.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The mystery of life is the moment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If I am walking with two other men, each of them will serve as my teacher. I will pick out the good points of the one and imitate them, and the bad points of the other and correct them in myself.
author: Confucius

quote: ...I want to live doubly - first with you and then afterwards in memory ...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: Look at towards the future! If you see something, it is your imagination only! Because the future is not there yet, it has not born yet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: People are generally amazed that I would take an interest in any forum that would require me to stop talking for three hours.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: I think that humor has become a principle means of communication among Americans about politics.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Our ignorance of the meaning of the existence of one or another creation does not mean they are meaningless
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Neither can you explain yourself to me. Nor can I explain myself to you. You have your sadness and I have mine.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Man is a history-making creature who can neither repeat his past nor leave it behind.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: It's all about you, isn't it?
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Artistes breathe and dream creativity!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Merlin's pants!" shrieked Hermione, jumping up and running from the room."Merlin's pants?" repeated Ron, looking amused. "She must be really upset.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: I got swirling eyes and the capacity to shatter windows with my bare voice. Tod got teleportation and invisibility. The supernatural world is so far from fair.
author: Rachel Vincent, My Soul to Keep

quote: Everyone who fights always fight with a purpose in mind.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: Talking to strangers is very panic fear, to be fearless and good communicator in long term try talking to strangers with courage like you already know them.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: He’d only ever seen her twice, only talked to her once, but as he now gazed upon her, he realized that he’d missed her all day long.
author: Nicki Elson, Hans & Greta: a Twisted Fairy Tale Novella

quote: We are all vessels of good honour.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: When you write a story you're telling yourself the story. When you rewrite your main job is taking out all the things that are NOT the story.

quote: Afterward, there was that long, crowded pause in which everyone decides that although they are very shaken, and possibly upside down, they are, to their surprise, still alive.
author: Terry Pratchett, The Carpet People

quote: Only knowledge can turn life's unbearableness into a weapon.

quote: Where error is irreparable, repentance is useless.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: I keep on dreaming, but to find freedom, one must first search inwards.
author: Fennel Hudson, A Waterside Year - Fennel's Journal - No. 2

quote: Keep up your faith to go high and fly, even after so many pains and sorrow. You can turn from a caterpillar to a butterfly. Life gives you a second change: a call to grow.

quote: We all have the Wisdom to understand that sooner or later Life will end, but we don’t have the Willpower to Live before we die.
author: RVM

quote: You belong to the saved souls.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The only joy in the world is to begin.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: I went to the bank and proposed that they lend money to the poor people. The bankers almost fell over.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: I love food, and I'm a chronic over-orderer at restaurants.
author: Shakira

quote: We owe it to each other to tell stories.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Ruthless trust ultimately comes down to this: faith in the person of Jesus and hope in his promise.

quote: Your excitement, motivation, energy, happiness should be dependent on – YOU and YOU ONLY!!!!!
author: Harrish Sairaman

quote: What would you do if I kissed you right now?"I stared at his beautiful face and his beautiful mouth and I wanted nothing more than to taste it. "I would kiss you back.
author: Michelle Hodkin, The Unbecoming of Mara Dyer

quote: To be sensual, I think, is to respect and rejoice in the force of life, of life itself, and to be present in all that one does, from the effort of loving to the making of bread.

quote: Heaven will always support your godly move be it a righteous cause or be it a desire to see people free from what has held them down.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: Those who find ugly meanings in beautiful things are corrupt without being charming. This is a fault.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: The exercise of blending people’s problem-solving abilities to produce the desired outcome is a worthwhile thing to do.
author: Pearl  Zhu, Unpuzzling Innovation: Mastering Innovation Management in a Structural Way

quote: Musical training is a more potent instrument than any other, because rhythm and harmony find their way into the inward places of the soul.
author: Plato, The Republic

quote: What is it about intimacy that makes it so very disturbing?
author: Jeanette Winterson, Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit

quote: If you desire to be great in life and live a life of no regret the number one thing you should do with time is to INVEST TIME.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: We must transcend the illusion that money or power has any bearing on our worthiness as children of God.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Beautiful girls should know how to defend themselves against the advances of gentlemen.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: To say goodbye is to die a little.
author: Raymond Chandler, The Long Goodbye

quote: Every thought you cultivate is a brushstroke on the canvas of your life. Your life then, is an outer picture of your inner thoughts.
