quote: Familiarity breeds contempt, for others at first, but then inwardly, contempt towards ourselves.
author: Oli Anderson, Synchronesia: A Depressing Existential Novel

quote: Jesus Christ is three in one: the way, the truth, and the life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Nothing lasts for long. Even moments of beauty transcend and transform.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Now,Because I put you in the past,My life is like:A path paved,Fit for your feet.Now other women walk on it;And not one of them fits.Walking crooked, on a path that's straight.I watch them.They don't even have your gait.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, Live & Remember

quote: Pack is for comfort when you hurt, I thought, putting my head back down. And for the first time in a long time, maybe the first time ever, I appreciated being a part of one.
author: Patricia Briggs, Silver Borne

quote: Any idiot can put up a website.
author: Patricia Briggs, Blood Bound

quote: The value of time lies in its brevity. To use it effectively, you must know its value.
author: Mensah Oteh, Unlocking Life's Treasure Chest: Wisdom keys to keep you inspired, encouraged, motivated and focused

quote: Punk is musical freedom. It's saying, doing and playing what you want. In Webster's terms, 'nirvana' means freedom from pain, suffering and the external world, and that's pretty close to my definition of Punk Rock.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: My baby is amazing; even his head smells amazing. His breath, the whole thing, you could eat him! He's a big, beautiful boy. He's great.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: Listening to podcast, reading a book, listening to an aduibook and watching films isn't waste of time. It's how somebody becomes wise!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: The report card just told me, my teacher, my parents maybe 3 weeks before when they gave me a test HE HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH MY POTENTIAL.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: If cats looked like frogs we'd realize what nasty, cruel little bastards they are. Style. That's what people remember.
author: Terry Pratchett, Lords and Ladies

quote: Your associations play a crucial part of your success equation. Study them closely because they will help or hinder you from reaching your potential.
author: Mensah Oteh, Unlocking Life's Treasure Chest: Wisdom keys to keep you inspired, encouraged, motivated and focused

quote: Just remaining quietly in the presence of God, listening to Him, being attentive to Him, requires a lot of courage and know-how.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: I no longer belong to your ways. My religion is love. Every heart is my church.
author: David Paul Kirkpatrick

quote: What if someone picks on me?" I askedThen I'll pick on them".What if someone picks my nose?" I asked.The I'll pick your nose, too" Rowdy said.
author: Sherman Alexie, The Absolutely True Diary of a Part-Time Indian

quote: As you awaken to the new day, put your hands to your heart, breath in and say: I am loved. I am love. I love, I love, I love.
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: I don't hate you.. I just don't like that you exist
author: Gena Showalter, Seduce the Darkness

quote: It is possible for God to live in a man and for the man to still be useless.
author: Sunday Adelaja, Create Your Own Net Worth

quote: I have a vivid picture of what I want.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: A mother's happiness is like a beacon, lighting up the future but reflected also on the past in the guise of fond memories.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Maybe this was how you stayed sane in wartime: a handful of noble deeds amid the chaos.
author: Scott Westerfeld, Leviathan

quote: You can't control anything in this world except your perception and emotion.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Enzo inherited a throne. Giulietta relied on her royal blood. Queen Maeve rules Beldain because she was born to it. But true rulers are not born. We are made.
author: Marie Lu, The Rose Society

quote: Maybe the difference between first marriage and second marriage is that the second time at least you know you are gambling.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage

quote: Your life may not have gone the way you planned it, but it will go the way it's supposed to.
author: Jeanette Coron

quote: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Fools act on imagination without knowledge  pedants act on knowledge without imagination.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: True emptiness is not empty, but contains all things. The mysterious and pregnant void creates and reflects all possibilities. From it arises our individuality, which can be discovered and developed, although never possessed or fixed.
author: Jack Kornfield, A Path with Heart: A Guide Through the Perils and Promises of Spiritual Life

quote: Man is a marble piece; unlike Michelangelo's masterpieces, man is unconsciously carved and imperfectly shaped by the nature!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: You drift through life and let things happen to you, or go by design and say, 'This is what I'm intended to do.'
author: Rick Warren

quote: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.
author: Walt Disney

quote: But O, how bitter a thing it is to look into happiness through another man's eyes.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Everyone deserv a chance maybe 2 or 3, but always this guy wants something and before he didn't made it don't mean that now again won't reach a conclusion.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Class is more than money. Class is also about knowledge.
author: bell hooks

quote: Being naturally happy is the most impressive sign of freedom.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: It's true though: time moves in its own special way in the middle of the night," the bartender says, loudly striking a book match and lighting a cigarette. "You can't fight it.
author: Haruki Murakami, After Dark

quote: God answers sharp and sudden on some prayers  And thrusts the thing we have prayed for in our face. A gauntlet with a gift in't.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Respect is reverence out of love, Fear is reverence out of hate.Choose Wisely
author: Abhysheq Shukla, The Reflection "Success or Stress"Choose Wisely

quote: What did I know of loving anything, beyond a longing, beyond being biased in one woman's direction.
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quote: Politics is the gizzard of society  full of gut and gravel.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Our most tragic error may have been our inability to establish a rapport and a confidence with the press and television with the communication media. I don't think the press has understood me.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Hang there like a fruit, my soul, Till the tree die!-Posthumus LeonatusAct V, Scene V
author: William Shakespeare, Cymbeline

quote: The girl dreams she is dangerously ill. Suddenly birds come out of her skin and cover her completely ... Swarms of gnats obscure the sun, the moon, and all the stars except one. That one start falls upon the dreamer.
author: C.G. Jung, Man and His Symbols

quote: A writer gets to live yet another life every time she creates a new story.
author: Pawan Mishra

quote: Which college?''Hmm?''Which college do you go to?'Fletcher nodded. 'Yes.''I'm sorry?''Oh,' Fletcher said, and laughed.Valkyrie's parents looked at Fletcher in near bewilderment. Fletcher looked back at them in total bewilderment. Valkyrie shook her head.
author: Derek Landy, Mortal Coil

quote: Because words have deep meaning, Tweets have power.
author: Germany Kent

quote: I believe in the immortality of the soul because I have within me immortal longings.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Integrity is the essence of everything successful.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: The dance between darkness and light will always remain— the stars and the moon will always need the darkness to be seen, the darkness will just not be worth having without the moon and the stars.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: I ate all of my husbands. First I ate their love, then their will, then their despair, and then I made pies of their bodies - and those bodies were so dear to me!
author: Catherynne M. Valente, Deathless

quote: Ignorance of one’s life mission leads to one’s life being used improperly
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Your shield must surpass your weaponry.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Future will always remember the heroes, its because of them there exist a future.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Thinking is simply an orderly process of asking yourself questions.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: For the first time, Ender had found a living mind he could admire.
author: Orson Scott Card, Ender's Game

quote: Indulge your passion for science…but let your science be human, and such as may have a direct reference to action and society. Be a philosopher; but amidst all your philosophy, be still a man.
author: David Hume, An Enquiry Concerning Human Understanding

quote: True dreams are those which keep you awake at night and drive you nuts during the day.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: He would write and write. He would make wonderful things happen. Some of it would be true. All of it would be true. Most of it would be true.
author: Kate DiCamillo, Flora and Ulysses: The Illuminated Adventures

quote: The world is so full of a number of things  I'm sure we should all be as happy as kings.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Your connection to yourself is also your connection to the divine. The more you are connected to yourself, the more you are connected to the divine. They are one and the same.
author: Renae A. Sauter, An Empowered Life: Mind/Body/Spirit Empowerment

quote: The physical concerns and misalignment we experience in the spinal vertebrae of our body are often directly correlated with the spiritual energetic ability to flow freely as well.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon, Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: But thing in the past are like plate that’s shattered to pieces. You can never put it back together like it was, right?
author: Haruki Murakami, Kafka on the Shore

quote: Your attitude towards life will define your altitude of success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A strong man doesn't have to be dominant toward a woman. He doesn't match his strength against a woman weak with love for him. He matches it against the world.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: You cannot win a war outside until you have won the war that you are fighting inside you first.
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: Leaders rule hearts, not people.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Whether we fear the existence of boundaries with others or crave more of them, there’s no denying that individuation and separation are inevitable parts of loving relationships that become the site of tension.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: It may seem that you are on the path alone, but the light that guides you is coming from somewhere. Trust your every step because none of us walk this journey alone.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: It can only take a moment to waste the rest of your life.
author: Chuck Palahniuk, Snuff

quote: The world encyclopedia, the universal library, exists, and it is the world itself.
author: Alberto Manguel, The Library at Night

quote: If we read the scriptures, we shall escape the evils of sin.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Wisdom makes it even more likely that you will be exposed to the danger of fornication.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: An effective life is a selfless one
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: In the calculus of feelings, you never really know how one person's absence will affect you more than another's.
author: Gayle Forman, Where She Went

quote: You will never know what could have been done until you start doing what needs to be done.
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: I thought of writing a summary about you, but when I finished it was a book.
author: Amit Kalantri, I Love You Too

quote: Man never rises to great truths without enthusiasm.
author: Vauvenargues

quote: Racism in impenetrable. Staying in America means always fighting. For our own sanity and safety, we must go.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: I find something incredibly sexy about a man who pursues love with care, it's like he knows the feeling of heartbreak; so he's gentle with whom he gives his heart too.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Giving up on your dreams and still living the life is called a living hell.
author: Seema Brain Openers

quote: With my pen I have engraved warrants of citizenship in the most remote corners, for truly the world has been my home.
author: James A. Michener, World Is My Home

quote: Men use thought only as authority for their injustice, and employ speech only to conceal their thoughts.
author: Voltaire

quote: He was the owner of the moonlight on the ground, he fell in love with the most beautiful of the trees, he made wreaths of leaves and strung them around his neck.
author: Tove Jansson, Tales from Moominvalley

quote: You know what awareness is only when you are aware. Awareness is the perception of your presence in the now.
author: Ilchi Lee, Change: Realizing Your Greatest Potential

quote: They have been at a great feast of languages, and stolen the scraps.
author: William Shakespeare, Love's Labour's Lost

quote: Tolerance is love sick with the sickness of haughtiness.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: A kiss is a moment of quantum leaps, a moment of shared joy, and a moment of bliss.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We experience happiness on a sensory level that is relatively short-lived. But lasting happiness is related to our state of mind.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: If we have reverence for God, we will have respect for one another.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When instinct speaks, listen to it. It might be the next push you need to reach greater heights.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

quote: Some people will never learn anything, for this reason, because they understand everything too soon.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: When you live for the purpose of making a difference for the people, for society, for the things that are beyond you, then significance will not be able to elude you.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: The lust for comfort kills the passions of the soul.
author: Kahlil Gibran, The Prophet

quote: The eyes and the sex understand and know every language without any distinction.
author: Ehsan Sehgal

quote: Go where your best prayers take you.
author: Frederick Buechner

quote: Life is not a battle to win but a melody to sing.
author: Amit Ray, Enlightenment Step by Step

quote: One thing I've found... the road rarely rises up to meet you until you've begun walking.
author: Michele Jennae

quote: Her scar tissue, which she seems to amass both physically and mentally, may not be pretty, but they have become tougher than if she had never been wounded at all.
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: The thing is, that world doesn't exist. All growing up means is that your realize no one will come along to fix things. No one will come along to save you.
author: Elizabeth Scott, Love You Hate You Miss You

quote: You like every one; that is to say, you are indifferent to every one.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: He wasn't sure he liked everything that was happening, but a lot of it was "cultural," apparently, and you couldn't object to that, so he didn't. "Cultural" sort of solved problems by explaining that they weren't really there.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: The Truth is there is only one wise God, the Divine Being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: One of the great disadvantages of hurry is that it takes such a long time.
author: G.K. Chesterton, All Things Considered

quote: Creativity - like human life itself - begins in darkness
author: Julia Cameron, The Artist's Way

quote: I discovered Deborah Ellis's books in the school library after my head teacher encouraged me to go beyond the school curriculum and look for books I might enjoy.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Please God, please suh, don't let him love nobody else but me. Maybe Ah'm is uh fool, Lawd, lak dey say, but Lawd, Ah been so lonesome, and Ah been waitin', Jesus. Ah done waited uh long time.
author: Zora Neale Hurston, Their Eyes Were Watching God

quote: In God have I put my trust: I will not be afraid what man can do unto me.
author: Bible

quote: Despite my height, ignorance, heartbreaks, insecurity, criticism, competition, my skin color, that voice in my head that says 'No way', bad luck, a tight budget, insults, fear, flaws, failure and opposition. I believe in myself.
author: Manasa Rao

quote: Poetry is a rich, full-bodied whistle, cracked ice crunching in pails, the night that numbs the leaf, the duel of two nightingales, the sweet pea that has run wild, Creation's tears in shoulder blades.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: It is not only a matter of not caring who knows - it is also a matter of knowing who cares.
author: Idries Shah, Reflections

quote: My imagination is as rich as my bank account is empty.
author: Dean Koontz, Brother Odd

quote: People need to know that they have all the tools within themselves. Self-awareness, which means awareness of their body, awareness of their mental space, awareness of their relationships - not only with each other, but with life and the ecosystem.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Make correct conclusions from the negative solutions you have experienced
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: For centuries mankind has been on an incredible journey, taking him across every generation and through every conceivable experience in his search for God.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: What you had yesterday is only memories; what you will have tomorrow is your dreams and what you will do today, let it be love.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Levi was smiling. He kicked her chair again.
author: Rainbow Rowell, Fangirl

quote: Do not seek for the best partner, but seek for the person who makes you a better version of yourself.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Wise Mating: A Treatise on Monogamy

quote: To amaze yourself, lift your spirit and see through your love the beauties of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In order to stay happy, You must learn from your wins and fails and accept all things that come your way as they are.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: The truth is, forgiving is a rather simple concept to grasp. It is often imagined that when you forgive, you have to reconcile with someone and yet this is a larger team in which forgiveness is just a player.
author: Stephen Richards, The Pain You Feel Today Is The Strength You Feel Tomorrow

quote: The man who has many answersis often foundin the theaters of informationwhere he offers, graciously,his deep findings.While the man who has only questions,to comfort himself, makes music.
author: Mary Oliver, A Thousand Mornings

quote: The strong belief can make things out of imagination.But that can also make facts as if they were fairy tales.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Always act like you are the king of your own world that you created on the day of your birth. Enjoy your kingdom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It gets kind of zen after awhile, life is a journey, time is a river, the door is ajar.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: If you try to win, you bind (create) enmity, and if you acknowledge defeat, you will be freed from enmity.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Sometimes she worried that she was too happy. . . And her joy would become a restless thing, flapping its wings inside her, as though looking for an opening to fly away.
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie, Americanah

quote: There is no greater sorrow than having to live with an untold experience
author: Ane Krstevska

quote: From a purely positivist point of view, man is the most mysterious and disconcerting of all the objects met with by science.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: I think it was Lessing who once said, 'There are things which must cause you to lose your reason or you have none to lose'. An abnormal reaction to an abnormal situation is normal behaviour".
author: Viktor E. Frankl, Man's Search for Meaning

quote: A mother has the best of all smiles; she is a wonderful friend, lover and adviser.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: It's delightful when your imaginations come true, isn't it?
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of Green Gables

quote: If you see only your coreligionists as your brothers, you aren’t only a good man but also you are very low in morality! Your brothers are the whole humanity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When you're a black woman, her mother said, ain't no hiding what you are. Day you try, is the day you die. Stand tall, smile bright, and let 'em wonder what secret's making you laugh.
author: Dan Brown, Angels & Demons

quote: The best thing about a heartbreak, you start looking for happiness elsewhere. You realize like wild flowers, happiness can grow anywhere and everywhere. And, most importantly within you.Be wild, dear heart, happiness awaits you.
author: Saru Singhal

quote: I've never understood the phrase they have chemistry before now. After all, everything is chemistry. Everything is combination and reaction. The atoms in by body align themselves with the atoms in his.
author: Nicola Yoon, The Sun Is Also a Star

quote: Loving another person is a wonderful thing, and if that love is sincere, no one ends up tossed into a labyrinth. You have to have more faith in yourself.
author: Haruki Murakami, Norwegian Wood

quote: And speaking of this wonderful machine:[840] I’m puzzled by the difference b
author: Vladimir Nabokov, Pale Fire

quote: Our goal is to reflect the Kingdom of God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Love binds all souls in sacred harmony.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A fairy-tale life exists only in fairy tales.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: Life…was much like a song. In the beginning there is mystery, in the end there is confirmation, but it’s in the middle where all the emotion resides to make the whole thing worthwhile.
author: Nicholas Sparks, The Last Song

quote: When life gives you pain, give life your unconditional love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Isn't it amazing that we are all made in God's image, and yet there is so much diversity among his people?
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Courage is what preserves our liberty, safety, life, and our homes and parents, our country and children. Courage comprises all things.
author: Plautus

quote: If we knew all the answers, we won’t ask questions.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Thinking differently is the key to improvement.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: God can take you where you want to go. Trust in God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Future strong strives for simplicity for all:Least amount of individual effort, energy and time to create maximum impact by each person.
author: Bill Jensen, Future Strong

quote: When we understand the mechanism of life then we can cooperate with it and live an abundant life.
author: Thomas Vazhakunnathu, God Does Not Play Dice

quote: Money may not be able to buy her love but it will definitely make her pay attention.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: We always learn more from those whom we hate than those whom we love.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: I am not scared of you, I am scare of these feelings.
author: Judy Blume, Summer Sisters

quote: But beauty is about finding the right fit, the most natural fit, To be perfect, you have to feel perfect about yourself --- avoid trying to be something you're not. For a goddess, that's especially hard. We can change so easily.-Aphrodite
author: Rick Riordan, The Lost Hero

quote: Trust yourself first then everybody will follow.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Only a book is enough to change the course of your life.
author: Aman Jassal

quote: In literature, you either create a classical or create a foam! There is no in between!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: In case you never get a second chance: don't be afraid!" "And what if you do get a second chance?" "You take it!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The very essence of literature is the war between emotion and intellect, between life and death. When literature becomes too intellectual - when it begins to ignore the passions, the emotions - it becomes sterile, silly, and actually without substance.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: Even the most sensitive person can get used to even the most insensitive things.
author: Rick Yancey

quote: Ignorance to Awareness is the true journey of Life, called ‘Life’.
author: Harrish Sairaman

quote: Life is a practice. When you 'fail,' you can immediately begin practicing again.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Human life and human labour were near. I must struggle on: strive to live and bend to toil like the rest.
author: Charlotte Brontë, Jane Eyre

quote: Art is good, but happiness is better.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: How Forgiveness Helps Us Forgiveness is the answer to the child's dream of a miracle by which what is broken is made whole again  what is soiled is again made clean.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: If I owe Smith ten dollars and God forgives me, that doesn't pay Smith.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Spending time with God is the key to our strength and success in all areas of life. Be sure that you never try to work God into your schedule, but always work your schedule around Him.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: I will break your heart over a fucking library card.
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: Space is big. You just won't believe how vastly, hugely, mind-bogglingly big it is. I mean, you may think it's a long way down the road to the chemist's, but that's just peanuts to space.
author: Douglas Adams, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quote: Those who love their lives too much eventually lose it. While those who are ready to sacrifice their lives for others gain it.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God doesn't hand you an easy life because you will grow in it. He hands you a dream with hurdles, obstacles, setbacks, battles and challenges because he knows the real you is at the finishing line.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: O what will she do, a soul bitten into with wrong?
author: Euripides, Medea

quote: Your pretense does not fool me, gnome. My eye will be upon you.
author: Cassandra Clare, Lord of Shadows

quote: You have the itch for writing born in you. It's quite incurable. What are you going to do with it?
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: Some peopleAre worthy of a bullet straightto the heart because that is wherecruelty evolves into evil.Somehumans aren't human at all,despite how they appear.Humanity is what lives insidepeople,harbored beneath skin, flesh,and bone.
author: Ellen Hopkins, Smoke

quote: Perfect Valor is to do, without a witness, all that we could do before the whole world.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There is no feature as attractive as a well exercised intellect.
author: Lois Greiman, Unscrewed

quote: You're such a bastard," she sighed.	He chuckled. "Are you really insulting the man who just gave you an orgasm?
author: Elle Kennedy, Midnight Action

quote: Every man of action has a strong dose of egotism  pride  hardness and cunning. But all those things will be forgiven him  indeed  they will be regarded as high qualities  if he can make them the means to achieve great ends.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Marriage is a fine institution, but I'm not ready for an institution.
author: Mae West, The 2,548 Best Things Anybody Ever Said

quote: Keep your calmness at all times.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The energy everything is made of is conscious. It's alive.
author: Chris Prentiss, Be Who You Want, Have What You Want: Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life

quote: The creation of a thousand forests is in one acorn.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: But, in making the sacrifices that the Government asks us to make, we are not protecting our freedom. We are giving away our freedom in exchange for a false sense of security.
author: Kenneth Eade, A Patriot's Act

quote: Forgiveness leads to healing of wounds and restoration of health.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: And, as always happens, and happens far too soon, the strange and wonderful becomes a memory and a memory becomes a dream. Tomorrow it's gone.
author: Terry Pratchett, Wintersmith

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear - not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Every existing thing is born without reason, prolongs itself out of weakness and dies by chance.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Finding the real joy of Christmas comes not in the hurrying and the scurrying to get more done, nor is it found in the purchasing of gifts. We find real joy when we make the Savior the focus of the season.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Take a walk with me through nature and let’s gaze on the marvelous wonders of creation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: She walks in beauty  Like the night of cloudless climes and starry skies  And all that's best of dark and bright Meet in her aspect and her eyes.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Dance as if you got lost in the mystery and beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I felt knowledge and the unity of the world circulate in me like my own blood.
author: Hermann Hesse, Siddhartha

quote: History is no more fixed and dead than the future. The past is no further away than the last breath you took.
author: Robin Hobb

quote: If this is a dream, may we never wake up!
author: Ahmed Mostafa

quote: Truly worthy are those who become brighter as the days get cloudier so that their light shines through, regardless of how hard the clouds are working to block their radiance.
author: Pooja Ruprell

quote: Infant mortality and life expectancy are reasonable indicators of general well-being in a society.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: You embody the strength of 10,000 moons and your life will be a testament of it. Ase
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: So here is one tip, be careful how you say the words... sometimes people get it wrong once wrong it goes like rummor.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: The vision is always for the appointed time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We don't fall in love with someone. We discover love in someone!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: I inhale loneliness like it is the sweet smell of virgin earth conquered by fiery rain drops. Within me, I'm a thousand others.
author: Faraaz Kazi, Truly, Madly, Deeply

quote: The ripe apple falls, it doesn't know what else to do.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Nobody holds a good opinion of a man who has a low opinion of himself.
author: Anthony Trollope

quote: Heavenly Father, I live my life for your glory.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Live your life without any fear.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: With no doubt Al Hussain was one of the greatest rebels, for correcting the path of rulers who deviated from the right path. He, by his stance honorably acquired martyrdom martyrdom that free people wish to acquire.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Each day should be founded on a purpose and work in harmony with the core reason for your life.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Words without warmth are dead words.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: There's no way that moving in with your parents is a sign that your life is on track.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Man is to be understood only in his relation to God.
author: C.S. Lewis, The Problem of Pain

quote: Every solider believes in war till the time he actually fights it.
author: Pushpa Rana, Just the Way I Feel

quote: Dream no small dreams. They have no power to stir the hearts of men.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: It seems supernatural, but only because it is not understood.
author: John Muir, My First Summer in the Sierra

quote: A celibate clergy is an especially good idea, because it tends to suppress any hereditary propensity toward fanaticism.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: ...they want us to pretend that we see the world as they pretend they see it. They need some sort of sanction from us.
author: Ayn Rand, Atlas Shrugged

quote: I can't understand God and I can't understand myself, so there's no chance in hell that I'm going to understand you!
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: The thought of hurting him ripped me apart. Ripped me so totally, that I knew, I cared more for him than I did myself.
author: Samantha Young, On Dublin Street

quote: A businessman who stops advertising to save money is like a foolish who stops a clock to save time.
author: Moosa Rahat

quote: If you have to ask yourself if it's love, it's not.
author: Kate McGahan

quote: You don't know me. You know one me, just like I know one you. And you can't know every me, and I can't know every you.
author: David Levithan, Every You, Every Me

quote: Love is the miraculous power of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I'm killing time while I wait for life to shower me with meaning and happiness.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: It takes patience to make a man - the patience to listen, watch and wait.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: There is a correlation between the physical and spiritual worlds but only attachment to the physical world causes emotional suffering.
author: Daniel Marques, The 88 Secret Codes of the Power Elite: The Complete Truth about Making Money with the Law of Attraction and Creating Miracles in Life that is Being Hidden from You with Mind Programming

quote: Decode the message of failure and enjoy the fortune thereof.
author: Ogwo David Emenike, The Fortune in Failing: Decoding the Message of Failure

quote: On no account must you return back to the world
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Since the human body tends to move in the direction of its expectations-plus or minus-it is important to know that attitudes of confidence and determination are no less a part of the treatment program than medical science and technology.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: If you want to be popular and famous, you can do it; it's dead easy if you have that ego desire. But most of my ego desires as far as being famous and successful were fulfilled a long time ago.
author: George Harrison
category: time, you can do it, ego

quote: Without culture, and the relative freedom it implies, society, even when perfect, is but a jungle. This is why any authentic creation is a gift to the future.
author: Albert Camus, The Myth of Sisyphus and Other Essays

quote: Grace is the fullness of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Walk the path your heart beats faster on.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: In any moment of time, you have three paths to choose from. You stand for something, you stand against something, or you drop both, and walk with your inner truth.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: Each memory was now the shadow of a shadow of a shadow. The only thing that remained tangible to him was the sense of absence.
author: Haruki Murakami, Tony Takitani

quote: The life is possible without the past. You can always have a fresh start with life, at any point. Each moment millions of children’s are born to have a fresh start with life.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: He helped the Librarian up. There was a red glow in the ape's eyes. It had tried to steal his books. This was probably the best proof any wizard could require that the trolleys were brainless.
author: Terry Pratchett, Reaper Man

quote: A children's story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children's story in the slightest.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: I do love that tune - but really, I must go home. I only meant to stay for a few minutes.
author: C.S. Lewis, The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe

quote: Anybody amuses me for once. A new acquaintance is like a new book. I prefer it  even if bad  to a classic.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: We dress ourselves up in lies,So that the nakedness of truth doesn't come out.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: What is yours is yours
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Don't find fault, find a remedy; anybody can complain
author: Henry Ford

quote: There will come a time when everybody will know why, for what purpose, there is all this suffering, and there will be no more mysteries. But now we must live ... we must work, just work!
author: Anton Chekhov, The Three Sisters

quote: [I]f the writer does his job right, what he basically does is remind the reader of how smart the reader is.
author: David Foster Wallace

quote: I have not loved the world  nor the world me  I have not flatter'd its rank breath  nor bow'd To its idolatries a patient knee.
author: Lord Byron

quote: To possess time is to possess life, don’t trivialize time.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: The smile of God is victory.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: The central theme of the universe is the purpose and destiny of every individual. Every person is important in God’s eyes.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Beauty, love with truth, that is all there is.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Ladies, how do you expect a man to love you, if he hasn't first learnt how to love himself?
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: It is not that I am very intelligent, but I try to understand with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: He (God) reveals himself to the pure heart.
author: Swami Vivekananda, Complete Works of Swami Vivekananda, 9 Vols.

quote: To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
author: John Dewey

quote: Accepting that life is insane, that bad things happen to good people and that you can find the courage to be grateful for the good in every situation and still move forward is hard (even terrifying), but heroic.
author: Richie Norton

quote: Let us leave pretty women to men without imagination.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: There are times when the world is rearranging itself that the right person can change the world.
author: Lolly Daskal, The Leadership Gap: What Gets Between You and Your Greatness

quote: A good man lives for the joy in life and the happiness of being alive, not shackled to the wants of the future or the regrets of the past.
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift

quote: Life isn't about just having dreams, it's all about transforming them into reality.
author: M.H. Rakib, The Cavalier

quote: Life will fulfill your expectations.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The importance of money flows from it being a link between the present and the future.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: It is almost always better to listen and understand than express opinions to annoy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: My work has been always presented to me in front of others by creating a unique individual.
author: Tanmaya Guru

quote: There is no ‘my’ in ‘I’. ‘My’ is outside of the ‘I’.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: I got mixed up with some oddness in my youth, and the long and short of it is that I can't shuffle off this mortal coil until I have read the ten most boring classics.
author: Jasper Fforde, Lost in a Good Book

quote: Always attack. Even in defense, attack. The attacking arm possesses theinitiative and thus commands the action. To attack makes men brave; to defendmakes them timorous.
author: Steven Pressfield, The Virtues of War: A Novel of Alexander the Great

quote: We learn from every experience to be wise.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Without the fear of God it is impossible to say ‘No’ to temptations and evil.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Her power was a wrenching thing, starless black and sorrow, but my magic was something more...it was hope.
author: Roshani Chokshi, The Star-Touched Queen

quote: You put your time where your priority is.
author: Sebastian Faulks, Engleby

quote: Leading a missional church is not for the faint of heart. It takes courage to push yourself beyond your comfort zone and to lead the church beyond it personal limits.
author: Gary Rohrmayer, Next Steps For Leading a Missional Church

quote: Be good to yourself. You deserve goodness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: With wisdom in your mind,you can perform great deeds.With faith in your heart,you can perform extraordinary deeds.With love in your soul,you can perform remarkable deeds.With God in your life,you can perform supernatural deeds.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: No two stories are the same. They may seem the same at first glance, but, once you take a closer look, give the story some of your time, you realise its unique qualities.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Pessimism

quote: No threatening the cat!" Mr. Snuggly said.
author: Charlaine Harris, Midnight Crossroad

quote: The journey isn't the vista at the end, it's the ever changing view along the way.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: To rule a country of a thousand chariots, there must be reverent attention to business, and sincerity; economy in expenditure, and love for men; and the employment of the people at the proper seasons.
author: Confucius

quote: I don't know anymore, whether it's a curse or a blessing to see the beauty in the ugly. Growing up simply and getting old complexly. I now see reason behind sin, and love behind pain.
author: Hubert Martin

quote: [On marriage and permanent attach
author: Dorothy L. Sayers, The Letters of Dorothy L. Sayers. Vol. 1, 1899-1936: The Making of a Detective Novelist

quote: Until he extends the circle of his compassion to all living things, man will not himself find peace.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Cease ye from man  whose breath is in his nostrils.
author: Bible

quote: Books are those faithful mirrors that reflect to our mind the minds of sages and heroes.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: The best tourist is one without a camera
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: You ought to be curious and daring.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I like marriage. The idea.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: Nothing is so firmly believed as that which we least know.
author: Michel de Montaigne, The Complete Essays

quote: It was God’s love which knew that men were incapable of obeying His law, and it was His love which promised a Redeemer, a Savior, who would save His people from their sins.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: There is no problem you can't take absolute advantage of.
author: Ehab Atalla, The Secrets of Business

quote: Red flags are moments of hesitation that determine our destination.
author: Mandy Hale, The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: If you 'don't do politics', trust me - politics will do you.
author: Christina Engela

quote: Never stop dreaming, but please stop sleeping!
author: Alin Sav

quote: Though you should still let her do what she wants, don't let her take total control of you or you won't be making the most of your experience.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: You may not have finished today but the work you did got you closer than if you would have done nothing.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Pessimism

quote: Problems and problems... and problems and the whole truth was told.(Holiday Engagement 2011 - Movie)
author: Deyth Banger, Deep Legend

quote: Nature awakens each day in brilliant autumn colors, making me wish the pale winter would bid adieu.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: I think women are foolish to pretend they are equal to men they are far superior and always have been.
author: William Golding

quote: It had filled my time - given me quiet, steadfast company with those characters, who did not exist and never would, but somehow made me feel less ... alone.
author: Sarah J. Maas, A Court of Mist and Fury

quote: Renewal of mind leads to revival of spirit and revitality of soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You and I have a connection that nothing, not on heaven or earth, or even hell, could ever break. If you want to talk to me, talk to me. I’ll hear you…
author: Cynthia Hand

quote: Overconfidence blurs out the risk. Inferiority magnifies it.
author: Toba Beta, Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza

quote: Dare to love every person, including yourself.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Turbulence does not shake a tree with strong roots.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Majority of women like to fantasize and men like to romanticize. I saw a painful mountain in her eyes.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Come see the cherry trees of a water constellationand the round key of the rapid universe,come touch the fire of instantaneous blue,come before its petals are consumed.
author: Pablo Neruda, 100 Love Sonnets

quote: A hero is born among a hundred, a wise man is found among a thousand, but an accomplished one might not be found even among a hundred thousand men.
author: Plato

quote: Your own brain ought to have the decency to be on your side!
author: Terry Pratchett, Wintersmith

quote: Do not become a slave to sin.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Serving humanity is not beneath spiritual pursuit
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Though I love your company, your instructions are wasted her. I will always choose the woman who caries me off, I will always sit with the family of loneliness.
author: Leonard Cohen, Book of Mercy

quote: What you conquer in your soul you conquer in your world.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: In this age, lies were the universal lubricant of the culture. A love of Truth and commitment to it were seldom rewarded and were often punished.
author: Dean Koontz, Breathless

quote: The world is a bell curve. Classroom test scores, employee performance in a company or how many people really, really like you. No matter the population you're studying, they always fit neatly across the standard deviations of the famous bell curve.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: You have to see every unit of currency that passes through your hands as a seed to your financial future.
author: Stephen Richards, Six Figure Success: Time To Think Big - You Can Do It

quote: Every soul is beautiful and precious; is worthy of dignity and respect, and deserving of peace, joy and love.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: Statisticians tell us that people underestimate the sheer number of coincidences that are bound to happen in a world governed by chance.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: Don't underestimate the power of friendship. Those bonds are tight stitches that close up the holes you might otherwise fall through.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: Don't give in to your fears. If you do, you won't be able to talk to your heart.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: No change, no pause, no hope! Yet I endure.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley, Prometheus Unbound

quote: Living is not the sole purpose of life—loving is.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Employment frees man from the nightmare of unemployment, while it chains him to his employer’s dream.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: In a time of drastic change it is the learners who inherit the future. The learned usually find themselves equipped to live in a world that no longer exists.
author: Eric Hoffer, Reflections on the Human Condition

quote: In any case the friendships of later life, in contrast wih those negotiated before thirty, are apt to be burdened with reservations, constraints, inhibitions.
author: Anthony Powell, A Dance to the Music of Time: 4th Movement

quote: Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward towards success.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The degree of slowness is directionally proportional to the intensity of memory. The degree of speed is directionally proportional to the intensity of forgetting.
author: Milan Kundera, Slowness

quote: Life is what it is...And even without having everything you desire...It is still gloriously beautiful...
author: Virginia Alison

quote: The oldest books are still only just out to those who have not read them.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Peace is the music of every soul. Our glory lies in understanding, listening and honoring that music
author: Amit Ray, Walking the Path of Compassion

quote: As long as you're alive, there's always a chance things will get better.
author: Laini Taylor, Days of Blood & Starlight

quote: There are often two sets of goals in life: those that we establish, and those that really matter.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: This is the part where I kiss you.
author: Cynthia Hand, Hallowed

quote: A man cannot be aware of his destination without the help of his creator
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you ask God for love,He may give you someone to forgive.If you ask God for patience,He may give you someone to bear.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: People are what you make them. A scornful look turns into a complete fool a man of average intelligence. A contemptuous indifference turns into an enemy a woman who, well treated, might have been an angel.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: If he decided to pursue Sienna...Sucking in a breath Indigo promised herself she'd warn the girl if and when the time came-because no woman should have to face that campaign unprepared.
author: Nalini Singh, Play of Passion

quote: Life is not about destination, it is a journey of creation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Out of the unreal shadows of the night comes back the real life that we had known
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The language of marriage is often a language of ownership, not a language of partnership.
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quote: One of the symptoms of an approaching nervous breakdown is the belief that one's work is terribly important.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Literature is a sacred knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Who does not know another language  does not know his own.
author: Goethe

quote: all day long, one storm then another—and I take your hands like gentle flowers that blossom into awareness
author: John Geddes

quote: It was a lesson that I would learn in time though it wasn't Hegbert who taught me.
author: Nicholas Sparks, A Walk to Remember

quote: That they believe in you does not make them your disciple
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The truth is precious commodity, not everyone will possess her.
author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quote: The victory of the ignorant masses always means a temporary backward movement in the progression of humanity!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: For prayer is request. The essence of request, as distinct from compulsion, is that it may or may not be granted.
author: C.S. Lewis, Letters to Malcolm: Chiefly on Prayer

quote: Resistance to change" is our fine ability to create reasons to crib and criticize.
author: Sukant Ratnakar, Open The Windows: To the World around You

quote: When the federal government spends more each year than it collects in tax revenues, it has three choices: It can raise taxes, print money, or borrow money. While these actions may benefit politicians, all three options are bad for average Americans.
author: Ron Paul

quote: Star-crossed lovers desperate to get home together. Two hearts beating as one. Romance.
author: Suzanne Collins, The Hunger Games

quote: We colour the world,Not with the darkness of our pasts, But with the rainbow of our hope.
author: Jenim Dibie, The Calligraphy of God

quote: War on the other hand is such a terrible thing, that no man, especially a Christian man, has the right to assume the responsibility of starting it.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: When you journey inwardly exploring yourself, a sense of personal trust begins.
author: David W. Earle

quote: My life wasn’t just about one city, or one Epic, anymore. It was about a war. It was about finding a way to stop the Epics.Permanently.
author: Brandon Sanderson, Firefight

quote: Don't expect life to serve you what you expect. Just enjoy the buffet.
author: Manoj Vaz

quote: All the truth of God are discoverable through every day life.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Jesus our Teacher and Guide loves truth and hates iniquity
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I simply believe that some part of the human Self or Soul is not subject to the laws of space and time.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: God’s call upon your life is not an accident
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Don't tell me it's going to fucking be okay! I am not okay with being that fucker's pinata!
author: Nenia Campbell, Terrorscape

quote: Suffering is never wasted. Most often those who suffer the most will learn the most.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you master the basics, and execute them well, there’s no need to worry about the score.
author: Frank Sonnenberg, Follow Your Conscience: Make a Difference in Your Life & in the Lives of Others

quote: Be kind whenever, you can.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There should be a healthy ‘stubbornness’, assertiveness and confidence that comes from knowledge of your clear vision, mission, values and personal brand.
author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

quote: ... people made the imaginary real all the time: taking the music they heard in their head and recording it, seeing a house in their imagination and building it. Fantasy was always only a reality waiting to be switched on.
author: Joe Hill, NOS4A2

quote: People go their whole lives wanting to be admired for their hidden qualities.
author: Hanif Kureishi, The Nothing

quote: What is more powerful than the love of a mother? Perhaps only God's hand in answering her earnest pleadings on your behalf.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: He who is deaf to wisdom is blind to good.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The joy of comradeship in this foreign land has been killed by silence and overprotection of personal space. I miss the chaos around me for it makes me realise that I am amidst life and alive.
author: Gloria D. Gonsalves, The Wisdom Huntress: Anthology of Thoughts and Narrations

quote: I may never fly—in the bird sort of way. But I do have wings.
author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn

quote: Loving someone as fiercely as my mom loves me must be like wearing your heart outside of your body with no skin, no bones, no nothing to protect it.
author: Nicola Yoon, Everything, Everything

quote: I guess I was sad that love was not real? Or not all that real, anyway? I guess I was sad that love could feel so real and the next minute be gone, and all because of something Abnesti was doing.
author: George Saunders

quote: Stop thinking that nobody is “good enough”.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: To explain all nature is too difficult a task for any one man or even for any one age. 'Tis much better to do a little with certainty & leave the rest for others that come after you.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: I’d like to be the moon in your sky.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I am here to tell youWe are all of us just as mighty as planets—and you too,We'll let you in, we've got stalwart to spare—But you might have to sleep on the floor.
author: Catherynne M. Valente, The Bread We Eat in Dreams

quote: If we seek the knowledge God, all other knowledge will be given to us.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you don't scare the neighbors while copulating, I'm afraid you're doing something terribly wrong.
author: Lois Greiman, Unmanned

quote: True confidence is not about what you take from someone to restore yourself, but what you give back to your critics because they need it more than you do.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Your purpose will be clear only when you listen to your heart.
author: Lolly Daskal, Thoughts Spoken From The Heart

quote: Conflicts stay in your mind with your permission.You allow them to.
author: Hina Hashmi, Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: Philosophy can make people sick.
author: Aristotle, Nicomachean Ethics

quote: No dirt can touch me, like an ocean, everything that comes to me becomes clean.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Constant prayer is the bridge that leads to life
author: Karen  Gibbs

quote: John Dalton's records, carefully preserved for a century, were destroyed during the World War II bombing of Manchester. It is not only the living who are killed in war.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Kids are important. The most important thing.
author: Allan Dare Pearce, Hitler Burns Detroit

quote: Description begins in the writer’s imagination, but should finish in the reader’s.
author: Stephen King, On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quote: Most people under the influence of the wrong and common belief which says that the sense of man’s life is to grow a tree, build a house and bring up a son
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Great relationships do not depend on who you find, they depend on who you are.
author: Jeffrey Fry

quote: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Painful as it may be, a significant emotional event can be the catalyst for choosing a direction that serves us - and those around us - more effectively. Look for the learning.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Let my notes, like the most sensitive seismograph, record the curve of even the most insignificant vibrations of my brain: for it is precisely such vibrations that are sometimes the forewarning of...
author: Yevgeny Zamyatin, We

quote: Success = Dream x Plan x WorkConscious dreams are essential components of your success. When you are backed up by a convincing dream, meticulous planning, and 100% execution, you are bound to be victorius.
author: Vishwas Chavan, Vishwasutras: Universal Principles for Living: Inspired by Real-Life Experiences

quote: You are like a chestnut burr, prickly outside, but silky-soft within, and a sweet kernel, if one can only get at it. Love will make you show your heart some day, and then the rough burr will fall off.
author: Louisa May Alcott, Little Women

quote: Every time you try to block a thought out of your mind, you drive it deeper into your memory. By resisting it, you actually reinforce it.
author: Rick Warren, The Purpose Driven Life: What on Earth Am I Here for?

quote: Loyalty is what we seek in friendship.
author: Cicero

quote: There is no communication with God without communication with God’s people
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: As with many people, Charles, who could not talk, wrote with fullness. He set down his loneliness and his perplexities, and he put on paper many things he did not know about himself.
author: John Steinbeck, East of Eden

quote: Every woman is different in her own special way.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: Poetry is the royal essence of beauty.
author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quote: The awful part of the writing game is that you can never be sure the stuff is any good.
author: P.G. Wodehouse, P.G. Wodehouse: A Life in Letters

quote: Bless someone today, other than yourself
author: Charmaine J. Forde

quote: You cannot honor God without honoring people first
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Ignorance’ (absence of Self-Knowledge) creates vibrations (causes) and ‘Knowledge’ (Self-Knowledge) stops these vibrations.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Recognizing Nothing as one's true nature, following the guidance of our conscience - having a clear distinction between absolute and relative values, and using the Earth as the external absolute scale that matches the internal absolute truthfulness.
author: Ilchi Lee, Change: Realizing Your Greatest Potential

quote: Stop looking for a partner. Focus on your goals and rebuilding your life. The right person will eventually find their way to you.
author: Robert Tew

quote: Truth even in the most whispered tones will always roar.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Be kind to others—not because they deserve kindness—but because you deserve inner peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Live by choice, not by accident. Lead with passion and compassion. Love with all your heart and win like a champion! Yes, Winning Matters!
author: Farshad Asl

quote: You don't walk away to prove your worth. You walk away because you allowed someone else to dictate your value and you found yourself believing it.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Aim at heaven and you will get earth thrown in. Aim at earth and you get neither.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: I don’t go back and look at my early work, because the last time I did, many years ago, it left me cringing. If one publishes, then one is creating a public record of Learning to Write.
author: Lorrie Moore

quote: The life of faith is not a life of mounting up with wings, but a life of walking and not fainting.
author: Oswald Chambers, My Utmost for His Highest: Selections for the Year

quote: In art and dream may you proceed with abandon. In life may you proceed with balance and stealth.
author: Patti Smith

quote: If I am right  Thy grace impart  Still in the right to stay  If I am wrong  O teach my heart To find that better way!
author: Alexander Pope

quote: She's a gypsy girl living in a materialistic world, Unattached to most things but in love with life itself.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: SHE Is A Wonderful Romantic Poem With Billions of Lines. Even If I Could, I Wouldn't Finish Reading HER In My Entire Life....
author: Muhammad Imran Hasan

quote: Few and mean as my gifts may be, I actually am, and do not need for my own assurance or the assurance of my fellows any secondary testimony.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It is never wrong to inspire, for Jesus Christ became an inspiration to many who had been given the tag of condemnation
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Confidence is contagious. So is lack of confidence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: If the rowan's roots are shallow, it bears no crown.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Farthest Shore

quote: The severest test of character is not so much the ability to keep a secret as it is, when the secret is finally out, to refrain from disclosing that you knew it all along.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: The history of our time must be well-captured and documented.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Luxury is not a necessity to me, but beautiful and good things are.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: The irritating question they ask us -- us being writers -- is: "Where do you get your i
author: Neil Gaiman, Smoke and Mirrors: Short Fiction and Illusions

quote: The stars give light to night sky.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The only person standing between your dreams and making them a reality is YOU.
author: Vikrmn, 10 Golden Steps of Life

quote: วันหนึ่งในฤดูหนาว สมัยที่คุณเป็นนักเรียนมัธยม หิมะกำลังตก คุณกำลังครุ่นคิดอะไรบางอย่างจนลืมสิ่งอื่น คุณได้ยินเสียงพระเจ้าในตัวคุณ และคุณก็พยายามจะลืมพระองค์ให้ได้ คุณเห็นว่าโลกนี้เป็นหนึ่งเดียว แต่คุณคิดว่าถ้าสามารถหลับตาลงไม่มองภาพนี้ คุณจะเศร้าหมองได้มากกว่าและมีสติปัญญาล้ำเลิศกว่าด้วย ซึ่งคุณก็คิดถูกแล้ว มีแต่คนที่ฉลาดมากๆ หม่นหมองมากๆ เท่านั้นที่จะเขียนบทกวีได้ดี ดังนั้นคุณจึงยืดอกอย่างหาญกล้าและแบกรับความเจ็บปวดของการไร้ศรัทธา เพียงเพื่อจะได้เขียนบทกวีดีๆ แต่หารู้ไม่ว่าเมื่อคุณสูญเสียเสียงข้างในที่ว่านั้นไป สุดท้ายคุณจะลงเอยอย่างโดดเดี่ยวในจักรวาลอันว่างเปล่า
author: Orhan Pamuk, Snow

quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: If you're making mistakes it means you're out there doing something.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Dancing is the normal prelude to intercourse
author: Sylvia Plath, The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: When angels speak of love they tell us it is only by loving that we enter an earthly paradise. They tell us paradise is our home and love our true destiny.
author: bell hooks, All About Love: New Visions

quote: By the time I was sixteen I had read many books and I had become a freethinker.
author: Cormac McCarthy, All the Pretty Horses

quote: Flaubert had infinite correction to perform.
author: Roland Barthes

quote: This was beyond a joke. This had moved beyond foolishness, slipped over the line into genuine 24 karat Jesus-Christ-I-fucked-up-bigtime territory.
author: Neil Gaiman, American Gods

quote: Chase Dreams, Not People.The right people will be drawn to you.
author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Permit no one to define you by your mistakes or your past
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: Sometimes, all you want is a warm loving embrace.. and no words..
author: Himmilicious, The Knot : A Relationship beyond marriage.

quote: The end toward which all human acts are directed is happiness.
author: Aristotle

quote: The feeling of being both trapped and free at the same time is the most mind twisting feeling of all.
author: Melody  Lee, Moon Gypsy

quote: The worst way to drown is in mainstream.
author: J.R. Rim, Write like no one is reading 2

quote: There is no other space, no other time. This moment is all. In this moment the whole existence converges, in this moment all is available.
author: Osho, Zen: The Path of Paradox

quote: BLT Prime at Trump National Doral is essential after a long day on the golf course. The popover bread alone is enough to keep me coming back!
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: The things taught in schools and colleges are not an education  but the means of education.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Only pain can define the meaning of tears.
author: Munia Khan

quote: Compassion is given freely with no expectation of reward.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Compassion Revolution: 30 Days of Living from the Heart

quote: Don’t be victim of circumstances but be victorious.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The only thing that stops you from success is fear of the unknown
author: Thabiso Monkoe

quote: If you ever feel the need of my love, just open the window. My heart will always be there.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Two people that have the same wants are two people that should be friends.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: But that was just a shadow of what would come to pass:When one appointed season Christ came to die at last.And in the name of justice they flogged him like a thief,But willing was the victim of human disbelief.
author: Joyce Rachelle, Sewing Figs

quote: Those who know do not speak. Those who speak do not know.
author: Lao Tzu, Tao Teh Ching

quote: The tune was sad, as the best of Ireland was, melancholy and lovely as a lover's tears.
author: Nora Roberts, Born in Fire

quote: There is for each man a day, an hour, a minute. The Bible talks in many places about the brevity of life, and the Bible warns that we should be prepared to meet God at all times.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Small is the number of them that see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Confident people tend to evaluate their opinions alongside those of others and then follow their intuition.
author: Sam Owen, 500 Relationships And Life Quotes: Bite-Sized Advice For Busy People

quote: Routine feeds the illusion of safety...
author: Christopher Moore, Lamb: The Gospel According to Biff, Christ's Childhood Pal

quote: Love is a sacred entity.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The light of God's love makes us unique personalities
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: All Librarians are Secret Masters of Severe Magic. Goes with the territory.
author: Catherynne M. Valente, The Girl Who Soared Over Fairyland and Cut the Moon in Two

quote: She was his north star, the fixed point round which his world turned. For as long as his heart beat, or hers, he believed they would always share a destiny.
author: David Gemmell, Fall of Kings

quote: ...reality, however utopian, is something from which people feel the need of taking pretty frequent holidays....
author: Aldous Huxley, Brave New World

quote: Since we have to make choices in life, why not choose the good ones?
author: Kcat Yarza, KCAT CAN: I have a pen that writes

quote: In August of 2002, I survived a car accident. Although I can still see the van speeding toward us, I cannot bring to mind the crash itself - only its aftermath.
author: Siri Hustvedt

quote: Oh, I've no patience with these romances. They're the ruin of all order. It's a thousand pities they ever happened
author: D.H. Lawrence, Lady Chatterley's Lover

quote: The inner intent one has of ‘may everyone attain salvation’, will bring salvation to himself first.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Satan’s first appearance in the Bible included an attack on a marriage—trying to divide Adam and Eve. His tactics have not changed. He wants our marriages to flounder and fail, because he knows that few things will discourage us more.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Welcome to the human race. Nobody controls his own life, Ender. The best you can do is choose to fill the roles given you by good people, by people who love you.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: When a man really tells the truth, the first truth he tells is that he himself is a liar.
author: G.K. Chesterton, What's Wrong with the World

quote: Okay baby, let's take this rocket to Uranus. This hoor is perfect, and she can act as well.
author: Irvine Welsh

quote: Whether a religion is of peace or violence should be defined by the actions of its people, not by some books.
author: Abhijit Naskar, The Islamophobic Civilization: Voyage of Acceptance

quote: It was no joy waking up after a dream about that man. He left a taste of thunder in my mouth.
author: Chaim Potok, My Name Is Asher Lev

quote: It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.
author: Chuck Palahniuk, Fight Club

quote: Be not anxious;yesterday is your experience, today is your experiment and tomorrow is your expectation. Maximize the time!
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: I can choose either to be a victim of the world or an adventurer in search of treasure. It's all a question of how I view my life.
author: Paulo Coelho, Eleven Minutes

quote: Some things have to be believed to be seen.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: There is so much sttuborn hope in a human heart.
author: Albert Camus, The Myth of Sisyphus

quote: Each of us comes into being knowing who he is and what he is supposed to do.' ... 'Small children know,' Leto said. 'It's only after adults have confused them that children hide this knowledge even from themselves.
author: Frank Herbert, God Emperor of Dune

quote: If you knew the golden treasures of adversity, you will bravely embrace it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I might live a life of struggle but I will not live a life of defeat!
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett, Neglected But Undefeated: The Life Of A Boy Who Never Knew A Mother's Love

quote: You are a sweet ocean of love. Invite everyone to come to your shore to feel the joy of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Thunder roars but does not strike. Lightning strikes but does not roar. Choose to be lightning.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: He had become enveloped in the Indian Summer of the Soul.
author: O. Henry

quote: A badly written novel can always be shortened to a poem.
author: Gloria D. Gonsalves

quote: Self-Help books are for bitchesss
