quote: It is the heart which experiences God  not the reason.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Everybody is talking about the Law of Attraction. Nobody is talking about the Law of Action.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Every time a war ends, under a beautiful sun, on the face of a crying child; I see a rainbow of hope over the innocent teardrops.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: If you think rightly, every problem is financial problem or eventually becomes one.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: It was another country. It was a country for the young, a country where you died before you got old.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Dream Thieves

quote: Nature is too thin a screen  the glory of the omnipresent God bursts through everywhere.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Our object should be peace within, and peace without. We want to live peacefully and maintain cordial friendly relations with our immediate neighbours and with the world at large.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: They always tell you to do what you love. But they forget to add that writing doesn't pay by the hour.
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: Sociologists say a neighbourhood is perceived as gay if anywhere between 15 to 25 percent of the residents are homosexual.
author: Christopher Bram, Eminent Outlaws: The Gay Writers Who Changed America

quote: Death, a necessary end, will come when it will come
author: William Shakespeare, Julius Caesar

quote: It’s really kind of… well, beautiful, in a way. Even the monsters, once you get to know ‘em. We’re all beautiful.
author: Peter Watts, Starfish

quote: The knowledge of the Holy One is the key to all knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Agile is more a “direction,” than an “end,” a philosophy and mindset at board level.
author: Pearl Zhu, Digitizing Boardroom: The Multifaceted Aspects of Digital Ready Boards

quote: Make it the ultimate purpose of your life to be a great success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What makes the pain we feel from shame and jealousy so cutting is that vanity can give us no assistance in bearing them.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Inductive reason, which alone makes man master of his environment, is an achievement; and when once born it must be reinforced by inhibiting the growth of other modes of knowledge.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: You have to be selfish with who you are to stop wanting in your relationship with yourself.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: We can allow ourselves to pass through the darkest valley without losing our light. One candle can lit millions of other candles, which are willing to receive the light.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: He that seeks trouble always finds it.
author: English proverb

quote: I do become a recluse once in a while. It's so nice to just be at home and to not have to deal with the outside world.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: Death is not the enemy  living in constant fear of it is.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Basically there can be no categories such as 'religious' art and 'secular' art, because all true art is incarnational, and therefore 'religious.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: Die before you die and find that there is no death.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Three years later and I’m still writing about you. I don’t know if that says more about you or I.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: We are all insects. Groping towards something terrible or divine.
author: Philip K. Dick, The Man in the High Castle

quote: I am Indonesian. I don't buy fear of western ghosts.But when you deal with a giant garagasi of sumatera,there's no word worth enough to express the eeriness.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Trees are where Nature has simply begun
author: Will Advise

quote: I quite agree with Dr. Nordau's assertion that all men of genius are insane, but Dr. Nordau forgets that all sane people are idiots.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Trust unites, fear divides, mercy heals, and love conquers.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Sometimes healing comes after helping someone that is going through the same trauma you went through. Help yourself by helping others.
author: Ace Antonio Hall

quote: When neurons “talk” to each other clearly, our brain is able to make sense of our lives. We make our wisest decisions when there is nothing obstructing these lines of communication.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: Some people just love to stir the pot, but don't realize they're cooking themselves.
author: Richie Norton

quote: Your single not because you are not good enough for one, it's that you're too good for the wrong one.
author: Chris Burkmenn

quote: Our friends have a way of reminding us of how fabulous we are when the rest of the world has forgotten.
author: Mandy Hale, The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: Love, the simplest, strongest, and most unforgiving of all emotions.
author: Stephen King, Needful Things

quote: Boo: "Go talk to her."Callum: "About what?"Boo: "Anything."Callum: "You want me to walk up to her and say, 'Are you a ghost?'"Boo: "I do that."Callum: "I love it when you get it wrong.
author: Maureen Johnson, The Name of the Star

quote: education without inspiration is only a recipe for desperation
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Distinctive Footprints of Life: Where Are You Heading Towards?

quote: We aim for the higher calling of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You may wonder what you can do for humanity. Humanity desperately needs peace. Be an advocate of peace and teach others to think about peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Surround yourself with things that inspire you every day. Let go of everything that drains your inspiration.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: When we approach the journey acknowledging what we do not know and what we can’t control, we maintain our energy for the quest.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: There's just so many great stories in the past that you can know a little bit about, but you can't know it all, and that's where imagination can work.
author: Geraldine Brooks

quote: All that is important is this one moment in movement. Make the moment important, vital, and worth living. Do not let it slip away unnoticed and unused.
author: Martha Graham

quote: I dreamed that you bewitched me into bedAnd sung me moon-struck, kissed me quite insane.(I think I made you up inside my head.)
author: Sylvia Plath, The Collected Poems

quote: We keep drifting till we see light. Seldom do we realize that the light was always there!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Daily life took as much as she had. The future was sunset; the past something to leave behind. And if it didn't stay behind, well, you might have to stomp it out.
author: Toni Morrison, Beloved

quote: In 5-billion years the Sun will expand & engulf our orbit as the charred ember that was once Earth vaporizes. Have a nice day.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: The man of pleasure  by a vain attempt to be more happy than any man can be  is often more miserable than most men.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: The world actually is a mirror, and as you change, you will see everything around you changing as well as mirroring your changes.
author: Chris Prentiss, Be Who You Want, Have What You Want: Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life

quote: To conquer anxiety, love everything and fear nothing.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There are always those to whom all self-revelation is contemptible, unless it ends with a noble thanks to the gods for the Unconquerable Soul.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Crack-Up

quote: When it is time to sow, sow and when it is time to harvest, you will harvest. Obey this rule.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Become a Better You

quote: This time it is real — all must die, and where could mountaineer find a more glorious death!
author: John Muir, My First Summer in the Sierra

quote: Society can only exist on the basis that there is some amount of polished lying and that no one says exactly what he thinks.
author: Lin Yutang

quote: Life is a fairytale if we know how to write the story.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If size really mattered, a match wouldn’t be able to set a forest on fire.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: ...and that's when I get to wondering, what would happen if I told her she something good, ever day?
author: Kathryn Stockett, The Help

quote: Most of us accept that although we may believe our dreams to be real events, upon waking, we can tell the difference between nocturnal hallucinations and reality.
author: Siri Hustvedt

quote: One day I’ll paint the perfect sunset-- if I can only find the words.
author: Atticus Poetry, Love Her Wild: Poems

quote: The Word of God gives power, authority and abundant life to a man.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To be successful in life , Plan, Implement, Revise, Update, and Build on Change.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KISS Life  "Life is what you make it"

quote: Never feel powerless when you have the power of love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Attention on the breathe, is the best tool, to take of your attention from negative thoughts or negative imagination of mind.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: In the end they will lay their freedom at our feet and say to us, Make us your slaves, but feed us.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, The Grand Inquisitor

quote: He was thinking of that time, the way one does on long journeys when rootlessness and boredom, lack of sleep or routine can summon from out of nowhere random stretches of the past, make them as real as a haunting. --Solar
author: Ian McEwan, Solar

quote: You build legacy when you do something and also when you do nothing.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Only in the love of those who do not serve a purpose, love begins to unfold.
author: Erich Fromm, The Art of Loving

quote: Every sunrise is priceless and you can experience the richness that life holds only when you live life to the full instead of just being an onlooker.
author: Stephen Richards, Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: You never push a noun against a verb without trying to blow up something.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: Be a friend to thyself, and others will be so too.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: i’m afraid i’ll lose you if i share all that’s real.i’m afraid i’ll lose myself if i don’t.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: I love religious nuts. They make me remember I have them too. So, being a health nut, I scratch them religiously. Just as I do my butt.
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: Stress isn't only a joy stealer. The way we respond to it can be sin.
author: Ann Voskamp, One Thousand Gifts: A Dare to Live Fully Right Where You Are

quote: If, after all, men cannot always make history have a meaning, they can always act so that their own lives have one.
author: Albert Camus

quote: We ought to be free to meet and mingle, --to rise by our individual worth, without any consideration of caste or color; and they who deny us this right are false to their own professed principals of human equality.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe, Uncle Tom's Cabin

quote: Do you know how wizards like to be buried?""Yes!""Well, how?"Granny Weatherwax paused at the bottom of the stairs."Reluctantly.
author: Terry Pratchett, Equal Rites

quote: Treat people as if they were what they should be  and you help them become what they are capable of becoming.
author: Johann von Goethe

quote: Is it possible not to ever know your type--not to even know you have a type--until quite suddenly you do?
author: Jennifer E. Smith, The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight

quote: you have everything. still ,you have nothing . sad .
author: litymunshi

quote: The world will be brighter and wiser without religions, but it will surely be darker and more hopeless without God!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Conceited people never hear anything but praise.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, The Little Prince

quote: This must be a simply enormous wardrobe!
author: C.S. Lewis, The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe

quote: If you can put your five fingers throught it, it is a gate, if not a door.
author: James Joyce

quote: Let me not pray to be sheltered from dangers,but to be fearless in facing them. Let me not beg for the stilling of my pain, butfor the heart to conquer it.
author: Rabindranath Tagore, Collected Poems and Plays of Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Open spaces sing to my heartof the art of nature and the nature of art.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: I stuff my mouth with old fabric and scream until there are no sounds left under my skin.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quote: I will not change just to court popularity.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: So Lightning says to Mud,“What would happen if I struck your blood?”And Mud says, “Brother, It would hurt, And make me the motherOf every living thing.But, Fire Boy, you ain’t lifting my grass skirtUntil you burn me a ring.
author: Sherman Alexie

quote: For many of us, especially being so fortunate to live in a first-world country, the vast majority of pain we experience is due to the seriousness with which we identify with our thoughts.
author: Chris Matakas, #Human: Learning To Live In Modern Times

quote: Once you know you are on the right path, you must stay focused and be prepared for the devil’s attacks
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There are people in every time and every land who want to stop history in its tracks. They fear the future, mistrust the present, and invoke the security of a comfortable past which, in fact, never existed.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: Darwin gives courage to the rest of science that we shall end up understanding literally everything, springing from almost nothing - a thought extremely hard to comprehend and believe.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Obsession and desperation for your goal, gets you the goal.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The security officer smiled and said, ‘Good afternoon, ma’am,’ to me before Igave him ID.”“It’s a sick world, Eve.” He resisted taking her hand for another squeeze. “A sick,sad world.
author: J.D. Robb, New York to Dallas

quote: I'm not claiming divinity. I've never claimed purity of soul. I've never claimed to have the answers to life. I only put out songs and answer questions as honestly as I can... But I still believe in peace, love and understanding.
author: John Lennon

quote: It is better to seek spirituality than materialism.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My early and invincible love of reading  I would not exchange for the treasures of India.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: This was not of the nature of a Christlike lesson for Owen Meany to learn, as he lay in the manger, that someone you hate can give you a hard-on.
author: John Irving, A Prayer for Owen Meany

quote: This paper, by its very length, defends itself from ever being read.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: The heart can think of no devotionGreater than being shore to the ocean-Holding the curve of one position,Counting an endless repetition.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Circumstances makes a thing poison or nectar. There is nothing absolute good or bad.
author: Amit Ray

quote: We live in an upside-down world. People hate when they should love, quarrel when they should be friendly, fight when they should be peaceful, wound when they should heal, steal when they should share,do wrong when they should do right.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: They may try to stop you by their words and deeds, but like air you will rise above it all. You are unstoppable
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive, Your Dreams Will Not Die

quote: Despite my best effort to make myself as large as absolutely possible, life will always be larger than me. That simple fact makes God not only a likelihood, but a necessity.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: I don’t know that love is freedom. Rather, I think it’s more a force to preserve freedom.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: You create the possibility of reaching your desired destinations if you have the courage to begin your journey.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To confront death, in any guise, is to identify with the victim and face what is unsettling and sobering
author: E.B. White

quote: Love requires imagination more than experience.
author: Simon Van Booy, Love Begins in Winter: Five Stories

quote: I hoped our lives would continue this way forever, but inevitably the past came knocking. Not the good kind that was collectible but the bad kind that had arthritis.
author: David Sedaris, When You Are Engulfed in Flames

quote: To truly live a passionate life, develop habits and routines that engage you and enable you to express your passion each day.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: We must concentrate not merely on the negative expulsion of war but the postive affirmation of peace.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: No! Wait! I've got a better idea...""Your ideas tend to result in unnecessary violence, Sergeant Schlock.""And your point is...""Let's broaden the definition of 'necessary'.
author: Howard Tayler, The Tub of Happiness

quote: No one, I fancy, would discredit a story that the Archbishop of Canterbury slipped on a banana skin merely because he found that a similar comic mishap had been reported of many people, and especially of elderly gentlemen of dignity.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, Tree and Leaf: Includes Mythopoeia and The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth

quote: It was not often that she was alone like this and she did not like it. When she was alone she had to think and, these days, thoughts were not so pleasant.
author: Margaret Mitchell, Gone with the Wind

quote: I didn’t want anybody seeing my fire until I burned them with it.
author: Cameron Conaway, Caged: Memoirs of a Cage-Fighting Poet

quote: For surely as each November has its April, mysteries only are significant; and one mystery-of-mysteries creates them all: nothing false and possible is love(who's imagined,therefore limitless)love's to giving as to keeping's give;as yes is to if,love is to yes
author: E.E. Cummings, I : Six Nonlectures

quote: A man wants to earn money in order to be happy, and his whole effort and the best of a life are devoted to the earning of that money. Happiness is forgotten; the means are taken for the end.
author: Albert Camus, The Myth of Sisyphus and Other Essays

quote: If you ever injected truth into politics you would have no politics.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Do not allow yourself to act according to the flesh
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Time has transfigured them intoUntruth. The stone fidelityThey hardly meant has come to beTheir final blazon, and to proveOur almost-instinct almost true:What will survive of us is love.
author: Philip Larkin

quote: God tempers the wind to the shorn lamb.
author: Laurence Sterne

quote: May the Lord deliver us from every danger.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Although we, as Christians, are living in Sodom, we are not to become citizens of Sodom. . The story of Sodom is God's reminder to the modern world
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Praying is the breath of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Nothing is dark when you embosom your own light within you
author: Munia Khan

quote: Don't say you don't have enough time. You have exactly the same number of hours per day that were given to Helen Keller, Pasteur, Michaelangelo, Mother Teresa, Leonardo da Vinci, Thomas Jefferson, and Albert Einstein.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Once war becomes a clash of absolutes, there is no breathing room for mercy. Absolute truth is blind truth.
author: Deepak Chopra, The Third Jesus: The Christ We Cannot Ignore

quote: Fifth Cosmic Seal:(Liber 003 - Seal of Tuzassotama) One who has received this Cosmic Seal is mystically empowered to proclaim himself as "God, Lord, Universal Master or God-Incarnate" on earth and he controls all spirits of the occult kingdoms.
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: Since it is always possible that your dream can come true, you must be very careful in choosing your dream, because the world is full with the unhappy people whose dreams are realized!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: God is Love but He also is the Lawgiver
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: You can't solve a problem: but problems will dissolve in you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: The best about cats is they love cannot feign...
author: Will Advise

quote: And in real life endings aren't always neat, whether they're happy endings, or whether they're sad endings.
author: Stephen King

quote: The gatekeepers are not there to prohibit you anything, they just want to frighten you away, if you are courageous enough to go through them, they will let you , thinking you are the owner or his so
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Education should be the process of helping everyone to discover his uniqueness." -Leo Buscaglia (1924-1998)
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: We are alive in all our layers of self and selflessness - individuals becoming one.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them.
author: Agatha Christie, An Autobiography

quote: Answer the question “ what am I living for?” and become a master in this field, serve others with your gift, because you were created exactly with this goal
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We trifle with France and labour with Germany, we sentimentalize over Italy and ecstacise over Spain- but England we love.
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett, The Shuttle

quote: People lose fifty million skin cells every day. The cells get scraped off and turn into invisible dust, and disappear into the air. Maybe we are nothing but skin cells as far as the world is concerned.
author: Haruki Murakami, 1Q84

quote: Perhaps a man really dies when his brain stops, when he loses the power to take in a new idea.
author: George Orwell, Coming Up for Air

quote: Wisdom may teach you that all places are one, but love shows you how to get there.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Crossing the limit is not my styleMy footsteps meander less than a mileI travel the world perhaps in a minuteYet a dream, to me, is never infinite!
author: Munia Khan

quote: True heroes don't fall. They only encounter temporary setbacks as they forge ahead towards progress.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando

quote: Never durst a poet touch a pen to writeUntil his ink was tempered with love's sighs.
author: William Shakespeare, Love's Labour's Lost

quote: This is what a woman is: unadorned, after children and work and age, and experience-these are the marks of living.
author: Zadie Smith, On Beauty

quote: Don't just become a monument of information, rather a solace of knowledge refuge.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: The world of men is dreaming, it has gone mad in its sleep, and a snake is strangling it, but it can't wake up.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: If you run from technology, it will chase you.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: Never was anything great achieved without danger.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quote: Sometimes people don’t understandthe promises they’re making when they make them,” I said.Isaac shot me a look. “Right, of course.But you keep the promise anyway. That’swhat love is. Love is keeping the promise anyway. Don’t you believe in true love?
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Renew your mind every morning with pure thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I saw a man climb a mountain with no feet or hands and barely a stump for each arm and leg. At once I realized there was no excuse at all for me not to scale my own mountains.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: We were both young when I first saw you. I close my eyes and the flashback starts. I'm standin' there on a balcony in summer air.
author: Taylor Swift, Taylor Swift - Fearless: Easy Guitar with Notes & Tab

quote: I felt a Cleaving in my Mind—As if my Brain had split—I tried to match it—Seam by Seam—But could not make it fit.The thought behind, I strove to joinUnto the thought before—But Sequence ravelled out of SoundLike Balls—upon a Floor.
author: Emily Dickinson, The Complete Poems of Emily Dickinson

quote: The rich that are rejoicing having conquered life, should beware & rethink, for no man can conquer death.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: The distinction between "assistant" and intern" is a simple one: assistants are paid, interns are not.But of course interns are paid, in experience.
author: Joyce Carol Oates, Beasts

quote: An effective life is anchored on the ability to look into your life and see results in line with your creation
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Samkit’ (right belief) means knowing the Soul (self).
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The world belongs to the energetic.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: ...being beautiful has nothing to do with sex. You have to be beautiful in here, too.” he says, pressing his fist against his heart and then his head.
author: Karina Halle, Racing the Sun

quote: Every night I go to sleep with the hope to wake up next morning. How do I call it? Trust maybe?
author: Manasa Rao

quote: I don't have to touch God to know that he's real.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Words are all we have.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: If you seek the presence of God, you will see the glory of God:
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Take your life out of high gear and disengage the autopilot mode. Try living mindfully and avoid the pattern of living in a reactive manner.
author: Nanette Mathews

quote: When truth and honesty is successfully intertwined into the business world of a nation, the result is a boost in commerce.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Don’t jail your imagination. You cannot imagine beyond your desires. You can't unleash your imagination without the SEEDs of desire.
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: Beauty is only skin deep, but who gives a shit what's under their skin anyway?
author: Lois Greiman, Unzipped

quote: The church has to show the way of freedom to the nation
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Morality is everywhere the same for all men, therefore it comes from God; sects differ, therefore they are the work of men.
author: Voltaire, A Pocket Philosophical Dictionary

quote: He was gone and did not have time to tell him what I had just now realized: that I forgave him, and that she forgave us, and that we had to forgive to survive in the labyrinth.
author: John Green, Looking for Alaska

quote: Kissing her is like drinking salted water, he thinks. His thirst only increases.
author: Sara Sheridan, Secret of the Sands

quote: Pain is very often a maimed creature without a mouth.
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: The person who knows how to adjust to others, he will not have any suffering. ‘Adjust everywhere’.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: My own eyes try to sleep, but they don't. They stay wide awake as time snarls forward and silence drops down, like measured thought.
author: Markus Zusak, Underdog

quote: Perspective is not a science but a hope.
author: John Berger

quote: Nobody really knows herExcept the chosen fewHer secrets are kept hiddenBehind that sun-kissed hue.If I reach out to touch herShe’ll just run awayMy Forever and AlwaysWill have to wait another day.
author: Simone Elkeles, Chain Reaction

quote: On the one hand you had people constantly fighting Hell; on the other, you had people constantly fighting Hell on earth.
author: Criss Jami

quote: You have been crafted with utmost care and creativity by your Creator. There is none other like you in the world.
author: Pooja Ruprell

quote: My mind an ever longingAs the moon longing for nightMake the night dreams of desireThat is my love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Prayer's a very tricky business.
author: Dodie Smith, I Capture the Castle

quote: I am exploring the beautiful world.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: GOD is foolishness and GOD is wisdom all at the same time.
author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quote: Fear could paralyse. Action was the antidote.
author: Ken Follett, Hornet Flight

quote: An archaeologist is the best husband a woman can have. The older she gets, the more interested he is in her.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: Rich and wealth comes to a man only through diligence
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If there are infinite dimensions then there would be infinite alternate realities and if there are infinite alternate realities we would exist in almost all of them that would make all of us omnipresent...
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: Can you imagine, finally showing your true self to your spouse, your soul mate, and having him not like you?
author: Gillian Flynn, Gone Girl

quote: Anybody, and any company, can have a big run of success once, but if you're going to repeat that over time, you need to be aware that you need to keep learning.
author: Patrick Lencioni

quote: Success is a way of life that has meaning and purpose.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Mastering facts is knowledge. Mastering knowledge is wisdom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The weakness of a man is the strength of a woman
author: Santosh Avvannavar

quote: Beauty is that which attracts your soul, and that which loves to give and not to receive.
author: Kahlil Gibran, A Tear and a Smile

quote: Not even a repeat of Dawson’s Creek makes me feel better.
author: Susane Colasanti

quote: There is nothing in this world constant but inconstancy.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: With peace of being, you can overcome any pain.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: ...if desire is predominant it can deform love between man and woman and rob them both of it.
author: John Paul II, Love and Responsibility

quote: Freedom is a daring liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: How can the truth make anything worse?
author: Kiera Cass, The Heir

quote: Never believe the lines on your hands that predict your future. Because people who don't have also have future.
author: Moosa Rahat

quote: I would rather be average and wise than be extraordinary and imprudent.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Friendship is never measured it words…it’s measured in memories.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Trust in yourself, your ability, and your struggles, but not in your appetite.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: You are the loving child of this universe, she is always eager to help you, your joy is her happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The only interesting ideas are heresies
author: Susan Sontag, Reborn: Journals and Notebooks, 1947-1963

quote: So Matilda's strong young mind continued to grow, nurtured by the voices of all those authors who had sent their books out into the world like ships on the sea.
author: Roald Dahl, Matilda

quote: Every man has been called to produce a certain number of products within the time allocated to him to live on earth and failure to hit the target would mean a wasted life.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: There is no rerun of life. Rejoice while breathe.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: All will be redeemed in God's fullness of time, all, not just the small portion of the population who have been given the grace to know and accept Christ. All the strayed and stolen sheep. All the little lost ones.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: Tired mothers find that spanking takes less time than reasoning and penetrates sooner to the seat of the memory.
author: Will Durant

quote: We have to do with the past only as we can make it useful to the present and the future.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: I think about all the people I wish could die instead of you.
author: Colleen Hoover, Confess

quote: To appear in heaven, let yourself disappear amongst the beauties of nature!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Art symbolizes our perfect ability in the matter of enriching the reality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: He was always 'checking in' to see if I needed any help with my campaign, which on the surface seemed nice enough, but it was done in a condescending tone that made me want to staple his lip to his tie.
author: Molly Harper, My Bluegrass Baby

quote: She had no time for sleep, with the weight of the world upon her shoulders. And she feared to dream. Sleep is a little death, dreams the whisperings of the Other, who would drag us all into his eternal night.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Dance with Dragons

quote: I was raised in unique and trying environments, but they were also amazing platforms for me to have an extraordinary life. Going through hell as a kid made me sensitive to what others in this world go through, too.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Are you living your dreams?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: To be hopeful means to be uncertain about the future, to be tender toward possibilities, to be dedicated to change all the way down to the bottom of your heart.
author: Rebecca Solnit

quote: But you've slipped under my skin, invaded my blood and seized my heart.
author: Maria V. Snyder, Poison Study

quote: God prefers bad verses recited with a pure heart to the finest verses chanted by the wicked.
author: Voltaire

quote: Get up in the morning on a mission to save prospective clients from the shabby, ill-fitting, overpriced and worthless alternatives that those charlatans - who are your competition - are trying to get away with flogging them.
author: Chris     Murray, Selling with EASE: The Four Step Sales Cycle Found in Every Successful Business Transaction

quote: Focus on peace not on war.Love, live, share and care. Focus on kindness not on hate.Bliss will flow to open the gate.Focus on joy, not on hurt or fear.The earth will dance, peace to share.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In the sky, far above - Where my words - Written in the Clouds; I've borrowed from the sun, A gentle smile.
author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quote: But souls can't be sold. They can only be lost and never found again.
author: Ray Bradbury, Long After Midnight

quote: If there's one observation that rings true in today's changing world, it is that freedom and peace go hand in hand.
author: Ronald Reagan, The Quest for Peace, the Cause of Freedom

quote: Why are you being so mean?”“Friends tell friends the truth.”“Yeah, but not to hurt. To help.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson, Wintergirls

quote: She says it's really not very flattering to her that the women who fall in love with her husband are so uncommonly second-rate.
author: W. Somerset Maugham, The Painted Veil

quote: Love is ever the beginning of Knowledge as fire is of light.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: People, who seek God, find answers to their question
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The entire time I'm burning in Hell, I'll regret each tear I made you weep. But if Hell were the price for twenty days with you, I'd condemn myself again and again. - Cian MacKeltar
author: Karen Marie Moning, Spell of the Highlander

quote: If we live good lives  the times are also good. As we are  such are the times.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Only God gets it right the first time and only a slob says, "Oh well, let it go, that's what copyeditors are for.
author: Stephen King, On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quote: Fat men take a cushion with them wherever they go.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Feast for Crows

quote: I speak gibberish to the civilized world and it replies in kind.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

quote: You should never have a relationship based on guilt over someone's poor choices.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Without Ruth’s partnership and encouragement over the years, my own work would have been impossible. We were called by God as a team.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Men can go to hell! I’ll meet them there.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova, The New Land

quote: I was even a little glad that if it wasn’t going to be me she wanted, it was going to be someone who really deserved her.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Ashes

quote: There is no truth without faith. Nothing is proven except to the heart of one who believes.
author: Compton Gage

quote: It is key to remember we can maintain a genuine enthusiasm and love for what IS, in the PRESENT moment, enjoy it with gratitude for all of the blessings in our lives.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon, Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: Let there be love. There will be light to show you the path of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: ...words are so strong and I am so timid - my soul ignores warnings and I end up covered with your paint ...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: Until they feel what we feel, they will never fully understand the own hell they caused.
author: Shannon A. Thompson, November Snow

quote: The things that truly define me can’t be lost.
author: Amy Neftzger, The War of Words

quote: Losing you're co-remember meant losing the memory itself.
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: ‎"Do you know that nothing you do in this life will ever matter, unless it is about loving God and loving the people he has made?
author: Francis Chan, Crazy Love: Overwhelmed by a Relentless God

quote: Words have to die if humans are to live.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: You were born for the Kingdom of God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Mindfulness helps us to set boundaries by revealing what makes us unhappy & what brings us peace.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Happiness at Work: Meditations for Accomplishment, Achievement, and Peace

quote: This is what war does. Right here, in my hands. This is war.
author: Patrick Ness, Monsters of Men

quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
author: Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

quote: Truth should be the very breath of our life. When once this state in the pilgrim's progress is reached, all other rules of correct living will come without any effort, and obedience to them will be instinctive.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You go to the Place of the Lie to find out the truth?
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Only internal bliss is perpetual, nothing else is created to last. That's why God lives within us and all storms pass
author: Carl Henegan

quote: I desperately want to talk to her now. I want to ask her who it was who so deftly crafted and shaped the legend that was our love.
author: Dan Simmons, Prayers to Broken Stones

quote: There is a rationale for every action.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Your soul is your sacred self.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There are powers inside of you which, if you could discover and use, would make of you everything you ever dreamed or imagined you could become.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Contradiction is not a sign of falsity  nor the lack of contradiction a sign of truth.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: There is a wonderful power that comes when you know that someone will achieve something great due to your help.
author: John Patrick Hickey, On The Journey To Achievement

quote: Serve one another with great humility.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Why are you worrying about YOU-KNOW-WHO, when you should be worrying about YOU-NO-POO? The constipation sensation that's gripping the nation!
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: When I was a kid my parents moved a lot, but I always found them.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: The best way to insure you achieve the greatest satisfaction out of life is to behave intentionally.
author: Deborah Day, BE HAPPY NOW!

quote: No one can hurt you without teaching a life's lesson. So accept it with love and kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be yourself!What harm can it do?
author: Anthony T Hincks

quote: My dad actually makes the best cookies. My mum is great baker, too, but doesn't share them - it's tantalising! Luckily for me though, my dad shares his!
author: Blake Lively

quote: The trouble with being in the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Money is a great servant but a bad master.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Courage doesn’t happen when you have all the answers. It happens when you are ready to face the questions you have been avoiding your whole life.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: To cultivate bravery and courage, interview brave people and learn their secrets.Whom do you know that displays courage and confidence? Ask them for their best practices, mimic their actions, follow their steps, utilize their methods. Ask if they will mentor you.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Action: 8 Ways to Initiate & Activate Forward Momentum for Positive Impact

quote: It is a matter of mere coincidence that there is often a real individual who corresponds with a celebrity, signifies them.
author: Johnny Rich, The Human Script

quote: Try not to trip," she added. "We don't have time for a concussion today."I groaned. That would be just like me - ruin everything, destroy the world, in a moment of klutziness.
author: Stephenie Meyer, New Moon

quote: I am not omniscient, but I know a lot.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Faust: First Part

quote: A satisfied customer brings more customers.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: Have the courage that you will trample over your I'll struggles of the past till all is settled for your celebrations. You will be victorious in the face of difficulties if only give are courageous!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Dream Big!: See Your Bigger Picture!

quote: "But" is a fence over which few leap.
author: German proverb

quote: Vision and purpose fix our character.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: Adapting to changes represents an important characteristic of human nature, essential for the development of human society.
author: Eraldo Banovac

quote: Until now Psychologists only factored in emotional and physical gratification, but VIRTUAL GRATIFICATION is the latest to take over, Beware!
author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quote: Sometimes our lives can change so fast that the change outpaces our minds and hearts.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: There is no failure in loving someone, only in never letting them know.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: To experience positive/healthy emotions you don’t need a big house or a nice car or a managerial job or a million dollar in your bank.
author: Maddy Malhotra, How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

quote: No man deserves to be praised for his goodness, who has it not in his power to be wicked. Goodness without that power is generally nothing more than sloth, or an impotence of will.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Don’t forget to wonder and appreciate yourself.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Fiction gives us empathy: It puts us inside the minds of other people, gives us the gift of seeing through their eyes. Fiction is a lie that tells us true things, over and over.
author: Ray Bradbury, Fahrenheit 451

quote: I drink to separate my body from my soul.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: How many people long for that "past, simpler, and better world," I wonder, without ever recognizing the truth that perhaps it was they who were simpler and better, and not the world about them?
author: R.A. Salvatore, Streams of Silver

quote: I love the smell of coffee when I wake up in the morning. It gives me the awesome feeling of hope!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Trust holds fast, standing firm until deliverance arrives or a solution is found.
author: Elizabeth George, Breaking the Worry Habit...Forever!: God's Plan for Lasting Peace of Mind

quote: The secular world often finds its constituents disenfranchised and solitary as it has spent a great deal of time debating the religious community while failing to build a true community of its own.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Continued Education Through Jiu Jitsu

quote: I am deeply in love with you but you are so ethereal. I may not know how to touch your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The elixir of life is a bubbling stream of laughter.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: If you are not trying to participate or win then you are trying to fail.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: At His door, what is the difference between Moslem and Christian, virtuous and guilty? At his door all are seekers and He the sought.
author: Idries Shah, The World of the Sufi: An Anthology of Writings about Sufis and Their Work

quote: I'll always choose you." Yes that was the word. "Every single lifetime, I'll choose you. Just as you have always chosen me. Forever.
author: Lauren Kate, Passion

quote: The heart stays heavy if it remains in a state of unforgiveness.
author: Aisha Mirza

quote: When one is just sad one should just be alone.
author: Will Advise

quote: An educator...a good one that is, inspires others to be even better than herself.
author: Jill Telford

quote: None of us lives in isolation. We're in it together. And some conflict along the way is inevitable. But our highest priority, when all is said and done, has to be commitment to each other –- sticking together.
author: Steve Goodier

quote: Planning and perseverance will bring your mission to fruition.
author: Rob Liano

quote: God is interested in how you relate to Him
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If someone is capable of Hurting you, you must be Capable of not getting hurt.
author: Mohith Agadi

quote: It is strange how a scrap of poetry works in the mind and makes the legs move in time to it along the road.
author: Virginia Woolf, A Room of One's Own

quote: Truly I am God's Beauty, His Trophy, His Outstretched Arms...I am here for His Glory and Pleasure.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, Risk It, Be Different

quote: Democracy is the art and science of running the circus from the monkey cage.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: The way of sin is physical death of soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Whomever you truly are... honor that person. No dream was ever realized by disappearing into the shadows of self-deceit and doubt.
author: Jaeda DeWalt

quote: Be you. You are sacred.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Negative prophecies are reversible. The Lord reveals to conquer. You are created to reverse any negative with your prayers and the word of God.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: You do indeed have a past, but not now! And, yes, you have a future, but not now! You can consume your now with thoughts of 'then' and 'maybe,' but that will keep you from the inner peace you could experience.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Anything we fully do is an alone journey.
author: Natalie Goldberg

quote: The state is the soul of man enlarged under the microscope of history.
author: Will Durant

quote: I didn't come from a success lineage but I am so glad that my earthly lineage is not my final story because when I gave my life to Jesus twelve years back, God interrupted my story.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: A charming girl gets more proposals than a beautiful girl.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Weeping bride  laughing wife  laughing bride  weeping wife.
author: German proverb

quote: Be yourself, it doesn‘t matter who is looking,Fall in love like you’ve never been hurt,Sing like you are alone even when you are not,And be free like it's paradise on earth.
author: Ane Krstevska

quote: It's witchcraft with all the crusts cut off, and real witchcraft is ALL crusts.
author: Terry Pratchett, I Shall Wear Midnight

quote: Bloody ashes, woman. This isn't a metaphor for anything! It's just boots.
author: Robert Jordan, Towers of Midnight

quote: I guess the thing that I'm most proud of is that I kept on writing poetry. I understand that poetry is sort of the source of everything I do. It's the source of my creativity.
author: Erica Jong

quote: Children are like clay in the hands of teachers. Like a sculptor we can chisel and carve their personalities with our behavior.
author: Balroop Singh

quote: Power of softness and kindness are the greatest.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I am proud to say to you that, I am a scientist and I accept all religions to be biologically true and equal. My pursuit of understanding the human mind has taught me universal tolerance.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Biopsy of Religions: Neuroanalysis Towards Universal Tolerance

quote: The more time you have to do things, the less you are able to get done.
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: His heart was like a battered guitar; worn and scuffed from a life spentout on the road, but still capableof bringing forth beautiful music.
author: John Mark Green

quote: A wise person does not fear failure but gains experience and wisdom.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: Uniconsciousness is the ultimate purpose and ultimate essence of a higher consciousness. The knowledge of the ultimate source of life and the ultimate source of non-judgmental love and consciousness can achieve higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What you don't know can make you fail! Perhaps the only reason why you are where you are is that, you've not known what you have to know... Go, learn and take the lead!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365

quote: God is not upset that Gandhi was not a Christian, because God is not a Christian! All of God's children and their different faiths help us to realize the immensity of God.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: one of the most painful things in life is to be considered as meaningless in an environment where you think you are truly meaningful
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Distinctive Footprints of Life: Where Are You Heading Towards?

quote: Nature is a mutable cloud which is always and never the same
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Being in the design industry, I've tended to meet more people who are affected by HIV and AIDS.
author: Douglas Wilson

quote: With confident, courage and commitment, the God-given goals will be achieve.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I would rather walk alone in the light than with many in the dark doom.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Great men are not always wise.
author: Bible

quote: If the rest of your brain were conscious, it would probably regard you as the pointy-haired boss from Dilbert
author: Peter Watts, Blindsight

quote: Elegant writers depict intricacy with simplicity.
author: Coco J. Ginger

quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: The actual tragedies of life bear no relation to one's preconceived ideas. In the event, one is always bewildered by their simplicity, their grandeur of design, and by that element of the bizarre which seems inherent in them.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: Our life is full of empty space.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: We are in the process of disabling our most distinctive achievement - our educational system - in the name of making the country more like itself.
author: Marilynne Robinson

quote: Only the church can show people how to restore their lives according to the word of God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Don't you think you ought to at least think about getting yourself to your ultimate? Because, trust me, nobody else is going to get you there.
author: Claudia Gray, A Thousand Pieces of You

quote: When we start to understand God, we will be offended less and we will react less to negative circumstances
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: One day, I would like to turn on the news and hear, there is Peace on Earth.
author: Karon Waddell

quote: Good...if you've done things you aren't proud of. It means you have a conscience.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: Don’t run away from the challenges. You can graciously overcome every challenge. Be strong!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: On your journey, you will find a wondrous station called life; relax and enjoy the hospitality and beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Working smarter is learning to prioritize, plan, and focus our energies with meaningful intent.
author: Michael Thomas Sunnarborg, Balancing Work, Relationships & Life in Three Simple Steps

quote: My message to anyone who's afraid that they can't write music when they're happy is 'Just trust the passion.' The passion can write a lot of things.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: She had to quickly pop back to the fifteenth century to find a word for how beautiful he was. The boy was makeless.
author: Helen Oyeyemi, What is Not Yours is Not Yours

quote: Everything seems impossible And everything seems possible.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: But, how do you know if an ending is truly good for the characters unless you've traveled with them through every page?
author: Shannon Hale, Midnight in Austenland

quote: The mind that is anxious about the future is miserable.
author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quote: A healthy choice for your overall health and well-being is one of a happy and positive disposition.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Sometimes your wish can become chaos ... be careful what you wish for!
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Know the other person’s viewpoint first and then talk. To Talk after comparing it or mixing it with our viewpoint is an offence.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: God would not have brought you to this place to leave you here without the archangel's help.
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: Money is a great asset, talent is an extraordinary asset, and courage is an exceptional asset.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There is less flogging in our great schools than formerly  but then less is learned there  so that what the boys get at one end they lose at the other.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: No matter what you face, don't forget if you're positive, positivity will find you and embrace you.
author: Widad Akreyi

quote: Man is the cruelest animal.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Time is life.Time for birth, time for death.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Truth  * I had a long heart-to-heart talk with a politician and a 14 month old baby the baby spoke more truth  than the politician _________________ 2014(c)rassool jibraeel snyman "The Poetic Assassin
author: rassool jibraeel snyman

quote: Dream your dreams and go all out there to achieve it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Someday we're going to look back on every shared smile and smile some more. It's moments like this that make life worth enduring.
author: Nadège Richards

quote: Time is no one's friend--time has no social niceties and holds the door for nobody nowhere. But I hold the door for time, with my one good paw.
author: Catherynne M. Valente, The Girl Who Soared Over Fairyland and Cut the Moon in Two

quote: I care as much as I can, but I don’t spend energy caring about things I cannot resolve.
author: Gregory Maguire, Out of Oz

quote: Women have a role to play in global development.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: Love is that indefinable moment of brokenheartedness when you cry and someone weeps with your tears
author: Munia Khan

quote: Being an artist means, not reckoning and counting, but ripening like the tree which does not force its sap and stands confidence in the storms of spring without fear that after them may come no summer.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: MUSIC is, can, and will.
author: Stephanie Lahart

quote: Great leadership makes ordinary people into extraordinary people.
author: Jeffrey Fry

quote: Please do not say magic like you are discussing a bowel movement... Humanity expects the lights, so they are provided.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Artificial Gods

quote: I don't fear the future. I fear letting it pass by me, without ever trying to make it mine.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Respect for the fragility and importance of an individual life is still the mark of an educated man.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Dreams are like passing clouds but love makes the world stand still for something beautiful to happen.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Any society that justifies violence against any human being for any reason will be a violent society. It will ultimately infect and affect the whole society. Everyone will suffer.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The problem with the stigma around mental health is really about the stories that we tell ourselves as a society. What is normal? That's just a story that we tell ourselves.
author: Matthew Quick

quote: ... we are only ever pretending to ourselves, never to other people ...
author: José Saramago, The Cave

quote: In Hollywood a marriage is a success if it outlasts milk.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: There were a few things scarier than a bipolar vampire off his meds, but to be honest, not that many.
author: Rachel Caine, Daylighters

quote: Never in the field of human conflict was so much owed by so many to so few.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: Ultimately, the universe doesn't care about us. Time doesn't care about us. That's why we have to care about each other.
author: David Levithan, Every Day

quote: You are imminently connected with this universe through your breathing. You can improve this great relationship by breathing consciously and appreciating this universe in this process.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Men may fight the battle, but women wage the war.
author: Katlyn Charlesworth, The Patriot's Daughter

quote: All at once he feels weary of ganefs and prophets, guns and sacrifices and the infinite gangster weight of God. He's tired of hearing about the promised land and the inevitable bloodshed required for its redemption.
author: Michael Chabon, The Yiddish Policemen's Union

quote: Glorifying people is the most noble act
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To feel worthy, value others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Never allow your life to be dictated by what you can see by sight, be guided by your inner vision.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: Our vocabulary may become a real time algorithmic word bank. Could you imagine having a conversation like that? Where the meaning of words constantly adapts?
author: Natasha Tsakos

quote: Never forget to express your gratitude for the gift of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I like the way you kiss-a couple of test kisses, then a huge kiss.
author: Robyn Carr, Sunrise Point

quote: Memories sharp enough to cut himself on - the smells, the sounds, the feel of the air on his skin, the desperate hope and mad anger.
author: Joe Abercrombie, Best Served Cold

quote: Limitless material growth is not sustainable or moral.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Don't let your habits become handcuffs
author: Elizabeth Berg, The Year of Pleasures

quote: Consult.../what reinforcement we may gain from hope,/If not, what resolution from despair.
author: John Milton, Paradise Lost

quote: I shall allow no man to belittle my soul by making me hate him.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Joy is the goal of existence, and joy is not to be stumbled upon, but to be achieved, and the act of treason is to let its vision drown in the swamp of the moment’s torture.
author: Ayn Rand, Atlas Shrugged

quote: He found himself understanding the wearisomeness of this life, where every path was an improvisation and a considerable part of one's waking life was spent watching one's feet.
author: William Golding, Lord of the Flies

quote: We may place blame, give reasons, and even have excuses; but in the end, it is an act of cowardice to not follow your dreams.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Sometimes it takes a miracle to remind us that the only permanent condition is that of impermanence.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: We all write poems it is simply that poets are the ones who write in words.
author: John Fowles

quote: In Love's service, only wounded soldiers can serve.
author: Brennan Manning, Abba's Child: The Cry of the Heart for Intimate Belonging

quote: It is good even for old men to learn wisdom.
author: Aeschylus

quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
author: Aesop

quote: Do it first and feel about it afterwards.' - Dagny Taggart
author: Ayn Rand, Atlas Shrugged

quote: By practicing meditation we establish love, compassion, sympathetic joy & equanimity as our home.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Lovingkindness: The Revolutionary Art of Happiness

quote: It is so difficult - at least, I find it difficult - to understand people who speak the truth.
author: E.M. Forster, A Room with a View

quote: Love with your soul. Hear your soul speaking, it will always be your guiding light.
author: Nikita Dudani

quote: If I was a nobody you wouldn't be so eager to see me dead. Just like these people you know that I am devoted to the truth. That is why you want to eliminate me." - Magda Searus
author: Terry Goodkind, The First Confessor

quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Deliver me from writers who say the way they live doesn't matter. I'm not sure a bad person can write a good book. If art doesn't make us better, then what on earth is it for.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Every person has two educations, one which he receives from others, and one, more important, which he gives to himself.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: So that's little Scorpious. Make sure you beat him in every test, Rosie. Thank god you've inherited your mother's brains.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: We already had three steps behind us."Hold on, Lia," I whispered. Hold on for me.
author: Mary E. Pearson, The Heart of Betrayal

quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
author: Paulo Coelho, By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept

quote: Once, I believed that space couldhave no power over faith, just as I believed the heavens declared the glory of God’shandwork. Now I have seen that handwork, and my faith is sorely troubled.
author: Arthur C. Clarke, The Star

quote: And for once a band of thieves in ripped up jeans got to rule the world
author: Taylor Swift, Taylor Swift: Speak Now

quote: Experience hath shewn, that even under the best forms of government those entrusted with power have, in time, and by slow operations, perverted it into tyranny.

quote: You must have something in order to give it up.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: Giving, goodness and generosity expresses love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Where you are running to is not the answer, who is with you is the power.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: I don't believe in an afterlife, so I don't have to spend my whole life fearing hell, or fearing heaven even more. For whatever the tortures of hell, I think the boredom of heaven would be even worse.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: When you are grateful - when you can see what you have - you unlock blessings to flow in your life.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Women often forget that the man she is complaining about is a creation of a mother like her.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Though children can accept adults as adults, adults can never accept children as anything but adults too.
author: William Faulkner, Light in August

quote: Every word comes from the heart.

quote: Never underestimate the capacity for romance, no matter what the circumstances.
author: Jasper Fforde, Shades of Grey

quote: Surfeits of happiness are fatal.

quote: Take heed lest passion sway Thy judgment to do aught  which else free will Would not admit.
author: John Milton

quote: He who is more mindful of one, loses the love and the faith of both.
author: Kahlil Gibran, The Prophet

quote: Sometimes it is the reader that sucks, not the book.

quote: There is nothing to lose in this life.

quote: They say faith is taking the first step when you can’t see the whole staircase. Actually, wisdom is seeing the elevator behind it that would have taken you to the top floor.

quote: Feed your child ideas of peace, harmony and compassion but at the same time give them courage to defend their identity and dignity.

quote: Mad Ireland hurt you into poetry.
author: W.H. Auden

quote: The only sensible ends of literature are, first, the pleasurable toil of writing; second, the gratification of one's family and friends; and lastly, the solid cash.

quote: There are endearing people who come into our lives and leave a soul print.

quote: One is often unconsciously surrounded by one’s own personal reality

quote: Happiness is having a large  loving  caring  close-knit family ... in another city.

quote: The role of a philosopher is to create a better way for the future generations.

quote: If a lion invites you home for dinner, it is you he wants to serve as a meal to his guests.

quote: There are two ways to destroy a country: to involve it in a civil war or to keep all people ignorant by teaching them only religion.

quote: I lost my way in the darkness. But at dawn of a bright light, I find my path.

quote: Every parent is an artist, but not every artist is apparent.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Beauty is something that burns the hand when you touch it.

quote: How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: In its failure to value differences in the way people learn, the educational process often suppresses intuition, creativity, and your sense of identity.

quote: I can’t control your behavior; nor do I want that burden… but I will not apologize for refusing to be disrespected, to be lied to, or to be mistreated. I have standards; step up or step out.

quote: You are a change maker and nothing should clean this notice off the boards of your heart!

quote: Remember, you are training your mind. You are either training to look for things to go wrong or you are training it to look for anything to go right. Train yourself to think only positive thoughts.

quote: You are the most beautiful fairy from heaven. You have made my life a fairytale.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Power always thinks it has a great soul and vast views beyond the comprehension of the weak.
author: John Adams

quote: Military men are just dumb, stupid animals to be used as pawns in foreign policy.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: You try almost dying, being chased, thenhopping in a car with a complete (horny)stranger.

quote: The strongest bond in the universe is when two souls unite to become one.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: This is my moral. Trust what you dream. Not what you think.
author: David Mitchell, number9dream

quote: Your body is temple of the holy spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We came to this world with nothing but love and blessing. The purpose of our life is to be happy by loving and serving.

quote: His habit of reading isolated him: it became such a need that after being in company for some time he grew tired and restless ...
author: W. Somerset Maugham, Of Human Bondage

quote: Endure while you can, you will succeed in due time.

quote: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quote: When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference. You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.

quote: The use of imaginative fiction is to deepen your understanding of your world, and your fellow men, and your own feelings, and your destiny.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Language of the Night: Essays on Fantasy and Science Fiction

quote: Be thou faithful unto death.
author: Bible

quote: Every great advance in natural knowledge has involved the absolute rejection of authority.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.
author: W.B. Yeats

quote: The act of praying is the very highest energy of which the human mind is capable; praying, that is, with the total concentration of the faculties. The great mass of worldly men and of learned men are absolutely incapable of prayer.

quote: Our fated untainted soul gives us free reign, only doth backward pull our clouded minds when we ourselves falsely protect from pain.

quote: The biggest challenge for human mind is human mind.

quote: Everything about sex and freedom interests me.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention.

quote: My general attitude to life is to enjoy every minute of every day. I never do anything with a feeling of, 'Oh God, I've got to do this today.'

quote: You are a person worthy of love. You don’t have to do anything to prove that.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Kiss her gypsy soul and love her for the wild rose she is.

quote: It's not that we like sad movies that make us feel like, 'Oh, my God, what a bummer.' We like emotionally moving experiences. It's nothing new. It's catharsis. It goes back to the Greeks.

quote: GOD Doesn't Follow Your Timetable... And You Will Never Know His Timetable.
author: Cyc Jouzy

quote: The time you spend loving is the most valuable time.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Failure is almost always success wrapped in a blanket of redo possibilities... It is up to you to reframe the outcome ~bns
author: Bluenscottish

quote: A good library will never be too neat, or too dusty, because somebody will always be in it, taking books off the shelves and staying up late reading them.

quote: So, how close are love and genius, really? We know that they are both mentioned far more than lived.

quote: Choose carefully. Success in life depends on the choices you make.

quote: leave me some musicthat’s chocolate for the heart.
author: Sanober  Khan, Turquoise Silence

quote: Yes, cannibals. People are just cannibals unless they leave each other alone.
author: Doris Lessing, The Golden Notebook

quote: If we wish for a new strength, we must meditate on the Scriptures.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Heavenly blessings are life, grace, hope, faith, love, inner peace, nature, family, friends….!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You took your clothes off?""You didn't notice?""No! Jeez Louise, I don't even know you.""If you look under the covers, you'll know me better.""I don't want to know you better!""That's a big fib," Diesel said.

quote: Even if it turns out that time travel is impossible, it is important that we understand why it is impossible.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: A good cricketer never loses his nerve.He just bats on!

quote: Very occasionally, if you pay really close attention, life doesn't suck.

quote: Love is a spiritual soul.

quote: Happiness is just a smile away.

quote: Start every day by making a list of all the experiences you will fill your day with and make an effort.

quote: The man who alters his way of thinking to suit others is a fool.

quote: She'd absolutely adored the library_an entire building where anyone could take things they didn't own and feel no remorse about it.

quote: The superpowers often behave like two heavily armed blind men feeling their way around a room  each believing himself in mortal peril from the other  whom he assumes to have perfect vision.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: Most men pursue pleasure with such breathless haste that they hurry past it.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Those who succeed after a rare opportunity, only succeed on the back of a plan they already had or one they craft and begin to pursue after receiving the windfall.

quote: Mathematics possesses not only truth  but supreme beauty - a beauty cold and austere  like that of a sculpture.

quote: white is not always light and black is not always dark.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: For me, my haters are not the ones who I have done wrong with, but the ones I have fought for.

quote: We are not creators; only combiners of the created. Invention isn't about new ingredients, but new recipes. And innovations taste the best.

quote: Every journey towards change begins with awareness.

quote: He kissed her forehead and drifted into an uneasy sleep, listening to the soft snoring of the creature on his chest, one he loved slightly more than he had come to fear.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Danse Macabre (Night's Dream, #2)

quote: Many things the gods achieve beyond our judgement,'" said the sorrowful girl. "'What we thought is not confirmed and what we thought not God contives.
author: John Irving, A Prayer for Owen Meany

quote: What you want to see, allow it and let it be.

quote: I testify that inspiration can be the spring for every person's hope, guidance, and strength. It is one of the magnified treasures of life. It involves coming to the infinite knowledge of God.
author: James E. Faust

quote: The meaning of life is to die living it.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: What will he then do unto his name whereby we are called? ...of these things have I asked.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Make your life a magical journey of Life, encountering Life.
author: Donald L. Hicks, Look into the stillness

quote: ...having you as a friend wasn’t second prize. It wasn’t something to chafe against. It was an honor.

quote: Anything anybody has was purchased with the currency of time.

quote: Read over your compositions  and when you meet a passage which you think is particularly fine  strike it out.

quote: I love the romance in Kimberly Derting's 'The Body Finder.' 'Cold Kiss' by Amy Garvey is unbelievably touching - and about so much more than just romantic love.

quote: Love is not a Subject, but it has some great lessons..!
author: Sarvesh Jain, The Journey of 101 Milestones

quote: Walk in love and you will appreciate people for who they are.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: An education system is best belittled when the so-called educated gets hired by a company that’s owned by a so-called dropout.

quote: It is important to remember that good overcomes evil
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If life is a stage and you are your own agent, then don’t hesitate to play the character you wish to play.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: May you find the right path to your destination.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: For there comes a day on which we will see a mirror of judgement; to gaze not on man, but within ourselves. what cometh on that day in you? truth or despair? love or hate?

quote: Hearing voices no one else can hear isn't a good sign, even in the wizarding world.

quote: God honors you when you take a stand for what is right.
author: Jim George

quote: Intuition feels the imperceptible things that unknown to mind.

quote: See what no one else can see.Be what no one else can be.Do what no one else can do.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Random acts of kindness, however small it may be can transform the world.

quote: If a story is in you, it has to come out.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Transcend your doubts.Transcend your fears.Transcend your weaknesses.Transcend your limits.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: That's not a religion, that's Pokemon.
author: Stephen Colbert, I Am America

quote: If we knew what is already there, there will be no need for research.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: We all have a piece of God in us
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Peace is an awful beautiful thing for life.

quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.

quote: Angels only care about what you look like on the inside. A pure heart is the vessel that contains a soul's true beauty.

quote: When it comes to compounding, don't trust your intuition - you have no idea how powerful it is.
author: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

quote: I am now ready to let go of anyone or anything that prevents me from being me.

quote: Some people could look at a mud puddle and see an ocean with ships.

quote: The almighty dollar  that great object of universal devotion throughout our land  seems to have no genuine devotees in these peculiar villages.
author: Washington Irving

quote: Be patient and pray for God will make a way.
author: Chris Burkmenn

quote: To believe in Jesus Christ is to be saved from death to life eternal.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I have never been carried around by a large boy, or laughed until my stomach hurt at the dinner table, or listened to the clamor of a hundred people all talking at once. Peace is restrained; this is free.

quote: Best gifts: love, prayer, books!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: In writing, you must kill all your darlings.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Obviously the imagination is fueled by emotions beyond the control of the conscious mind.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: With grace we can overcome every human limitations.

quote: Listen, real poetry doesn't say anything; it just ticks off the possibilities. Opens all doors. You can walk through anyone that suits you.

quote: I can't believe he didn't have the dignity and presence of mind just to get drunk and pass out in some gutter," said Jace. "I must say, I'm disappointed in the little fellow.

quote: There is only one attraction, one law, one power and that is the power of love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be determined enough to live for your dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: because daytime leaves vampires less than, well, conscious, I told him, “Take your muffins to Boston and shut it, Terrance.” And then I hung up on him.
author: Molly Harper, Nice Girls Don't Bite Their Neighbors

quote: If you read the novel in more than two weeks, you don't read the novel really
author: Philip Roth

quote: We can’t have what we want and nothing is gonna change it.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: If we do not set the time limits, we can get caught up in the process and never achieve the goal
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: At the center of a man's purpose rests the hunger for competition, war, chaos, and calmness. You take it away, there is nothing but a self-reflection of stagnation for him.
