quote: Morality is of the highest importance - but for us, not for God.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Now and then, when I grow nostalgic about my ocean childhood - the wauling of gulls and the smell of salt, somebody solicitous will bundle me into a car and drive me to the nearest briny horizon.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: Give your weakness to one who helps.
author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quote: I had not, I said to myself, come into the future to carry on a miniature flirtation.
author: H.G. Wells, The Time Machine

quote: But thus do I counsel you, my friends: distrust all in whom the impulse to punish is powerful!
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

quote: Computers may save time but they sure waste a lot of paper. About 98 percent of everything printed out by a computer is garbage that no one ever reads.
author: Andy Rooney

quote: power happily walks hand in hand with abuse
author: Dean Cavanagh

quote: They ordered the exterminationof all minds they couldn't control
author: Tupac Shakur, The Rose That Grew from Concrete

quote: Sparrows and cats will live in my shoe,Sooner than I will live with you.Fish will come walking out of the sea,Sooner than you will come back to me.
author: Peter S. Beagle, The Last Unicorn

quote: What is demanded of man is not, as some existential philosophers teach, to endure the meaninglessness of life, but rather to bear his incapacity to grasp its unconditional meaningfulness in rational terms.
author: Viktor E. Frankl, Man's Search for Meaning

quote: The best self is a good being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Change occurs slowly. Very often a legal change might take place but the cultural shift required to really accept its spirit lingers in the wings for decades.
author: Sara Sheridan

quote: Money and beauty are defenses against the sorrows of this world but neither can undo the past. Only time will conquer time. The way forward is the only way back to innocence and to peace.
author: Dean Koontz, Brother Odd

quote: Convert every minute and hour of your life into perfecting your calling.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: If you don't value yourself, you're not going to draw valuable things into your life.
author: Robert Tew

quote: To find inner bliss and happiness through yoga, learn to accept things as they are by changing your thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you have no passion, you better do something different.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Faith makes all things possible. Love makes them easy.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Why does humankind love to seek the glory of one another instead of the glory of God?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Adam smiled cheerily. Ronan would start wars and burn cities for that true smile, elastic and amiable.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Raven King

quote: The spirit of fun keeps your dating life interesting and not boring.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: I love singing Christmas carols. I know every harmony to every music-hall Christmas song.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: I'll love you with all the madness in my soul.
author: Bruce Springsteen, Born to Run

quote: We view art in order to escape our own skins, to get outside of the commotion inside our skulls.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: It was a little thing, a baby tree, but still it tangled with things around it and required care to move. And when she pulled it out, it's roots still clung to Earth from it's old home.
author: Ally Condie, Matched

quote: 297. We cannot reform without focusing on God and His principles
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: ...we fear monsters because we fear the dark parts of ourselves...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: 248. You will only have influence and power in the field of your gifts and talents
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I confused things with their names: that is belief.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre, The Words

quote: The tune was wailing and mournful, almost flagrantly so, and the total effect was of a heartbroken piccolo being parted forever from its bagpipe lover.
author: Peter S. Beagle, A Fine and Private Place

quote: The motionless person was once full of life in one moment in time. What a misery?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Something tells me this isn't going to end well for everyone involved. Someone may get turned into a frog yet." And that was the good news.
author: Deborah Blake, Wickedly Magical

quote: It’s the inward attention that takes you into the depth of the mind.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: Patience is only possible within the time we are able to be patient.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: The saddest thing about love, Joe, is that not only the love cannot last forever, but even the heartbreak is soon forgotten.
author: William Faulkner

quote: In marriage, at home and everywhere else, one is to remain superfluous. That is where people go in deep into; that is called the worldly life (sansaar).
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The good Watson had at that time deserted me for a wife, the only selfish action I can recall in our association. I was alone.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle, The Case-Book of Sherlock Holmes

quote: She was like a mermaid enrapturing me the sailor with all her charms!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: You did it... now you should pay... that's how the world works.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Feel my presence. Recognise my soul. Love my heart.
author: Truth Devour, Unrequited

quote: The greatest relationships are those in which love is not treated as a noun, but as a verb; with romance not viewed as a burden, but lived as a poem.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Entrepreneurship is an art, you do it because you love it.
author: Farshad Asl

quote: We are told that talent creates its own opportunities. But it sometimes seems that intense desire creates not only its own opportunities but its own talents.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: A consecrated Christian life is ever shedding light and comfort and peace.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: The old resists the new one.'Change hurts' is the reason.
author: Toba Beta, Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza

quote: When you are insane, you are busy being insane - all the time.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: What is life to Spirit, is death to the ego.
author: Vivian Amis, I Am: The Key to Manifesting

quote: Live more. Worry less. Do what you love.
author: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

quote: For some stories, it's easy. The moral of 'The Three Bears,' for instance, is "Never break into someone else's house.' The moral of 'Snow White' is 'Never eat apples.' The moral of World War I is 'Never assassinate Archduke Ferdinand.
author: Lemony Snicket, The Wide Window

quote: The flames of our memories keep us alive!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: No man really knows about other human beings. The best he can do is to suppose that they are like himself.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: The things I know, every man can know, but, oh, my heart is mine alone!
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, The Sorrows of Young Werther and Selected Writings

quote: To understand desire, one needs language and flesh.
author: Sherry Turkle, Alone Together: Why We Expect More from Technology and Less from Each Other

quote: Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Your identity is no more than the memory of your mind, and the time you learn to consciously look into your memories of the past, the first time you realize that nowhere you exist in your mind.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: Now me,” said Mr. Vandemar.“What number am I thinking of?” “I beg your pardon?” “What number am I thinking of?” repeated Mr. Vandemar. “It’s between one and a lot,” he added, helpfully.
author: Neil Gaiman, Neverwhere

quote: If a fly lands on your food, do not use a hammer to remove it.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: It may be that there are kernels of truth in a few of these doctrines, but their widespread acceptancebetokens a lack of intellectual rigor, an absence of skepticism, a need to replace experiments by desires.
author: Carl Sagan, Dragons of Eden: Speculations on the Evolution of Human Intelligence

quote: Your end can be greater than your beginning: butterflies are the greatest proof of this.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You are NOT an abuse survivor or victim. Leave your labels elsewhere because they are no longer serving you.
author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women

quote: The act of loving is an act of self-evolution even when the purpose of the act is someone else's growth.
author: M. Scott Peck, The Road Less Traveled: A New Psychology of Love, Traditional Values, and Spiritual Growth

quote: Just as water is the only thing that can relieve thirst in the desert, the provision of God's Word is the only thing that can satisfy our spiritual thirst.
author: Jim George, A Man After God's Own Heart

quote: The games made me the guy who I'm here now, the articles and the videos which I have watched and I continue to watch make the person today who I am. The life build me as such type of person!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Our senses are the lavish gift of being human.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: The moon is the lighthouse of love, and as changing as a woman's mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: oh my soul...be prepared for him who knows how to ask questions
author: William Paul Young, The Shack

quote: -Climb out of mediocrity, it has no integrity. Climb out of imitation it is a limitation. Climb higher than copying, it is double standard. Come up to be original
author: Ikechukwu Joseph

quote: Before prayer changes others, it first changes us.
author: Paul Silway, Heaven I - Paradise: The City and Throne

quote: In a way, I was safe writing
author: Franz Kafka, Letter to His Father

quote: Two things that matter to me. Emotional resonance and rocket launchers.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: The world has been loaned to humanity by the universal powers of creation.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: One eye open. One still in a dream
author: Markus Zusak, The Book Thief

quote: Politicians and figureheads bank on the amnesia of the ignorant.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: There is only one way to happiness  and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
author: Epictetus

quote: He was the most ordinary man in all the world, and yet in her memory he'd become luminous, like the prince in a fairy tale.
author: Cheryl Strayed, Torch

quote: You only have one heart, but it can love the whole world and still have room to grow kindness in its deepest chamber.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Each person deserves a day away in which no problems are confronted, no solutions searched for.
author: Maya Angelou, Wouldn't Take Nothing for My Journey Now

quote: Justice in the life and conduct of the State is possible only as first it resides in the hearts and souls of the citizens.
author: Plato

quote: It is time for us to move on to our promised land!!! It’s time to begin to believe that with God on our side we can build a prosperous nation and continent
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To deal with history [life] means to abandon one's self to chaos but to retain a belief in the ordination and the meaning. It is a very serious task.
author: Hermann Hesse, The Glass Bead Game

quote: Horses frighten me as much as chickens do,’ he said.‘That is too bad, because lack of communication with horses has impeded human progress,’ said Abrenuncio. ‘If we ever broke down the barriers, we could produce the centaur.
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: Conscience is the light by which we interpret the will of God in our own lives.
author: Thomas Merton, No Man Is an Island

quote: Grace is a free sacred gift from God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If your dream doesn't scare you, it's not big enough.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: The common question that gets asked in business is, 'why?' That's a good question, but an equally valid question is, 'why not?'
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: There are things in life that science will never be able to see. We have to rely on what has been passed from our ancestors, generation to generation.
author: Pawan Mishra, Coinman: An Untold Conspiracy

quote: Man is not growing better! Man is not climbing upward. Instead of progress in man himself there is degeneracy—degeneracy of body, mind, and spirit. Man is going downhill.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Self-confident people take the initiative to move forward in the direction of their dreams.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact

quote: All you need is confidence in yourself. There is no living thing that is not afraid when it faces danger. The true courage is in facing danger when you are afraid, and that kind of courage you have in plenty.
author: L. Frank Baum

quote: When things don’t add up, either you don’t have a calculator or you forgot to use commonsense by simply asking.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: To maximize our lives we think that we should get up and join in the race. Yet, we rarely consider that maybe it’s less about joining a race and more about actually creating one.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: To live is to think.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: You must trust and believe in people or life becomes impossible.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: You call it thought. I call it a mind manufactured invisible powerful product.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: The sweetest victories come after the bitterest defeats.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Your mother sets you up blind dates? With guys like that?" The corners of his mouth twitched. "She doesn't like you very much, does she?
author: Kelley Armstrong, Dates from Hell

quote: If someone thinks your ideas, the dreams bubbling up inside of you, are stupid, welcome to the Club.
author: Richie Norton, The Power of Starting Something Stupid: How to Crush Fear, Make Dreams Happen, and Live without Regret

quote: Don’t neglect your calling all in the name of employment
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Speak up, stand up, and keep correcting the false perceptions. Stay true to your heart's views and keep chanting for peace and justice.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: We arc the miracle of miracles  the great inscrutable mystery of God.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: In the days when wishing was having, I got what I wished and then I wish I hadn't.
author: Emma Donoghue, Kissing the Witch: Old Tales in New Skins

quote: All have dreams, live for them, They add meaning to LIFE.The only thing that differentiates us from other beings is the fact that us can DREAM!!!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: There is nothing more beautiful than the light of a Candle and the Aroma of it's Heart
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich, Return to Stantasyland

quote: The prenup needs to be drawn up months before the wedding, not days - it's not something you slap together and sign in the car on the way to the ceremony. A shotgun prenup might not hold up in court.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Each of us makes his own weather  determines the color of the skies in the emotional universe which he inhabits.
author: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: The whole history of science has been the gradual realization that events do not happen in an arbitrary manner, but that they reflect a certain underlying order, which may or may not be divinely inspired.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: It is as true as anything else which can be spoken to say that all knowledge is really available everywhere.
author: Idries Shah, Knowing How to Know: A Practical Philosophy in the Sufi Tradition

quote: Our thinking makes or breaks our life, we live as we think
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Morality is good when we use it to live our lives but not to hurt anyone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Goal Of LIFE Is patience,Goal Of Patience Is LIFE!
author: Sujit Lalwani, Life Simplified!

quote: To me and the rest of the world your poetry is a gift.
author: Delano Johnson, Rare Images of Love

quote: There are plenty of good reasons for fighting, I said, but no good reason ever to hate without reservation, to imagine that God Almighty Himself hates with you, too.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr., Mother Night

quote: In the end, just three things matter:How well we have livedHow well we have lovedHow well we have learned to let go
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: Do actions agree with words? There's your measure of reliability. Never confine yourself to the words.
author: Frank Herbert, Chapterhouse: Dune

quote: Courage is the footstool of the Virtues  upon which they stand.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: If you want to change your nation, you have to start a conversation.
author: Alin Sav

quote: The knowledge of God gives a person the opportunity to not be a slave to wealth.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To know more, read more, watch more, listen more!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Then he commandeered the floor, shooting back and forth like some hot Latin lover. When he finished, everyone applauded. He could have stayed in that moment forever.
author: Mitch Albom, Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: Imagination is the core of attraction.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: It's a lot harder to get someone OUT of your life than it is to let them IN, so please…be selective.
author: Mandy Hale, The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: Like a rose bud, my heart always desires to bloom and spread the fragrance of love, beauty, and kindness of mankind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: No employer today is independent of those about him. He cannot succeed alone, no matter how great his ability or capital. Business today is more than ever a question of cooperation.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: There shall be no more death, Because we have already seen all that, Its old and we are tired of it, And now we need something new, And this new thing is Eternal Life
author: Boris Pasternak, Doctor Zhivago

quote: You have the freedom to live and let live, to love and let love. Granting yourself that freedom is one of the healthiest, most constructive things you can do for yourself and the people who matter to you.
author: Martha Beck

quote: The year's at the Spring And day's at the morn  Morning's at seven  The hillside's dew-pearled  The lark's on the wing  The snail's on the thorn: God's in his Heaven -  All's right with the world!
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: If you serve the king of kings, the rest will serve you, money, success, prosperity, etc
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson, Travels with a Donkey in the Cevennes

quote: Often people, when they're confronted with a poem, it's like someone who keep saying 'what is the meaning of this? What is the meaning of this?' And that dulls us to the other pleasures poetry offers.
author: Billy Collins

quote: Generosity is the most natural outward expression of an inner attitude of compassion and loving-kindness.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: The further you venture down a river the bigger the fish.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Gratitude is arriving at the point where your expectations, accumulation and anticipations make way for appreciation, reflection and celebration.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: After all, if you run far enough, no one can catch you.
author: V.E. Schwab, A Gathering of Shadows

quote: I've always believed phone calls from kids must be allowed if mothers are to feel welcome in the workplace, as anyone who has worked in my chambers can attest.
author: Sonia Sotomayor, My Beloved World

quote: Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourslef or to gossip about others. Use your power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
author: Miguel Ruiz, The Four Agreements: A Practical Guide to Personal Freedom

quote: I am dying now, but I still have many things to say.
author: Roberto Bolaño, By Night in Chile

quote: Don't fear mistakes, they are your stepping stone to success
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Generations to generations, you are God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: God is life. Life is divine.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Hope and Change has become Divide and Conquer.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: Love and care can transform the impossible to possible and ugliness into beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you wish to reach the highest  begin at the lowest.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Happiness doesn't always come from a pursuit. Sometimes it comes when we least expect it.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Getting some redecorating ideas?’ Nico asked. ‘Maybe you could do your dining room in mediaeval monk skulls.’ Hades arched an eyebrow. ‘I can never tell when you’re joking.
author: Rick Riordan, The Blood of Olympus

quote: My words are the kisses but many of the times they don't taste so good as the touch of your lips does to mine.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Your perception of the world and the way you see yourself in it has created within your mind a concept, a philosophy, of the way you believe things to be.
author: Chris Prentiss, Be Who You Want, Have What You Want: Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life

quote: She felt hot liquid anger suddenly cool and harden into something powerful and immovable.
author: Liane Moriarty, Big Little Lies

quote: Excellence, then, is a state concerned with choice, lying in a mean, relative to us, this being determined by reason and in the way in which the man of practical wisdom would determine it.
author: Aristotle

quote: Never chase a person that doesn't know your worth because the moment you catch him you will always feel you were never good enough.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: The sound of words as they're said is always different from the sound they make when they're heard, because the speakers hears some of the sound from the inside.
author: David Levithan, Every Day

quote: Why must we cling to those who walk away instead of granting freedom? We must give the same liberty God gives to prodigals-an ability to let them go-or we'll be perennially bound to others for our happiness and effective service.
author: Mary E. DeMuth, Everything: What You Give and What You Gain to Become Like Jesus

quote: Music enlivens my soul and opens my heart to ever greater levels of bliss and joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: In the end, it mattered not that you could not close your mind. It was your heart that saved you.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: I’ve learned that sometimes, when you’re afraid but you keep on moving forward, that’s the biggest kind of courage there is.
author: Cynthia Hand, Hallowed

quote: Men always talk about the most important things to perfect strangers. In the perfect stranger we perceive man himself the image of a God is not disguised by resemblances to an uncle or doubts of wisdom of a mustache.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: What I want is only a wish.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We are all responsible to Jesus first, and then, under him, to various other persons and offices. Discerning the path of love and obedience when two or more of these submissive relationships collide is a call to humble, Bible-saturated, spiritual wisdom.
author: John Piper

quote: People should be courage to read books, it should be made in such way how I changed my opinion how James Patterson did it. It should be done a way in which people should se the advantages of reading a book.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: If a man isn't willing to take some risk for his opinions, either his opinions are no good or he's no good
author: Ezra Pound

quote: Now she sat in their dining hall, a book in her lap but unread while she stared blankly across the room.Bercelak’s kin kept themselves busy by sharpening weapons, reading, talking, or setting things on fire with small bursts of flame.
author: G.A. Aiken, Dragon Actually

quote: You're going to need this," she said, and pulled out a condom."At some point, we're also going to need a defibrillator and a fire extinguisher.""Promises, promises.
author: Nora Roberts, Remember When

quote: Peace is a way of constructively handling natural conflict.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: He wanted to die. He prayed for it. Through the roar in his ears, he begged for it.
author: V.S. Carnes, Sand for Dreams

quote: Ordinary people can do extra ordinary things when they create opportunity towards their passion
author: Sivaprakash Sidhu

quote: If you are filled with pride, then you have no room for wisdom.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: ... your grasp, even in fury, would have a charm for me...
author: Charlotte Brontë, Jane Eyre

quote: The air is full of flying kisses sent by the people who are watching you.
author: Amit Kalantri, I Love You Too

quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: The dream chooses the dreamer, not the other way around....
author: Laini Taylor, Strange the Dreamer

quote: You can’t enjoy art or books in a hurry.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri, Brushstrokes of a Gadfly

quote: Upon my word, I think the truth is the hardest missile one can be pelted with.
author: George Eliot, Middlemarch

quote: Whatever you believe is true is true even if it is not true
author: Saji Ijiyemi

quote: That would be a good thing for them to cut on my tombstone: Wherever she went, including here, it was against her better judgment.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: All of the stories, all of the beauty, all of the songs and events of this life will vanish in the ocean of time.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We have always held to the hope, the belief, the conviction that there is a better life, a better world, beyond the horizon.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Nothing is finished unless it is started. So just start where you are.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

quote: Publishing is definitely something you do because you enjoy educating or entertaining people.
author: Steven Magee

quote: The deepest and darkest dungeons that we are ever flung into are the dungeons of the mind
author: rassool jibraeel snyman

quote: Passive-Aggressive behavior consumes unnecessary time and resources. Say what you mean, let's resolve the issue, and move on to more productive tasks.
author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quote: Faith in action works and gets far good results than faith
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Wielding your words cavalierly can inadvertently lop off someone’s ego.
author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quote: Love, like a chicken salad or restaurant hash, must be taken with blind faith or it loses its flavor.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: The sole remaining task for philosophy is the analysis of language.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: The bird of hope singsPerched on the branches of twilight;Never grieve for anythingFor, the day always follows the night!
author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

quote: Oh to have you with me, to have you here, not to be alone, but to be with you, my beauty, you of all souls! You.
author: Anne Rice, Pandora

quote: Shall I tell you what the real evil is? To cringe to the things that are called evils, to surrender to them our freedom, in defiance of which we ought to face any suffering.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Differences disappear when faced with death.
author: Shannon A. Thompson, 2013: A Stellar Collection

quote: Whoever encounter Jesus Christ shall never be the same.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We have enough grace for everything.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
author: John Wooden

quote: If history were taught in the form of stories, it would never be forgotten.
author: Rudyard Kipling, The Collected Works

quote: I shall never be very merry or very sad, for I am more prone to analyse than to feel.
author: H.P. Lovecraft

quote: Man's best support is a very dear friend.
author: Cicero

quote: True wisdom gives the only possible answer at any given moment, and that night, going back to bed was the only possible answer.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Eat, Pray, Love

quote: I love you now for what we've already shared, and I love you now in anticipation of all that's to come.
author: Nicholas Sparks, Nights in Rodanthe

quote: Remember thee? Ay, thou poor ghost, while memory holds a seatin this distracted globe. Remember thee?
author: William Shakespeare, Hamlet

quote: We make no greater voluntary choice in this life than the selection of a marriage partner. This decision can bring eternal happiness and joy. To find sublime fulfillment in marriage, both partners need to be fully committed to the marriage.
author: James E. Faust

quote: Until you do your best, don't try to take a rest. Until you take a leap, don't try to sleep. Until you top, don't try to stop.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder

quote: Doing nothing for others is the undoing of ourselves.
author: Horace Mann

quote: Crawl in faith, and you will end up walking.Walk in faith, and you will end up jogging.Jog in faith, and you will end up running.Run in faith, and you will end up sprinting.Sprint in faith, and you will end up soaring.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Everybody undertakes what he sees another successful in  whether he has the aptitude for it or not.
author: Johann von Goethe

quote: A cord that remains, always. in many ways...
author: Santosh Avvannavar

quote: The Creator favors the man who loves over the man who hates. If you teach hatred to your children, one day your child will have that hatred reflected back onto them, or onto you.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: live a death, die a death
author: Aporva Kala, Life... Love... Kumbh...

quote: Your highest purpose and calling is often really calling for your own healing
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Fear nothing but your conscience.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Shift your consciousness to a higher consciousness to see the beauty and joy all around you. Immerse yourself in beauty and will see everyone will be eager to join you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It is pointless to be called by God’s name and not have His respect
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are going to the moon that is not very far. Man has so much farther to go within himself.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: I'd much rather fall to my death than admit my weakness to you.""The captain of the Royal Guard wants to impress a lowly handmaiden?""A clumsy young man wants to impress a beautiful young woman.
author: Renee Ahdieh, The Moth & the Flame

quote: A bit of adviceGiven to a young Native AmericanAt the time of his initiation:As you go the way of life,You will see a great chasm. Jump.It is not as wide as you think.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: A society that has no wrongs will soon have no rights.
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: One of the greatest tragedies of life is to work your life away only to realise later that you never really did live
author: Topsy Gift

quote: Yes the truth is that men's ambition and their desire to make money are among the most frequent causes of deliberate acts of injustice.
author: Aristotle, Politics

quote: When one is pretending the entire body revolts.
author: Anais Nin

quote: They sicken of the calm who know the storm.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: To my shame, I had never thought to ask anything of the future, and yet woke each and every day embittered because it was never what I needed it to be.
author: Chris     Murray, The Extremely Successful Salesman's Club

quote: There is a difference between a calling and an assignment
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Religions began as realization of the self, but ended up being retaliation against each other.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: A moment of care carries us away!The fragrance of forgiveness elevates usImperfections are essentially universalDivine love drives our desire.
author: Balroop Singh

quote: Your this beautiful ship that will sail a long way, and I'd only be your anchor""A ship without an anchor can never be at rest
author: Dean Koontz, From the Corner of His Eye

quote: Awww," Minho said. "That's almost as sweet as that time she slammed the end of a spear into your shuck face.
author: James Dashner, The Death Cure

quote: Dance your Soulful path / and you shall know the magic / of your mind & heart / and all the beauty laughing / to fill your rising self.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: My name is Percy Jackson. I'm twelve years old. Until a few months ago, I was a boarding student at Yancy Academy, a private school for troubled kids in upstate New York.Am I a troubled kid?Yeah. You could say that.
author: Rick Riordan, The Lightning Thief

quote: Je tiefer sich das Leid in euer Sein eingräbt, desto mehr Freude könnt ihr fassen.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Nothing is bigger than art.
author: Kenya Wright, The Muse

quote: Change of heart comes from the Creator.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Ever since history has been written, ever since philosophy has meditated, misery has been the garment of the human race.
author: Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

quote: Though cultures differ and times change, the Word of our God stands forever as an unchanging source of answers to all of life’s problems.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Drugs don't really fix anything, except for everything.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: If people in the position of power are not made to be accountable, then, ungodliness, injustice and oppression will continue to be the order of the day in the society.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: A multitude of small delights constitute happiness.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: It was dark, so I couldn't make out much of her face, but she had brilliant red hair, like honey and roses and the sun altogether.
author: Kiera Cass, The Selection Stories: The Prince & The Guard

quote: I wish for sorrow to be a full stop and happiness to be a comma in my life.
author: Luffina Lourduraj

quote: God determines the path of every man.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: God is all-powerful.God is all-capable.God is all-knowing.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Make a change of your steps when necessary. “Status quo” is the court room where change is kept on trial for long, delaying the verdict. Make a change and achieve your dreams. Rule your case with victory.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Shaping the dream

quote: I've never minded it," he went on. "Being lost, that is. I had always thought one could not truly be lost if one knew one's own heart. But I fear I may be lost without knowing yours.
author: Cassandra Clare, Clockwork Prince

quote: The problem with having a sense of humor is often that people you use it on aren't in a very good mood.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Never allow yourself to be sapped of your extraordinary energy that is the necessary ingredient for creating something new and progressive.
author: Janvier Chouteu-Chando, The Girl on the Trail

quote: Live like Jesus, pray like Jesus, love like Jesus, serve like Jesus but don't hand yourself over to the enemy like Him.
author: Ikechukwu Izuakor, Great Reflections on Success

quote: The Repairer is a Restorer.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The one who does not have the control for even a minute, he does not have the control forever.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: When nobody else celebrates you, learn to celebrate yourself. When nobody else compliments you, then compliment yourself. It’s not up to other people to keep you encouraged. It’s up to you. Encouragement should come from the inside.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I don't try to imagine a personal God; it suffices to stand in awe at the structure of the world, insofar as it allows our inadequate senses to appreciate it.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The most precious gifts you can think of are not ends in themselves. They all lead to God. Ultimately, that is what all His gifts are for.
author: John Piper

quote: So overjoyed were they at their deliverance that they laughed aloud, and the Earth seemed to them like a flower of silver, and the Moon like a flower of gold.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Star-Child and Other Tales

quote: Many people would be more truthful were it not for their uncontrollable desire to talk.
author: Edgar Watson Howe

quote: What man is able to do that, that thou should ask such things of me?
author: Compton Gage

quote: In the end,The treasure of life is missed by those who hold on and gained by those who let go.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Most people have to talk so they won't hear.
author: May Sarton

quote: there is no class that cannot be wiped out if a sufficient number of its members are murdered.
author: Hannah Arendt, The Origins of Totalitarianism

quote: Life is not just to run and run, it is also not just to have fun. Life is complete when we get something worthwhile done.
author: RVM

quote: Sometimes advises from others are more difficult to bear with than even slang.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Entrepreneurship is like a weighing machine whose load content should tilt towards passion to solve a pressing need, more than passion to make money.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: The proper office of a friend is to side with you when you are in the wrong. Nearly everybody will side with you when you are in the right.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A bear, however hard he tries, grows tubby without exercise.
author: A.A. Milne, Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: I love you," I whisper over and over again. "Don't go," I close my eyes. My tears fall on his cheeks.
author: Marie Lu, Champion

quote: Always improve on things you do better and faster.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: Whoever wants to be an overnight success must be willing to sweat for it during the day.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: The fastest way to get lost is to go on a guilt trip!
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Those wars are unjust which are undertaken without provocation. For only a war waged for revenge or defense can be just.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Judging art is like caging a bird. Instead of seeing it soar, you can only watch it flutter.
author: Ron Brackin

quote: The world needed gentle men to rule if the people were to live in peace, not the warmongers and conniving men she so often witnessed wearing the crimson of the Imperial Council.
author: A.H. Septimius, Crowns Of Amara: The Return Of The Oracle

quote: Quality of life depends on quality and quantity of happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: All thought is a feat of association.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The secret of all greatness is knowing what to do with time.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: If you are happy with your past, you visit it often; and strangely, if you are unhappy with your past, you visit it often too!

quote: From daybreak to sunset she turned her thoughts, like boulders, over. She set them in long lines. She rearranged their order...

quote: Laughter is the most important paradise of life.

quote: Night and day, wind and storm, tide and earthquake, impeded man no longer. He had harnessed Leviathan. All the old literature, with its praise of Nature, and its fear of Nature, rang false as the prattle of a child.

quote: This ‘science’ is prem swaroop (embodiment of love). There is nothing else in love; nothing like anger-pride-deceit-greed are to be found in love. If they are present, till then, love will not be there.

quote: To have seen something means it has come into one’s understanding. To have known something means it has come into one’s knowledge. There is a vast difference between ‘seeing’ and ‘knowing’.

quote: Work on Purpose - Play on Purpose -Rest on Purpose -Do not let yourself or anyone else waste your time.

quote: Like a deep sad noteplayed beneath the oceanwaving through the orbthe memories of youthe bittersweet echoesinfixed forever in my heart

quote: Our love was bornoutside the walls,in the wind,in the night,in the earth,and that's why the clay and the flower,the mud and the rootsknow your name.

author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: Life begins on the other side of despair.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Look forward, not back," the Hag said. "All is change. Do not regret. Instead, learn.

quote: There was no opiate like a French pillow.

quote: Your fate lies in your hands.

quote: Be the love that you are always looking for.

quote: Quis custodiet ipsos custodes? - Who watches the watchmen?

quote: Mentally I can die, Emotionally I can cry, Physically I can sigh, Spirituality I can fly. If I just try.

quote: The thing about girls? Suzanne said. Is we are more content-driven.

quote: Appreciate every moment because this moment is your precious life.

quote: Nothing is impossible, nothing is risky, when you take the action with love, something better will happen.

quote: His charm was not electric, but it was enveloping.

quote: Cyber hygiene, patching vulnerabilities, security by design, threat hunting and machine learning based artificial intelligence are mandatory prerequisites for cyber defense against the next generation threat landscape.

quote: Always think in circles to get your ideas around
author: Benny Bellamacina, The king of rhyme

quote: If you wait, you can have what you want,

quote: If we want to survive this economic collapse, new mandatory school subjects should be eCommerce, Chinese, spirituality and aesthetics.

quote: The price an artist pays for doing what he wants is that he has to do it.

quote: All men have a soul.

quote: Love is the only reason that is reason enough

quote: When I was a child, I was living in the housing projects of Philadelphia. I didn't even have a Christmas tree.

quote: Venice is beautiful, but like a Bergman movie is beautiful; you can admire it, but you don't really want to live in it.

quote: Democracy! Bah! When I hear that I reach for my feather boa!

quote: Greatness can be bought with the currency of time.

quote: She's the kind of woman who climbed the ladder of success  wrong by wrong.

quote: To their simple, degenerate minds there was only one thing to do when faced by a God more powerful than their own: Convert.Brandon Sanderson(Elantris)

quote: You can't do it unless you can imagine it.

quote: The world after a war is a good world, I told myself. A happy world. A secure world. In this world, I might do anything.

quote: He tried to read her heart in her handclasp but he knew nothing.

quote: You cannot pray for someone and hate them at the same time.

quote: Literature is the aesthetic exploitation of language
author: Anthony Burgess, A Mouthful of Air: Languages and Language, Especially English

quote: Ô, Muse of the Heart’s Passion,let me relive my Love’s memory,to remember her body, so brave and so free,and the sound of my Dreameress singing to me,and the scent of my Dreameress sleeping by me,Ô, sing, sweet Muse, my soliloquy!

quote: How small a thought it takes to fill a life.

quote: Raise your children don't train them RjS

quote: The reason America is in its death-throes is because America has lost moral authority.

quote: Many Words Of Love are Spoken, Many Hearts Still Broken, Many Promises Were Meant To Last Forever Girl.

quote: There's little of the melancholy element in her, my lord: she is never sad but when she sleeps; and not ever sad then; for I have heard my daughter say, she hath often dreamt of unhappiness, and waked herself with laughing.

quote: I always have the time, the room and the energy for more love.

quote: When other people are grieving, the newspaperman turns efficient.

quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion  enmity  worship  love  but no friendship.

quote: Walk with the Creator on the face of earth.

quote: I must tell you what you will not ask, though I may wish it unsaid the next moment

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity in front of a closed door—wander until you find the open one.

quote: Love has power in it. At the end, it wins over all miseries.

quote: Achieving a goal is not the most important part of the process. The destination should never be your primary purpose or objective.

quote: Did I see them waving?' said Mrs Liberty'And particling, I shouldn't wonder' said the Alderman

quote: The spirit of man can endure only so much and when it is broken only a miracle can mend it.

quote: It is all too common for people to invest tine into appearance but not in developing their inner man

quote: Open your eyes to new opportunities

quote: Ah! Such a beautiful morning! Let us be the sunshine in someone’s life and fill her heart with untold joy.

quote: It [is] that courage that Africa most desperately needs.

quote: Only those who transcend into another world, knows there.

quote: I make books because I love them as objects; because I want to put the pictures and the words together, because I want to tell a story.

quote: Fight for what you want. Never allow anything to distract you.

quote: The content of a man is the life he possesses inside

quote: I don't want to stand in naked silence, pathetically unaware of how to be.

quote: We can rely on the righteous Ruler.

quote: A devout Christian, desire Jesus Christ.

quote: And pictures of perfection, as you know, make me sick and wicked.

quote: Sometimes being happy takes effort. Invest time and energy in yourself and your happiness.

quote: God is my spiritual Father.

quote: Married couples must pray and study the Bible daily.

quote: THERE IS NO JUSTICE" said Death "JUST ME

quote: Do you realise that people die of boredom in London suburbs? It's the second biggest cause of death amongs the English in general. Sheer boredom...

quote: James Altucher reminds me for Stephen King... when is about Stephen King his 2 sons, probably the one or no,no both they look like him.

quote: Sacred soul has indomitable strength.

quote: Sometimes it's about standing in your power.

quote: You are not what your critics say you are. You are wonderful sacred-soul.

quote: when you hate others, you hate yourself.when you hate yourself, you hate others.when you love others, you love yourself.when you love yourself, you love others.there is no separation.

quote: A lie, sometimes, can be truer than the truth, which is why fiction gets written.

quote: All truly wise thoughts have been thought already thousands of times; but to make them truly ours, we must think them over again honestly, until they take root in our personal experience.

quote: Moments of love is life, a life is for moments of love.

author: Josh Stern, And That's Why I'm Single: What Good Is Having A Lucky Horseshoe Up Your Butt When The Horse Is Still Attached?

quote: I don't feel old. I don't feel anything till noon. That's when it's time for my nap.

quote: What would come, would come...and you would have to meet it, when it did.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: You need to cleanse your mind throughout life because there is so much negativity in yourself and around. Keep cleaning and you will connect with the Universe quicker and effectively.
author: Hina Hashmi, Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: Books--oh! no. I am sure we never read the same, or not with the samefeelings.""I am sorry you think so; but if that be the case, there can at least beno want of subject. We may compare our different opinions.
author: Jane Austen, Pride and Prejudice

quote: Courage was something John Reckless only ever wished he had. Courage was not a given; it was acquired, earned. You had to take the difficult paths, and John had always picked the easy ones.
author: Cornelia Funke

quote: You know you’re writing well when you’re throwing good stuff into the wastebasket.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: My advice to you is get married: if you find a good wife you'll be happy; if not, you'll become a philosopher.
author: Socrates

quote: No one but Night, with tears on her dark face, watches beside me in this windy place.

quote: Too many husbands and wives enter into marriage with the idea that their spouse exists for one purpose: to make them happy.

quote: Be grateful when you have friends who care for you, it's a blessing to see nice happy people around us.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Love to live, live to love—nothing else matters.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Do you see that out there? The strange, unfamiliar light? It's called the sun. Let's go get us a little.

quote: Chaos was the law of nature Order was the dream of man.
author: Henry Adams

quote: My past still haunts me when I sleep, although I saw that - much to my surprise- his does as well.
author: Zack Love, Anissa's Redemption

quote: I don't like food that's too carefully arranged it makes me think that the chef is spending too much time arranging and not enough time cooking. If I wanted a picture I'd buy a painting.

quote: Hope is a good breakfast, but it is a bad supper.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: It is great joy to love and be loved.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I am made of universal love. I embrace my interconnected self and let it bring me joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: A hug everyday mixed with just four sweet letters makes life joyful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be a good actor you have to be something like a criminal, to be willing to break the rules to strive for something new.
author: Nicolas Cage

quote: It is both dangerous and absurd for our world to be a group of communions mutually excommunicate.

quote: You are never too old to learn something new, or too young to learn too much.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Associate Yourself with People Who Think Positively: Associate yourself with people who think positively. You cannot surround yourself with negative people and expect positive outcomes.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: I hope I shall possess firmness and virtue enough to maintain what I consider the most enviable of all titles, the character of an honest man.
author: George Washington

quote: Your mission: Be so busy loving your life that you have no time for hate, regret or fear.
author: Karen Salmansohn, Instant Happy Journal: 365 Days of Inspiration, Gratitude, and Joy

quote: The ability to observe without evaluating is the highest form of intelligence.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Love is forever. If it wasn't, it wouldn't be love. The world is beautiful. If it wasn't, it wouldn't be the world.
author: Rick Yancey, The Last Star

quote: You can only derive pleasure from work when it is in the sphere of your calling
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Everyday I reach to a place where there is my name on the door. It's been a while, didn't reach my home.
author: Sarvesh Jain, Naked Wisdom of the child

quote: And the existence is tedious, anyway; it is a senseless, dirty business, this life.
author: Anton Chekhov, Uncle Vanya

quote: Your destiny can only be defined by you.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Our habitual failure to recognise thought as thought, our habitual identification with discursive thought, is the primary source of human suffering.
author: Sam Harris

quote: Personal responsibility leads to national transformation.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: I tried to convey to the boy how people’s lives are often altered by curved lines read slowly from paper, sand, or stone.
author: Simon Van Booy, The Illusion of Separateness

quote: With jealousy, a parasite takes root in your heart. It becomes a cancer that eats away at your soul.

quote: A friend is one before whom I may think aloud.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It was my interest in happiness that led me to the subject of habits, and of course, the study of habits is really the study of happiness. Habits are the invisible architecture of everyday life, and a significant element of happiness.

quote: I fight evil, and words are my weapons of choice.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: She left, never to return. I planted a tree and a seed each time I thought of her. I grew a small forest and a large garden and had no one to give the orchids to.

quote: Greater than all the joy of success and victory is the joy of true love and the of giving of yourself.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be more concerned with your character than your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are.
author: John Wooden

quote: The first footfalls on Mars will mark a historic milestone, an enterprise that requires human tenacity matched with technology to anchor ourselves on another world.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Too much of what is called 'education' is little more than an expensive isolation from reality.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: C'mon, Amory. Your romance is overYou don't know how true you spoke. No idea. 'At's the whole trouble
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald, This Side of Paradise

quote: Great literature will insist upon its self-sufficiency in the face of the worthiest causes
author: Harold Bloom, The Western Canon: The Books and School of the Ages

quote: I WILL FOLLOW ANYONEAND TELL EVERYONEABOUT...THE REAL WAR ON WOMENON YAZIDI GIRLS & WOMEN
author: Widad Akreyi

quote: Help means give me a hand.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Life wasn't about becoming, was it? It was about being.
author: Kate Atkinson, Life After Life

quote: I never meant it," he was saying. "Never meant it to happen. Can't stand it,seeing her suffer. Must do something, do something... What do I do? What can I do...?
author: Rachel Caine, Ghost Town

quote: Our love is the reason romance was created.
author: Faraaz Kazi, Truly, Madly, Deeply

quote: But I cannot love her as I did, because she is not open, because she withholds what matters, because she makes me, with her pride or her madness, live a lie.

quote: Every time you say ‘but’, you aregiving yourself a get-out clause.

quote: People settle for a level of despair they can tolerate and call it happiness.

quote: There is no point treating a depressed person as though she were just feeling sad, saying, 'There now, hang on, you'll get over it.' Sadness is more or less like a head cold- with patience, it passes. Depression is like cancer.
