quote: There is something healthy and invigorating about direct action.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Fake it 'till you make it.
author: Gayle Forman, If I Stay

quote: What's happened to me,' he thought. It was no dream.
author: Franz Kafka, The Metamorphosis

quote: The names they gave were false ones, though the vows they made were true.
author: Leigh Bardugo, Ruin and Rising

quote: Don't indulge your ego at the expense of your soul.
author: Rick Warren, The Purpose Driven Life: What on Earth Am I Here for?

quote: We can be wise from goodness and good from wisdom.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: Faith gives you a concept of the dignity and worth of all work, even simple work, without which work could bore you.
author: Timothy J. Keller

quote: Curious that we spend more time congratulating people who have succeeded than encouraging people who have not.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Everything in my environment is offering me feedback, if I will only listen.
author: Sharon Weil, ChangeAbility: How Artists, Activists, and Awakeners Navigate Change

quote: Would you like me to [kill you] now?" asked Snape, his voice heavy with irony. "Or would you like a few moments to compose an epitaph?
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Confidence is armor you cannot buy.
author: Jeffrey Fry

quote: The good is, like nature, an immense landscape in which man advances through centuries of exploration.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Did you ever wonder if the person in the puddle is real, and you're just a reflection of him?
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Let your faith in the Universe deepen, purify and strengthen most on your troublesome, dark days. If you close your eyes in prayer, surrendering every problem and desire, you will find a way out without fail.
author: Pooja Ruprell

quote: A peaceful mind is a powerful mind...Set your mind at ease and take charge of yourself.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

quote: The best way to be thankful for the gift of life is to not throw it away.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Ah, merciless Love, is there any length to which you cannot force the human heart to go?
author: Virgil, The Aeneid

quote: I think that's what you say when you can't have something you want, isn't it? You say you don't want it in the first place.
author: Jodi Lynn Anderson, Midnight at the Electric

quote: ...the terrible crumple and blanch of a lie come undone...
author: Ann Patchett, Run

quote: People who are different from other people are always called peculiar,' said Anne.
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of Avonlea

quote: It is becoming a bad dream-- in the daytime as well as at night. I see him nearly all the time and can't get at him, I mustn't show anything, must remain gay while I'm really in despair.
author: Anne Frank, The Diary of a Young Girl

quote: Self leadership requires us to lead and motivate ourselves. But it looks a heck of a lot like schizophrenia during a ropes course.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: Anyone who says he can see through women is missing a lot.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Love demands expression. It will not stay still, stay silent, be good, be modest, be seen and not heard, no. It will break out in tongues of praise, the high note that smashes the glass and spills the liquid.
author: Jeanette Winterson, Written on the Body

quote: There will be a time, when you ask for nothing but life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It was easier to know it than to explain why I knew it.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle, A Study in Scarlet

quote: Your true potential is unlimited, and you can certainly achieve much more than human intelligence can comprehend.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: If my heart was a bottle, your kiss would be the cork that seals in our love.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Seduction is merely encouraging a man to do something he already wants to do.
author: Lisa Kleypas, Tempt Me at Twilight

quote: Your ego is everything man about yourself
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: The sacred soul delivers the message of life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When the Christian faith becomes defined by who we are and what we do and not by who Christ is and what he did for us, we miss the gospel - and we, ironically, become more disobedient.
author: Tullian Tchividjian

quote: Generally, people who are good at writing letters have no need to write letters. They've got plenty of life to lead inside their own context.
author: Haruki Murakami, A Wild Sheep Chase

quote: What happens when you shut your eyes? The images you have been accustomed to look at suddenly disappear. See through the images by closing your eyes and opening your heart.
author: J.R. Rim

quote: Embrace one another with a holy hug.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Since marriage is for two people, it is difficult to remain in it when one person steps out of it.
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: I’d said it before and meant it: Alive or undead, the love of my life was a badass.
author: Richelle Mead, Blood Promise

quote: The truth that is suppressed by friends is the readiest weapon of the enemy.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: That is the eternal folly of man. To be chasing after the sweet flesh, without realizing that it is simply a pretty cover for the bones.
author: Neil Gaiman, American Gods

quote: You cannot bury someone with the Shereketa spirit for long. Even if they are thrown into problems, they will rise back up.
author: Archibald Marwizi, Making Success Deliberate

quote: When we choose to operate on the frequency of compassion and kindness, we create, and reinforce our own realities, as filled with compassion and kindness.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: Your love is my diamond that I want to wear near my heart. Your hug is my heaven where I want to belong always.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: not writing is not good but trying to write when you can't is worse.
author: Charles Bukowski, The Last Night of the Earth Poems

quote: Just in case you’re wondering,” Gage says, breaking the silence, “this alliance of ours doesn’t mean I like you.”“Feeling’s mutual.” Julian tosses him a disdainful look.
author: Laura Kreitzer, Burning Falls

quote: Our heart is made by the love, for the love, and with the love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Most folk are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: There's only one rule that I know of, babies—God damn it, you've got to be kind.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr., God Bless You, Mr. Rosewater

quote: Violent anger makes me physically ill.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
author: Les Brown

quote: Once you've charmed a girl and prove how mature and independent you are, just ask her out.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: A miserable scrooge whom lacks charity for the entire world is a menace to society. Spiritual sullenness destroys men quicker than gunfire.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: Young people these days don't trust anything at all. They want to be free.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Wisdom is a sharp chisel to carve out your future.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Give freely, love fully, and play with fervor! Don’t put so many conditioned rules on your happiness. Life can be a beautiful experience if we allow it.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Hope is the great deceiver. Hope is the piper who leads us sleepy to our slaughter.
author: Brent Weeks, The Broken Eye

quote: I guess it’s true what they say," observed Jace. "There are no straight men in the trenches.""That’s atheists, jackass," said Simon furiously. "There are no atheists in the trenches.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Tell people there's an invisible man in the sky who created the universe, and the vast majority will believe you. Tell them the paint is wet, and they have to touch it to be sure.
author: George Carlin

quote: ...Nope!...Gues again, you haven't understood me right!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Cool people are only cool for the first thirty minutes of knowing them. After that, they just become annoying.
author: Carroll Bryant

quote: There is no cure for birth and death save to enjoy the interval. The dark background which death supplies brings out the tender colors of life in all their purity.
author: George Santayana

quote: To be happy, you have to love and forgive.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don’t wait for a vacation to enjoy life. Start to enjoy it now, today, wherever you are.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are random animals. That is who we are, and we have only ourselves, nothing more--there is no greater relationship.
author: Yann Martel, The High Mountains of Portugal

quote: Shock is a merciful condition. It allows you to get through disaster with a necessary distance between you and your feelings.
author: Lisa Kleypas, Sugar Daddy

quote: You must maintain a state of happiness, state of joy to let the positive thoughts emanate from your mind.. If you are in a state of joy, your thoughts emanate positive energy, and you can influence others without much efforts.
author: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

quote: Dreams, unlike eggs, don’t hatch from sitting on them.
author: Frank Sonnenberg, Follow Your Conscience: Make a Difference in Your Life & in the Lives of Others

quote: You think that's the solution to everything, don't you, Bane? Drinking and dancing and making love... but I tell you this, something is coming, and we'd be fools to ignore it.""When have I ever claimed not to be a fool?
author: Cassandra Clare, The Rise of the Hotel Dumort

quote: The longer you pause to process surprising or negative feedback, the more likely you are to learn from it.
author: Susan Cain, Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can't Stop Talking

quote: No book is really worth reading at the age of ten which is not equally – and often far more – worth reading at the age of fifty and beyond.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: There is time for work. And time for love. That leaves no other time.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Don’t let them fool you and tell you goals has to be unified before any partnership agreement. Be carefully concerned about unifying your values and principles, after that all will run smoothly.
author: Sameh Elsayed

quote: No matter how high buildings you make, your soul needs to be where it belongs.
author: Mahrukh

quote: Nobody comes here anymore, its too crowded
author: Yogi Berra

quote: If the flesh says that you should stop, then you must move forward
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The more we accept the holy gospel of Christ Jesus , the more we know God's grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You need to live a life of service to make your life an effective one
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Wait.” Stefan’s voice was hard suddenly. Bonnie and Elena turned back and froze, embracing each other, trembling. “What is your—your father—going to do to you when he finds out that you allowed th
author: L.J. Smith, Midnight

quote: Without passion, the earth will be full of hollow bodies devoid of love, relationship, religion, art, science and technology
author: Val Uchendu

quote: Literature is my Utopia. Here I am not disfranchised. No barrier of the senses shuts me out from the sweet  gracious discourse of my book-friends. They talk to me without embarrassment or awkwardness.
author: Helen Keller

quote: You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life.
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: On your track to success, never forget that you are crossing many rivers. Yes you are! And each of those rivers contain crocodiles that may attempt to intimidate you. Never be afraid; sail on and you will get there.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: A novel is never anything but a philosophy expressed in images. And in a good novel the philosophy has disappeared into the images.
author: Albert Camus, Lyrical and Critical Essays

quote: You do not have to be good.You do not have to walk on your kneesfor a hundred miles through the desert, repenting.You only have to let the soft animal of your body love what it loves.
author: Mary Oliver, Red Bird

quote: Emotions, in my experience, aren't covered by single words.I don't believe in "sadness", "joy", or "regret".Maybe the best proof that the language is patriarchal is that is oversimplifies feeling. I'd like to have at my disposal complicated hybrid emotions.
author: Jeffrey Eugenides, Middlesex

quote: I feel free when I see no one and nobody knows my name
author: Lana Del Rey, Lana del Rey - Honeymoon

quote: God, come down, if you're really there -Well, you're the one who claims to care!
author: Morrissey

quote: How would this world be if there was not God? The answer is simple: it would become itself God.
author: Sorin Cerin

quote: You are or become what you think you are
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If want to become a person with vision, get back and reconnect to your source.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: When I am looking for you, then in silence, your every atom is longing for me.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your calling is to serve people and humanity with this gift
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Taking personal responsibility is not about being "responsible" — it is about seeing your truth and evolving.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: In the end, we begin.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Most people lose the only thing they possess—Life—while acquiring the many things that will finally never be theirs.
author: RVM

quote: If there is anything that links the human to the divine, it is the courage to stand by a principle when everybody else rejects it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: To be as good as our fathers we must be better, imitation is not discipleship.
author: Wendell Phillips

quote: Use your body language and posture to project confidence. Shift your physiology into a more powerful pose or position and your mindset will follow.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Being: 8 Ways to Optimize Your Presence & Essence for Positive Impact

quote: Like many people who dress in black, the lump of coal was interested in becoming an artist.
author: Lemony Snicket, The Lump of Coal

quote: Any civilization where the main symbol of religious veneration is a tool of execution is a bad place to have children.
author: Charles Stross, Toast, and Other Stories

quote: When we are at peace within our marriage, the effects can be astounding! We will raise happier children, become better employees, and overall find the joy in life.
author: Lindsey Rietzsch, How to Date Your Spouse: A Couple's Guide to Falling and Staying in Love

quote: What people are really after is, what is my stance on religion or spirituality or God? And I would say, if I find a word that came closest, it would be agnostic.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: I live my life in growing orbits which move out over the things of the world.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Over time, repetition brings perfection, which brings success.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: THREE BASIC TRUTHSThree things have a limited threshold: Time, pain, and death.While truth, love, and knowledge –Are boundless.Three things are needed For humanity to co-exist:Truth, peace and basic needs.Everything else -Is irrelevant.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: It's just high school, man. Those guys are just high school guys, and in ten years they're going to be working for people like me. I know that. I just have to make it through two more years.
author: Cynthia Hand, The Last Time We Say Goodbye

quote: An ordinary man gets arrogant with beauty, conceited with knowledge and ruthless with power.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Don't give up all your romance, Anne," he whispered shyly, "a little bit is a good thing - not too much, of course, but keep a little of it, Anne, keep a little of it.
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of Green Gables

quote: I connect with the world of flora and experience the bliss of that connection!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Humor is rare in science fiction... there's so little of it that it automatically reminds you of other heroes with that acerbic humor when you find it.
author: John Scalzi

quote: If you wish to fear nothing  consider that everything is to be feared.
author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quote: What might be considered loyalty in onesociety might not necessarily be the same for another.
author: Gloria D. Gonsalves, I Am Tausi

quote: Don't let the cares of the day interfere with living the life that you desire.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: Tragedy of life: we want to possess more material wealth, but fail to enjoy the spiritual riches.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There is diversity of belief but it is the same God at work.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There is no hierarchy of values by which one culture has the right to insist on all its own values and deny those of another.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: Bear it in mind that people who do not take actions are not and cannot be leaders. Leadership is action.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

quote: That’s what being alive is, Thing! It’s being badly prepared for everything! Because you only get one chance, Thing!
author: Terry Pratchett, Diggers

quote: Loving yourself is required for authentic relationships.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Your dreams may have been buried inside of you for a long time because you were busy with things that needed to get done, but it is never too late to dare to dream.
author: Stephen Richards, Ask and the Universe Will Provide: A Straightforward Guide to Manifesting Your Dreams

quote: Sex is something I really don't understand too hot. You never know where the hell you are... Sex is something I just don't understand. I swear to God.
author: J.D. Salinger, The Catcher in the Rye

quote: The rules from those who are politically correct restrict what you can say to or about anything in our daily life. They tell you what to call others and what others can call you.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That

quote: Remember to be kind. Always.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Magician is the best storyteller in the world.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Most people, in my opinion, steal much of what they are. If they didn't what poor items they would be.
author: Julian Barnes, England, England

quote: Just like sweeping the streets, sweep the unnecessary things from your mind too; keep your mind clean!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: He that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.
author: Bible

quote: The only faithful tradition is change.
author: Ted Agon, The Human Key Condensed

quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
author: André Breton, Mad Love

quote: Trust means that they will never throw our pain and vulnerabilities in our face. Trust means we know they will protect us and our innermost thoughts and shared feelings without question.
author: Cathy Burnham Martin, The Bimbo Has Brains: And Other Freaky Facts

quote: We all want to be happier, more financially secure and to experience more rewarding relationships. We all dream of making something more of our lives. A mountain trail is a terrific place to make our biggest, boldest, brightest dreams come true.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: The moment you stop to think about whether you love someone, you've already stopped loving that person forever.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón, The Shadow of the Wind

quote: There are a thousand thoughts lying within a man that he does not know till he takes up the pen to write.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray, The History of Henry Esmond, Esq.

quote: As your lover describes you, so you are.
author: Jeanette Winterson, Sexing the Cherry

quote: Mrs. MacAndrew shared the common opinion of her sex that a man is always a brute to leave a woman who is attached to him, but that a woman is much to blame if he does.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Sometimes just getting up and moving is victory enough.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Trust is like sand, one lie and it slips away.
author: Saru Singhal

quote: What inspires you to do what you do is the reason why you persist, even in the face of trouble.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Reason

quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We have nothing to lose in this life: We came naked into the world and we will exit naked.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: We have these weapons of mass destruction on every street corner, and they're called donuts, cheeseburgers, French fries, potato chips, junk food. Our kids are living on a junk food diet.
author: Joel Fuhrman

quote: Our ability to choose is sacred. It’s what makes humans special.
author: Mark Andrew Poe, Ending Easter

quote: Only a positive mind can move the world forward.
author: Pearl Zhu, Thinkingaire: 100 Game Changing Digital Mindsets to Compete for the Future

quote: Unlike grownups  children have little need to deceive themselves.
author: Goethe

quote: If Galileo had said in verse that the world moved, the inquisition might have let him alone.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: Every time I thought I was being rejected from something good, I was actually being re-directed to something better.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: We've got exactly what we need to fulfill our destiny! The universe has designed us on purpose to who we are! We are God's MASTERPIECE! We are the most BEAUTIFUL thing in this universe!
author: Abhishek Kumar, Stardust Family - We Are One!

quote: Don't dig up in doubt what you planted in faith.
author: Elisabeth Elliot

quote: Peace of mind for five minutes, that's what I crave.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Triumphing over great difficulties can lead to great happiness.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Focus on good thoughts.Focus on wonderful moments.Focus on beautiful places.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Be kind, be all sympathy,For each and every human beingIs forced to fight against himself.
author: Sri Chinmoy, My Life's Soul-Journey: Daily Meditations for Ever-Increasing Spiritual Fulfillment

quote: An eagle can mock a lion only because of its wings.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: What makes me happy is just curling up in with my mom in her bed and watching a marathon of 'CSI' and 'Grey's Anatomy' episodes with pints of ice cream.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: There is forgiveness for every soul. Desire a new life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Before marriage, you lose your virginity. After marriage, you get to give it away. Which would you rather experience?
author: Todd Stocker

quote: With grace and gratitude, life is filled with endless gladness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Before passing judgementon someone’s choices,stop and look at the questionsthey were trying to answer.
author: Domonique Bertolucci

quote: Have you killed anyone?” she asked quickly.“What? Did you miss what I said, about turning murder intoan art form?”“But you haven’t actually killed anyone yet, have you? I readyour file.”He glowered. “Technically, yeah, all right, maybe I haven’t
author: Derek Landy, Playing with Fire

quote: Where can we go to find God if we cannot see Him in our own hearts and in every living being.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Nothing attunes you to the beauty of the quotidian like a man who decides not to kill you after all
author: David Mitchell, The Bone Clocks

quote: If you cannot teach me to fly, teach me to sing.
author: J.M. Barrie, Peter Pan

quote: Every great endeavour is fueled by great enthusiasm.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: May the gift of gratitude and power of attention be with you always
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: ​You can't Believe in Yourself, till People Believe in You.
author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

quote: A truly happy person is he who is happy without any reason.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you feel stuck in a hard time, jump-start a pro-change attitude by letting go of possessions that no longer work for you - like old clothes and old shoes.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Does Hallmark make a “Sorry I tried to drink your blood and touched you in a vaguely inappropriate manner” card? I settled for “How much do you remember?
author: Molly Harper, Nice Girls Don't Have Fangs

quote: Sometimes something that you've been asking forIt's just something that you could not see before. For it was something that made you belong,And that was there the whole time all along.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, A-Z of Happiness: Tips for Living and Breaking Through the Chain that Separates You from Getting That Dream Job

quote: Because your own strength is unequal to the task, do not assume that it is beyond the powers of man; but if anything is within the powers and province of man, believe that it is within your own compass also.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Wives are people who feel they don't dance enough.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: It's important to remember that peace, liberty and freedom changes many aspects in our thoughts as far as life is concerned.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Perhaps trust had to be accompanied by a measure of common sense, and a hefty dose of realism about human nature. But that would need a lot of thinking about, and the tea break did not go on forever.
author: Alexander McCall Smith, The Good Husband of Zebra Drive

quote: MORNINGTIDEThe wonderful works of morningtidebring the sight of luminous whiteness,a breathing whimsyamong wind-tossed sprigs of green.
author: Tara Estacaan

quote: One must give himself completely to his art and not hold back. Throw caution to the wind. Embrace the muse. Make love to your art.
author: Harley King

quote: To be happy, make others happy.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: To have a mission is to find the thing that you are fond of doing, a thing that you can do better than others
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Life is full of surprises but you are exactly where you are supposed to be. Start there.
author: Julieanne O'Connor, SPELLING IT OUT FOR YOUR CAREER

quote: You will be required to do wrong no matter where you go. It is the basic condition of life, to be required to violate your own identity.
author: Philip K. Dick, Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

quote: You become strong by lifting others up, not pulling them down.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: There is nothing Christ dislikes more than for His people to make a showpiece of Him and not to use Him.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: We are only human, and the gods have fashioned us for love. That is our great glory, and our great tragedy.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Game of Thrones

quote: Be happy today, let the past bury and let the future fly.
author: Girdhar Joshi, Some Mistakes Have No Pardon

quote: Ego-less, in time, you will no longer be God-less.
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: And what lesson can we draw from Volantene history?”“If you want to conquer the world, you best have dragons.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Dance with Dragons

quote: This world is a business venture and only those that mean business reap bountifully from it.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: For life, it doesn’t matter how much you earn and how you hold your different relationships, but what’s important for life is, what kind of progress, you have achieved from inside, while going through different aspects of life.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: Try and make it right, and if you can't, that's on them, not you. Forgiveness shouldn't be stockpiled by anyone. It should be given freely.
author: Karina Halle, The Lie

quote: Smartass Disciple: If there were two masters, which one should I listen to?Master of Stupidity: Use the ears to the one who looks so stupid, eyes to else.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: To hate someone just because he doesn't presume like you is big blunder.
author: M.H. Rakib

quote: And now it was official: I loved REI more than I loved the people behind Snapple lemonade.
author: Cheryl Strayed, Wild: From Lost to Found on the Pacific Crest Trail

quote: You have to conquer every obstacle, before you can reach the top of the mountain.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Having happy kids is far more important than anything they'll ever accomplish. Without happiness success and contentment is always hard to reach.
author: Ron Baratono

quote: Tradition means giving votes to the most obscure of all classes, our ancestors. It is the democracy of the dead. Tradition refuses to submit to the small and arrogant oligarchy of those who merely happen to be walking about.
author: G.K. Chesterton, Orthodoxy

quote: It is absolutely possible that the impossible is possible.
author: Ted Agon, The Human Key Condensed

quote: What you think about yourself is more important than what others think about you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Come out my friend. Come out from the narrow lanes of darkness into the vivacious light of the day.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Never again will I underestimate the greatness inside of me just because of the hate and limited thinking inside of others.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The fact that you are not perfect may come as a surprise to you but it is not a surprise to anyone else.
author: John Patrick Hickey, All You Have Is Now: How Your Approach to the World Determines Your Destiny

quote: YOU FEAR TO DIE?"It's not that I don't want... I mean, I've always...it's just that life is a habit that's hard to break...
author: Terry Pratchett, Reaper Man

quote: Correct teaching brings out human excellence.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: Most gothics are overplotted novels whose success or failure hinges on the author's ability to make you believe in the characters and partake of the mood.
author: Stephen King, Danse Macabre

quote: If you think you can stand to know what you’re made of, try kneeling before God.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Open the curtains of your mind! If there is light outside, it will come in; if there is light inside, it will go out! Keep the curtains open!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: I could run farther than a hare! I could fight the fiercest fox that ever lived...I could climb the highest mountain faster than an eagle could fly.
author: Erin Hunter, Outcast

quote: Life is infinitely stranger than anything which the mind of man could invent.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle, A Case of Identity

quote: A propensity to hope and joy is real riches one to fear and sorrow real poverty.
author: David Hume

quote: Art changes posture and posture changes innocent bystanders.
author: Seth Godin, Linchpin: Are You Indispensable?

quote: Music, when soft voices die, vibrates in the memory.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley, The Complete Poems

quote: Im.’ The monosyllable was heavy with contempt. ‘’E’s a twat.’‘Is he?’‘Yeah, ’e is. Ask Kieran.’She gave the impression that she and Kieran stood together, sane, dispassionate observers of the idiots populating Lula’s world.
author: Robert Galbraith, The Cuckoo's Calling

quote: It's the mind that sees, not eyes.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Men have called me mad; but the question is not yet settled, whether madness is or is not the loftiest intelligence.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: The courage to continue before the face of despair is the recognition in those eyes of darkness we find our own night vision. Women blessed with death-eyes are fearless.
author: Terry Tempest Williams, When Women Were Birds: Fifty-four Variations on Voice

quote: At first the solitudecharmed me like a prelude,but so much music wounded me.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: It isn't a bit of use my pretending I'm not crying, because I am... Pause to mop up. Better now.Perhaps it would really be rather dull to be married and settled for life. Liar! It would be heaven.
author: Dodie Smith, I Capture the Castle

quote: Reason is the natural order of truth but imagination is the organ of meaning.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: I have one top-notch baby with whom I am in love. It's a head-over-heels "first love" kind of thing, because I pay for everything and all we do is hold hands.
author: Tina Fey, Bossypants

quote: Wealth in money, mineral resources are not the real wealth. The true wealth of nation is the character of her people.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Sales can never be done with 'good' skills or 'good' communication or 'thorough' product knowledge.. It can only be done with PASSION and U gotta be a people loving person, to be alive in sales...
author: honeya

quote: When you battle with your conscience and lose, you win. -Henny Youngman, comedian and violinist (1906-1998)
author: Henny Youngman

quote: In the games of queens and kings, we leave our dreams at the door and we make do with what we have. Sometimes if we’re fortunate, we still manage to have a good life.
author: Melina Marchetta, Quintana of Charyn

quote: Confess your sins. God will cleanse you of all the wrongs done.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Why is it," he said, one time, at the subway entrance, "I feel I've known you so many years?""Because I like you," she said, "and I don't want anything from you.
author: Ray Bradbury, Fahrenheit 451

quote: The most tragic thing for a person is to have a very limited capacity in the matters of dream!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Those who know me never doubt me..Those who doubt me, never knew me.
author: Karen  Gibbs, A Gallery of Scrapbook Creations

quote: The love for books is a paradise.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The wolves knew when it was time to stop looking for what they'd lost, to focus instead on what was yet to come.
author: Jodi Picoult, Lone Wolf

quote: Success is a habit not an isolated event. Be passionate about success to cultivate it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Happiness depends  as Nature shows  less on exterior things than most suppose.
author: William Cowper

quote: Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Are you an idiot, or an idiot?' Gargarin hissed.'The first one. I really resent being called the second.
author: Melina Marchetta, Froi of the Exiles

quote: Morality without kindness is the most dangerous weapon.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: i didn't call myself a writer until everyone else did. i knew it was real then.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: It will take as long as it takes. Your work is to take the time and make the space. Everything else is beyond your influence.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: Darwin says people like you need to die.” (Carrow)
author: Kresley Cole, Wicked Deeds on a Winter's Night

quote: Whether it was in the maze of my fantastical mind or the allure of her gossamer eyes, they took me to undiscovered worlds of azure and metamorphosis. The air shimmered with every breath, the water tightened with every sound.
author: Hubert Martin

quote: When you forgive, you love. And when you love, God's light shines on you..
author: Jon Krakauer

quote: For my part, whatever anguish of spirit it may cost, I am willing to know the whole truth; to know the worst and to provide for it.
author: Patrick Henry

quote: Life is a long failure of understanding, a long, mistaken shutting of the heart.
author: Patricia Highsmith, Nothing That Meets the Eye: The Uncollected Stories of Patricia Highsmith

quote: I think music is what language once aspired to be. Music allows us to face God on our own terms because it reaches beyond life.
author: Simon Van Booy

quote: KEEP YOUR DREAMS ALIVE. KEEP YOURSELF ALIVE. Don’t just exist. Live. Thrive. Love. Share. Care. DARE!!
author: Abhishek Kumar, Stardust Family - We Are One!

quote: One certainty when you travel is the moment you arrive in a foreign country  the American dollar will fall like a stone.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: It will get easier each time, I think. I hope. I just have to keep trying.
author: Jenny Han, To All the Boys I've Loved Before

quote: Тhe gentle overcomes the rigid.The slow overcomes the fast.The weak overcomes the strong."…"Everyone knows that the yielding overcomes the stiff,and the soft overcomes the hard.Yet no one applies this knowledge.
author: Lao Tzu, Tao Te Ching

quote: To know God, know your heart (conscience). After you know your heart, you will learn to see God in all things. Truth can only be seen by those with Truth in them.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Every journey taken always includes the path not taken, the detour through hell, the crossroads of indecision and the long way home.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: We may fight for the cause of international peace because we are very fond of fighting.
author: G.K. Chesterton, Heretics

quote: I hate you, God. I hate you as though you actually exist.
author: Graham Greene, The End of the Affair

quote: I will show you all the ways in which you are easy to love.
author: R. Y.S. Perez, I Hope You Fall in Love: Poetry Collection

quote: The zeal to pray and desire to read the scriptures can transform many lives.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Living in harmony with one another brings inner tranquility
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: They say grief occurs in five stages. First there's denial followed by anger. Then comes bargaining, depression and acceptance. But grief is a merciless master. Just when you think you're free you realize you never stood a chance.
author: Emily Thorne

quote: Why am I a socialist? Simple: Because I believe in freedom.
author: Michelle Templet

quote: Parenting is a partnership. Loving each other has a big impact on your children.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: Always be humble and gentle with one another.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Time heals nothing. It only brings other issues and tissues, and takes what is incurable or unacceptable out of the center of our attention.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, The Tao of Physical and Spiritual

quote: Many do not see that not to have dreams is far worse than seeing that their dreams do not come true.
author: Luigina Sgarro

quote: Immortals are constrained by ancient rules. But a hero can go anywhere, challenge anyone, as long as he has the nerve.-Chiron
author: Rick Riordan

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy for ever: Its loveliness increases; it will never Pass into nothingness; but still will keep A bower quiet for us, and a sleep Full of sweet dreams, and health, and quiet breathing.
author: John Keats

quote: Life consists of books. All experiences are stories to be told and must be written.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: We begin to cultivate real love for ourselves when we treat ourselves with compassion.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection

quote: I continueto believe in miracles. But i know that miracles come to thosewho work very hard
author: Cinda Williams Chima, The Gray Wolf Throne

quote: We may speak about a place where there are no tears, no death, no fear, no night; but those are just the benefits of heaven. The beauty of heaven is seeing God.
author: Max Lucado, Experiencing the Heart of Jesus: Knowing His Heart, Feeling His Love

quote: The more we focus on who we are in Christ, the less it matters who we were in the past, or even what happened to us.
author: Joyce Meyer, Beauty for Ashes: Receiving Emotional Healing

quote: There is no excuse to give for being a beggar. We all have imaginations to work out our dreams. Work yours out.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, 101 Keys To Everyday Passion

quote: The greatest prison where most people live is the fear of what other people think and say
author: Osunsakin Adewale

quote: Let the beauty of sunrise, keep your heart warm.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: He felt gladness roar through his soul.
author: Stephen King, Misery

quote: If we encounter a man of rare intellect, we should ask him what books he reads.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Something will work out tomorrow, I thought. And if not, then tomorrow I'll do some thinking. Ob—la-di, ob-la-da, life goes on.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Your voice may not be loud today or be heard today, but make sure you are still standing on your feet.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: Don't be afraid of enemies who attack you. Be afraid of the friends who flatter you.
author: Dale Carnegie, How to Win Friends and Influence People

quote: You have mastered the art of discipline when you are able to act according to what you ultimately desire rather than how you feel in the present moment.
author: Mensah Oteh, Unlocking Life's Treasure Chest: Wisdom keys to keep you inspired, encouraged, motivated and focused

quote: Life is a book. We write in everyday existence.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Waste no time to compare yourself with others. Find your soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I had begun to think my ripening body would wither untasted on the vine.
author: Jacqueline Carey, Kushiel's Dart

quote: Which would you rather be if you had the choice--divinely beautiful or dazzlingly clever or angelically good?
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of Green Gables

quote: The existence of guilty sense is soimportant in education and religion.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Balance in life is the key to everything.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Learning to be complex is easy, but learning to be simple is most difficult.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Planning eliminates urgency by allowing you to bring your future into the present.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: I’m looking for youinto that silverspoon where I taste my reflection to feel the touch of your untouchables- from the poem "Looking For You
author: Munia Khan

quote: Art doesn’t bare itself to just anyone, but to believers called artists.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: Where they come in the perpetual spirit of giving - the house that love built.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Don't be carried away by beauty, for the faeces also stays in the rectum of ravishing faces, and their private life is not beautiful as their public life...fear beauty!
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: If, after I depart this vale, you ever remember me and have thought to please my ghost, forgive some sinner and wink your eye at some homely girl.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: You're going to come across people in your life who will say all the right words at all the right times. But in the end, it's always their actions you should judge them by. It's actions, not words, that matter.
author: Nicholas Sparks, The Rescue

quote: Is it really you this time, Kells?”“Well, I’m no maggoty corpse, if that’s what you mean.”He grinned. “That’s a relief. No maggoty corpse would be that sarcastic.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: My yesterdays walk with me. They keep step, they are gray faces that peer over my shoulder.
author: William Golding

quote: The Duke of Dunstable had one-way pockets. He would walk ten miles in the snow to chisel an orphan out of tuppence.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: You don’t have to like someone, but you have to treat them as you wish to be treated.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: If you move faster than the music, it will look strange; if you move slower than the music, it will look strange! Be like autumn leaves which follow exactly the rhythm of the wind!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The strength of a man is in his character. A strong man is great man of wisdom who understands, his top priority is to his family.
author: Ellen J. Barrier, The Price We Must Pay for Our Father's Sins

quote: Live life by the abc's...adventure, bravery and creativity.
author: James Thurber, The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

quote: You're a free man, act like it.
author: Mike Klepper

quote: I think the mystery of art lies in this, that artists’ relationship is essentially with their work — not with power, not with profit, not with themselves, not even with their audience.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: This world has been changing from time immemorial. But because it is “round” (subject to cycle of cause-effect), one cannot find an end to it.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The public wants work which flatters its illusions.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: He who does not know how to appreciate flowers will not be able to see the beauty of life
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The land created me. I'm wild and lonesome. Even as I travel the cities, I'm more at home in the vacant lots.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: My heart is warm with the friends I make,And better friends I'll not be knowing,Yet there isn't a train I wouldn't take,No matter where it's going.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay, The Selected Poetry

quote: You will never truly know yourself, or the strength of your relationships, until both have been tested by adversity.
author: J.K. Rowling, Very Good Lives: The Fringe Benefits of Failure and the Importance of Imagination

quote: Love is the softest rose in the soul's garden.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: In the weeks after 9/11, out of the pain and the fear there arose also grace and gratitude, eruptions of intense kindness that occurred everywhere, a sharp resolve to just be better, bigger, to shed the nonsense, rise to the occasion.
author: Nancy Gibbs

quote: Infidel  n: in New York  one who does not believe in the Christian religion  in Constantinople  one who does.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: As a mother, you need to remember that a loving and compassionate God is one hundred percent aware of your child’s situation.
author: Elizabeth George, Prayers to Calm Your Heart: Finding the Path to More Peace and Less Stress

quote: Well, I'm about as tall as a shotgun, and just as noisy.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Hope of God is fulfilled when the kingdom of God extends to all the earth
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The modern State, whether in a totalitarian or a democratic country, has far too much power, and we are probably right to fear it.
author: Anthony Burgess, A Clockwork Orange

quote: Marriage is the commodification of affection, copulation, and, reproduction.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: As soon as I read that, it clicked: that's my theater of war. It was exciting to think that I could write about World War Two from a totally new place.
author: Michael Chabon

quote: A man's life is what his thoughts make it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The hunger to know is the hope of search.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: In the days approaching Christmas, she always reminds me of the previous year: 'Jane crocheted you an entire poncho, and all you gave her was a bone-shaped beach stone.
author: Sara Baume, A Line Made by Walking

quote: True happiness... is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The Bible says that to have a friend we must show ourselves friendly. To that, I say, “Amen.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Lord heal the broken hearted.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The new electronic independence re-creates the world in the image of a global village.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: I am Butler. Anything I say sounds scary.
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: Every man thinks God is on his side. The rich and powerful know he is.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: The mind is its own place  and in itself Can make a heaven of hell  a hell of heaven.
author: John Milton

quote: Inspiration ends when reading ends.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Cowardice is the mother of cruelty.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: They can't tell so much about you if you got your eyes closed.
author: Ken Kesey, One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

quote: Everyone is a criminal! We are beset on all sides by antirevolutionary forces. Naturally, then, humans fall into three categories: the criminal, the not-yet-criminal, and the not-yet-caught.
author: Catherynne M. Valente, Deathless

quote: Trusting yourself means you believe in a higher divine power.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Whenever He answers prayers, God usually prioritizes those by people who, instead of their mouths, have prayed with their hands and/or feet.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Perhaps grief, which destroys all patterns, destroys even more: the belief that any patterns exist. But we cannot, I think, survive without such belief. So each of us must pretend to find, or re-erect, a pattern.
author: Julian Barnes

quote: The greatest of tragedies is a life lived without knowing its purpose. Discover your purpose and life will take on a new meaning.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: There is only one failure in life possible, and that is not to be true to the best one knows.
author: George Eliot

quote: The only thing more interesting than the truth is fiction dressed up as the truth.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Pessimism

quote: Knowledge is something which you can use. Belief is something which uses you.
author: Idries Shah, Reflections

quote: Let him who would move the world first move himself.
author: Socrates

quote: Those are my principles, and if you don't like them...well I have others.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: The greatest enemy of man is not sin, the enemy of man is not Satan, the greatest enemy is ignorance.
author: ANIKOR Daniel

quote: The facts of life do not penetrate to the sphere in which our beliefs are cherished; as it was not they that engendered those beliefs, so they are powerless to destroy them.
author: Marcel Proust, Swann's Way

quote: Kingdom laws do not change
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Anon, who wrote so many poems without signing them, was often a woman.
author: Virginia Woolf, A Room of One's Own

quote: Lack of independent thinking is lacking in confidence.
author: Pearl Zhu, 100 Creativity Ingredients: Everyone's Playbook to Unlock Creativity

quote: Quality is all about taking care of the details.
author: Rajen Jani, Once Upon A Time: 100 Management Stories

quote: She said my glasses made me look like a butch jock's locker room bitch.
author: Nenia Campbell, Bound to Accept

quote: Turn off the light to enter into the darkness and enlighten the world with the lights of your being.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It is so much easier to honour the leaders who are honourable.
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: The life of a man consists not in seeing visions and in dreaming dreams, but in active charity and in willing service.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Praise not the day until evening has come, a woman until she is burnt, a sword until it is tried, a maiden until she is married, ice until it has been crossed, beer until it has been drunk.
author: Michael Crichton, Eaters of the Dead

quote: It was his subconscious which told him this---that infuriating part of a person's brain which never responds to interrogation, merely gives little meaningful nudges and then sits humming quietly to itself, saying nothing.
author: Douglas Adams, The Long Dark Tea-Time of the Soul

quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Happiness is waking up, looking at the clock and finding that you still have two hours left to sleep.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: I saw this was the way of the future, to leave the past behind as if it were a dream.
author: Alice Hoffman, The Museum of Extraordinary Things

quote: Freedom is a spiritual-self liberty.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Against logic there is no armor like ignorance.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: When the moon kisses the stas in the silence with her lights of love, my heart dances with ecstasy and beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The higher consciousness feel the most pain because they search for the darkness in order to bring it to the light and thus feel the most pleasure.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: In my darkness, my pathway was marked by the brightness of light.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: In my deepest wound I saw your glory, and it dazzled me.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: Mind and spirit together make up that which separates us from the rest of the animal world, that which enables a man to know the truth and that which enables him to die for the truth.
author: Edith Hamilton

quote: When you believe and act on your dreams, your dreams will become a reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: He would eventually have to pass through the forest, but he felt no fear. Of course - the forest was inside him, he knew, and it made him who he was.
author: Haruki Murakami, After the Quake

quote: Being a good mother, it seemed to me, meant you ran the risk of losing your child.
author: Jodi Picoult, Handle with Care

quote: Life must be live daringly.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I am happy to be alive.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: True repentance is a turning from sin . . . Humanly speaking, it is our small part in the plan of salvation. Our part is repenting. God will do the converting, the transforming, and the forgiving.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Leave me alone in the long desert forever, and I won’t give up on my dreams.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: Relax and renew your mind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: There is no loss in any loss...if you recognize it!
author: Steven Chopade

quote: You reach a point where you don't work for money.
author: Walt Disney

quote: An innovative mind is never once bitten, twice shy.
author: Haresh Sippy

quote: Everything from the humble woodlouse to specks of dust moving through a ray of sunlight. Each tells a story.
author: Fennel Hudson, A Meaningful Life - Fennel's Journal - No. 1

quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.
author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: time is flying always when you're around love is hard to find don't let it slip away .........................
author: Sami Abouzid

quote: If a man realizes who he is, he is confident of his strength
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you live with values for yourself, then you become of great value to all who know you.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Without the emotion of the beautiful, the sublime, the mysterious, there is no art, no religion, no literature.
author: John Burroughs

quote: My preferences range from the gutter-like to the idyllically sublime, ideally with you roaming the range beside me...
author: Virginia Alison

quote: I like Kindness it's something the Government can't tax and it's free to give away that will return to you some day
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: Whatever situation you are in, you should find an opportunity to renew your strength in the Lord, so that your problems don’t affect your joy, your peace and rest.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I am an equation that only she solves, These X's and Y's by other names called, My way of division is desperatley flawed, while I multiply days without her.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, Linger

quote: Negative Confession is not a Choice of words but a Weakness
author: Samuel Asumadu-Sarkodie

quote: The best morale exist when you never hear the word mentioned. When you hear a lot of talk about it, it's usually lousy.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Faith can move mountains, Love can move man.
author: Alin Sav

quote: Fantastic ideas often come from fantasy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: One bright day in the last week of February, I was walking in the park, enjoying the threefold luxury of solitude, a book, and pleasant weather.
author: Anne Brontë, Agnes Grey

quote: Sisters in battle, I am shield and blade to you. As I breathe, your enemies will know no sanctuary. While I live, your cause is mine.
author: Leigh Bardugo, Wonder Woman: Warbringer

quote: The commencement of all labor consisted in the preparation of his own soul.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Lectures to My Students

quote: Before you believe in doubt; before you journey with doubt; before you go the way of doubt, first, go to faith with faith and seek permission from faith.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Against my will, in the course of my travels, the belief that everything worth knowing was known at Cambridge gradually wore off. In this respect my travels were very useful to me.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Walls get made, walls crumble, buildings get built, buildings collapse, memories get made, memories last.
author: Jill Telford

quote: When a great man stands on a land for a moment, the land becomes not just a great land for a moment, but a great landmark!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: It has been well said that an author who expects results from a first novel is in a position similar to that of a man who drops a rose petal down the Grand Canyon of Arizona and listens for the echo.
author: P.G. Wodehouse, Cocktail Time

quote: The political Greeders mindset wastes resources that could transform the future of tens of millions of people and the destinies of the countries.We need to rethink Leadership and politics.
author: Tony Dovale

quote: You are mine my precious.
author: Eyden I., Woman's Book: Only For Men

quote: I have waltzed with wolves and howled at the moon. But my heart will always remember the slow-dance that ended much too soon.
author: Alfa H, Abandoned Breaths

quote: Sometimes you need to loose in order to win.
author: Adele          Rose, Possession

quote: Passion often makes a madman of the cleverest man, and renders the greatest fools clever.
author: François de La Rochefoucauld

quote: When you gain maximum knowledge in any area of work and put it into practice, no powerwill be able to hinder you achieving your set goals.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When our environment changes we change, and this combination of transformative deeds create a synergistic effect. Seemingly, insignificant and imperceptible quantitative changes can eventfully lead to fundamental qualitative changes in the way a group of people function as a society.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: Too many riddles weigh men down on earth. We must solve as we can, and try to keep a dry skin in the water.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, The Brothers Karamazov

quote: Understanding is nothing else than conception caused by speech.
author: Thomas Hobbes

quote: Words to me were magic. You could say a word and it could conjure up all kinds of images or feelings or a chilly sensation or whatever. It was amazing to me that words had this power.
author: Amy Tan

quote: Every lover is a soldier.
author: Ovid, Amores

quote: Inspiration usually comes during work rather than before it.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: We must love those close to us, all the time, every day. Moments only happen once. Make them matter.
author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn

quote: A man can't soar too high, when he flies with his own wings.
author: William Blake

quote: The more you share unconditionally what others most need, the more you will receive what you most want.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D., Sleepers: A Little Book on How to Find Hope, Meaning and the Courage to Fall in Love with Your Dreams

quote: Fear enslaves us, Truth sets us free and the only Truth is the Oneness.
author: Human Angels

quote: No one can convince a man of his erring ways as persuasively as experience.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: I think I'm a natural-born leader. I know how to bow down to authority if it's authority that I respect.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: When we hear the bird sing, it hears only how to love. (Quand on entend l'oiseau chanter, - Lui n'entend que comment aimer.)
author: Charles de Leusse

quote: Be determined to fulfill your dreams.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Whilst some people inspire, others conspire!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: A person without a plan is a person with soggy dreams.
author: Ben Tolosa, Masterplan Your Success

quote: That's the thing about being the product of happily marries parents, You grow up thinking the fairy tale is real, and more than that, you think you're entitled to live it. So far, though, it wasn't working out as planned.
author: Nicholas Sparks, The Choice

quote: Appreciate every little improvement. Forget to criticize every failure as long as you are learning from them.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The pursuit of a greater self is a holy-being.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: To really change the world, we have to help people change the way they see things.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: He heapeth up riches  and knoweth not who shall gather them.
author: Bible

quote: Ultimately, who you choose to be in a relationship with and what you do in your bedroom is your business.
author: Eminem

quote: Self-praise is for losers. Be a winner. Stand for something. Always have class, and be humble.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Friendship/Relationship... all is about the deal and business... give or take!?
author: Deyth Banger

quote: He was deciding whether to cut her throat or love her forever.
author: Margaret Atwood, The Blind Assassin

quote: Education is a savings account that you fill by learning and by spending. Even if you spend for the rest of your life, it will only grow to give you joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A bore or an uggo might manage not to get up anyone's nose, but if a girl's got brains and looks and personality, she's going to piss someone off, somewhere along the way.
author: Tana French, Faithful Place

quote: The job of reflection is to add a dimension of fable to the reality!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: In the end things must be as they are and have always been--the great things remain for the great, the abysses for the profound, the delicacies and thrills for the refined, and, to sum up shortly, everything rare for the rare.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, Beyond Good and Evil

quote: You ought to give thanks to the Lord.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: I wasn't going to great schools, because my parents didn't believe in public education. They wanted the education to be influenced by their religion, so I was going to these halfway education-slash-Christian schools that were like pop-up shop-style education.
author: Katy Perry

quote: The real genesis is forbidden to me, vis-à-vis N´s inability to confess even the mildest transgressions.
author: Suzanne Finnamore, Split: A Memoir of Divorce

quote: Buying books would be a good thing if one could also buy the time to read them in: but as a rule the purchase of books is mistaken for the appropriation of their contents.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer, Counsels and Maxims

quote: The echo of a red roseat the sunset, you decidedto check out.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: In diversity is life and where there's life there's hope, was the general sum of his creed, a modest one to be sure.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Word for World is Forest

quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
author: Jules Renard

quote: That time we separated was my idea. I thought, well, I'm fifty years old and there might be someone else out there. People waste their happiness - that's what makes me sad. Everyone's so scared to be happy.

quote: And that's that as you get older, you lose things, things you don't necessarily want to lose.
author: Meg Cabot, Forever Princess

quote: The only recourse for an escape artist from world affairs is to explore their inner sanctum where hopes, dreams, insecurities, and despair collide.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: The world will never know you because you did not drain all your potentials to the last drop
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Why can't we breathe now, In this moment we have breath?
author: Jenim Dibie

quote: You hit me again," I said, growing oddly annoyed."Ya think?" Evil Riggs said. Smart-ass."Part of my brain hurts. I demand to know what that part of my brain is called and what its job is.
author: Darynda Jones, Second Grave on the Left

quote: Until the ‘wrong belief’ leaves, we will continue to be robbed.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: I have enough of everything.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I decided to find you, throw myself at your feet, and beg you to have mercy on me. Honestly, I’ll accept whatever you choose, Kelsey. Just don’t ask me to live apart from you again. Because...I can’t.
author: Colleen Houck, Tiger's Quest

quote: Be truly romantic even when you are alone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The situation and the people you meet in everyday life are designed by God for your future. So follow Him because He alone knows what’s best for your well being.
author: Latika Teotia

quote: All I want to do is change the world.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: People’s mind becomes their boss and torments them. So what would become of the one who believes he can be the boss [control] of the mind of others?
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Can we go back to using Facebook for what it was originally for - looking up exes to see how fat they got?
author: Bill Maher

quote: You cannot defeat darkness by running from it, nor can you conquer your inner demons by hiding them from the world. In order to defeat the darkness, you must bring it into the light.
author: Seth Adam Smith, Rip Van Winkle and the Pumpkin Lantern

quote: Peace without truth is nothing but an illusion – a deceptive misguidance which generates opportunities and problems to chew the sweet and bitter tastes of evil respectively.
author: Nilantha Ilangamuwa

quote: You're like a dream I never want to wake up from, but I; I'm insomniac!

quote: with your love I forget about my problems, and by your side everything is better
author: Auliq Ice

quote: My message to the international community is that our silence and complicity especially on the situation in Gaza shames us all. It is almost like the behaviour of the military junta in Burma
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Trust everyone and love everyone, you will never lose.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The exhausted mind is obsession's easiest prey.
author: Stephen King, Lisey's Story

quote: If you decide not to take action, you are going to fail, and even if you do take action, if you can’t keep up your motivation, you will simply end up back where you started.
author: Steve Backley, The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Watch your manner of speech if you wish to develop a peaceful state of mind. Start each day by affirming peaceful, contented and happy attitudes and your days will tend to be pleasant and successful.

quote: It would be advisable to realize that we will eventually become whatever it is that we’ve created. And too often what we’ve created is a massive mess.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Your time and your true relevance are just like your shadow, the more you take steps into the darkness, the more they disappear!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Free drinks have no carbs.
author: Nicki Elson, When It Hooks You

quote: You should never hate anyone, even your worst enemies. Everyone has something good about them. You have to find the redeeming quality and love the person for that.

quote: He who loved himself became great in himself, and he who loved others became great through his devotion, but he who loved God became greater than all.
author: Søren Kierkegaard, Fear and Trembling

quote: Sympathy is imagining the pain. Empathy is having suffered through it first.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: It's risky most of the time, but its better to listen to your heart.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett, Friends 2 Lovers V.2: Closed Doors Open

quote: The power of the Lord changes all circumstances
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: It is interesting to note how many of the great scientific discoveries begin as myths.

quote: In Heaven  all the interesting people are missing.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: As long as there is greed (desire) for even a single situation, one will have to come back into the world and wandering will continue until then.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The female brain is engineered to avoid conflicts at all cost, whereas the male brain pleasures conflicts in the purpose of being the boss.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Love, God & Neurons: Memoir of a scientist who found himself by getting lost

quote: The power of fiction is a great thing. But, after all, reality is just a little more important.
author: S.A. Tawks, The Spirit of Imagination

quote: The key to every human heart is love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It is our business to proffer solution to the problem of the society.
author: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

quote: Alchemy: In times of recession it's not wise to argue about the price of gold.
author: Robin Sacredfire

quote: I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles but today it means getting along with people.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I'd Drown For YouI opened my heart to youA complete immersionI offered my soul to youA heavenly diversion
author: Muse, Enigmatic Evolution

quote: Sometimes it's easier to go on living, not even knowing who you are, when at least you know precisely where you are while you go on not knowing.
author: Fredrik Backman, Britt-Marie Was Here

quote: Be as humble as you need to convince people that you are not Jesus.
author: Alin Sav

quote: The will to dare, the power to act.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: ... there is something revolting about the way girls' minds so often jump to marriage long before they jump to love. And most of those minds are shut to what marriage really means.
author: Dodie Smith, I Capture the Castle

quote: I can't deal with someone wanting to take a relationship backward or needing space or cheating on you.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Be positive with every idea surrounding your dreams. Think about the possibility of what you plan to do and approach it with an optimistic action. Stay positively.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Shaping the dream

quote: The master's tools will never dismantle the master's house
author: Audre Lorde

quote: When faced with many rejections, don’t give up. Hold fast to your dreams and keep up with sacred-work, you will succeed in the sacred-time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The closer you get to your past the sooner you realize it was never present
author: Bluenscottish

quote: Get rid of the judgmental mindset and adopt one of love and acceptance towards people – including yourself.

quote: I think you should always bear in mind that entropy is not on your side.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I have always found that mercy bears richer fruits than strict justice.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: True love is the tide that pulls out to sea, but always returns to kiss the shore at sunrise.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: You never require a teacher to lead you into the wrong path, but you do require a kindly word to conduct you aright.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: Everything comes down so pasteurizedeverything comes down 16 degreesthey say your amplifier is too loudturn your amplifier downare we high all alone on our kneesmemory is just hips that swinglike a clockthe past projects fantastic scenestic/toc tic/toc tic/tocfuck the clock!
author: Patti Smith, Babel

quote: She could and had faced an armed laser in the hands of a mad mutant mercenary with less fear than she faced such unswerving emotion...
author: J.D. Robb, Immortal in Death

quote: If the baser instinct of rampant self-preservation adamantly refuses to surrender itself to the infinitely greater call of self-sacrifice, in attempting to save our lives we will have in reality completely destroyed our lives.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Your love awakens my spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: You cannot describe the beauty of nature in words, you cannot capture the feeling of God in camera. Its about the moment you set yourself free and live it.
author: Mahrukh

quote: There's no way to know what's going to happen, Folly. But we'll blood well be on our feet when it does.
author: Jim Butcher, The Aeronaut's Windlass

quote: a man was on his way to the gallows when he met another, who asked him: where are you going, my friend? and the condemned man replied: i'm not going anywhere. they're taking me by force.
author: José Saramago, The Year of the Death of Ricardo Reis

quote: It is sad to love and be unloved, but sadder still to be unable to love.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck, Maurice Maeterlinck - Wisdom and Destiny, & The Wrack of the Storm

quote: ... You are ignorant of the duties you undertake in marrying...
author: Emily Brontë, Wuthering Heights

quote: If you want to find a reason to smile, to find a reason to be happy, learn to appreciate the beauty that surrounds you.
author: Lionel Suggs

quote: It takes time;It will take time, But it will happen
author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

quote: A cold wind was blowing from the north, and it made the trees rustle like living things.
author: George R.R. Martin, A Game of Thrones

quote: Where love rules, there is no will to power; and where power predominates, there love is lacking. The one is the shadow of the other.
author: Carl Jung

quote: When God holds the Crayons you can expect a masterpiece.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: To tell your soul that you love it, is like remembering who you are after being in a coma for a hundred years. Your face will beam the light of a hundred galaxies.

quote: We begin to change the world when we stimulate long-term prosperity using technology. There is not a problem that's large enough that innovation and entrepreneurship can't solve.

quote: It is wisdom to recognize necessity when all other courses have been weighed, though as folly it may appear to those who cling to false hope.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Fellowship of the Ring

quote: Set within the seed of the soul is not jut a fleeting image or a vague pattern but a lifelong story enfolded within, waiting to be cracked open and lived all the way out.

quote: When face with any problem, do not panic, but pray. You will find the peace to overcome the pain.

quote: Ye ask  and receive not  because ye ask amiss.

quote: If this generation doesn't end...then change towards a better one will be delayed.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain.
author: Maya Angelou, Wouldn't Take Nothing for My Journey Now

quote: If you remain dependent on your parents all your life, do not carry a wrong pretence that you are even born.

quote: Afterwards, when it's all over, you meet God. What do you say to God?
author: Yann Martel, Beatrice and Virgil

quote: Those that care for their career, more than their relationship, can find themselves alone.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: To control yourself, control your fear first.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If it ain't a pleasure, it ain't a poem.
author: William Carlos Williams

quote: If you eat the standard Western diet that most people eat in the modern world, it's quite likely you will develop heart disease.
author: Joel Fuhrman

quote: The greatest grace shall be harmony in human relations.

quote: Not lovelier. But a different kind of loveliness. There are so many kinds of loveliness.
author: L.M. Montgomery, The Blue Castle

quote: If you are still breathing, do not stop learning.

quote: You have not studied the histories of ancient times, and perhaps know not the life that breathes in them; a soul of beauty and wisdom which had penetrated my heart of hearts.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley, Valperga: Or, the Life and Adventures of Castruccio, Prince of Lucca

quote: John: 'Have mercy. I don't want to die!'Sita: 'Then you should never have been born.
author: Christopher Pike, Phantom

quote: Without the will or desire to achieve one is like flotsam on the oceans of time.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: The aim of science is not to open the door to infinite wisdom, but to set a limit to infinite error.
author: Bertolt Brecht, Life of Galileo

quote: As repressed sadists are supposed to become policemen or butchers so those with an irrational fear of life become publishers.

quote: War makes rattling good history  but Peace is poor reading.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: When you come out of the storm you won't be the same person that walked in. That's what the storm is all about.

quote: People must make make risks, must make mess in their life's. They must make make mistakes, they must think - This is the part of the proccess "learning"!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: One cannot get rid of a good education, nor, unfortunately, of a bad one, which often is such because one has not wanted to defray the expenses of a good one.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: With the strength of grace, we can survive any situation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Frisbeetarianism is the belief that when you die, your soul goes up on the roof and gets stuck.
author: George Carlin

quote: Life, wherever it leads,Will always be the same,It begs for the best of you.
author: Scott Hastie

quote: Experience is the only subject worthwhile of study.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: As long as you know men are like children, you know everything!
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Great companies are built on great products.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Do not take the grace of God for granted.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: So holding many factors constant, we find that living in a civilization reduces one’s chances of being a victim of violence fivefold.
author: Steven Pinker, The Better Angels of Our Nature: Why Violence Has Declined
