quote: Emotions don't distract high performers.
author: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

quote: Reading is more important than writing.
author: Roberto Bolaño, The Last Interview and Other Conversations

quote: A deeper intimacy with God sharpens our awareness of sin, which causes a stronger need for grace and a freer offering of mercy.
author: Alisa Hope Wagner, Eve of Awakening

quote: The pleasure of reading is the greatest solitude.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: All businesses begin and end with their company culture.
author: Amber Hurdle, The Bombshell Business Woman: How to Become a Bold, Brave, and Successful Female Entrepreneur

quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Why would anyone want perfection when growth comes from flaws?
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Work on what is real rather than worry about what is unreal.
author: Elizabeth George, Loving God with All Your Mind

quote: The Man in Black fled across the desert, and the Gunslinger followed
author: Stephen King, The Gunslinger

quote: Hope does not leave without being given permission.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: There is a difference between working hard to create a life that truly serves you and working hard to create a life that you’ve been told you should want.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset

quote: But beauty, real beauty, ends where an intellectual expression begins. Intellect is in itself a mode of exaggeration, and destroys the harmony of any face.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: as they die, the ones we love, we lose our witnesses, our watchers, those who know and understand the tiny little meaningless patterns, those words drawn in water with a stick. And there is nothing left but the endless flow.
author: Anne Rice

quote: Chance is perhaps the pseudonym of God when he did not want to sign.
author: Anatole France

quote: To be effective in fulfilling your goals, you must break them down into little tasks and then spend most of your time working on the task in front of you, instead of being overwhelmed by the enormity of the big goal.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button", great story, great film.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Women, we might as well be dogs baying the moon as petitioners without the right to vote!
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Learn to handle books, you will learn how to enjoy life.
author: Aman Jassal, Rainbow - the shades of love

quote: There are many more books to read, when will I finish reading?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: ... you should never give yourself a chance to fall apart because, when you do, it becomes a tendency and it happens over and over again. You must practice staying strong, instead.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Eat, Pray, Love

quote: Our most important problem is that we can talk to express our thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I am the seeker of love, I am the giver of love, and I became the love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Scarlett kicked the coverlet in impotent rage, trying to think of something bad enough to say.'God's nightgown!' she cried at last, and felt somewhat relieved.
author: Margaret Mitchell, Gone with the Wind

quote: Transition isn't pretty, but stagnation is hideous.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: And this that you call solitude is in fact a big crowd.
author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Shape

quote: Great struggles make for great stories.
author: Sanober  Khan

quote: Wherever you go, go with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Thank God for imminent doomsday.
author: Jim Butcher, Cold Days

quote: Only loving people who love you isn’t profitable
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Whitney Houston’s cover of “I Will Always Love You” was constantly on my FM Walkman radio around that time. I think that made me cry because I associated it with absolutely no one.
author: Tina Fey, Bossypants

quote: You have to grow. You have to be. You have to love yourself unconditionally.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: You can't learn everything you need to know legally.
author: John Irving, A Widow for One Year

quote: When truth has no burning, then it is philosophy, when it gets burning from the heart, it becomes poetry.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: No coward soul is mine,No trembler in the world's storm-troubled sphere:I see heaven's glories shine,And faith shines equal, arming me from fear
author: Emily Brontë

quote: Glory to the the Great God!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: With the world's fate resting on your shoulder - you're gonna need someone on your side.You can't do it by yourself any longer - you're gonna need someone on your side.
author: Morrissey

quote: If only I could change the world around me, perhaps my truth won’t one day be the end of me.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing

quote: Honoring your word is the fiber from which trust is built.
author: David W. Earle

quote: It is not giving up, it is accepting. And the light will enter. Always does.
author: Kamal Ravikant, Live Your Truth

quote: It was a prayer that he had never said before, because it was a prayer without words or pleas.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Suffering is the sorrow of joy.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: History's got no bows on it, only frayed ends of ribbons and knots that can't be untied.
author: Orson Scott Card, Alvin Journeyman

quote: Love is what we are born with. Fear is what we learn.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: The first qualification for a historian is to have no ability to invent.
author: Stendhal

quote: Disappointment over love affairs generally has the effect of driving men to drink, and women to ruin; and this, because most people never learn the art of transmuting their strongest emotions into dreams of a constructive nature.
author: Napoleon Hill, Think and Grow Rich: The Landmark Bestseller - Now Revised and Updated for the 21st Century

quote: The way you see people is the way you treat them and the way you treat them is what they become.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Other people's eyes are limitless and that's what scares me.
author: Sophie Kinsella, Finding Audrey

quote: Sometimes people outside of your people act more like your people than your people.
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quote: Romantic love allows you to focus mating energy. Attachment sustains that relationship as long as necessary to raise your baby.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: Greatness has a fragrance. Get close to it and that fragrance will arouse your potential.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: The quality of your life is a direct reflection of the quality of the decisions you make each day.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: As long as politics is the shadow of big business, the attenuation of the shadow will not change the substance.
author: John Dewey

quote: IF [GOD] HAS SPOKEN, WHY IS THE UNIVERSE NOT CONVINCED?
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley, The Necessity of Atheism

quote: When you find out the field you were gifted, what you were created for, you will not have to work hard and sweat it out
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Great griefs exhaust. They discourage us with life. The man into whom they enter feels something taken from him. In youth, their visit is sad; later on, it is ominous.
author: Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

quote: Be oblivious to city high-rises, work-related stress and microwave popcorn.
author: Fennel Hudson, Wild Carp - Fennel's Journal - No. 4

quote: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one's own relations.
author: Oscar Wilde, A Woman of No Importance

quote: While sitting in the darkness in complete silence, I never realized how much there was to see and hear. There is sight and sound in darkness and silence. Learn to look and listen.
author: Bobby F. Kimbrough Jr.

quote: Hope opens the door of opportunity and shines the way to possibilities.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The power of a corrupt government is located in the ignorance and indifference of its people - rjs
author: rassool jibraeel snyman

quote: When you put fear behind the wheel, you're bound to crash, but when you drive in faith the ride will be rough, but preceding into a journey of your lifetime.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: My dear young cousin, if there's one thing I've learned over the eons, it's that you can't give up on your family, no matter how tempting they make it.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: The world is your exercise book, the pages on which you do your sums. It is not reality, though you may express reality there if you wish. You are also free to write lies, or nonsense, or to tear the pages.
author: Richard Bach, Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah

quote: No counsel is more sincere than that given on ships which are in danger.
author: Leonardo da Vinci, Thoughts on Art and Life

quote: Follow your heart. Then root its longing with the facts.
author: Gina Greenlee, Postcards and Pearls: Life Lessons from Solo Moments on the Road

quote: Definitions from Mulla Do-Piaza. Worry: Something to make you unnecessarily ill.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: Let certain things be uncertain.Appreciate the puzzle that life is,insofar as I know, after a scheme of steps,all Crosswords have a solution,and every Sudoku makes a lot of sense.
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: As long as you're in the food business, why not make sweets?
author: Anne Frank, The Diary of a Young Girl

quote: You thought too hard. Same with travel. You can't work too much at it, or it feels like work. You have to surrender yourself to the chaos. To the accidents.
author: Gayle Forman, Just One Day

quote: One who is lost cannot show others the way.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: People Die...Beauty Fades...Love Changes...And You Will Always Be Alone
author: L.J. Smith, Night World, No. 3

quote: Asia is an entertainment, Europe is a dream, America is an imprisonment and Rest is a nightmare.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: someday i will walk under the soul-blossom tree with my hand eternally woven in yours.
author: Sanober  Khan

quote: Even though we know we have to let you go, our hearts are singing the song no- no- no. We can’t let you go.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Only death consistently excites your emotions, whether contemplating when life is safe and stale, or fleeing it when life is threatened and precious
author: Yann Martel, Life of Pi

quote: Don't turn your back on your own happiness just to hug your pride.
author: Nora Roberts, Enchanted

quote: Strengthen yourself in the word of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The white flower of a blameless life.
author: Lord Alfred Tennyson

quote: How much others love you is not very important, but how much you love yourself will define your success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Yesterday was just the tip of the iceberg of awesomeness. Things will get better. Keep smiling, don't give up just yet. Perseverance has an amazing gift for you, just wait you see.
author: Janna Cachola

quote: The best lies are based on thetruth, at least in part
author: Cassandra Clare, Clockwork Angel

quote: Artist is not human, but humanity.
author: Raheel Farooq

quote: Ear demons are totally real," Cody said. "They're what make microphones like these ones work. They're also what tell you to eat the last slice of pie when you know Tia wanted it.
author: Brandon Sanderson, Steelheart

quote: Just because I like to suck cock doesn't make me any less American than Jesse Helms.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: Jealousy is love in competition.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Often our self-esteem is tied to our work. In our culture, men and women often define themselves by the jobs they hold . . . But a person’s job tells you nothing about a person’s character or value.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Be yourself. That is where you should always be.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: For love to flourish there has to be trust. Promises don’t matter as much aspersonal choice.
author: Ann Aguirre, Aftermath

quote: To expand your wings, be persistent in learning new things.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The secret of happiness is freedom but to be totally free you need to earn: courage, persistence and boldness.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: The evil that is in the world almost always comes of ignorance, and good intentions may do as much harm as malevolence if they lack understanding.
author: Albert Camus

quote: You can feel creative tension when you sense the freedom to be creative, the harmony not via compliance only, but through brainstorming.
author: Pearl  Zhu, Unpuzzling Innovation: Mastering Innovation Management in a Structural Way

quote: Not until your heart and mind comes into a total agreement for the approval of your true purpose on earth, you shall least unleash your full energy and true strength to accomplish your true mission with enthusiasm and full tenacity.
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Art  as far as it is able  follows nature  as a pupil imitates his master  thus your art must be  as it were  God's grandchild.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Treasure the beauty of youthful life and the wisdom of adulthood.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When the uncertain future becomes the past, the past in turn becomes uncertain.
author: Mohsin Hamid, Moth Smoke

quote: Effort is the foundation of all achievements and is the single greatest competitive advantage and quality you must consistently apply to achieve your dreams.
author: Mensah Oteh, The Good Life: Transform your life through one good day

quote: Adversity gives life the thrill of adventure.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: fanaticism is the only way to put an end to the doubts that constantly trouble the human soul.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Zahir

quote: Sharing will enrich everyone with more knowledge.
author: Ana Monnar

quote: It is only your dreams that will keep you alive.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The essence of life is finding something you really love and then making the daily experience worthwhile.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: We are told to let our light shine, and if it does, we won't need to tell anybody it does. Lighthouses don't fire cannons to call attention to their shining - they just shine.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: It was like being leaned on by a very heavy, warm brick. A sexy brick.
author: Patricia Briggs, Iron Kissed

quote: People today are still living off the table scraps of the sixties. They are still being passed around - the music and the ideas.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: And now we who are writing women and strange monstersStill search our hearts to find the difficult answers,Still hope that we may learn to lay our handsMore gently and more subtly on the burning sands.
author: May Sarton, Selected Poems

quote: To show our commitment to the future means to dedicate our time, efforts, resources, saving nature and to develop nice thoughts for better thinking.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: A single recipe holds countless stories.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Place yourself in the middle of the stream of power and wisdom which animates all whom it floats, and you are without effort impelled to truth, to right and a perfect contentment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, Spiritual Laws

quote: I need someone who is willing to watch me brave the ocean and then dare me not to drown.
author: Colleen Hoover, Maybe Someday

quote: The most meaningful prayer is kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Unfathomable mind: now beacon, now sea.
author: Samuel Beckett, Molloy, Malone Dies, The Unnamable

quote: Sometime they'll give a war and nobody will come.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Platonic Love is a fool's name for the affection between a disability and a frost.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: A single tiny light creates a space where darkness cannot exist. The light vanquishes the darkness. Try as it might, the darkness cannot conquer the light.
author: Donald L. Hicks, Look into the stillness

quote: Relatable escapism can only be achieved using facets of the real world.
author: Kevin Focke

quote: Though you are as a drop in the ocean, without you, the universe would be empty.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You may hear bad words but you always use soft words that carry the air of flowers!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: I am a feminist because in every woman I can see reflection of my mother.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What's another word for thesaurus?
author: Steven Wright

quote: Invest your time and add value to your life because that is the only way to greatness.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: Notice how extraordinary your life truly is. It’s filled with love. Open your heart to it.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree, Joyful Living: 101 Ways to Transform Your Spirit and Revitalize Your Life

quote: Life is not so short but that there is always time enough for courtesy.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Once you figure out what you want in life—expect nothing less.
author: Lorii Myers, Make It Happen, A Healthy, Competitive Approach to Achieving Personal Success

quote: A Christian is the person who studies the life of Christ and carries His image in himself in order to be like Him
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Empathy? What’s that?” Glokta winced as he rubbed at his aching leg. “It’s a sad fact, but pain only makes you sorry for yourself.
author: Joe Abercrombie, Before They Are Hanged

quote: It is only once you see the baffled expression on the face of your enemy when you give his cruel words a warm smile that you’ll understand, truly understand, what love is all about.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: Wherever there is a settled society, religion is necessary; the laws cover manifest crimes, and religion covers secret crimes.
author: Voltaire

quote: Time waits for no man"That is what they say.That is why our time spent together,is so special in so, so many ways.
author: Anthony T Hincks

quote: So, what if, instead of thinking about solving you whole life, you just think about adding additional good things. One at a time. Just let your pile of good things grow.
author: Rainbow Rowell, Attachments

quote: Almost everything carried to its logical extreme becomes either depressing or carcinogenic.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: As Moses threw whatever in his hand on the ground,so does hand should do what it can to earn miracles.
author: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Indeed, of the major religions, Islam offers no discernible sliver of valid notion for How Life Works.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer, Essence of Reality: A Clear Awareness of How Life Works

quote: For most of the people there is no today and there is no tomorrow; for them, there is only the past times! Leave your past to live your today and to live your tomorrow!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The words were good words, Ulysses felt, maybe even great words, but the list was very incomplete. He was just getting started. The words needed to be arranged, fussed with, put in the order of his heart.
author: Kate DiCamillo, Flora and Ulysses: The Illuminated Adventures

quote: No jewels, save my eyes, do I own, but I have a rose which is even softer than my rosy lips. And a quiet youth said: 'There is nothing softer than your heart.' And I lowered my gaze...
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: What destroys us most effectively is not a malign fate but our own capacity for self-deception and for degrading our own best self.
author: George Eliot, Adam Bede

quote: There are moments of existence when time and space are more profound, and the awareness of existence is immensely heightened.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: It is the uncertainty of life that fills life with magnificence and beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: ‎By reacting from fear instead of responding from love, you inject poison directly into the veins of your relationship.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I am loving. I am forgiving.I am at peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Even freed men will do what they must in Rome.
author: Katlyn Charlesworth, While Rome Burned

quote: Poetry of the universe is written with flowers and the lights of love on a canvas we call earth.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: ...even misplaced faith can help us gain knowledge. We try to be smart about where we put our faith and we adjust as we learn more.
author: Brandon Mull, Chasing the Prophecy

quote: It's all very well to tell us to forgive our enemies; our enemies can never hurt us very much. But oh, what about forgiving our friends?
author: Willa Cather, My Mortal Enemy

quote: Death is not the end of life but the beginning of eternal life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Have I told you I love you?" he whispers.I smile. "Not since this morning.""Unforgivable. I will tell you every hour of every day.
author: Jessica Khoury, The Forbidden Wish

quote: Entrepreneur, if your going to start up, make sure you start up with excellence in mind.
author: Onyi Anyado

quote: The writer's secret is not inspiration - for it is never clear where it comes from - it is his stubbornness, his patience.
author: Orhan Pamuk

quote: It is not enough to be busy so are the ants. The question is: What are we busy about?
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: God holds the key to every door.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Dogs do not have many advantages over people, but one of them is extremely important: euthanasia is not forbidden by law in their case; animals have the right to a merciful death.
author: Milan Kundera, The Unbearable Lightness of Being

quote: I had killed our careful relationship by driving my tongue through its heart and pushing it off a cliff.
author: Jeff Lindsay, Darkly Dreaming Dexter

quote: Friendship is almost always the union of a part of one mind with a part of another  people are friends in spots.
author: George Santayana

quote: Mind is not your brain, but mind is subtle clothing that is spread over your entire physical body and doesn’t limit itself only with the physical part of the brain.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: My father is an amazing man.
author: Sherman Alexie

quote: In your journey of life, stick to relevance, don’t stay stuck! Keep improving yourself until your opportunity comes.
author: Bidemi Mark-Mordi

quote: An ounce of wisdom is worth more than a pound of knowledge.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: I'm sorry I left without telling you," she says. "I wasn't ready. I wanted it so much, and I wasn't ready for that.
author: Nina LaCour, You Know Me Well

quote: The world is full enough of hurts and mischances without wars to multiply them.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Return of the King

quote: Believe in miracles as if there's no work, but work as if there are no miracles. When miracles and hard work come together success is certain.
author: Val Uchendu

quote: Leadership does not always wear the harness of compromise.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: You are most beautiful when your eyes are glowing with kindness and joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be creative you must set aside both certainty and doubt.
author: Pearl Zhu, Thinkingaire: 100 Game Changing Digital Mindsets to Compete for the Future

quote: My whole life was about her, what if her whole life wasn’t all about me?
author: Jodi Picoult, The Pact

quote: Marriage is the harmony of God synchronizing two wills with the will of the Father.
author: Ravi Zacharias, I, Isaac, Take Thee, Rebekah: Moving from Romance to Lasting Love

quote: Dear and most respected bookcase! I welcome your existence, which has for over one hundred years been devoted to the radiant ideals of goodness and justice.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: Your calling is important, regardless of its status or other people’s opinion
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Happiness is surrounding yourself only with those who bestow their unconditional love and support.
author: Ken Poirot

quote: I have always thought that all philosophical debates are ultimately between the partisans of structure and the partisans of "goo.
author: Alan W. Watts, The Essential Alan Watts

quote: And courage to me meant ploughing through that dull gray mist that comes down on life--not only overriding people and circumstances but overriding the bleakness of living.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Offshore Pirate

quote: My best friend is me, and I take good care of me.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Take the risk! You will find the right road.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you would convince a man that he does wrong, do right. But do not care to convince him. Men will believe what they see. Let them see.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If you have enjoyed something, but have never experienced joy, then u have not really been happy
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: As soon as you see the need to change your partner to save the relationship, it is then time to end it.
author: Charles F. Glassman

quote: Never confuse belief with knowledge.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: You never go away from us, yet we have difficulty in returning to You. Come, Lord, stir us up and call us back. Kindle and seize us. Be our fire and our sweetness. Let us love. Let us run.
author: Augustine of Hippo, Confessions

quote: Strange to hear atheists say 'god' when having great sex.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Silence is a lie that screams at the light.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Worries and sufferings are helpful for (one’s) spiritual development.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Boredom always precedes a period of great creativity.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: You see, the mailman saw your husband during one of his walks.""He's my fiancé," I told her. "We are living in sin."Heather blinked, momentarily knocked off her stride, but recovered. "Oh, that's nice.""It's very nice. I highly recommend it.
author: Ilona Andrews, Magic Shifts

quote: Bitterness leads to brokenness in spirit.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A man without regrets cannot be cured.
author: Aristotle, The Nicomachean Ethics

quote: Ever let the Fancy roam  Pleasure never is at home.
author: John Keats

quote: I want your hand without the skin. Bone to bone without the molds. Mouth to mouth, without the porn.
author: Coco J. Ginger

quote: Let me not fear adversity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Abundance does not come in packages, it comes from the happiness within.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Hope is the word which God has written on the brow of every man.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Talk to a man about himself and he will listen for hours.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I don’t own anything, but I have everything.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Keep on questioning. Keep on searching.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Offer yourself forgiveness as a gift. The word ‘give’ is the basic keyword in the word forgiveness, therefore it relays a meaning therein.
author: Stephen Richards, The Pain You Feel Today Is The Strength You Feel Tomorrow

quote: If I see darkness in the Church I bring light to it.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Love is a contact sport you were born to win.
author: Suzette R. Hinton

quote: Love is like a season,it ebbs and it flows,sometimes we're like Summer, Fall and Winter,but it's Spring that I long to know.
author: Anthony T Hincks

quote: You are having a bad day? Remember it could always be worse... It could be me having a bad day!
author: Mark W. Boyer, Domestic Vigilance: One Nation

quote: Our computers have become windows through which we can gaze upon a world that is virtually without horizons or boundaries.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: When I get ready to talk to people, I spend two thirds of the time thinking what they want to hear and one third thinking about what I want to say.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The consistent thinker ... is either a walking mummy or else  if he has not succeeded in stifling all his vitality  a fanatical monomaniac.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: To change ourselves effectively, we first had to change our perceptions.
author: Stephen R. Covey, The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People: Powerful Lessons in Personal Change

quote: If you can desire it, you can behold it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The philosophy of the rain is very simple: No obstacle is obstacle when you are strongly determined!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Whenever you feel exhausted, take time to relax, refresh and recharge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: People-based service is God-based service
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When there is fear, there is no trust.
author: Pearl Zhu, Thinkingaire: 100 Game Changing Digital Mindsets to Compete for the Future

quote: The sweetest melody that playson starry nights and wintry days,most soothing to my listening earsand calming to beleaguering fears,I call a symphony on air―the song of sweet, still silence rare.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: Everyone knew that if you divided reality by expectation, you got a happiness quotient. But when you invert the equation - expectation divided by reality - you didn't get the opposite of happiness. What you got, Lewis realized, was hope.
author: Jodi Picoult, Nineteen Minutes

quote: You see, I, unlike you, have been made a prefect, which means that I, unlike you, have the power to hand out punishments.”“Yeah,” said Harry, “but you, unlike me, are a git.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Friends are family members we have a choice over.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Most of us have the good or bad fortune of seeing our lives fall apart so slowly we barely notice.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón, The Shadow of the Wind

quote: For beautiful success, serve with love and serve with courage.
author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quote: No government can help the destinies of people who insist in putting sectional and class consciousness ahead of general weal.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: I'm sorry, I didn't mean--""To speak of it?" asked the K'mir. Diane nodded. "You have to, just to bleed off the poison from the memory.
author: Tamora Pierce, Wild Magic

quote: Hey, yummy leather guy? Can you hear me? (Amanda)
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon, Night Pleasures

quote: A good part of my leadership skills is crafted from learning from experiences early in my career that were not positive experiences.
author: John Lasseter

quote: As selfishness and complaint pervert and cloud the mind, so sex with its joy clears and sharpens the vision.
author: Helen Keller, My Religion

quote: Every morning, I crawl out of bed. I sit there and think, 'Do I really need this?' And I drag myself to the gym in my garage. It's not fun. I hate it. I work out alone. Weights.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: You can lose your MONEY. You can lose your FRIENDS. You can lose your JOB and you can lose your MARRIAGE...and still recover...as long as there is HOPE. Never lose HOPE.
author: John Paul Warren

quote: Every post is a digital tattoo of your personal brand.Every post you make is a marketing piece. Whether you realize it or not and regardless of having something for sale. Every post is a digital tattoo of your personal brand.
author: Richie Norton

quote: She it is, she, that found meIn the morphia honeymoon;With silk and steel she bound meIn her poisonous milk she drowned me,Even now her arms surround me
author: Aleister Crowley, Diary of a Drug Fiend

quote: God is waiting on you to believe that you are capable
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Do you want me? I am yours.
author: Mark Andrew Poe, Ending Easter

quote: Miss Bingley's congratulations to her brother, on his approaching marriage, were all that was affectionate and insincere.
author: Jane Austen, Pride and Prejudice

quote: Life is nether food nor drink. But the faith of a dance dream.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Those who fail to think, will shrink, sink and stink.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: As ofttimes as it rains on my little spot of earth, you'd think I'd grow accustomed to the gloom.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: Love  I find  is like singing. Everybody can do enough to satisfy themselves  though it may not impress the neighbors as being very much.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: She tasted good. Like salt and vinegar chips and Bailey’s Irish cream. Who knew that was such a fucking turn on?
author: Amy Andrews, Playing With Forever

quote: It is the theory which decided what can be observed.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The philosophy of the schoolroom in one generation is the philosophy of government in the next.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: People who have created their success through hard work and the support of others are always looking for ways to help those around them. Don’t be afraid to reach out.
author: Mensah Oteh

quote: An artist is somebody who produces things that people don't need to have.
author: Andy Warhol, Andy Warhol, Thirty Are Better Than One

quote: Kill your fear, and start something! God needs people for greater works, but fear always tells them how dangerous it is to take a step!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: We did it Disneyland, in the knowledge that most of the people I talked to thought it would be a financial disaster - closed and forgotten within the first year.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Child, you have to learn to see things in the right proportions. Learn to see great things great and small things small.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: Send me all the advice you like. I'll use as much as I can.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: I like people who can keep the conversation going no matter how random the topic gets.
author: Turcois Ominek

quote: All the beatitudes manifest in the sacred-time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: You saw my leg?""How can a man help what he sees?" he said. "And, if I could add, you possess a very fine leg.
author: Shannon Hale, The Goose Girl

quote: I wanted to figure out why I was so busy, but I couldn't find the time to do it.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: Whatever you dream of, there will be fulfillment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The northern soldiers are just men,” Hal told the men in his command. “And women,” he amended. “When you cut them, they bleed, just like us.
author: Cinda Williams Chima, Shadowcaster

quote: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: For years I wanted to be older  and now I am.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: Religion and spirituality can easily be intertwined; however, there is a very distinct separation between the two.
author: Ricky Maye, An Emerging Spirituality

quote: Nostalgia... the blessing of a merciful memory.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Seek to know thy soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Gin a body meet a bodyComing thro' the rye,Gin a body kiss a body— Need a body cry?
author: Robert Burns

quote: The need is what is necessary.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My whole family is missing that sports gene. I hope I didn't screw that up by marrying a great golfer.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: Life wants you to be able to fully receive and give affection and love.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: I had always dreamed of being a professional escort but never thought that there was any real money in it.
author: Chelsea Handler, My Horizontal Life: A Collection of One-Night Stands

quote: One always has hope for human nature
author: Agatha Christie, Sleeping Murder

quote: Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: Learning isn't acquiring knowledge so much as it is trimming information that has already been acquired.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: God desires to free our country from darkness through our active civil position.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: He was afraid of touching his own wrist. He never attempted to sleep on his left side, even in those dismal hours of the night when the insomniac longs for a third side after trying the two he has.
author: Vladimir Nabokov, Pnin

quote: Find your inner bliss and then let it out to make the world blissful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are trying to prove ourselves wrong as quickly as possible, because only in that way can we find progress.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: I know’, is a big ghost. ‘This is mine’, is a huge demonic possession!
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: You are guilty of no evil, Ransom of Thulcandra, except a little fearfulness. For that, the journey you go on is your pain, and perhaps your cure: for you must be either mad or brave before it is ended.
author: C.S. Lewis, Out of the Silent Planet

quote: There's a whole category of people who miss out by not allowing themselves to be weird enough.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Opportunity starts with a great education.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: The world we build tomorrow is born in the stories we tell our children today. Politics moves the pieces. Education changes the game.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: I was a vampire, and she had the sweetest blood I’d smelled in eighty years.
author: Stephenie Meyer, Midnight Sun

quote: Judge not  that ye be not judged.
author: Bible

quote: Arizona is a great place to be a radiation researcher.
author: Steven Magee

quote: No! Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try.
author: George Lucas, The Star Wars Trilogy

quote: One thing I've learned: we don't stumble accidentally into an amazing life. It takes decision, a commitment to consistently work on ourselves.
author: Kamal Ravikant, Live Your Truth

quote: I offer you peace. I offer you love. I offer you friendship. I see your beauty. I hear your need. I feel your feelings.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.
author: Eckhart Tolle, A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life's Purpose

quote: As for style of writing  if one has anything to say  it drops from him simply and directly  as a stone falls to the ground.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Though Julian could be marvelously kind in difficult circumstances of all sorts, I sometimes got the feeling that he was less pleased by kindness itself than by the elegance of the gesture.
author: Donna Tartt, The Secret History

quote: Even in the midst of life’s adversity, struggle or strife; Love’s enduring presence remains steadfast.
author: Eleesha, The Soulful Pathway To Love: Soulfully Inspiring You to Uncover the Essence of True Love That Exists, Within

quote: Quite possibly there's nothing as fine as a big freight train starting across country in early summer, Hardesty thought. That's when you learn that the tragedy of plants is that they have roots.
author: Mark Helprin, Winter's Tale

quote: All that is gold does not glitter...
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Now? I'm just another female faking orgasms to make a man not feel so inadequate.
author: Jess C. Scott, Kylie

quote: ... there was no need for him to hasten towards the attainment of a happiness already captured and held in a safe place, which would not escape his grasp again.
author: Marcel Proust, Swann's Way

quote: Don't people get married because they're full of love and then divorced when they run out of it?" (Elsa)"Did you learn that one in school?" (Mom)"It's my own theory." (Elsa)
author: Fredrik Backman, My Grandmother Asked Me to Tell You She's Sorry

quote: Neither father nor son moved, but stayed face to face for hours and hours, neither looking away nor surrendering, until the sun finished its daily pilgrimage, for no day is so long that it is not ended by nightfall.
author: Rabih Alameddine, The Hakawati

quote: When we realize every moment is sacred, we understand that every footstep is sacred, too.
author: Molly Friedenfeld

quote: It is better to seek redemption than chase riches.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Nobody wanted to be sexless, but nobody wanted to be nothing but sex.
author: Margaret Atwood, Oryx and Crake

quote: Though I despise it, I do not doubt His Love for the creatures. I have seen it —His ever-reaching outward for any hand that might reach back. At His love, I tremble yet believe.
author: Geoffrey Wood

quote: Happiness lies with us only. Desire for experiencing interactive pleasure is because of the association with the ignorance (of the Self). The one who does not have such association, he will ‘realize’ true happiness.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: The Sufi must be able to alternate his thought between the relative and the Absolute, the approximate and the Real.
author: Idries Shah, A Perfumed Scorpion

quote: It is a beautiful and scary thing to sit open-handed and let all your plans float away like dust.
author: Anna White, Mended: Thoughts on Life, Love, and Leaps of Faith

quote: No demigod can heal your heart."Aphrodite to Reyna, at Charleston
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Before proving it to someone else, I had to be able to prove it to myself.
author: Tyconis D. Allison Ty

quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
author: Haruki Murakami, What I Talk About When I Talk About Running

quote: It is naive to think that self-assertiveness is easy. To live self-assertively--which means to live authentically--is an act of high courage. That is why so many people spend the better part of their lives in hiding--from others and also from themselves.
author: Nathaniel Branden

quote: No, I regret nothing, all I regret is having been born, dying is such a long tiresome business I always found.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: We're going to knock those demons out and slay them with the power of Jesus. Hallelujah, can I get an amen?- Timmie
author: Jeaniene Frost, Halfway to the Grave

quote: The holy war is within.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You win the victory when you yield to friends.
author: Sophocles

quote: Love is the innermost energy, innermost fire which wants to come out always and spread all over.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Focus on the timeless blessings in life
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I hear he liked flowers pretty well.""Yes," said Annie, "he said they were the friends who always came back and never disappointed him."--"Out, Brief Candle
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr., While Mortals Sleep: Unpublished Short Fiction

quote: Young people don't always do what they're told, but if they can pull it off and do something wonderful, sometimes they escape punishment.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Let us dance in the rain to enjoy the rainbows and to get lost in the beauty of nature.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Of course, these were only dreams. How could a sensible woman leave a happy marriage? All the same, a seductive voice from afar kept breaking into her conjugal peace: it was the voice of solitude.
author: Milan Kundera, Immortality

quote: Education is the progressive unfolding of our own beauty with the light of knowledge like the blooming of a flower.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We must intentionally push ourselves out of our comfort zones if we are to make any significant progress on this side of life.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We come to this world with an abundance of hope, a deep desire to love, and a longing to belong.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There’s not a single good thing about fear. Fear is a habitual liar and a destroyer of a purpose-filled life. Don’t entertain fear. You’ve got to protect your dreams, goals, and the desires of your heart. Be brave in all things!
author: Stephanie Lahart

quote: Richness does not exist in being wealthy, richness exists in having abundance in life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Learn to read deeply. It will slowly open your mind’s eye, and will be able to see the secret beauty of the universe and understand its deeper essence.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The more we train a man to labor, deliberate, dictate and demand over the inconsequential, the less capable his mind becomes of holding that of consequence.
author: Geoffrey Wood

quote: One is tempted to define man as a rational animal who always loses his temper when he is called upon to act in accordance with the dictates of reason.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A distant goal can be achieved day by day.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Van Eck raised a brow. "How old are you, girl? Sixteen? Seventeen? Nations rise and fall. Markets are made and unmade. When power shifts, someone always suffers.
author: Leigh Bardugo, Six of Crows

quote: Measure your success by the ladder you set for yourself and not on what somebody achieved or done!
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: For two days I went about my business. I travelled the globe as always, handing souls to the conveyor belt of eternity.
author: Markus Zusak, The Book Thief

quote: There is no Soul, where there is give and take. Wherever there is give and take, it is a stock market.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Love taught me to die with dignity that I might come forth anew in splendor. Born once of flesh, then again of fire, I was reborn a third time to the sound of my name humming haikus in heaven’s mouth.
author: Aberjhani, The River of Winged Dreams

quote: In my case, I was not frightened in the least bit at the thought that I might live because I was certain, quite certain, that I was already dead.
author: Elizabeth Wurtzel, Prozac Nation

quote: There are crimes of passion and crimes of logic. The boundary between them is not clearly defined.
author: Albert Camus

quote: My philosophy of life is that if we make up our mind what we are going to make of our lives, then work hard toward that goal, we never lose - somehow we win out.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Courage is a scorner of things which inspire fear.
author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quote: If you promote peace and progress for others, I don’t think you will have sleepless nights.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts

quote: Suffering! We owe to it all that is good in us, all that gives value to life; we owe to it pity, we owe to it courage, we owe to it all the virtues.
author: Anatole France

quote: Without the will, marriage is a mockery; without the emotion, it is a drudgery. You need both.
author: Ravi Zacharias, I, Isaac, Take Thee, Rebekah: Moving from Romance to Lasting Love

quote: Write in the morning, revise in the afternoon, read at night, and spend the rest of your time exercising your diplomacy, stealth, and charm.
author: Roberto Bolaño, The Savage Detectives

quote: A praiseworthy King is he who doesn't seek the most expensive throne, rather the most effective leadership style.
author: Gugu Mona

quote: Lovely thoughts came flying to meet me like birds. They weren't my thoughts. I couldn't think anything half so exquisite. They came from somewhere.
author: L.M. Montgomery, Emily Climbs

quote: [Families] are made to make you forget yourself occasionally  so that the beautiful balance of life is not destroyed.
author: Anais Nin

quote: The opinion of success matters more than the opinions of your critics.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Sometimes I get mail for people who lived in my home before I did, and sometimes my own body seems like a home through which successive people have passed like tenants, leaving behind memories, habits, scars, skills, and other souvenirs.
author: Rebecca Solnit, The Faraway Nearby

quote: God is love” means that He tries constantlyto block your route to destruction.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Human happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected.
author: George Washington

quote: Some of us fast so that we can have less discomfort in life. The reason is not far-fetched – God is not interested in your comfort. He is more interested in your purpose.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: In serving the poor,one serves humanity.In serving mankind,one serves equity.In serving goodness,one serves God.In serving the Creator,one serves himself.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Respect cannot be inherited, respect is the result of right actions.
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

quote: To be a successful general one must be prayful, faithful and work hard
author: Osunsakin Adewale

quote: It’s easier to be close to God during prayer time when you’re close to God all the time.
author: Jared Brock, A Year of Living Prayerfully: How a Curious Traveler Met the Pope, Walked on Coals, Danced with Rabbis, and Revived His Prayer Life

quote: I often carry things to read so that I will not have to look at the people.
author: Charles Bukowski, The Last Night of the Earth Poems

quote: Of course they were eaten,â€� he retorted, his eyes flashing in cold humour. â€œTrolls generally arenâ€™t exactly renowned for being vegetarians.
author: Adele          Rose

quote: We feel that we don't have luck with us and everybody does at a particular moment of time. Whereas, when we do, we forget to notice that the others don't.
author: Bhavik Sarkhedi, The Weak Point Dealer

quote: We were all created differently, each with his/her calling and purpose
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: It is the province of knowledge to speak, and it is the privilege of wisdom to listen.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Friendship is love without his wings!
author: Lord Byron

quote: Bad habits are demons that often push us into isolation because they know that in our loneliness they stand little chance of being overcome.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons

quote: Mostly, all book-told gods are as little as the little men who wrote them idiots into existence.
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: Employment was better than idleness for men, because it kept the enemy guessing.
author: H.W. Brands, The Man Who Saved the Union: Ulysses Grant in War and Peace

quote: We are never defeated unless we give up on God.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: One day the people of the world will want peaceso much that the governments will have to get outof their way and give it to them.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: That's what I've noticed about being 32: it is a lot of women and a lot of boys our age.
author: Mindy Kaling, Is Everyone Hanging Out Without Me?

quote: We do not need to attend classroom training programmes for everything. Observation opens the windows of knowledge around us
author: Sukant Ratnakar, Open the Windows

quote: Building confidence comes from overcoming the voice in your head that says you are not capable silence the noise and then prove it wrong.
author: Sam Owen, 500 Relationships And Life Quotes: Bite-Sized Advice For Busy People

quote: You don't win races by wishing, you win them by running faster than everyone else does.
author: Philip Pullman, Clockwork

quote: He looked around him wildly, as if the past were lurking here in the shadow of his house, just out of reach of his hand.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Great Gatsby

quote: I love the confidence that makeup gives me.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Don't wait until you become rich to help somebody, kindness doesn't always require money
author: Charmaine J. Forde

quote: An unread book does nobody any good. Stories happen in the mind of a reader, not among symbols printed on a page.
author: Brandon Mull

quote: All times are treasureable; the times of prosperity, and times of adversity,
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You have within you,right now,everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: I don't count my blessings,because just being alive is good enough for me.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: I started rubbing my temples and she suggested I don't really get headaches. It just hurts me to think.
author: Kelley Armstrong, The Calling

quote: Life in the spirit is a saving grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: These question-boundaries ...are ours, not of reality. We are led to them, caged by them not only culturally and intellectually, but quite physically, by the restlessness of our eyes and their limited field and acuity of vision.
author: John Fowles, The Tree

quote: Contrary to what most women think, men want a lot more than just sex. A man wants to make a difference in a woman’s life and make her happy.
author: Linda Alfiori, The Art of Loving Intelligently:Discover the Five Love Myths Hurting Women in America

quote: I don't know what is in my destiny, but I want to be sitting on top of the highest peak of the sky.
author: Tanmaya Guru

quote: Our task is not multiplying the number of our church members but making people happy
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You can measure the happiness of a marriage by the number of scars that each partner carries on their tongues, earned from years of biting back angry words.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage

quote: Fellowshipping with God continually is to maintain your well-being
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The truth is considered hatred by those who hate the truth.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If we have touched another's life with our action and through our words then we have lived.
author: Aisha Mirza

quote: Every time you speak, you are using your voice to connect with others, whether it is in-person, on the phone, or in a recorded message.
author: Susan C. Young, The Art of Communication: 8 Ways to Confirm Clarity & Understanding for Positive Impact

quote: Psyche you out?" I repeat. "I'm your FRIEND. I wouldn't do that." He doesn't say anything. I can tell he doesn't believe me-not quite.
author: Veronica Roth

quote: I know a bank where the wild thyme blows,Where oxlips and the nodding violet grows,Quite over-canopied with luscious woodbine,With sweet musk-roses and with eglantine.
author: William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream

quote: You should also pay attention to what happens to you and make sure you draw correct conclusions
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you sell the film rights to your book, it doesn't mean there will be a film. I have sold the rights to five books and had zero films made. Take the money and be thankful.
author: Matt Haig

quote: Thank you for telling me fairy tales, but also for teaching me how to face the battle I'd need to win in real life.
author: C.J. Redwine, Deliverance

quote: One of his followers murmured agreement, but another quietly slipped away. Now there was Norton and four others. Maybe that wasn't so bad. Christ Himself could only find twelve.
author: Stephen King, The Mist

quote: Dance to music in your soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Though I do not believe that a plant will spring up where no seed has been, I have great faith in a seed... Convince me that you have a seed there, and I am prepared to expect wonders.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A book is a version of the world. If you do not like it, ignore it; or offer your own version in return.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: God, please give us more grace!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I don't know what your destiny will be, but one thing I know: the only ones among you who will be really happy are those who have sought and found how to serve.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Beauty is ever to the lonely mind a shadow fleeting; she is never plain. She is a visitor who leaves behind the gift of grief, the souvenir of pain.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: He who has courage and faith will never perish in misery!
author: Anne Frank

quote: Some people use power, whilst they are some who let power use them.
author: Moffat Machingura, How I Kissed Heartbreak Goodbye

quote: After another long silence, bit by bit, realisation dawned upon Edmund and he became even paler than Hecate herself which was, in itself, a fantastic achievement. Adele Rose, Awakening.
author: Adele          Rose, Awakening

quote: He is terribly afraid of dying because he hasn’t yet lived.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Someday this life will end, but for the Christian death also marks a beginning—the beginning of a new life with God that will last forever.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: What I think the political correctness debate is really about is the power to be able to define. The definers want the power to name. And the defined are now taking that power away from them.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: Do you want me to ride you like a rented mule, or do you prefer to be Mr. Missionary Position? I'm fine with wither, so it doesn't matter to me.
author: Katie MacAlister, It's All Greek to Me

quote: My spirit has pass'd in compassion and determination around the whole earth.I have look'd for equals and lovers an found them ready for me in all lands,I think some divine rapport has equalized me with them
author: Walt Whitman, Leaves of Grass

quote: Love of bustle is not industry.
author: Seneca

quote: God always smiles because of our little deeds done with a good heart, but to make the heart of God always beat for you, win and keep a soul for Him!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: When Jonathan Winters died, it was like, 'Oh, man!' I knew he was frail, but I always thought he was going to last longer. I knew him as being really funny, but at the same time, he had a dark side.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Each story provides a beginning, a middle and an end, the trick is, never seperate them through the chapters or you'll miss the meaning of the entire book.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Swords can’t solve every problem.
author: Rick Riordan, The Mark of Athena

quote: If you only go around once in life, then why has that one gone around more than once?
author: Brian Spellman, Cartoonist's Book Camp

quote: Blue was perfectly aware that it was possible to have a friendship that wasn't all-encompassing, that wasn't blinding, deafening, maddening, quickening. It was just that now that she'd had this kind, she didn't want another.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, Blue Lily, Lily Blue

quote: (About changing faith) At our best, Christians embrace it, leaving enough space within orthodoxy for God to surprise us every now and then.
author: Rachel Held Evans, Evolving in Monkey Town: How a Girl Who Knew All the Answers Learned to Ask the Questions

quote: Do not run away from your challenges. You must endure and overcome each challenge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Life is like a bud, it always dreams to bloom like a flower.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You’re not worried about being compromised, are you?” he asked. “Because I’ve already done that.
author: Lisa Kleypas, Devil in Spring

quote: Well,” she said. “I’m frustrated.”“Don’t make me angry-kiss you.”“Give me the laundry.”“Tempers rising, faces flushed … This is how it happens.
author: Rainbow Rowell, Fangirl

quote: At some point you have to forget about grudges because they only hurt.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Don’t give someone the credit for holding you back. Give yourself the power in continuing to move forward.
author: Chris Burkmenn

quote: A highly paid, highly motivated employee who is not allowed to work with his full potential is like a Ferrari which is not allowed out of the garage.
author: Charbel Tadros

quote: I work all day, morning and afternoon, just about every day. If I sit there like that for two or three years, at the end I have a book.
author: Philip Roth

quote: The dictionary says my identity should be all about being separate or distinct, and yet it feels like it is so wrapped up in others.
author: Mary E. Pearson, The Adoration of Jenna Fox

quote: It's still magic even if you know how it's done.
author: Terry Pratchett, A Hat Full of Sky

quote: Physical attractiveness is no indicator of an individual's beauty."from "The Beauty of Ugh
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, I am not Frazzle!: And other stories for grown-ups

quote: When we learn to love unconditionally we will find endless happiness and infinite peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Grace is the power of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We must rebuild organic communities, where people can come together and have analogue conversations and share stories, art, music and emotions.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: This is the cusp of an age at least as exciting and as brimful of potential as the early days of the printing press.
author: Sara Sheridan

quote: Whatever you do, let it be done with profound love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Before you criticize a man, walk a mile in his shoes. That way, when you do criticize him, you'll be a mile away and have his shoes.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Got it. Demon. Death. Doom.
author: Kami Garcia, Beautiful Creatures

quote: Don't ask about my past. And never expect a future.
author: Colleen Hoover, Ugly Love

quote: The chit is semi-animate (half-alive) and the mind is completely physical.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Nor shall derision prove powerful against those who listen to humanity or those who follow in the footsteps of divinity, for they shall live forever. Forever.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: To move from here to there, sometimes there is a need to suspend the present realities; they can be a distraction.
author: Bidemi Mark-Mordi

quote: The essay is a literary device for saying almost everything about almost anything.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: What are we? We are a thinking universe!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: For the first time she could see a man's head naked of its skull. Saw the cunning thoughts race in and out through the caves and promontories of his mind long before they darted through the tunnel of his mouth.
author: Zora Neale Hurston, Their Eyes Were Watching God

quote: Change your thoughts to change your reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I am waltzing with death, flirting with him, but he stands there smiling and saying nothing because he does not need to woo or be wooed: he knows he gets us all in the end.
author: Nenia Campbell, Tantalized

quote: striid andWthdraw into yourself. Our master-reason asks no more than to act justly, and thereby to achieve calm.
author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quote: It was the word 'late' that did it. Such a stupid word to use of the dead, implying that they would be with us today if they hadn't happened to be delayed in traffic somewhere...
author: Emma Donoghue

quote: Thoughts are like burning stars, and ideas, they flood, they stretch the universe.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy

quote: There is no other position and no other place where you will be as happy as the place of your calling
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I find my greatest strength in wanting to be strong and my greatest bravery in deciding to be brave....If there's no feeling of fear then there's no need for courage.
author: David Levithan

quote: Love looks not with the eyes  but with the mind  And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: We're each other's questions, aren't we? The question that never gets an answer.
author: Patrick Ness, The Rest of Us Just Live Here

quote: My confidence is in the idea that I may be wrong on this or that. No man in this life should ever have to bear the burden of perfection.
author: Criss Jami, Healology

quote: The real lessons is the reality of living life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Success to me is having ten honeydew melons and eating only the top half of each slice.
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: Nothing can be more hurtful to your heart than betraying yourself.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: During my life journey I've discovered an interesting thing once you stop seeking outside you discover what already resides within.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: We all have special attributes that are of value to someone. Find your place of value. You are never useless. You just need to find your place.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe, The Vision

quote: Great wisdom is generous; petty wisdom is contentious. Great speech is impassioned, small speech cantankerous.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: You know that your happiness and suffering depend on the happiness and suffering of others. That insight helps you not to do wrong things that will bring suffering to yourself and to other people.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Success is an addiction. Once you get into the habit of success, you can’t stop.
author: Ehab Atalla, The Secrets of Business

quote: Heroism doesn’t always happen in a burst of glory. Sometimes small triumphs and large hearts change the course of history. Sometimes a chicken can save a man’s life.
author: Mary Roach, Grunt: The Curious Science of Humans at War

quote: I wish my brain had an off switch. Maybe that way I could get some sleep.
author: Christy  Hall, The Little Silkworm

quote: We spend the first twelve months of our children's lives teaching them to walk and talk and the next twelve telling them to sit down and shut up.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Your relationship with God is tested by your relationship with His people
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Beware of will power. It damages your giving-up skills.
author: Vikrmn, Corpkshetra

quote: When you are old and grey and full of sleep  And nodding by the fire, take down this book,  And slowly read, and dream of the soft look Your eyes had once, and of their shadows deep
author: W.B. Yeats, The Collected Poems of W.B. Yeats

quote: Beyond the very extremity of fatigue distress, amounts of ease and power that we never dreamed ourselves to own, sources of strength habitually not taxed at all, because habitually we never push through the obstruction
author: William James

quote: Faith is the strength of existence.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My writings are reflections of my momentary thoughts, imaginations, and love for you and life in this world as a whole.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Without judging anyone, let us love everyone like a flower.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Never give a person a piece of your mind when all you really wanted to do was give them a piece of your heart.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Asking the appropriate questions means understanding exactly what your customer is trying to achieve
author: Chris     Murray, Selling with EASE: The Four Step Sales Cycle Found in Every Successful Business Transaction

quote: If you forget where you came from, you've gone too far.
author: Tanya Masse

quote: He that can have patience can have what he will.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You can change your world by changing your words... Remember, death and life are in the power of the tongue.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I have wondered why it is that our greatest triumphs spring from our greatest extremity and adversity. Perhaps it is because we are so resistant to change, we only move when our seat becomes too hot to occupy.
author: Richard Paul Evans, A Winter Dream

quote: Stab your demoniac smile to my brain,Soak me in cognac, love, and cocaine
author: Aleister Crowley, Diary of a Drug Fiend

quote: To create an inner peace of mind, be humble, gentle, harmonious, and kind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are robots aren't we??
author: Deyth Banger

quote: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: Any seed that is planted by God bears fruit even before it touches the ground.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: We cry to release the soul of its pain.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The survived souls give strength to the suffering souls.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When love and skill work together expect a masterpiece.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Kindness is the sacred act to transform lives.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Lingerer, my brain is on fire with impatience; and you tarry so long!
author: Charlotte Brontë, Jane Eyre

quote: I can only run as fast as the rate of my breath.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I'm starting to think you like prisons," "And that you have the worst taste in men.
author: Victoria Aveyard, Glass Sword

quote: Don't say the old lady screamed. Bring her on and let her scream.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When we have graciously endured every adversity, we become like a shining diamond.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The act of taking the first step is what separates the winners from the losers.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Just remember to say THANK YOU sometimes, for all of these everyday extraordinary gifts.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: Never give up. You must persist!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: To free us from the expectations of others, to give us back to ourselves - there lies the great, singular power of self-respect.
author: Joan Didion

quote: If you want to be listened to  you should put in time listening.
author: Marge Piercy

quote: I weep for the stupidity of my sins.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You can't lead if no one will follow.
author: Margaret Atwood, Moral Disorder and Other Stories

quote: You can have regret from yesterday, fear tomorrow, but peace today by sharing your heart’s deepest feelings. A life spent being fearful of showing your soul is a life not worth living.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: If you hold onto a man hoping someone else won't get them you have learned how to be desperate, not wise.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Excuses are like butt holes everyone has 'em and they all stink.
author: Lois Greiman, Unplugged

quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
author: Henry Ford

quote: You character and action will reveal your purpose.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Truth can only be found in a person's record of actions, not their list of intentions.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Gifts of the heart can't be claimed by anyone except the giver.
author: Nicholas Sparks, The Wedding

quote: I haven't looked at marriage in the conventional sense, as far as settling down. I look at it as putting faith in another person, which has always been hard for me to do.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: You attract what you think of.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: It’s a truth I love you,It’s a hope you do,And may I live and die with it,Not knowing that you don’t.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: Let us forget and forgive injuries.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Sometimes, kids want you to hurt the way they hurt.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: Your reality is based upon your beliefs.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: Secrets had the power to kill a marriage,she said. Nonsense, Sylvie said,it was secrets that could save a marriage.
author: Kate Atkinson, A God in Ruins

quote: Turn your self-hell into self-help.
author: Richie Norton

quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: Life is like a game of cards. The hand that is dealt you represents determinism  the way you play it is free will.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Everything that is really great and inspiring is created by the individual who can labor in freedom.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Wind is the sacred music of the leaves; wherever and whenever the wind blows, over there leaves start their holy dancing frantically!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Our relationship had been doomed form the start, because it was based on grief, and unlike love, grief eventually passed.
author: Ilona Andrews, Magic Burns

quote: Mistakes should be examined, learned from, and discarded; not dwelled upon and stored.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: Humor has to surprise us; otherwise, it isn't funny. It's a death knell for a writer to be labeled a humorist because then it's not a surprise anymore.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: If they are wrong they need your prayers all the more; and if they are your enemies, then you are under orders to pray for them. That is one of the rules common to the whole house.
author: C.S. Lewis, Mere Christianity

quote: It is sad to see people do things without putting their soul and heart into it.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Live your life without ever having to ask, 'What if?
author: Ken Poirot

quote: My childhood should have taught me lessons for my own fatherhood, but it didn't because parenting can only be learned by people who have no children.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: The idea that the future is unpredictable is undermined every day by the ease with which the past is explained.
author: Daniel Kahneman, Thinking, Fast and Slow

quote: You have to loss something to gain something.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Thank God every morning when you get up that you have something to do that day, which must be done, whether you like it or not.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: You create more space in your life when you turn your excess baggage to garbage.
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: We do not know the worth of one single drop of blood, one single tear.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: While you were busy working on your ego, she was busy working on her soul.
author: Melody  Lee, Moon Gypsy

quote: Roscoe Conkling was a man of superb courage. He not only acted without fear, but he had that fortitude of soul which bears the consequences of the course pursued without complaint.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: The main purpose of a church is to bring relevance to people and make sure everyone discovers their calling
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I spent the afternoon musing on Life. If you come to think of it, what a queer thing Life is! So unlike anything else, don't you know, if you see what I mean.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: The profoundest of all sensualitiesis the sense of truthand the next deepest sensual experienceis the sense of justice.
author: D.H. Lawrence

quote: No one can any longer write in the fat style of Strauss. That was killed by Stravinsky. He stripped the body of much of its clothes. Music is the craft of building structures with sound and that is what Stravinsky represents.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: And most of the failures in parent-child relationships, from my observation, begin when the child begins to acquire a mind and a will of its own, to make independent decisions and to question the omnipotence or the wisdom of the parent.
author: Sydney J. Harris, The Best of Sydney J. Harris

quote: A fear is a reaction to a specific danger, to which the individual can make a specific adjustment. But what characterizes anxiety is the feeling of diffuseness and uncertainty and the experience of helplessness toward the threat.
author: Rollo May, The Meaning of Anxiety

quote: Please understand. Please forgive me.I prayed every day for you to be alive, until hope became painful.Don't hate me.I still love you.
author: Lauren Oliver, Requiem

quote: Christ didn't join in. He saw which direction the rocks were being thrown, and became a shield.
author: Criss Jami, Healology

quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I think it's great to dress up and play on all the girly features.
author: Katy Perry

quote: Words need to be sown like seeds. No matter how tiny a seed may be, when in lands in the right sort of ground it unfolds its strength and from being minute expands and grows to a massive size.
author: Seneca, Letters from a Stoic

quote: Suddenly I was struck motionless: I was living through the first chapter of a novel in which I was the heroine; she was still almost a child, but we, too, were growing up.
author: Simone de Beauvoir, Memoirs of a Dutiful Daughter

quote: Fear of death, wonder at the causes of chance events or unintelligible happenings, hope for divine aid and gratitude for good fortune, cooperated to generate religious belief.
author: Will Durant, Our Oriental Heritage

quote: One strength of the communist system of the East is that it has some of the character of a religion and inspires the emotions of a religion.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I write to understand what I know.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Why dwell on the pain, when you can focus on peaceful thoughts?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There's no present. There's only the immediate future and the recent past.
author: George Carlin

quote: People will buy anything that is 'one to a customer.'
author: Sinclair Lewis

quote: There can be no great courage where there is no confidence or assurance, and half the battle is in the conviction that we can do what we undertake.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: The comeback need to always be more effective than the downfall!
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quote: God's ways of making Himself known are infinite.
author: Mahrukh

quote: Waves are the voices of tides. Tides are life," murmured Niko. "They bring new food for shore creatures, and take ships out to sea. They are the ocean's pulse, and our own heartbeat.
author: Tamora Pierce, Sandry's Book

quote: If miracles represent prophecy, we must have more prophets in twenty first century than the entire human history.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: The belief that personality is mysterious and irreducible has no scientific warrant, and is accepted chiefly because it is flattering to our human self esteem.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Power changes everything till it is difficult to say who are the heroes and who the villains.
author: Libba Bray, The Sweet Far Thing

quote: Try your best, before any rest. Life gets its beauty from the best.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love while there is a still a blessed possibility to love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: How did I get 'IT'? - By crying, begging, yelping! - Any of this helping?
author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quote: Sometimes the only way to succeed is to fail backwards
author: Benny Bellamacina, The King of Rhyme

quote: Friendship often ends in love, but love in friendship - never.
author: Albert Camus

quote: My patience has dreadful chilblains from standing so long on a monument.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning, Letters of Elizabeth Barrett Browning to Mary Russell Mitford, 1836-1854

quote: People tell you to believe in yourself for your whole life, then call you arrogant when you begin taking their advice.
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones
