quote: There is a coherence in things, a stability; something... is immune from change and shines out... in the face of the flowing, the fleeting, the spectral, like a ruby.
author: Virginia Woolf, To the Lighthouse

quote: The other person always has a point, Listen to each other, and you'll hear it.
author: Sophie Kinsella, Shopaholic to the Rescue

quote: In essence, you are neither inferior nor superior to anyone. True self-esteem and true humility arise out of that realization. In the eyes of the ego, self-esteem and humility are contradictory. In truth, they are one and the same.
author: Eckhart Tolle, A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life's Purpose

quote: Attention serves a person better when he or she works for it and then lets it come.
author: Ron Baratono, The Writings of Ron Baratono

quote: Never was a blind person blinded by the light that overwhelms his skin but blinded by the darkness within
author: Goitsemang Mvula

quote: The ripen fruit is for a sacred season.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Everything is going to be all right. Miracles happen every day.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: I do not care so much what I am to others as I care what I am to myself.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Holding on to negative feelings and past circumstances is like placing a lock on your soul.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Saying of the ProphetThe BequestI have nothing to leave you except my family.
author: Idries Shah, Caravan of Dreams

quote: So I heard the boom of my father's rifle when he shot my best friend. A bullet only costs about two cents, and anybody can afford that.
author: Sherman Alexie, The Absolutely True Diary of a Part-Time Indian

quote: If poetry and the arts do anything, they can fortify your inner life, your inwardness.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Parents are labelling, criticizing and reproaching the child on any account
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I'm not really angry at you.I'm just angry at myself for not doing anything.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: The vote is the most powerful instrument ever devised by man for breaking down injustice and destroying the terrible walls which imprison men because they are different from other men.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Public health service should be as fully organized and as universally incorporated into our governmental system as is public education. The returns are a thousand fold in economic benefits, and infinitely more in reduction of suffering and promotion of human happiness.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: Magic to be its best must be unexpected".
author: Kristin Hannah

quote: It is the nature of man to rise to greatness if greatness is expected of him.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Positive mindset leads to positive self esteem.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: When you accept a leadership role, you take on extra responsibility for your actions toward others.
author: Kelley Armstrong, The Calling

quote: He must love you very much,' Gavril said once I had my footing.I couldn't look at him. 'What makes you say that?' Gavril sighed. 'I've known Maxon since he was a child. He's never stood up to his father like that.
author: Kiera Cass, The Elite

quote: Everybody has a vocation to some form of life-work. However, behind that call (and deeper than any call), everybody has a vocation to be a person to be fully and deeply human in Christ Jesus.
author: Brennan Manning, The Wisdom of Tenderness: What Happens When God's Fierce Mercy Transforms Our Lives

quote: Be the great person you were always meant to be.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman, Kaya Abaniah and the Father of the Forest

quote: It is surely better to pardon too much, than to condemn too much.
author: George Eliot

quote: Because change creates opportunity, when we do it through purpose and awareness, we are working with the fates, and in turn they smile upon us.
author: Lawren Leo, Dragonflame: Tap Into Your Reservoir of Power Using Talismans, Manifestation, and Visualization

quote: Right is just and true.
author: Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

quote: An era can be considered over when its basic illusions have been exhausted.
author: Arthur Miller

quote: My mom bought me this amazing baby-food maker, the Beaba. I steam and puree fruits and vegetables, and they last for, like, four days.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: The connection between art and Christ is like the connection between sunlight and the sun. It is, in fact, the connection between Sonlight and the Son.
author: Peter Kreeft, Jesus-Shock

quote: A little caring, a little love, and a little kindness can give you joy and bring enduring happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Sometimes all you need is to forgive yourself.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: If I do not write to empty my mind, I go mad.
author: George Gordon Byron

quote: His fists clenched at his sides. 'Damn it! Where's your pride?' 'Pride? It's in my heart, of course.' 'You're letting me demean you!' She smiled. 'You can't do that. I can only demean myself.
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips, Kiss an Angel

quote: your enoughness is off the charts.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: I think and think for months and years. Ninety-nine times, the conclusion is false. The hundredth time I am right.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Failure means nothing now, only that it taught me life.
author: Elisabeth Elliot, Shadow of the Almighty: The Life and Testament of Jim Elliot

quote: Strike an average between what a woman thinks of her husband a month before she marries him and what she thinks of him a year afterward, and you will have the truth about him.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: I kept thinking how they were all names of dead people, and how names are basically the only thing dead people keep.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: Things do not belong to us but we belong to things.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Show me a girl with her feet planted firmly on the ground and I'll show you a girl who can't put her pants on.-Annik Marchand
author: Ann Brashares, Girls in Pants: The Third Summer of the Sisterhood

quote: One of the effects of fear is to disturb the senses and cause things to appear other than what they are.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: It isn't the subjects we write about but the seriousness and subtlety of our expression that determines the worth of or effort.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: The greatest person to know in life is yourself. There’s no one who will treat you better.
author: Ron Baratono, The Writings of Ron Baratono

quote: Tears are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of compassion.
author: Jim George

quote: To be a servant of the Saviour is the sacred service.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Be slow to teach, and quick to learn.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Mother's ways are higher than others, even when everyone rejects, mother accepts with her arms open and wide.
author: Amit Ray

quote: You are loved, and you are worthy! Remember your wholeness. Within you is the spark of the Divine. Let go of negative self-talk and let LOVE heal you.
author: Angie karan

quote: A real decision makes one humble, one knows that it is at the mercy of more things that can be named.
author: James     Baldwin, Giovanni's Room

quote: Of Course you can attract someone by Beautiful body ,but if you don't have beautiful soul than they will be with you only until they enjoy your body in Bed
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: Your strength lies in knowledge, your power lies in wisdom, your treasure lies in understanding, and your wealth lies in life.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Inti dari hubungan adalah memiliki seseorang saat kita membutuhkannya".
author: Lisa Kleypas

quote: To pray is seek the sacred path.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Imagination is the voice of daring. If there is anything godlike about God, it is that. He dared to imagine everything
author: Henry Miller, Sexus

quote: He said, I always thought the woman I’d marry would hit me easy, in a bolt of lightning, and there is not lightning there is not even thunder there is not even rain.
author: Aimee Bender, Willful Creatures

quote: Call it Irony or destiny of life, but the fact is I failed to make a living from what 'I loved doing the most' nor did I justify for what I was paid for!
author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quote: Later—how much later? Hard to tell. In times of tragedy clocks will trick you—Philip stood in the kitchen doorway.
author: Dexter Palmer, Version Control

quote: There is no way to escape conflict in life, and there is no way to escape peace in life.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: In order to tame death, they refuse to completely enjoy life. In rejecting complete enjoyment, they are half-dead in advance - and that with no guarantee that their sacrifice will actually benefit them when all is done.
author: Tom Robbins, Jitterbug Perfume

quote: Nothing can replace your time and your strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: If you see yourself as a man, no one will dare to see you as a kid.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, LOVE, HATRED AND MADNESS

quote: As a human being, we have unlimited power and unlimited abilities, we just have to look for it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A heart has problems which mind cannot understand.
author: Santosh Kalwar, Quote Me Everyday

quote: The sense of national emergency engendered by war transforms the destruction of dissident opinion into patriotism.
author: Thomas Szasz, A Lexicon of Lunacy: Metaphoric Malady, Moral Responsibility & Psychiatry

quote: This instant which I cannot leave, which locks me in and limits me on every side, this instant I am made of will be no more than a confused dream.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre, Nausea

quote: Grown ups are complicated creatures, full of quirks and secrets.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: I only ever wanted to feel more human.
author: Timothy Joshua

quote: ...we went to watch the waves that bitter day and the wind took your red cap and mittens - blew them into the sea...
author: John Geddes, A Familiar Rain

quote: If your Idea cannot CHANGE the INDUSTRY, you have added no VALUE
author: Fela Durotoye

quote: I'm going to find whoever is responsible for me sleeping out side with outside without pillows and kick them in the shins!-Enna
author: Shannon Hale

quote: Transformational tools enhance one's clarity, competence, compassion, and empower you to achieve anything that seems impossible to you and others.
author: Vishwas Chavan

quote: If you can build a business up big enough, it's respectable.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Parents’ transmit their attitude towards education to children via soundless, aphonic messages.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: When my younger sisters were born, I was in high school and college. I was at my mom's all the time but never changed them or fed them.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: We act like pagans in a crisis--only one out of an entire crowd is daring enough to invest his faith in the character of God.
author: Oswald Chambers, My Utmost for His Highest

quote: Seems like the cold would never go away and winter would be like the bottom of my feet but then it is gone in one night and in its place comes the sun so large and laughable.
author: Sherman Alexie, The Lone Ranger and Tonto Fistfight in Heaven

quote: Love hopes. Love helps. Love heals. Love hears.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: With the pursuit of faith, I am a free soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: This town of churches and dreams; this town I thought I would lose myself in, with its backward ways and winding roads leading to nowhere; but, I found myself instead. -Magic in the Backyard (excerpt from American Honey)
author: Kellie Elmore

quote: We must repent of our prayerlessness. We must make prayer our priority. Even our churches today have gotten away from prayer meetings.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: If I die today, will you remember me tomorrow?The love I'm leaving behind, will you care to borrow? From a snake-shed-skin or from the sky unknownIn all living and the dead I'll dwell to groan
author: Munia Khan

quote: The Key to Happiness is to be FREE to BE what you want to BE!
author: RVM

quote: I can't set my hopes too high,'Cause every hello ends with a goodbye.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: Woe, destruction, ruin, and decay; the worst is death and death will have his day.
author: William Shakespeare, Richard II

quote: A piece of art is part of its creator, you cannot split them apart. You cannot like one and dislike another.
author: Sameh Elsayed

quote: I resented you for inserting yourself so fully into my life, and then one day I realized I couldn't imagine my life without you...
author: Maya Banks, Sweet Temptation

quote: A slave believes that the law should define the scope of liberty. A free person believes that liberty should define the scope of the law.
author: Jakub Bożydar Wiśniewski, The Pith of Life: Aphorisms in Honor of Liberty

quote: Knowledge isn’t life changing. The application of knowledge is.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: It will all work out, Inas. You come from a long line of survivors and strong women. So everything will be fine in the end. And we are always with you in spirit, to guide you and love you.
author: Zack Love, The Syrian Virgin

quote: Keep your head down, Edward. Those that see too much quickly find themselves seeing nothing at all.
author: Jasper Fforde, Shades of Grey

quote: Don't allow a negative experience effect your day for the worse. We may not have the power to control everything that happens to us, but we DO have a choice on how we react to it.
author: Napz Cherub Pellazo

quote: The good physician treats the disease the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
author: William Osler

quote: Get up, work out, eat well, enjoy the moment, be present and show up for people who need your love; family, friends, less privileged, your followers. Appreciate love and remember, the journey is more important than the destination.
author: Val Uchendu

quote: Time eventually positions most photographs, even the most amateurish, at the level of art.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: Jesus has prayed over us that our faith in Him will not fail but rather be strengthened by the process we go through.
author: E'yen A. Gardner, Humbly Submitting to Change - The Wilderness Experience

quote: Love is more powerful than even the sun; light can only enter your eyes, but love can enter your soul.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Opportunities rarely give second chances.
author: Julieanne O'Connor, SPELLING IT OUT FOR YOUR CAREER

quote: A positive self-image has little relationship to our material circumstances.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Love doesn't seem to follow a plan; it's not a series of steps. It can hit with the force of nature - an earthquake, a tidal wave, a storm of wild, relentless energy that is beyond your simple attempts at control.
author: Deb Caletti, The Nature of Jade

quote: Dreams don't get done while we are asleep.
author: Sravani Saha Nakhro

quote: Death is a delightful hiding-place for weary men.
author: Herodotus

quote: To educate a person in the mind but not in morals is to educate a menace to society.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Deliverance is not for me in renunciation. I feel the embrace of freedom in a thousand bonds of delight.
author: Rabindranath Tagore, Gitanjali: Song Offerings

quote: the serpent if it wants to become the dragon must eat itself.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Reading and writing are not education if they do not help people to be kind to all creatures
author: John Ruskin

quote: He found that the business of optimism was no mean task.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Beautiful and Damned

quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive—to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love—then make that day count!
author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Like Christmas trees and Easter egg hunts and the block party on the last day of summer, we do things because traditions feel cozy and safe.
author: Corey Ann Haydu

quote: Find the window of unconditional love in your heart and liberate yourself from the prison of judgemental and conforming thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Some people live as though they are already dead. There are people moving around us who are consumed by their past, terrified of their future, and stuck in their anger and jealousy. They are not alive; they are just walking corpses.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh, You Are Here: Discovering the Magic of the Present Moment

quote: If you want to be a screenwriter, take an acting class to get a sense of what you're asking actors to do. Learning other skills will help you communicate with people and respect what they do.
author: Tina Fey

quote: You have all the reason in the world to achieve your grandest dreams. Imagination plus innovation equals realization.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Life has a certain flavor for those who have fought and risked all that the sheltered and protected can never experience.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: Love yourself and extend the love to others.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Youth offers the promise of happiness, but life offers the realities of grief.
author: Nicholas Sparks, The Rescue

quote: People write about "How they feel"... "Where they are now"...
author: Deyth Banger

quote: If you cannot change your condition, change your perception.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Those who bring sunshine to the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves.
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: They said they respect me, which means, their judgment is crazy.
author: Morrissey

quote: When men are rightly occupied  their amusement grows out of their work  as the color-petals out of a fruitful flower.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Reading . . . is an activity subsequent to writing: more resigned, more civil, more intellectual.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: I think a servant of the enemy would look fairer and feel fouler. -Frodo Baggins
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: If you fail a thousand times, find a thousand and one ways to succeed.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You're boring me, M'Ordant. Go away." V'Aidan"You can't be bored." M'Ordant"And a good thing, too, since I'd no doubt perish from it while in your company." V'Aidan
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon, Dark Bites

quote: Sex without foreplay is like song's reff without intro.
author: Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

quote: Younger women have no problem in reconciling beauty with ambitions as a professional woman.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: You can learn more in half an hour's direct contact with a source of knowledge (no matter the apparent reason for the contact or the subject of the transaction) than you can in years of formal effort.
author: Idries Shah, Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: Two powerful factors which creates difference between destroying your relationship and deepening it are EGO and Attitude
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KISS Life  "Life is what you make it"

quote: Believe in yourself, don't let no man define your future, work hard at your trade as if no man exist to help you and focus should be your lens against distractions.
author: Oscar Bimpong

quote: Success is a way of life with the sense of connection, compassion, and expansion of human life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: For many years, I tried to make New Year's resolutions. I made lists and shot for great heights: I would show altruism and exert moral strength, patience and all those other great attributes.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: The night is the balm for the wounded soul!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: The fear of God is to depart from evil.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Oh, miss Haversham said I,there have been sore mistakes and my life has been a blind and thankless one, and I want forgiveness and direction far too much to be bitter with you.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: At the end of the day let there be no regrets, only a desire to do more tomorrow than you did today.
author: Noel DeJesus

quote: It symbolizes a spear, and in this sorry world the symbol is the thing.
author: Neil Gaiman, American Gods

quote: What good is a path that doesn’t carry us to the edge of our capacity and then beyond that place? A true calling involves a great exposure before it can become a genuine refuge.
author: Michael Meade, Fate and Destiny, The Two Agreements of the Soul

quote: It's never too late to love and live again. Without love in life, nothing to lose or gain.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I am not learning definitions as established in even the latest dictionaries. I am not a dictionary-maker. I am a person a dictionary-maker has to contend with. I am a living evidence in the development of language.
author: William Stafford

quote: Never ever feel inferior because of the colour of your skin. Great is your soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, The Alphabets of  Success: Passion Driven Life

quote: [My mom's] funny that way, celebrating special occasions with blue food. I think it's her way of saying anything is possible. Percy can pass seventh grade. Waffles can be blue. Little miracles like that.
author: Rick Riordan, The Sea of Monsters

quote: I was the last of the four Dresden dolls. Only me... and I didn't want to be here.
author: V.C. Andrews, Seeds of Yesterday

quote: I am redeemed and saved by grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: The worst kind of tyrant is one that is righteously wrong
author: rassool jibraeel snyman

quote: The East has failed because it tried meditation without love. The West has failed because it tried love without meditation. My whole effort is to give you a synthesis, the whole—which means meditation plus love.
author: Osho, Courage: The Joy of Living Dangerously

quote: Critics do not determine how high an eagle flies.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Every day is a new day and every sunrise brings hope to the hopeless”.
author: Abdulazeez Henry Musa

quote: Power isn't free. Energy isn't free. It has to be earned.
author: Lauren Oliver, Requiem

quote: The graveyard is an everlasting resting place.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Family, friends and relationships are the blessings of the God. They are the best way to access God.
author: Amit Ray, Nonviolence: The Transforming Power

quote: Fear of failure impedes adequate self-identification
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I'm always angry about the death of people who are still alive, their eyes are opened, yet they can't see anything...the spell of ignorance
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Work is its own cure. You have to like it better than being loved.
author: Marge Piercy

quote: Justice is paramount. The new judgement is the justice of the hidden time.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Meditation is a way of finding inner quietness and inner tranquility.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Millions of people acknowledge today that they do not know the meaning of life.
author: James C. Dobson, Life on the Edge: The Next Generation's Guide to a Meaningful Future

quote: I think: by the time I'm old, nobody will be able to die any more.
author: Sara Baume, A Line Made by Walking

quote: Pray frequently as you read [the Bible] and you will discover a fellowship with God.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: Fellowship with human beings opens up to fellowship with God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To expect more, be more.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you judge people  you have no time to love them.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: In times of change and danger, when there is a quicksand of fear under one's reasoning, a sense of continuity with generations before can stretch like a lifeline across the scary present. John Dos Passos
author: George F. Will, The Woven Figure: Conservatism and America's Fabric

quote: In the fall of leaves,In the hustle of breeze,In the curve of streams, I foresee,Nature keeps more concealed,Than it lets us peep!
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: You're Hell's Angels, then? What chapter are you from?''REVELATIONS. CHAPTER SIX.
author: Neil Gaiman, Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch

quote: Hope is that great spirit that grant us courage to stay determined.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Each man must make is own sacred journey.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: The most essential gift for a good writer is a built-in, shock-proof, shit detector. This is the writer's radar and all great writers have had it.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Because, wherever your heart is, that is where you´ll find your treasure
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: There are no prizes for defying yourself.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Faith is such a wonderful thing. Without it, we would be panicky when we feel like we're standing alone and when the things we need and yearn for seem to be beyond our reach.
author: Ron Brackin

quote: Her solitary nature means she needs a family to keep her from loneliness my gregarious nature means I will never have to worry about being alone...
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Life offers many reasons to be alive. Death offers none.
author: Aditya Ajmera

quote: A joke is never a joke if it is at the expense of another person's feelings
author: Heather Wolf

quote: Running my fastest not from my past. Running from those who have hurt me in it. And, they can't catch me anymore. I escaped from the land of make believe.
author: Jill Telford

quote: We should meet in another life, we should meet in air, me and you.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: Sin is rebellion against God.
author: Billy Graham, Billy Graham in Quotes

quote: First, know where you want to go. Then, go where you want to go. You are your own pilot and you can choose your Destination.
author: RVM

quote: The paths to liberation are numerous, but the bank along the way is always the same, the Bank of Karma, where the liberation account of each of us is credited or debited depending on our actions.
author: Yann Martel, Life of Pi

quote: You can achieve the set-goals with passion, persistent with perseverance.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Imperfections don’t make something ugly.
author: Amy Neftzger, The Orchard of Hope

quote: Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The misunderstanding of passion and reason, as if the latter were an independent entity and not rather a system of relations between various passions and desires; and as if every passion did not possess its quantum of reason
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, The Will to Power

quote: Greatness is not greater than you. You have total control over greatness. You can decide to be great and it will happen.
author: Sunday Adelaja, How To Become Great Through Time Conversion: Are you wasting time, spending time or investing time?

quote: God cares about even the least part of us
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I tell you the truth, if you will leave your life based on the whims and caprices of men, you shall be like the corn in popcorn machine
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: A psychiatrist is the God of our age. But they cost money.
author: Sylvia Plath, The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: When lost in darkness he who lights the way, marks himself as easy prey.
author: Mark W. Boyer

quote: All those who seek to destroy the liberties of a democratic nation ought to know that war is the surest and shortest means to accomplish it.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: Your wishes doesn't come true, because there is someone else who is wishing harder and trying harder for the same wish.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: She saw and marked the revolutions that had been, and the present seemed to her only a point of rest, from which time was to renew his flight.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley, Valperga: Or, the Life and Adventures of Castruccio, Prince of Lucca

quote: The one who can see all the viewpoints of the world is a savior (tarantaranhaar – one who has attained liberation and graces others with the same).
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Let’s have a life with momentum and action. Set a goal for every day and every season.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: But if it was always a point of speculation, where one person insisted it was a certain way and another denied it, how would anyone ever hold on to the truth?
author: Kiera Cass, The Elite

quote: I am the most important person to me. I am the most important person in the entire universe to me. I am the centre of my own universe.
author: Patience Johnson, Why Does an Orderly God Allow Disorder

quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: There are limits to self-indulgence  none to self-restraint.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: if nothing endswhere do we begin?
author: Natasha Tsakos

quote: I am called to minister to people and inspire them to do more not to advertise them and have them swell up with pride.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu, The Prince and the Pauper

quote: The spirit of fornication and adultery robs a man of his authority in the spiritual realm.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: By getting to know you I get to know myself too.
author: Kate McGahan

quote: Even an animal, if you show genuine affection, gradually trust develops... If you always showing bad face and beating, how can you develop friendship?
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Verses which do not teach men new and moving truths do not deserve to be read.
author: Voltaire

quote: Don't confuse poor decision making with destiny. Take accountability for your life, cut out the drama, distance yourself from negativity, and move your life into a healthy direction.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: History, if it has taught us anything at all, has taught us that the strange ideas we deride today will one day be our celebrated truths.
author: Dan Brown, The Lost Symbol

quote: It is possible to draw a straight line with a crooked pencil.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: From now on when people asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up, I planned to say, Amnesiac.
author: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: Gravity is a contributing factor in nearly 73 percent of all accidents involving falling objects.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Ignorance is a virus. Once it starts spreading, it can only be cured by reason. For the sake of humanity, we must be that cure.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Materializations are often best produced in rooms where there are books. I cannot think of any time when materialization was in any way hampered by the presence of books.
author: Shirley Jackson, The Haunting of Hill House

quote: You think I'm prettyWithout any make-up onYou think I'm funnyWhen I tell the puch line wrongI know you get meSo I'll let my walls come down, down
author: Katy Perry

quote: He who has God and everything else has no more than he who has God only.
author: C.S. Lewis, The Weight of Glory

quote: Regrets begin the moment we're comfortable with settling.
author: Andrena Sawyer

quote: To accomplish great things, we must dream as well as act.
author: Anatole France

quote: Art gives people a reason to be alive.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: Asking children to grow virtues hydroponically, looking only within themselves for guidance, is like asking each one to invent a personal language―a pointless and isolating task if there is no community with whom to speak.
author: Jonathan Haidt

quote: If you press me to say why I loved him  I can say no more than because he was he  and I was I.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Self motivation leads to acceptance of thyself.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There’s been time this whole time. You can’t kill time with your heart. Everything takes time.
author: David Foster Wallace, Brief Interviews with Hideous Men

quote: If you keep standing on the verge of greatness, you'll eventually get the courage to leap into it,
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones, Giants At Play: Finding Wisdom, Courage, And Acceptance To Encounter Your Destiny

quote: You only fix something, when it’s broken. And you - are far from broken.
author: Abhijit Naskar, The Bengal Tigress: A Treatise on Gender Equality

quote: You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.
author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quote: Sugar, it's no parade but you'll get down the street one way or another, so you'd just as well throw your shoulders back and pick up the pace.
author: Barbara Kingsolver, The Poisonwood Bible
